name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ugh.  Reduced to marking my camp with bear sweat. Those bears did not want to give up that sweat,  but it keeps the rodents from nibbling my lumps while I sleep. Ouch! I feel something crunchy! Like fried chicken!  Oh, it is fried chicken!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my Glob—forest creature! I'd better eat it real fast!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Get back here!     Aah!  What my life has become!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hello? Oh, my Glob!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, wonderful!  Welcome in, LSP. Uh, I want to go through—

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: This place is so clean and nice!

name: Tree Trunks
line: You're so kind.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Do you have a sink?!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Uh, there's one in the kitchen, and—

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I'll use the one in the kitchen!

name: Tree Trunks
line: I need to tell you all the s—

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Get me a towel!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Help me down!

name: Tree Trunks
line: O-okay, I-I really do need to tell you how to care for Sweet P. Uh, there's a proper procedure for Sweet P's special tuck-in time. You have to be real sweet to him. Pat him gently on the head, kiss his cheeks...

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What?

name: Tree Trunks
line: ...And give him treats. Sing to him real, real soft and sweet and touch your forehead to his and think the words, "You are more precious than anything in this world, and I will always, always love you." Then he'll fall asleep and have sweet dreams.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my Glob, I'll do all that! Okay, bye! Have a wonderful time!  Time to get down to the chill-out!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What a princess like me deserves.  Aah! Don't hurt me!

name: Sweet P
line: I'm Sweet P.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I didn't know you were huge.

name: Sweet P
line: I'm hungry.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Okay, let's check what's in the fridge.  Do you like pizza?

name: Sweet P
line: I like pizza.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Get the pizza, Sweet P!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Now I can kick back.   Refrigerators are just great! I never stopped to think how great they are.     Now I'm cold, though.  Oh, what?!  I'm still cold.   Rich-person indoor fire is just so great.  I'm feeling all toasty! Must be time for toast!  I'm waiting... Waiting... Waiting... All done!   It's not black and crunchy like when I throw bread into my campfire.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: This music's way better than owls' hoots.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I deserve this.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No! You're an animal! You can't come inside!

name: Sweet P
line: I'm ready to be tucked in now. Hello? Will you be sweet to me?

name: Sweet P
line: Sweetness must be out there in the night to guide my sleepy boat right.

name: Marceline
line: Yo!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hey, Marcy!

name: Marceline
line: LSPita bread, what's up?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Just chillin' in my awesome bubble bath!

name: Marceline
line: Did you break into someone's house again?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ugh! I have a new life now and a career.

name: Marceline
line: I didn't know you had any skills.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Success isn't about skills. It's about being cool. These people just randomly approached me, like, "Hey, we will totally pay you to hang out in our sick mansion and feed our baby" or whatever.

name: Marceline
line: Well, good for you, dude.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I mean, I feel like a totally new person now that I'm finally getting what I deserve.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my Glob, what is that?!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Aah!

name: Marceline
line: LSP? Mm.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Take this, you dandruff!

name: Raccoon
line: LSP.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Huh?

name: Raccoon
line: You don't belong here in the world of decent people. You belong in the woods with...  garbage animals!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Noooooooo!

name: Sweet P
line: Will you be sweet to me?

name: Sweet P
line: Will you kiss my cheeks?

name: Sweet P
line: Will you give me treats?

name: Sweet P
line: Blech!

name: Sweet P
line: Will you be sweet to me?

name: Banana Guards
line: Wee-Ooo! Wee-Ooo! Wee-Ooo! Wee-Ooo!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Agh!

name: Raccoon
line: Look what you've done, LSP.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Huh?

name: Raccoon
line: You made it gross. Everything you touch turns gross!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Uh...

name: Raccoon
line: Just like you!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Aah!

name: Raccoon
line: You don't really think you deserved any of this, do you? You're a rat, just a giant rat that wandered into somebody's nice house.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I'm a good person! I take care of babies!  Look! Baby Sweet P?   Baby Sweet P! Oh, my Glob, I lost the baby! I lost the baby!  I'm a bad person!

name: Raccoon
line: Just accept that you're garbage!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hi-yah!  Baby Sweet P!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Have you seen a big, fat child around here?!  Have you seen my enormous baby?!  If only I'd cooked the pizza!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I could've eaten some, too! I'm so stupid!  You got to help me! I lost some old couple's baby 'cause I didn't do the sweet things! I just wanted a bubble bath, and... How did I lose something so bi-i-i-i-g?!

name: Banana Guard
line: Ma'am, you're gonna have to come with us.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Baby Sweet P!  Give me that donut!

name: Banana Guard
line: No!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I'm not a bad person! I'm not a bad person!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Huh?

name: Banana Guard
line: Hey, big baby!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I found you!

name: Sweet P
line: LSP!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Sweet P! I'm so sorry! I should've been sweet to you! Here, okay, um... Pat very gently on the head... Kiss on both cheeks... Mwah! Mwah! Treat.

name: Sweet P
line: Mmm!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Uh, and sing something sweet.  ♪ Butter cakes, cupcakes, and ice cream cakes small baby bums and the friendship of puppies ♪  You are more precious than anything in this world, and I will always, always love you.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Aww!

name: Tree Trunks
line: We're ho-o-me!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Shh! He's asleep.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Why is Sweet P's blanket on the wall—?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Shh!  Mr. and Mrs. Pig Trunks, I have some good news. Sweet P has grown so attached to me that it would be cruel for me to leave him, obviously. So... Yes, I will accept the position as your live-in nanny!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Huh?

name: Raccoon
line: Partake of the chicken.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Chicken...

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: This is good chicken!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Maybe we can get, uh, Neptr to sit. I don't know.

name: Sweet P
line: Mama? I had that dream again—the one where I'm a comet boy.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, really?

name: Sweet P
line: Yeah, coming back to Ooo over and over, and there was a fake comet, a beard man in a spaceship.

name: Tree Trunks
line: My, what an imagination...

name: Sweet P
line: The comet... approacheth.

name: Jake
line: Hey, man.

name: Finn
line: What's so funny?

name: Jake
line: Oh, you know, just takin' this garbage bag of butter...  ...into the house.

name: Finn
line: Dude. That's not that funny.  EAAH!!

name: Jake
line: HAHAHAHAHA!

name: Finn
line: Ohhh, butter pranked! I can't believe I didn't see that coming!

name: Jake
line: Heh, yeah, I'm a genius.

name: Finn
line: You have offended my honor, sir, and in so doing, you have awoken the pranking demon that sleeps in my pits! The demon is coming for you, mortal. It is going to prank you... so... HARD!

name: Jake
line: Whatever. I'm gonna take a day long nap.

name: Finn
line: That's right, suckah! Go nap it up, for when you awake, the pranking demon will be upon you!   Aww, man! Nothing's better than throwing a big bag of butter at someone!  Gotta think! What's... a better prank... than butter?! Answer me, book! What's better than butter?! A unicorn.  A treasure hunter!  A battleship!  A pie!  A young girl in lo—Wait! Book, rewind!  That's it! I'll throw never-ending pies at Jake's face forever!

name: Finn
line: It's never-ending pie-throwing time! C'mon, dude! Turn on!  Why isn't it working?!  I'll never make a prank better than Jake's garbage bag full of butter.

name: Neptr
line: Ouch!

name: Finn
line: Holy stuff! It talked! Wow-cow-chow!

name: Neptr
line: Greeting, creator!

name: Finn
line: Oh, whoa! Hey, man!

name: Neptr
line: My name is Neptr, which stands for "Never-Ending Pie-Throwing Robot."

name: Finn
line: Oh, perfect! You're exactly the kind of robot I was trying to make!

name: Neptr
line: Creator, I am eager to commence the creation and propulsion of pies forever, but my pie-hucking appendage is... malfunctioning, and my oven lamp is cold, and my tank treads do not roll! They only do skids! Why, creator?!  Does it please you to watch me struggle?!

name: Finn
line: Neptr! Don't say stuff like that! Look, I know we just met, and you're probably goin' through a lot of personal stuff right now, but I really like you, Neptr, and I'm not gonna rest until you're working properly and throwing hot pie on my best friend's face. Together, we're gonna prank the poots out of Jake!

name: Neptr
line: Haha! I'll always love you, creator!

name: Finn
line: I know you will, Neptr. Now, all we need is more lightning power so you can be operating at full capacity! And I think I know just the dumb-hole who we can get some from.

name: Neptr
line: Ooh, what beautiful piles of sugar!

name: Finn
line: Heh. No, Neptr. We call that snow.

name: Neptr
line: Snoooow??

name: Finn
line: UNH!  Did y'all smack me into that mountain on purpose?

name: Balloons
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Take note, Neptr. These guys are grade-A pranksters. You guys hang out in case we need a daring escape!

name: One Balloon
line: I got his wallet.

name: Finn
line: Just gotta sneak around until we find his lightning bolt stash.

name: Neptr
line: But, creator, is not breaking and entering wrong?

name: Finn
line: No, we're pranking and entering, which is awesome!

name: Neptr
line: Sneaking! We're sneaking...

name: Finn
line: Shush, Neptr!

name: Neptr
line: Sneaking...

name: Finn
line: Shh!

name: Neptr
line: Sneaking...

name: Finn
line: Neptr, you're gonna get us caught!

name: Neptr
line: Sneaking!

name: Ice King
line: Is that you, honey?  How was your day at work?  Terrible! How could I possibly stand to be apart from you, the Ice King?!  You see, Gunter, that's how it would go if I actually had a wife.

name: Penguin
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Game time!  Kill the frog! Kill the frog! C'mon! Oh, he's right in front of you! Lower! L— Stupid lady. Kill it...

name: Neptr
line: Creator, if we get caught, I want you to know that I will always love you.

name: Finn
line: Shh! You already told me that! And we're not getting caught! We're gonna get you working so you can prank Jake! He could wake up from his nap at any second!

name: Jake
line: I might wake up at any moment! Naaaah, I'm still asleep.

name: Ice King
line: No, no! That frog is casting magic missiles on my babe!

name: Finn
line: Quickly! While he's distracted!

name: Ice King
line: No, c'mon, get out of the—UGH! Move!

name: Penguin
line: Wenk!

name: Ice King
line: Baaaugh!  This game cheats anyway!  LOOK WHAT YOU DID, GUNTER!!

name: Finn
line: We're home free, Neptr.

name: Penguin
line: Wenk wenk wenk wenk wenk wenk wenk!

name: Ice King
line: What are you on about? You're starting to infuriate me... It's almost like you're trying to alert me—warn me about... I don't know, an intruder or something? Perhaps he's lurking in this very room, just outside my field of vision!

name: Penguin
line: Wenk wenk wenk wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Well, knock it off!!

name: Neptr
line: What'll we do, creator?

name: Finn
line: We're gonna prank 'im, Neptr. Hardcore.

name: Ice King
line: Hmm. You're looking kinda fat, Gunter! Look at these arms! Fat fat fat! Daddy's little fattie! Oh, you'll never get a prom date with all that chub on your face, you know!  Ooh! Oh, blast these melty ceilings!

name: Finn
line: Hee hee hee hee!

name: Neptr
line: Creator, you have shown me the joys of pranking! I cannot wait to throw pies infinitely at Jake's face!

name: Finn
line: The ceiling really is melty!  Whoa! Whoa!

name: Ice King
line: What was that?

name: Finn
line: WAAAAH!

name: Ice Toads
line: Alarm! Alarm! Alarm!

name: Finn
line: Figs!

name: Ice King
line: Huh? An intruder! Maybe a beautiful princess like in my poems.

name: Finn
line: We've gotta find that lightning as fast as—

name: Neptr
line: Creator! Lightning!

name: Finn
line: It's a lightning-shaped door! And we're gonna smash right into it! Hold on, Neptr! I got a plan!

name: Neptr
line: That was a great plan!

name: Finn
line: Nah, that wasn't my plan. We got lucky!

name: Neptr
line: Are those my tickets to the gun show, creator?

name: Finn
line: Mm-hmm. You're gonna be fully functional just like I promised.

name: Ice King
line: Whoa, ice-o-pede! Finn?! Oh, why can't you ever be a princess?! Ice-o-pede, attack!  Ice-o-pede, no! Aaah!

name: Finn
line: Let's grab some lightning and get outta here!

name: Ice King
line: Hahaha! Finish him off, my semi-loyal pet!  An innocent bystander?! ZAP!

name: Finn
line: Neptr! NOOOOO!  NOOOOOO!—Oh, yeah. That's what we wanted to happen.

name: Neptr
line: Neptr is fully functional! Yay!

name: Finn
line: Neptr! Yeah!

name: Ice King
line: Crush him! Crush him like you crushed me!!

name: Neptr
line: Creator?

name: Finn
line: Neptr! The pies! Pies!

name: Neptr
line: Oh, right!

name: Ice King
line: Come on!

name: Finn
line: What was in those pies?!

name: Neptr
line: Just boysenberry. Hahaha. And also... poison.

name: Finn
line: Neptr's acting... different.

name: Balloons
line: Quick, Finn! Jump!

name: Finn
line: Heh heh. You guys got me.

name: Ice King
line: Something about that robot I tried to kill fills me with... deep longing.

name: Finn
line: Thanks, guys. Your blood-oath is fulfilled.

name: Balloons
line: Yay! To the mesosphere!

name: One Balloon
line: Finally we can die!

name: Neptr
line: I am troubled, creator. Troubled by a sudden urge to... collect princesses.

name: Finn
line: Neptr, that's a heavy unsettling thing to say, but pull yourself together. We're about to prank Jake!

name: Neptr
line: Uh-huh. Sure.

name: Finn
line: One... two...

name: Ice King
line: THREE!

name: Finn
line: Run, Neptr!!

name: Neptr
line: Oooh!

name: Finn
line: Hah! Hah! Hah!  Aw, man.

name: Ice King
line: I've come to take my son.

name: Finn
line: Your son?!

name: Ice King
line: Come to Papi, son. I won't attack you... unless provoked.

name: Finn
line: He's not your son! If anything, he's my son!

name: Ice King
line: It was my power that activated his full potential. Zzz.

name: Neptr
line: Oooh...

name: Ice King
line: When you were struck by my lightening, you also became infused with my private particles. He wants to be with me, Finn!

name: Finn
line: No way! Neptr wants to help me prank Jake!

name: Neptr
line: I am torn! I am processing a love for both princesses and pranking!

name: Ice King
line: Don't worry, son. I'll show you the life you deserve!

name: Finn
line: No! Neptr!

name: Ice King
line: Yes! Now that we've entered my imagination zone, allow me to tantalize you with this!  Princesses! As my son, you will carry on the tradition of capturing ladies!

name: Neptr
line: Tell me more, Papi!

name: Finn
line: No, Neptr!

name: Ice King
line: I want a son who can do better than I. One who can succeed where I... have failed. You can mate with robot princesses!

name: Neptr
line: Can I still prank with Finn after?

name: Ice King
line: NO!! I'll show you what will happen if you hang out with Finn!

name: Imaginary Finn & Jake
line: Yeah! Pootin' on Neptr to the max!

name: Neptr
line: Haha! Yeah, I love Finn's pranks!

name: Ice King
line: NOOOOO!!  I'm through playing around, son. Who do you choose?

name: Finn
line: Come on, Neptr. Choose me, buddy. Choose pranks.

name: Neptr
line: I... uh, I... choose... Ice King!

name: Finn
line: WHAT?! You've gotta be flippin' kidding me!

name: Ice King
line: He made his choice! Get over it, crybaby!

name: Neptr
line: I'm not finished. I choose Ice King... to prank! Hardcore!

name: Ice King
line: WHHHAAAAT—  Aah! My face!  I birthed you and I can un-birth you!

name: Finn
line: NEVER!

name: Ice King
line: OOF!

name: Neptr
line: Sleep well, Papi. In your Imagination Zone full of beautiful princesses.

name: Finn
line: You wanna prank Jake?

name: Neptr
line: It's why I was created.

name: Finn
line: Haha, okay. Let's gooooo!  Jake! Wake up!

name: Jake
line: Ahhh, hey, du—AAAAAH!

name: Imaginary Neptr
line: Sun is going down. Shall we capture princesses now, Papi?

name: Ice King
line: No, let's just stay here a little longer, son.

name: Imaginary Neptr
line: I love you forever, Papi.

name: BMO
line: Haha! Take that, Master Chen!

name: Finn
line: JAAAAKE!

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Jake, did you hide my sock?

name: Jake
line: No, man, I told you,

name: Jake
line: I don't do that kinda stuff anymore.

name: Finn
line: So, what? It just magically disappeared?

name: Jake
line: I don't know...

name: Jake
line: Maybe.

name: Finn
line: Is that just a cute way of saying you took it?

name: Jake
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Why don't you just help me find my sock?

name: Jake
line: Oh, Finn lost his sock! Everybody stop what you're doing and help Finn find his precious sock!

name: BMO
line: It looked like a tough case to crack. But I hate to see good friends fight.

name: BMO
line: So I decided to take the case.

name: BMO
line: Hmm...

name: BMO
line: Ronnie!

name: BMO
line: It looked like I had a guilty mouse.

name: BMO
line: Huh!

name: BMO
line: Hello, Ronnie.

name: BMO
line: What do you want, BMO?

name: BMO
line: Where is Finn's sock?

name: BMO
line: I don't know what you're talking about, BMO. I didn't do nothin'. Leave me alone!

name: BMO
line: I knew that lipstick anywhere.

name: BMO
line: How is Lorraine?

name: BMO
line: You stay away from her! She is with me now, do you hear?

name: BMO
line: Calm down, big guy. Me and Lorraine are dinosaur bones.

name: BMO
line: Good, 'cause I would be so jealous.

name: BMO
line: Just tell me where the sock is, and I will let you go.

name: BMO
line: I don't know, man.

name: BMO
line: What if I put some knuckle in your eyeballs? Would that help you think?

name: BMO
line: Ok! Ok! Umm...

name: BMO
line: It looks like a grape juice stain on his sock; check the pantry.

name: BMO
line: Of course I didn't trust Ronnie, but I had no other leads.  Maybe the grape juice had some secrets to tell me. Or maybe Ronnie was just pulling my hair.

name: BMO
line: Just as I thought, not even opened. I fell right into his trap.

name: BMO
line: Let me out, you! I'll get you! Piece of... you! Ronnie!  Officer Davis! Thank goodness. I...

name: BMO
line: BMO, what are you doing here?

name: BMO
line: Looking for Finn's socks, same as you.

name: BMO
line: We got this to under control.  Stay out of police business, or you will be the one behind bars.

name: BMO
line: I didn't listen to that cop. I needed to find Ronnie, and I knew just the lady who could lead me to him.  She looked as beautiful as ever.

name: BMO
line: Where is the sock, Lorraine?

name: BMO
line: What makes you think I know?

name: BMO
line: I saw your lipstick on his fur, so don't act so cute.

name: BMO
line: Sounds like someone's jealous, no?

name: BMO
line: Don't count on it, Lorraine. Now tell me where Ronnie is.

name: BMO
line: Ha! You think it was Ronnie? Maybe if he was man enough to steal a sock, I wouldn't have to spend my nights with Bebe.

name: BMO
line: Bebe? So you're saying Bebe is man enough?

name: BMO
line: What? No, you're putting words in my mouth. Bebe doesn't know anything about Finn's sock.

name: BMO
line: Finn's sock? How did you know it was Finn's sock? I never said whose sock was stolen, Lorraine.

name: BMO
line: Uh... uh... I heard it on the TV news.

name: BMO
line: No dice, sweet beak. Officer Davis has this case under tight wraps.

name: BMO
line: Oh, fine, Bebe stole the sock. Oh, BMO, can't you just forget about it?

name: BMO
line: Sorry, lady, forgetting ain't in my job description. Ha ha ha!

name: BMO
line: Does that mean you still remember... us?

name: BMO
line: ... Hahaha! Same old Lorraine.

name: BMO
line: Well, don't tell Ronnie about me and Bebe.  You know how he gets when he's jealous.

name: BMO
line: Bebe owned Bebe's, a dance club downtown.  He yells at ladies!

name: BMO
line: Wake up, brainiac.

name: BMO
line: BMO? Uh...uh...auh!

name: BMO
line: Where is the sock, Bebe?

name: BMO
line: Uh ... I don't know nothing about socks!

name: BMO
line: Don't play dumb, Bebe!  Don't play dumb with me!

name: BMO
line: I talked to Lorraine, Bebe. She sold you out, dumb dumb!

name: BMO
line: No! She-she wouldn't do that! It wasn't me, I swear! It was Ronnie!

name: BMO
line: Ronnie? But why?

name: BMO
line: I don't know, man! I don't know!  Oh, Lorraine!

name: BMO
line: I'm gonna go wash this shmutz off my grabbers. When I get back, you better start talking sense!

name: BMO
line: It wasn't adding up. Why would Ronnie swipe the sock? And why would Lorraine finger Bebe?  Sure, he's a dirt bag born out of a mother, but who's not?

name: BMO
line: I don't really get it.

name: BMO
line: Maybe it was time to cut my losses.

name: BMO
line: Come on, Bebe, let's get you cleaned up. Bebe?

name: BMO
line: Bebe!  Dead. This doesn't look good. I'd better hightail it!

name: BMO
line: Huh? The cops!? It was a setup!

name: BMO
line: Oh no!  Bang, bang! Pew, pew, pew!

name: Jake
line: Hey, has anyone seen BMO?  BMO? Where's BMO?

name: BMO
line: Hello?

name: Finn
line: I'm worried about BMO.

name: BMO
line: This is real.

name: Jake
line: BMO!

name: BMO
line: Who's BMO?

name: Different BMO
line: Hello.

name: Neptr
line: Hello? Hello? Hello? Hey, BMO. Wake up, buddy. Are you alright?

name: BMO
line: Neptr? I feel like I got hit with a Dracula by King Kong.

name: Neptr
line: Whoa, sorry, man. You want some pie or something?

name: BMO
line: Sorry, I gotta run. The cops are after me. Have you seen any down here?

name: Neptr
line: Nah, no one's been down here all day except me, you, and Ronnie.

name: BMO
line: What?! What was Ronnie doing down here?!

name: Neptr
line: I don't know, but now my sensors indicate that some treasure is missing ...about a sock's worth.

name: BMO
line: That's it! That's why Ronnie took the sock To carry stolen treasure in with! He had to whack Bebe to keep him from squealing, then he pinned the rap on me.

name: Neptr
line: Bebe's dead?

name: BMO
line: Listen, Neptr you better lay low for awhile. I'm gonna go find Ronnie . I've got a score to settle.

name: Neptr
line: Hey, BMO. We should hang out more. We're both robots.

name: BMO
line: No, Neptr. I am not like you.

name: BMO
line: Ronnie?

name: BMO
line: Evening, BMO.

name: BMO
line: Don't worry, buddy. You're off the hook. We know it was Ronnie who killed Bebe and snatched the treasure . We found this confession on him after the shootout.

name: BMO
line: Hmmmmm...what about the sock?

name: BMO
line: Forget the sock, BMO. The case is closed. Let it go, buddy. It's over.

name: BMO
line: Maybe he was right. But I just couldn't shake the feeling that, somehow, this case had slipped right through my fingers.  Lipstick?

name: BMO
line: Lorraine!

name: BMO
line: BMO?

name: BMO
line: Get back here with that treasure, Lorraine!

name: BMO
line: Sorry, BMO. I earned this loot. Those chumps were not framing themselves. See you around, BMO.

name: BMO
line: Lorraine, wait! What about the sock, Lorraine?

name: BMO
line: Oh, that old thing? I hid that where no one would ever find it in our secret, grown-up kissing spot. Remember?

name: BMO
line: It was good to see you again, BMO . Till next time.

name: BMO
line: Till next time, Lorraine.

name: Jake
line: Ya see, man? That was really fun. You don't need two socks to have fun.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I guess. But maybe it woulda been more fun with two socks!

name: BMO
line: Finn, Finn! I know where your sock is!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: BMO
line: It was in your pillow this whole time! See?

name: Finn
line: Whoa haha!  Right on, BMO!

name: BMO
line: Ronnie the mouse stole it, but Lorraine chicken set him up to kill Bebe, but the flatfoot busted Ronnie, and Lorraine skedaddled with the loot, but BMO solved the case!

line: Yay, BMO! Yay! Yeah!

name: BMO
line: Yay, BMO!

name: Finn
line: Yay!

name: BMO
line: Yay, BMO!

name: BMO

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: In the Kingdom of Ooo there is a galaxy of flavors, but only one taste sensation is amazing enough to kill for—the Royal tart.   Royal tarts are very rare. They are only eaten at the most sacred gathering in Ooo—the annual Back-Rubbing Ceremony . The tart is so legendary that countless thieves will risk their lives for just one bite.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: My head will be decapitated if the tarts don't make it to the ceremony. I only trust one guy to deliver them... the Royal Tart Toter.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: He's magnificent!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: He used to be, but he's gone mad and old. So he can't deliver the tarts anymore. Cinnamon Bun offered to fill the position, but he's kind of... half-baked.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Hey Princess! Here I go!  I'm stuck.

name: Finn
line: Princess, let us deliver the tarts.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Are you sure Finn? This is really important.

name: Finn
line: Princess, I have never been more sure of anything in my whole life!  I'll do anything it takes to keep you alive and safe. We won't let you down.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well... I accept your offer.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Welcome to the Tartorium!

name: Finn
line: Wow.  They're so beautiful.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, boys. Those are the reject tarts, full of imperfections.  These are the perfect tarts...  safely packed into one of my anti-gravity tote chambers.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Tote sweet!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Now, I want you to tote those tarts through that tunnel.  The Royal Tart Path takes you directly to the Royal Congressional Hall in the Bad Lands. The path is really safe and well protected, but keep your eyes open for any sign of danger, okay?

name: Finn
line: Mmm hmm.

name: Jake
line: Yep.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Good. Now here's your map.

name: Finn
line: Hey Princess, what are all these bubbling chemicals all over the place?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's paralyzing potion, Finn! Don't touch it. It'll paralyze you forever!

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thank you, boys. And remember, my head is on the line!

name: Jake
line: All right, let's hit it.

name: Finn
line: Wait. I got a sick plan!

name: Finn
line: Go!

line: Okay.  Bye! Bye-bye! Bye-bye! Bye!

name: Finn
line: Goodbye! You'll be fine! Hahaha!

name: Jake
line: Bye! Goodbye!

line: Heh, that was fun, but why'd you do it?

name: Finn
line: Look, everyone expects the tarts to on that Royal Tart Path. Cinnamon Bun will be our decoy while we take the one path no thief expect a tart toter to take the Desert of Doom!

name: Jake
line: I guess this is it.

name: Finn
line: Huh, not as scary as I thought it'd be.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man, mostly just looks empty. I mean, what thief would ever hang out here? There's nothing to steal!

name: Finn
line: You know, I think my plan might be kinda brilliant. I mean, I'm not saying I'm the brilliant, but it's a pretty brilliant plan, I think.

name: Jake
line: True, true. This place is perfect for toting tarts.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, and the Back-Rubbing Ceremony is right over those mountains.  This tart tote is gonna be a total tart walk.

name: Jake
line: I think they're just dirty hobos.

name: Finn
line: No, man, they are cold-blooded tart destroyers and we have to get them before they get us.

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: They're gonna kill Princess Bubblegum by stealin' our tarts!

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Jake
line: Rawr!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, go on, get! We'll mash you up crazy!  You! Listen up and tell your friends the next time you wanna steal one of our tarts—!

name: Grimby
line: You got tarts?

name: Finn
line: You know we do! And the next time you want to steal one—!  You picture this guy right here  chewin' on your brain!  What the—?!  That thing's gettin' the tarts!

name: Finn
line: Son of a—.

line: Uh-oh, man, he got, like, five or six!

name: Finn

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn? Finn! Oh, well, I'll see you soon enough!

name: Holo-Pendant
line: Transmission complete.

name: Jake
line: I think the plan went awry.

name: Finn
line: No! All this was just some freak bad luck, but we still got some tarts and the princess is still safe.

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah, and who knows what kind of freaky things would have happened if we took the Royal Tart Path?  Heheh, old Cinnamon Bun's probably got his hands full.

line: I-I—alright, here it comes.  I had a brilliant plan to tote the tarts along a dangerous path, but I mucked it up.  You oughtta give this toter job to Cinnamon Bun. He's the real hero.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The old Tart Toter!  Nobody move! He can't see or hear, but he can feel your movement.

name: Royal Tart Toter
line: Hello? Eat my tarts? This cosmic dance of bursting decadence and withheld permissions twists all our arms collectively, but if sweetness can win—and it can— then I'll still be here tomorrow, to high-five you yesterday, my friends. Peace.

line: Great. What am I supposed to do now?

name: Finn
line: Wait. Hey. Hey, I just smashed you. I... Ah... Magic door, okay. Right, but if I...

name: Finn
line: Well done, Finn. You solved the magic door. That ought to have done it, and... Oh. This door is too tricky for me. Guess I better give up, right? Wrong, wrong! Let's try that again.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Smooth like metal. Floor's smooth too. What have we here? An errant thread!  It must lead back out. Bread-crumb... Oh, trap door?  Spike trap. Better head back and regroup.

name: Finn
line: Fiendish. Anyway, don't let's do that again.

name: Finn
line: And right then straight. And... Hey now. Hold the phone, there should be a left turn here. Letters? E... G... 'Egress'. It spells 'egress'. This way! And here's another one, and another...  Whoa!

name: Finn
line: Okay. So, every map I make is wrong. All the exit signs led to traps. Plus the braille, the hieroglyphics, and the tape recorder message too. It's  almost like the maze is trying to tell me something. Something confusing, whatever! Who needs anyway with your stupid signs and messages? I'm Finn Mertens, ya heard? And I don't need no nothing! Watch me.

name: Jake
line: Finn? Fi-inn!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Jake, I'm coming!

name: Jake
line: Finn? Where are ya, buddy?

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Finn
line: That's a little disappointing. Still, though. I'm in the homestretch here.

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Finn! There you are.

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Sorry to pop up, then disappear again like that.

name: Jake
line: Again? You just got here, son.

name: Finn
line: I did? Shoot, man. This cave has got me straight scrambled up and down.

name: Jake
line: What cave?

name: Finn
line: What? Oh. Uh oh.

name: Finn
line: Well?

name: Jake
line: Well, I followed your map, but there's just a bunch of grass here.

name: Finn
line: What? Let me see!

name: Finn
line: Dang it.

name: Finn
line: So, yeah. Everything I did to try to make sense of the maze or to play it safe totally backfired, but when I got fed up, and started just charging in willy-nilly, I was able to get to the end and find you.

name: Jake
line: And then the whole thing disappeared. But I wonder how come I don't remember any of it.

name: Finn
line: I don't know. I'm just hoping, maybe if I sleep it off, maybe I'll be better in the morning.

name: Jake
line: Okay, well... Good night, buddy.

name: Finn
line: Thanks, Jake. Good night.

name: BMO
line: Are you awake?

name: Finn
line: Yes.

name: BMO
line: Are you gonna open your eyes now?

name: Finn
line: Maybe.

name: BMO
line: Are you scared?

name: Finn
line: No.

name: BMO
line: Then do it.

name: Finn
line: On three.

name: BMO, Finn
line: One, two, three,...

name: Jake
line: So, been almost a month now. What do you think? You wanna try opening 'em? It's beautiful day. Plus, I need someone to tell me if this hat looks cool.

name: Finn
line: Man I told you. If I open 'em now, it'll just be the same. I got to wait till something's different.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, that makes sense, I guess. So, um, I got you a little something, a little present.

name: Finn
line: Wow, thanks man!

name: Jake
line: You're really gonna thank me. Gotcha!

name: Finn
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, you've done it, like, 30 times now.

name: Finn
line: It's like programmed into your DNA or something.

name: Jake
line: Well, shoot, man. If I wanna do it that bad, it must be kinda right, right?

name: Jake
line: Look at it from where I'm sitting. All this funky pizzazz that only you can see, that's like the literal definition of a hallucination, either all that stuff is a dream or like, I'm a dream. And I ain't no dream, ya heard?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I know, I heard. It's just that, well...

name: BMO
line: Hyah! Open up!

name: Finn
line: Oh, Jake, I know you mean well, but I guess I got to see this one through on my own.  I'll see you around, buddy.

name: Finn
line: Huh? What the... How long has this been going on? Someone's apt to track me down, bread-crumb style, e.g. Jake. Can't let him catch me. No more threads to follow. No more egress.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. It's cool in here... Ain't nothing wrong with that. Deep too. That's good. Ain't nobody gonna be looking for me down. Ugh!  Egress! Egress! Egress! Egress!

name: BMO's voice
line: Something's different.

name: Princess Bubblegum's voice
line: Hurry, Finn. At the seashell's center lies, the cornucopia's smallest door.

name: Jake
line: Whoa! That must have been some cave!

name: Finn
line: No comment!

name: Jake
line: You're totally slow dude, speed up them gams.

name: Finn
line: Auh... I'm not used, uh... to running on all fours! Oahh!

name: Jake
line: Ready to admit it's harder than it looks?

name: Finn
line: I'll never admit anything to you. Hey where'd you go?

name: Jake
line: Heh heh heh.

name: Finn
line: Whoa aoh oh! Umpf! Okay I admit it's, it's harder than I thought.

name: Jake
line: Actually you did pretty good! Hey check it out!

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Looks like a giant dead turtle.

name: Finn
line: I think it's some kind of city of...

name: Hag
line: Thieves! It's the City of Thieves! Be warned boy! All who enter the city are destined to be come thieves themselves!  Even you.

name: Finn
line: I would't become a thief lady! I'm a pretty good guy.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, get your glasses on grandma, this kid is pure. In fact he's about to help that little crying kid.

name: Finn
line: Oh, whoa!

name: Hag
line: Be warned!

name: Finn
line: Enough lady!  Hey little girl, are you okay?

name: Penny
line: Please, don't steal anything from me!

name: Finn
line: Whoa! We wouldn't do that. We're heroes.

name: Jake
line: We want to turn your frown all the way around.

name: Penny
line: Ahh!

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: I'll face the other way, but I'm gonna keep doing this.

name: Finn
line: So what's wrong?

name: Penny
line: Oh, it was terrible. I was trying to sell my flowers out here in the desert, when these two thieves came and stole my whole basket! Then ran into the city.

name: Finn
line: The city?

name: Hag
line: ...of Thieves!

name: Jake
line: Oh boy.

name: Hag
line: Heed my warning boy enter the city, and you'll come out a thief!

name: Finn
line: Never.  I'll get this girl's flowers back-

name: Penny
line: My name is Penny.

name: Finn
line: I'll get Penny's flowers back, and come out of that city as pure as the driven snow. Let's go Jake!

name: Jake
line: Yeah! We're gonna purify that city!

name: Finn
line: Cool.

name: Jake
line: Crud.

name: Big Guy
line: My ring!

name: Finn
line: Stop thief!

name: Finn
line: Stop!

name: Big Guy
line: My ruby!

name: Finn
line: Stop, baby! Don't steal!

name: Finn
line: Don't steal, Mr. Turtle!

name: Penny
line: Finn, it's hopeless to try stopping a thief here. Everyone steals from each other. It's redoodoodiculous!

name: Finn
line: Penny! Never say that!

name: Penny
line: Redoodoodiculous?

name: Finn
line: No! The whole thing you said. About hopelessness. 'Cause I'm gonna get your basket back from whoever took it. And then I'm going to  beat my purity into them!

name: Jake
line: And then I'm gonna beat your purity outta them.  And then beat a sandwich into them!  And then beat them to the punch! And then punch 'em!

name: Finn
line: We can beat these thieves while we search for Penny's flower basket!

name: Jake
line: Okay.

name: Finn
line: Hey turd-le ! I'm gonna kick your butt! Also, have you seen this little girl's flower basket?

name: Jake
line: You're going down, turtle!

name: Jake
line: Woah! I want jets!

name: Finn
line: Come back, Crossbow Guy!

name: Crossbow Guy
line: My crossbow!

name: Penny
line: Hey, my basket! That's my basket!

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, Penny. We'll get it right after I deal with this guy!  Stealing's wrong, doofus!

name: Penny
line: This is fun, Finn!

name: Two-Headed Thief Head 1
line: My bro!

name: Two-Headed Thief Head 2
line: My body!

name: Cyclops
line: I'm gonna steal your flower basket, wizard!

name: Wizard Thief
line: Pancake, pancake, pancake.

name: Two-Headed Thief Head 2
line: Ow, brotha'!

name: Cyclops
line: My glasses!

name: Phil
line: My jammies!

name: Phil
line: My glasses!

name: Finn
line: There it goes!

name: Finn
line: I will smite thee, goblin thief!

name: Goblin Thief #1
line: You stole that basket from me!

name: Goblin Thief #2
line: No I didn't!  Hey! Gimme that! I stole it first! I'll use my sword on you!

name: Goblin Thief #2
line: Hey!

name: Finn
line: You there! It's time to step into the purification chamber, son!  Hey!

name: Finn
line: How are we supposed to get that basket back if it keeps being stolen?!

name: Jake
line: Hey! We can steal a new one from that guy!  He's got lots of flower baskets. And boots! I'd like to steal me one of them pairs of boots, especially.

name: Finn
line: No, Jake. We can't steal. We have to stay pure!

name: Jake
line: Okay.

name: Penny
line: I have an idea! My mom used to tell me that there's a King of Thieves who lives in the center of the city, and everything that gets stolen from little girls ends up at his tower. Maybe we'd find my basket in his treasure chest!

name: Finn
line: That's a great idea, Penny!

name: Penny
line: There's one thing, though. The tower that he lives in is surrounded by a magical barrier. Which magically keeps thieves out.

name: Finn
line: Have you forgotten?! We three ain't thieves! We're pure! Right, Jake?  Jake?

name: Jake
line: Just gotta steal these boots...

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Baskets & Boots owner
line: Hey! Go away!

name: Finn
line: What are you doin', man?

name: Jake
line: It's the city, it's getting to me. Help me, Finn!

name: Finn
line: I'm here for ya buddy.

name: Jake
line: Thank you Finn, thank you.

name: Finn
line: Nooo!  I won't let you become a thief!

name: Finn
line: Bells. That way, I'll hear you if you try to steal again.

name: Jake
line: Oh. Hmm.

name: Penny
line: The King of Thieves' tower is right up here.

name: Finn
line: Woah.  You read to pass through, Penny?

name: Penny
line: I'm too afraid! Is it okay if I wait out here?

name: Finn
line: Sure. C'mon, let's go, Jake!

name: Jake
line: Comin'!

name: Finn
line: Jake, where'd you get those boots?

name: Jake
line: Huh, what? What boots?  Oh, no! I stole! The city! It took advantage of me!

name: Finn
line: Jake, you're a thief now! You won't be able to get in anymore!

name: Jake
line: Yes, I can.  Oh.

name: Finn
line: It's up to me, now.

name: Penny
line: Legend says you'll find the loot in the King of Thieves' chest. Good luck, Finn! Oh, yeah, and that high window is the only entrance.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Alright, wish me luck!

name: Jake
line: She already did, man.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah. Right.  Great, now I gotta climb down?!  Huh?  The King of Thieves!  Sorry to trespass, I just... Uh, hello?  The chest! In it's in his chest! Thanks!

name: Jake
line: You see, if you have too much earwax, you won't be able to hear anymore.

name: Finn
line: I got it, guys!

name: Penny
line: The chest! Gimme that!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Woah, woah, woah. Easy, kid.

name: Finn
line: What?!  Is you basket under all that gold?

name: Penny
line: Of course it's not! I set you up to steal this chest of gold! I couldn't get past the barrier 'cause I'm a thief!

name: Finn
line: But you're just a cute little girl!

name: Penny
line: And, I'm a thief!

name: Finn
line: Well, if this isn't yours, I'm gonna return it right now!  Huh?  Why can't I...?

name: Penny
line: Because you stole something in the city! Now you're a thief!

name: Finn
line: No!  No!!! What have I done?! What have I become?!

name: Penny
line: You've become a thief, stupid!

name: Finn
line: My hands. They're all dirty. Covered in the dust of a criminal act! I'm a thief!

name: Hag
line: Oh, what did I tell you, boy? This city will get you, no matter how pure you think you are!  I was right.

name: Jake
line: Hey, that's enough from you, Hag!   Finn?

name: Finn
line: Don't touch me! I'm impure, man! Unfit to be a hero! Unfit to be your friend.

name: Jake
line: Come on, Finn, keep it together!

name: Finn
line: No, Jake. This is a one-way path, down a jacked-up road. And I gotta walk it... alone.

name: Jake
line: I'm not gonna leave you alone in the city. You're my buddy. Besides, I stole these boots. These super-big style boots. So I'm just as dirty as you are, Finn. We gotta walk this filthy path together!

name: Finn
line: Then we shall embrace the darkness of this wicked city and use the methods of the criminal to seek vengeance on Penny.

name: Jake
line: Cowabunga!

name: Finn
line: Cowabunga, indeed.

name: Penny
line: Mmm. Yes. Yeah.  Wha? Is someone there?!

name: Finn
line: It's me, Penny. The hero whose purity you stole! And I'm here to enact my revenge upon you!

name: Jake
line: Hi, Penny.

name: Penny
line: Finn, please don't punch my lights out! I'm just a poor, homeless baby girl.

name: Finn
line: I trusted you, Penny. You made me steal. And you took my purity. You ruined me!

name: Penny
line: I'm sorry, Finn.  Let me give you some uh, gems, or some gold, or uh, have some  knife in your neck!

name: Jake
line: Watch out, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Thanks, dude.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, dude.

name: Penny
line: You may have soiled my purity, but I think you can still come out clean.  C'mon, Jake!

name: Penny
line: No! No!

name: Jake
line: Nice work, dude.

name: Finn
line: She's purified!

name: Penny
line: I feel...clean! Like all the filth of the city and wrongdoings are gone! Thank you F and J! I haven't felt like this since I was young!

name: Finn
line: You're welcome.

name: Jake
line: Woah, dude!  The soap got on us, too!

name: Finn
line: We're clean!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Yes!

name: Finn
line: This good deed we did has purified us once again. We're virgin islands!

name: Penny
line: Finn, thanks for the second chance to live a pure life.

name: Finn
line: And you know what that means, Penny. No more stealing!

name: Penny
line: Never again.

name: Finn
line: Well, I think it's time for us to get the math out of here.

name: Penny
line: I'm going to miss you, Finn!

name: Finn
line: I'll miss you, too.

name: Penny
line: G'bye!

name: Jake
line: Woah, dude. Why are you naked?

name: Finn
line: PENNY!

name: Finn
line: Our secret mission to capture the Ice King is underway. Though I probably shouldn’t say stuff like that out loud.

name: Ice King
line: Who is it?  Zap zap zap zap zap zap zap!  Ooh, someone left me a gift. Peanut brittle? But I'm on a diet.

name: Jake
line: Should have stuck to your diet!

name: Ice King
line: Oahh! Finn, you have destroyed my faith in canned peanut brittle! Zap!  Oh, no, my crown has all my powers in it!

name: Finn
line: Wrap attack!

name: Jake
line: How about I swaddle you up like a sweet baby.

name: Finn
line: We finally captured the Ice King!

name: Jake
line: Why'd we do this again?

name: Finn
line: Princess explained it all when she sent us on the mission, remember?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Go capture the Ice King, and bring him to me.

name: Jake
line: Hmm… That didn't really explain anything.

name: Finn
line: I'm sure she's got a good reason.

name: Finn
line: Where is everybody?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, this place is deserted, except for that guy.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ich bin hier, Finn.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's me, the princess. Did you bring him?

name: Finn
line: Sure did.

name: Finn
line: So, what did the Ice King do to—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ah-bababap! No time! Now quickly, with me!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ttubllaw!

name: Stonesy
line: What's the password?

name: Stonesy
line: Oh, you got me!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Secret door!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: This stairway leads to the dungeon where we'll toss that lousy Ice King!

name: Finn
line: What awful thing did he do to get tossed in there?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Chhh, he didn't do anything. Not a thing.

name: Finn
line: Wha?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's a long story, Finn. You see, the Ice King…

name: Manfried
line: Princess Bubblegum, you're needed at once in the Grand Hall.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No! I need more time!

name: Manfried
line: Gosh, I'm sorry.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Alright, alright, I have to go. You two just guard the Ice King until I return  and be prepared to make him howl with pain.

name: Finn
line: You got it, princess!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, this is a total rook!

name: Jake
line: Settle down, prisoner! We gotta record your belongings. One magical crown,  probably stolen.

name: Ice King
line: I didn't steal it! I made that item! …Made it with the magic that I stole! So hand it over, or I'll strike menacing poses at you!

name: Finn
line: Cool it, inmate!

name: Ice King
line: These bars can't hold me forever! Hey there's only like two of 'em. You fools have no business guarding prisoners.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah?! Well how 'bout these helmets we found? And we got the Oculus of Rehabilitation!

name: Ice King
line: Hmm?

name: Oculus
line: Be better!

name: Finn
line: And the shelf of penitence!

name: Ice King's crown
line: I'm sorry…I'm so sorry…

name: Ice King
line: How about you just hand me my crown. I'll create some ice bars.

name: Jake
line: Okay!

name: Finn
line: No, Jake! It's a trick.

name: Ice King
line: I'm toying with you, ha ha, psychologically.

name: Finn
line: Finished!

name: Ice King
line: So what am I being charged with?

name: Finn
line: Umm…

name: Jake
line: Five counts of jerkateering. Ha!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, what does it matter?

name: Ice King
line: Gah! Of course it matters! The way things work is first, I transgress your meaningless rules and then you maliciously persecute me!

name: Finn
line: That makes sense. You do bad stuff, we punish you.

name: Ice King
line: Fool! You have disrupted that order, for—are you ready for this?—I have committed no recent crime!

name: Finn
line: Really? Umm…

name: Ice King
line: I'm rockin' your worldview!

name: Finn
line: Jake, he is starting to convince me we're doing a bad thing.

name: Jake
line: Dude,  be calmed by my saliva and think of all the terrible things he's done.

name: Finn
line: Yeah… yeah! You're still a jerk that deserves to be in jail.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, yeah? You know who really deserves to be in jail? I will show you the true jerks!  Behold!

name: Finn
line: Uhh, it's too dark.

name: Ice King
line: Behold!  Wha, Behold!  Behold the true jerks!

name: Finn
line: The jerks are us? Jake, am I going crazy? It seems like the Ice King is right about this. But if he's in the right, that means we're in…

name: Jake
line: The Candy Kingdom!

name: Finn
line: No, it means much, much worse.

name: Finn
line: On your feet.

name: Ice King
line: Is it time for my hour in the yard, boss?

name: Finn
line: No, we're letting you go. We decided that it's wrong to imprison you.

name: Ice King
line: This is a trick, huh?

name: Finn
line: Get out of here before I change my mind!

name: Ice King
line: There must be someone waiting outside to beat me. Ooh, is that my crown over there?

name: Jake
line: I'm glad that's all taken care of.

name: Finn
line: No, quite yet.

name: Jake
line: Awww…

name: Finn
line: Sorry, but since we're the bad guys this time, we gotta go to jail.

name: Jake
line: This sucks.

name: Ice King
line: Hey!

name: Ice King
line: Get out of my room!

name: Finn
line: You're still he—  …Just get out of here, man!

name: Ice King
line: So, you're really breaking me out?

name: Finn
line: Like I said, it's wrong to imprison you.

name: Ice King
line: You mean, you believe me? Oh, can it be? Has all the hatred between us transmuted into something more? A friendship? A best friendship.  Knucks?  Oh, ho ho, slaps in disgust, eh? Let's call them "Slappy D's"! Okay, see you later, my bosoms!

name: Finn
line: I am no man's bosom.

name: Ice King
line: Cast "Detect Secret Door"!  Success!  Wa ha ha ha!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Sorry for the delay.

name: Jake
line: Man, there are a lot of secret door around here.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And now, Ice King, prepare to howl with  pain?

name: Finn
line: Wow, she's so proud we did the right thing, she almost looks enraged.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Where is the Ice King?

name: Ice King
line: Finally! Freedom and friends FOREVER!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What... have... you... DONE?!?!

name: Finn
line: What have we done?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'LL SHOW YOU.

name: Finn
line: AHHH!!!

name: Starchie
line: Heah, even old Starchie's sick.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: A plague of Freezer Burn Flu.

name: Finn
line: Ice King did this?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, yes and no.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It happened 3 days ago.

name: Ice King
line: Hey, hey, Princess, check out my new trick!  It's snowing it's snowing for you!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We don't think he was trying to spread disease, but soon the entire kingdom was infect by his beard flakes.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Through my research, I quickly discovered that the only way to cure my people was to obtain the pained howls of the Ice King himself.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: But when I pleaded with him directly…

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Please, I beseech your aid. In the name of common decency!

name: Ice King
line: So let me get this straight… You're hitting on me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 으으, 웃기시네! 너는 우리 공주님과 판결 상대도 안 될 그런 가치없는 놈이야!

name: Ice King
line: I think I heard the word "Virile" in there. Oh, she is definitely hitting on me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 말도 안 돼!

name: Ice King
line: Be gone, you biddies!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: He had his chance to help and he did nothing!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, my gosh, she came to me this time.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I had no choice but to try and take his wails by force.

name: Jake
line: By getting us to beat the tar out of him.

name: Finn
line: I can't just beat up the Ice King for nothing. That's against my alignment.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I know, I know. You're right.

name: Finn
line: But I'll get him to give up those howls. Voluntarily. I swear it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, thank you, Finn. I…

name: Finn
line: Shhhh…

name: Jake
line: Dude, how are we gonna get those howls?

name: Finn
line: Oh, I gotta plan to trick him, but you won't like it.

name: Jake
line: That sounds ominous. I don't like it!

name: Finn
line: Ice King, come forth!

name: Ice King
line: I'm coming forth! Hee hee, is that the voice of friendship I hear?  So, are you fellas ready for game night?

name: Finn
line: Game night? Well, that's weird.

name: Ice King
line: What? Why?

name: Finn
line: You do know how friends act, right? You've had friends before.

name: Ice King
line: I… yes?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, so you know how friends are always howling in pain for each other.

name: Ice King
line: Yeah… right! Everyone knows that!

name: Finn
line: Will you howl for me, pal?

name: Ice King
line: Oooh, of course, friend. Awoo-hehehehe! Oh, I've got the sillies! I couldn't possibly without giggling uncontrollably. I'm just so giddy about you being here!  I'm a banana!  Don't slip on me!

name: Jake
line: We're out of options. Let's just beat it out of him.

name: Finn
line: No, Jake! We…

name: Ice King
line: Wait a sec, there's a bug on you, friend. Smack!

name: Finn
line: Grrr… Biscuits, now's my chance!

name: Ice King
line: You know, I carved these game pieces from my own teeth.

name: Finn
line: Boo hoo, boo hoo, boo hoo, boo hoo…

name: Ice King
line: Huh? Crying?!

name: Finn
line: Boo hoo. You hit me, Ice King. I don't think I could live any more knowing my best bosom hit me.

name: Ice King
line: I was only saving you from poo poo palms!

name: Finn
line: I'm dying because I know you care not for me.

name: Ice King
line: No! No, my…my bosom! What hath I done?! My friend!  My only friend.

name: Jake
line: Hey, what about me?

name: Ice King
line: Why?! Why?! WHY?!!!

name: Starchie
line: Starchie's feeling healthy again!  A bit too healthy if you ask me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: They're all getting better! Finn and Jake did it! Ich bin so glücklich, ich könnte, ich könnte…

name: Ice King
line: WHY?!!!… Ah, well. Gunter! Dispose of Finn's carcass.

name: Finn
line: Harumph.

name: Jake
line: Good job! Those wails must have reached all the way to…

name: Finn
line: Did you see how fast he dropped my lifeless body? That's just mean.

name: Jake
line: Finn, if I came across your lifeless body, I'd clasp you dramatically for a kajillion years.

name: Finn
line: Thanks, man.

name: Jake
line: Hey, why wait?! Play dead, Finn!

name: Jake
line: Why?! Heh heh heh heh. Why?! Heh heh heh heh. Why?!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Adventure time!

name: Candy Children
line: Whoa-a-a!

name: Candy Child
line: That was awesome!

name: Candy Child 2
line: Lets go over there!

name: Candy Children
line: Whe-e-e-e!

name: Candy Child 3
line: Come on! Come on!

name: Candy children
line: Wow! Yay! Whee!

name: Candy Child
line: Whoa-a-a!

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Why would I need to learn about caterpillar families? I don't get it.

name: Jake
line: Well, they look like they're having fun.

name: Finn
line: Real leaves aren't made out of candy. They always have a gross, bitter taste.

name: Candy Child
line: Whee!

name: Candy Child
line: Terry eats all the caterpillars!

name: Candy Child 2
line: Mmm! Ah, it's so good!

name: Finn
line: Ugh. That's gross, too. There's no way real caterpillars are delicious.

name: Jake
line: You think? I bet they taste great if you're a boid.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The caterpillar eats the leaf. Then the bird eats the caterpillar. Then the big bird eats the little bird. The big bird then dies, and its remains decompose into rich, fertile soil And from that soil, a new plant bursts to life. And then the caterpillar eats the plant again. And so the circle of life continues. This is a law of nature we call the food chain.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Isn't that fascinating?

name: Candy Child
line: Yo, Princess Bubblegum, do birds play football?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, Terry. They don't.

name: Candy Child
line: That's weak, Ma'am.

name: Candy Child 2
line: You guys, this is lame.

name: Finn
line: No way I'm eating a bug's butt. Those kids are right. Whats the big deez about the food chain, anyway? Lets hit the snack bar and eat something yummy.

name: Finn
line: Hey, this is pretty fun!

name: Jake
line: Hey, have you noticed we are birds now?

name: Finn
line: I'm hungies.

name: Jake
line: Look over there. That oasis looks pretty good to me.

name: Jake
line: Bon appetit!

name: Finn
line: Oh, dude, you ate those?!

name: Jake
line: Come on, man. We're sweet, sweet birds, and we get to eat worms. This is a unique experience.

name: Finn
line: Uh, how did I get so mad chubs? I only ate one grub.

name: Jake
line: Dude, you've been eating grubs for hours.

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, you're a beast.

name: Finn
line: Help me, Jake! My body's too bloated to fly!

name: Jake
line: Hide!

name: Finn
line: There goes my din-din. Why am I hungry again?

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Who are you?

name: Finn
line: It's me, Finn.

name: Jake
line: Dang, when did you get so big?... And old?

name: Jake
line: You feeling okay, bro?

name: Finn
line: Jake, we are good friends. So let me just say you look awesome right now.

name: Jake
line: Ha, really?

name: Finn
line: Yeah.

name: Finn
line: You're looking tasty.  Hey, why don't you take a seat in my mouth?

name: Jake
line: Why? That's... weird.

name: Finn
line: It's okay. It's okay. Just give it a try. It's a new experience, right?

name: Jake
line: Wow, you have a lot of saliva.  You must have a broken pipe, old timer. It's comfy, though.

name: Jake
line: Whoa! Did you just try to eat me?!

name: Finn
line: No...? But if I did that'd be okay, right?

name: Jake
line: You are trying to eat me.

name: Finn
line: I'm just following the Law of Nature.

name: Jake
line: What're you talking about?

name: Finn
line: I don't know. I just feel that way.

name: Finn
line: Aw, Jake, you're missing out... by not getting eaten... by me.

name: Jake
line: Sorry, man. I'm not into it.

name: Finn
line: So alone. So hungry.  The Law of Nature... has claimed this... bod...

name: Finn
line: Yay! What a big turnout. Top notch! To decompose stuff! Yeah-h-h! We are so pumped! Yeah!  What's that smell?

name: Finn
line: Wow. It looks amazing! Yay! Yay!

name: Finn
line: Party time!

name: Finn
line: So good! Awesome. This bird went bad so well!

name: Jake
line: You took it too far, man. I'm a dog, and I eat all kinds of horrible things. This is disgusting.

name: Finn
line: Come on, think of it as a conversation starter—like, "The other night, I ate the grossest thing I've ever tasted." You know, it's interesting.

name: Finn
line: Whew! I'm full.

name: Finn
line: Whoa! Aah!

name: Finn
line: Whoa! Aah! Whoa! Aah! What's going on?! Whoa!

name: Finn
line: I think we're safe now... and also caterpillars.

name: Jake
line: We're still in a bind, man. No food, no water.

name: Finn
line: I'm hungry.

name: Jake
line: I'm thirsty.

name: Jake
line: Hey, look.

name: Jake
line: It's another caterpillar.

name: Jake
line: Huh? You okay?

name: Finn
line: She's beautiful.

name: Jake
line: She's just a caterpillar, dude.

name: Jake
line: Looks like she's gonna faint.

name: Jake
line: You see?

name: Jake
line: Huh. "Love is Blind"—that must apply to all species.

name: Jake
line: Oh, I see. Your name is Erin, and there's a famine near your town, so that's why you're out here searching for an oasis.

name: Erin
line: Yes, I have to hurry and find food. Otherwise, my family won't survive.  But I don't know if I can go on...

name: Finn
line: Hold on, Erin. Food! Water! Shade! Where are you?!

name: Jake
line: Over there—the oasis!

name: Finn
line: Yummy!

name: Jake
line: Really? You like leaves now?

name: Finn
line: So good, dude.

name: Finn
line: Your eyes.

name: Jake
line: Hey, hey, hey, move over a bit. I got a rhythm going here.

name: Erin
line: I've never been this happy.

name: Jake
line: This oasis is pretty romantic, huh?

name: Erin
line: Sure, I guess.

name: Jake
line: So, how many kids you want to have?

name: Finn
line: Uh,  d-d-do you want to get married?

name: Erin
line: Yes!

name: Jake
line: And will you, Finn, take this caterpillar to be your wife, even if she becomes a flower or a bird or a bacteria, to love and to cherish till death do you part?

name: Finn
line: Y-y-y-yes.

name: Jake
line: You may now kiss the bride.

name: Finn
line: This way, Erin!

name: Caterpillar
line: Hey, is that my butt? Man, it's been a while!

name: Erin
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: When we're reborn as caterpillars, I'll marry you all over again!

name: Erin
line: That's beautiful, Finn! But when we're bacteria, I might see other people!

name: Jake
line: Hey, why are you eating caterpillars?

name: Finn
line: My eyes are open.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The caterpillar eats the leaf. Then the bird eats the caterpillar. Then the big bird eats the little bird then dies and its remains decompose into rich, fertile soil. And from that soil, a new plant bursts to life. And then the caterpillar eats the plant again. And so the circle of life continues.

name: Candy Child 2
line: Eh, so what? Let's go play.

name: Candy Child 3
line: Yeah, weirdo.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn? Finn? Finn! Where are you? I need you to try this!

name: Finn
line: I'll be there in a sec!

name: Jake
line: What's the status?

name: Finn
line: Good, man!

name: Jake
line: Nice! Seal the deal, bro!

name: Finn
line: Okay, man! Whatevs!

name: Jake
line: You can do it, you hear me?!  I'm playin' BMO—call me later, bye!

name: BMO
line: How's Finn's date?

name: Jake
line: I think it's goin' good.

name: BMO
line: Unlike your game, boiiiii!

name: Jake
line: Where's the key to the tower, BMO?! Tell me! AAAGH!

name: Finn
line: Okay, Finn. She's 13; you're 13. Just have fun! Be yourself.  Wooooo!

name: Finn
line: What's that? Are you trying to make yourself 18 again?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Nah. This is an instant bath serum. It makes you sweat cleaning agents.

name: Finn
line: I don't bathe. I want that!

name: Finn
line: WAAAUGH! Hot, hot, oh—WAAAAUGH! Oh... so spice! So spice!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: YOU'RE so spice!

name: Manfried
line: Bwaaa bwaaa bwaaaaaa!  Announcing the arrival of the Earl of Lemongrab!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Heh hah hah- AAAAUGH! Oof! Ha ha ha!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: This castle is... in... UNACCEPTABLE CONDITIIIIOOOON! UNACCEPTABLLLEEE!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Thirty days in the dungeon!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: For who?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Everyone in this ROOM!  MMMLLUUUUUGH!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wait, wait! You can't give orders like that! I'm in charge here, Lemongrab!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: TOO YOUNG! TOO YOUNG TO RULE THE KINGDOM!

name: Finn
line: Watch your manners with the princess--!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: HHHHUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOH?!

name: Finn
line: What the huh?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: MMMM!  HAH!  I am next in line to thee throne! Sooo... I will be in charge... UNTIL PRINCESS BUBBLEGUM turns... 18 again!

name: Finn
line: That's bunk! Right, Preebos?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No... He is rightful ruler under kingdom law. It's complicated.  I created Lemongrab.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: He was the first of my experiments gone wrong...

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Nnnnnnuh!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Gaaaaaah!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: EEEEEEAAAAAAGH!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: ... And now that I'm younger than him, he inherits the right to the throne.

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: IF ANYONE NEEDS ME I'LL BE TAKING A NAP! A...a-a-and CLEAN this place up or dungeon! THREE HOURS DUNGEON!

name: Starchie
line: Who are you talking to?!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: THREE! HOURS! DUNGEON!

name: Starchie
line: NNNNOOOOOOOO!!!

name: Finn
line: We'll see you in a few hours... okay, Starchie?

name: Starchie
line: Yeah, right... If Starchie ever survives that long...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, this is dirt balls! We gotta do something to make him leave!

name: Finn
line: Yeah... like pranking him up his face!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, yeah! And I have the perfect prank! C'mon, Finn!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Huh?  "You... really... smell... like... ... dog buns"...?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: NNNUUUUuuuuuooooooooooOOOOOOOOUUUUUUGGGGHHH!!!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Well, well, well... IS THIS EVERYONE, THEN?!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Yes, all the castle staff.

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Sooo which one of yooou WAS it?! Who did... the THING?!

name: Upside-Down Ice Cream Cone
line: The... thing?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU-- —UUUMMMM!!!  THE THING, THE THING!!!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hey, man! Calm down!  It's just a prank, man! For laughs!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Prank? F... for... laughs?  Yes, of course... Just a harmless prank... f-for laughs... Ahhh...  HAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAH- OH! HAOAHOAHAOAHOAHAOAHAOHAO

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Heh, heh...

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: HAHAHAOAHAHAOAAHA-  Twelve years dungeon.  All of you—dungeon! Seven years, no trials!  C'mon... LET'S MOVE IT!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I don't think that worked out too math, Finn.

name: Finn
line: What? No, no! He just needs some more prankin's to finish the job! He'll leave the kingdom. Let's try it my way this time, okay?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: OOF!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Cough, cough!  Oooooh...  Ha, ha-ha... GOOD ONE!  Keep 'em coming! I'M NOT GOING ANYWHERE!!! Ho... ha... Ah-ah-oooow!

name: Finn
line: I got a new plan!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, yeah? What?

name: Finn
line: We'll work together and use that serum you made. The one that was "Ah! So Spice!" And spice-bomb him non-stop 'till his butt falls out! How's that sound?

name: Finn
line: Hoooo!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Thank you for releasing me early from the dungeon, Master Lemongrab.

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: I determine what is early, and what is late, Mr. Peppermint!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Yes, Your Earlness.

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Also... I don't know where food comes from!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: My Lord, food comes from Ma--

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: AHHHHtatatataNO!! That's why I am royal and you are servile!

name: Finn
line: You ready to pour the stuff?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah! I made it super-hot this time!

name: Finn
line: Wait 'till he opens the lid!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Behold a plate of mashed carrots, flavor--

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Shoot!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: HHHHAAAAAAA!!! HAAAAAAA! HAAAAAAA!!!! AAAAAAAGHAAA!!!!!

name: Finn
line: Shh!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: STOP SCREAMING!!! WHY ARE YOU SCREAMING?!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Because I'm excited by this meal I made!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Me, too. I'm excited, too.

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: HHHHUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!!!!!!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: He's eating the dirt! SPICE IT NOW!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: He's heading for the orchard!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Apple!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Mmmm!

name: Finn
line: Heh, heh... heh!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: OOOOOONE MILLION YEEEEEEEARS, DUNGEON!!!!

name: Finn
line: Maybe if we... set his butt on fire.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, Finn... There's only one way. I just didn't want to have to do it. If I change myself back to my real age, I can reclaim the throne.

name: Finn
line: What? No! I mean... you can do that?

name: Finn
line: Then... why did you wait so long?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Because being 13 again is... Bloobaloobie!

name: Finn
line: Hm?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: While being 18 is all plock dumps and wagglezags... I never really get to act like a kid. But, it's okay. Really. My people need me, and that comes first!

name: Finn
line: Yeaaah...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: First thing we need is more candy flesh to increase my biomass. But I need my lab equipment to engineer it.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Not necessarily, milady!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, thank you! Thank you, all! Okay... Next we need a bonding agent.

name: Finn
line: Princess? I think I can help.

name: Finn
line: Finished!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: There's one last thing we need.  Only the heat from a whopping love hug can catalyze the re-age-ifying process.

name: Finn
line: Are you ready, Princess?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes, Finn. But... first, I just want to say how much fun I've had hanging out with you.

name: Finn
line: Me, too!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And I... I wish I could stay... like this, with you, but--

name: Finn
line: I... I know, Princess.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: 'Scuse, me, Finn.  Yo, Earl!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: WHAAAAAT?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey! You're fired, ya BUTT!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: HHHHHRRRRRGGGRRRUUGGHHH!!!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm so glad everything's back to normal. Thanks for all your help, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Oh- you're welcome! But... uhm...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What is it, Finn?

name: Finn
line: Well, ah... Do you... do you wanna hug some more?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What? Finn, you silly! That was, like, five years ago! You really gotta move on.

name: Finn
line: Oh- yeah, yeah... Sorry...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Such a silly boy.

name: Finn
line: Hello?

name: Jake
line: Hey, man! What's the status?

name: Finn
line: Bad news, man... I... I got dumped.

name: Jake
line: Awww. I'm sorry, Finn. But look, man. Lemme share with you a little secret on how to win the heart of a princess. It's not easy, but ya have to be persistent. You might have to defeat a demon lord, and warp through several worlds.

name: Jake
line: But once you do, you walk up the wizard stairs, and produce your magic key you got in a water world and unlock the chamber door. Then, walk right up to the princess, and give her a smooch.

name: Jake
line: Yesss!  Does that make sense?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man. I see what you're sayin'. Thanks, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Mmm-hmm.

name: Finn
line: Go up the wizard steps.

name: Normal Man
line: Hey, how's it going up there? Have you made visual confirmation with Glob?

name: Tiny Manticore
line: Shut... you... This is freaking har—!

name: Normal Man
line: Come again? You're breaking up. Make sure you tell Glob it's me who sent you. Tell him we're coming for Grod, Grob, and Gob, also! I believe in you, little guy!

name: Tiny Manticore
line: You can keep your little guys in your—aarrgh! What the freak am I doing?!

name: Normal Man
line: Come again?

name: Tiny Manticore
line: Nothing. Never mind.  Oh, crud. There... he... is!

name: Glob
line: Who's that? Dark off.

name: Normal Man
line: Whoa!

name: Tiny Manticore
line: I... got... you!

name: Glob
line: Uh-oh, don't pass out, man. Hey, wake up. Hey.

name: Tiny Manticore
line: What?

name: Normal Man
line: Pull up! Pull up!

name: Tiny Manticore
line: Oh, right.  I did it! I have your brother, Magic Man!

name: Normal Man
line: It's "Normal Man" now.

name: Tiny Manticore
line: Yes... powerless... Normal Man.

name: Normal Man
line: Bring him here, Tiny!

name: Tiny Manticore
line: No.

name: Normal Man
line: Wh—Wh—Huh? What is this?

name: Tiny Manticore
line: It's a classic double-cross, bozo!

name: Glob
line: Brother, tell this animal to put me back in space.

name: Tiny Manticore
line: You messed with me for years! Now it's my turn to mess with you!

name: Finn
line: Hey, Jake. You need help with demma Eggs Benedict inna demma hollandaise sauce?

name: Jake
line: Get over here, dude.

name: Finn
line: Yo, no dogs on the table. Shoo! Get down, boy! Whatcha see, boy? Show daddy.

name: Jake
line: I do see something, but you're making it weird.

name: Finn
line: Sorry bro. What's going on.

name: Jake
line: Look.

name: Finn
line: Whoa. Hey, you! scram!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, beat it Magic Man!

name: Normal Man
line: Oh, hey.

name: Jake
line: Got him!

name: Finn
line: Uhh.. is he dead?

name: Jake
line: Nah, he's magic.

name: Finn
line: Dude, he lost his powers, remember?

name: Jake
line: Oh, right.  Uh-oh.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Phew!

name: Finn
line: Come on. Let's bring him inside, you murderler.

name: Normal Man
line: Finn and Jake! I need your help!

name: Finn
line: Why would we help you, Magic Man?

name: Normal Man
line: It's Normal Man, and it's not helping me. It's helping my brother, Glob.

name: Finn
line: Whaaaaaa?

name: Normal Man
line: That's where Tiny Manticore took Glob -- to the very top of Wild Trap Mountain.

name: Tiny Manticore
line: Come on, fool! Come on. Get spanked!

name: Normal Man
line: Tiny always liked you guys.

name: Jake
line: That's because we freed him from your sick nightmare house.

name: Normal Man
line: Maybe he'll listen to you and not hurt Glob. This could be my chance to make things right between us, go back to Mars and run things how we used to, before I threw everyone under the bus.

name: Finn
line: Like when you made them all go bald or something?

name: Glob
line: Magic Man, stop this nonsense immediately.

name: King of Mars
line: Aah! Magic Man! As soon as I break these magic bonds, you're going straight to Ooo on that bus, you hear me?!

name: Magic Man
line: Magic Man! Have some of these bangers, why don't ya? Bang!

name: King of Mars
line: What's that? Oh, no! Aah!

name: Magic Man
line: Just a few more laps and I'll break the jerk world record.

name: Normal Man
line: You know what, guys? I'll just go up there and let Tiny margle me off a cliff. It'll be good for Glob to see his trash brother eat it finally.

name: Jake
line: What do you think about that?

name: Finn
line: No. Glob's your brother, and brothers always care about each other, even if one of them is a terrible deuce breakfast like you. So let's stretch up this thing and talk it out with Tiny.

name: Normal Man
line: WAIT! It's called Wild Trap Mountain for a reason. Look. Normal-size manticores. Carnivore plants. Camouflage rock beasts. Mind-control parasites. Archer bandits that'll shoot you straight out of the sky. This one quiet dude nobody messes with. A dragon ghost. Red ants. Weekend survivalists. Waking dream demons. That squirrel that hates you, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Who?

name: Finn
line: We get it. We got to stealth it up there.

name: Normal Man
line: Oh, ouch, my knees.

name: Finn
line: Shh!

name: Luke
line: Hey, Jonah.

name: Jonah
line: Hey, Luke. What's going on today?

name: Luke
line: Freaking nothing yet.

name: Jonah
line: I know. I just want to kill and eat someone already.

name: Jake
line: Phew! Well, we got past those guys.

name: Finn
line: Easy greasy. You doing okay, Normal Man?

name: Normal Man­
line: Easy grea‐‐

name: Finn­
line: What?

name: Jake­
line: Aah!

name: Squirrel­
line: I know that voice!

name: Finn­
line: Charge!

name: Camouflage Rock Beast­
line: Surprise, you're dead!

name: Finn­
line: Go, go,go, go, go, go!

name: Jake­
line: Finn?

name: Normal Man
line: Parasite!

name: Finn­
line: What the heck?

name: Jake­
line: To the top! Wait!  Almost there!

name: Normal Man­
line: Don't bother that guy.

name: Normal Man
line: Wow.  Ouch! Freakin' red ants!

name: Red Ant­
line: Get off my mountain!

name: A weekend survivalist­
line: Aah, my dreams! I'm having daymares!

name: Jake­
line: There's the top!

name: Squirrel­
line: Jake! It's me!

name: Jake­
line: Who?

name: Jake­
line: My eyes! Sorry.

name: Normal Man­
line: Ahh! Tiny Manticore! Please! Don't hurt my brother!

name: Glob
line: This guy is really freaking me out.

name: Tiny Manticore­
line: Yes! Hello, Normal Man. Come and greet the dawning of your grimmest day! How ironic that you, who once trapped me, are now about to royally bite it. You stand at the mercy of my boomerang and flamethrower!

name: Normal Man ­
line: I know I really messed you up, but Glob has nothing to do with this. Kill me instead. I'll let you do it.

name: Tiny Manticore­
line: Why do you sound so insincere?

name: Normal Man ­
line: That's just my voice.

name: Finn­
line: Normal Man's telling the truth.

name: Jake­
line: Yeah!

name: Tiny Manticore­
line: Finn and Jake? I respect you guys a ton, but I have trained for this vengeance for months! I must seize this sparkling moment full in grasping hand!  Boomerang!

name: Normal Man
line: What's even a boomerang? Oh, my gosh. I've been calling them something different my whole life.

name: Tiny Manticore­­
line: I'm sorry, Jake! I'm just doing me right now. We're still cool, though?

name: Finn
line: Not no more!

name: Jake
line: Kick his tiny butt.

name: Normal Man
line: Aah!

name: Normal Man
line: Gah! I hate this mountain.

name: Finn­
line: Boomerang!  Watch out for when it ‐‐Oof.

name: Tiny Manticore­­
line: Two boomerangs! Could it be? My moment approacheth? Steady hand, steady heart.

name: Glob
line: Look out, dude.

name: Tiny Manticore­­
line: Whoa! Can I just have this?

name: Finn
line: Uh‐oh. Hang on like hot snot, Normal Man!

name: Normal Man
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa!

name: Tiny Manticore­­
line: Let go! We're going to fall. I'm not very big. I ‐‐ Uh...Okay. Upon reassessment, this is actually a great situation for me!

name: Tiny Manticore­­
line: Farewell, Magic Man! By my hand, I soar free!

name: Finn­
line: Boy‐yay‐moy! Jake!

name: Jake­
line: What? I'm coming! I got to save the dude.

name: Finn­
line: No planes! Never planes!

name: Normal Man
line: Glob, are you okay?

name: Glob
line: Why did you rescue me?

name: Normal Man
line: I wanted to bring you back to Mars. They need a ruler up there, and I wanted to apologize for being such a beanshow for hundreds of years.

name: Glob
line: Whoa. What? Maybe you really have changed.

name: Tiny Manticore­
line: Yeah, right! I'm following to watch you die.

name: Glob
line: You know what, though, Magic Man? I've been doing a lot of thinking up in orbit. I shouldn't have shut you out when you got exiled to Ooo. In some ways, I, too, was a total beanshow.

name: Normal Man
line: I guess neither of us were perfect brothers.

name: Glob
line: Although you were much, much worse.

name: Normal Man
line: So, what now? Are we straight up just going to die?

name: Normal Man
line: I guess so. Sorry.

name: LSP­
line: So, your profile said you were into music. That's crazy, so am I!

name: Lemongrab
line: It's stressing me out that there's food on a blanket! I have to go home. This was nice. You're running away from intimacy! You don't know you'd get hurt!

name: Normal Man
line: Tiny? What are you doing?

name: Tiny Manticore­ ­
line: I could not go through with my vengeance. It wouldn't have accomplished anything. Also, you and your brother are really sweet together.

name: Normal Man
