line: You're hard to track. But okay!

name: Finm­
line: We'll get down ourselves, guys. Don't even sweat it!

name: Tiny Manticore­­
line: But, yeah, let's hang out sometime. I'm getting a phone soon.

name: Normal Man
line: Bye! Ready to go home?
Whoa, dang.

name: Normal Man
line: Oh, the people of Mars are gonna be so glad to see you. It really feels good to be good, you know? Maybe that's my new catchphrase. I don't know. Is that dumb?

name: Glob
line: It's a good catchphrase. You'll do okay up there.

name: Normal Man
line: Ahh! Glob, what are you doing?!

name: Glob
line: My days of ruling Mars are over, but you got this, man.

name: Normal Man
line: All right. Well...

name: Gob­
line: Oh, my Gob. Where were you?

name: Glob
line: I was with Normal Man. He's cool now.

name: Gob­
line: Whaaaaa?I don't believe it.

name: Normal Man
line: Hey, guys. I'm back.

name: Martians, in union
line: Magic Man!

name: Martian 1­
line: Oh! He came back!

name: Martian 2
line: Oh, I can't believe it!

name: Normal Man
line: It's okay. Calm down.

name: Martian 3, who is a giant starfish­
line: Calm down?! You turned me into a giant starfish!

name: Martian 4, who is a flaming garbage­
line: You turned me into a barrel of flaming garbage!

name: Martian 3­
line: What horrible trick do you have planned now?

name: Normal Man
line: I don't really do tricks anymore. Hmm. Okay. Here's a trick. It's a hat but inside it are... brownies!

name: Martian 4­
line: I want to eat those brownies.

name: Normal Man
line: It's a start.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: My arm!

name: Turtle Princess
line: My face!

name: Skeleton Princess
line: This happens sometimes...

name: Finn
line: Wait... what?!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my gosh! How many times do I have to tell you? Somebody broke into my house and stole my lumps!

name: Finn
line: Peebo?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, someone stole half of my face.

name: Jake
line: Eeeeeugh...

name: Finn
line: Eh...okay, calm down...

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: How am I supposed to calm down?! A lumping thief is out there getting fresh with my lumps!

name: Jake
line: Haha, gross.

name: Finn
line: Whoa! Gals... we'll find this crazy freak and return all of your body parts!

name: Hot Dog Princess
line: Thank you so much, Finn!  I should give you a kiss!

name: Finn
line: It's... it's okay, Hot Dog Princess! We'll be right back.

name: Ice King
line: I said, "I don't know!" I have nothing to do with this!

name: Jake
line: Stop lying! We found your fingerprints at the crime scene!

name: Ice King
line: What? Really?

name: Jake
line: Uuh... no.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, well...then...why would you say that?

name: Finn
line: Ice King, we know you did it!

name: Ice King
line: Finn, I'm as concerned as you are. There's some sicko out there... What if he comes after my princess?

name: Finn & Jake
line: Your princess?

name: Ice King
line: Yeah... let me introduce you to my new wife.  Oh, wait...you mean I'm the guy stealing all the p— Yeah, okay, I get it now.

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: What happened to them, husband?

name: Ice King
line: Hmmm... mmm aah! They're sleepy. They are our limp sleepy children! Come on wife, let's have a nice family meal.

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: Okay.

name: Ice King
line: Wife, you sit here. Isn't this nice?

name: Ice King
line: Uh oh... I mean, that's good!  Oops! How fun! You're so fun!

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: Hahahahaha!

name: Ice King
line: Aww... marriage is fun!

name: Ice King
line: See, when you wash and I dry, we get done faster! Then tomorrow night we switch!

name: Ice King
line: Here, let me show you a trick, my darling. See, you let it soak and we'll wash it in the morning.

name: Ice King
line: Enough chores... come along, dear. I want to show you something special...

name: Ice King
line: Here it is. I hope you like it...

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: Is there something wrong with me? The way I am...it's not normal... is it?

name: Ice King
line: Oh... pretty baby wife. You're the most normal thing in my whole life. We're like two normal jelly beans sitting at the bottom of the jar, floating in a sea of olives, waiting for somebody to guess how many jelly beans are in the jar... which I mentioned.

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: I don't think I understand...

name: Ice King
line: Just look into my eyes and know that everything is okay.

name: Ice King
line: Are you feeling normal yet?  Okay.  See that? We're normal, just like the normal people are.

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: Oh...

name: Jake
line: Lady don't take my pizza....

name: Finn
line: What's h— Oww...

name: Finn
line: A mo-mo-mons-mo.....

name: Jake
line: Finn? What's— Are you saying Mama? Where'd you—

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: Hi there!

name: Jake
line: Monster!

name: Ice King
line: Oh... don't mind the kids! It's just a phase!

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: I need a glass of water.

name: Ice King
line: Ooh, I'll go get—

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: No, it's okay. I'll get it.

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: You are not normal! You are a  monster!

name: Ice King
line: Hey, hey, hey....

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: Monster! A monster!

name: Ice King
line: What's going on in here? Nobody's a monster! All I see in this room is a young, kind-hearted, intelligent, hot-looking ice king, and his beautiful princess bride! That's you, sweetie...

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: I don't feel beautiful. I feel like a freak!

name: Ice King
line: I will prove to you that you are beautiful!

name: Ice King
line: To me, my penguins! Gunter, Gunther, Gunder, Goonder, come on! Gunter, Goonthy, Gonter, Ginthy, follow!

name: Ice King
line: Don't rearrange the chairs please. You're all gonna clap and cheer or I'm gonna smack your buns.  Whoo! Yeah! ...

name: Finn
line: If we look at her with these mirrors, her ugliness will have no effect on us.

name: Jake
line: Where is she? Oh! I think she's right over...

name: Ice King
line: Hey!

name: Ice King
line: Baby, do you want to talk about it?

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: You should just find another princess to marry. I'm unlovable!

name: Ice King
line: Girl, I love you as much as all of the other princesses in the world combined!

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: You don't really mean that...

name: Ice King
line: I'll prove it! See, you have Elbow Princess's hips, and Dr. Princess's heart and intestines, Slime Princess's bottom... You have all my favorite parts of my favorite princesses!

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: I'm just a bunch of stolen parts?!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, the parts don't matter. It's you that matters.

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: But... who am I?

name: Ice King
line: You're my wife! And I will always love my wife no matter what!

name: Princess Monster Wife
line: You'd love me, even without these other princess's parts?

name: Ice King
line: Sure, baby, even without all your fine lady parts. Now give us a hug.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Ice King!

name: Jake
line: Your wife's face can't make us faint anymore!

name: Ice King
line: Don't listen to them babe; they're being negative! Run, my happiness! I'll distract them with ice magic!

name: Jake
line: Ouch.

name: Finn
line: Do you give up?!

name: Ice King
line: Yes! I give up...

name: Jake
line: Finally... let's get those princess parts back to the ladies.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, mans. Wait... where'd your wife go?

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Ice King
line: Let me go! Let me go!

name: Princess Monster Wife's spirit
line: Though my parts be scattered, I will always be your wife.

name: Ice King
line: She... she... gave away all my stuff!

name: Finn
line: What... is the meaning of "soup"?

name: Jake
line: What? I don't know. What's with all the weird quest—?

name: Finn
line: What... is the meaning of "spoon"?

name: Jake
line: Shoot, man, are you still lady-sad about Flame Princess? Y'know, it's okay if you are.

name: Finn
line: Naw, that's all fine. I just been feeling kind of... gray, is all. Like my inside voice has been kinda quiet lately. Not a lot of instructions forthcoming, y'know?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, well, sounds like you're sad. Listen, Finn, girls is like horses. When you fall down, it's important that you get right back on again—on a different horse. And there's a lot of fish in the sea. A lot of fish. A penny saved is a penny earned.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I-I guess. Or maybe dating girls is like riding a bicycle.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man, yeah!

name: Finn
line: Or, like, if you mess up, you could get really hurt forever, or hurt someone you really care about.

name: Jake
line: Eh, well, I suppose. Anyway, I hope this mystery cave we're looking for is as weird as Flambo's brother says it is. Maybe that'll snap you out of the— Whoa! What?!

name: Jake
line: What's this train all about? No one said nothing about no train in the way!

name: Finn
line: Relax, buddy. We'll just cross after it passes. No big thing, really.

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Jake
line: It's two hours later now. What the stunk?  Oh, okay.  Hey, the train just goes in a big circle! We can cut right through the middle, blingle, blongle, blungle! Come on!  Wha-hey! You know, I just had another idea! If we just stay put here on the train, we could ride it all the way to the cave.  Blingle, blongle, blungle!

name: Creature
line: Gimme! Gimme the loot!

name: Finn
line: Ow!

name: Finn
line: Yeeow!

name: Creature
line: Gimme! Gimme that hat!

name: Finn
line: Knock it off!

name: Creature
line: Aah!

name: Creature
line: Oh, dang!

name: Jake
line: Hey, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Look at all the loot that guy dropped while you whipped his butt!

name: Finn
line: Dang, look at that sword!  Whoa. Feels kinda right.  Whoosh. Whoosh. Vvsh, vvsh.   Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Pretty fun, huh?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man! It's spicy baby fun!

name: Jake
line: You wanna go see what other kind of monsters are on this train?

name: Finn
line: Yes!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, Crystal Ants, I think!

name: Jake
line: Cool!

name: Finn
line: Ha-ha! Yeah!  Die, die, die, die, die, die, die!

name: Jake
line: Welcome back, buddy.

name: Finn
line: Man, look at all this rad loot!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, this is a pretty neat train. We should come back again someday.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, what do you mean? We just started only, like, three hours ago.

name: Jake
line: Heheh, yeah. I'm just gettin' a little bored, is all. All these cars of monsters are kinda all the same. It's a little boring.

name: Finn
line: Oh, come on.  It's fun! Just one more car. Come on.  Come on, man!  Come on!

name: Jake
line: All right, just one more.

name: Finn
line: Ha-ha, yes!

name: Finn
line: Hmm? Where is everybody?

name: Jake
line: Hey, hey! Empty car—think we beat it, buddy.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, man! Boss battle! Let's chew it up!

name: Jake
line: Okay, but this is the last one, okay?

name: Finn
line: We'll see!

name: Finn
line: Ha-ha!

name: Jake
line: Hey, man,  you remember we were going to that weird cave? Bet it's not too late to check it out.

name: Finn
line: Eh, weird cave, weird train—I'm cool here.

name: Jake
line: Okay.

name: Finn
line: Hyah!

name: Head
line: Ahhhh, gimme a break!

name: Finn
line: Oh? Oh, dang. Boss loot!  Oh, yeah.

name: Jake
line: No, thank you.

name: Finn
line: Jake, hurry. Next car!

name: Finn
line: Slime crimes!

name: Jake
line: You have fun. I'm just gonna watch.

name: Finn
line: Hey.

name: Finn
line: Ow!  Ow. Cool... acid!

name: Jake
line: Hey, also, man, aren't you, like, gettin' kinda hungry?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man. I guess we've been here for a while.

name: Jake
line: More than a while, dude. I've already missed my bathroom window!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I guess I could take a snack break.

name: Jake
line: 'Kay! Well, we'll go back to the tree house, and I'll make us some lunch. I could make the toaster pancakes you like.

name: Jake
line: And maybe I can boil up some hot dogs, or—

name: Finn
line: Look.  Now we don't gotta do that thing you wanted to do.

name: Jake
line: Aah!

name: Finn
line: Hot meat!

name: Jake
line: Ants again?

name: Finn
line: "Ant" no thang!  Yah!  Caught with your "ants" down! "Ants" for nothin'!  Forget about "ant"!  What's wrong? Feeling antsy?

name: Jake
line: Dude, this is the ant car. We already did the ant car. We did all the ants!

name: Finn
line: Same car,  but those were blue ants. These are red ants.

name: Jake
line: Finn, I think we should take off. I think this place is bad news for you.

name: Finn
line: Man, no way. All this feels good.  Like my inside voice is saying, "Hey, keep it up. This is good stuff."  Aah! Hey!  Ah! Like when you made those biscuits way back? And I kept eating them until they were all gone. Like that!

name: Jake
line: Finn,  I made those biscuits with so much butter. You were just responding to the butter! This whole place is butter!

name: Finn
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Boss fight!

name: Boss
line: My jacket-sta!

name: Finn
line: Check it out battle moon.

name: Jake
line: What?   Finn! This is a future crystal! Look!

name: Jake
line: That's you, dude! You're old, you're alone, and you're still fighting on this dumb train!

name: Future Finn
line: Get "ant" of town.

name: Finn
line: Whoa. I'm gonna have the best life!

name: Finn
line: Oh, Hair Apes!

name: Jake
line: Nuh-uh, dude. I'm bored, I'm tired, and I'm goin' back to the tree house.  You can come with me if you want.

name: Finn
line: What? No, man! It's better on the train; stuff makes sense here.

name: Finn
line: Yow!

name: Jake
line: I'm sorry. If you wish to join me, I'll be in the tree house experiencing the joys of life and not getting attacked by gorillas made out of hair.

name: Finn
line: You'll be back.

name: Jake
line: No, I won't, Finn.  Goodbye!

name: Finn
line: Hey!   "Hair" we go!

name: Jake
line: What're you doin' up here?

name: Jake
line: Are you gettin' sick of things down there, too?

name: Jake
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Jake
line: You're not gonna try and zap me, are you?

name: Jake
line: I wonder what my kids are doin'.

name: Jake
line: Hey!  I knew it!

name: Jake
line: Gotta find that kid. Hey, Finn!  Fi—oh!  Umm... hey, there, friend. I ain't lookin' for no trouble. Just lookin' for my friend, Finn. Maybe you seen him? About five feet tall, picks his nose, and always kinda smells funny l—

name: Finn
line: Hey, hey! Jake, it's me!  I'm just all souped up now.

name: Jake
line: Ah, jeez, Finn. I... for a minute there, I thought you were one of those twisted-lost-soul boss guys.

name: Finn
line: Bl-bl-bl-bl-bl.

name: Jake
line: Wait, you are! You are one!

name: Finn
line: What? Those guys are cool!

name: Jake
line: That's it, man! I'm gettin' you off this train whether you like it or not!

name: Finn
line: Jake, stay back. I mean it!

name: Jake
line: Oh, please. What're you gonna do? I'm ten times stronger than—

name: Jake
line: Ah, gross!

name: Finn
line: Yoink!   Pff, Jake—tryin' to tell me what to do. Pff, yeah, right. I tells me what to do. Now let's see what we got here.  Apple, apple, chicken, apple...  Oh, yeah, that little orb in which I rule! Let's see that again, orb.  Yeah, that's right. Lookin' right.  Wait a second, who's that sad ward little guy followin' me around?  Jake? All those years—he stayed with me.

name: Future Jake
line: Finn, can we slow down? My feet hurt.

name: Future Finn
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Oh, Jake. Hang in there, buddy. I'ma set this right.

name: Jake
line: Finn? Finn, I'm sorry. I'll stay on the train with you, I swear. Just get this stuff off of me.

name: Finn
line: No, I'm sorry, Jake. I messed up, but don't worry. It's all over now.

name: Jake
line: You mean we're gettin' off the train?

name: Finn
line: Well... you are. I'm gonna keep playin' for a while. I'll meet you back home in a week or two.

name: Jake
line: Aw, man, don't you see that's just the train talkin'? It's got its hooks in you!

name: Finn
line: No, no for real!  My inside is tellin' me it's time. Here,  see for yourself.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man. That's what I'm talkin' about. That... is what I'm talkin' about.

name: Finn
line: Wha—?

name: Finn
line: Wha—?!

name: Jake
line: What? Finn?!

name: Jake
line: I'm coming!

name: Finn
line: She's got me! She's got me!

name: Jake
line: Yo, bro, you're sleepwalking again! Wake up!

name: Finn
line: Whoa. Jake? Was I...?

name: Jake
line: Yes, Finn. Again. Every time youse is screaming about "She's got me!" and all that.

name: Finn
line: She's got... Wha?

name: Jake
line: Wait, you don't remember? You just woke up, man! Recall it, baby! Come on.

name: Jake
line: That's too much; don't punch yourself.

name: Finn
line: Eh, it's gone. I don't know.

name: Jake
line: You're repressin' the memory, dude!

name: Finn
line: I'm what?

name: Jake
line: You're hiding whatever she is in a mental vault.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah. The vault. That's where the stuff I can't handle goes. Kerplunk.

name: Jake
line: Okay, so you even know you're doing it?

name: Finn
line: Yeah.

name: Jake
line: Listen, we gotta find out who this lady is. We gotta open the vault a little.

name: Finn
line: No, sir.

name: Jake
line: This is just gonna keep happening, man.

name: Finn
line: It's alright. I'm not hurting anybody.

name: Jake
line: Finn, for reals.

name: Finn
line: NO!

name: Jake
line: Alright. Chill, chill. Don't sweat it, man. It's not even a thing.

name: Finn
line: Cool.

name: Jake
line: Why don't you clean up the kitchen now?

name: Finn
line: Okay. I'm sorry I did that.

name: Jake
line: It's alright. It's only, like, the fifth room you've train-wrecked this month.

name: Jake
line: Wow, that was fast.

name: Finn
line: Yup.

name: Jake
line: While you were doing that, I downloaded a new game on BMO.

name: Finn
line: There's a cricket in here.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: What is it?

name: Jake
line: I don't know. Lady said it's good.

name: Finn
line: Hmmm. She likes those games where you're, like, collecting materials to make stationery.

name: Jake
line: Naw, this is different.  It's different.

name: Finn
line: A'ight, let's peep it.

name: Finn
line: Regression Simulator? Uh, okay.

name: Finn
line: Start.

name: Male Voice
line: Welcome, adventurer.

name: Finn
line: Whoa.

name: Male Voice
line: I am the Hypno-Priest. I will be your guide.

name: Male Voice
line: Deep into your subconscious mind. Follow me now, adventurer.

name: Finn
line: The vault.

name: Jake
line: Go in there, man! Don't be scurred.

name: Jake
line: What do you see?

name: Finn
line: I see... my past lives.

name: Finn
line: I was a comet...

name: Finn
line: A butterfly...

name: Finn
line: A thing... I don't know what that is. Some kind of shape? Or a doodoo in another dimension?

name: Jake
line: Do you remember anything about the scary lady?

name: Finn
line: Scary lady?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. I was her! Except she was a chubby tiger.

name: Finn
line: No, no, no, wait, wait, wait. She was riding a tiger, and she wasn't scary.

name: Boss
line: Hey, girl.

name: Boss
line: Sniffin' around for that chedda?

name: Shoko
line: You know it. Got any work for me?

name: Boss
line: I might could, but it's a top-shelf shakedown. Know what I'm saying?

name: Shoko
line: I can step to that.

name: Boss
line: There's a rival camp down river. The leader's got some magic omelette, you know?  Mmm. You know? The kind you wear around your neck.

name: Shoko
line: I think it's pronounced "amulet."

name: Boss
line: Oh, don't get fresh with me, girlie. I talk good. Anyway, when I get my hands on that omelet, whoo-hoo! Forget about everything, baby. I'll be the biggest cheese in creation.

name: Shoko
line: Sounds cool. I'll take the job

name: Boss
line: Shake on it.

name: Boss
line: You pull this off, and I'll let you join my gang.

name: Shoko
line: Uh... that's okay. I'll just work for coin.

name: Boss
line: And, on the other hand, so to speak, if you screw up or chicken out, you're out of the game. Permanently.  Pretend my finger's a knife.

name: Shoko
line: Play dead.

name: Shoko
line: Deader.

name: Banana Guard
line: Ah! Another attack!

name: Banana Guard
line: My leader! Another attack!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Bring them inside.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, you're up!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I thought you might be hungry.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: So, who knocked you out?

name: Shoko
line: Bath Boy Gang.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ugh! I hate those boys!

name: Shoko
line: Yeah, they stole everything I had, but that's okay. My parents always told me that simple possessions aren't the most important things in life.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Word 'em up.

name: Shoko
line: They told me "all you really need is a good computer."

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Amen. Wait, what?!

name: Shoko
line: They traded my arm to some tranch for a computer.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: They what?!

name: Shoko
line: What?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Parents should protect their children!

name: Shoko
line: What? Really?

name: Shoko
line: Do you have any kids?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: All the Candy People are like my children, except young Mr. Cream Puff... he's like my boyfriend. Anyway, protecting my people is the most important thing to me. That's why I've got to take down the Bath Boy Gang.

name: Shoko
line: You think you can do that?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I got a plan—a secret, awesome plan. In the meantime, I've gotta cover this radioactive river with candy. Wanna help?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks for pitching in, Shoko! You can stay here as long as you want.

name: Bath Boy
line: Psst! Psst! Shoko!

name: Shoko
line: What are you doing here?!

name: Bath Boy
line: I'm spyin' on you. Wait 'til I tell boss that you quit the life for a cruddy day job!

name: Shoko
line: I'm gaining her trust, you momo. Say... you can help me.

name: Bath Boy
line: Huh?

name: Shoko
line: Stay away from me you gang boy! Ahhhhh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: A Bath Boy!

name: Bath Boy
line: What're you doing?!

name: Shoko
line: Be cool!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That was bananamas! Where'd you learn to fight like that?

name: Shoko
line: My parents took me to a dojo when I was little... they never came back.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wow. Your parents are the worst... hey, come with me. I wanna show you something.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: My secret project is in here.

name: Shoko
line: Whoa... what are they?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The Gumball Guardians. Wanna help me finish them?

name: Shoko
line: Yeah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's it! There's just one last step.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hello.

name: Gumball Guardians
line: Hello, mother!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Y'all go guard now, and don't let nobody mess with my stuff!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, guess what, thanks for helping me make those guys.

name: Shoko
line: I like feeling handy.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I want to repay you for your help.

name: Shoko
line: Oh, yeah? You gonna give me that amulet, maybe?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No. No, dude, I made you a thing.

name: Princess Bubblegun
line: That's it. You can do it.

name: Shoko
line: You made me a man servant?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No! In the box.

name: Shoko
line: Oh, no...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What do you mean "Oh, no"? I made you an arm! It's a dang plug 'n' play, girl.

name: Shoko
line: No, it's awesome... I can't believe it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's right, I'm a technical wonder-child.

name: Shoko
line: Yeah, I know.  I'm sorry, I gotta go to my room for no reason.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay! I thought we could do some two-arm stuff, but... uh, it's cool!

name: Bath Boy Gang Leader
line: Pretend my finger's a knife.

name: Shoko
line: I'm sorry, Princess Bubblegum...

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Are you okay, princess?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ah, jeez, you're so loud!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Are you in danger?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No! Don't just guard me! You need to protect everyone!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Okay.

name: Gumball Guardian
line: I knew it. Princess, you are getting jacked.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wha-hut? Whoa, hey!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Halt!

name: Shoko
line: Ahhhhhhhh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Get her out of there, quick!

name: Gumball Guardians
line: Yes, mom.

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Uhhh...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Alright. Take a break for the night.

name: Jake
line: How you doin', buddy?

name: Finn
line: The past was to be reckoned with.

name: Jake
line: That's cool. Whachu' gonna do about it?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hallo, Bubblegum hier...  atonement? Alright, Finn, I'm on my way.

name: Shoko
line: Ahhh... look at that. I got a new arm. That would be cool if I weren't about hit my reset button...

name: Finn
line: Hey, hey. This way.

name: Jake
line: What was th—aww, no.  Dog-drangit, Finn...

name: Finn
line: Okay, here you go.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whoa, what?! My amulet?! Wait a second...  Is that...?

name: Finn
line: It's me, Shoko! And PB, you're like a bazillion years old. You're not freaking nineteen! What the heck?!

name: Finn
line: Weirdo.

name: Finn
line: Heh. My vault feels lighter.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, you think you're pretty way up there but I can get you!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 나 잡아봐봐~

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Alright. Let me just add three more drops of explosive diarrhea.

name: Finn and Princess Bubblegum
line: Oooo...

name: Finn
line: Hey Princess Bubblegum, when we bring the dead back to life, will it be filled with worms?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No. If my decorpsinator serum works, all the dead Candy People will look as young and healthy as you do.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Pick up that platter, tough guy.

name: Finn
line: Old Mr. Cream Puff?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We used to date.

name: Finn
line: Something's happening! Come on, come on...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Work.

name: Finn
line: Algebraic!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wait, something's wrong.

name: Zombie Mr. Cream Puff
line: Sugar!

name: Finn and Princess Bubblegum
line: Ew!

name: Finn
line: Hey, look, the decorpsinator serum is working!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, this is wrong. They're not coming back to life--they're still dead! The decorpsinator serum--it's incomplete!

name: Zombie Love Heart
line: Rah. Must eat sugar!

name: Finn
line: You're grounded, Mister.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, this is really bad. They're going to be attracted to the Candy Kingdom!

name: Finn
line: Why?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Because the Candy People are made of sugar, ya ding dong!

name: Zombie Mr. Cream Puff
line: Gimme some sugar, baby.

name: Finn
line: Chew on this!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Good one, Finn. Quickly, to the kingdom!

name: Finn
line: Get a life!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: All citizens of the Candy Kingdom! Report to the palace, immediately!

name: Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hurry, sweet citizens.

name: Finn
line: Alright, you heard the princess, everyone in! Alright, no pushing, come on!

name: Jake
line: Dude, what's up?

name: Finn
line: The princess will explain everything. Tree Trunks, get those hot buns in here, girl.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, I hope it's not bad news.

name: Finn
line: Did we get everyone?

name: Manfried
line: All present and accounted for.

name: Finn
line: Thanks, Manfried.

name: Manfried
line: You're welcome.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Citizens, we are assembled here in the candy foyer for a momentous announcement. Tonight we are all going to have... a slumber party!

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Finn
line: Wait! What about the zom--?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Go ahead and start partying.

name: Finn
line: But, Princess, the Undead--

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We'll be right back, everyone.

name: Jake
line: Whooo!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, the Candy People can't know about the zombies.

name: Finn
line: Wha?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: If they knew, they would flip out.

name: Finn
line: What do you mean "flip out"?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I mean they would flip out.

name: Starchie
line: Princess? It's me, Starchie the gravedigger. I brought you a larger corpse shovel. Oh, Princess? Well, I'll just wait for you here, then. By the mausoleum. With my back turned. And my defenses lowered.

name: Finn
line: Candy People explode when they get scared?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Not telling the Candy People about the zombies is so important that you need to promise, Royal Promise, not to let anyone find out about the zombies, ever.

name: Finn
line: Okay, sure.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, Finn. You have to Royal Promise.

name: Finn
line: Yes,  I Royal Promise.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Now I must cloister myself in the lab and finish the equation to my decorpsinator serum. You keep the candy folk distracted and ignorant. Can you do that?

name: Finn
line: Yes, your highness.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Good. Don't tell anyone about the zombies. Never ever.

name: Finn
line: No, wait. Can I at least tell  Jake?

name: Jake
line: Tell me about what, dude?

name: Finn
line: You know, about the outbreak of zom--

name: Jake
line: Alright, what's going on?

name: Finn
line: Uhh, nothing at all, buddy!

name: Jake
line: Hey, dude. I think you and Bubblegum are up to something.

name: Finn
line: Ahha ah, what? No, no way.

name: Jake
line: Whoa, you guys are up to something. Is it some sort of prank? Can I get in on it?

name: Finn
line: Who wants to play "Truth or Dare"?

name: Jake
line: Hmm...

name: Finn
line: Ok, Chocoberry, you may ask someone to tell a deep truth or a saucy dare.

name: Chocoberry
line: Mr. Cupcake, truth or dare?

name: Mr. Cupcake
line: Dare.

name: Chocoberry
line: I dare you to take off your wrapper.

name: Jake
line: Hey seriously, man. I'm your bro. Bros are supposed to tell bros everything all the time. What are you and Bubblegum up to? Is everything alright?

name: Finn
line: Yep! Fine! Everything is great! Heh, heh.  Except for that. Whoa.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: I didn't know he was chocolate.

name: Mr. Cupcake
line: Jake, truth or dare?

name: Jake
line: Truth.

name: Mr. Cupcake
line: Do you prefer chocolate or fudge?

name: Jake
line: I can't eat chocolate or fudge 'cause I'm a dog and they'd probably kill me, but hmmmmm probably... neither. Finn! Truth or dare?

name: Finn
line: Dare! Haha!

name: Jake
line: I dare you... to tell me the truth about what's going on in your mind. What were you and Bubblegum talking about when you were alone together?

name: Finn
line: Umm, ahh, the truth is, ahhh...

name: Hallucination of Princess Bubblegum
line: You promised you wouldn't freakin' tell anyone! Oh, you're so cute, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Ahhh... the truth is... that I'd rather play Dodge Socks!

name: Jake
line: I'm not playing dodge socks 'til you stop dodging my questions. Hey...  Old Mr. Cream Puff? Isn't he dead?

name: Finn
line: Hey, give me my sock back! Dodge Socks was a bad idea!

name: Jake
line: Whoa.  Look dude, just tell me what's up, 'cause you are crazier than a cannonball tonight.

name: Finn
line: Oh, my goodness! Princess hasn't finished the equation and the zombies are here!

name: Finn
line: I, uh, she just want this slumber party to be super fun, and if I did have something to tell you, then I would in a second, and it would make my life easier, unless there was something stopping me, like a promise, but there isn't, so I won't, so it's cool.

name: Zombie
line: Sugar!

name: Jake
line: What? You lost me.

name: Finn
line: Umm... Hey, you know what time it is?

name: Jake
line: Adventure time?

name: Finn
line: No, time for Seven Minutes in Heaven! You're first.

name: Jake
line: Really?

name: Finn
line: Lady Rainicorn! In the closet with Jake!

name: Lady
line: 뭐? 나? 웃겨 정말. 그래, 좋아. 하자.

name: Jake
line: Okay, okay, alright.  But in seven minutes, I'm gonna come out and make you spill your beans, Finn.

name: Finn
line: I can't hear you all the way in heaven!

name: Chet
line: Umm, does anyone else hear that?

name: Finn
line: What? Hear what? I, I don't hear anything.

name: Chet
line: I hear something I don't understand... and it makes me scared!

name: Finn
line: What? No, Chet. Everybody, wait. What noise? You mean this noise?

name: Chet
line: Oh.

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Dance it! Bust it up! Uh! Uh! Uh! Oh!

name: Chocoberry
line: What is this game you are playing at now, Finn?

name: Finn
line: Uhh, it's... Blockado. Haha, the game of barricades. Come on, let's block all the entrances and windows!

name: Finn
line: Alright, this is not a permanent solution. Think Finn, how can you keep everyone from finding out?

name: Manfried
line: Find out about what, Finn?

name: Finn
line: Manfried, the talking piñata! Your convenient appearance gives me a great idea. Everyone, grab a stick! New game! We're gonna smash some piñatas!

name: Manfried
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Except for you, Manfried.

name: Manfried
line: Oh, thank goodness.

name: Finn
line: Now everybody don these blindfolds.  Thanks, Taffy Girl.

name: Finn
line: Alright, everybody, get together. I'm hanging the piñatas...  They're all around you. Smash the piñatas!

name: Finn
line: Yeah! You guys are on fire!

name: Chocoberry
line: Oh, it is so tasty.

name: Finn
line: Yes! We did it! My improbable plan worked!

name: Jake
line: Whew!

name: Lady
line: 안녕!

name: Jake
line: Seven minutes up yet?  Whoa!  What the nuts happened here?!

name: Finn
line: Oh, we killed all the zombies that Princess Bubblegum and I raised from the dead.

name: Jake
line: Really!?

name: Finn
line: Jake? What's going on?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What? Huh? Oh, Finn! Did you break your Royal Promise?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but, I mean, all the zombies are dead. The Candy People won't freak out. What's the big deal?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: This is really, really bad, Finn. You can't break Royal Promises. Never, ever, never. No matter what, forever.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The Guardians of the Royal Promise are coming for us.

name: Finn and Princess Bubblegum
line: Whoa!

name: Guardian 1
line: Finn the Human. You have broken a Royal Promise for which the penalty is trial by fire.

name: Finn
line: That's stupid.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wait! He's my friend! Isn't there another option?!

name: Guardian 1
line: Yes. Because you care for the promise-breaker, we will give him a less hot trial. You must now answer...

name: Guardian 2
line: ...Math questions!

name: Finn
line: Mathematical!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, you're terrible at math.

name: Finn
line: Awww.

name: Guardian 1
line: Now, solve this!

name: Finn
line: Uhh....

name: Guardian 2
line: Oh, wait, wait, I thought of a better one.

name: Guardian 1
line: Yes! Two plus two. Solve it or die.

name: Finn
line: Uhh. Four, right?

name: Guardian 1
line: Oh, correct.

name: Finn
line: What's happening, Princess?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You've defeated the broken royal promise! The Gumball Guardians are resetting!

name: Finn
line: Slamacow! That was tops! Who's not good at math? I was all "Four!"

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Four, four... Four, four, four... That's it! The answer was so simple, I was too smart to see it!

name: Finn
line: You're welcome!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: '4' is the last figure I need to perfect my decorpsinator serum.

name: Revived Zombie
line: Golly!

name: Finn
line: Woohoo! Yeah!

name: Jake
line: This is messed up, but sweet.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 진짜로.

name: Candy Person 1
line: Uncle Chewy!

name: Candy Person 2
line: Grandma!

name: Ice Cream Lady
line: Former dead relative!

name: Jake
line: Starchie!

name: Starchie
line: Mornin'.

name: Jake
line: Man, you broke a Royal Promise? You're nuts. All you had to do is say that it was a royal secret. I know what's up.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I hope you grasp the full consequences of breaking promises.

name: Finn
line: Heck yeah! If I break a Royal Promise, I get to fight zombies, throw slumber parties, awake Gumball Guardians and... and...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Alright, alright.

name: Finn
line: And reverse death itself!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, you are adorable. But keep your promises, okay?

name: Finn
line: I will, Princess.

name: Finn
line: Starchie, you're not a zombie.

name: Starchie
line: I can't help it. Flesh is delicious!

name: Finn
line: You're delicious!

name: Starchie
line: Don't squeeze me! I'll fart!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Swords! Yeah, swords! Whoo!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, men and their swords... You boys, stop horsing around with my apples!

name: Both Finn and Jake
line: Aw,Tree Trunks!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Now, come on over! I baked y'all an apple pie.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, apple pie!

name: Jake
line: Whooo-hoo-hoo!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna eat it all before you even GET there!

name: Jake
line: Noooooo!

name: Finn
line: Apple pie!

name: Jake
line: Don't let him eat it all!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Now, you boys sit down and behave yourselves. Oh!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Shoo, fly! Get off my apple pie! Huh!  A fly landed on my pie. That's no good.  Bye-bye.

name: Finn
line: Why are you throwing the pie away?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Flies wanted it, they can have it.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Anyways, don't y'all worry 'cause the new pie is coming in the wag of a lamb's tail.

name: Finn and Jake
line: New pie?

name: Finn
line: Woohoo! Pie, yeah!

name: Jake
line: Yeah! Wowowowowo

name: Tree Trunks
line: Here you are.

name: Finn
line: Wow.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Come on, go ahead.

name: Tree Trunks
line: What you think?

name: Jake
line: Best apple pie ever!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, Jake, thank you, but that ain't the best apple pie.

name: Finn
line: What are you talking about, Tree Trunks? What can be better than your apple pie?

name: Jake
line: You ate all the pie...

name: Tree Trunks
line: Finn, what would you do if you could do anything?

name: Finn
line: Anything? Well, I'd catch a shooting star, travel to outer space and fight space monsters!

name: Jake
line: I'd carve my face on the moon so the moon would look like my face!

name: Finn
line: What would you do, Tree Trunks?

name: Tree Trunks
line: I would go pick an apple.

name: Finn
line: ...Lame.

name: Finn
line: I'm sorry. I mean, it's just you pick apples every day.

name: Tree Trunks
line: This apple ain't like the apples that I pick. They say it's the apple of apples; rarest kind of all. Legends call it the Crystal Gem Apple.

name: Jake
line: That sounds awesome!

name: Finn
line: Where is it?

name: Tree Trunks
line: I've heard that it grows at the deepest end of the Evil Dark Forest.

name: Finn
line: Whoo! Tree Trunks you gotta go pick that apple!

name: Jake
line: YEAH!

name: Tree Trunks
line: What? Me? Oh, no I'm just a cute little elephant. I'm not cut out for adventuring.

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks! This is your dream! Think about eating that apple with your own mouth.

name: Jake
line: Or your trunk.

name: Finn
line: Imagine the flavor.

name: Jake
line: And your satisfied face.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Really? You think I can handle the Scary Dark Forest?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, and we'll help you.

name: Jake
line: We love you, Tree Trunks.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Okay. I'll do it. Call me... Adventurer Tree Trunks.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yeah, Tree Trunks!

name: Tree Trunks
line: I love being so high up from the ground!

name: Jake
line: Psst, I can take you even higher on my shoulders.

name: Finn
line: No, Jake. She has a weak heart.

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Finn
line: Ewww, why is this ground all squishy?

name: Jake
line: Whatever it is, I'm liking it. Oh, yeah!

name: Tree Trunks
line: I wanna try!

name: Finn
line: Okay. I'm cool with you letting you do whatever you want.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Heeheehee! It's like some cookie dough!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, hello there.

name: Finn
line: Uhh, Tree Trunks, stay away from that.

name: Finn
line: Ugh, you're gonna get it, wall of flesh.

name: Tree Trunks
line: An eye and a mouth. Well, I think I got the perfect thing for him or her... stickers!

name: Finn
line: Careful, Tree Trunks, this thing is evil.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Here's a rainbow sticker, and here's a scratch-and-sniff sticker. Smells just like a pickle. Oh, and this one is a holographic unicorn, but it doesn't have a horn.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, now, whatcha doing?

name: Finn
line: Huh? Tree Trunks!

name: Jake
line: Whoo!

name: Finn
line: You better stay in that tree, baby. Um, Tree Trunks were you putting stickers on that evil monster?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Yes, I thought it needed some tender love and affection. Oh, what a pretty butterfly!

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks? Ugh. Jake, I just realized that Tree Trunks is old and bonkers. We can't take her through this Evil Dark Forest.

name: Jake
line: Nah, she'll be fine.

name: Finn
line: But the monsters?

name: Jake
line: It's fine. It's fine!

name: Finn
line: Are you sure? 'Cause she has zero adventurer training.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, it's fine, she'll be fine, it's fine, it's fine, it's fine.

name: Finn
line: Maybe it is fine. Tree Trunks?

name: Jake
line: Where'd she go?

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks!

name: Finn
line: We gotta find her, Jake! Tree Trunks!

name: Jake
line: Where are you, Tree Trunks?

name: Tree Trunks
line: And here's your teacup, and here's my teacup.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Tree Trunks!

name: Tree Trunks
line: And here's your sandwich. Oops, you dropped it.

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks, run!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, hey, Finn.

name: Jake
line: Hiya!

name: Finn
line: Time to call your mamas, evil sign posts.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Patience, boys. There's enough tea for everyone.

name: Finn
line: Errr...

name: Finn
line: NO!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, Finn. What a nice hug.

name: Finn
line: I'm not hugging you! I'm trying to save your life! There's too many!!

name: Jake
line: Finn?!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, Finn. That tea party was crummier than a big old biscuit.

name: Finn
line: Errrr. Tree Trunks, I'm all jacked up because of you. Look at my jacked up face!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Are you mad at me?

name: Finn
line: No, I'm not mad. You're too super-cute for me to be mad at you, and you're a top notch adventurer. Now, let's go find and eat the heck out of that crystal gem apple together.

name: Finn
line: Dang it!

name: Jake
line: You go fight—I'll keep Tree Trunks out of trouble.

name: Finn
line: Awesome.

name: Tree Trunks
line: J-Jake I think Finn is getting jacked up again.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, Finn can handle it. He's 12.

name: Tree Trunks
line: I think I know a way to help him out.

name: Jake
line: Uhh, you should stay here, Tree Trunks.

name: Tree Trunks
line: But I thought Finn told me that I was a top notch adventurer. And my adventurer instincts tell me to seduce that tentacle critter with my womanly charms and elephant prowess.

name: Jake
line: Uhh, no way.

name: Finn
line: Uh, what are you doing here, Tree Trunks?

name: Tree Trunks
line: I'm helping you by tempting this guy with my body.

name: Finn
line: It's not a guy, Tree Trunks! It's a Snake Armed Ruby Brain Beast!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Even brain beasts get lonely, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Jake! You were supposed to watch her!

name: Jake
line: She got passed me, man. I tried to stop her, but she overpowered me.

name: Finn
line: GET her out of here!

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Finn, kill it!

name: Finn
line: I can't find it's magic gem weak spot!

name: Finn
line: Oh, there it is.

name: Tree Trunks
line: I did it! I helped! I'm the sexiest adventurer in the world!

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks!! You're not an adventurer! You nearly got yourself killed again! Do you wanna die, Tree Trunks?! Is that what you think adventurers do?! Die and make all their friends feel terrible 'cause they couldn't save them?!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, man.

name: Tree Trunks
line: I'm going home now.

name: Finn
line: Ugh... Tree Trunks. Tree Trunks!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Don't follow me. Oh, Finn... You shouldn't yell at cuties that just wanna help you. OH!

name: Finn
line: Man, I feel horrible. I was only yelling because I care about her safety.

name: Jake
line: That's what happens when you care too much, dude.

name: Tree Trunks
line: OH!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Tree Trunks! Huh!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Finn, I found the crystal gem apple.

name: Finn
line: Woohoo!

name: Jake
line: You're the man, Tree Trunks!

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks, I'm a huge butt guy for getting mad at you. I'm a huge fart. I was only upset because... I love you and I don't wanna see you get hurt.

name: Tree Trunks
line: That's precious, Finn, and I'll accept your apology if you let me kiss your cheek.

name: Finn
line: Uhhhh, I don't know, I--

name: Jake
line: Whoa! Let her kiss your cheek, man. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

name: Crystal Guardian Jake
line: Whoa! Let her kiss your cheek, man. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

name: Crystal Guardian Finn
line: Uhhhh, I don't know...

name: Finn
line: A crystal guardian! Tree Trunks, stay out of the monster battle this time. I don't want you getting hurt.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Alright, I promise I will.

name: Finn
line: Radical! Back off you!

name: Crystal Guardian Finn
line: Back off you!

name: Finn
line: Stop copying me! Grrah!

name: Crystal Guardian Finn
line: Stop copying me! Grrah!

name: Finn
line: Ahhhh! A-a-oww..

name: Jake
line: Finn! Graw!

name: Crystal Guardian Jake
line: Graw!

name: Jake
line: Ow! Ow.

name: Finn
line: He's copying everything we do.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Hey! It's my butterfly-friend. That's precious.

name: Jake
line: Whoo! Shake it, Tree Trunks!

name: Crystal Guardian Jake
line: Whoo! Shake it, Tree Trunks!

name: Finn
line: Gem-clam! Let's beat it up while it's copying Tree Trunks! Yaah!

name: Jake
line: Crud, this is barf dude.

name: Finn
line: Oh, man, I'm a total moron! We gotta fight this one Tree Trunks style.

name: Jake
line: I'll get the make up.

name: Finn
line: Hey! Crystal Guardian, are you okay with Tree Trunks taking a bite of that apple?

name: Jake
line: I'm okay with it.

name: Crystal Guardian Jake
line: I'm okay with it.

name: Jake
line: And I'm stupid.

name: Crystal Guardian Jake
line: And I'm stupid.

name: Jake
line: Heh-heh, you heard the guardian, TT. Bite that thing.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Okay!

name: Finn
line: Whoo! How's it taste, Tree Trunks?

name: Jake
line: Yeah! How is it?

name: Ice King
line: Get back here, worm! What?! The last chapter of "Cosmic Kissing"? My stirring lyrical interlude from "Fionna Goes to the Market"? The epilogue from "Flame Prince Breaks a Sweat"?!  Who gave you permission to edit my fan fiction?! Prepare to be punished! But first... what'd ya think?

name: Gunther
line: Wenk!

name: Ice King
line: Great critique!

name: Gunther
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: I don't need an editor. I'm my own editor -- editor-in-king!

name: Ice King
line: Ooh! My custom tape! Remix!  "Sunlight gleamed through the window as Fionna sat patiently at the breakfast table."

name: Cake
line: Hah! Check out my sweet flippin' moves.

name: Fionna
line: You're a real ace in the kitchen.

name: Cake
line: Roar! Ha ha! Cooking is fun! Here come the flapjacks!

name: Fionna
line: Know what's better than cooking?

name: Cake
line: No!

name: Fionna
line: Wha?!

name: Cake
line: These are narrative flapjacks. Darlin', don't you see the brilliant comedy laid out before you? You wouldn't eat Act II before Act I, silly. Now try starting with the dockworker having a moral crisis.

name: Fionna
line: Okay. This...one?

name: Cake
line: Fionna, this character doesn't serve any thematic purpose until much later in the meal.

name: Fionna
line: Sorry, Cake, but these just look like formless blobs of sweet flapjack to me.

name: Cake
line: Mmm... It's true. Maybe if I based them off real people, do some "life cooking" -- nonfiction flapjacks! Let's go griddle up portraits of the entire kingdom! Got to get my supplies together. My portable griddle... Mmm. Some peppermint eggs... and the twice-cursed flour! Got it! Ready for stories and flapjacks?

name: Fionna
line: Heck yes!

name: Flour Demon
line: You're wasting me on breakfast!

name: Fionna and Cake
line: No one asked you, Flour Demon.

name: Ice King
line: That was like a cookbook... written by a genius. On to the next chapter -- "A Game of Gumball."

name: Fionna
line: Prince Gumball would probs make a great flapjack model. Sometimes he gets so absorbed in his work that he doesn't move for days.

name: Cake
line: Ooooh! I can break out the pink sea salt and --

name: Fionna
line: Hey, there's Gumball!

name: Prince Gumball
line: Is it here? No. No. Ah! Just what I need! The periodic table of candy elements! If I use this one and this one here... Ha ha! The perfect strategy! Hyup!  Butterscotch Butler, the butterscotch Scottish butler, I challenge you!

name: Butterscotch Butler
line: Again?

name: Prince Gumball
line: I've gathered all the necessary strategy and tactics to finally defeat you!

name: Butterscotch Butler
line: To play, one must know strategy, yes. But to know victory, one must also know their opponent!

name: Prince Gumball
line: Opponent?

name: Butterscotch Butler
line: Their dreams... ...their ambitions.... ...their rrrregrets... ...and their fears!

name: Prince Gumball
line: M-My mortality!

name: Butterscotch Butler
line: King me.

name: Fionna
line: Maybe we should find someone a little more relaxed.

name: Prince Gumball
line: How?! How did you know?!

name: Butterscotch Butler
line: Huh? Oh. You leave that lying around everywhere.

name: Cake
line: Yes! Still not quite right.

name: Fionna
line: How about this for some inspiration?

name: Cake
line: Pancakes and flapjacks are nothing alike!

name: Fionna
line: Aw, Cake.

name: Cake
line: It's just that flapjack literature is such a niche genre, and none of my flapjacks are turning out any good.

name: Fionna
line: Come on, Cake. We've still got 10 minutes before the library closes. It's Flame Prince!

name: Cake
line: What's that fire hazard doing in the library?

name: Turtle Prince
line: Hmm? Oh, no! Oh! I love that author! Have you read her newest book? I-I could, uh, find it for you.

name: Flame Prince
line: Oh. Uh, n-nah, that's okay. I'll just start with this one. Thanks, though.

name: Turtle Prince
line: Uh -- Aah!

name: Flame Prince
line: Oh. Sorry about that. Uh -- Uh -- W-w-w-- W-w-w-- Eh... No, no, no, no, no! Hot, hot, hot!

name: Flame Prince
line: Wow. I am not graceful today.

name: Turtle Prince
line: N-Not the first editions! Ow, ow! Ow, ow, ow! Easy... Unh! Gah! Huh?! Leaving, yes?

name: Flame Prince
line: Yeah. I'll borrow this one, please.

name: Turtle Prince
line: Of course! I'll just need you to sign it out.

name: Turtle Prince
line: I'm sorry. I have a duty to serve the library's patrons, but I'm also sworn to protect the books. I can't in good conscience let you take it home. But maybe I could read this book to you?

name: Flame Prince
line: Listen, I just came in here to use the bathroom, man. I thought you had to, like, check out a book first to pee. Actually, I don't even have a library card.

name: Marshall Lee
line: Lumpy Space Prince! Lumpy Spaaaace Priiiince! Come on. You've been coughing for five days. Just take one tablespoon.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Uh... B-Bumpy Space Prince? Uh, there's no one here by that name.

name: Marshall Lee
line: Then who am I talking to?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Uh, this is Ja-- Jack.

name: Marshall Lee
line: Huh. Well, if you're Jack, then I'mmmm... MMMMichael Dean. Yeah. And I'm looking for this beautiful prince. I got to give him this...magic potion! See, he was cursed by this evil snot gnoll.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Really?

name: Marshall Lee
line: The snot gnoll transformed him into a totally disgusting mucus monster.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: What?! No, I'm not!

name: Marshall Lee
line: Did you hear that?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Huh? What is it?!

name: Marshall Lee
line: It's -- It's --  It's the snot gnoll! Aah! Uh-oh! It's coming towards your tree, Jack!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: I'm stuck!

name: Marshall Lee
line: I'll protect you, beautiful prince! Step off, snot gnoll!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Get him, Michael Dean!

name: Marshall Lee
line: Gah! It got me! Ugh!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: No!!

name: Marshall Lee
line: I got one last hit in! I-It's running away!  I think this is the end for me.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Rally, Michael Dean!

name: Marshall Lee
line: It's...too late for me, beautiful prince. Take the potion.  Take it and live. Live!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: I won't let your sacrifice be wasted.

name: Marshall Lee
line: See? No more coughing.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Hey, yeah. Actually, I do feel better.

name: Marshall Lee
line: Wow. Maybe that was the wrong potion.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Much better!

name: Ice Queen
line: Lounged atop their comfortable sense of ennui, Flynn the human being and Jacques the raccoon listened to the Ice President read his fiction.

name: Ice President
line: "Lynn the person looked at Janet and asked, 'Am I my feelings? Do I exist because I can't stop feeling?' Janet the fox answered her. 'Feelings are action, and like all mortal action, they are doomed to failure.'"

name: Ice Queen
line: Flynn and Jacques sighed. They totally got it. The end! What do you guys think? Too philosophical?

name: Ice Queen
line: Out of my way!

name: Cake
line: Blazin' blueberries -- comin' through!

name: Ice Queen
line: You're ruining my literary reading!

name: Fionna
line: Oh, hey, Ice Queen. Do you want Cake to make your flapjack portrait?

name: Ice Queen
line: Why, ye-- No! I mean no! Why don't we table this for now, so I can... destroy you!

name: Cake
line: Hang on to your turkeys, because I'm about to make the toughest flapjack ever. Some purple chicken milk... dramatic cornmeal... And the tears of this reflective turtle.  You will outlive everyone you love. Cry for me, little mama! Here, Fionna!

name: Fionna
line: Tasty! Hey, Ice Queen, I really liked your story. The imagery was tight.

name: Ice Queen
line: Can you bElieve it was my first draft?!

name: Fionna
line: No way!

name: Cake
line: Gotcha! I call it "Portrait of an Author."

name: Fionna
line: I really did like her story, though. I wonder how that Ice President got elected.

name: Ice King
line: Talk about life imitating art. Gunter, did you see what Daddy did? Did you guess the secret theme?

name: Gunther
line: Wenk!

name: Ice King
line: No! You're way off! Fionna and Cake were at the breakfast table. Gumball consulted the periodic table. Flame Prince set fire to the table of contents. The...purple thing had a tablespoon of syrup. And Ice Queen...did a tabley thing, too, probably.

name: Gunther
line: Wenk!

name: Ice King
line: They're not like regular stories. They're shorter. I'll call them...grabl-- No -- tables!

name: Gunther
line: Wenk.

name: Cuber
line: I'll never look at tables the same way again.

name: Lumpy Space Messenger
line: Sir! My sir! A message from their majesties.

name: Finn & Jake
line: King and Queen Lumpy Space!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: We can't find our baby girl!

name: Lumpy Space King
line: She's been missing for days!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, stop your crying, you two. We'll help you find your daughter. We'll find her using Jake's muscles.  Dude, show off your muscles!

name: Finn
line: Whoo!

name: Lumpy Space King
line: No more tears, Boobly-Bear.  Please, take her these sandwiches we made. She loves these sandwiches. Thank you, boys.

name: Finn
line: Whoo!

name: Finn
line: Dude, I know where Lumpy Space Princess is. She's in the woods eating beans.

name: Jake
line: Mmhmm! This is gonna be easy as... uh... mm...

name: Finn
line: Easy as childbirth!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, okay.

name: Fat Villager
line: Please, please help me. A monster is terrorizing our village and has eaten up all the crops.

name: Finn
line: Why were you up here in this tree?

name: Fat Villager
line: I thought I saw some food, and I was hiding from the monster.  You must help.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. I guess we can help this guy real quick and then get back to LSP.

name: Jake
line: Where's your village?

name: Fat Villager
line: Umm, I don't remember.

name: Fat Villager
line: Howard remembers. Hey! It's Howard! Howard! You remember where the village is?

name: Howard
line: Yeah, I marked it on the map, but  it's only half.

name: Howard
line: Well, we're all ready.

name: Fat Villager #2
line: We can't leave yet.

name: Fat Villagers
line: Aw.

name: Howard
line: Alright, now we're ready.

name: Fat Villager #3
line: What's in the basket?

name: Jake
line: Sammiches!

name: Fat Villagers
line: Food! Food!

name: Finn
line: Wait! You can't eat this food! It's not ours to give!

name: Fat Villagers
line: Aw.

name: Finn
line: Now, show us the way to your town.

name: Fat Villager #4
line: Too tired from hunger. Carry me?

name: Finn
line: Okay.

name: Fat Villager #1
line: The monster lives in that windmill, but we're too scared to go near it.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Nothing scares us!

name: Jake
line: Be alert. Anything could pop out of there and rip our faces off.

name: Finn
line: Whoo.

name: Jake
line: Be careful, Finn.

name: Finn
line: It's you!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Finn, what the junk?

name: Jake
line: It's you!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, sandwiches!

name: Jake
line: LSP, what the heck are you doin' here?

name: Finn
line: Are you in here making out with the monster?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No... I am the monster.

name: Jake
line: Whaaaaat?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: It's a long story.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: It all started at my lumpin' parents' house.

name: Lumpy Space King
line: Daughter?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah?

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: How are the sandwiches?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: They're lumpin' delicious, Mom.

name: Lumpy Space King
line: You know, you could enjoy your mom's sandwiches every day if you came back more often.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No. You can have them delivered to me at my apartment.

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: We want you to move back home, sweetheart.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What?!  You invited me here under false pretenses?!

name: Lumpy Space King
line: Wait, sweetheart. We're just worried about you.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ha! Y'all don't think I can make it on my own? I'll show you! I'm running away!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I stormed out and left Lumpy Space forever.

name: Jake
line: Oh, and then you found this windmill.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No. Something else happened first. Keep listening.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I was so cold, and I was so very hungry.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Uh! Oh, Glob! Maybe I can... make a shelter out of these nuts!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: It's not fair.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I was rescued by a family of wolves. The mama wolf was all like, "We must take care of her, as if she were our own." And Papa Wolf was all like, "This is a special child who needs special love because she's gonna be great when she grows up."

name: Finn
line: So these were talking wolves?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No, they were normal wolves. I knew what they were thinking because of their body language. Stop interrupting, Finn.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I found a home where I could act like myself.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: They took care of me.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I knew that if my parents could see me now, they'd be jealous of how lumpin' awesome I am.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my Glob!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: But then, the drama started.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Stephanie, Sue, can you guys keep a secret?  Okay, here's the secret I just saw Jessica making out with Mark... behind Tony's back! Stephanie, are you even listening? 'Cause I'm kinda freaking out right now! Tony's gonna come back from hunting any minute now, and—

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hi, Tony! Oh, my Glob. Guys, what are we gonna— oh.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: So, should we say something to Tony?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You guys!  TONY, JESSICA'S CHEATING ON YOU!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my Glob. Oh, my Glob. Oh, my Glob.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Look, I'm sorry. I know it's none of my business. I know, I—

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Because I think Tony has a right to know, Stephanie!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Nuh-uh, Miranda, I do not like Tony.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No, Jessica! Don't cheat on Tony with me!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ah!  Oh, Glob!  Oh, no! Aah!    Oh, Glob.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I came upon a tribe of villagers.

name: Female Fat Villager
line: Monster!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, I'm so hungry!

name: Male Fat Villager
line: Monster!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ah!

name: Another Fat Villager
line: Monster!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Anyway, then I found this windmill, and whenever I get hungry, I dress up like the monster and I go eat all the villagers' crops.

name: Finn
line: LSP, you're stealing!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Don't say that.  You're makin' me feel bad.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Thanks, Finn.

name: Finn
line: LSP, if you wanna feel better, you should apologize to the farmers and make amends.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Really?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, that'll work.

name: Fat Villager
line: Monster! Monster! Monster! Monster!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No. No, wait!

name: Fat Villagers
line: Monster! Monster!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I'm not a monster! I was just pretending to be a monster.

name: Fat Villagers
line: Uh?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I'm sorry that you're starving because I ate all of your crops, even though you're all still really fat, and I probably helped you lose some weight.

name: Fat Villager
line: Did she just call us fat?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Don't get all bent out of shape! I'm just being honest!

name: Finn
line: LSP!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What?

name: Finn
line: That apology was terrible!

name: Fat Villager
line: Look, the monster eats while it apologizes! Let's kill it!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Please don't kill me!

name: Fat Villager
line: We have to!

name: Finn
line: Well, you don't have to.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, you could just let her go.

name: Fat Villager
line: If we let her go, she'll keep eating our crops, and we'll starve!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Why don't you just get your parents to buy you more crops?

name: Fat Villager
line: We are parents! Those crops were for our children!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You guys are parents? Just like my parents...

name: Finn
line: LSP, are you okay?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah, Finn, I'm great. Here,  I want you to have these sandwiches.

name: Fat Villagers
line: Sandwiches.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah, they're really good. They're made with a lot of love.

name: Finn
line: It's working!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I saved the village!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: And that's how I saved the village!

name: Lumpy Space King
line: Well, we're just glad you're home.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Whatever.

name: Lumpy Space King
line: And thank you, Finn and Jake.

name: Finn
line: No problem.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, we didn't really do that much.

name: Jake
line: Here, try throwing this one.

name: Jake
line: Here's one called Caturday Surprise.

name: Finn
line: Throw it!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, go on, get out of here!  Unless you feel like a fist cookie, you better keep runnin'!

name: Finn
line: What the heck is goin' on?

name: Jake
line: I have no idea. But it's probably best to stay out of it.

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Hey, look.  This one looks stupid. Let's see how it flies!  Aw, lame.

name: Jake
line: Uh-oh...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Duke of Nuts!  What have you done?!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Oh...

name: Finn
line: Oh no! She thinks that nuts guy did it. We gotta go clear up what happened!

name: Dr. Ice Cream
line: Don't worry, my dear. I'll have you fixed up in no time!

name: Finn
line: Princess!  Are you OK?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, I guess if green and bald is okay.

name: Jake
line: Oh boy. I'm sorry! I can't stop now.

name: Dr. Ice Cream
line: My dear, not to worry! The medicine milk in this suit will have you healed lickety-split! In just five days you'll be back to your beautiful bubblegummy self.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Five days?! The Grand Meeting of Ooo Royalty is tonight!

name: Finn
line: Uh... hey, Princess. There's something I should tell you about that bottle that hit you in the face.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I already know, Finn! The Duke of Nuts has always been a bad guy. But now that he's done this, I'll never forgive him! And it's not just because I hate the Duke! I'd never forgive anybody who did this to me! I'd hate them!

name: Finn
line: Yeah but-

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: FOREVER!

name: Finn
line: Forever?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finally. I have a witness to his misdeeds!

name: Jake
line: Two witnesses!

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh Finn, my flawless, flawless champion, bring the Duke of Nuts to justice. The justice of a cold dungeon!

name: Jake
line: Heheh. She's completely bonkers.

name: Finn
line: What do I do? If I tell her I threw it, she'll hate me forever!

name: Jake
line: Don't worry!  That won't happen. We're gonna catch that Duke!

name: Finn
line: But we're the ones who threw the bottle!

name: Jake
line: Dude, look. The Duke of Nuts is bad guys.

name: Finn
line: How do you know that?

name: Jake
line: Think about it. If Bubblegum hates him so much, then he must have done some rotten stuff. I mean, maybe he even threw a bottle and turned someone ugly before.

name: Finn
line: Maybe you're right.

name: Jake
line: Maybe I am!

name: Finn
line: Alright, just this once, we'll be vigilantes!

name: Jake
line: Nah, we're more like cops. Crooked cops!

name: Finn
line: Princess! I won't rest until the villainous duke is captured!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, thank you, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Woah. Okay, and by then, hopefully you'll have taken care of...this.

name: Finn
line: Look yonder! The Duke of Nuts castle!

name: Finn
line: Duke of Nuts!

name: Jake
line: How are you?

name: Finn
line: By order of Princess...

name: Finn
line: Um, Princess...

name: Duchess of Nuts
line: Hello, Finn. Are you here to arrest the Duke?

name: Finn
line: How did you know?

name: Duchess of Nuts
line: The nuts told me...for I am the Duchess of Nuts!

name: Jake
line: Oh... should've asked if these were, like, her eggs or something.

name: Duchess of Nuts
line: I know of my husband's crime against the princess. A crime that you personally witnessed! And why would you lie? Huh?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, why?

name: Duchess of Nuts
line: Oh but he was once such a wonderful man! He'd pet dogs, kissed babies; we'd lie together underneath the cashew bush. He even taught under-privileged nuts how to dance. But somehow he's gone rancid! These nuts tell me he must be executed. Would you like to hear what my nuts have to say?!

name: Finn
line: That won't be...um...necessary.

name: Duchess of Nuts
line: Listen! Listen!

name: Jake
line: Woah!

name: Finn
line: I don't get it, Jake. How can the dude be evil if he pets puppies, kisses babies, and lies with his wife?

name: Jake
line: What?! You believe that? She is nuts. Listen, man. Let's just go back and face the music. Who cares if Bubblegum hates you forever? It's no biggie. Tons of people hate me!

name: Squirrel
line: Why, Jake? Why won't you print my letters? I...I...I HATE YOU!

name: Finn
line: Hmm.   It's him! The Duke of Nuts!

name: Finn
line: I'll break left! You take the right!

name: Jake
line: I went left too!

name: Finn
line: Wha-?  You're way smaller than I thought you were!

name: Jake
line: Dude. That's not him.

name: Marquis of Nuts
line: No one will harm the Duke of Nuts! I will kill whoever seeks to arrest him!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: No! Please! This has gone far enough!

name: Jake
line: That's the Duke of Nuts.

name: Marquis of Nuts
line: But I vowed to kill whoever did this to you. They can't take you away, Dad!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Who's the toughest little nut? That's you.   One second.

name: Finn
line: Man, I don't know, Jake. Why would Princess Bubblegum hate him if he's such a nice guy?

name: Jake
line: Just because he's a good father, doesn't necessarily mean he isn't a villain.

name: Finn
line: That doesn't look like a villain.

name: Jake
line: I can probably think of a reason why that's villainous if you gave me enough time. Maybe.

name: Finn
line: Ugh! Maybe we should just confess. But then, Princess Bubblegum will hate us forever.

name: Jake
line: Hey man, it's not that bad being hated.

name: Squirrel
line: C'mon man, pick it up!

name: Squirrel
line: You son of a bleeblop!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Oh! Sorry to make you wait. I made these daisy crowns for you guys as a- as a token of gratitude for waiting.  Oh...sorry I....I have to sit down for a second. I know this is an odd question, but you wouldn't happen to have any pudding on you, would you?

name: Finn
line: Actually yeah, I think I have one in my pack.

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Oh, thank goodness.

name: Finn
line: I think I have a spoon in here too- wha-?

name: Jake
line: What happened to the cup?

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Oh, I'm so embarrassed! Now you know my shame. I can't stop eating pudding.

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: I don't tell people because I hate making them worry, but yes, I have a rare condition. A pudding deficiency. And I always end up eating all of the royal pudding supply whenever I go to the castle.

name: Finn
line: So that's why Princess Bubblegum hates you!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Yes, but I didn't turn Princess Bubblegum green and bald! I would never do such a thing!

name: Finn
line: Gah! Of course you wouldn't! You're too nice a guy. I'm the one who threw that bottle. I was gonna tell her, but then-- she started talking all crazy-- she said she'd never forgive me and I-- I didn't know!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Hey, it's okay. People make mistakes. It's all part of growing up and you never truly stop growing.

name: Finn
line: Now you're making me feel even worse by being so nice about it.

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Maybe I should just confess the crime and end all of this.

name: Finn
line: Wait...I think I might have an idea that will save everyone's reputations.

name: Finn
line: Halt!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn! Did you find the duke yet?

name: Finn
line: Not yet, but you are in grave danger, Princess. There is an assassin in these very woods, dead set on stopping you from reaching the Grand Meeting. In fact, what's that rustling in the bush??

name: Jake
line: Rustle. Rustle, rustle.  I'm an ambush! Halt!

name: Finn
line: What's going on?!

name: Jake
line: Oh,  Did I come out to early?

name: Finn
line: What are you here to do, stranger?

name: Jake
line: I've come for the princess. I'm an assassin!

line: Um, guys?

line: Stand back! I will stop him! Hi-yah!

name: Jake

line: Hi-yaah!

name: Jake
line: Hah!

line: Remember, it's just acting, Jake!

name: Jake
line: Sorry, dude!  Now, to kill you up. But wait, surely this cannot be the fair Princess Bubblegum! Where are her pink, flush cheeks? The long gooey hair?  Clearly, the princess travels elsewhere.  Later, Bubblegum!  Get out there, man!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: I don't know if I can do this.

name: Jake
line: Go, go, go, go!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: And that's how I, the Duke of Nuts, by disfiguring you beyond all recognition, humbly saved your life.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, alright!

name: Finn
line: Yeah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What was the point of this little play again?  And why isn't the duke clapped in irons?!

line: Peppermint Butler!

line: Oh, no!

line: The duke didn't throw that bottle! Ahh- Princess, I have something sucky to confess. I'm the one who threw the bottle.  I'm sorry, but I knew if I told you, you'd hate me forever!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That jerk always empties out my pudding pantry!

name: Finn
line: Aw, shucks. He just can't control himself around pudding. He goes cocoa-nuts for it! Because he has a pudding deficiency!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, my, you poor man! Of course you're forgiven!  Yeah, I don't believe a word from him.

name: Finn
line: I'm really sorry about making you temporarily ugly, Princess. Especially before the Grand Meeting of Ooo Royalty. I wish there was some way to make it up to you.

name: Finn
line: Hmm, what? You said maybe.

line: Call to order the sesquicentennial Grand Meeting of Ooo Royalty. I now call upon the delegate from the Candy Kingdom. Princess Bubblegums?

line: Ahem! It would be presumptuous indeed to present myself against the distinguished princess to whom you have listened.

line: You should stay, man. At five o'clock every day, I chop both their heads off, and they grow them back for the next day.

line: Aw, man, that sounds awesome! I do want to stay and fight those guys, but I also want to hang out with my girlfriend.

line: Boo!

name: Jake
line: Oh!

line: Sorry! Sorry I'm late. Finn and I were fighting this shark and science cat, and I lost track of time. Anyway, I’m here now, M'lady, and I have brought to you half an orange.

line: Ooh! 고마워!

line: 미안해. ]  니가 늦게 왔잖아.

line: Hi Jake.

line: Noooo! Don’t leave.  If there was only some way you two could talk to each other directly.  Oh, dude! I just remembered! There's a universal translator device at the bottom of Lake Szelezon!

"Doug, Todd, Jerry, Dennis, Reggie, Peter, George, Larry, Luke, David, Benton, Mike R., Mike H., Mike A., Gareth, Jennings, Mr. International, Mr. Outrageous, Captain Majesty, The Flying Lettuce Brothers, Pete the Punk"...  Tiiffaanyy!  PERFECT! Muhuhaha!
