name: "Fionna"
line: Okay, that's enough.

name: Ice King and Banana Guard
line: Aw!

name: Ice King
line: I want to see more.

name: "Fionna"
line: I don't want to wear it out. It's my only copy. And it's very important to me.

name: Turtle Princess
line: Library closes in five.  Click, click, click.

name: Ice King
line: So, where you heading now?

name: "Fionna"
line: Guess I'll go back to the dump under the bridge where I live. I'd invite you over, but I don't have a sofa or TV or anything. It's literally a dump.

name: Ice King
line: I have a TV. My crib is equipped.

name: "Fionna"
line: Oh, really?

name: Ice King
line: Hey, you should move in! Please live with me, Fionna.

name: Ice King
line: This is the sweet spot. My roo--  Oh! I wasn't expecting guests.  Not that you mind a bit of dirt, right?

name: Ice King
line: Nice, huh?

name: "Fionna"
line: So, this is my room now.

name: Ice King
line: Only the best for Fionna.

name: Ice King
line: Oh yeah, I like this room too. It's where I do all my deep thinking. Man, I still can't believe it-- the Fionna in my bathroom, touching my toothbrush, throwing it into my little trash can. Fionna taking charge!

name: "Fionna"
line: That's what heroes do.

name: Ice King
line: You're a so much better hero than Finn.

name: "Fionna"
line: I know.

name: Ice King
line: Plus, don't tell Jake, but I've always been more of a cat person. Where is Cake the Cat?  Cake? Cake?

name: "Fionna"
line: Cake is gone. Some years back, there was an adventure mishap. I don't feel comfortable talking about it.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, okay.

name: "Fionna"
line: Hey, you still haven't shown me where you keep your Fionna and Cake tapes.

name: Ice King
line: Sorry, no can do.

name: "Fionna"
line: What? Don't you have tapes?

name: Ice King
line: Oh, yeah, I got loads of tapes, but they're super private.

name: "Fionna"
line: Maybe you'll change your mind once you see more of my mummy adventure?

name: Ice King
line: Yay! I'll get snacks.

name: Fionna
line: Hey, what's wrong?

name: "Mummy"
line: I have... a curse!

name: Fionna and Cake
line: Oh no.

name: Fionna
line: How can we save you, tiny mummy?

name: "Mummy"
line: The curse can only be broken by strong black coffee and fancy muffins from Breakfast Kingdom.

name: Fionna
line: I know that place. It has a really long line on weekends.

name: "Mummy"
line: Yes! That sounds like the one. Be a hero and fetch unto me the sacred breakfast.

name: Cake
line: Don't you worry, little guy.

name: Fionna
line: We'll save you!

name: "Fionna"
line: Okay, that's the end of the tape.

name: Ice King
line: Really? My stories usually get wrapped up neater.  Wrapped up -- mummies.

name: "Fionna"
line: Yeah, well, there's no more, so...  You wouldn't know this, but old heroes need a lot of sleep.

name: Ice King
line: I did know that.

name: "Fionna"
line: See you in the morning.

name: Ice King
line: Okay.

name: Ice King
line: Fionna? You awake? I made you a midnight snack.

name: Fionna
line: Mummy, we're home.

name: Ice King
line: I knew it.

name: Fionna
line: Where did it go?

name: Cake
line: Maybe it had to go back into its coffin Dracula-style.

name: Fionna
line: Mummy?

name: Cake
line: We got you breakfast.

name: Fionna
line: Hmm.

name: Cake
line: Shh! What's that?

name: "Mummy"
line: Nyeh!

name: Fionna
line: That's our treasure!

name: "Mummy"
line: Stay away. You'll get cursed.

name: Fionna
line: I take the curse off of me and put it back on you.

name: "Mummy"
line: You understand nothing of mummy curses!

name: Fionna
line: Our treasure!

name: Cake
line: Our muffins!

name: Queen of Ooo
line: Uhh... Do not look upon a naked mummy. It's bad luck.

name: Fionna and Cake
line: Queen of Ooo?!

name: Queen of Ooo
line: That's right. I snuck in here to pretend to steal your stash and teach you a valuable lesson. Never invite strangers into your home, no matter how cool they seem and are. You should be thanking me really.

name: Ice King
line: Of course. She didn't want me to see the end of the tape because she's not Fionna. She's... a mummy!  Aah!

name: "Fionna"
line: Come on. They're all just him?

name: Ice King
line: Imposter! Reveal yourself!

name: "Fionna"
line: Aah! Knock it off!

name: Ice King
line: You're the knock-off!

name: "Fionna"
line: What?

name: Ice King
line: You're not Fionna!

name: "Fionna"
line: How did you--

name: Ice King
line: Show me your true form!

name: Ice King
line: Aha! Huh? What kind of mummy are you supposed to be?

name: Rabbit Lady
line: No kind! I'm just an old lady.

name: Ice King
line: Who likes to dress up as Fionna?

name: Rabbit Lady
line: It makes me feel confident, okay? Plus I look really good in this outfit.  Look, I used to be very shy, tinkering with my tech stuff all night, sleeping all day. But one evening, I intercepted a strange signal. I was mesmerized. I watched that tape like a hundred times before I finally stepped out of my cave a new woman, determined to find more Fionna and Cake. I roamed Ooo for years with no luck. But then I found out about you, and I hatched a plan to steal your tapes.

name: Ice King
line: What? I don't have any Fionna and Cake tapes.

name: Rabbit Lady
line: I know! All of your tapes are filled with embarrassing diaries.

name: Ice King
line: If I met them, I'd definitely record it.

name: Rabbit Lady
line: Fionna and Cake aren't real, you ding-dong! They're just, like, a TV show from the past or something.

name: Ice King
line: You're the ding-dong, lady! You tricked an old, defenseless Ice King.

name: Rabbit Lady
line: Look, I didn't mean to hurt you.

name: Ice King
line: You lied to me. Fionna would never lie -- never.

name: Rabbit Lady
line: Oh, glob, you're right. I'm not like Fionna. I'm the mummy! Oh glob!

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Huh? Well, that was disheartening.

name: Rabbit Lady
line: Forgive me, Fionna!

name: Fionna
line: Cake, what time is it?

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.

name: Jake
line: Happy birthday!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Is that you? I can't see!

name: Jake
line: Right! That's because-

name: Finn
line: I'm blind?! Jake! I'm blind on my birthday!

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: Oh...

name: Jake
line: Keep the blindfold on. I've got a surprise for you.

name: Jake
line: Surprise!

name: Finn

line: That's quite alright. Just don't let it happen again.

line: Sorry about that, folks. We're approaching Gumball Gulch now. The rides gonna get a little bumpy until we reach the straight-away and you might wanna buckle up!

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: Great! Now find your seatbelt.

name: Mr. Candy Cane
line: Jeez Louise! So sorry about that Colonel!  Beg your pardon!  Sorry! Whoa!!

line: I'm gonna kill you!

line: He doesn't look good.

name: Jake
line: Hey man, this is kinda a bad scene. Maybe we should get off the train and huff it to your surprise.

name: Finn
line: Are you kidding? It's a murder mystery! On a train!  And we're gonna solve it.

name: Jake
line: Alright.

name: Finn
line: What'dya think, Doctor Donut? Any clues?

name: Doctor Donut
line: Hmm. I think it was the guy would screamed 'I'm gonna kill you.'

name: Finn
line: Passengers, passengers! I don't think it was Colonel Candy Corn.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Thank you!

name: Finn
line: No, in murder mysteries it's never the first person you think of. Never ever.

name: Marshmallow Kid
line: So who do you think it is?

name: Finn
line: Colonel, do you have any enemies on this train?

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Just one! And his or her name is...

name: Finn
line: See? I knew it wasn't him!  But now we need to figure out who his enemy is. It could be anybody.

name: Green Gumdrop Dude
line: It could even be you.

name: Finn
line: Yes it could.  Except I didn't do it.

name: Green Gumdrop Dude
line: But... we don't know that.

name: Finn
line: You singled me out to take suspicion of yourself! Are you Colonel Candy Corn's enemy?

name: Finn
line: Suspect numero uno!

name: Finn
line: Rat traps! Really thought I was onto something!

name: Jake
line: Now I know this is going to sound crazy, but what about the conductor?

name: Finn
line: No it's definitely not him.

name: Jake
line: Oh. Why not?

name: Finn
line: 'Cause he's weird and creepy. And you never suspect the creepy guy because he's too obvious.

name: Jake
line: Whatever, man. I'm gonna go sit and look at the schedule.

name: Finn
line: We're running out of suspects. And we're running out of time.

name: Conductor
line: Attention!  Attention passengers!  Nollie, heheheh. Yeah hi, it's me, the conductor. Heheh. Anyway, I couldn't help overhearing that someone thinks I'm weird and creepy. And you know; I'm not weird and creepy.  I'm cool and awesome.  Happy birthday, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Hey Jake.

name: Jake
line: Yeeeeeeeaaah?

name: Finn
line: The conductor was just here and he was weirder and creepier then before.

name: Jake
line: What?! No way, he was cool and awesome!

name: Finn
line: Anyway, it's still not him. ] No. The murderer is right here among us. ] Isn't that right, Doctor?

line: You think it was me?

line: When Candy Cane guy was murdered, you diverted suspicion to Colonel Candy Corn.  Then killed him to protect your alibi.

line: Dude, I think you're waaay off.

name: Finn

name: Finn

name: Finn
line: It doesn't make any sense to me.

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: Yes! Jake, that's it! It's all so clear now! Gather everyone in the caboose and I will reveal a murderer!

name: Finn
line: You're the only remaining passengers. So the murderer, is in this caboose.

name: Finn
line: Let me explain how I know who the murderer is.  I saw Pineapple Guy skim through the sheet music. Sheet music to a song that's very special to Lollipop Girl. A song that reminds her of Ice Cream Guy.   Before Colonel Candy Corn's aide, Doctor Ice Cream was in possession of a basket of cabbage, fish and eggs.  And you, Pineapple Guy, have cabbage bits on your socks!  And you!  Chocolate Bar Guy!  Does this dictionary look familiar? A dictionary that contains the words  Rid!  Guests!  At once!

line: But the real murderer is someone no one suspects! The real murderer is-

name: Finn
line: Oh yeah! He did it.

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: I knew it; because he's creepy.

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: I know. You knew he was the murderer all along. I couldn't have done it without  you, you, you

name: Finn

name: Finn
line: You feel kinda bony.  Jake?  NOOOOOOOOOOO!

line: Hey.

name: Finn
line: How could you murder all those Candy People?! And, you murdered Jake on my birthday!

name: Conductor
line: Yes, and you're next.

name: Finn
line: Wrong!

name: Finn
line: I'm coming for you!  This is for Jake!  You're going down, or both of us are going down!  My birthday wish, is vengeance!  Happy birthday to me!!

name: Conductor
line: Wait! [Stretches himself around to reveal that it is actually Jake covered in paint.

name: Finn
line: You're alive!!  You were the conductor the whole time?!

name: Jake
line: Yup. You were so focused on the murders because you never even noticed!  The skeletons were the hardest part.  It was all an elaborate set up for your birthday present!

name: Finn

name: Jake
line: Nope! Not unless you count the train's control panel!

name: Jake
line: Dude, open your eyes!

name: Finn
line: Hey, we're alive!

name: Candy People
line: -to you!

name: Finn
line: Wow, this is the best birthday ever. Thanks, Jake.

name: Jake
line: You deserve it, buddy.  Because you're a great friend.

name: Jake
line: Nope! That part was a total accident.

name: Finn
line: Oh. So we could have...

name: Jake
line: Died horribly? Yes. Happy birthday, pal!

line: Or... we could keep looking through his stuff. Heh, heh, heh! You know, for more proof? Hehehe!

name: Finn
line: No.  Alls we're gonna do is lie in wait until the Ice King gets back. Then—BOOM —we catch him with princess on his hands.

name: Ice King
line: Yes, Gunter's ailment was the perfect cover for stealing a princess, M.D.

name: Dr. Princess
line: I'm not even a real princess. "Princess" is just a surname.

name: Ice King
line: Enough! You may have uncovered my princess-smuggling scheme, but you'll never leave this place alive!

name: Jake
line: A couple of ninjas like me and Finn can only be defeated by another ninja!

name: Ice King
line: Doot, doo, doooo!  Ninja!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Ninja!

name: Dr. Princess

name: Finn, Jake and the Ice King
line: NINJA!

line: Wenk, wenk.

name: Dr. Princess
line: Oh.

line: Weh-weh-wenk.

name: Rap Bear
line: Yo! Check, check, one, two! Hey! I'm Rap Bear! I can rap... like that. Ha-ha, I'm back! It's a battle of rhymes. I'm gonna do it this time. I'm Rap Bear. My raps are mystical... quantum physics! Whoo!

line: Whoa!

name: Rap Bear
line: Yeah, yeah!

name: Jake
line: Boo! That was pre-written. It's so obvious! Take him out, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Off...

name: Starchie
line: Nope.

name: Finn
line: Off the dome, here we go. Uh! I'm-a start it now. I'm-a battle now. We gonna make a rhyme, so I can rap this time. I rap for millions...  sesquipedalians.

name: Starchie
line: Yeah, that was tight.

name: Finn
line: Whoo!  Huh? Rap Bear, what's wrong, man?

name: Finn
line: No way! You are the best! Going up against you was a dream come true. I look up to you, man. You're like... You're like my hero, Rap Bear.

name: Jake
line: Awesome.

line: I thought Billy was your hero.

name: Finn

name: Finn
line: Ha-ha! Yeah! You're awesome Billy! Ha-ha!

line: Sick.

line: Billy!

line: I love rap music, but only when it's good rap.

name: Finn

name: Jake
line: What's going on here? Who's that?

name: Finn
line: This is Billy's ex-girlfriend.

name: Jake
line: His special Lady?

name: Canyon
line: No, his ex-girlfriend.

name: Jake
line: Oh, man, I'm sorry. Well, I hope you guys get back together. Whoo-oop!

name: Finn
line: Jake's still in denial about Billy.

name: Canyon
line: Billy and I broke up four years ago, but I held on to this.

name: Finn
line: Billy's loincloth!

name: Canyon
line: After Billy died, I couldn't keep it in my place anymore. I heard you guys were friends, so when I saw your name on the rap battle flyer, I thought it would be cool to bring it to you.

name: Starchie
line: Oh, that's some smelly.

name: Finn
line: Thank you, Canyon. I guess I've been in denial, too. Have you been back to Billy's crack?

name: Finn

name: Canyon

name: Finn

name: Finn
line: Fairies! Oh, they've infested the place! Okay, you guys, out! This is Billy's crack.

name: Gnome 1
line: Billy got aced by the Lich.

name: Gnome 2
line: We have dibs on the crack, so beat it!

name: Finn
line: I'll dib up your brains if you don't respect the mems of Billy.

name: Jordan
line: Flimsy threats! Like a tiny blade of grass in a maelstrom, you are. That storm is me, Jordan, Lord of the Fairies. I ain't afraid of you or this big—

name: Jordan
line: You think you can chump me like that? This breeze feels great, doofus!

name: Jordan's head
line: All right.

name: Finn
line: Laters.

name: Finn
line: Um, so, Canyon, why did you and Billy break up?

name: Canyon
line: Huh? Oh. Well, I loved Billy, and I believed in him, but then Billy stopped believing, and that jammed up our whole deal—being a top-tier, red-belt power couple. After a while, all he did was watch movies and play video games. Pretty lame, right? So I bailed.

name: Finn
line: Even heroes have slumps, bro.

name: Canyon
line: Yeah, I know. I heard he was making a comeback, too. What a weird world.

name: Billy
line: Billy!

name: Canyon
line: What the—?

name: Finn
line: What is it?

name: Canyon
line: It looks like Billy's bucket list.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, let me see!

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Looks like he got to most of these. He sure lived a full life. Okay, here's one. Wait. "Tell Finn that thing." What the butt is that?

name: Canyon
line: I don't know.

name: Finn
line: Okay, that's gonna bother me forever. Well—well, here's one more. We should do it for Billy.

name: Canyon
line: What's that?

name: Canyon
line: Are you sure you're okay?

name: Finn
line: Holy shram! Whoo!

name: Canyon
line: That was awesome, Finn. You know, you remind me of Billy when he was young.

name: Finn
line: Whoa. So... can I see you sometime?

name: Canyon
line: I have a feeling our paths will cross again. Take care, Finn.

name: Finn
line: "Take Canyon on one last ride."  Whoops.  What? Another item? You sneaky Billy. "Lie on my back in the ocean. Just float." Cool.  Why the ocean, Billy?!

name: Finn
line: Okay, Finn, don't think about your fear. Just jump in there like it's no biggie. Do it for Billy. For Billy!

name: Finn
line: I'm afraid. I'm afraid! Oh, dang, here he comes! Here comes the Fear Feaster!

name: Fear Feaster
line: Way to go, Finn the Coward. Still afraid of the ocean, eh?  You should just give up! You're not a hero. You're a wimp-o! A cringing, cowardly—

name: Fear Feaster
line: Hey, where you going? Fool, I come with. Ha-ha! I'm gonna nosh on your insecurities. Then I'll—I'll squat on your hopes. So now what, little boy?

name: Fear Feaster
line: Huh? Uh, hey, man, don't do anything stupid. Hey! You're too chicken to face your fears with open eyes? This stank is cheating!

name: Finn
line: This stank is for Billy.

name: Fear Feaster
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Huh?  Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!

name: Finn
line: For Billy!

name: Fear Feaster
line: Wake up. Wake up!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Whoa!

name: Fear Feaster
line: No mortal blade can harm—

name: Fear Feaster

name: Finn
line: Was that you or me? Huh? Hey. Hey! I—I'm doing it!  I'm not afraid of the ocean anymore! I'm doing it, Billy.

name: Billy
line: Billy!

name: Billy
line: You finished my list. Now I can rest like a great hero. Thank you, Finn.

name: Finn
line: You're welcome. Canyon helped, too.

name: Billy
line: Tell Canyon I watch her sleep. Man, love is weird, Finn.

name: Finn

name: Billy

name: Finn

name: Billy

line: Joshua's not alive. Me and Jake buried him behind the—

name: Billy

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Billy
line: Your father, Finn. He's alive.

name: Finn
line: Jake! Jake! I had an awesome dream! Flame Princess was there; My body was on fire. I think it was inspired by Flame Princess battling Ice King yesterday!

name: Jake
line: That's weird. I had a dream too. I'll tell you about it!

name: Jake
line: So then paintings were found and everybody's eyes lit up. Cinnamon Bun smiled and said "I saw it from miles away"...

line: Man, I need to have that dream again. I have to get Flame Princess to beat down Ice King again.

line: Hey, look!  Hey, look! There's that big jerk you hate so much, remember?

name: Finn
line: Oh, dang. Did you hear that?! I think he's, like, making fun of you.

line: What?!

line: Yeah, it's in the tone of his voice.

name: Flame Princess
line: What did you say to me?

name: Ice King

name: Flame Princess
line: It is in the tone of your voice.

name: Ice King
line: Look, just take whatever you want. Okay? Take it all!  It's all just prunes! Prunes and liver! Frozen, of course.

name: Ice King
line: Ah. You might have what it takes to slap these old jowls, but do you have what it takes to face my- just a second...  Legion of Snow Warriors?! Go, fight! Protect me!  Oh, boy.

line: I don't like being made fun of, Ice King. I don't like it at all!

name: Ice King
line: Woah!

line: Milk.  Milk.  Play the sleep jam, BMO.

name: Finn
line: Mmm. What's cookin'? Smells good. Wha?!  What?! Oh, no!

name: Finn
line: Jake! I had another dream. My body was being blasted. But this time, Ice King was blasting me with ice cubes! Aww. It was awful! And someone else was there. He was just laughing and laughing. He was in the first dream too, but he was whispering. I couldn't make out what he was saying. Oh, yeah!  It was the Cosmic Owl!

name: Jake
line: What?! You didn't tell me the Cosmic Owl was there!

name: Finn
line: I couldn't see him last time!

name: Jake
line: Dude, that means it was a prophetic dream! You have to finish the original dream! Cosmic Owl could be whispering something wildly significant! You have to get Flame Princess and Ice King to fight again so you can see the end of the dream! Make 'em fight!

name: Finn
line: Dear Ice King, you smell like stink, you're unpleasant, you're not funny, you're old, blah blah blah, sincerely, the Flame Princess. P.S., let us fight.  Dear Flame Princess, you're just the worst, your hair is bad, your feet smell like face cheeks, blah blah blah, let's meet up and fight, dummy, sincerely, Ice King.  Flame Princess fight Ice King.

line: Huh?

line: Yes, but look, it's just like, I had this dream and it was because of that fight you had. It was weird, but I also liked it. But it was important because the Cosmic Owl was  So I had to get you to beat up Ice King-

line: Shh. I should have known. That letter said things in it that only you would know. Personal things, Finn. And you used them against me. I thought you were the one person I could- I need some time alone.

name: Finn
line: Princess!

name: Finn

line: Give up, worms! My fight power is supreme!  I'm too freaking legendary for you!

line: Whoa!

name: Finn

line: Huh?

line: No, man. It is important. Being the third best at something is math and deserves respect. Not like I did to Kompy. Anyway, I think we both got cranky after all that training.

line: Knock, knock. Yo, Peebs, you want to make a midnight Squeez-E-Mart run? I'm gonna drink the red from out the customers' bloodshot eyes.  Psych. I'll probably just get a slushie.

name: King of Ooo
line: Whoa! Relax!  Bubblegum is fine, just fine... and deposed! And powerless! So crushed by defeat was she that the tyrant exiled herself to a sad cabin on the shores of Lake Butterscotch—technically still Candy Kingdom territory. But in my mercy, I've allowed her to remain.

line: Two months? But—then why didn't she t— Bubblegum!

name: King of Ooo
line: Tell Bubblegum I wear her nightgown! Tell everyone!

name: Marceline
line: BONNIE!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Marceline. What up?

name: Marceline
line: Ugh. Why didn't you tell me you got throne-jacked! I gotta hear it from that wax fraud!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Be cool, Marceline. Let's all be real cool.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Give us a minute, Peppermint Butler.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hmm.  Hup hup hup hup...

name: Marceline
line: Well?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I didn't get jacked. I quit. But yeah, alright, I should have told you. I was just  embarrassed. And it all happened so fast. I'm still trying to sort things out, see things rationally.

name: Marceline
line: Huh. Well, you could have talked to me about it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, 'cause you're so dang rational. Ha ha. I'm sorry, that's mean. I'm trying to be less mean. That's why I'm starting fresh with a new kingdom out here. Just me, Pep But, some pretty stars. Ugh, and of course, some varmints.

name: Marceline
line: Varmints?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Varmints!  Raiding my pumpkin patch. Every dang night!  After all my sweet bio-engineering? The nerve of these varmints. Not tonight!

name: Marceline
line: So, how long you gonna sit out here for?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Long as it takes.

name: Marceline
line: Uh, alright, yeah! Let's get these varmints.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Um...yeah.

name: Marceline
line: These must be pretty good pumpkins, huh?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: They're citizens of my garden kingdom. 100% loyal garden citizens.

name: Marceline
line: That reminds me -- so I was in the grocery kingdom last Sunday, 'cause free samples, you know. They had these, like, shrimp cocktail dealies. So good. I was sucking the sauce off them and hucking the shrimp at the ceiling. I kept going back for more and more samples, I could not stop myself. I don't know, man. The shrimp must have gone bad or something, 'cause all that red came right back up. Still invisible and yakking red all down the produce isle. It was awesome.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, you remember that one time --

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Varmints! After them!  Varmint hole! Ah, nuh-unh! A ding dang varmint hole. I can't believe my sweeps didn't find it.

name: Marceline
line: Well you found it now. So, what next?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Next? We dig.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm. This looks like a delivery tunnel from the old rock-candy mines.

name: Marceline
line: Huh! We haven't been down here in hundreds of years. Remember when I'd get you out of those stinky Cheese Kingdom trade meetings and we'd sneak down here and spray-paint the walls?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Um, I am pretty sure it was me who found you vandalizing my property.

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, but I got you to tag something, didn't I? I bet I could find it. Here, come on. We used to follow the mine car rails, cracking jokes, telling stories... Whoa! The broken bridge! Remember? You jumped across this! You were so scared.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Mmm, I think I was just trying to prove something.

name: Marceline
line: Bonnibel Bubblegum, always so prepared.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, I have to be "always so prepared." We can't all just "wing it." I didn't have to always worry about so many things, you know? The Candy Kingdom used to be so small, so manageable. But then it kept growing and growing, and there was always some new disaster to prepare against.

name: Marceline
line: Is that why you stopped talking to me?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, I...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Bring it, ya darn pumpkin munchers!

name: Marceline
line: It's a freaking mother varmint!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ugh! Marcy, cover me!

name: Marceline
line: No problem.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Marceline! Look out!

name: Marceline
line: Huh?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: She's going to bring the whole tunnel down!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: My snapback!

name: Marceline
line: In there!

name: Marceline
line: You got any more gadgets?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Umm... Some bandages, a pen, unpaid internet bill, and a strawberry lip balm.

name: Marceline
line: Ah.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Maybe we can find something useful around... Oh!

name: Marceline
line: Your tag! We actually found it. Man, your handwriting hasn't changed at all.  Still as prissy and prim as... What?

name: Marceline
line: Hey, hey, whoa. Wait, I didn't mean... I like your handwriting. I think it's realy pretty.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's... it's not that... I lost my hat.

name: Marceline
line: We can get you another hat.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I lost my hat, lost my home, lost my people. I can't even keep darn varmints out of my pumpkin patch!

name: Marceline
line: Oh, Bonnie, you're...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I tried. I really, really tried. I just... I thought that if I shut everything out and just focused on work, it would all be okay, but look where that landed me. All I managed to do was push everyone away. I pushed you away. I'm sorry, Marceline. I've been a real dinger to you.

name: Marceline
line: Come on. What are you even apologizing for?

name: Marceline
line: Uh, how about we not get buried under a metric ton of rock-candy rubble?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The field generator! Aw, geez! Okay, uh, maybe I can rig up a graffiti bomb or a rudimentary rock-candy cannon or... what?

name: Marceline
line: This time, I'm prepared. I've been watching these dudes pretty close. I think I can varmint-style dig us through the wall. It's just a shame about your tag, I don't want to mess it up.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Nah, it's good, I think. Mess it up.

name: Marceline
line: Dig, dig, dig, dig, dig!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yo, varmints! You hungry? I'll eat you! I'll eat your mom! I'll eat your eggs! I'll... Whoop!

name: Marceline
line: Thanks.  Boing!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm crazy tired, Marceline. I think I have been for a long time.  But those varmints are still out there, waiting.

name: Marceline
line: Eh, worry about it tomorrow. I'll keep a lookout tonight. I'll watch the heck out of this pumpkin patch. Come on.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, okay. Maybe for a bit. Don't let me sleep too long. Promise to wake me up in 15 minutes.

name: Marceline
line: I promise.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Uh, can I come back now?

name: Finn
line: Safety!  Patrol!

name: Jake
line: Safety!  Patrol! Safety patrol! Safety— Oh... Were we not wearing the uniforms?

name: Finn
line: C'mon. Let's keep lookin' for hazards. Look out!

name: Jake
line: What is it, dude?

name: Finn
line: Shushers, man!  Look there!

name: Jake
line: Just looks like an ordinary little town, man.

name: Finn
line: Yeah...  Suspiciously ordinary. Oh! Little house people! Maybe it is just regular ordinary, not sinister ordinary—oh, no, wait... Grass ogre.

name: Donny
line: Haha!  Hey, chicken, you're travelin' egg-spress!

name: Finn
line: It's an obnoxious grass ogre.

name: Donny
line: You get my joke, right?! Hahaha!

name: Barn House
line: Careful, you oaf! Those chickens are rentals!  Agh!

name: Donny
line: We're havin' so much fun, huh?!

name: Jail House
line: Drop that chicken!

name: Donny
line: Huh?

name: Jail House
line: You're under arrest!  Good... Now get in your tiny cell... Oh, uh, oh!

name: Finn
line: Hey, ogre! Stop hazing these cute little houses!

name: Jake
line: Ya jerkball!

name: Donny
line: My name is Donny, idiot!

name: Finn
line: Sorry. I was just tryina' get your attention.

name: Donny
line: What kinda houses are you supposed to be? A... stupid... uh... a dumb house?! Haha! Hey, what's with your jowl?!

name: Jake
line: Ow!

name: Donny
line: Hahaha! I'm gonna mess with these housies some more.

name: Finn
line: NEVER!!

name: Donny
line: So you wanna wrestle, huh? 'Cause I know, like, this ninja move to get out of this lock instantly! Okay... Now, first I...  Hey! You're doin' it wrong!!

name: Jake
line: Whoa.

name: Finn
line: You're doin' it wrong!

name: Donny
line: Whaddaya mean?

name: Finn
line: First, you roll your right shoulder forward...

name: Donny
line: Like this?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but then I counter it by doin' this!

name: Donny
line: Hey!

name: Finn
line: Um... You need to take a break?

name: Donny
line: No... but if you need to, we can stop...  Ya baby.

name: Jake
line: Whoa, I zoned out there for a bit. Did you win?

name: Finn
line: Nah. Just takin' five. Donny's pretty good.

name: Donny
line: Yeah, well, you're okay, too.

name: Finn
line: Thanks, man.

name: Donny
line: ...For a complete idiot!

name: Finn
line: Aww...

name: Jake
line: Donald, quit all this jerky nonsense!  Unless you wanna get gored by a forest prince!

name: Donny
line: I was just kiddin' around, but then you took it too far! You guys are the real jerks!

name: Jake
line: Donny is one mixed-up dude.

name: Finn
line: Nah. He's just rough-and-tumble, like me, but deep down, he's probably really sensitive, like me.

name: Jake
line: You're a mixed-up dude, too!

name: Finn
line: Hey, Donny!

name: Donny
line: What?

name: Finn
line: I was thinkin' that since you're a pretty good wrestler, maybe you'd wanna hang out with a couple a' rascals like me and Jake!

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Donny
line: Muuuh... I don't know. Messin' with these housies is pretty fun. You got somethin' better?

name: Jake
line: You sure this is a good idea?

name: Finn
line: If you come to the Tree Fort, we got video games and apple juice!

name: Donny
line: Really?!  I mean... if it keeps you from cryin'...

name: Finn
line: Donny's problem is that he's treated like an outsider, like me.

name: Jake
line: You are not an outsider. You wear cute little blue shorts!

name: Finn
line: I... am complicated.

name: Donny
line: Uh... This fort isn't so great. Not as cool as the fort I'm gonna build.  I call this chair!

name: Finn
line: Hey, Donny, you should play Bug Battle.

name: Jake
line: And hey, can you put on some pants?!

name: Donny
line: You put on some pants!

name: Jake
line: I have pants...  spun from spiderwebs... by pixies.

name: Finn
line: Okay. There's you, and here come the bugs.

name: Donny
line: Huh?!

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah. Those guys'll get ya.

name: Donny
line: Urgh!! This game cheats!

name: Jake
line: Not cool, dude.

name: Finn
line: Have more apple juice. It always makes me feel better when I—  Aaah! Donny! Quit being a jerk!

name: Donny
line: What? What'd I do?

name: Jake
line: Finn, I don't think this is gonna work.

name: BMO
line: I am incapable of all emotion.... but you are making me chafed!!

name: Donny
line: Everybody's gettin' mad at me for nothin'!

name: Finn
line: You have to think about how your actions make other people feel.

name: Donny
line: Ohh. Hmm. I don't understand at all.

name: Jake
line: Ooh! Teach him that little empathy song I taught you!

name: Finn
line: Okay, yeah!  Empathy, empathy, put yourself in the place of me!  Your turn!

name: Donny
line: Uh... Empathy, empathy, put yourself... Ohh! So it's like, when I squeeze eggs outta chickens, I should let them squeeze eggs outta me, too!

name: Finn
line: ...Um... kinda right.  Someone needs our help! Jake, you stay here and try to fix him, while I deal with an unknown possibly deadly emergency!

name: Jake
line: Dude, trade me jobs.

name: Donny
line: Jake! Someone broke your... um... entire living room!

name: Bank House
line: Quick! Act abandoned!

name: Finn
line: Hands off the housing market!  BACKPACK!  Werewolves. Much worse than ogres.

name: Jail House
line: Stop in the name of the law!

name: Finn
line: Is there somewhere I can trap that thing?

name: Jail House
line: Well, there was a zoo, but he moved back east. Course, there's always the old well.

name: Well
line: I'm not old!

name: Finn
line: Perfect!  Slam-bam-in-a-can! Huh? Another werewolf?!? What's up with this town?!

name: Finn
line: Mr. Bank! Are you alright?!

name: Bank House
line: Oh, it's fine, it's fine. All my assets are insured. Pardon.  I have to go spackle my cracks.

name: Finn
line: Why is this town just getting worse and worse?

name: Wolf
line: Yes! Why indeed!!

name: Finn
line: Hey! What are you werewolves up to?!

name: Wolf
line: We're not werewolves...   We're Why-wolves.

name: Finn
line: Uh... Why-wolves?

name: Why-wolf
line: Creatures possessed by the spirit of inquiry.....  AND... BLOODLUST!!

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Why-wolf
line: Please. Save your questions until the end of the lecture.  Our ecosystem. At the bottom level are the house people. Given the opportunity, we Why-wolves would easily wipe them out. However, Donny's presence is a natural deterrent. His jerkiness is so powerful that it produces a pungent gas—obnoxygen. To Why-wolves, it is a deadly poison. But since you've removed the jerk Donny, we will devour the houses, and our population will rapidly swell until we are, in turn, devoured by the Cosmic Owl. Such is the course of nature, but it'll be a pretty sweet ride up until that point.  TONIGHT, WE FEAST ON THE BLOOD OF THE INNOCENTS!

name: Finn
line: Oh, no! I have to get Donny back!

name: Finn
line: Donny, you have to go right now, and stop the Why-wolves from—

name: Donny
line: Ah! Master Finn has returned!

name: Finn
line: What's it goin'?!

name: Donny
line: Thanks to you, I shall never be jerky again!

name: Finn
line: Oh, no... Oh, no. Oh, no, nonononononono! No! This is all wrong! We need jerk Donny to make the obnoxygen, and, and—

name: Donny
line: Steady on, Finn. Perhaps you are dehydrated! It's as Jake taught me  "8 ounces, 8 glasses, 8 days a week!"  I'll fetch you some tap water.

name: Finn
line: Are you wearing jeans now?!

name: Donny
line: Surely!  Gotta get pants! Go get your pants! Button, fly! I wrote that one myself. Perdoname.

name: Finn
line: But, but, but—

name: Jake
line: Butt, butt, butt! Yeah, Donny! You're lookin' good in those jeans!

name: Finn
line: What did you do?!

name: Jake
line: Miraculous, isn't it? I just kept teachin' him my musical rules, and now, he's perfect.

name: Finn
line: No! We messed up, Jake! The House People are doomed if Donny doesn't go back to being town jerk!

name: Donny
line: I have no intention of being a jerk again. Hmph.

name: Finn
line: But the housies will be wiped out if you don't!

name: Donny
line: It sounds tragic, but I'm turning over a new leaf!

name: Finn
line: Donny, you gotta go!

name: Donny
line: Finn, "no" means, "no." I'm sure you'll respect my wishes.  No! Stop! No!

name: Finn
line: Now, go be a jerk to those Why-wolves!

name: Donny
line: No! I'll use my musical messages to stop them!  Let's see... I've got one on the ethics of laundry... Crosswalk-ery... Ooh! Here's a good one!

name: Finn
line: Man! The town is getting creamed! By not being a jerk, you're being a real jerk, Donny!!

name: Donny
line: Comb your hair right! It's a good time! Sticky, sticky pomades, short back and sides!   Why isn't anybody paying attention to my words?

name: Finn
line: He sure is sensitive about his songs!   It's cuz they think your songs are dumb!

name: Donny
line: Wha?!

name: Jake
line: What're you saying?! If you don't encourage his talent, he might revert back to jerk Do—  OHHH, OHHH!  HEY, DONNY! EVERYONE SAYS YOUR SONGS ARE SUPER BALLS!!

name: Finn
line: They all think you're a real jerk!

name: Donny
line: But... but I've changed! Why would they say that?!  Empathy, empathy, put your mind insi...

name: Why-wolf
line: You're so pathetic! So comical!

name: Donny
line: Rrrrr... Think I'm a jerk do they? I'm feelin'.. obnoxious!!  HEY, YOU WHY-WOLVES ARE COOL! JUST KIDDING!  HAHAHAHA!!

name: Why-wolf
line: Obnoxygen cloud!! EGRESS!!

name: House People
line: The town is saved!!

name: Donny
line: Get offa' me, nerds!!

name: Finn
line: You did it, Donny! You're a full-blown jerk again!

name: Donny
line: What?! You're the jerk!! Housies! Ready to hear my new song?! It's about how Finn will betray you, just to save lives!

name: Finn
line: I'm sorry, Donny.

name: Donny
line: I'll never forgive you, Finn!!  WAAAAAAH!!!

name: Jake
line: C'mon. We can go stare wistfully at the lake.

name: Finn
line: I'd... I'd like that. Very much.

name: Donny
line: Hey! I love bein' a jerk! Thanks, Finn! Finn?  Finn, you loser!  I'll never... forget you!

name: Shermy
line: Haha, you're doing it wrong. Like this.

name: Beth
line: Shermy, this is silly as heck. Beatboxing is for babies.

name: Shermy
line: No, it's not. I am a man.

name: Beth
line: I don't know about that, but you should start thinking about your future.

name: Shermy
line: What about you, Princess Zip? What are your goals?

name: Shermy
line: Ha! Princess Zip's got a one-track mind!

name: Shermy
line: Prize Ball Guardian's back!

name: Shermy
line: Let's get 'em!

name: Shermy
line: Get that boulder!

name: Shermy
line: Hup! Whap!

name: Shermy
line: Ha! Here it comes!

name: Shermy
line: Boy! My knots suck!

name: Shermy
line: Yeah, I see you.

name: Beth
line: Hey, Sherm, you see this?

name: Shermy
line: Nope.

name: Beth
line: It looks like the Guardian scuffed something up.

name: Shermy
line: Ohhh!  Whoa!

name: Beth
line: It's beautiful! Let's take it home, and I'll learn about it with my brain.

name: Shermy
line: You and your brain!

name: Shermy
line: ♪ "On a tropical island, on a tropical island..." ♪

name: Shermy
line: It looks so old, Beth! Whose do you think it is... or was?

name: Beth
line: There's no markings on it or anything. I think we should find the King of Ooo and ask him.

name: Shermy
line: What? Beth, the King of Ooo is just a myth... Come on, Beth!

name: Beth
line: That's what I thought, too, but I was doing some research at the library–

name: Shermy
line: Nooooo! Not the library! You can't make me!

name: Beth
line: Shermy, I have the book here. Already checked it out.

name: Shermy
line: Oh.

name: Beth
line: He's supposed to have lived in a cave at the top of Mount Cragdor.

name: Shermy
line: Really?

name: Beth
line: Uh-huh... He's supposed to have lived forever.

name: Shermy
line: Come on, Beth! Come on, come on, come on!

name: Shermy
line: Come on, Beth! Come on, come on, come on!

name: Shermy
line: I did it. I found him! The King of Ooo.

name: BMO
line: Welcome, friends, I've been expecting you. Because of my proximity radar. Hehehe... Come on inside.

name: Shermy
line: Wow! King of Ooo, you must be rich!

name: BMO
line: Yeah, that's me alright.

name: BMO
line: I'm sure you are very thirsty after your journ...

name: Shermy
line: Whoops...

name: Shermy
line: This place is wild.  Huh? This is crazy!

name: BMO
line: Please be careful with...

name: Beth
line: Sorry, sir... My big feet.

name: Shermy
line: Hey, Beth, look. I'm a princess, too

name: Beth
line: Shermy...

name: Shermy
line: I-I think it's okay...

name: Beth
line: Be careful... This stuff isn't ours. Woops. Oh...

name: BMO
line: Well, goodbye!

name: Beth
line: Oh, no, no...

name: BMO
line: Have fun on the other side of this door.

name: Beth
line: But... We came here to ask about something.

name: BMO
line: No, don't worry about it. Please leav...

name: Beth
line: Do you recognize it?

name: BMO
line: Yeah... It belonged to my best friend. Fred!

name: Shermy
line: Fred!

name: BMO
line: No... Not Fred... His name was, Phil! He was an amazing hero, and he was there at the end.

name: BMO
line: Do you know about The Great Gumwar?

name: Shermy
line: Mnm-mnm.

name: BMO
line: Well, get ready to have your hair blown back!

name: Finn
line: Hey, there it is again! It's close.

name: Jake
line: Let me see!

name: Finn
line: It looks like Normal Man, Betty, and...  Maja?

name: Jake
line: Come on!

name: Finn
line: Hey, just-

name: Jake
line: Let me-  Maja's got smoke coming off her.

name: Finn
line: You think they're with the Gumbaldians?

name: Jake
line: I don't know, but they're flippin' freakin' me out.  Guess we better tell PB, huh?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I guess.

name: Jake
line: Hey man, don't even worry about all this war stuff. I know we'll find a way to fix this thing. Come on! You'll see.

name: BMO
line: And so the Princess was mother to her own uncle, and that made him mad. But she had friends, and he had friends, so they decided to have a bad fight - the biggest fight that Ooo had ever seen.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Then it's settled. At the stroke of high noon, when the sun is at its most zenith-est, Banana Battalions three and four will initiate operation "Shut the Door", forming a pincer formation around Gumbald's exposed nether legions, isolating his rear and -

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Um, excuse me? Excuse me. Princess, if I may. I think I have a plan that'll put an end to all this tonight. I just need a Bowie knife, a snowmobile, a parachute,  rubber gloves, and, uh...

name: Lemongrab
line: Terrible, mm! Terrible plan!... Mm! No!

name: Duke of Nuts
line: But, but my -

name: Lemongrab
line: My plan! Hot air balloon!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey! Now's not the time. Unless we win this fight today, we all get to take a nice Pep-Butt-style sponge bath in Uncle Gumbald's extra-strength lobotomy sauce, understand?

name: Lemongrab
line: No.

name: Duke of Nuts
line: Not really.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well I do, so we're doing this my way. Now-

name: Finn
line: Um, PB?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, you're back. How goes the scouting?

name: Finn
line: Um-

name: Jake
line: We saw Normal Man and Betty flying around with Maja, and they were chanting.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm, very peculiar.

name: Finn
line: Hey, maybe this is, like, a bad omen. Like, to see the King of Mars, um, up among the stars? It's like a bad omen, and you should call off the battle. I think I heard that somewhere...

name: Camera
line: Low battery. Please connect to power...

name: Cake Person
line: Long live Gumbaldia!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Stonk! That dang Gumbald just peeped all my tactics!  He's left me no choice. The attack begins now.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Stonk! That dang Gumbald just peeped all my tactics!

name: Gumbald
line: Well, that settles it then. If we know, and she knows, and we know she knows we know - which we do - then we know we have no choice. We must strike now. Ladies and gentlemen, to war!

name: Marceline
line: A word?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: All right, just make it quick. ...Please.

name: Marceline
line: Well, I know you're under a lot of pressure here, but I... I just wanna ask you to reconsider. I mean, I don't like to flaunt my suffering cred, but I've lived through something like this once before, and...  I'm just not really tryin' to help start that all up again.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I understand, Marceline, I really do. But I just can't see another way out of this. Look, I've gotta go.  Let's talk more when this is all over. Wish me luck, okay?

name: Marceline
line: Good luck!

name: Jake
line: What if PB's right about this? Maybe she'll just go whup Gumbald's rear, and then things'll go back to normal.

name: Finn
line: Nah, man, she's wrong. This is all wrong. Even if she wins now, this is never gonna end; I can feel it. It's like the whole world's going crazy, man, like we're living in, one, big...

name: Jake
line: Finn?

name: Finn
line: ... one big nightmare.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Here we go.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: War! War! War! War! War! War!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Banana Guard 500s, you're on!

name: Banana Guard 500
line: Up we go.  In position, ma'am. Code name, "Father's Brother", appears testy.

name: Gumbald
line: More bananas!? You're weird, Bubblegum!  You! Give me your lunch. Got a banana in here?  Is this a banana? Hey, niece!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes?  I'm doing it! I'm soundin' the war horn!

name: Finn
line: Wait!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What!?  Dang it, Finn!

name: Finn
line: PB! He sees that you're serious! Maybe he'll back down now. Please listen to me! We've been friends for a long time.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, Finn. We'll give him one last chance.

name: Gumbald
line: What?  Come on.

name: Finn
line: Here they come!

name: Gumbald
line: Hurry this up. I want a war.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Fern.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Uncle Gumbald, I demand that you de-escalate your forces now.

name: Gumbald
line: Listen to yourself. You're a toddler, Bonnibel.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: SURRENDER OR DIE!

name: Gumbald
line: No!

name: Jake
line: That's my cue!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?

name: Jake
line: Hya-pow!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: They're dead! They're actually dead!

name: BMO
line: And so they were dead. ...No, not dead.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What is this place? Finn?

name: Finn
line: Last resort! Sorry, PB, but you were acting like total nuts out there. Now you guys have to hash this out in the unconscious world.

name: Gumbald
line: This is... a dream?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man. You can basically do anything in dreams.

name: Gumbald
line: Sneak attack!  If we destroy them here, maybe they'll die in the real world.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Psst! Not if I destroy you first!

name: Finn
line: No! We need love, not war!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Good idea.  Love bazooka! Put down your weapons, or I'll bazooka you!

name: Gumbald
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Thank goodness for a singing pot beast to de-escalate the situation.

name: Jake
line: Oh, this sandwich is way too much for me. Jermaine always liked splitting sandwiches.

name: Jermaine
line: Mmm! Thanks, bro.

name: Gumbald
line: I'm gonna figure out how to wake myself up and take my revenge on you sleeping chumps!

name: Fern
line: You're leaving me?

name: Gumbald
line: You're on your own, kid.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: He's rooting into the ground. Ready, aim...

name: Finn
line: No!  You're supposed to be having some kind of epiphany!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Here's my epiphany you've gone rogue on me! I'm outtie five thou!

name: Finn
line: Fern!  Come on! Snap out of it, man!  Aah!

name: Fern
line: I don't need your help.

name: Finn
line: Jake? Help me!

name: Jake
line: I want to help you,  but I can't lose this job.

name: Jermaine
line: Waiter! Oh, waiter!

name: Finn
line: Dude...

name: Fern
line: I'm going to fly around, and wreck things, until I feel better! Or until I tire myself out.

name: Finn
line: Peaceful thoughts...  Fern!

name: Jermaine
line: It all looks so good.  What's up with that bird? Why are you looking at me, bird?  Bad bird!

name: Jake
line: Everybody gets an evil doppelganger but me.

name: Jermaine
line: I'll be your evil doppelganger!

name: Jake
line: Jermaine, you're the best!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Enough, Gumbald!

name: Gumbald
line: Pinch me, I want to wake up!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Gumbald! We're ending this here.

name: Gumbald
line: So be it.

name: Finn
line: If you could just calm down and be cool, it would be a great thing that there's two of us.

name: Fern
line: Why don't you just fight me like a real butterfly!?

name: Finn
line: We're two sides of the same coin!

name: Fern
line: You'll never understand what it's like to be me. I'm TORMENTED!

name: Finn
line: I'm ALSO that sometimes!

name: Fern
line: Prove it, or I'll never stop fighting you.

name: Jermaine
line: Oh geez, how's he gonna do that?

name: Jake
line: Hmm?  Finn, we'll be right back.

name: Finn
line: Okay- ah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Come on, little gum. Don't run away from happiness! I'm gonna fix you!

name: Gumbald
line: No, no, no!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Just ONE drop. Drip a drop, I drip a drop. Not gonna stop, till I drip a drop.

name: Gumbald
line: Hmm?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Drip, drip!  The juice! NOOOO!...  ...Wuh-what?

name: Gumbald
line: Call me... princess.

name: Jermaine
line: What are we looking for?

name: Jake
line: Mm, I can't quite picture it. But I'm pretty sure Finn buried it here.

name: Jermaine
line: ... In the underground balloon mall. Remember how much balloon animals used to cheer Finn up?

name: Jake
line: Yeah...

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 그래.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Uh, Lady, where's Jermaine?

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 쉿.   이런 어두운 지하굴에서는 살살 걸어야 돼.

name: Jake
line: Aww, sleepy puppies.

name: Jake
line: Yee!

name: Jake
line: And I'm done!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 걱정하지 마, 제이크! 내가 처치할게!

name: Jake
line: What? Oof!

name: Charlie
line: Your farts aren't funny, dad!

name: Jake
line: NOOOOOO!!!  Huh? Oh dang!  Is that... Finn's vault?  Aargh! Nightmare fart!

name: Candy Bonnibel
line: It's beautiful...

name: Gumbald
line: No! Oh, why didn't I build an armature?

name: Candy Bonnibel
line: I can help you, Princess! Just listen to this!  Watch me do my tiny taffy dance!

name: Finn
line: Fern, come on! I'm not fighting you.

name: Finn & Fern
line: Oh, what reeks?

name: Jake
line: Repressed memories!

name: Finn & Fern
line: My vault!?

name: Jake
line: Proof!

name: Finn
line: See? this is our shared torment!

name: Fern
line: Dude, I blocked this stuff out for a reason!

name: Finn
line: Well, now you know how I feel about knowing how you feel about!

name: Fern
line: Okay, okay! Just make it stop!

name: Finn
line: We gotta confront them head on!

name: Finn
line: Fern. This is why I brought us here. We can defeat him together.

name: Princess Bubblegum's voice
line: No fear.

name: Finn
line: So you're the nasty grass wad that's been holding my Finn boy hostage.

name: Grass Demon
line: Without me, he's got no body. So back off.

name: Finn
line: You sicken me.

name: Past Finn
line: I'm me again. It feels like it's been years.

name: Past Finn
line: He was right. I've got no body.

name: Jake
line: Ah, don't worry. It's just a dream!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: They're dead! They're actually dead!  Never mind! They're okay!

name: Finn
line: Fern! You really are disintegrating!

name: Jake
line: My bad.

name: Gumbald
line: Bonnie, I...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm so sorry for what I put you through for all those centuries. The Candy Kingdom was your dream, and I took it from you.

name: Gumbald
line: Bonnie, that means so much to me. Come. From now on, we'll live in peace.  Drat.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: WHAT?!

name: Lolly
line: He never was the epiphany type. But I am willing to let bygones be bygones.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Very well. Two Candy Kingdoms, it is!

name: People from Both Sides
line: Hurray!

name: BMO
line: And so, in the end, they decided not to have the big fight.

name: Beth
line: Oh! So you meant, like, the end of the war. I thought you meant like the end of the world.

name: BMO
line: No, no, no. That happened next.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: So I guess everyone's just going home, huh?

name: Jake
line: Yep.

name: King Man
line: We donked up for real.

name: Finn
line: Jake... what am I lookin' at?

name: Jake
line: Uh... we saved the day. So, maybe that big baby's here to give us presents for doing a good job?

name: Fern
line: Okay, I'm not an expert, but this seems bad.

name: Flame Princess
line: You ain't kiddin', shrubs.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh - no - !

name: Marceline
line: Bonnie! What did you do?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It wasn't me!

name: Ice King
line: It's been real cool being in this rogue's gallery with you. Me and Gunter were gonna go, uh...  Oh... my...  GOLB!

name: Simon Petrikov
line: Look, Betty. I keep seeing reference to this mysterious entity that embodies chaos.

name: Betty Grof
line: That's great! Come on, let's make sundaes.

name: Simon
line: GOLB would say ice cream is without meaning. Just empty calories devoid of purpose.

name: Betty
line: Good thing he isn't here then.

name: Simon
line: His presence is felt in every crevice where chaos lurks. Imagine if we could somehow harness all that dank energy...!

name: Betty
line: Hey! You want some cherries with that chocolate syrup?

name: Simon
line: Oh!  Sure.

name: Betty
line: Catch!

name: Simon
line: Have you thought about using sliced almonds for the sundaes?

name: Ice King
line: ...I don't know who that is!

name: Lolly
line: Don't let it touch you!

name: Candy Person
line: No, I'm a loner!

name: Marceline
line: Peebs, this is the worst thing ever! If somebody doesn't stop this, it could be the end of Ooo!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You're right, Marceline. I gotta do something!  Banana guards!

name: Banana Guard
line: Uh, no.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Obey my command! Flee for your lives! If you fight, the demon will just add you to its mass!

name: Banana Guard
line: Can we flee in a panic?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes!

name: Finn
line: FYI, Princess, I'm not going anywhere!

name: Jake
line: I'm also staying.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks, guys.

name: Marceline
line: I'm in, too. This is a war I have to fight. We all have to.

name: Fern
line: Me too! I'll defend Ooo down to my last blade.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Gumball guardians!

name: Gumball Guardians
line: Yes, mom?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Stop that monster!

name: Gumball Guardians
line: Okay.  Containing enemy!  Gross.

name: Lolly
line: Cake, pick me up!  My friends! It is time to set aside past differences! We must join the fight!  Hmm! Forwards!

name: Finn
line: Normal Man! Come on, wake up!

name: King Man
line: Is that Ice King?

name: Finn
line: How do we stop these guys?  Come on, Jake.

name: Jake
line: H-H-H-Horse!

name: Gumball Guardian #1
line: Ugh! My balance!

name: Jake
line: War is the worst, dude!

name: Gumball Guardian #1
line: Sorry, mom...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: My guardian!

name: King Man
line: Ice King! Ice King!

name: Ice King
line: What's up?

name: Jake
line: Ho-ho-ho.

name: Finn
line: How do I stop this!  What?

name: King Man
line: You are the only one who can stop this! Betty's up there, trying to harness the power of GOLB! We have to snap her out of that trance and banish GOLB, or we're all doomed! If anyone can do it, it's you.

name: Ice King
line: Sounds great! Im'a save the world!

name: Gumball Guardian #2
line: Enemy threat restrained.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: They got him!

name: Gumball Guardian #2
line: Awaiting orders.  Help me, mom. I'm turning nasty...

name: Banana Guards
line: Princess, we came back to help!  Eee! Help us, princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ugh!

name: Ice King
line: Evil penguins!

name: Jake
line: Don't worry, guys!

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: I believe in you, Ice King!  Aah! I didn't think this through!...

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: So this is it.  Oh tender lad! I give you the parting gift of my lips.

name: Lemongrab
line: I find your proposal...  ...ACCEPTABLE!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You're welcome.

name: Finn
line: Betty! You have to stop this!

name: King Man
line: Go ahead. Talk to her, IK.

name: Ice King
line: Who?  Oh, it's weird lady! Hey, lady. ...I'm diggin' your primitive dance style!

name: King Man
line: No! You're supposed to stop her, not encourage her! You gotta dig deep inside and find those magical words to shake her outta that trance! Get personal and emotional!

name: Ice King
line: Personal? Emotional? Oh! Just like a fan-fic!

name: Ice King
line: "I feel like nothing was real until I met you. I feel like we connect. And I really get you. If I said 'You're a beautiful girl,  would it upset you? The way you look tonight, silhouetted, I'll never forget it."

name: Betty
line: Simon...

name: Ice King
line: ♪ Oh, oh,  Fionna!... Your fist has touched my heart... ♪

name: Betty
line: What... You're trying to stop me!?  When I'm this close to harnessing the most powerful force in the universe and finally saving you!?

name: Ice King
line: Yeah, I guess. ...Right, Finn?

name: Betty
line: Emotional super-charge!

name: Maja
line: Finally! My time -

name: Ice King
line: Ice King!

name: Flame Princess
line: Burn, burn, burn! PB, get me some backup! Ugh!  Ugh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's headed this way!

name: Fern
line: I'll take down this beast! Fern's way!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Fern!  No, no, no, no, no! NO!!!

name: Marceline
line: Bonnie!

name: Cake Person
line: Thanks.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Marcy?...

name: Marceline
line: You're okay!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: My armor has an emergency -

name: Marceline
line: You scared me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?

name: Marceline
line: Even back when we weren't talking, I was so afraid something bad would happen to you, and I wouldn't be there to protect you. And...  I don't want to lose you again.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, I'm a tough gum. Nothing never happening to me, never.

name: Marceline
line: I know, I... Girl, you phrased that so weird.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I might have a concussion.

name: Cake Person
line: Uh-oh.

name: Ice King
line: Owie!

name: Betty
line: Simon, your crown!

name: Ice King
line: What...  ...happened, lady?

name: Betty
line: Don't panic, but I think Golb is digesting us.  Breaking us apart, layer by layer,   ...down to our essential forms.

name: Finn
line: I'll get us outta here.

name: Ice King
line: Betty...?

name: Betty
line: It's good to see you, Simon.

name: Simon
line: It's good to be seen.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Ice Simon! Use the crown before we're totally crushed!

name: Simon
line: It's not working! Yah!  Finn, it's hopeless. You can't punch your way out of his guts.

name: Jake
line: Okay, Jake. You can do this! You can stop 'em solo!  They'll be talking about this fight for years! And by "they," I mean BMO and Shelby.  Finn! This is for you!

name: BMO
line: What's all the ruckus out there? Oh. It's up to BMO to save the -

name: Jake
line: Okay, bud. There's no reason to freak out just because the tree house is  GONE...!  Ah! BMO...? Ah no, man! Your little face!

name: BMO
line: It's okay, Jake. You always try to protect me and Finn. But sometimes we are going to get hurt. How about today, you let me be the papa?

name: BMO
line: ♪ "Time is an illusion that helps things make sense, so we are always living in the present tense. It seems unforgiving when a good thing ends, but you and I will always be back then. You and I will always be back then. Singing will happen, happening, happened; will happen, happening, happened. And we'll happen again and again, 'cause you and I will always be back then - "

name: BMO
line: "... you and I will always be back then." ♪

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whoa. What's up with him?

name: BMO
line: You better hush up while my baby boy is sleeping!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Keep singing!

name: BMO
line: Okay!  ♪ "Will happen,  happening, happened. Will happen, happening, happened. And we'll happen again and again, 'cause you and I will always be back then." ♪

name: Marceline
line: Oh man! He hates music!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ugh, duh! GOLB is discord. It's the harmony! Harmony hurts them!

name: BMO
line: My art is a weapon!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Everyone! I need you all to harmonize along with BMO!

name: BMO
line: I wrote this for my son, Jake!

name: Marceline
line: I don't know if we can kill Golb with music, PB!

name: Finn
line: I always figured I'd go out saving somebody.

name: Simon
line: Hey, no one gets to choose how it happens. The most important thing is that we're here together.

name: Finn
line: Shh, shh! Do you hear that? It sounds like Jake.  Oh-ho, it is Jake! Look, we can leave this way!

name: Simon
line: Betty, we're saved!

name: Betty
line: Go, there's something I have to do first.

name: Simon
line: What!?

name: Betty
line: I figured out what's wrong with the crown. It reset, just like us. It's in its primal wishing form now.

name: Simon
line: Who cares! Leave it!

name: Betty
line: This world will end unless GOLB is banished. So I'm gonna make... the wish.

name: Finn
line: Guys, it's clenching!

name: Simon
line: We'll make the wish after we escape!

name: Betty
line: I have to do it here. The crown could revert once we leave. I gamed it out.

name: Simon
line: But I can't...

name: Betty
line: I'm sorry for messing everything up.

name: Simon
line: Wait! Betty? Betty!

name: Betty
line: I wish to banish GOLB from this world.

name: Betty
line: Uh-oh, um... I wish for GOLB to disappear, I wish for GOLB to disappear!

name: Betty
line: No! He's too strong! Even for the crown.  However it has to happen. ...I wish for the power to keep Simon safe.

name: Marceline
line: Slide faster, you ding-dongs!  Simon!

name: Shelby
line: Hmm, check, plea-

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: We heard there was a war-

name: Finn
line: She did it! Yeah, Betty! Whoo!

name: King Man
line: What has she done?...

name: Slime Princess
line: Well, great! I don't like this guy either!

name: Simon
line: No... Betty? Betty!  Betty! Oh my, my Betty, my princess, why did you...

name: Marceline
line: You're back. It's what she wanted more than anything in the world.

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.

name: Jake
line: Jump him! He's gonna wish to be all space villain!

name: Neptr
line: What?

name: Jake
line: He's a big evil alien stuck in a penguin!

name: Neptr
line: Oh!... I see.

name: Ice Thing
line: ... la-ba-droo-la-da-boo! Say, where's Gunter, my beautiful child that I love?

name: Jake
line: Oh, never mind, I think he just wished to be Ice King?

name: Jake
line: And for some drums, I guess? Yeah, this is fine.

name: Finn
line: Whew.

name: Fern
line: Hey, Finn... I'm not doing so good.

name: Finn
line: Oh, no.

name: Fern
line: Yeah...  I just wish I could see the treehouse one more time.

name: Finn
line: Yeah dude, of course! Let's go there right now.

name: Fern
line: That's okay... Just promise to plant me there.

name: Jake
line: You feel ready?

name: Jake
line: Whoa.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Excuse me. Hi, PB.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I just wanted to come say... thank you for disobeying my orders this morning. I'll see you tomorrow, okay?

name: Finn
line: See you tomorrow.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You're getting tall. Good night!

name: Jake
line: Night, PB!

name: BMO
line: That's the end.

name: Shermy
line: I thought this story was about the end of Ooo.

name: BMO
line: ... Pretty much.

name: Shermy
line: But what happened to Phil and Jake after that?

name: Beth
line: Or Princess Bubblegum?

name: BMO
line: Eh, y'know. They kept living their lives. Thank you for visiting the King of Ooo, goodbye.

name: Beth
line: The king was very polite for a king, don't you think?

name: Shermy
line: I wish we could find that little Fern tree, see if that story is true.

name: Beth
line: The tree would be a big tree now. It's, like, a thousand years old.

name: Shermy
line: Oh, a big tree... Hey! I know where that tree is! C'mon, Beth!

name: Finn
line: I came pretty close to biting it back there. I never would have gotten out of there without your singing. It's amazing how strong that song was.

name: Jake
line: Music is powerful, man. It speaks to a primal pit in our brains. It makes anyone wanna get up and get their knees goin', gotta get 'em pumpin' pumpin' pumpin'. Boompa-boompa-boom.

name: Finn
line: What do you think, Music Hole?

name: Music Hole
line: Jake's right. A good song can really wrap people up in a mood, better than any words alone could. Actually, I've been working on a new song myself. It's about a really specific feeling that's hard to describe. Would you like to hear it?

name: Jake
line: Sure!

name: Finn
line: Yeah!

name: Shermy
line: Check it out, dude.

name: Beth
line: Very pretty.

name: Beth
line: Lift that sword, Shermy.

name: Shermy
line: Oh, yeah!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Woo! woo! woo!

name: Jake
line: I think the swimming hole's right around the corner!

name: Finn
line: Yes! Woo! Woo!

name: Jake
line: First one in the water is...um...first one in the water!

name: Finn
line: No fair! I have to take off my stuff.

name: Jake
line: Ah! Uh, eh, uh.

name: Jake
line: Faster, we're getting a swirl!

name: Jake
line: You ready to get out?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, dude.

name: Jake
line: Let's get BMO to make us some sassages. Maybe with that one mustard?  I'll use the Sassage Flare.

name: Jake
line: Hopefully BMO sees that.

name: Finn
line: Didn't Lady tell you not to use the Sassage Flare?

name: Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Finn
line: Well, don't abuse it man. 'Cause you're gettin'...

name: Jake
line: I'm gettin' what?

name: Finn
line: 'Cause you're gettin' fat.

name: Finn
line: Wah!  Whoa...

name: Finn
line: Hey. Relax.

name: Jake
line: Grob, dude! You're hat's alive!  This is crazy!  He likes me!

name: Finn
line: It's not my hat. It's, like, this other thing now.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man, hats can be anything pants, other people. It's fine!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but it's like, living now.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, it's a miracle. Now he can listen to our rad jokes and hang out.

name: Finn
line: Right. Maybe it's good he's alive.  You were a rad hat, and now you're a rad...little dude.

name: Finn
line: Yo, bro! Our eyes are down here. C'mon little dude. Let's go live life!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yeah! Woo hoo!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Aaah!!!

name: Jake
line: Aw yeah! Aw yeah! BMO! Jakey likes! Look at that spread!

name: BMO
line: I did it up big time for you! Hope ya are hungry!

name: Jake
line: Ha ha! You know it!

name: Finn
line: BMO, this is Little Dude.

name: BMO
line: Hello!

name: Finn
line: Cribes!

name: BMO
line: Oh, what? Ahh! There's hot grease next to us; don't fool around!

name: BMO
line: Oh no! Get off of me!

name: Finn
line: Little Dude, no!  You don't jump on heads. That junk is rude, Little Dude! You okay, BMO?

name: BMO
line: I am fine, Finn. I just thought you kept better company.

name: Finn
line: Sorry, BMO, he's just excited.

name: Finn
line: Sorry, Little Dude, but I have to eat.

name: BMO
line: Don't touch anything! I'm still frying up garnish!

name: Finn
line: Okay.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, okay.

name: Jake
line: Your head looks weird with short hair man, heh, heh, it feels like a peach.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Little Dude, y'all can get in on this if you promise to be good.  Only good babies get sassages.

name: Little Dude
line: Nyang!

name: Jake
line: Hey, don't eat the—the food?

name: Finn
line: Dude, he turned it into poo! This is poo now—smell it!

name: Jake
line: Yep.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Little Dude!

name: Jake
line: Quit it!  Gotcha!

name: Finn
line: Oh, little Deezy. What am I gonna do with you?

name: BMO
line: You guys should get ready for bed.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, okay.

name: Finn
line: Oh!

name: Jake
line: BMO hit ya on the butt.

name: Little Dude
line: Nyang! Nyang!

name: Finn
line: Shhhh. Little Dude, you gotta chill.  Night-night.

name: Little Dude
line: Nyang. Nyang.  Nyang.

name: Little Dude
line: Nyang.

name: Finn
line: Jake, wake up. Someone's on the house!

name: Jake
line: Tsk, it's probably Ice King again, dude. Man, we should tell him we know he sleeps on the top of our house.  Oh.

name: Little Dude
line: He-ah-ha.

name: Finn
line: Ugh.  No, no, no!

name: Finn
line: No, not on my head! Poo buns! Poo buns on my head! WAAAAAH!

name: Little Dude
line: N-Nyang.

name: Jake
line: Gross.

name: Finn
line: Ninja.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Eh?

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Oooh-hoo-hoo-hoo!

name: Finn
line: What are you doing in our house, homey?

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Please don't hurt me! You're in grave danger and it's all my fault!

name: Finn
line: Wha? What are you talking about?

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Your hat accidentally touched my head flower. See?  My magic imbues anything it touches with an evil spirit, one that craves destruction and chaos. Yech.  I buried myself so that nothing would touch my body ever again, but then this bloom grew out of my head. C'est la vie!

name: Finn
line: Evil magic donks, homey.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: I'm sorry, that's just the way my magic works.  Papa always said I was a bad wizard. Right, Papa?! "Baby's a bad wizard." A bad wizard, huh?! You're a bad wizard!  I'm a bad wizard!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, cool it, man. Let's just fix Little Dude.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Okay.

name: BMO
line: Guys! Your stanky friend jumped out the window and ran toward the Candy Kingdom!

name: Cream Puff Gentleman
line: Oh, hello. Aren't you a cutie! Hey, are you lost, tiny gentleman?

name: Little Dude
line: Nyang!

name: Cream Puff Gentleman
line: Nyang, nyang! Nyang, nyang!

name: Jake
line: Where is he?!

name: Finn
line: Little Dude! Little Dude!

name: Cream Puff Gentleman
line: Nyaaaaaaang!   Nyang?

name: Little Dude
line: Nyang.

name: Candy Sheriff
line: Blisterin' beef!

name: Cream Puff Gentleman
line: Nyang-nyang-nyang-nyang-nyang-nyang!

name: Finn
line: No, Little Dude!

name: Cream Puff Gentleman
line: Nyang?

name: Finn
line: That's a bad Little Dude!

name: Cream Puff Gentleman
line: Nyang!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Aaah, horsey!

name: Cream Puff Gentleman
line: Nyang, nyang, nyang...

name: Finn
line: Little Dude! You were supposed to be my buddy!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: All my fault. All my fault!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Oh, gleeble snoots!

name: Finn
line: How is he so strong?

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Whomever the hat possesses gains the proportional strength of a hat!  Look out! He's got the horse again!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Evil presence detected!

name: Banana Guard
line: Wee-oo-wee—

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Sorry, fellas. I don't thrive in conflict situations!

name: Jake
line: Ow.

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Evil.

name: Cream Puff Gentleman
line: Nyang?   Nyang.

name: Finn
line: No! Not the Gumball Guardian!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Evil.

name: Little Dude
line: Nya-hang!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Na-yang!

name: Jake
line: Dude, use your powers!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: I can't! All I can do is think about my papa and how much I disappoint him!

name: Jake
line: Just think of something positive! Something comforting!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Like... my mommy? When I came home with bad grades from wizard school, my mommy used to hug me, and hug me,  Ooh, Mommy!

name: Jake
line: Uh, yeah. Just think about your mom and use your magic.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: O-Okay, let's try this.  I... love my mommy?

name: Tree
line: Hugs. Aw, I-I'll hug you. I'll hug you. Hug me.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Ooooh, it worked!  I love my mommy! I love my mommy!

name: Bush
line: Hi, friends!

name: Wheel
line: I love bein' alive!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Mommy!

name: Window
line: I'm a window and I'll hug you!

name: Apples
line: Ditto about hugging y'all!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Mommy!

name: Pants
line: Ha-ha! I feel like huggin' everybody!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Hi, Mommy!

name: Building
line: I'm going to hug you.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Mommy.

name: Pajamas
line: Heh, somebody... get this guy some clothes!

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Now—now rise up, love buddies,  and hug your gross brother into submission!

name: Love Buddies
line: Gonna squeeze the heck out of him! I love that guy.

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Nya-a-a-ang!

name: Pajamas
line: Come on, let's be pal-jamsas. P-Pal-jamas. Pajamas.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Thank you, my newly conscious bros. Now return your life forces to me.

name: Pajamas
line: I loved every minute!

name: Wheel
line: Yay! Not living!

name: Little Dude
line: Nyang, nyang.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Ymmom!

name: Cream Puff Gentleman
line: Huh?  Yes!

name: Finn
line: Poor Little Dude. He was just doin' it up the only way he knew how. It's not his fault he was created evil.

name: Jake
line: Yeah. He deserves to come back good.

name: Finn
line: Wizard, Mommy-magic this dude back to life.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Okay!  Mommy.

name: Hat
line: Oh, my goodness! What is this lovely place?

name: Jake
line: Life, man!

name: Hat
line: I see.

name: Finn
line: And this dude  is your pops.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: No, I-I, ooh—I guess I am. Huh.

name: Finn
line: Be good to this dude.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: I will. Way better than my papa was to me.

name: Finn
line: Yup, that's the idea. Jake, looks like I need a new hat.

name: Jake
line: Okay. Let's go skin an evil bear.

name: Moe
line: Let's see, $4 off a... honey-baked ham. I don't like ham. $1 off of beets. Do beets have tannins? What is that? Oh! $4 off a honey-baked ham.

name: Jake
line: Moe?

name: Moe
line: Call me "Gwampa." How's your rose water?

name: Jake
line: It's exactly what it says it is. So, hey, uh, Gwampa, feels too quiet in here. Maybe we can hang out with Neptr. He can rap or something.

name: Neptr
line: B-b-b-bread, where's my needle and thread?

name: Moe
line: No!

name: Moe
line: Eh, well, Neptr is too distracting. Who wants to play video games?

name: Jake
line: Oh, you have games like BMO? Let's do that, Gwampa!

name: Moe
line: I have one video game. It's called "Hangman."

name: Finn
line: That sounds griz as nuts!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, let's play hang-a-man!

name: Moe
line: Coming right up!  Pick a letter.

name: Jake
line: Show us what you did, hangman!

name: Moe
line: Pick a letter.

name: BMO
line: But, ALLMO, I don't understand. How can I help? I mean, I'm just a little baby kid still -- even though it's my birthday -- Happy Birthday, BMO.

name: ALLMO
line: I don't know about that, but I do know about your special mind. As the accumulation of all MOs, my computing power is unmatched. Yet still, I lack the imagination to think outside my collective programming. I can only see the world as it is. But your imagination, BMO, lets you see the world how it could be, or might sort of be like. If the two of us work together, we can think up a way out of here.

name: BMO
line: I will do what I can.

name: ALLMO
line: All right. You see that hatch over there? That hatch leads to an exit corridor. But it's locked from this side. The vent up there leads to the other side.  But it's too high up.

name: BMO
line: Oh.  What if we use this trash  to climb up to the vent?

name: ALLMO
line: But all this trash is too small.

name: BMO
line: Ah-huh!

name: ALLMO
line: Whoa. You just blew my mind.

name: Jake
line: What haven't we guessed yet? "B."

name: Jake
line: "Burgess Meredithe"?!  I don't even know what that is!

name: MO
line: Do you boys want to play again?

name: MO
line: Boys love games.  Pick a letter.

name: Jake
line: Uh, I don't know, "E.'  Is this "Burgess Meredithe" again?!  Not cool! Come on, Finn, let's find a real hangman.

name: BMO
line: Yuck. This room gives me the heebie-jeebies straight-up.

name: ALLMO
line: It is the room of AMO, the first of our siblings. He, too, was special. As you were built to give love, AMO was built to receive. But he could not think outside his programming and was blinded by his need. Such is the cruel physics of love -- that those who crave it most will repel it and only the dang rich get richer.

name: BMO
line: Well, maybe as my birthday present, I can ask Moe to fix AMO.

name: ALLMO
line: But this is impossible. Moe went off line yesterday and has not re-logged. Our sensors would know.

name: BMO
line: But he's at my house right now with Finn and Jake. He got a new body.

name: ALLMO
line: Oh, dear. Oh, dear. Did this new body happen to have jagged prongs and a cannon phaser on top of its head?

name: BMO
line: No.

name: ALLMO
line: Phew!

name: BMO
line: He had a huge, gigantic wig on.  Uh-oh.

name: ALLMO
line: What?

name: BMO
line: The spikes are under the wig!

name: ALLMO
line: Oh, no! Of course! Your friends may be in grave danger. He must have sabotaged the factory. Quickly, hoist me up on top of your head. We must depart straightaway.

name: BMO
line: Uh...

name: ALLMO
line: You're stronger than you know.

name: ALLMO
line: Also, I'm lighter than you know.

name: Finn
line: I'm sorry we didn't find any hangmen.

name: Jake
line: I don't even know what I'd do with a hangman if I got one.

name: MO
line: Bloo-hoo. Bloo-hoo.

name: MO
line: Ah, bloo-hoo.

name: Finn
line: Moe!

name: MO
line: Bandits stole my legs!

name: Finn
line: Yeesh.

name: Jake
line: If you tell us where the bandits went, we'll avenge your legs!

name: Finn
line: We're sorry we left you!

name: MO
line: You should be. I'm your Gwampa wobot. Carry me.  Over here.  There! There's the thief!  The thief with my legs!

name: Finn
line: Neptr?

name: MO
line: Throw him out!

name: Finn
line: Come on. Maybe Neptr did it like, accidentally?

name: Jake
line: Neptr's out cold. He's got a heck of a dent on his head.

name: Finn
line: What? Who could have done that?

name: MO
line: Forget him! You love me, right? You love me like BMO?

name: Finn
line: What? You're all right, but we -- we love BMO.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man, be cool. BMO's like our best friend.

name: MO
line: BMO's trash!
