name: Finn
line: Moe!

name: MO
line: Moe's dead!

name: Finn
line: "Ah-mo"?

name: AMO
line: You don't love me!

name: Jake
line: Ow!

name: Finn
line: Aah!

name: AMO
line: Wake up and love me!

name: BMO
line: Imposter!

name: BMO
line: AMO!

name: AMO
line: Hello, BMO. I'm your cute sibling, AMO.

name: BMO
line: I know about you and your dirty hands. Where are Finn and Jake?

name: AMO
line: I think Finn and Jake went somewhere to buy me a gift.

name: BMO
line: Tell me what you did with Finn and Jake and our poop.

name: AMO
line: Ay!

name: AMO
line: AYYYYY!

name: BMO
line: AMO, look at my face! You gone too far!

name: AMO
line: Whoo, whoo, whoo, whoo! Bye!

name: BMO
line: You can't escape the birthday boy!

name: AMO
line: Too high.

name: BMO
line: Hey! Talk, AMO!

name: AMO
line: You want to know where Papa is? Here is all that remains of him --  his memory backup drive.

name: BMO
line: Oh.

name: AMO
line: I was returning from a long pilgrimage. I came to confront Papa, for I had discovered terrible things about myself. He was dying.  "AMO, dear child, my body is conking out.  Take this.  It is who I am. Send my mind into space so I may spend the eons among the stars and other brilliant gases."  His hands were as cold as clay. Our Papa never loved me, so I ignored his last request.  I used his knowledge of the factory and its MOs to destroy them.

name: DMO
line: Is that you, AMO?

name: AMO
line: They didn't love me, either.

name: DMO
line: Where you been?  What are you doing?  No!

name: AMO
line: Then I learned about you and your new family.  I wanted a taste of that melon.

name: AMO
line: People in my life don't love me. I'll obliterate, y'all!

name: BMO
line: You cheat. Give me those memories.

name: AMO
line: BMO, I don't want to look at you!

name: BMO
line: Tough nuts! For Moe!

name: ALLMO
line: BMO!

name: Finn
line: Hey.  We caught the tail end of what happened. Are you okay?

name: BMO
line: No.

name: Jake
line: Well, I don't like that.

name: ALLMO
line: BMO, will you live with us back at the factory? With Moe gone, you can be our leader.

name: BMO
line: I don't think I can. I'm not grown up -- or I'm too grown up now. I think I just killed someone. I need to have some time alone, but you're all really nice.

name: Finn
line: All right.

name: Jake
line: Sorry your birthday was weird.

name: BMO
line: That was the craziest thing that ever happened. But I guess, after all that, I do feel a bit more grown.

name: Red BMO
line: Except that the mission was just some made-up lie.

name: Orange BMO
line: So who knows if I will ever grow up at all.

name: Yellow BMO
line: And Moe is gone now.  So if there is anything he wanted to teach me, it better be in me already.

name: Green BMO
line: I guess all I can do is listen to the heart Moe gave me.

name: Blue BMO
line: Except that's what AMO did, and he turned out bad.

name: Purple BMO
line: So what if I turn out bad, too?

name: ALLMO
line: AMO could not think outside his programming and was blinded. But your imagination lets you see the world how it could be.

name: BMO
line: But I am different. It's not just Moe up here,  it's me, too.

name: All BMOs
line: And if I cannot trust in Moe, I can trust in me.

name: BMO
line: Oh, boy. It sure is confusing being grown.  I miss you, Moe. What a day!

name: Moe
line: I'm gonna miss you, too, BMO. I feel so very, very proud of you.

name: Jake
line: Blech. Your tooth looks bad, dude. It smells like a garden shed in here.

name: Jake
line: Finn, I think you have to go dentist.

name: Finn
line: I can't go dentist, Jake! You gotta take care of it.

name: Jake
line: Just go dentist, dude.  Okay. Easy does it...

name: Jake
line: This is so bad. What did Princess Bubblegum say when you showed her?

name: Finn
line: Aaaaaaaaaah.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm. Finn, this is literally serious. You have to go dentist.

name: Finn
line: NOOOOOOO!

name: Jake
line: Dude. You. Got. To. Go. Dentist.

name: Finn
line: Blech.  NOOOOO! I'm too strong for the world!  I don't want to go dentist, Jake. They put you in a hole filled with snakes and rotten butter and they leave you there.

name: Jake
line: Come on, man. It's not that bad.

name: Finn
line: Okay.

name: Jake
line: Right?

name: Jake
line: Whup!

name: Finn
line: This isn't so bad...  My sword! Wonder wh—

name: Finn
line: Soft sand.  Ant.

name: Ant
line: Welcome to dentist, cadet.  I'm Leftenant Gamergate.  Snakes and rotten butter. A common mistake—you were expected to arrive with snacks and a flashlight. Either way, you're here.

name: Finn
line: So... dentist is ants?

name: Gamergate
line: Dentist is dentist, cadet! Drop and give me twenty!

name: Finn
line: I don't have any money.

name: Gamergate
line: Funny man goes dentist, huh? The queen's office is in the royal hill.

name: Finn
line: Holes.  Hmm.

name: Queen
line: Listen, I wasn't here when you came in. I'm a very busy woman.  Hello, my name is General Tarsal. I am the current queen of this regiment, and please have a seat.

name: General Tarsal
line: As a first-time recruit, I'm confident that you have no idea what you're doing here.

name: Finn
line: My tooth hurts.

name: General Tarsal
line: Let's take a look at your file.  Ah, you're a fighter!  We could use a fighter.

name: Finn
line: My tooth hurts.

name: General Tarsal
line: What? Of course it does. Let me explain. You have gone dentist. That means that you will serve a brief tour of duty, and in exchange we will provide full dental rehabilitation. You will be on the front, fighting monsters... monstrous monster wooorms!

name: Finn
line: Worms.

name: General Tarsal
line: The worms are employed by the flies.

name: Finn
line: Worms.

name: General Tarsal
line: Work for the flies. You fight them; we'll fix your teeth.

name: Finn
line: Me.

name: General Tarsal
line: Yes, you!  Your mission is to secure this junction at all costs. Upon completion of service, you will be sworn to absolute secrecy. The flies have spies everywhere. Fly spies!

name: Finn
line: Heh heh.

name: General Tarsal
line: These worms are no joke, so you'll be assigned a partner. Ah, let's see... Cadet... Tiffany Oiler.

name: Finn
line: Tiffany?!

name: Tiffany
line: Tiffany! Finn, I'm gonna kill you!

name: Finn
line: That guy wants to kill me!

name: General Tarsal
line: Tough nuts, that's dentist.

name: Loudspeaker
line: Cadets, dinner is being served in the mess hall, central hill, sub-tunnel eight.

name: Finn
line: Hm. Do you have anything less sugary?

name: Tiffany
line: Yo, Finn! I'm gonna kill you!

name: Finn
line: Doin' it for my tooth.

name: Tiffany
line: Ruff! Thought so.

name: Finn
line: Hey, uh, partner. Um. So how are you doing, Tiffany?

name: Tiffany
line: Yeah, I lost my teeth eating the Baker's Shard. It's a lot of sugar, right?

name: Finn
line: Oh. Did you already know what dentist is?

name: Tiffany
line: See, this is a good example of why I want to kill you. You're ignorant.  Heed my words, Finn. As the miller's wheel forever outrages the seed, so the good apple boringly receives his neighbor's worm.

name: Finn
line: The hey?

name: Tiffany
line: And all the corn gets smooshed to grease—to grease under the miller's fleaping wheel.

name: Tiffany
line: You're getting greased!

name: Finn
line: Tiffany, look. We gotta work together, right? Why don't we let bygones be bygones?

name: Tiffany
line: Bygones? Ha!  That's you. Bye!  Gone!

name: Finn
line: Do you want my peach?

name: Tiffany
line: Bye-gone!

name: Gamergate
line: Hey! Stand down, cadets! Retire to your bunks!

name: Tiffany
line: Tonight, light's out. Tomorrow, your eyes out!

name: Finn
line: What the stork, man? This is my special sword. Why didn't you take one of those ant swords they offered you back there?

name: Tiffany
line: I don't need some fancy thinger to kick butt when I've got these!  You know about these?

name: Finn
line: No.

name: Tiffany
line: You will. Anyway, I just kinda wanted your sword 'cause it's pretty cool, I guess. Whatever. I'll get it soon enough... from off your dead corpse, you chump!

name: Finn
line: Hey, Tiffany... you know, we're really not so different, you and I.

name: Tiffany
line: Bullstuff.

name: Finn
line: Well, we're both friends with Jake, and that's something, right?

name: Tiffany
line: I was friends with Jake. Then some baritone herb stole him away from me.

name: Finn
line: I didn't steal him. We're broth—

name: Tiffany
line: And when that snow-white wiener dog is finally dead, Jake will be devastated.

name: Tiffany
line: He'll need a shoulder to cry whiny, Finn-style tears on, and that shoulder will be mine—Tiffany's! Then I can get busy with undoing your cheesy influence, plus more! With my help, Jake will become the criminal juggernaut he was always meant to be.

name: Tiffany
line: We won't just be robbing banks anymore.

name: Tiffany
line: We'll be robbing the actual banks. The whole banks!

name: Tiffany
line: You get it? We're gonna steal actual whole buildings.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I get it.

name: Tiffany
line: So don't tell me we're not so different, okay?! We're opposites, you and me. Oil and goody-goody snow-white baby-vanilla bean mitten water! Go, Tiffany!

name: Finn
line: Man, that nut's gonna try and stick me while I'm not even looking.  Don't even stress it, Finn. You're Finn Mertens, man. You got this.  Man, I hope so.

name: Tiffany
line: Finn! Get in here, quick!

name: Finn
line: The junction.

name: Tiffany
line: There's something moving in the walls. It was like .

name: Finn
line: Wall worms! Holy cow!

name: Finn
line: Dang it, Tiffany, not yet! We got to work together to beat the worms! Here they come!

name: Finn
line: Tiffany!

name: Finn & Tiffany
line: Oh, snap! Look out! They're coming in from the side!

name: Tiffany
line: You good?

name: Finn
line: My tooth hurts.

name: Finn
line: Dang! It's the head worm, and she's livid! I say we get the heck out of heeeeere—!

name: Tiffany
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Tiffany, quick! Pull me up! Quick, Tiffany! I'm slipping!

name: Finn
line: Dang it, Tiffany! Weren't you paying attention? We're two peas in a pod! We're not oil and water. We're oil and vinegar! It's good, man. It's yummy!

name: Tiffany
line: Mm...

name: Finn
line: It's good for you!

name: Tiffany
line: You're right, Finn. I can't bring myself to do it...

name: Tiffany
line: ...but I can't bring myself to save you, either.

name: Tiffany
line: Why are you still smiling?

name: Finn
line: Sorry. I didn't hear what you said. I was just gonna let it slide.

name: Tiffany
line: Look, you're—you're on your own. I'm sorry.

name: Tiffany
line: Catch you on the flip, I guess.

name: Finn
line: Tiffany?  Tiffa—  nooooooooo!

name: General Tarsal
line: Whoa! Easy, son. Don't try to speak. Your mouth is full of ants.

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Ant
line: It's okay. We just finished up.

name: Finn
line: Ah.  What happened down there? Where's Tiffany?

name: General Tarsal
line: Well, the good news is the worm queen was defeated, choked to death on some foreign object, presumably Cadet Tiffany, who is missing in action, which is the bad news.

name: Finn
line: Tiffany...

name: General Tarsal
line: But we didn't have to fix his teeth, which is nice news. But we did have to fix your teeth, which is okay news.

name: Finn
line: Huh huh. Ayyyy!

name: General Tarsal
line: So, on behalf of the ant nation, I'd like to thank you for your service, which is now concluded. As soon as you're ready, we'll get you stuffed back up that well with all the snakes and butter.

name: Finn
line: Holy cow.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Welcome home, Finn.

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Welcome home, buddy.

name: Finn
line: Thanks, you guys! Man, you'll never believe it. Dentist is actually—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Eh-eh-eh!

name: Finn
line: It was crazy! Tiffany was there—

name: Starchie
line: Whoa! Hey! Deh-deh-deh!

name: Finn
line: Wait. You all knew? What the heck? Why didn't you tell—

name: Jake
line: Ah-ah-ah!

name: Jake
line: Hey, brother. Pass me that jam, won't you?

name: Finn
line: Sure.

name: Jake
line: Thanks.

name: Finn
line: So, how is your toast?

name: Jake
line: Pretty good. Funny, though, I can kind of taste the toast's emotions or something. Getting ground into flour and then made into bread really did a number on this wheat's sense of self.

name: Finn
line: That's a pretty hyper‐developed sense of taste you've got there. Hey, you seem kind of different.

name: Jake
line: Nope. Same old Jake.

name: Finn
line: You're blue, you've got those five eyes, you're way bigger, and you keep discovering strange new abilities. I think this might be a situation.

name: Jake
line: Where's this coming from

name: Jake
line: Whoops! Tuck‐tuck. See? Same old Jake.

name: BMO
line: Ahhh!

name: Jake
line: Whoa.

name: BMO
line: Ahhh! Jake is a crab! Ahhh!

name: Finn
line: Same old Jake. If you say so.

name: Jake
line: Hmm.

name: Jake
line: I think I'm handling these minor changes pretty well. Besides, a lot of people are different these days. Dirt Beer Guy, you're practically a zombie. How are you dealing with it?

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Well, I'm basically the same as before. The difference is only physical.

name: Jake
line: So you agree Finn is really overreacting?

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Totally. You're the same person as before.

name: Jake
line: Heck yeah! I'm still the same old Jake on the inside.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Wait, you're Jake?! Uh, pardon me. Oh, dear, oh, dear. That's really something.

name: Jake
line: You know, I think I figured out why I make people uneasy. They're used to yellow Jake.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 자기야, 내가 좀 고쳐볼게.   at changing Jake's color]

name: Jake
line: Lady, that tickles.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 젠장!

name: Jake
line: It's okay, lady. Thanks for trying, but I'm fine, really.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 어떤 일이 일어나도 나는 널 사랑해.

name: Jake
line: I love me, too.

name: Jake
line: Jermaine?

name: Jermaine
line: Ahh, mountain colors. I'm painting this mountain. I think it's really coming together.

name: Jermaine
line: Yep. I'm a mirror. Hey, who's your friend?

name: Jake
line: Yipe!

name: Jake
line: Dad?

name: Joshua
line: Look at this.  I can almost walk the dog.

name: Jermaine
line: Your body looks like one of my paintings. Pretty weird dream, huh?

name: Jake
line: This isn't just a dream body, this is what my body looks like when I'm awake.

name: Jermaine
line: Oh. Got it.

name: Jermaine
line: Ha! I've got it!

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Joshua
line: I can almost walk the dog.

name: Jake
line: Finn, you up?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man.

name: Jake
line: I had a really bad dream last night. So ominous. These images are going to haunt me for, like, forever.

name: Finn
line: Sometimes it helps me if I draw a bad dream in picture form. My crayons!

name: Jake
line: It was a weird scene, all right. Chanting ladies, labyrinths, classical sculpture. And Jermaine was there, too. The weird thing was that he was painting abstract art.

name: Finn
line: So? F.Y.I., Jermaine hates abstract art. He would never paint something non‐representational.

name: Finn
line: Maybe he's just trying something new?

name: Jake
line: It's not in his nature. Why would he all of a sudden get into painting meaningless shapes?

name: Finn
line: He's probably fine.

name: Jake
line: Just feels so out of character, you know, for Jermaine.

name: Finn
line: How's the drawing?

name: Jake
line: Just squiggles.

name: Finn
line: Fuelish tank! You are too slow for the Finnosaurus. Give up! Give up!

name: Jake
line: I knew I had seen that mountain.

name: Finn
line: Tank boys,you have no hope.

name: James
line: Vrrt‐vrrt‐vrrt! Brrt! Who goes there?!

name: Jake
line: James, it's me, Jake.

name: James
line: You look nothing like Jake, but I believe you. I just have to ask because I'm supposed to guard the Wasteland. I was just making some beans. Come to my tent!

name: Jake
line: Okay, but I don't want any beans.

name: James
line: Man! I could eat beans all day, every day.

name: Jake
line: Where did you get that painting?

name: James
line: One day when I was guarding, I saw Jermaine painting it. James was like, "Dang, I like that painting!" And he was like,"You can have it." And I was like, "Waah?"

name: Jake
line: You like this? It doesn't look anything like a mountain.

name: James
line: I think you're looking at it wrong.

name: Jake
line: Where'd Jermaine go...after?

name: James
line: He went back to his studio, behind the wall of water.

name: Jake
line: You mean a waterfall?

name: James
line: No, like the thing I said.

name: Wall of Water
line: Hey! None but the chosen may walk beyond the wall of water.

name: Jake
line: What have you done with my brother?

name: Wall of Water
line: Who's your brother?

name: Jake
line: Jermaine.

name: Wall of Water
line: Wow. You guys don't look anything alike.

name: Jake
line: We're practically twins.

name: Wall of Water
line: Well, I guess you can walk beyond the wall of water. But just this once. Ooooh!

name: Bryce
line: Can I help you, sir?

name: Jake
line: Hey, Bryce. I'm looking for Jermaine. Is he behind that door marked "private"?

name: Bryce
line: No, no, no. Mr. Jermaine won't be seeing anyone today. His wishes for privacy were quite explicit. You wouldn't want to interrupt Mr. Jermaine. He's a brilliant painter.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, he used to be. Now you got him painting all this nonsense.

name: Bryce
line: I'm just his humble dealer. So many times I've watched him painting, painting, painting.

name: Jake
line: What's really going on, Bryce? My dad told me all about your demon tricks.

name: Bryce
line: Well, now I don't want to say anything bad about your dad, but...

name: Jake
line: Bro? I'm here to save you.

name: Jermaine
line: Hmm? Oh, hey. I'm not sure if this is done yet. It's hard to tell when an abstract is finished.

name: Jake
line: Jermaine, what's wrong with you? Who's taken away your identity as a landscape painter?

name: Jake
line: No, I just look different.

name: Jermaine
line: Eh, that sounds like denial.

name: Jake
line: No, it doesn't!

name: Jermaine
line: Come on, bro.

name: Jake
line: This looks bad, but deep down,I'm not different. And you're not different either, right? You'll go back to painting landscapes?

name: Jermaine
line: No one is making me do this. I painted so many landscapes that the shapes of the land began to lose their meaning. And the shapes broke apart to me, so I painted them like that. And it's not like my new paintings erase my old paintings. They're both me. Okay. I think I'm starting to get it. I like the new look, by the way.

name: Jake
line: 'Cause you like your brothers to be crazy shapes?

name: Jermaine
line: Sure. Also, Dad told me you might go through some changes one day.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Jermaine
line: He told me to be supportive. But I would've done that anyway.

name: Jake
line: I wonder what he meant.

name: Jermaine
line: You knowhow secretive Dad was. Sorry I don't have more answers.

name: Jake
line: Well, do you have any more of these paintings?

name: Jake
line: The shapes are always changing. Changing is their normal state, like us. Even if we're not changing on the outside, we're changing on the inside constantly. There's some stuff about me that I've been ignoring for a long time. I'm afraid of that stuff. But it's part of who I am. As long as I know the shape of my soul, I'll be alright.

name: Jermaine
line: Wow. You really understand my art.

name: Jake
line: Oh, I totally don't understand anything.

name: Finn
line: Hey, you're back.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I went to see Jermaine. He says hi.

name: Finn
line: No, I mean, like,you're really back.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Different, yet the same.

name: Flame Princess
line: Don't ever mess with me again!

name: Finn
line: Who was that?

name: Jake
line: The Princess of the Fire Kingdom?

name: Finn
line: Dude, I think I have a crush.

name: Finn
line: What do you know about her, Jake?

name: Jake
line: I was trying to help you get over your Princess Bubblegum sad times by hooking you two up. But she's evil, man!

name: Finn
line: You shut your dirty mouth!

name: Jake
line: Dirty?  Oh. No, really man! Her dad said she was evil!

name: Finn
line: Naw, man, I peeped beyond her burning gaze, and noshed hot lunch with her soul.  She ain't evil. She's passionate. Help me track her down.

name: Jake
line: Hmmm..

name: Finn
line: C'mon, man, I really like her. Help me out.  Jake, Jake help me out. Help me out. Jake, Jake, help me. Jake, Jake, help me!

name: Jake
line: Eeeeeeeeehhh, ok.

name: Finn
line: Whoo! Alright!

name: Jake
line: You sure you're not into any other princesses? What about Wildberry Princess? She's small and plump. You could sleep on her like a pillow. Could be nice.

name: Finn
line: Is that bird... smoking?

name: Brown Bird
line: Hey, don't you judge me. It was that fire chick down there that done this to me.

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh.

name: Finn
line: Oh, Jake... look at her. She's innocent. Like the steam off a puppy's nose, searching for ham in the snow.

name: Jake
line: Guy drops one piece of ham in the snow and he never hears the end of it! Snap out of it! She's burning cute little flowers!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, she is like a cute little flower.

name: Flame Princess
line: Aaahh!

name: Finn
line: Oh, no, are you ok?

name: Finn
line: I... I was just worried about you.

name: Flame Princess
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: Look, I'm sorry about what I said before. I don't know what happened, but I just, I had to see you again. And, I don't know.. I don't know anything about you,  but I just, I really like you. You know, you're so... beautiful.

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Flame Princess
line: Ah!

name: Flame Princess
line: Ow!

name: Finn
line: Oh, Glob. Am I hurting you?

name: Flame Princess
line: Yes! That's all you've done!  Are you trying to hurt me?! Is that why you're following me?!

name: Finn
line: I'm not followi-- Well, I guess technically I am following you.

name: Finn
line: Hey, no wait!

name: Finn
line: I guess now I'm technically chasing you.

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Jake
line: Hold on!

name: Jake
line: Eaoww.. Toasty buns.

name: Finn
line: Where are you? I want to chat it up with you! Oh, we lost her!

name: Finn
line: Whoa.

name: Flame Princess
line: I am ambushing you!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Aah!

name: Finn
line: Hey, I like your fireballs.

name: Flame Princess
line: Huh? Why do you torment me?

name: Finn
line: I'm not trying to. I just like you. I think I... I think I like-like you. Listen, when I look at you, my brain goes all stupid. And I just wanna hug you, and sit on the couch and play BMO with you. I can't explain why, but, I never felt this way before and I think we should be together.

name: Finn
line: Yeah.

name: Flame Princess
line: Rggh! Enough. You should not toy with the emotions of a fire elemental.

name: Finn
line: Wait wait, I really didn't--

name: Flame Princess
line: You told me you liked me, and you made my flame grow brighter, but then you put me out, which hurt!

name: Flame Princess
line: You're trying to impede me. That must be your purpose, ...but fire's purpose is to burn, so I'm going to turn this land into my fire kingdom!

name: Finn
line: No!

name: Jake
line: She's headed for Goblin Kingdom! We need to defeat this fiery she-beast!

name: Finn
line: I can't fight her, man. I'm still into her!

name: Jake
line: Finn, what's more important? Your love for that screwball dame, or being a hero and savin' the lives of innocent goblin folks?

name: Finn
line: Rrrrhh.. Being a hero.

name: Jake
line: Alright, c'mon! Let's go build fire-proof suits.

name: Finn
line: Uh-uh-uh, I gotta' get back to her.

name: Jake
line: Dude, slow down or your fire suit will be junk.  Ooh. Is bags of old bread fire-proof?

name: Neptr
line: Jake, you've found Neptr! I am the ultimate hide-and-seek champion! 15 months, 4 days, 9 hours and you guys did not find me!  Hahahaha-hahaha.

name: Jake
line: Oh, plops, we forgot about the game.

name: Finn
line: Sh-sh-sh-sh-sh...

name: Neptr
line: I missed you, creator.

name: Finn
line: And we missed you, too, but Neptr, right now we need you to--

name: Neptr
line: To count to 100 while you hide? 1, 2,.. 3, 4, 5--

name: Finn
line: Neptr, will you help us build fire-proof suits?

name: Neptr
line: You cannot tell but I am giving a thumbs up.

name: Neptr
line: I am finished!

name: Finn
line: I sure hope Flame Princess is okay.

name: Neptr
line: Haha, we are as one, creator.

name: Finn
line: Jake, you think Flame Princess is okay?

name: Jake
line: DUUUUDE! I feel like I can touch the heavens!  And sock angels!

name: Finn
line: We're coming up on the Goblin Kingdom.

name: Finn
line: There she is.

name: Finn
line: She seems okay.

name: Goblin
line: AAAAHH! Wood for sale! Wood on fire for sale!

name: Flame Princess
line: It's really starting to come together. Needs more... fire... hmm.

name: Finn
line: Flame Princess!

name: Finn
line: Listen, you gotta stop burning the Goblin Kingdom, ...but I don't wanna fight you or hurt you, I swear.

name: Flame Princess
line: I've heard this all before.

name: Flame Princess
line: You... MEANIE!

name: Goblin
line: My cart. I was born in that cart!

name: Jake
line: I'll put it out!

name: Flame Princess
line: Ah!

name: Finn
line: Aah! Jake didn't mean that!

name: Jake
line: Oh...  I need your help Finn! This one's too big!

name: Flame Princess
line: Ah! Whyyyy?!

name: Finn
line: No, Jake, stop. You're hurting her!

name: Neptr
line: I will solve this, creator. I will extinguish her using our suit! Foam blaster.  Hold still, burning lady.

name: Finn
line: Wha?

name: Neptr
line: Locked on target.

name: Finn
line: No, Neptr!

name: Neptr
line: Yes, creator.

name: Finn
line: NOOOO!

name: Flame Princess
line: AH!

name: Finn
line: I'm sorry!

name: Flame Princess
line: That is the last time you hurt me.  RAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!

name: Finn
line: My bad, Jake! Turn it off, Neptr!

name: Neptr
line: Oh, my...

name: Finn
line: NO!

name: Flame Princess
line: RAAAAAAAAAHH!

name: Finn
line: No more... No more!  FLAME PRINCESS!

name: Finn
line: I can't fight her, ...but I can't let her destroy the city... I've failed everyone.

name: Neptr
line: Not true, creator. You haven't failed Neptr. Even if everyone burns, you'll still have me, creator.

name: Jake
line: Mmm!

name: Finn
line: No. Why can't I just like a girl?

name: Flame Princess
line: Ow!  Huh?

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh.

name: Finn
line: Wah! Did I... do something... cool while I was knocked out?

name: Flame Princess
line: I understand now. You're a water elemental.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Flame Princess
line: You're my opposite. You create water.

name: Finn
line: What, cry? No, I j--

name: Flame Princess
line: Yeah, you cry and cry all the time.

name: Finn
line: N-No. I-I don't usually do that.

name: Flame Princess
line: That's your power.

name: Finn
line: No! N-N-N-NO-NO-NO!

name: Flame Princess
line: Finn, even if we like each other, we're going to hurt each other.

name: Finn
line: No, we don't have to. I can take it... I... I mean, can't we try?

name: Flame Princess
line: You would defy nature for me?

name: Finn
line: Uh... yeah, whatevs.

name: Finn
line: Aaah.. Uh.

name: Flame Princess
line: Bye, Finn.

name: Neptr
line: Goodbye, lady.

name: Jake
line: FINN!  Oh my Glob, man. Everyone's dead, man! They're all burned. There's barbecued bods EVERYWHERE!

name: Finn
line: WHAAAAT!?!

name: Jake
line: Hah. I'm just kidding. I saved 'em. Everyone's fine, see?

name: Jake
line: So. How'd everything go with Flame Princess?

name: Finn
line: She hugged me... then left.

name: Jake
line: Whoa! How did it feel?

name: Finn
line: It hurt.

name: Jake
line: You've got a lot of meat, Wildberry Princess.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Yeah, well, you know.

name: Finn
line: Thanks for cook-a-looking for us.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Oh, you're welcome, Finn, and thank you for answering my urgent summons.

name: Finn
line: Hey, yeah. How can we aid thee?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Oh, it's nothing really. Someone's trying to kill me.

name: Jake
line: Still tastes good.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: It's no big deal. Finish your pie.

name: Finn
line: It is a big deal, and I demand deets.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Okay.

name: Jake
line: I'm listening, but I'm gonna keep eating.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: I suspect that I've been targeted by the Guild of Assassins.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, how do you know?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: I found this note stabbed to my door... man.

name: Finn
line: Princess, we vow to protect your juice. Right, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Sometimes, I think there's a monster who lives in my stomach, and that's why I'm hungry all the time.

name: Finn
line: Uhh, Princess, let's continue this briefing outside. I can't look at his mouth when he gets like this.

name: Jake
line: Princess, want me to finish off your pie?  Yes, Jake. All my pies.  Hmm...hehehehehehe, a tiny cat.  Whoa!

name: Me-Mow
line: Quiet! Or you die! .

name: Jake
line: You're the assassin!

name: Me-Mow
line: Me-mow, assassin second class, ...but once I take out a princess, I g'aduate to full membership.

name: Jake
line: Well, I'm no princess, sister!

name: Me-Mow
line: Yes, I know, but since you've blown my cover, you will slay Wildberry Princess.

name: Jake
line: What!? I'd rather be injected with poison!

name: Me-Mow
line: Oh. Uh... okay.

name: Jake
line: I mean, I will assassinate Wildberry Princess.

name: Me-Mow
line: Good. Oh, and if you try to trick me, I'll poison you.

name: Jake
line: My nose!

name: Me-Mow
line: Blagh! It's like worn garbage up in here!

name: Wildberry Princess
line: You done in there, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Oh, uh, yeah. So, um, Wildberry Princess. So, maybe it wouldn't be so bad to be killed.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: W-w-why would you say that?

name: Finn
line: Dude, are you trying to freak her out?

name: Jake
line: I don't know. I'm just thinking out loud here.

name: Finn
line: Are you trying to freak me out?

name: Jake
line: Uh, I'm sorry, Wildberry Prin...cess...  You should... let me... do something... and... it will be...good.

name: Me-Mow
line: What's going on out there?

name: Jake
line: Eat this! And that! Ooh, how do you like this, Princess! Duoo!

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Uh... That's very good?

name: Jake
line: I'm gonna pick you up now and carry you... to the window!

name: Finn
line: Jake, what are you...

name: Wildberry Princess
line: No! Stop! Please!

name: Jake
line: Wildberry Princess is dead!  Shh...

name: Me-Mow
line: You did it! Well done! I guess I'll be on my way.

name: Wildberry Guard #1
line: Princess! Oh, Princess!

name: Wildberry Guard #2
line: You're alive!

name: Wildberry Guard #1
line: We saw your crown next to a pile of dirtied meat, then we skipped on the meat and I thought I tasted your juice, but it was just blood from the meat. We're so glad it wasn't actually you!

name: Me-Mow
line: Grraa!! You liar!

name: Jake
line: Oooh!

name: Finn
line: Jake?

name: Me-Mow
line: Okay, Jake. I've injected you with half the poison, you'll be dead in thirty minutes, unless you kill the princess, which is when I'll give you the antidote

name: Jake
line: Finn  help me!

name: Finn
line: What's wrong?

name: Me-Mow
line: If you say anything, I'll stab you in the brain!

name: Jake
line: Uhh... Finn, uh, sing mom's lullaby. I'm so tired, Finn, from the meat. Please, you have to lull me to sleep.

name: Finn
line: Uhhh...

name: Jake
line: I know you carry mom's music box around in your backpack!

name: Finn
line: Dude, I'm not going to sing mom's lullaby in front of other people...

name: Jake
line: Please, pleeeaaase...

name: Finn
line: Alright, real quick while the princess is distracted. .

name: Jake
line: Finn there's an assassin in my nose and she poisoned me and is making me kill Wildberry Princess!

name: Finn
line: Dude, stop playing games! This is serious!

name: Finn
line: Cat... noise? Oh, cats go "meow." Meow meow meow meow meow meow meow meow meow meow meow meow meow meow.

name: Jake
line: Shh!

name: Finn
line: Meowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeowmeow!

name: Jake
line: Shh! Shh! Shh!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Jake! What are you doing?!

name: Jake
line: Sorry...   Me-mow? Still asleep?

name: Me-Mow
line: Gonna double cross Jake... and leave him to die...

name: Jake
line: Phew... If I can just grab that antidote...  Ah-ha!

name: Me-Mow
line: Puppy... hoodies...

name: Jake
line: I did it!

name: Finn
line: What the flop, Jake!

name: Jake
line: Noooooo!!

name: Me-mow
line: Treachery! Hiya!

name: Me-Mow
line: Time's running out, Jake! Do you want the antidote, or not?

name: Finn
line: What is wrong with you!

name: Jake
line: Hey, everybody, everything's cool...

name: Finn
line: Everything's not cool, Wildberry Princess is still in danger!

name: Jake
line: Right, right, well, we should take her somewhere safer...

name: Me-Mow
line: Don't make me give you the rest.

name: Jake
line: I know where to stash you, princess. Follow me.

name: Jake
line: Here, nobody can take us by surprise. Finn, stand here with your back to the cliff. I'll stay with Wildberry Princess.  To do what must be done.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Oh, my, look at how close to the edge I am!

name: Me-Mow
line: Do it, Jake, do it!

name: Jake
line: I...I...I probably shouldn't!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Jake!

name: Jake
line: I'm full of poison...

name: Finn
line: The assassin!

name: Me-Mow
line: The name's Me-mow.

name: Finn
line: If you let Jake die, so help me I will kill you too!

name: Me-Mow
line: Try it, oaf!

name: Finn
line: Give me the antidote!

name: Finn
line: Face me, cat!

name: Finn
line: Ugh, ow!

name: Finn
line: Give it up, Me-mow! You're only making my face look cooler!

name: Me-Mow
line: You're at my mercy!

name: Finn
line: Ha, you think you're hurting me? With that tiny dagger?

name: Me-Mow
line: We'll see who's laughing when you're blind!

name: Finn
line: It's over! Give me the antidote!

name: Me-Mow
line: What, this antidote?

name: Finn
line: No! You... milk-lapper!  Jake, come lick this treebark!

name: Jake
line: I'm coming--

name: Me-Mow
line: Forget it, kid. I gave Jake enough poison to kill a dog fifty times his size.

name: Finn
line: Oh, no...

name: Finn and Jake
line: Wait! Oh yeah

name: Jake
line: Dog liver times fifty-one!

name: Me-Mow:
line: A magic dog? Nooooooo!!!!!!!

name: Finn
line: How you feeling, dude?

name: Jake
line: Big liver, big liver, yeah!!

name: Me-Mow
line: You've ruined me! I have to wait a whole year to retake the assassins test!

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Aww! What if I made you my royal pet?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Oh, dear....

name: Finn
line: Nice defense mechanism, Wild B!

name: Jake
line: Are you naked?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Oh, no, this is a medical condition. I need a hospital

name: Jake
line: Hehe, we all need a hospital.

name: Jake
line: Finn?

name: "Finn"
line: Yo.

name: Jake
line: Oh, hey. Me and BMO are heading over to the vuvuzela store in the Music Kingdom. You want to come with? I got to get a new vuvuzela. Somebody keeps smashing my old one.

name: BMO
line: I can't bear this burden any longer! It was me! I'm the vuvuzela smasher!

name: Jake
line: BMO, how could you?

name: Neptr
line: No, it was me! I'm the vuvuzela smasher.

name: Jake
line: Neptr?!

name: "Finn"
line: No, I'm the vuvuzela smasher.

name: Jake
line: All right, all right. Well, I'm still getting one. You coming?

name: "Finn"
line: Nah, me and Fi- ...Fern are supposed to clean out the chicken coop today. And if anyone tries to stop me, I'll slash their flipping faces off.

name: Jake
line: True, true. Okay, well, I'll see you later then. Come on, BMO.

name: BMO
line: Jake, I'm sorry! I really am the smasher!

name: Jake
line: Ah, don't sweat it buddy.

name: Finn
line: Holy cow! Fern, that was perfect!  Hyup! You're getting new powers like every day now. Let me see you do Jake - no, wait, Ice King! Do Ice King!

name: Fern
line: Ha, nah, man.  Imitating uncool people infects you with their loserishness.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Yeah, that rings true.  It's too bad you didn't develop any coop-poop-scooping skills. That coop is incredibly disgusting.

name: Fern
line: Actually, about that, I was thinking that, instead, maybe you and I could explore some secret ruins I found.

name: Finn
line: Secret ruins?! Sweet! Maybe we can still catch up with Jake and BMO! Or maybe Neptr could come! Hey, Neptr, you want to go on an adventure, buddy?!

name: Neptr
line: Oh my glob! Hold on!

name: Fern
line: Actually, I was thinking maybe just you and me would go. Spend some quality time together, Finn and Fern style.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, okay. That actually even sounds like something Jake would want us to do.  Forget it, Neptr!  ♪ Dungeon surprise, right before my eyes, what a surprise, the dungeon surprise. ♪

name: Finn and Fern
line: One, two, three - shoot! Rock! One, two, three - shoot! Scissors!

line: This is so weird. I can't tell if it's boring or fun.

line: Well, I can. It's boring. I want the thrill of victory! Who wants to be the same all the time?

name: Finn
line: Come on, man! You know you love it! Come on! One, two, three... Come on!

name: Fern

name: Finn
line: Sorry.

name: Fern
line: Ah, it's okay. That stuff won't mean a thing. I mean, that stuff don't mean a thing. Hey, come on, we're almost there!  Whoop, whoop, whoop!

line: Whoop, whoop whoop!

line: Whoop, whoop, whoop! Whoop, whoop!

line: I had to chop up a bunch of stubborn so-and-sos to get my hands on this baby.

name: Finn
line: Wow, would you look at that! They hid this ziggurat in the cliff side. Amazing!

name: Fern
line: Yeah, I poked around in there a bit, but-

name: Finn
line: Dut, dut, dut! No spoilers!

name: Fern
line: No, I know. I didn't go past the first level. I was saving it to do together.

name: Finn
line: Sweet.  Whoa, what is that, a fitness pole?  Hey ya, hey ya, hey ya!

name: Fern
line: Come on.  This way.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Fern, wait up. Hey, I just want to say that it's really cool that you're into this stuff. You know - that we have so much in common. It feels almost like we're real brothers, right? Or even closer.

name: Fern
line: I think that's the treasure chamber down there. Why don't you go check it out? I want to study these interesting carvings.  Hmm. Fascinating.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Uh, okay. I guess just holler if you need me.  Hey, what's this?  Contemporary chair, contemporary trash, contemporary meatloaf? Hey, bad news, Fern. It looks like we've got a squatter situation here.

name: Finn
line: I think they got the treasure, but they left some meatloaf behind. The good news is I know a meatloaf dealer-

name: Finn
line: What the? Fern?  Fern?  Uh, Fern? I think maybe the wind blew the door shut. An "act of nature", I would presume.

name: Fern
line: I'm sorry. I don't actually know how to make meatloaf. That's just a pan of dirt.

name: Finn
line: Well, that's okay. I don't know how to either! ...Fern, please open the door.

name: Fern
line: This is where you live now. You'll be fine.

name: Finn
line: What?! Fern, what about Jake and BMO - my home?

name: Fern
line: It's been your home long enough. It's Fern's turn. I think I'm going to be a really great Finn. Hey, do you know who my favorite is? It's Neptr. I'm a Neptr guy! I'll be back in a month with a new bucket of trash. Later!

name: Finn
line: Fern!?  I've been double-crossed by grass Finn! I don't like being abandoned! I'm sensitive to it!  Mmm!  It's too hot!  There's got to be something useful in here.

name: Finn
line: You'll be back in a month?! With a new bucket of trash?! It's hot! There's no air in here! I need air! I need air!

name: Finn
line: Wha?  Oh! A microphone. There's some dried ketchup on it.  Uh, hello.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hi, Finn! You're still asleep after your fight with Susan. But when you wake up, I'm sure you'll have fun discovering everything your new arm can do. And Finn, sincerely, thank you for defending our kingdom again. Oh. Someone else wants to thank you, too.  Thank you, Finn!  I don't know. Okay, um... Welcome, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Huh.

line: Yes!

name: Finn
line: I know you do, Fern. Listen, we can stop this and just go home together. All this lying and fighting, it doesn't have to end like this. Today doesn't have to have this kind of... finality.

name: Finn
line: What? I'm not afraid of lakes, wells, or rivers, streams, or deep wells or puddles. Why would I be afraid of-

line: I'm no wuss! I'm the hero around these parts!

name: Finn
line: I shall conquer my fear.

line: Yeah, right.

name: Finn
line: No! I will. I'll conquer my fear.

name: Fear Feaster
line: Of course you will,  and I live in a two bedroom apartment that doesn't smell like vomit  ...Sarcasm.

name: Jake
line: Dude. Dude, did you see me? I was all like womp, and then I was all like take this! Womp! Womp! And then... Hey, what’s wrong with you, dude?

name: Finn
line: Jake. I think I'm afraid... of the ocean.

name: Jake
line: Say what, now?

name: Finn
line: I need your help to overcome my fear. Will you do it?

name: Jake
line: Um... No... I don't really wanna do it.

name: Finn
line: Jake! Come on!

name: Jake
line: I'm just messing with you. I'll do it. Hmm... Where to start? Oh, ok. I think we should just take a few steps in the water. You can hold Jake's hand if you're scared.

name: Jake
line: Um... Oh it's ok, dude. I see the problem. It's just your feet.

name: Jake
line: Boop. Beep. Boop. Beep. Boop. Beep. Boop. Beep. Beep. Boop. Beep. Boop.

name: Finn
line: Don't be scared. I shall not be scared.

name: Jake
line: Boop. Boop.

name: Finn
line: I'm afraid! Ah!  Jake, get me out of the water! Now, Jake! Now! Now!

name: Jake
line: Hot jam! You're really scared of the ocean. In fact, you're so scared... it gives me an idea. Let's start a business of being scared of the ocean!

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Ok. Ok. I have a plan to get rid of your fear. We'll start tomorrow morning.

name: Finn
line: But I must conquer this now!  I'm not afraid of you!

name: Finn
line: I'm afraid of you! I'm afraid of you!

name: Finn
line: Ok, yeah. Let's try tomorrow.

name: Jake
line: Fiiiinn. Finn. Hey, Finn. Wake up.

name: Finn
line: Morning, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Ready for me to help you get over your ocean fear?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man.

name: Jake
line: Cool... but I can only do this if you ask me.

name: Finn
line: I'm askin'!

name: Jake
line: Then get ready for my three-step plan. Watch your troubles melt away with step one!

name: Finn
line: Jake, are you crazy? This is not an OK thing to do!

name: Jake
line: Hey. Hey. Come on. The ocean is your friend, and you got friends all around you right now. Miles and miles of friends.

name: Finn
line: You're nuts.

name: Jake
line: Don't try to struggle, man.  I'll let you out in a second. You just need to calm down.

name: Finn
line: Really? Ok. I'm calming down.

name: Jake
line: That's great. You're doing great. Ready for step two?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man. I can do it.

name: Jake
line: Alright, dude. Step... two!

name: Finn
line: Jake, this isn't a joke! It's touching me!

name: Jake
line: Let it hold you, man! Let it hold you like a child!

name: Finn
line: I'm trying to let it hold me.

name: Jake
line: Control your breathing!

name: Finn
line: This isn't working!

name: Jake
line: That means we gotta move to step three. Just don't scream.

name: Finn
line: W-what?

name: Jake
line: I'm gonna push you underwater with my jowls. Just don't scream. Don't scream.

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Jake
line: Don't scream. Hold your breath, Finn. You got it, dude!

name: Finn
line: Get me away, Jake! Now, Jake! Now! Right now! Get-Get me away!

name: Jake
line: Finn! Stop it, Finn! Ow!

name: Finn
line: I'm safe! I'm safe! How'd I do?

name: Jake
line: I think we should give up.

name: Finn
line: What? I made it all the way to level three.

name: Jake
line: Look, Finn. It's not that I don't want to help you... I just don't wanna get beat up anymore. I mean this  is my bread and butter. I can't have you messing up my bread and butter, dude.

name: Finn
line: You have to help me. I can't do this without you.

name: Jake
line: Ok. Fine... but only if you swear not to hit me anymore.

name: Finn
line: I swear I won't hit you anymore.

name: Jake
line: And also swear to only speak in rhymes. Speak in rhymes all the times.

name: Finn
line: I swear... and pigs have hair.

name: Jake
line: Yes. Perfect. And since you want more... it's time for step four.

name: Jake
line: I'm not that good at counting.  Come on. Let's go kick your fear of the ocean where the sun don't shine... in the sea cucumber.

name: Jake
line: Check it, dude. One hundred percent awesome-itude.

name: Finn

name: Jake

name: Finn

line: And so fear is forced deep within the soul of a hero. Conquered... at least, for now...

line: Awesome. Wizard of Grassy Moun-tayn... Mountain. Yeah, thanks, Choogs.

line: Hey! How's it going?!  Ugh! Is that true, what the bird said? You guys are heroes?

line: Oh, I wasn't hiding. I'm a Tree Witch. I can turn into trees and shrubs and bushes and stuff. Check it out.

line: Why? 'Cause I have a balding problem! What, are you, blind?   Are You blind!?

line: No, we're not blind.  I had no idea... I don't know...

line: Yeah, okay.

line: Her? Are you kidding? Come on, look at her!  If she was good, she wouldn't be so ugly.

line: Are you guys still talking?!

line: So what do we do? Tell her we can't help her 'cause she's ugly?

name: Jake
line: No, man! She'll kill us or put a freaky curse on us or something.  Let me get rid of her with some of my world-famous smoove talking.   Hey. Sorry about that, girl.  Ahh. You don't mind if I take a load off, do you?

line: What were you guys talking about?

name: Jake

line: Huh?

line: We were just saying someone as pretty as you doesn't even need a full head of hair.  Isn't that right, buddy?

line: Uh, yeah, totally!

name: Tree Witch
line: Nuh-unh!

name: Jake
line: Girl, if I didn't already have a G.F., I'd be on you like butter on toast!

line: Oh. Umm…

line: Dude, I don't think it's working.

line: Yeah, I think I'm making things worse.

line: Ah-ah-ahhh!

line: Hey.

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Finn
line: No! I--I'm here to save you! From your hair! It looks really bad. Cut it off, quick!

name: Muscle Princess
line: Of course it looks bad. If I had beautiful, shiny hair, no one would look at my muscles.  Come back when you wanna get serious about loving me!

name: Finn
line: I am terrible at talking to ladies.

name: Finn
line: Hmm... Where's a princess? Princess?... Princess... Princess... Who's that?  It's Lumpy Space Princess.  Does she... live in the woods now?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: G-G-Get away from my camp! I'll cut you! Hrm. I'm never gonna go back home.

name: Finn
line: Huh. Wait. Does she even have hair?  She does! Well... hair is hair.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my Glob! What the stuff are you doing?! Why are you cutting my lumps?!

name: Finn
line: Because they're, uh... So--

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I knew you liked me.

name: Finn
line: No, I don't! I-I'm just stopping by because--

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Just admit it, Lover Boy! You can't resist me! Well, if you want these lumps, you gotta put a ring on it! Where's my ring?!  I knew you liked me, Finn. That's why you're running! Get in touch with your feelings, babe!

name: Finn
line: What am I gonna do? Huh? A graveyard? Yes! There's got to be a hairy princess in there that won't think I'm hitting on her! Princess? Princess? Princess? Ugh! Come on! Bingo!  "Here lies Princess Beautiful. She was so beautiful." Hey, that's perfect! And sort of macabre. Oh, well.  Aha!

name: Princess Beautiful
line: Hi, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Ohh!

name: Princess Beautiful
line: What? What are you -- Please stop.

name: Finn
line: Where's her hair?!

name: Princess Beautiful
line: Thanks, Finn.

name: Finn
line: "Here lies Princess Beautiful. She was so beautiful, but died of baldness?!" Dang it!

name: Tree Witch
line: I'm gonna look so beautiful... Invited to all the parties.

name: Finn
line: Jake! Jake! I'm sorry, man. Getting princess hair is -- is impossible! They all just think I'm in love with them! Ugh! I can't do it. You're gonna have to spend the rest of your life in this witch's butt.

name: Jake
line: Noooo!

name: Tree Witch
line: Eh! Quiet down! I'm daydreaming!

name: Jake
line: Dude, if they think you like them, then use that. Embrace it! Find the least terrible princess you can, play her some music, cook her a meal, smoove talk her until she likes you. And then get the hair!

name: Finn

name: Jake
line: Marry a princess if you need to! Just get her hair! Aaaah!

line: Go get the hair!

name: Jake

line: Whoa... Mmmmmmmmmmmmmm...MAKE IT STOP!

name: Booko
line: Anyways, At the center of the multiverse is a dimension called the Time Room, believed to be the quasi-corporeal dwelling place of the almighty Prismo. The Time Room is the single dimension that exists outside of time. The Time Room produces time waves that are experienced by other dimensions. Some dimensions have permanent links that allow travel to and from. Others become linked temporarily by naturally forming Worm Holes. And others can become linked artificially by magical portals, torn open by items of great power. Once the last gem is inserted into the Enchiridion it will have the power to create a portal to any dimension in the multiverse. An activated portal creates a time dilation in which either end of the portal experiences a temporal synchronization allowing for the safe passage of particles  through a non-local region of space-time.

line: Oh, one other thing. Do not open that door.  So that's two things write down the numbers, do not open that door. Got it?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Yes, Princess.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Hello.

name: Flame Princess
line: Hello.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: You look sad.

name: Flame Princess
line: Yeah, but mostly I'm confused.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Ha, me too.

name: Flame Princess
line: Really?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Yeah. Bubblegum is bad.

name: Flame Princess
line: She is?!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: I don't know. Wanna pet my dog?! He lives at my house.

name: Flame Princess
line: What about the tests?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: I'm not good at tests.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: La-de-da-de-da  His name is Jake, but he's not the real Jake.  Ow. My body is soft.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: We're friends.

name: Flame Princess
line: Yeah, I really get you, but sometimes friends are hard to understand. Sometimes you think you know them, but you find out they're just playing mind games.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Is the princess your friend?

name: Flame Princess
line: I don't know.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Yeah, because why did she lock you up in jail when you were a little baby? That was a weird friend thing.

name: Messenger
line: The word! The word!

name: Flame King
line: What's the word?

name: Messenger
line: The word is your newborn baby will have greater powers than you'll ever dream of.

name: Flame King
line: Uh... have my baby sent into the wilderness of the outside world to perish.

name: Messenger
line: Okay!

name: Messenger
line: Oop. Hup.

name: Messenger
line: Ah!  Aw.

name: Messenger
line: Hmm.

name: Rock Woodsman
line: Ho-ho!

name: Rock Woodsman
line: WAAAAAAAAAH!

name: Flame Princess
line: Bah.  Ca'tle.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What's this?

name: Flame Princess
line: Kih, kih.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: A princess? Must've wandered off.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Flame King?

name: Flame King
line: What do you want, princess of the Gum World?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I found your lost daughter.

name: Flame King
line: I-I don't remember losing anything.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Pssh.

name: Flame King
line: Okay, you got me. I had her sent to wander in the woods. I was in fear of being usurped. Come on.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's your problem, but you can't just let her run around the woods. She's too dangerous. Find some way to contain her power, or I will.

name: Flame King
line: Pssh, fine.

name: Flame Princess
line: Is everybody in this world hiding something?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: It's fun to hide.

name: Flame Princess
line: You're all right. Why can't everybody be honest like you? Maybe I should just go back where I belong.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Wait, do you mean baby jail?

name: Flame Princess
line: I don't know, man.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Mmmm...

name: Finn
line: Fighting snow-a-constrictors really helped take my mind off things.

name: Finn
line: So, uh, why am I here again?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, I just wanted to measure Flame Princess's reaction when confronted by the guy who broke her heart.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, Cinnamon Bun, I'm—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: CINNAMON BUN!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: There's a note  "Gon 2 fyr kingdum. Pleez watch dog."

name: Finn
line: Oh, this is terrible! If Flame Princess goes back there, her evil dad will lock her up again!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And if she's imprisoned, I won't be able to complete my tests, and I'll have wasted my precious time!

name: Finn
line: We gotta save her. Let's doogie!

name: Flame Guard #1
line: State your business here, and be quick about it. Sorry, I'm on edge 'cause I'm worried that Jerry here will find out I'm dating his sister.

name: Finn
line: Listen, we need to get into the castle right now.

line: Yeah, but why?

name: Finn
line: Grrr! So I can go to your mama's house! Now get outta my way!

name: Jerry
line: Doesn't your mom live in a nursing home?

name: Flame Guard #1
line: Yeah, and in a different city. C'mon, dude, you gotta be honest here.

name: Finn
line: Honest my fist!  Come on, Princess!

name: Flame Guard #2
line: D'aw, yeah! Gonna scramble you and fry you up for brunch! I try to act tough but I really wanted to be a chef.

name: Finn
line: Man.

name: Jerry
line: Halt. What is your business here?

name: Flame Person
line: I need to get inside to file my taxes. Also I like using the bathroom here. Also I like to crop dust the lobby.

name: Flame Guard #2
line: Pass, friend.

name: Finn
line: Alright, so you wanna get nasty? One time, I blew a snot bubble that broke off and floated away. Then it hit some lady's baby in the face, and it started crying.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And I really enjoy the taste of envelopes.

name: Flame Guard #1
line: Uh, that's cool and all, but you still haven't told us why you want to get in.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We need to see the king?

name: Flame Guard #1
line: Well, why didn't you just say so? Right this way, friends.  There you go  the new Flame King.

name: Finn
line: Flame Princess?

name: Flame Princess
line: Finn?

name: Finn
line: You're okay! Um, how's it going?

name: Flame Princess
line: Pretty good. Cinnamon Bun and I staged a coup and I overthrew my dad.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh-ho, that's why the guards were wigging out.

name: Flame Princess
line: That is the new way in the Fire Kingdom. Total honesty is the law of the land—no secrets.

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: Flame King
line: Right, can you believe this nonsense? Once I get outta here, I'm gonna ground you for real. No snacks, no friends, no popular music.

name: Flame Princess
line: You never let me have any of those things! You were a selfish king and a bad parent!

name: Flame King
line: But I did it for you, honey—for you not to overthrow me like you just did.

name: Flame Princess
line: You belong in that lamp! And if you don't settle down, you'll have to answer to Cinnamon Bun!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Hi.

name: Finn
line: Wow. She's even awesomer than I remember.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Take off that silly hat. We're going home.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: No. Look,  got a real dog now! Hah.

name: Finn
line: Flame Princess, listen. I'm really sorry I lied and hurt your feelings, and I was a big fat jerk—

name: Flame Princess
line: Finn, it's okay. It's in the past now.

name: Finn
line: So, does that mean we're still going out?

name: Flame Princess
line: No. I've realized my place is here, ruling these weak and vicious Fire People.

name: Finn
line: I see.

name: Flame Princess
line: But we're cool. You're welcome to come back and hang out whenever you like if you promise me one thing.

name: Finn
line: Anything.

name: Flame Princess
line: That you'll be completely honest with me.

name: Finn
line: Heh. Okay. I promise.

name: Flame Princess
line: I'm serious.

name: Finn
line: Hmm.

name: Finn
line: What's up?

name: Flame Princess
line: Nothing, I don't know.

name: Jake
line: If anybody wants tea, it will be ready in a few minutes.

name: Flame King
line: Evil...evil...evil...evil...evil!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, Flame King!

name: Flame Princess
line: Father!

name: Flame King
line: Oh, well, uh... Sorry, I... thought my daughter was alone... Well, I'll just be going now. Nice teapot.

name: Jake
line: Ooh!

name: Finn
line: What was that?

name: Jake
line: He was saying "evil, evil, evil" over and over again.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I heard.

name: Jake
line: Well, I wasn't sure if you heard him 'cause he was whispering.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I heard.

name: Flame Princess
line: Ugh, he's so annoying.

name: Jake
line: Well, I was just trying to help.

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh, not you, Jake, my dad. I always catch him whispering stuff in my ear while I'm not paying attention. He keeps saying I'm evil.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, you best not be believing that whack bunk. I bet he's trying to make your life bad, so you'll think you're evil. But you're really not!

name: Flame Princess
line: How can I know for sure?

name: Finn
line: Dungeons.

name: Flame Princess
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Let's have a good time in a dungeon or something, that always clears my head that reminds me what's what.

name: Flame Princess
line: And that will make me good?

name: Finn
line: No, that will show you not to worry so much, because you're already good in here.

name: Flame Princess
line: Ok, yeah, let's do it.

name: Finn
line: Dungeons!

name: Flame Princess
line: Dungeons!

name: Jake
line: Chamomile tea!

name: Flame Princess
line: Is this how you look for a dungeon?

name: Finn
line: Yeah... a lot of times the entrances are hidden, so you gotta look under rocks and stuff for a secret switch.

name: Finn
line: Sometimes it takes a while... Hmm.

name: Flame Princess
line: I'll just use my heat sense.

name: Flame Princess
line: That tree over there is not made of wood.

name: Finn
line: Really?

name: Finn
line: Yes!

name: Finn
line: Ooh... gauntlet.

name: Flame Princess
line: Thanks for taking me out Finn.

name: Finn
line: No prob, Bob, light this for me, will ya?

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh, sure. Um... do we need a torch? I'm sort of made of fire.

name: Finn
line: Oh...well, I guess torches are just cool for dungeons, you know?

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh, okay.

name: Finn
line: Yeah...I like to hang on to it.

name: Flame Princess
line: Boy, this place is creepy!

name: Finn
line: Really? I feel like it's trying too hard. Gold piece!

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh, you mean, like, with all the skulls?

name: Finn
line: Whoa! Whoa!

name: Flame Princess
line: What?

name: Boney
line: Hey! What are you doing here?

name: Flame Princess
line: Burning you alive!

name: Finn
line: Haha no, no, wait a sec. Sorry, one second.

name: Boney
line: Sure.

name: Finn
line: He might have an important loot on him, so we don't wanna just burn him up; plus it's a little cruel even for an evil guy, check this out.  RRRAAA, you're gonna surrender!

name: Boney
line: Okay, okay, I surrender!!!

name: Finn
line: I shall grant thee clemency! If you do the splits! Do the splits!

name: Boney
line: I-I can't-I can't do the splits.

name: Finn
line: Do the splits, thou milk-livered maggot pie!

name: Boney
line: Okay, okay...Ow, ow, ow!

name: Finn

name: Flame Princess
line: Neat!

name: Finn
line: Got any loot on ya?

name: Flame Princess
line: Yeah, no, that makes sense.

name: Finn
line: What else you got?!

name: Boney
line: Yeah! Uh, uh, there's a treasure chest in the corner, please stop yelling.

name: Finn
line: Hah, hah! I knew it.  Oh, cram it to the butternuts, it's locked!

name: Boney
line: Aahh! I don't know were the keys is, please don't yell!

name: Finn
line: Hahaha, alright. We can come back to that later.  Hey, are you having fun?

name: Flame Princess
line: Mhm.

name: Boney
line: I- I'll just stay here.

name: Flame Princess
line: Race you to the next monster!

name: Finn
line: WHOA, whoa!

name: Flame Princess
line: What?

name: Finn
line: That's not how you do things in a dungeon. You gotta sneak.

name: Flame Princess
line: Sneak?

name: Finn
line: Like this.  And you gotta look around.

name: Finn
line: Ok, this guy's too big to intimidate, but I have a plan. First, you shoot some fire at that rope, the chandelier falls, we distract the monster and we run in. Element surprise.

name: Flame Princess
line: Wow.

name: Finn
line: You ready?

name: Flame Princess
line: Yeah.

name: Finn
line: Before we go in, how good are you at quietly throwing a tiny bit of fire?

name: Flame Princess
line: Uhh... what?

name: Finn
line: Like on a scale of 1 to 100, how good are you at quietly throwing a tiny bit of fire at a rope 50 feet away?

name: Flame Princess
line: Uhh...

name: Finn
line: Scale of 1 to 100.

name: Flame Princess
line: Well, I don't know! I've never rated myself before.

name: Finn
line: Well, that's cool, that's cool. Just try to hit that rope.

name: Flame Princess
line: Are you okay?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I'm good. it's a hologram.

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh. Neat. So, uhh, should we keep going?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, although it does raise the question. Why would someone go through the trouble of setting up a hologram? Unless... they've hidden something in this room?

name: Finn
line: Hey, wake up.

name: Flame Princess
line: I was meditating.

name: Finn
line: Look what I found.

name: Flame Princess
line: A key!

name: Flame Princess
line: We have to go back?

name: Finn
line: We don't have to, we get to! Come on.

name: Finn
line: See? That didn't take long at all. Now we get treasure.

name: Flame Princess
line: Okay.

name: Finn
line: Nope. This key's for something else. Haha. Oh, well.

name: Flame Princess
line: Jeez. This is kinda boring. At least he's walking fast.

name: Finn
line: See? That's where I found the key.

name: Finn
line: Snapdragons!!

name: Snapdragon
line: Take my place, take my place! Take my-

name: Flame Princess
line: Scatter fire!

name: Finn
line: No, no, we shake them down first, remember?

name: Flame Princess
line: He... wanted me to take his place.

name: Finn
line: Man. Ooh, hold on.  Ha ha! It's another key! Now we get to go back to the beginning!  Whoohoo!

name: Flame Princess
line: Finn, I'm not having any fun.

name: Finn
line: What? Why?

name: Flame Princess
line: Well, you keep wanting me to do things your way. But I don't like doing things your way. Is that because I am evil?

name: Finn
line: What? No, wait, that's... no! Uhh, hey, you know what? Let's do things your way.

name: Flame Princess
line: Really?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. I've been acting an uncouth lout, m'lady.  Okay, so there's a door over there. What do you wanna do?

name: Flame Princess
line: I... burn it down.

name: Finn
line: Okay, that worked. Now what do you do...

name: Flame Princess
line: RRAAAAAGGGHHH!!

name: Finn
line: Uhh...  Good- good job, FP.

name: Flame Princess
line: Thanks, FTH! Haa!  Ughh, doors! Burn, burn, burn!  Huh? Ugh.

name: Finn
line: Oh, Sham man. It's the legion of Goo Skulls! Uh, how do you defend?

name: Flame Princess
line: Uhh... snake fire!!

name: Finn
line: Fire burn goo.

name: Flame Princess
line: Yes! Feel my flames, puny worms!  The power of destruction!

name: Finn
line: Woh.   Whoa! Flame Princess!!

name: Flame Princess
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: Ahh!!!

name: Finn
line: Help me! But don't use fire because you'll- mphh!

name: Flame Princess
line: Release him or feel the wrath of the Princess of Flames!

name: Flame Princess
line: Very well.

name: Flame Princess
line: Do the splits! Do the splits, thou milk-livered maggot pie!

name: Finn
line: Hot Daniel! Flame Princess. I thought you were going to burn me alive.

name: Flame Princess
line: No way! I'd never do that to my boyfriend.

name: Flame Princess
line: Ha, thanks Finn. That was a really awesome experience.

name: Finn
line: Dungeons totes clear your head, right?

name: Flame Princess
line: I forget how good it feels to destroy stuff.

name: Finn
line: Uhhhh.....

name: Flame Princess
line: I mean, like evil stuff.

name: Finn
line: Oh yeah, cool.

line: And burn it.

line: Willy! Willy! Oh, Willy!

name: Finn

line: I wanted to do it. Why didn't you let me?

line: Jeet!

line: Wow. James sacrificed his life for you again, PB.

line: Yeah, that's like the twenty-fifth time, right?

name: Jake
line: Totes.

line: Now hold up. This ground is perfectly solid.  There's no loose gravel here.

name: Jake
line: So what? Clone him up, girl.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: James is too reckless. I can't reward this kind of foolish behavior forever. It's time James takes his eternal nap.

line: But it's James!

name: Jake
line: Come P-Gum, don't be all cold-hearty!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm putting my foot down. There will be no more Jameses.

name: Finn
line: No...

line: I'm sorry. Look, I need you guys to go to James's apartment and box up his stuff.

name: Finn
line: Is this... James heaven?

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: James...

line: Uh, I'm James number 2. The original James got all goopy in the desert.

name: Jake
line: Explain this biz, James II.

name: James II
line: Well... I was lonely! I knew Princess Bubs would make a new James if, you know, a James died a hero. So...

line: You faked your own death?

name: James II

name: Finn
line: James...

name: James II
line: Plus, each time I get kerplonked, I get another shiny medal, and why have two medals if you can have all the medals? Medals, medals, medals...

name: Finn
line: Dude, I've been to your funeral like twenty-five times.

name: James II
line: What? The medals make me happy. Plus, PLUS! It's a constant party here in  Jamestown!

name: Jake
line: PB ain't gonna like this.

name: Finn
line: Hmm hmm!

name: James II

line: Nah, man. PB's no dummy. She'll find out. It's only a matter of time.

name: Finn
line: We like you James but, you're on your own. We're gonna sit this one out.

line: This should be good.

name: Jake
line: There's Princess Bubblegum!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey! Stop running! You rascals, get back here! You are all in so much trouble!  James!

name: Jake
line: What a show!

name: Finn
line: Very enjoyable!

line: Okay, who's the Banana Guard Leader for this week?

line: I'm the leader.

name: Princess Bubblegum

line: Hey guys, it's the picture of one of the perpetrators. Take a good look.

line: Ooooh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: There's twenty-five of them.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: I need to see the other twenty-four pictures.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Nope, you only need that one.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: What? How can one picture identify twenty-five perpetrators?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's because they all look the same.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: Oh okay, I see. There's twenty-five of them! They all look like this guy!

name: Banana Guard I
line: Huh, how can twenty-five guys look like one guy? You mean they're viginti-quintuplets?

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: You mean they're viginti-quintuplets?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No! They're clones.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: What are clones?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: A group of organisms or cells produced asexually from one ancestor or stock, to which they are genetically identical.

name: Banana Guard II
line: How did that happen?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's a long story.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: I love long stories.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Aaah! There's no time!

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: And they're not brothers?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No! They're not brothers, they're clones!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey! Get down here and help me!  Viginti-quintuplets! I'm telling you...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What are you doing? Why aren't you helping?

line: Come on PBs, just sit here with us for five minutes.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Why?

name: Jake
line: Come on! Five minutes!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Maybe just a brick.

line: Hey you, stop!

name: Clone James I
line: Yeah?

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: Have you seen this guy?

name: Clone James I
line: Hmm...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I have to admit, it's fun to watch.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: You two stop too!  Show them the picture!

name: Clone James I
line: Alright.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: Have you guys seen this guy?

name: Clone James II&III
line: Hmm...

name: Clone James I
line: Here you go.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: Hmm... Hmm...  What's your name?

name: Clone James I
line: James.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: What's your name?

name: Clone James IV
line: James.

name: Clone James V
line: James.

name: Clone James VI
line: James.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: You're all named James. Is it because you guys look alike?

name: Clone James VI
line: I guess so.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: Y'know, I was telling this to the guys... If, if we look alike, we should have the same name. It would just make it a little easier. Life, that is. It would make our life a little easier.  Aah... Give me a second...  Same name... Look alike... You really look alike... Brothers! You're all brothers?

name: Clone James VI
line: No... I don't think so.

name: Banana Guard Leader
line: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven-

line: Twenty-five. If you're counting how many of us look alike, there's twenty-five.

line: Hmm... Twenty-five... Not brothers...   I think these are the twenty-five that are not brothers.  Perpetrators! Get to them!

line: Where they'd go?

line: It's them!

line: Gotcha!

line: Okay, fun's over. You're not heroes!  You don't deserve these medals.

line: Wah, no fair.

line: Okay! Weeoo weeoo weeoo weeoo...  Ah! Can't fight!

line: Hey!

line: Heeyah!Aww! Don't touch the monsters! They'll melt you! Oh my jerbs! Jake! Let's help these candy orphans!  Hey kids!

line: It doesn't matter how you pretend to change. You've done enough already to get staked a thousand times over. You're monsters. You'll always be

line: Simon. Crud!

line: It's gross as butts, man. We’re taking care of this right now.

line: See ya larder!

line: Huh.

line: Well, seeing as sea lards are saltwater fish, and the pond is a freshwater environment… ...no? He’s a stenohaline fish. Haven’t you guys ever heard of osmoregulation? Allow me to explain.

line: Waaaa!

line: Oh, wait. We dropped our sea lard in the pond, and we’ve got to save it before it dies from the freshwater. He’s a stenohaline fish.

line: You are crazy. You are so crazy!

line: I don’t know. It kind of makes me feel… naked. ♫♪♪ La-la-la laaaard!♫♪♪

line: ♫♪♪A one-and a-two- I’d rather be anything but me, a leaf on a tree, a bug or a bee. I just want to see the sea, I want to be free from this body, this flower body.♫♪♪

line: Please don’t change. You’re perfect just the way you are.

line: ♫♪♪bum-bum-bum, little purple, you're a catch, I love your pretty purple sash. We're a perfect purple match, Welcome to my purple patch♫♪♪!

line: And then there was like, a PB puddle, a Marceline plant, and a little bee that looked like you, BMO! You know what? We didn't save the sea lard. The sea lard saved us.

line: You shouldn't creep us out from way over there!

line: Jake! That horse is whack with poo-brain.

name: Jake
line: Good night, buddy.

line: Ahh! It's in our house now!

line: That's obvious, Finn! You don't have to say that out loud!

line: Hey, this is all your fault, dude! If you weren't so darn handsome, animals wouldn't always be staring at you!

line: You're just mad at me for being...handsome? Well, you're the one who told me to lure snakes! Ahhh!

line: I told you to lure the horse! You lured the snakes! There's even one here in my underpants!  Wait a minute, dude. Can't you see what this horse is doing?  It's tearing us apart.

name: Jake
line: Tell us why you were spying!

line: NO!

line: Snakes!

name: Jake

line: Is that all the ice ya have?

name: Finn
line: Tell us why you're watchin' us or we'll - we'll cut off your stupid head.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Ice King
line: It's true! I would like to be happy like you guys. But, I have no idea how.

name: Jake
line: So, you dressed up like a horse?

name: Ice King
line: Have pity on me.  I've been so sad and miserable, I cry all the time. But, whenever I see you two, you always look so happy.

name: Ice King
line: But, they're just hopping over each other.

name: Ice King
line: So yes, I've decided to spy on you, dressed as a horse.

name: Ice King
line: But, I guess my plan failed. All I observed was you two arguing over...how to get rid of me.

name: Ice King
line: Hey, are you sleeping?  Is this it? Sleeping? Could it be that all I need is a good night's rest?

name: Ice King
line: Ahh... I'm... still not happy.

line: Wow, everything sucks here!

line: Hey, there's our guy!

name: Farmworld/Ice Finn
line: WOOHOO! HAHAHAHAHAHA!  Yeah, just hang out there for a while! I love it! I feel fresh, hahahahahaha!

line: Well, this is the weirdest thing I've ever done.

line: Oh yeah!

name: Jake

line: You're lucky I don't take you out, kid!  Quit crying baby!

line: PRRRIIIIIIISSSSSMM-

line: Oof!

name: Finn and Jake
line: OOOOOO!

name: Finn
line: TION!

name: Prismo
line: Thanks for responding to my call, guys! I'm in a serious pickle, and I mean the brown kind. I mean like a really smelly, brown pickle.

name: Jake
line: Don't sweat it, boy! Finn and I got yo' back!

name: Finn
line: Who's bullying you Prismo?!

name: Prismo
line: Nobody's bullying me. Look, um, remember when you wished the lich never existed and you created a new wish reality that ended up totally not working out?

name: Finn
line: No.

name: Jake
line: Vaguely, yes.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: You don't remember making that wish!

name: Finn
line: Wu-huh?

name: Jake
line: I thought I explained it to you that one time.

name: Prismo
line: Dude, I'll catch you up.  Look!  After you wished the lich never existed, you accidentally created an alternate wish reality where magic doesn't really exist.

name: Finn
line: Wait! . Who's that dude?

name: Prismo
line: That's you! But sort of less cool.

name: Finn
line: Uh-huh, proceed.

name: Prismo
line: So you find an old Marceline and the crown on the body of Ice King's skeleton who was smushed under the weight of a frozen mitogenic bomb. But then the destiny gang steals your family donkey, so you use the crown to become Ice Finn and save your donkey and your family. But, the crown makes you crazy, and you ice everything up like a dumb bozo, which sets off the mitogenic bomb, which releases the spirit of the lich anyway. But then, this reality's Jake made a counter wish which supposedly fixed the problem, but as it turned out, it didn't really.

name: Finn
line: Can I just say that I don't remember any of this stuff.

name: Prismo
line: Because technically it didn't happen to you. But, also it still happened, and that wish reality continues to exist.

name: Finn
line: Is this why all of a sudden one day I was better at the flute.

name: Jake
line: Oh yeah, I noticed that!

name: Prismo
line: Listen! Something, really bad, is about to go down.  Ice Finn is using his world's Enchiridion to build a portal to the multiverse. I literally do not know what will happen if he succeeds, but it could def's be catastrophic to the architecture of these realities. Now if that happens, my boss, let me repeat that, my BOSS will hold ME responsible, and by proxy, y'all both be in the dip too.

name: Finn
line: Why don't you just bloop bloop it all better?

name: Prismo
line: Something there is dampening my powers. I AM LOSING MY PICS OVER THIS BIZ!

name: Jake
line: His boss! Who's that?

name: Finn
line: Alright, man, what do we do?

name: Prismo
line: Take this, and use it to take care of the Ice Finn.

name: Finn
line: Oh, wait what do you mean by take care o-

line: Good luck guys we're all depending on you!

name: Finn
line: Woah.

name: Jake
line: What is it?

name: Finn
line: Oh golly!

name: Jake
line: What's that thing now?

name: Finn
line: It's like 50 bowling balls on my teen bod! Oh, check it! There's instructions.  The maid will handle all Class A interdimensional Bung-ups if you follow these simple steps direct the small end of the Maid towards your massive mistake . Focus your intention until all distractions leave your thought sphere . Then recite the words "A man needs a maid" three times. Alright . Here we go!  Help help help help help help help!

name: Jake
line: Lower it!

name: Finn
line: Ledge ledge ledge!  Ok! Focus my intention.

line: My intention to heal the madness of this other self.

line: Wait, wait, wait. I don't think that's what we're supposed to do. Prismo said take care of him.

line: Are you being stupid on purpose?

name: Finn Sword
line: That's me!

line: Mamamamamamama.

line: A man needs a maid .  A man... needs... a maid. A maaaaan , needs... a... . Nope! This is bull juice!
