name: Finn
line: We saved 'er, Billy.

name: Jake
line: You saved 'er.

name: Finn
line: I saved 'er, Billy. I saved 'er using violence. And that's not a bad thing, Billy! This old lady is alive because of these!  And look how happy she is, man! She's elated!

name: Billy
line: Hmm. Perhaps you're right.  It's... it's as if your words are filling a void in my very being... You wanna watch?  Nothung!  Finn and Jake... truly, you are my heroes.  Now you're freakin' me out...

name: Jake
line: We're his heroes!!

name: Billy
line: Huh... Hello.

name: Jake
line: Ha! Haha! I love you, Billy!!

name: Billy
line: Get outta here!!

name: Finn
line: Poor Finn Sword. I'm sorry, man.  Everything's broken.

name: BMO
line: No, it's not! It's still good. Five seconds rule.

name: Jake
line: I don't know what to do.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: This is hecka serious. Did you try making feel-better-waffles?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but he just keeps dropping them on the ground, and we're all like, "It's still good. Look."

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, yeah, five-second rule. Jake, I think it's time for you to activate plan C.

name: Jake
line: Plan C? Are you sure?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes. He's all jefferied up in the dome piece. We can't let it spread any further.

name: Jake
line: You're right.

name: Jake
line: Plan C, activate. Plan C, plan C,... Aha. Bingo. Hmm.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hello?

name: Jake
line: What's plan C, again? Something about music?

name: Finn
line: Poor Finn Sword. I'm sorry, man. What the heck is that? It's gonna distract me from my sword staring. Better track down the source and kill it.

name: Susan Strong
line: ♪I'm gonna fly, fly like an eagle. With the power of myself, constant pain. I'm gonna climb, every mountain. Get the dust off my shelf, ohh...♪ oh, hold on, hold on, can susan get more bass in the monitor?

name: Jake
line: You got it, Sooz. Oh, hey buddy.

name: BMO
line: We are going live in five!

name: Finn
line: What is this? A concert?

name: Jake
line: Even better. It's a "Battle of the Bands"!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And guess who the special celebrity guest judge is?

name: Finn
line: Donny?

name: Jake
line: No! You are!

name: Jake & Princess Bubblegum
line: It's working.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Good afternoon and welcome to plan C -- I mean, "Battle of the Bands". Now, let's all give a warm welcome to our celebrity guest judge!

name: Ice King
line: Hey, yo, my man, no photos.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Please welcome our first contestants to the stage, Emcee Neptr and Flame P.

name: Ice King
line: Huh? Wha-? Where am I? Gunter?

name: Ice King
line: Gunter?

name: Ice King
line: I don't think this is Gunter.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: It's me, Ice King.

name: Ice King
line: Lumpy Space Princess?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah.

name: Ice King
line: And you're doing this because you like me?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No, Ice King, listen. I'm gonna give you the straight dope.

name: Ice King
line: Okay.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You're weird and old and you kidnap princesses.

name: Ice King
line: I know!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: But I asked you here tonight because I wanna know what you think of this.

name: Ice King
line: "The Prince Who Wanted Everything; A Fionna and Cake Adventure"? Hey, why isn't my name on there?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I want you to read it because you're their dad. Please be their dad right now and bring them to life!

name: Ice King
line: Okay, might as well...at least until the cops show up. Ahem!

name: Ice King
line: Once upon a time, there was a most handsome prince, the future king of Lumpy Space, Lumpy Space Prince.

name: Lumpy Servants
line: Where do you want these gold-plated sandwiches your highness?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: By the window!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No!  That's not how I sound! Read it in a better voice!

name: Ice King
line: Okay, Okay! Yeesh!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: By the window!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: For from the window shall I shower the poor with presents, as is my altruistic nature. Haha!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Eat! Eat, my children!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: Son, come here at once!

name: Ice King
line: But, all was not perfect for this philanthropic prince of the people.

name: Ice King
line: His parents were slobbering monsters who didn't care that he was a beautiful prince! They wanted him to be a monster too.

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: Why aren't you working on your monster exercises?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: I don't want to be a monster.

name: Lumpy Space King
line: Eat these worms!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: No!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: You will eat them!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: I won't eat them!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: Sharpen your teeth!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: No!

name: Lumpy Space King
line: Eat these worms!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: Eat those worms and sharpen those teeth!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: No, no, no! I told you hundreds of times that I don't want to be a monster, and there's nothing you can do about it!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Where am I?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Who's there? Reveal yourself!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Hmm... Citizens of this realm, I am the one and only heir to the throne of the Lumpy Space Kingdom- I mean, I used to be. I rebelled against my parents, and now i'm a refugee.  What's that? You wish to help me? I am touched! Fetch me some clothes and I'll pay you handsomely, by petting you. First, I need freaky clothes! Cool freaky, not monster freaky. Oh yes, and something to read as well, something mind-blowing.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Oh wait! I also need servants! Recruit some locals, they work fine.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Hmm... Not bad! Well done, my child! Next!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Massenpsychologie und Ich-Analyse. That does sound mind-blowing!

name: Fionna
line: Yah! Aiyah! Aha!

name: Fionna
line: Cake, I'll save the captives, you take care of those animals!

name: Cake
line: Ya!

name: Cake
line: Ha! Dance you puppets!

name: Fionna
line: You're free to go people!

name: Flame Prince, Turtle Prince, Marshal Lee, and Prince Gumball
line: Woohoo!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Hey! Those were my servants!

name: Fionna
line: Hmm?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: What an innocent face!  It shines as if you have done no wrong! Do you like my freaky clothes?

name: Fionna
line: I don't care about your clothes!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hey! You're not supposed to read it like that. Say it in a nicer way!

name: Ice King
line: I...Uh...I don't-

name: Fionna
line: -care about you're clothes.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: You don't?  Finally, someone who's not impressed with my noble looks, but admire's what's inside of me!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Is this really happening? You're clothes are so raggedy and soiled! And yet, you use them as a napkin!  You care not about your personal appearance nor hygiene!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Dress me in the fashion of this peasant!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: I have much to learn from you, Fionna the Human.

name: Cake
line: How'd he know your name?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Hmm... Your movements are so free! My parents only want me to fly like a proper monster stiff and rigid, with a sharp toothed scowl permanently in place. But now, I see a new way to move.  Dance with me?

name: Cake
line: Y'all seeing those big floaty faces?

name: Fionna
line: Pretty!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Uh...No!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Release!

name: Fionna
line: Uh... What just happened?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: You were under my handsome spell for a moment. We can never marry, you know? I can only be with someone who is my equal in every way , a person so much like me that she doesn't even exist!

name: Fionna
line: I don't care, as long as we can hang out! Anyone want a sandwich?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Ooh! I'll have one!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: So rusty... So humble...

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Delightful!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Wait, where're your baby tables?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: What!?  You don't dip your foods in gold before eating?

name: Fionna
line: Who eats gold?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Great Glob! What is this? So charming! So quaint! So self-reliant!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: For years, I thought only of the needs of my people, but what about me? What do I need? This poorly made sandwich has enlightened me!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: What I want is to be like you, Fionna the peasant! And I'll need you as my pet, Cake the cat.

name: Cake
line: Yeah, whatever.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Huh?

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: Son!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Flee, noble Fionna, for it is my stupid parents! And they're fatter than ever!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: Silence!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Ahh! I'm just being honest!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Huh?

name: Fionna
line: Come on, you beautiful dandy! Only your pure spirit can defeat your evil family!

name: Fionna
line: And this sword!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: You're right, Fionna! This is my destiny!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: I do have the power!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Huh?

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Fionna!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: You must obey!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: My heart!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: Submit young one, become a true monster.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: No! It isn't right!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: Silence!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Urh, Fionna, This is the end for me. But at least I made you proud, didn't I?

name: Fionna
line: I don't care.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: My glob, Fionna! You've been telling be the answer all along!  The only way to defeat parental disapproval is not caring about anything! I don't care!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: I don't care!

name: Fionna
line: LSP!

name: Cake
line: Haha! Cake's helping!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: I don't care...

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: Thank you son! You freed us from adult mediocrity and fatuousness.

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: I don't care!

name: Lumpy Space Prince
line: Fionna, Cake. Both of you buy me dinner.

name: Fionna and Cake
line: Yes, your hotness!

name: Ice King
line: And then, Lumpy Space Prince became so real that he can actually break through into this plane of existence. Woah!  And meet his one true love, Lumpy Space Princess. It was really happening. The secret portal began to shake and tremble.

name: Ice King
line: The countdown began. 10, 9, 8, 7, 6, 5...

name: Finn
line: Hey, fart-face!!

name: Ice King
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: Unhand Princess Bubblegum!!

name: Ice King
line: Foolish interlopers! Zah!

name: Finn
line: Whoa!  Ah!

name: Ice King
line: Ee hee hee hee—OOH!  MY EYESIGHT!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Huh? Hee hee hee!

name: Finn
line: Hey, Ice King! I bet you'll never kiss the princess!

name: Ice King
line: I will kiss her! I will!  Hold still.  Mwah!

name: Finn
line: You just kissed Jake's butt!

name: Ice King
line: What?!  EEEEGH!!   The hour is yours, but the day shall be mine! Just like you, Princess—MINE!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What a patoot. Thanks for saving the day yet again, boys.

name: Finn
line: You're welcome, Princess.  Uh...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm gonna throw you two a party. Meet at the Candy Kingdom—TONIGHT!

name: Jake
line: That paper crane for Princess Bubblegum?

name: Finn
line: I just thought I'd bring 'er a gift... in return for throwing us this party.

name: Jake
line: Heh. I bet you wish you were my butt.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: I bet you wish you were my butt, because then the princess would... No, wait... I bet you wish you were the Ice King and the princess was my butt!

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Jake
line: Hmm...  OH! I bet you wish Bubblegum would kiss you, too! Like the Ice King and my butt! Hahahaha!

name: Finn
line: That's ridiculous!  Huh? Uggghhh!!  What's so funny?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hey, everybody. Finn and Jake are here.

name: Jake
line: Who's ready to party?!

name: Finn
line: What's everyone laughing at?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Shh!

name: Ricardio
line: Stand back, everyone. This style of massage is called, "Best Friend Massage."

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my gosh...

name: Ricardio
line: Because it can only be done for friends. It is completely consensual.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, holy cow...

name: Ricardio
line: Relax yourself now, Lumpy Space Princess... YAH!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh! I feel so great!

name: Finn
line: Who is that guy?

name: Ricardio
line: Hahaaa!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Greetings, party-goers! Glad you could all make it!

name: Finn
line: Princess Bubblegum!  Princess. I just wanted to thank you for—

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my gosh! PB, ya gotta check out this super cute guy. You're gonna love 'im.

name: Finn
line: Uhhh...

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: This is... Oh. Oh, my gosh. I don't even know your name.

name: Ricardio
line: Ricardio. Ricardio at your service. I've been waiting all evening to meet you, Princess.  Mwah!  I've heard you appreciate ancient technology. Have you ever used the balbaflonic laser to align the hybernotalist rift in the bubaflon plasmodial formation?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whoa! No, I haven't!  Wanna continue this conversation on the dance floor?

name: Ricardio
line: It would be my pleasure, Princess.

name: Finn
line: Why didn't the princess invite me to dance?

name: Jake
line: If you wanna dance, just go dance!

name: Finn
line: But now she's dancing with him! Ah... I feel... weird!

name: Jake
line: Huh, it sounds like you're dealing with some new emotions you don't understand... like jealousy.

name: Finn
line: BLAAAARGH!!

name: Jake
line: Look, man, just go out there and get down!

name: Ricardio
line: —transmordial layers completely independent of the babylons. Eh?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wow! That would mean that the babylons would fluctuate with the piranha-nanosphere!

name: Ricardio
line: Correct!

name: Finn
line: Agh!  They're talkin' about science, man! I can't compete with that!

name: Jake
line: Do the Science Dance! Remember it? It was sorta like this.  Wah unh we ah eeh...

name: Finn
line: You think that'll work?

name: Jake
line: Yeah! Probably.  Do it, man! You're a pro!

name: Finn
line: Science Dance! Science Dance!

name: Ricardio
line: —lower proximities to—

name: Finn
line: Science Dance! Hey, eh, Princess! You wanna spend some time with me?

name: Ricardio
line: Excuse me, Princess. You must excuse me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, uh... Alright!  Finn, what the cabbage? I was learning about Zanoits!

name: Finn
line: Oh... I'm... into Zanoits! Th-They're the best!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Zanoits kill hundreds of thousands of Plantoids a year.

name: Finn
line: Oh, no, not the Plantoids!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Plantoids produce mellotoxin!  Mellotoxin kills Zanoits!!

name: Finn
line: ...So are Zanoits... good things?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You're totally jealous of Ricardio.

name: Finn
line: No, I'm not. I just don't like the way he talks to you. It makes me feel weird.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's jealousy, hun.

name: Finn
line: I'm not jealous! I'M WEIRD!!!

name: Jake
line: Woof! Man... This is goin' bad. Hey, Finn. You gotta come help me slay these peanut monsters at the bar. It can't wait.  Wow, man, what happened out there?

name: Finn
line: Agh... I don't know! I was tryin' to warn 'er, but she twisted my words around and—

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Ladies are twisty, man. Bubblegum's super smart, too.

name: Finn
line: I know! And I can't shake this weird feeling about Ricardio. I think he's... a villain.

name: Jake
line: Why? Is it because his face is so foldy and dramatic?

name: Finn
line: No! I can just feel it in my gut! He's up to something sinister!

name: Jake
line: Maybe what you feel is romantic rivalry.

name: Finn
line: I'll prove he's a villain!

name: Jake
line: How?

name: Finn
line: Stakeout.

name: Finn
line: Here he comes!  They're talking!

name: Jake
line: Lemme see.  I can read their lips.  "Hey, shorty, you should pick your boogers and then fart!"  "You look kind of like a big pink baguette!"

name: Finn
line: Get serious, Jake!! This is life and death!

name: Jake
line: Is it? Don't get me wrong. I'm all about stakeouts and spying on this guy, but what if he's not a villain? What if he just looks wicked? Some people look wicked but are super nice.

name: Finn
line: I gotta trust my gut!

name: Jake
line: Hmm.

name: Finn
line: He's on the move! Let's roll!  I see 'im. He's holding rope and going into the trash. He's smashing bottles—and pretending to stab someone!

name: Jake
line: So... he's recycling... or what?

name: Finn
line: I think your gut's a little naive, Jake.  Holy moly! He's... he's with the Ice King! They're shouting something!  Ricardio is tossing him in the dumpster and running away!

name: Jake
line: So I was right! He is a good guy who's just cursed to look suspicious!  You and me, gut! Together forever! Solvin' crimes and makin' up rhymes!

name: Finn
line: No way. This proves he's a super-villain! More powerful than lesser villains like the Ice King!

name: Finn
line: Then it's settled! We're gonna confront Ricardio face-to-face and prove he's evil!

name: Jake
line: Or good!

name: Ricardio
line: Oof!

name: Finn
line: So what're you doin', Ricardio? Are you evil?

name: Jake
line: Or nice with an evil face?

name: Ricardio
line: That's none of your business.

name: Finn
line: The safety of Princess Bubblegum is my business!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, we just wanna know if you're evil or not.

name: Ricardio
line: Oh, yeah?

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Ricardio
line: Oh, yeah?

name: Jake
line: Yeah.  Yes!

name: Finn
line: You stay away from Princess Bubblegum with all that stuff!

name: Ricardio
line: Now that my plan is nearly complete, there is no way you could stop me.

name: Finn
line: I could stop you if I wanted!

name: Ricardio
line: Oh, yeah?

name: Finn
line: Yeah!

name: Ricardio
line: Oh, yeah??

name: Finn
line: YEEEAAAH!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What's going on here?

name: Finn
line: Princess?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ricardio?!

name: Ricardio
line: Yes... I'm alright, Princess.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn... why'd you do it?

name: Finn
line: He was gonna hurt you with those ropes and bottles!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: These were for our balbaflonic laser.

name: Ricardio
line: It's not all his fault, Princess. I might've looked a little threatening.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn... you shouldn't punch brainiacs. You know how fragile they are! You gotta stop this jealous business.

name: Finn
line: But...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: C'mon, Ricardio. I'll patch you up and give you candy.

name: Finn
line: She hates me now. I was totally wrong about Ricardio.

name: Ice King
line: No, Finn!  You were not wrong. He is evil!

name: Finn
line: Ice King! What do you know about this? Tell me or I'll do something!

name: Jake
line: Hold up, Finn! The Ice King looks sorta damaged!

name: Finn
line: I don't care! I only care about Ricardio!

name: Ice King
line: But my enervated condition has everything to do with him.  I was trying to cast a spell that would give me total control of Princess Bubblegum's heart! ...But I messed it all up... and lost control of mine.  He planned to rip out Princess Bubblegum's heart... to make it his bride.  Without my heart, I grew weak.  But I made my way to the Candy Kingdom to look for him. In an alleyway, I begged him to  return to me and leave the princess alone.  But he threw me in the dumpster and left me for dead.  Stop Ricardio!

name: Finn
line: Agh! Come on, Jake!  Gotta save the princess!

name: Jake
line: Princess Bubblegum!!

name: Finn
line: Princess!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn!! Jake!!

name: Ricardio
line: You were right all along, Finn! Now I'm going to cut out Princess Bubblegum's heart and make out with it!

name: Finn
line: Not if I can help it!

name: Ricardio
line: One step closer and I'll remove her heart!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn! I feel like a big idiot for doubting you! He was just so engaging! ...But his knowledge on plantoids is actually pretty weak.

name: Ricardio
line: Shut your mouth up, Princess!  I'm gonna smooch that heart!! It will be my bride!!

name: Finn
line: Why don't you marry someone your own size?! Like my foot?!

name: Ricardio
line: Huh?!

name: Finn
line: And my fist?!

name: Ice King
line: Stop! Stop it! That's my heart, you piece of—

name: Finn
line: Ice King.  Should we... let 'im take his heart back? He is... villainous...

name: Jake
line: I don't wanna watch an old man die on Princess Bubblegum's carpet, man.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, yeah...

name: Ricardio
line: Wait! Wait! No!

name: Ice King
line: Come to daddy...

name: Ricardio
line: Noooooooooo!

name: Ice King
line: Yeah, there you go...  Like that? Huh?

name: Ricardio
line: Seeee you guys laterrrr...

name: Ice King
line: I feel wonderful! Hahaha! And now that I've saved the Princess, she'll marry me and live in my dungeon every day!

name: Finn
line: No, she won't!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, no, I won't!

name: Ice King
line: Yes you WILL!  Well... maybe not today... or tomorrow... but another day! Another—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks again for saving me... again.

name: Finn
line: Don't mention it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Now that Ricardio's gone, you don't have to be jealous of anyone anymore.

name: Finn
line: I never get jealous.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Kiss me, Finn.  Ahem.  I mean... kiss me, Finn.  Am I doing it right, Jake?

name: Finn
line: NOOOOOOOO!!!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: OH MY GLOB!

name: Viola
line: Time is a slippery devil. Our lives are sudden. They come and go like like a Summer Shower.

name: Finn
line: Whew. A goblet of sparkling apple juice for milady.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks, Finn. Hey where'd you get this goblet?

name: Finn
line: Oh, uh, I think we won it in a fight with an octopus we were fighting in, like, a sea cave full of treasure?

name: Jake
line: No. It was from when BMO was playing dress-up.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It reminds me of a cup my uncle used to have.

name: Finn
line: You mean your Uncle Gumbald, right?

name: Jake
line: Do tell. You never talk about your family.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I don't know. Families are tricky. You guys know what I mean, right?  We have to go back a ways Like 800 years ago.

name: Goblin
line: Help! Help me! Oh, goodness me. Someone please help me. I'm a defenseless little goblin surrounded by all this loot. Boo-hoo.

name: Young Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, you poor thing, here. Have a drink to ease your nerves while I untie you.

name: Goblin
line: Pfft! Aah! The time for faking is over now. Give me all your stuff.

name: Goblin
line: What? You brought a peashooter to a techno-harpoon fight?!  Aah!   Aah-aah-aaah!

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Another close call today, Neddy.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Neddy, you sweet chicken.  It was a lot different back in the Mother Gum. We all had each other's backs. I'm going to make more of us, Neddy. I know you don't care, and that's fine. But I need to be around people like me.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: O-kay! This is it, Neddy. We're getting relatives!

name: Young Bubblegum
line: It worked! Your name is Aunt Lolly!

name: Lolly
line: A pleasure to meet you, dear.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: And you're Cousin Chicle. You're a full 2.3 meters tall.

name: Cousin Chicle
line: Naturally I am a gentleman of high standing.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Oh, Cousin Chicle. And finally Uncle Gumbald! This is your favorite mug.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Ah, yes.  I'm your GREAT uncle. The mug proclaims it so.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Aren't they great, Neddy? You'll be my protectors, my advisers, my family.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: I'm heading out, Neddy.  What? What? What?!

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Morning, small niece.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Uncle Gumbald, the taffy trees are gone!

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: I know. I chopped 'em down last night.  Yesterday, I realized these trees were not being utilized to their full potential, so I elected to build this cabin. This is but the first step in building my glorious new candy city. I've already drawn up the plans for it. All of this will be apartments. And did you notice the family crest I designed? It's a "G" for, uh "Gum".

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Why does it look like your head?

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: You're such a curious little girl. We're a lifestyle brand now.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Success! Now instead of worrying about his dumb city, Uncle can come here to picnic, swim, and, uh fish!

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Welcome to life, Candyfish.

name: Candy Fish
line: I can't breathe air!

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Bonnie! What have you done to my building site?

name: Young Bubblegum
line: I made us a butterscotch lake and a fish to live in it.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: But that's where the gift shop was gonna go.Now it's just gonna be volleyballs, water skis, and shrimp cocktails.

name: Candy Fish
line: Sounds nice.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Did you say you "made" this creature?

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Come on. You'll appreciate him more once you watch him swim around.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Bonnibel you've micromanaged me for the last time.  Huh? Hmm. I think it's time for Bonnie to be re-branded.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Niece, now that I've had to stare at it for weeks, I've got to admit that your lake was a very good idea.

name: Lolly
line: Ja! Sehr gut!

name: Chicle
line: Very wunderbar.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Oh, I'm so happy.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: We got you a gift to say thanks. It's right outside, Prinzessin.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: You got me a car?

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Yes, a car. But also a boyfriend!

name: Mr. Cream Puff
line: Hi, babe.Beep beep!

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Wait, what?

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: All right, you nut. Have fun on your date.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Date?!

name: Mr. Cream Puff
line: Let's go, babe. Beep beep!

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: What a naive little child.

name: Mr. Cream Puff
line: Date's over, babe. Pick you up tomorrow to get matching tattoos.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: I'm back from that terrible date. Hello?

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Thank you for coming to the mandatory optimization meeting. Tonight, we address the "Bonnie problem".

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Bonnie problem?

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Our future city is on course to be a rousing success, barring only one obstacle Our complete lack of competent leadership.

name: Both Uncle Gumbald And Aunt Lolly together
line: Oh, Cousin Chicle! Oh, Cousin Chicle!

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Dang, Chicle, that's cold.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: I have formulated a happy juice that will render her as docile and simple-minded as her cutie BF, young Mr.Creampuff.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: All we have to do is sprinkle some of this on her breakfast, and we'll be in charge.Let us celebrate with coup d'etat cupcakes.

name: Chicle
line: Poisoned cakes.

name: Crunchy
line: Where am I?

name: Lolly
line: Oh, right, the poison.

name: Manfried
line: I don't know what's happening! Whee! Whee! Whee! Whee!

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: Ah! My first candy employees.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: What have you done? This isn't what I made you to be.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: No, you wanted us to be lowly pet fish, swimming in your narcissistic pond. But I am your equal!

name: Young Bubblegum
line: You're not like me. You're bad.

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: I am the future. Come on, Bonnie. Don't run away from happiness. I'm going to fix you. And then, I'm going to fix that sniveling gumwad, Neddy.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Don't touch my brother!

name: Uncle Gumbald
line: A pea-shooter?  The juice! Nooooo!

name: Punch Bowl
line: Hey! Where's the party?

name: Young Bubblegum
line: What a mess. But they do seem happier now So unburdened and pliable. You, the crunchy ball, dance for me.

name: Crunchy
line: Sure.  Come on, lady. Do the crunchy dance.

name: Young Bubblegum
line: Oh, Crunchy. Sure, I'll dance with my candy people.

name: Crunchy
line: Yay for the lady!

name: Young Princess Bubblegum
line: Call me Princess.

name: Everybody
line: Hurrah!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, for real?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Like I said, families are tricky.  BMO! Where did you get this cup?

name: BMO
line: From that guy! The guy on the cup! The guy who's face is on the cup! That guy!

name: Gunther
line: Stop, demon! Get back here, I say! Ha ha, nowhere to run. I, the great and powerful Urgence Evergreen, command you to freeze into a million pieces and leave young Gunther alone!

name: Gunther
line: Foolish demon, you leave me no choice. Zap, zap zap zap zap! What?

name: Gunther
line: No, Nina! You're supposed to be frozen. Nina!

name: Gunther
line: Nina, the portals! The Elementals are gathering! C'mon, you blockhead!

name: Chatsberry
line: I just think we should discuss this, Evergreen.

name: Evergreen
line: "Discuss"?! Are you listening, Chatsberry? Once this comet hits, everybody dies. Not just everybody, but us, but us!

name: Balthus
line: Now, now, hold on, Evergreen. Hath not a comet impacted our world every thousand years with no lasting grievousness?

name: Evergreen
line: Ahh, but this, Balthus, is no ordinary comet. Behold!

name: Evergreen
line: See how it writhes? It aches for our extinction. It—!

name: Chatsberry
line: But Evergreen, even if the comet is as dangerous as you say, what can we possibly do?

name: Evergreen
line: We build a crown.

name: Chatsberry
line: "A crown"?

name: Evergreen
line: Like none seen before, or ever after! A magical crown whose phantasmal circuitry will bond to its first bearer and grant him his one deepest wish...  to destroy the hideous comet which threatens our world! The good news is I already built the crown. The bad news it needs a power source.  The enchanted Ruby Eyes of the ancient lava dog, Magwood! And that's where you come in.

name: Chatsberry
line: Wait, wait! Evergreen, please. Wish Magic is really the real deal! This wish may see things in you you cannot see yourself. Can you truly say you know your heart's truest desire?

name: Balthus
line: I'm with Chatsberry. If this comet hits, we four indeed may perish. But the Elements we embody — Fire, Ice, Candy, and Slime — will live on! But a misplaced wish could cause irreversible damage to the very structure of existence!

name: Evergreen
line: Well, that's just great. What about you, Slimy D?

name: Slimy D
line: Yo, yo. My name's Slimy D, and I'm here to—

name: Balthus
line: Slimy D stands with us.

name: Chatsberry
line: We reject your plan, Urgence Evergreen!

name: Evergreen
line: Very well then. You leave me no choice.

name: Chatsberry
line: Urgence! Stop! You'll doom us... all!

name: Evergreen
line: Ingrate! Hmm! Doom you to no doom, maybe!  Gunther!  Pack my things, Gunther. We ride forth with Mount Magwood. You get to watch me save the world!  Gunther!  Come on, Gunther. Get your head in the game.

name: Gunther
line: Sorry, Master Evergreen.

name: Evergreen
line: And he expects me to teach him the ways of magic? As if.

name: Gunther
line: Ouch! Oof! OUCH! Uh, Master Evergreen? Can I ride on the palanquin with you? My feet are soft.  No, you're right. Ooh, boy...

name: Gunther
line: Gettin' fat.  Gettin' fat, right?

name: Evergreen
line: Hmm.

name: Gunther
line: However, I would suggest this is still a nice night. It's quiet.

name: Evergreen
line: Hmm, it is quiet. Why don't you put on some music? The chimes, Gunther.

name: Gunther
line: Okay.

name: Evergreen
line: Gunther! I said "chimes"! Gunther, no!

name: Gunther
line: Sorry, Master, I'll put him back.

name: Ice Imp
line: Heeeeey! Mmm, what?

name: Evergreen
line: Oh, never mind.  Here, take the jar and find me some water. There's not enough moisture in the air for me to make an ice camp.

name: Gunther
line: Uh, Master? I'm sorry, I don't think I've seen any water at all today.

name: Evergreen
line: Just do it. Don't anger Daddy.

name: Gunther
line: Wait, are you my father?

name: Evergreen
line: No, but I stole your egg and mutated your brain—get going!

name: Gunther
line: Hmm.

name: Gunther
line: Heh, you don't know where you're going, do you, girl?  Ah, you're good at this.  Man, you know who I like? Master Evergreen. He can do anything; one thing he's gonna do—he said he's gonna teach me magic. I can be like him!

name: Gunther
line: Nina, no!

name: Gunther
line: Master Evergreen, I found the water so you could build a—oh,  I guess he also found water, too.

name: Ice Imp
line: Heeeeey?!

name: Evergreen
line: Now, Gunther, listen to me. Don't follow me into Magwood's lair or else he'll melt your dome!

name: Gunther
line: Yeah...

name: Evergreen
line: Oh, Gunther! You should see this!

name: Gunther
line: Okay!

name: Evergreen
line: Gunther, no! You failed; he'll melt your dome.

name: Evergreen
line: Not as grand as you once were, eh?

name: Gunther
line: Master Evergreen, I'm sorry, but I got worried. Yeeeee!!

name: Gunther
line: Ah! Oh, boy! Uh, maybe maybe maybe, maybe I can do magic!  Like Master Evergreen. Bah! Ice! Flah, sorry...

name: Gunther
line: Shh!

name: Ice Imp
line: That's what you get!  Heeeey....

name: Evergreen
line: Ice!

name: Evergreen
line: This is why I don't teach you magic.

name: Gunther
line: Niiina, Hiiina, Iiiina, Fiiina—

name: Evergreen
line: Gunther! The heck are you doing?! Get in here, Gunther! Oh, there you are, you blockhead. Quickly, take your position. We have precious little time. Once I complete the bonding chant, you deactivate the force field.  Bonding, bonding, three two one, you can do it, you can do it, three two one, bonding bonding. I did it! I—  Come on, now, what did I ever do to you?!  Watch the columns, stupid! Whoops!  Easy now...  Oh, wow, did you see that?!  Ow, my bread balls!

name: Evergreen
line: Gunther?! Gunther, can you hear me?!

name: Gunther
line: Yeah—yes, Master Evergreen!

name: Evergreen
line: Okay, good. Now, aiming at the sound of my voice, throw the crown so it lands right on the top of my head.

name: Gunther
line: I—wait, what?

name: Evergreen
line: No, no, there's no time! It must be you, Gunther!

name: Gunther
line: Me?

name: Evergreen
line: Don't worry, it's easy. Even a mush-head like you couldn't donk it up too bad. Just focus on your deepest truest wish, the destruction of the deadly comet, and the rest will take care of itself.

name: Gunther
line: My deepest truest wish...  Gunther, no! Gunther, no! Gunther, no!

name: Evergreen
line: Gunther? Buddy? What are you wishing for down there?  Gunther... no... That's the wrong wish! You've got to snap out of it! Use a concentration spell or, or a basic focusing charm—like I taught you... I mean, like I meant to teach you... I--

name: Gunther
line: Gunther, no! Gunther, no! Gunther, no! Gunther, no! Gunther, no! Gunther, no!

name: Ice King
line: Gunther, no! Gunther, no! Gunther, no! Gunther, noooooo! . Mornin'. Man, what a dream. Do you guys ever have the dino-boy dream with the astero-- what? What... what is it?  Something in my teeth? Something in my hair? Something in my nose? Something in my ear?

name: Cookie
line: Donkin' Princess...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, okay. How about I give you a big cowboy hat? Then will you let the hostages go?

name: Cookie
line: No... no!  Don't play games with me, Princess. I want that crown. No crown, no hostages.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, obviously that's going to be a problem, because I'm the princess and I need my crown. So...

name: Cookie
line: No, Princess! You are problem—the problem princess!  Just gimme that crown!

name: Jake
line: Why does he want your crown anyway, Princess?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, what's his beef?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I don't know, guys—he's crazy. He's left me no choice. I'm sending in the banana guards. It's about to turn crazy nasty.  Hello. Captain Banana Guard?

name: Jake
line: Wait a second, Princess. Why don't me and Finn just sneak in there incognito and neutralize the threat, old-fashioned spy guy-style?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm. Okay, but if you guys aren't out of there by  400, I'm sending in the guards.

name: Jake
line: Okay, I was thinkin' I could  dress up like a mailman.

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Yeah, and I could wear all black and I could be like, you know, like, your shadow.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm. I can't really see that working.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, the shadow thing might be pushin' it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, no-no-no, that part's fine. I was talking about you dressing up like a mailman.

name: Jake
line: What? But I always wanted to be a mailman.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Nah, you don't look like a mailman. You look like a milkman. Let's get you a proper milkman outfit.

name: Jake
line: You ready?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Let's bust it.

name: Jake
line: Hello.

name: Cookie
line: "Hello"?! Who the heck are you?  I'm gonna smash your face.

name: Jake
line: Uhh, milkman, sir. I brought the milk—for the hostages, sir.

name: Cookie
line: Huh? Oh. I thought maybe you were a spy guy or somethin'. Go ahead, give everyone some milk, then get the math outta here.

name: Jake
line: Yes, sir.  Milk, sir?

name: Marshmallow
line: Thanks.

name: Jake
line: Milk?

name: Candy Person #103
line: Thanks.

name: Jake
line: Milk?

name: Marc
line: Thank you.

name: Jake
line: Some milk?

name: Finn
line: Psst! Get ready, Jake. When we get to the cookie, you throw some milk in his face and yell, "Alvin's hot juice box. Alvin's hot juice box." He'll be really confused, and that's when we grab him and tie him up-style.

name: Chipper
line: Come in, Cookie. This is Chipper. Over.

name: Cookie
line: Go ahead, Chipper. Over.

name: Chipper
line: I'm too short to lock the back door. Over.

name: Cookie
line: Hold tight, Chipper. Chipler's on his way.  You got that, Chipler?

name: Chipler
line: Affirmative.

name: Jake
line: Did you hear that?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Change of plans—I'll go take care of those chips. You keep the cookie distracted.

name: Jake
line: Yeah. I can do that.

name: Finn
line: Okay, awesome.

name: Jake
line: Milk? Milk?  Milk?  Some milk?

name: Cookie
line: What? Oh. Look, you should probably split, buddy. Things are about to get pretty flipped out in here.

name: Jake
line: Oh, sure. Sorry, man. I was just trying to get away from that rotten Princess Bubblegum for a while, y'know? Isn't she just the worst?

name: Cookie
line: Wait, you hate Princess Bubblegum, too? Get outta here!

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah, man, she's the worst. Sittin' out there all safe and cozy while I'm riskin' my life tootin' around in here in this stupid milkman costume.

name: Cookie
line: Wait—costume?!

name: Jake
line: Oh, um... I just mean it feels like a costume... 'cause I wanted to be a mailman so bad, ya see? But the princess—she made me be a milkman anyway.

name: Cookie
line: Boy, I hear ya, brother.

name: Chipolina
line: Cookie, you there? Over.

name: Cookie
line: Yeah. Go ahead, Chipolina. Over.

name: Chipolina
line: I just saw a light go on in the stock room—probably nothing. I'll check it out. Over.

name: Cookie
line: Okay. Over.

name: Chipolina
line: Hmm.   Looks like a false alarm, Cookie. It's just some kid's Baby Snuggleghost nightlight. Hee-yah!

name: Finn
line: Alvin's hot juice box! Alvin's hot juice—

name: Jake
line: So what's your story, man? How'd she doodie on you?

name: Cookie
line: I was just a kid, man, just a little kid, when I got doodied on.

name: Cookie
line: I was the new guy at the Candy Orphanage. They called me Baby Snaps. I tried to make friends with the other kids...

name: Baby Snaps
line: C'mon, guys, let's dance it up!

name: Cookie
line: They were always too depressed to play.

name: Candy Child
line: No, no. We're too depressed.

name: Cookie
line: Things went on like that for a while, then... one day...  she showed up.  Everything was different.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: ...a thunderous cheer  as Baby Whoozlefut...

name: Cookie
line: Everything was-was better with her around. And something inside me changed that day, too. And then later she told me I could be anything I wanted.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Anything your sweet heart desires!

name: Cookie
line: And I told her I wanted to be a princess like her, so I could make all the children happy.

name: Baby Snaps
line: I wanna be a princess like you!

name: Cookie
line: And she laughed in my face, man! It really messed me up.

name: Jake
line: Holy shmow, man. That's terrible. That's really terrible. Listen, I—

name: Cookie
line: She LIED to me!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but, maybe she didn't realize how much it meant to you.

name: Cookie
line: No, she just wants to hog all the princessin' for herself!  All chips, report in. It's time to get real! Over.  Chips. Chips. Over.  Chips! Where are my chips?! Chipolina! Chipler! Chipton! Chipper! Is anyone there?! Chipface? Something happened to my chips!  AAAAH!  I'm about to flip out, man... and take that crown!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, whoa, wait! It doesn't have to be like this! You don't need that crown. You could start over, man. You can start a new kingdom—your own kingdom... where everyone can be whatever they wanna be. I can be the mailman... and you? You can be the princess. And—

name: Cookie
line: My own kingdom?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man.

name: Cookie
line: I... I'd like that.

name: Jake
line: Okay, then. Just sit tight, Princess. I'll get us outta here.  Hey! Hey! I'm comin' out!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Jake? Jake, what's going on? Where's Finn? Where are the hostages?

name: Jake
line: Don't worry, Princess. It's okay now. Princess Cookie's gonna go away. You just gotta give him a horse to escape with and he'll go.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Right... and then you and Finn hunt him down and put him in the dungeon.

name: Jake
line: No, wait. He said he'd go away forever. Can't we just let him go?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No. That cookie is a menace. Once the hostages are safe, Cookie goes in my dungeon—in my dungeon for his life.

name: Cookie
line: Oh, boy! Would ya look at that?

name: Cookie
line: Dang!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, well... she's all yours!

name: Cookie
line: Hot diggity!

name: Jake
line: Ah-ah-ah! Man, that horse ain't no good; that's a trap horse.

name: Cookie
line: What are we gonna do?

name: Jake
line: It's okay, man, I'm Jake. J-J-J-Jingo Jango!

name: Cookie
line: Whoa! Ha HA! You're magic!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: After them!

name: Cookie
line: We're really doing it!

name: Finn
line: Jake! What are you doing?! What happened to the plan?

name: Jake
line: New plan—I'm gonna help Princess Cookie escape.

name: Finn
line: What? But-but he's a criminal!

name: Jake
line: No, man, Princess Cookie's a good guy. He just got dealt a bad hand. He's only trying to be what following how his dreams make you want to be, man!

name: Finn
line: Whaaaat?

name: Jake
line: You're either with us or against us.

name: Finn
line: Um... 'gainst?  WAAAH! Oof.

name: Jake
line: Hold on tight, Cookie! I'm gonna jump the gorge!

name: Cookie
line: No, Jake. Stop the horse.

name: Jake
line: I can make it!

name: Jake
line: Princess Cookie! Are you all right?

name: Cookie
line: I'm done for, Jake.

name: Jake
line: No, everything's gonna be fine. I won't let them put you in the dungeon. Just let me talk to them.

name: Cookie
line: No, Jake.

name: Cookie
line: Thank you for your help, but it's too late for me.

name: Cookie
line: I'll never be a princess. At least for a moment, you helped me feel like a princess. It was wonderful.  Thank you, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Careful, Princess!

name: Cookie
line: You know what? It's funny, but you sort of remind me of a mailman I used to know.

name: Jake
line: I do?

name: Cookie
line: Yep.

name: Jake
line: Princess!

name: Cookie
line: I glubbed up!

name: Cookie
line: Knight to E-5.

name: Jake
line: Where's Baby Snaps?

name: Jake
line: Excuse, me! Your highness!

name: Cookie
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Oh, hey. Check it out!  Special delivery from the Grass Kingdom!

name: Various Patients
line: He's a princess? I had no idea. Royalty!

name: Cuber
line: Hmm? Oh! Hello there! Bayble navel! It’s great to see you! Here for more graybles, I reckon. Well, alright. Just like last time.  We’ll watch five separate stories, each relating to one special theme.  Guess the theme by the end of the episode and you’ll be the freshest mint-whistle!  Now, look to my visualizer screen and let this exciting grayble dribble all over your mind-label!

name: Jake
line: Okay, so- scooch! Okay so I’m still pretty sure this old book is some warlock spell book or something .

name: Finn
line: Messed.

name: Jake
line: Warlocks, dude!  You ready for some ancient feel good spell craft?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I’ll try it. Could always stand to feel better.

name: Jake
line: Leeeeet’s seeeee. You got your bibby?

name: Finn
line: Check it!

name: Jake
line: Yup!

name: Jake
line: I don’t feel like a good boy.

name: Finn
line: You sure you read that spell right?

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Still though. Pretty sweet.

name: Finn
line: Wanna keep stickin’ our thumbs in stuff ‘til it works?

name: Jake
line: Yeah!

name: Jake
line: Ooooh! What-a-good-boy-am-I!

name: Finn
line: Ooooh! What-a-good-boy-am-I!

name: Jake
line: Ooooh! What-a-good-boy-am-I!

name: Finn
line: Ooooh! What-a-good-boy-am-I!

name: Jake
line: Ooooh! What-a-good-boy-am-I!

name: Finn
line: Ooooh! What-a-good-boy-am-I!

name: Jake
line: Ooooh! What-a-good-boy-am-I!

name: Finn
line: Ooooh! What-a-good-boy-a— Do you feel like a good boy?

name: Jake
line: No, I don’t.

name: Finn
line: Hey check out that gross toad!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Oh-what-a-good-boy-am-I. Good boy, good boy, good boy, good boy, good boy.

name: Toad
line: Gross! Ahahah! Cut it out! Quit stickin’ your thumbs in my back! Ahhhh!

name: Marceline
line: Yeeeaaah, I don’t know.  Uhhhhh, jeez! I’m never gonna find this place! Hmmm.  Hey!  Hey! Hey rock giant!  You seem cool! Do you know where wizard Bill’s music shop is? I can’t find it anywhere! He’s got a guitar that plays the most savory licks in Ooo!

name: Wizard Bill
line: Whaglgalgaw!

name: Marceline
line: Huuuuh. I’ve got an idea.  Okaaay, point now.  Wahahahoh yeah! Woowhohaha!  Thanks man!

name: Jake
line: Let’s find some more holes.

name: Tree Trunks
line: La da da la da da mmm deedle dee...

name: Finn and Jake
line: What-a-good-boy-am-I!

line: Oh! He he! Boys. Your manners.  Oh! Whoops! Oh!

name: Shelby
line: Hey, Tree Trunks!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Excuse me sir. I wasn’t looking where I was-

name: Shelby
line: Tree Trunks! Up here!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh no! Heavens no!

name: Banana Guard
line: I’m glad you brought this matter to the authorities mam. Now what exactly happened?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Yes thank you. I-I heard a man calling out to me “Oh Tree Trunks!” So I said who’s calling? I don’t know. So I looked and he was making a RUDE gesture.  It left a sour taste in my mouth!

name: Banana Guard
line: Alright, ma'am.  Let’s see. How do you spell your name?

name: Banana Guard
line: Okay.

name: Banana Guard
line: Okay.

name: Banana Guard
line: Okay.

line: Hold on oone second.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Uggh! I’m sorry, but the wheels of justice spin too slowly!  I’m going to have to take the law into my own hands!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Thank you all for coming! The police have failed me in my time of need! So I’ve brought you here together. A posse!  I made you all blackjacks  in case things get…uuugly. I stuffed some of my stockings with balled up newspapers. I made a big one for you, because you’re so strong.  Alright then!  Let’s clean up these streets!  Oh there he is! Oh my goodness!

name: Gumdrop Lasses
line: Weeeee!

name: Tree Trunks

name: Key-per
line: Greetings, young heroes to be. This mountain is called Cragdor. Its purpose is two-fold To protect the Enchiridion and to test the hearts of those who seek to possess it. Many noble challengers have entered the temple to pass the grueling trials that lie behind these walls, but no one has ever left here alive or dead! Only the truest most worthy hero can receive the heroes' Enchiridion and walk out these doors again! If it is you, friend,  and I cannot say that I am certain, but you are verily welcome to try; However, first you must pass my riddle. My name is Key-per, and duly so, for I carry the key to this door, but all is not how it appears, you see. Or perhaps you do not see at all.  Perhaps the key is in you, child, but you cannot use your brawn here. The door is magically sealed.

line: Hey! Back off, you gnomes! That kid just saved you guys! You should thank him, not destroy old ladies! Do you even know what I'm talking about? Say thank you! Say... Thank... You.

name: Red Gnome
line: Kill him!

name: Jake
line: Get back in there!

name: Jake
line: Hey, Finn. You okay?

name: Finn
line: No way, dude. Those old ladies are destroyed because of me. I'm not righteous. I'm wrongteous. Stupidteous.

name: Jake
line: Awww. Don't let those gnomes and their illusions get you down. They're just gnomes and illusions.

name: Finn
line: Illusions?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man. Think. What would regular, old, sweet ladies be doing wandering the hills of Mount Cragdor?

name: Finn
line: Maybe they're lost?

name: Jake
line: No way. This place is designed to mess you up. To mess with your head. None of this is real. It's all just trials to test your heroic attributes.

name: Finn
line: Hmmm... Hmmm!

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: Yeah! You're the smartest dog I know, man.

name: Finn
line: Jake? Jaaaaaaaake!

name: Ogre

name: Finn
line: Gimme back my friend!

name: Ogre
line: No!

name: Jake
line: It's ok, Finn! I can get out!

name: Finn
line: Let Jake go, or I'll...  I'll kick your foot!

name: Ogre

name: Jake
line: Don't worry, dude! I found another way—oof!

name: Finn
line: Huh?  I'm coming, buddy!

name: Ogre

name: Finn
line: I got your wallet, man!

name: Ogre

name: Finn
line: Give me back my friend!

name: Ogre

name: Ogre
line: Oof!

name: Jake
line: Whoa. Whoa. Whoa. Whoa-oa!

name: Finn
line: Jake!  You're okay!

name: Jake
line: Stomachs are weird.

name: Jake
line: Dude! You just flew us all the way to the top! Wait a minute.  I can smell the book right through this door.

name: Ogre
line: You're under arrest for stealing my dollar!

name: Finn
line: Just a minute, Jake.

name: Ogre
line: Hey!

name: Jake
line: You know what that was? That was righteous.

name: Finn
line: Thanks, Jake. Now sniff out that book for me.

name: Jake
line: You got it!

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Dark Magician
line: Congratulations, Finn the human. You must be truly righteous to have made it this far.

name: Finn
line: Thank you.

name: Dark Magician
line: Now! Enter my brain-world, and I will show you some aspect of yourself that you're not entirely aware of.

name: Finn
line: Where... am I?

name: Dark Magician
line: For your final trial, slay the beast!

name: Finn
line: Why? Is it an evil beast?

name: Dark Magician
line: Yeeeeessss. It's completely evil. Will you slay it?

name: Finn
line: Shoot, yeah. I'll slay anything that's evil. That's my deal.

name: Dark Magician
line: Yeeeeessss! You've done well, hero.

name: Finn
line: Thank you.

name: Dark Magician

name: Finn
line: Is it evil?

name: Dark Magician
line: No! But it's not good either. It's, uh, neutral. Will you slay it?

name: Finn
line: No!

name: Dark Magician
line: If you want the heroes' Enchiridion, then slay this unaligned ant!

name: Finn
line: Never. Never. Never!

name: Dark Magician
line: Uh oh.

name: Finn

name: Key-per
line: Ooh!

name: Finn
line: Oh, no! Mr. Key-per! I-I'm sorry. Why are you wearing that little devil costume?

name: Finn
line: Are you another trial?

name: Finn

name: Finn
line: So, can I check out the Enchiridion? Can I? Can I? Can I?

name: Mannish Man
line: Yeah. Come on. Let's go check it out.  Woohoo!

name: Mannish Man
line: We've been watching you guys on our magical viewing globe. Take a seat guys, have some juice. There's grape and apple and the gatekeeper made spaghetti. And... Alright, Finn. Are you ready for this?

name: Finn
line: The Enchiridion!

name: Mannish Man
line: You deserve it, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Really?

name: Mannish
line: Man  Yeah, Finn. You're the goodest of heart and most righteous hero I've seen here. Tenderness, ingenuity, bravery, nard-kicking ability, and when you took that giant ogre's dollar...  Oh, man! The Key-per nearly fainted!

name: Key-per
line: It's true!

name: Jake
line: Hey! Crack open that book and read something for fun's sake, alright?

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah.  Whoa. How to Kiss Princesses?

name: Jake
line: Whoa. What'd you just read?

name: Princess
line: Bubblegum   Yeah. What does it say, Finn? Mannish Man won't tell me.

line: Huh?  Sis, give me the phone.   Oh, hey, Finn. I got another Ice King situation here. Oh, yeah? That would be great! Thanks.

line: You're grounded for two weeks!

line: Whoa, you are fast.  And quiet.  And very good at dramatic silence. I like it.  Alright, so, how do we do this? We shake hands or...  Oh-ho, paperwork!   Finn and Jake.  Whoosh!  A-ha, there he is. Huh? What's he doing?  What the—?! I hired a hitman, not a fireman!

line: Okay, okay. Goll.

line: Sheesh, this Scorcher guy's got some weird ideas about hitting.

name: Ice King
line: Hey, there you are! What's that? I already signed that.  I thought I told you to hit them, not burn them alive! You big dummy! Goll! It's almost like you want to kill them! Lucky for them, I stopped the fire!  You know what happens when you're burned alive?! Your eyeballs explode! Bleh!  Hey wha—?

line: Punch, punch, punch!

name: Jake
line: Rainicorn, don't eat 'im.

line: Meat Man. Meat Man, I'm sorry, Meat Man, I didn't mean it, man.

name: Ice King
line: Okay, mister, you are really trying my patience. How clear can I be?! All I want you to do is hit them. On the shoulder or something.  Are you even listening? Oh, I get it.  Here's double the grease to not kill Finn and Jake.  You trying to hustle me, Scorcher? Okay, I'll play this game. How about this prized piece for your pad?   No! Okay, how about these bad boys? Night-vision x-ray goggles. For when you have a lady house-guest.  Oh, come on!  At least renegotiate the target! You can destroy my least favorite princesses.  What about Lumpy Space Princess?  Ghost Princess?  I can't even hold her with my love mitts.  Aw, geez! Uh...  Oh! A—A leg cramp! In my leg! Ow, ow, ow.  Oh, this is so embarrassing. I'll be right back!   Ow, ow, ow!  Huh. Think, baby, come on. Ah!  Alright, let's hit the hitman, right? There's gotta be a—  Ah! [A profile for 'Blastronaut' comes up. It reads

line: No! Come back, you wussy!  Ooh, that was weird.  Was that your friend, or something?  Look, a super model! Look, a hover-board! Look, the apocalypse! Someone got hit in the boing-loins! Hit in the boing-loins!  Boing-loins! Boing-loins. Somebody got hit in them.  Peace out!

line: Freakin' butt! Butt, butt, butt!

line: I thought he was going to just hit you in the gut and make you spit up your lunch.  Well, I froze him in ice, but I think he's free now 'cause he's made out of fire. Or he commands fire, maybe?

name: Ice King

line: Oh my gosh. I'm sorry, princesses. Slime Princess, are you alright?

line: Alright. I've got a plan on how to get out of here. First everyone needs to be dancing and laughing and saying fun stuff like "Whoopee"! line: Haha, awesome.  Haha! Heck yeah! Thanks, little friend! You just totally saved my life. No pun intended. What's the matter? Can't talk? Oh, or are you guys comet boys? From up in there? line: I AM SENDING FORTH MY HOLY EMISSARY, MARTIN MERTENS, AND HIS REGULAR SON, FINN. DON'T FORGET TO DO WHATEVER MARTIN TELLS YOU.

Then I'll be outta your hair by tomorrow morning.

name: Holo-Margaret
line: Recipe for french toast. Ingredients butter, three large eggs, a wide dash of vanilla, milk, ten slices of bread-white, brown, multi-grain, or country loaf. In a large mixing bowl crack the eggs and whisk the milk, vanilla, and all eggs and honey.  When your consistency is satisfactory, set mixture aside. Dip bread in the mixture and soak thoroughly. Heat your oven to a high heat and sauté your egg soaked bread slices till golden and toasted and serve hot with sugar, cinnamon sugar, jam, ice cream, meat, whipped cream-

line: Princess... this sweater you made me kept me safe. I almost got super messed up, but... it saved me. And I wanted to say... thank you for imbuing this sweater with the power of liking someone a lot. Because... I like you a lot.   Haha, uh... We shouldn't talk about this now. You should rest.

line: Finn... I need you to get me some things...

name: Finn
line: Yes, Princess.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Princess! I brought you some tea—

name: Jake
line: Whoa...  Uh... somethin' weird's goin' on...

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: AH!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna get some stuff for PB. Be right back.

name: Jake
line: Hey... Princess... Sorry you're not feelin' good. .] Oh! I'll sing you a song! You love it when I sing songs!

name: Jake
line: Uh...  Uh, this song's not that good. It's a bad one. I... I'm stoppin'.  ...And starting a new song!   AAH...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Jake...

name: Jake
line: AAAAAAAAAAHHHH!!!!!  OH, MY GLOB, OH, MY GLOB, OH, MY GLOB, OH, MY GLOB!!  Maybe the toxic waste did somethin' to her brain—made her have demon powers—or somethin’!  Yo, dude! Wait! What's all that biz?!

name: Finn
line: Uh, bleach, lighter fluid, ammonia, gasoline, I dunno. Lady stuff. Plutonium...

name: Jake
line: No, man... no... No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks.

name: Finn
line: No probs!

name: Jake
line: Wait! Hold on!

name: Finn
line: What's up?

name: Jake
line: Listen... PB's bed was on fire.

name: Finn
line: What?! Is she okay?!

name: Jake
line: She made it on fire.

name: Finn
line: With a match?

name: Jake
line: No, man. With her brain... I think...  Look, man, I'll show you!

name: Finn
line: Jake, wh—

name: Jake
line: Shh!!  P-P-P-Princess...?

name: Finn
line: Over there!  PB? You in there?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm busy!

name: Finn
line: See? It's fine. She's just havin' private time.

name: Jake
line: I'm lookin' in!

name: Finn
line: JAKE, WHAT THE HEY?!

name: Jake
line: Oh, my gloob!

name: Finn
line: Come on, man, that's pervy!

name: Jake
line: You don't even know, man.

name: Finn
line: DUDE?!

name: Jake
line: Look!  See it!

name: Finn
line: Hold on, Peebles!  PRINCESS!  AAH! PUT DOWN THE TUB!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Evil presence detected!!  Must defend!!

name: Ice King
line: Hey, Finn, are you dead or what?

name: Finn
line: Whaaah?... Ice King? What are you doing here?

name: Ice King
line: Hey. I had to keep an eye on the princess because she's being possessed by the Lich.

name: Finn
line: You don't know that.

name: Ice King
line: But I do. I saw it with my wizard eyes!  In the well, I saw something come out of the Lich and go into the princess. But I wasn't sure it was real  because when you have stanky old wizard eyes, sometimes you see things that are real, and other times it's like crazy crazy crazy in your face all the time!   All the time...  Guys, let me help you. I don't want my future wife to be... physically unattractive.

name: Finn
line: Listen, you old poot. I'm not going to let you kill 'er twice. GET STUFFED. Come on, Jake.

name: Finn
line: We're coming, Princess!

name: Jake
line: Dude! I think we should let the Ice King help! He can freeze her, which could buy us some t—

name: Finn
line: Dump that mess! I'mma set 'er free with my like-like sweater!

name: Jake
line: Woooh, do it!

name: Finn
line: I like you, Princess!!

name: Jake
line: Finn!!

name: Finn
line: Urrgh...  Liking her... didn't work. She's unstoppable... unless...   Ice King, I... I need you to freeze Princess Bubblegum. Will you help me?

name: Ice King
line: Are you suuuuure?

name: Finn
line: Yes.

name: Ice King
line: Great! Weeee!

name: Finn
line: I'll distract 'er up top, you freeze 'er legs!

name: Ice King
line: Wah!

name: Finn
line: I'M A CAT! I'M AN AGILE CAT! JAKE! DUCK!  MEOW, ICE KING!  Thanks, bird!

name: Ice King
line: Yeah! Whoopie!

name: Finn
line: You did good, Ice King.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, yeah?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man.

name: Ice King
line: Okay. I didn't kill 'er this time. Everybody saw that, right?

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Duuuude...

name: Finn
line: We gotta get 'er to the hospital!

name: Dr. Ice Cream
line: Start assembling! Here, try to connect these two pieces!  Turn it...  Perfect.  Give me more pieces, Doctor Princess!

name: Dr. Princess
line: That's all we have, Dr. Ice Cream!

name: Dr. Ice Cream
line: What?! That can't be!

name: Nurse Pound Cake
line: What do we do, Doctor?

name: Dr. Ice Cream
line: ...I don't know, Nurse Pound Cake.

name: Finn
line: I hope she's okay...

name: Nurse Pound Cake
line: Attention, everyone...

name: Finn
line: IS PB OKAY?!?

name: Nurse Pound Cake
line: Yes... but there were some complications.

name: Finn
line: NOOOOOOO!!!!

name: Nurse Pound Cake
line: Yes... I'm afraid... there wasn't enough gum to work with, so it appears Princess Bubblegum is now...... younger.  She's 13 years old now.

name: Ice King
line: Aw, dang it! Well, I'm outta here. Goodbye, everyone.

name: Finn
line: 13 years old? That's how old I am.  Uh...

name: Jake
line: Whoa...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Give me a hug, hero.

name: One-eyed Koala
line: Yam! Yam!

name: Two other Koalas
line: Nyam.

name: One-eyed Koala
line: Yam.

name: Martin
line: That's right, you silly guards. Stay distracted, talking to each other.

name: Martin
line: And when you least expect it, old Martin is gonna steal those gold helmets off your heads and use them for betting on lard fights. The very thing that got me imprisoned here in the first place.

name: Guard 1
line: It's not as bad as you—

name: Guard 3
line: Hey, you two mugs, be on the lookout for rebels.

name: Martin
line: Whoa! Nice. Time to enact my genius plan.

name: Large prisoner
line: Huh?!

name: Guard 3
line: Huh?!

name: Martin
line: Here comes the rascal!  Whoa!

name: Martin
line: Whoa!

name: One-eyed Koala
line: Nyam.

name: Small Koala
line: Nyam.

name: Martin
line: Hey.

name: Martin
line: This is your rebel village? I am honored.  Uh, say, you dudes hungry? I'm a little peckish.

name: Small Koala
line: Nyam, nyam?

name: Martin
line: What's a fella got to do, right?

name: Martin
line: Hey, wait a sec. Whoa!

name: Flame Messenger
line: Whoo-hoo!

name: Flame Princess
line: Next.

name: Flame Person
line: Oh, Your Highness, can you help my poor child? His hair is starting to go, and we can't afford flame care and...

name: Flame Princess
line: Take this fortifier. It should last you through the cold season.

name: Flame Person
line: Oh, Glob bless thy soul!

name: Ursula
line: More tea, Your Highness?

name: Flame Princess
line: Thank you.

name: Ursula
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Flame Princess
line: Who's next?

name: Flame Person
line: Hi, um, my microwave seems to be broken, and—  aah!

name: Flame Lord
line: Flame Princess!

name: Flame Princess
line: Don John—the Flame Lord!

name: Don John
line: I fear you're not evil enough to rule the kingdom.

name: Flame Princess
line: Excuse me? How dare you!   What?

name: Flame Princess
line: You've been poisoning me. How could you, Ursula? Guards!

name: Flame Princess
line: Huh?

name: Flame King
line: Oh, here he comes!

name: Flame Princess
line: No!

name: Flame King
line: Yes! Playtime's over, honey. Time to give Daddy his throne back.  I've secretly arranged to make Don John my vizier and give him my daughter's hand in marriage.

name: Flame Lord
line: Uh, yeah, I know.

name: Flame King
line: Ha-ha!

name: Flame Lord
line: Hwah!

name: Flame King
line: Man, you're looking shredded.

name: Flame Lord
line: My gym is dark magic, and my protein shake is rage.

name: Flame King
line: Okay, okay.

name: Flame King
line: Splendid work, Don John.

name: Flame Lord
line: No big D, bro.

name: Flame King
line: Heavens to Betsy!

name: Flame Princess
line: Cinnamon Bun!

name: Flame King
line: Don't let them escape!

name: Flame Lord
line: Come here, girl. We're getting hitched!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: No!  Go away!

name: Flame Princess
line: I can't leave. I have to fight for my kingdom!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: No. Fight later. Now we get help.

name: Flame King
line: Huh? Aah!

name: Flame Lord
line: Hwah!

name: Flame King
line: Why did I jump?

name: Flame Princess
line: Thanks, CB.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: You're welcome. How are you feeling?

name: Flame Princess
line: A little better, I think.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Who should we go to for help? Princess Bubblegum?

name: Both
line: Nah.

name: Flame Princess
line: I don't trust her.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Yeah, she's devious.

name: Flame Princess
line: Well, I've seen Finn battle huge monsters and even armies, and we need somebody who can fight... CB, take me to Finn.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Mmm, okay.

name: Finn
line: Waah!

name: Flame Princess
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Um...  hey. Uh, Jake isn't here. He's sleeping over at Lady Rainicorn's maybe.

name: Flame Princess
line: Finn, I've been slowly poisoned by my treacherous handmaiden. Now my powers are weakened, and—and the Flame Lord has freed my father and threatened to marry me. But I escaped with CB.

name: Finn
line: Oh, what?! I'll help you. I'll do anything for you.

name: Flame Princess
line: Listen, Finn, this doesn't mean we're getting back together. We're all business.

name: Finn
line: Mm-hmm. Of course.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Yeah, business.

name: Flame Princess
line: I'm feeling exhausted. Where can I freshen up?

name: Finn
line: Girls' bathroom is over there. Also, it's the boys' bathroom.

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh, thanks.

name: Finn
line: So, what do you think, CB? You think I still have a shot with her, right?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: No.

name: Finn
line: Does she ever talk about me? Is she seeing anybody?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: No and no.

name: Finn
line: "No and no," she does talk about me, or "no and no," she isn't seeing anybody?

name: Flame Princess
line: Alright, guys, let's wolf.

name: Finn
line: So... your Fire Wolf can fly.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Yep. I taught him.

name: Finn
line: Hmm.  Whoa! You've cooled down a lot.

name: Flame Princess
line: No funny stuff.

name: Finn
line: Things have been going great for me lately. Been hanging out with my boys. I got a cursed sword arm now, so that's new. Yeah, I've been exercising a lot and taking some piano lessons—trying to improve myself. Not dating anybody or anything, just getting a little me time, being the best Finn I can be.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Hyup!

name: Finn
line: Oh, no!

name: Finn
line: I hid my flameproof suit behind these rocks... just in case, whatever, you know?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: So, the guards are posted here and here, so we should probably sneak in here.

name: Finn
line: Suited!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Uh...

name: Finn
line: Remember my fire suit? Hey, CB, you did a great job getting us here and everything,  but I got this, all right?

name: Finn
line: I got a sword arm, so—

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Yeah, you said that.

name: Finn
line: Watch this.  Hey, guards! Come at me at the same time!

name: Flame Princess
line: What are you doing?!

name: Finn
line: Let's go, Princess!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: But that wasn't the plan! No!

name: Finn
line: Ha-ha!

name: Flame Guard
line: It's the princess.

name: Flame Guards
line: Capture them!

name: Finn
line: Ahhhhhh—

name: Flame Princess
line: No, Finn, don't hurt them! They're entranced!

name: Finn
line: Oh, right.  Oh, no.

name: Flame Guards
line: Captured.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Hyah! Um...

name: Finn
line: There's CB!

name: Flame Guard
line: Get that bun!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Could you move, please?

name: Flame Guard
line: Whoo, get him, boys! We're taking these two away.

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, FP, your boy Finn won't fail you.

name: Flame Guard
line: Put up your dukes. You have permission to leave when you out-duke us.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Okay.

name: Flame Guards
line: Duke! Duke! Duke!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Duke! Uh, duke!  These two are out-duked! Now I'm making my escape.

name: Finn
line: Trust me. It'll be fine.

name: Flame Lord
line: For soon you shall be mine.  If you've forgotten, I'm reminding you now.

name: Flame Princess
line: Never!

name: Finn
line: Yeah! It's because you secretly still have feelings for me.

name: Flame Princess
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Hmm.

name: Flame Princess
line: I can never marry you, because I don't even know you, much less like you, and forcing me to marry you is gross.

name: Flame King
line: Whoo! Whoo! Man, I love staring out over things. Whoo!  It's so good to be king.

name: Flame Lord
line: You said she'd do whatever you told her.

name: Flame King
line: Umm, okay...

name: Flame Lord
line: But she refuses to marry me. She's her own woman, you liar!

name: Flame King
line: Liar? You want to fight me?

name: Flame Lord
line: Aye—fistfight.

name: Flame King
line: Yes... I'll fistfight you. Come on!

name: Flame Lord
line: You hit me? Felt good!

name: Flame King
line: Oof! I love fistfighting.  You dirty bread breaker.

name: Flame Lord
line: Aah!

name: Flame Lord
line: Put them down.  Put your dukes down.

name: Flame King
line: No!

name: Finn & Flame Princess
line: Whaa?

name: Finn & Flame Princess
line: We're saved!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Hi.  Got a key.

name: Flame Lord
line: Fight!

name: Flame King
line: Fight!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: They're distracted. Let's go!

name: Flame King
line: Leg press!

name: Flame Lord
line: Stamina... failing.

name: Flame Lord
line: Cheater!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Onward, Jake 2!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Aah!

name: Flame Princess
line: CB, are you okay?

name: Female Flame Person
line: Huh? What happened?

name: Male Flame Person
line: Should—should we keep attacking?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Stop! You were all brainwashed... by him!

name: Flame King
line: Uh-oh.

name: Female Flame Person
line: Hey, I don't like that guy!

name: Male Flame Person
line: Yeah, let's get him!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Capture him!

name: Flame King
line: It wasn't me. It was Don John!  Aah!

name: Flame Lord
line: Huh?  Oh...

name: Flame Lord
line: Aah!

name: Flame King
line: Have you all gone dumb from Don John's magic? I mean, how do you expect this softy to rule you? She's even weaker than before from being poisoned. Look!

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh, come on.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: You're wrong. Flame Princess may not be the most ruthless of all despots, but she is strong where it really counts—in her heart. And that is good.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: I have learned so much watching this beautiful woman work, and with her example, I have become a better man. I will be by her side as her champion and knight every step of the way because... I love her.

name: Flame Princess
line: Thank you.

name: Flame Person
line: Aw, how sweet!

name: Finn
line: Jeez. Did I just get shown up by Cinnamon Bun?

name: Finn
line: Stunts!  Hi-ya!  Yeah!

name: Jake
line: Yo, Finn, look what I found!  A vertical trampoline! It's sticky!

name: Finn
line: Dude, it's a spider web.

name: Jake
line: Ohh. Well, cut me out, yo!

name: Finn
line: No way, I'll stunt you out! Whoah!  ...I was thinking something else would happen.

name: Jake
line: You got anything sharp?

name: Finn
line: The only sharp thing I had was my fingernails, but you made me cut them.

name: Jake
line: They were too long, Finn.

name: Jake
line: Augh! You broke the skin, dude!

name: Finn
line: I guess my fingernails are really loaaeaeuAAAAHH--!

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah. Sorry.

name: Jake
line: It's cool, man.

name: Finn
line: Can you... stretch us out of here?

name: Jake
line: I'm gonna take a nap while you grow out your fingernails. We'll make our escape when I wake up.

name: Bug
line: You'll never escape!  We'll all die in the web.

name: Fly
line: That's the circle of life.

name: Finn
line: That's not a circle. That's, like, a straight line.

name: Bug
line: We don't make the rules, man.

name: Finn
line: Well, don't just give up.

name: Bug and Fly in unison
line: The spiders are back!

name: Fly
line: Try to stay calm. Greet your fate with dignity.

name: Finn
line: We gotta go, Jake! Jake!

name: Barb
line: So what? You're not talking to me now?

name: Ed
line: No, I'm just tired of setting traps all day, solo-style.

name: Barb
line: Why are you mad?

name: Ed
line: I just said I was tired.

name: Barb
line: But you're acting like you're mad.

name: Ed
line: I'm not mad. Oh, look, food... that I caught... in my web... for us.

name: Barb
line: I spin webs, too, Ed.

name: Ed
line: Yeah, I know.

name: Barb
line: I try just as hard as you.

name: Ed
line: Well, go ahead then. Wrap them up for laters.  What's wrong, Barb?

name: Finn
line: What's going on there, Jake?

name: Barb
line: I can't! You think I'm gross when I spin my web!

name: Ed
line: What?

name: Barb
line: I can see it on your face! Tell me that you don't!

name: Ed
line: Uhh... I uh... You tell me, you don't find me gross!

name: Barb
line: Oh, get stuffed, Ed!

name: Finn
line: You guys are sad.  Ugh! What is that sound? Sick, dude! She makes that sound, too?

name: Ed
line: Yeah, I guess, but she never does it in front of me.  Anyway, it's not gross when guys do it.

name: Finn
line: Dude, that's not cool. You need to think about what you say and how that affects your lady.

name: Ed
line: How about how she affects me? I love her, man.

name: Jake
line: Oh, snap, how long was I out?

name: Ed
line: Can someone tell me why we fight, why she treats me like all I do is make her feel bad? Tell me, Glob, why don't you ever answer me!?

name: Bug
line: It's hard to step outside of yourself when you're enmeshed with another being. . Oh, Grod! It's over! It's over!!

name: Finn
line: Wait!

name: Ed
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Umm...  Right now, we gotta real-talk about your girlfriend.

name: Ed
line: I don't real-talk with my food.

name: Finn
line: Uhh...  We real-talk now, or you're going to be as single as your stinky web squirter!

name: Ed
line: Yeah, right. You just wanna get out of my web. All you ever want to do is escape! You're always, like, in cahoots, makin' plans not to be food.

name: Finn
line: I'm not in cahoots!

name: Ed
line: So okay, eat your friend here.

name: Finn
line: Okay.

name: Bug
line: No, man! What?! Where's your heart?! Look inside yourself! This isn't you!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna fake eat you, man.

name: Bug
line: Oh. Word.

name: Bug
line: Noooo! Oh, my guts! My guts everywhere! Agh, how could you!

name: Ed
line: Okay, man, you've earned my trust. So, let's do this. Real-talk me, bro!

name: Finn
line: Okay, first off, then, how you're going about this isn't working. Am I right?

name: Ed
line: Ugh, yeah. It's not working. My way sucks.

name: Finn
line: Cool, now we've gotta do damage control. Healing the negs energy at the source.

name: Ed
line: Yes, heal the neg-jerseys in me.

name: Finn
line: Alright, uhh...

name: Finn
line: Go find Barb a present. That'll fix the first neg. Can you do that?

name: Ed
line: Yeah, I can find her a present. If you think that'll help. I don't think it will, but what do I know, I'm just a big ol' dummy who does everything wrong...

name: Bug
line: Whee!

name: Finn
line: You're free!  Aw, man.

name: Jake
line: It's okay, Finn. You bought us some time.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, think fast, what can we use?

name: Jake
line: There's nothing! Just a bunch of nature.

name: Finn
line: I have a dumb idea.

name: Ed
line: Get her a present. Harumph. When was the last time she got me a present? What would she want, anyway? How do I know, we never talk. Jeez, what happened to my life? All my friends are gone. They all got kids now. I don't have kids. All I have is Barb. And she...  treats me like a--a dingus! Wha... Oh, cool! A sword!  Wow, neat!  It's magic or something! We can hang this up over our mantle and snuggle by the fire, huh, like we--like we used to! I'm gonna fix us, Barb! Fix us!

name: Jake
line: Alright, one... two... three!

name: Bird 1
line: Yo what?

name: Finn
line: Shoot!

name: Jake
line: Here comes another one. One two three!

name: Bird 2
line: My eyes! Agh!!

name: Finn
line: Ha ha, yes! Finally!

name: Jake
line: Good job! Last chance for life. Break out!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, you mommy!

name: Barb
line: Hey, what's going on here!

name: Finn
line: Nothing.  Oh, crab apples!

name: Barb
line: Where's Ed?

name: Finn
line: Oh, uh, he's getting you an "I'm sorry" gift.

name: Jake
line: He feels crazy about making you cry.

name: Barb
line: He does? Really?

name: Ed
line: Barb! Barb!

name: Barb
line: Ed?

name: Ed
line: Barb, look! Damage control! Check it out! I wrapped it up and everything!

name: Barb
line: Oh, Ed, I can't believe it!

name: Ed
line: Yeah! Come on, open it!

name: Barb
line: I really just, it's just so unlike you to--  What's this?

name: Ed
line: It's a sword! I found it in the woods!

name: Barb
line: In the woods?

name: Ed
line: Yeah, it's magical, though. Check out the blade!

name: Barb
line: You got this for you, Ed.

name: Ed
line: No, I got it for us! For snuggles by the fire!

name: Barb
line: We are never gonna snuggles until you learn to appreciate me!

name: Ed
line: Oh, really? Well, I guess we're never gonna eat again either 'cause I catch the food, and your butt is dysfunctional! Eeh-ya!  Go! Run away, food! We don't need you apparently!

name: Bug
line: Just break up, you guys!

name: Fly
line: Do it for you!

name: Ed
line: Now what are you gonna eat? Huh, Barb?

name: Barb
line: I'm gonna eat you!

name: Finn
line: Yo, that's wrong!

name: Barb
line: Who cares!

name: Jake
line: We're free!

name: Jake
line: Oh, no. You got that look on your face. You going back to help that fool?

name: Finn
line: His wife's gonna eat him!

name: Jake
line: Spider marriage is complicated. Sometimes, you just gotta mind your own biz.

name: Ed
line: Oh, help, somebody help me!

name: Jake
line: Ugh... Go with Glob.

name: Ed
line: Mercy!

name: Barb
line: You little twerp! Are you stupid or something?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I'm stupid. But I know something real. You shouldn't eat your husband!

name: Jake
line: Yo, smoothin' things out?

name: Finn
line: Not exactly...

name: Ed
line: Barb! Barb! What's wrong, my love?  Okay ...

name: Finn
