line: What is happening!?

name: Jake
line: Something we're not supposed to see.

name: Barb
line: Oh, Ed. We're parents!

name: Finn
line: Aw, sick!

name: Ed
line: I think there's hope for us, Barb.

name: Barb
line: We can make a new start, as a family.

name: Jake
line: Nice.

name: Finn
line: Think they're gonna make it?

name: Jake
line: Love like theirs will always find a way. It'll crawl all up over you and drain your body fluids, poisoning you slowly until you pass out.  Circle of life, Finn... circle of life.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Fearlessly, Captain Root Beer Guy charges across the battlefield. The ancient sleeper raises his power staff to attack. With one lever pull, Captain Root Beer Guy saves the...

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Root Beer Guy!

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: One day at a time.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Okay, Loafy, just a second.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Hmm?

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Hello?

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Root Beer Guy?

name: Starchy
line: Nope. Starchy. You do this every morning.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: I know. I'm sorry, honey. I'm trying, but I can't stop thinking about him.

name: Starchy
line: Look, we've been married two months already. I love you, baby, but isn't there an expiration date to this grieving thing?

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: I don't think it works that way.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Starchy, dear, could you feed the cat later? I've got to prep a witness tonight.

name: Starchy
line: Anything for my Chery Cream Soda and her sweet, little kitty cat.  Oh! I'll win your heart someday, Loafy. We can't all be a cute, little character with a cure, little straw sticking out of our cute, little head.But take some advice from an old grave digger, huh? Maybe it's time to do something with that. Here a thought... I could bury this for you. An unmarked grave kind of thing. Just... sswt!... Toss him in there with whoever.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Well, that's... that seems macabre. But sweet. I'll think about it.

name: Starchy
line: Okay, okay.  See you tonight.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Looks like it's gonna rain. Don't forget your umbrella, Starchy.

name: Starchy
line: Ooh, thanks. Maybe I'll take my hoe in case things set sloppy. Well, bye again.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Bye.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You two are married.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Good bye, Root Beer Guy

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Good Morning, husband.

name: Starchy
line: Good morning, wife.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Shaving your 'stache?

name: Starchy
line: Uh-huh.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Aaaaahhhh! Starchy! What? What?

name: Starchy
line: Blazes mazes! What is going on?

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: I saw him. He was right outside.

name: Starchy
line: Who? Finn? Jake? Candy person number 22?

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Maybe I can still catch him...

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Hi, sweetie. I was dead, but I came back to life. That was really something. Hmm.

name: Starchy
line: It's okay, baby. Starchy's here.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: Oh, thank heavens. It was just another hallucina-a-tion.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Honey, I'm fairly upset that you remarried.

name: Chery Cream Soda
line: But how is ths possible? You were zapped by Darren, the ancient sleeper. Your dome was cracked. Your root beer soaked into the ground. I buried you remains in a mason jar, which is now your head. And... and... and now I'm with Starchy. I mean we're... we're legally married. You're legally dead. Not that I want to sound obsessed with legalities, but I am a lawyer.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Hey, where's that little statue I got you? It said,"I wuv you," on the base of it. It was a little bear with his arms out like this.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: He was all, "I wuv you, I wuv you, I wuv you."

name: Starchy
line: No sudden moves, baby. He's got freaky zombie strength.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Maybe it's up here.  Did you hire a maid service or something while I was gone? I sure hope they didn't throw out the "I wuv you" bear.

name: Starchy
line: Enough! I should have put you in the ground a long time ago!

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Hey, I came back for her.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Root Beer Guy, if that is you in there, I'm so pround of you. But this isn't fair. You endend our life together when you pulled that lever. You made the choice, and you saved the kingdom. But you lost me.

name: Starchy
line: Heh, Burn.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Cherry Cream Soda, I still wuv you... whoa!

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: You always wanted this wall knocked down anyway, right?  Ooh.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Oooh! Wah! You come back with no explanation, wreck up the place, and you expect to just pick up where we left off? Get out of my house!

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: I'm sorry.

name: Starchy
line: Starchy wins!

name: Jake
line: That's funny.

name: Starchy
line: I can't believe you used to be married to such a freak.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: He isn't a freak. Or he didn't used to be.

name: Starchy
line: Shh, shh, shh, shh. Don't worry, honey.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Don't touch me now, please. I need time to think.

name: Starchy
line: Look, baby. Starchy knows all the fresh windows in town, and Starchy chose you. Starchy wuvs you.

name: Starchy
line: It's time to dig a hole.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: I thought she'd be happy to see me, but it was a disaster. I didn't know where to pick up with her, so of course I just acted like a goof. Oh, and now I'm one of the undead, I guess.

name: Jake
line: Hey, man, there's absolutely nothing wrong with you.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 그래, 그리고 좀비가 뜨는 거 알지? 특히 요즘들어 말이야.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: She's got a point though. I was the one who wanted to be the big hero, and I got my wish. But I didn't think about her enough. I'm not even thinking about her right now.

name: Jake
line: Yes, you are.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: I am?

name: Jake
line: Run back and tell her all the stuff you've been telling us. Maybe you could pick up from a place you Haven't been yet.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: I don't know what that means, but it sounds very encouraging! See you guys later

name: Jake
line: He didn't bite you, did he?

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Cherry Cream Soda! Cherry Cream Soda! I've had a revelation of some kind.

name: Starchy
line: No dirt-heads allowed.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Uh, but I have to talk to Cherry Cream Soda.

name: Starchy
line: Oh, no you don't. Nuh-uh.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: I'm trying to be polite.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Oh, dear. Hmm. Pardon me!

name: Starchy
line: It's on zombie.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: What the heck?

name: Starchy
line: You have met your match, freaky dirt guy! Woo-woo-woo-woo!

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Look, will you give me a break?

name: Starchy
line: Too chicken, huh? Look, I'll put the slovels down. See? Hah!

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: This is childish.

name: Starchy
line: Ha!

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Get away from my head!

name: Starchy
line: Ho-ho!

name: Starchy
line: We have some unfinished business. Wait for me, Little Dirt Beer!

name: Starchy
line: Ooh is somebody afraid of old Starchy?

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: I'm afraid of killing you.

name: Starchy
line: Oh, boo-hoo. Don't hurt me!

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Ugh. Is it not possible to get away from you?

name: Starchy
line: I'm escorting you to your new home... Far away from my house.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: It's not even your house.

name: Starchy
line: Ha! It's practically mine.

name: Starchy
line: Tonight you'll sleep in a hole... The same dirty grave hole from whence you sprang!

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: I'm not usually violent, but you pushed me.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Nah. What's this?

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Okay, now we're talking. Poke me with a shovel now,  you mustache face.

name: Starchy
line: Aw.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Stop it, both of you. Neither of you thought to ask me what I want. I've made a decision who I want to be with.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: I don't want to be with either of you.

name: Starchy
line: What?!

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: You're a maniac. I can't believe I ever got that low.

name: Starchy
line: Mmm! Starchy doesn't need this.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: And you. I don't know you anymore.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Okay. Take care of yourself.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: I said "I don't know you," but I'd like to. Would you like to go on a date?

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Yee!  I mean, yes. This is weird, right?

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Well we've never actually dated before. We got married so fast.

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: Let's take it show this time around.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: One date at a time.

name: Jake
line: Hey, man, it's Couples Only Movie Night tonight. Who are you bringin'?

name: Finn
line: I don't know. Who are you bringin'?

name: Jake
line: I'm bringing my girlfriend, dude.

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: Finn
line: I'll take this duck!

name: Jake
line: It's couples night! You gotta bring someone you can smooch.

name: Finn
line: Man, I don't want to be smooched!

name: Jake
line: Don't have to smooch. You just have to bring someone you can smooch. It's, like, the rules.

name: Finn
line: Lame.  Ah! Well, I'll take this blanket!

name: Jake
line: Put the blanket down.  Have a seat. I want to explain some "things" to you about couples.

name: Jake
line: You all square?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, yeah.

name: Jake
line: Who you gonna call?

name: Finn
line: I'm going to call a girl I don't have to kiss.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hello?

name: Finn
line: Hi Princess! Would you go to Couples Movie Night with me?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Sounds romantic, Finn.

name: Finn
line: No! I was just wondering if you wanted to go with me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, sorry, Finn. I'm busy practicing for the Whistling Choir Death Match Championship.

name: Finn
line: But—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Auf Wiedersehen!

name: Finn
line: She doesn't want to go!

name: Jake
line: Yes she does! We just need to help her realize that she wants to go to the movies with you.  I'm calling Marceline.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: Look, man, I've been learning a lot about vampires lately. I realized my fear was based on ignorance!

name: Marceline
line: Speak.

name: Jake
line: Hey, hey, Marceline. Got a favor to ask, Babe. We've gotta make Princess Bubblegum jealous, so she'll go to the movies with Finn.  Marceline? Come in. Hello?

name: Finn
line: Hehe. Are you gonna help us?

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, I'll help. It'll be funny.

name: Jake
line: Okay, so here's the plan.  You start saying things and  you start laughing waaay loud. And then Bubblegum...  will get jealous of you . Which will awaken her Finn love! You start us off.

name: Finn
line: Um... hmm funny... funny... giddy up?

name: Finn
line: Hehe. Um... diggy diggy?

name: Finn
line: Diggy diggy!  Diggy diggy!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Greetings, Finn.  Hey, Marceline...

name: Marceline
line: Hello, Bonnibel.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, yeah. So, what's so funny, Finn?

name: Finn
line: I, um... uh... it's... something.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, then, keep it down out there! I'm trying to whistle practice!

name: Jake
line: That was great! Now, we begin Phase 2! It's so powerful! Wait here! Hehehe...

name: Marceline
line: Hey, look, Finn, I know Jake's your friend and all, but... if you really want Bubblegum to go to the movies with you, you've gotta like, stop taking advice from your dog and take some advice from a real girl!

name: Finn
line: But Jake said Phase 2 is powerful!

name: Marceline
line: How is Jake going to know what girls want more than a real girl?

name: Finn
line: Yeah...

name: Marceline
line: Okay great. So what we need now is something... fun! Girls love fun more than anything. Fun, fun, fun! If you can show Princess Bubblegum you're fun, she'll deffs wanna go to the movies with you.

name: Finn
line: Haha, you said fun so much, it sounds all weird now. Fun. F—

name: Marceline
line: So... what do you like to do for fun, Finn?

name: Finn
line: Oh, Oh! I like to wrestle! And fight!  But girls don't like that.

name: Marceline
line: No, no, that's perfect! All you need to do is get in there and wrestle Princess Bubblegum to show her how fun you are.

name: Finn
line: Ffffffuuunnn. Ffffuuunn.

name: Jake
line: Whoa, where you going, man? Check it out!

name: Finn
line: What is that stuff?

name: Jake
line: It's a lute-suit! Girls love it! Trust me.

name: Marceline
line: Finn! What the plum are you wearing? You look horrible!

name: Jake
line: It's a lute-suit! And Finn looks adorable in it!

name: Marceline
line: Well, it's going to ruin the plan.

name: Jake
line: What she talking about, Finn?

name: Finn
line: Well... I was going to give Marceline's plan a try, too.

name: Jake
line: Her idea?! What's wrong with my idea?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, hey, Finn! Did'ya ever find some—Whoa! What are you wearing?

name: Finn
line: Oh... this is my... Lute... suit.

name: Finn
line: Oh.  This is my lute-suit!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, that is hilarious!  Oh, you are killing me!

name: Marcelince
line: Psst!

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah!  So... Headlock!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Guards!

name: Marceline
line: That suit was ridiculous.

name: Jake
line: Ridi—Ridiculous? What? Can you believe this girl, Finn? Huh? Can ya?

name: Finn
line: Uh... I guess the suit did feel... a little silly.

name: Jake
line: Well, fine! You can just give it back then!

name: Finn
line: I'm sorry!

name: Jake
line: Good luck getting to that movie without my help! Ruff.

name: Marceline
line: Gee, he seems pretty ticked.

name: Finn
line: Naw, he just needs some spaghetti.

name: Marceline
line: Oh, okay. Well taste this, then. I've gotta a new plan.

name: Finn
line: Really?

name: Marceline
line: The only thing women like more than fun is excitement! She needs to feel her blood pump, man! She needs to... be chased by wolves!

name: Finn
line: Like metaphorically?

name: Marceline
line: Come on, I'll teach ya how to show a girl a good time. Wraps Finn's arms around her.] Hold tight. You ready?

name: Finn
line: Uhh...  Mhmm.

name: Marceline
line: Shhh! She's probably asleep!

name: Finn
line: This was a really good idea.

name: Marceline
line: Now don't blow it this time!

name: Finn
line: Haha, okay.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, Finn, thank goodness you're here! There's wolves in my room!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I know! I put them there! Pretty exciting, right? Heh heh.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm sorry to do this, Finn. But until you stop acting like a psycho, you're forbidden from entering the Candy Kingdom. Farewell.

name: Finn
line: I don't understand, Marceline. I tried everything. I guess she just doesn't like me.

name: Marceline
line: Shhh. Come on, Finn, a brainlord like Bonnie? You'll be bored with her in a week! And anyway I, for one, think you're pretty great.  Sorry it didn't work out the way you wanted. See you later, I guess!

name: Finn
line: Marceline! Of course! It's been Marceline all along!

name: Jake
line: Hey, man, I've been looking for you. Sorry for acting like a dweeb before. Want some leftover spaghetti?

name: Finn
line: Ah, no, thanks, man. But I really need your help!

name: Jake
line: 'Bout time!

name: Marceline
line: Uh-oh.

name: Finn
line: Marceline! Will you go to the movies with me?!

name: Marceline
line: We need to talk...

name: Finn
line: Good evening my dear, your escort is here!

name: Marceline
line: Finn, you do NOT want to go down that road with me.

name: Finn
line: With you, I would walk down any road, m'lady. Especially, if it leads to the movies.

name: Marceline
line: Oh, yeah? No one would want to go to the movies with...  this!  What do you think of me now?

name: Finn
line: How do you like your popcorn?

name: Marceline
line: Uuugh!  You're starting to annoy me!

name: Finn
line: Well then let's do something fun, like go to the movies!

name: Marceline
line: Get off me!  Finn, I like you, but I—

name: Finn
line: Headlock!

name: Marceline
line: No!  Listen to me. I'm not going to go to the movies with you! I just don't like you... that way.

name: Marceline
line: I'm sorry Finn, I just... I don't wanna date you.

name: Finn
line: Date me? Man, I just wanna go to the movies. But everybody hates me.

name: Marceline
line: Wait, you don't want me to be your girlfriend?

name: Finn
line: Huh? No! Movies!

name: Marceline
line: If you weren't looking for a girlfriend then why were you romancing it up all day?

name: Finn
line: 'Cause Jake said Couples Night had weird kissing requirements and romance initiation rituals and whatever else.

name: Jake
line: I didn't really say all that.

name: Marceline
line: Of course I'll go with you, Finn!

name: Finn
line: You will?

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, as friends.

name: Finn
line: Of course as friends!

name: Marceline
line: But no tongue.

name: Finn
line: Yea—Wha?

name: Finn
line: Oh, man! I can't believe I'm finally going to see this movie!

name: Woman in movie
line: Oh, mon cher. I guess zese is goodbye.

name: Man in movie
line: No, not goodbye. Let's say Farewell!

name: Finn
line: Couples Night sucks! Marceline, would you do me the honor, of getting the plop out of here?

name: Marceline
line: There's nothing I'd like more.

name: Man in movie
line: Nothing can ever tear us apart.

name: Finn
line: It's slippin', dude.

name: Finn
line: Phew.  Raini-corni-copia? An Unabridged History of the Rainicorns.  Whatever, man. I barely even made it through the title.

name: Jake
line: Listen, man. One day, I'm probably gonna have half-rainbow pupsters. I gotta be able to share my babies' culture.

name: Finn
line: Huh.  Oh.  Hey, this table is wobbly. We gotta take it to the Lost Tinker Goblin of Fog Mountain to fix it.

name: Jake
line: Dude, I would love to go on some crazy, made-up adventure with you, but I really gotta read this. So from here on out, I'm just gonna ignore you.

name: Finn
line: I don't make up adventures! Jake, you know that! Jake! I don't make up adventures!  Hm.  Books, books.  Kitties, Zitties, Witties, Mitties, Knitties, Fitties, Hitties, Jitties, Pities, Cities...  Oh, no! Damaged books? Who did this?!

name: Turtle Princess
line: Shhhhhhhushh!

name: Finn
line: Sorry.  I will avenge thee, slightly-soiled books. Gotta tell Jake.

name: Finn
line: Hello?  Is someone back here? Are you stuck?

name: Turtle Princess
line: Shhhushmm!

name: Finn
line: Hello?  Whoa! Ohhh! Hey, there's pages comin' outta these books!

name: People offscreen
line: SHHHHHH!

name: Finn
line: Who are you dudes?

name: Pagelings
line: We are the Pagelings!

name: Paper Pete
line: I am Paper Pete, the leader of the Pagelings. But you can call me P.P.

name: Finn
line: I'll call you Pete.

name: Paper Pete
line: Okay!

name: Finn
line: Why are you dudes in the library?

name: Paper Pete
line: We are the secret guardians of the books in the library. You know those blank pieces of paper in the beginning of old books?

name: Finn
line: Yeah?

name: Paper Pete
line: That's us! We revealed ourselves to you, noble giant, because you felt our plight when you saw the damaged books. And now is our darkest hour, for the Moldos have been growing more bold with every attack. Look at the damage done yesterday  at the Battle of Teddy Bear Joke Book.

name: Finn
line: Wow, yeah.

name: Paper Pete
line: They're massing for a full-scale assault on every book in the library!

name: Finn
line: Gosh! Even the Rainicornicopia?

name: Paper Pete
line: Yes.

name: Finn
line: I better tell Jake. Don't you dudes go anywhere.

name: Pagelings
line: Okay.

name: Finn
line: Hey, bro, I've got an adventure—and it's not made up! There are these- these Pagelings they came out from- from books! And they- they folded into little animals.

name: Finn
line: Do you hear what I'm saying?!

name: Jake
line: Shhhh!

name: Finn
line: You think I'm making this up?

name: Finn
line: I'll prove it to you!

name: Jake
line: Finn!  Finn, you butt chicken!

name: Finn
line: Jake, wait till you see 'em.

name: Finn
line: Ow.

name: Finn
line: They were just here! Pagelings?

name: Finn
line: Why didn't you dudes introduce yourselves to Jake?

name: Paper Pete
line: We don't want to reveal ourselves to anyone else. We are the secret guardians. Secret.

name: Finn
line: Ummmm... yeah, but Jake is a powerful giant like me! He can help you battle or- or whatevs! But first, you must win his favor. Do you not want victory for your people?

name: Pagelings
line: Yes! We do want victory!

name: Finn
line: C'mon, follow me.  Jake, look.

name: Finn
line: He's up here reading a book.

name: Finn
line: Do something to get his attention.

name: Paper Pete
line: Very well. We shall dance as flowers.

name: Other Pagelings
line: Hoo-ah!

name: Finn
line: Okay.

name: Finn
line: Jake, the Pagelings are dancing for you. Just look up for a second!

name: Jake
line: Finn, all the little voices you're doing are cute, but come on, man! Just let me read.

name: Paper Pete
line: By wearing the beast,  we shall become like the beast.

name: Finn
line: You can feel them, can't you?

name: Jake
line: I can feel you pinching me.

name: Finn
line: Just look up for a second!  Looooook.  Uhhh. Pagelings, I'm sorry, but my friend is acting like a clump.

name: Pagelings
line: Okay.

name: Paper Pete
line: We can't wait any longer. We must go back to the bookshelf to prepare for the Moldos' attack

name: Jake
line: Yeah, go play make-believe somewhere else!

name: Finn
line: I'm not making believe!

name: Paper Pete
line: We were gone too long!

name: Paper Pete
line: Wield, my brethren. Wield!

name: Moldo
line: You win this battle, but next time, we will win.

name: Pagelings
line: Yes, leave! Victory! Veni, vidi, vici!

name: Finn
line: So, those little squishy guys are the Moldos?

name: Paper Pete
line: Aye. This was but a reconnaissance squad... sent to test our mettle!

name: Pagelings
line: Mettle!

name: Finn
line: Uh-huh. They seem tough.

name: Paper Pete
line: Their bites sting like the Dickens.

name: Finn
line: Hmmm... their bites sting, eh? I've got a plan, Pete.

name: Paper Pete
line: Tell me your plan, giant.

name: Finn
line: Just trust me.  Trust me.

name: Paper Pete
line: You've discovered the Moldos' Secret Lair!

name: Finn
line: Eh, it wasn't very hard.

name: Finn
line: Wibba-wibba-wah!

name: Moldo
line: The Pagelings have a battle beast! Attack!

name: Finn
line: Whoa. Whoa, moldy blobs. I've come here to help the Moldos defeat the Pagelings.

name: Paper Pete
line: Traitor!  Hiyah! Yah!

name: Finn
line: Calm down, this is part of my plan.

name: Paper Pete
line: Ohhh, ha-ha! Then I shall play along, wise giant.

name: Moldo
line: How are we to trust you?

name: Finn
line: Well... here, look.  I brought you all a prisoner. It's their leader.

name: Paper Pete
line: May you rot in Tartarus! May your skin boil and eyes burst into flames... forever in a pit!

name: Paper Pete
line: Traitor!

name: Finn
line: So, do you guys have, like, a—like, a leader or somethin'?

name: Moldos
line: Mildwin.

name: Paper Pete
line: Mildwin.

name: Mildwin
line: I'm Mildwin, leader of the Moldos.

name: Finn
line: Oh, uhh... hmm.  Nice to meet you, your highness.

name: Mildwin
line: I'm not a king; I was democratically elected.

name: Finn
line: That's adorable.  Now, Finn!

name: Moldo
line: Protect the elected official!

name: Paper Pete
line: Well played, ol' giant.  You have the cunning of Odysseus.

name: Finn
line: Pete, j-just stop winking.  Hyah!

name: People
line: Shhhh!

name: Finn
line: Ignore this!

name: Jake
line: Hmm?

name: Mildwin
line: Mmm! This tastes delicious!

name: Jake
line: AAAAH! AAH!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah!

name: Jake
line: What did you do to me?! AAAAAAH!

name: Finn
line: Ummm...

name: Jake
line: AH! AAAH!

name: Finn
line: Uhhh... come on, you guys, knock it off.

name: Finn
line: The Moldos got a taste for ya now.

name: Finn
line: Gotta do something. Where can I find ways to solve problems in a library?  "Books"?  Books! Books! Books!

name: Jake
line: Aaah!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Whatcha nibblin' me for?

name: Moldo
line: This sweaty stuff tastes amazing. A-mazing!

name: Finn
line: Hmmm. Tastier than battle beast fur. Yis!

name: Finn
line: Hey, Mildwin. Mildwin!

name: Mildwin
line: What?

name: Finn
line: I bring a peace offering from the Pagelings.

name: Mildwin
line: Hmm?

name: Jake
line: Finn... what's happening?

name: Finn
line: Hang on, buddy. Paper Pete?

name: Paper Pete
line: Giant! Have you wiped out the Moldo horde?

name: Finn
line: Naw, man. The war's over.  Mildwin, you can keep my shirt if  you don't attack their library books.

name: Mildwin
line: Agreed, beast. This filthy garb will feed my people for generations.

name: Finn
line: And in forty years, you can have my shorts. Sound good, Pete?

name: Paper Pete
line: It will suffice.

name: Finn
line: Sound good, Jake?

name: Jake
line: AAAH! What—What the hecks, man?! What'd you do to me?!

name: Finn
line: Look, man! Moldos and Pagelings are real!

name: Jake
line: Wha—? Who cares, man?! I'm outta here!

name: Finn
line: Did you finish your Rainicorn book?

name: Jake
line: Ugh... I was readin' the same paragraph over and over for, like, eleven minutes. I guess I'm gonna give up on learnin' everything about Rainicorn history. Don't tell Lady.

name: Finn
line: Oh. What about relating to your mixed-species kids?

name: Jake
line: Eh, I'll just fake it.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Well... hey, man, I think I see some, um...  Sun People in trouble on the sun over there.

name: Jake
line: You makin' that up?

name: Finn
line: Mmhmm.

name: Jake
line: Yeah! Let's do it!

name: Finn
line: WHOO! WHOOOO!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Cinnamon Bun, what the heck are you doing out in the woods?! I asked you twenty minutes ago to take these drinks around for us.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Oh, oh, "around for us." I thought you said "walk to the zoo and back"!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Gob.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, Cinnamon Bun's gonna attend your juice bar now. I have a special job for you.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: As Ooo's greatest champion, I'm relying on you to keep Lumpy Space Princess from crashing this wedding. I went ahead and deputized you.  So, you know, no holds barred, got it?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Oh, what about Jake?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, honestly I haven't seen Jake this happy in a while.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I kinda don't want squash his groove.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Knock, knock. Hey, Tree Trunks.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, hey, Princess. Wow, you look prettier than a sippy cup in a snowbank.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks, Tree Trunks. Now listen, I don't want you to worry about a thing. I've got Finn on LSP Deputy, and we're keeping your ex-husbands, Randy, Danny and Wyatt, a hundred feet apart at all times - at least until it's time for me to perform the ceremony.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, well, uh, Princess, I appreciate your generosity going to all this trouble to hijack my wedding and all, but you can't perform the ceremony.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?! Why not?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Uh, well, I'm sorry, but I just don't recognize your quote unquote "authority" on such matters. I can only be married by His Holiness, the One True King of Ooo.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: WHAT? That fraud?!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Now I know...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That fraud is here?!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Why, yes, but...

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, dear. Mama, I'm afraid I've offended the Princess.

name: Tree Trunks' mother
line: Oh, nonsense, baby. She's probably jealous 'cause you're about to marry a handsome, fine, saucy man. Oh, but he is a saucy, fine bologna factory. Mmmhmm, tell you what I'd like to open up that hood, see how the bologna gets made!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Mama, please! Please don't call him a saucy fine bologna factory!

name: Tree Trunks' mother
line: Bologna factory, bologna factory, bologna factory!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, my perfect day. What else could go wrong?

name: King of Ooo
line: Please, go on. Describe the next thought form.

name: Mr. Pig's relative
line: Um... I see, like, reddish-green blotches.

name: King of Ooo
line: Ah... Ahaha!  One year good luck.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I've waited a long time for this King of Ooo, and now I'm gonna expose you in front of everyone for what you really are!

name: BMO
line: Yay!

name: Wyatt
line: Hey, uh, barkeep, can I have another one of these ciders?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Sure!

name: Wyatt
line: Hey, little robot. How ya doing?

name: BMO
line: I am the best! I love weddings, I love flowers! I love LOVE!

name: Wyatt
line: Hey, did you know I used to be married to Tree Trunks?

name: BMO
line: No!

name: Wyatt
line: Heh, yeah... it's just me and TT. We had some wild times back in the day. Did you know I once taught her to play tennis?

name: BMO
line: No...

name: Wyatt
line: Yep, tennis! I took her to one of those... uh... paddles... or whatever, you know!

name: BMO
line: No.

name: Wyatt
line: Yeah, she left me. She said I was stifling her spirit... I mean hehe... You know, what? Not enough tennis for ya?

name: BMO
line: No.

name: Mr. Pig's relative
line: It's starting! The ceremony is starting!

name: BMO
line: Oh no! I'm missing the love!

name: Wyatt
line: No! Uh, please stay here! This is cathartic. You're a good listener.

name: BMO
line: Oh, okay...

name: Mr Pig
line: Psst, Sweetie, you look so nice.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Shh...

name: Finn
line: Sounds really sweet.

name: Finn
line: Lumpy Space Princess? Is that you?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Let me go to this party...

name: Finn
line: It's not your party, LSP.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Poor Finn. Don't you know?  Every party is my party.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm just gonna look in this guy's blimp.  Make sure everything's in accordance...  with the laws.

name: Mr. Pig
line: Psst... sweetie, what are ya doing?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Get out of my way, Finn.  Oh my glob, you're touching my woman body!

name: King of Ooo
line: Okay, dear, now up you come.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Don't hurry this.

name: King of Ooo
line: There you go!

name: King of Ooo
line: Whoa, whoa, kids! Gotta finish the ceremony first. Keep the baby in the basket!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Everyone at the party get ready! 'Cause here comes the hot bunch of grapes!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ahhhh... oh my gaaaah...

name: King of Ooo
line: We've gathered here on this beautiful day, under my life-giving sun, to celebrate the enjoinment of Mr. Pig and Tree Trunks, the little elephant. These two weird animals...

name: BMO
line: I bet some cute weddings are happening over there.

name: Wyatt
line: BMO, you're so nice.

name: BMO
line: Those flowers look really cold.

name: Wyatt
line: I've had a hard life. People seem cute. They seem nice. And then when you can't stop crying because they beat you in tennis that one time, they call you a baby.

name: BMO
line: Yeah, cute nice babies.

name: Wyatt
line: BMO?

name: BMO
line: Mm-hmm?

name: Wyatt
line: BMO, would you move in with me?

name: King of Ooo
line: Do you, Mr Pig, take Tree Trunks to be your ever-wedded wife, forever following the teachings of me the true King of Ooo?

name: Mr. Pig
line: I do.

name: King of Ooo
line: Do you, Tree Trunks, do you promise to love Mr. Pig forever, and spend the next 5 years with me and my serenity compound, performing simple household repairs,  to have and to hold the in sickness and in health, in my gated mountain compound?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Everybody get ready...  to pay attention to me...

name: Tree Trunks
line: do... oh

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Everybody, hey! I'm here! Look at my bouq-

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Ah...

name: King of Ooo
line: My zep!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Everybody! This wedding is a farce! A criminal farce!

name: King of Ooo
line: Hey, just what are you egging at here?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'll tell you what I'm egging at! I'm egging at this outdated wedding officiant license!

name: King of Ooo
line: Oh, is that what this is about? You must've found that in my back records! I have the up-to-date paperwork right here!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What? Uh...

name: King of Ooo
line: Hey, wait, how did you get that? I could've swore it was locked in my zep.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No... shhh... no... nope nope, stop talking, go to jail!  Yeah!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Princess Bubblegum, you have gone too far. We stand together against your tyranny.

name: Finn
line: Hey, everybody.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Your prison may hold one of us, but it may not hold all of us.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, poor Tree Trunks. Wait, where's my mama? Has anyone seen my... oh!

name: Tree Trunks
line: No, Mama. Well I guess this is it, sweetie.  Oh, oh no, the elephant graveyard is calling me now. Okay, hold your horses, I'm coming!

name: Mr Pig
line: Wait, Tree Trunks. Look around everyone we care about is all here together. Finn, Uncle Donald, Banana Guard Number 1, Jake, Jake Junior, everybody. We can have the ceremony right here.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Hey yeah! King of Ooo, will you do the honors?

name: King of Ooo
line: Are you crazy? That loopy bird is gonna string me up sideways. You can perform your own dang ceremony. Kingofooo.com!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, dear.

name: Mr Pig
line: Oh, my gosh. Tree Trunks, did you hear?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Huh?

name: Mr Pig
line: The King said you can perform your own dang ceremony!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Yeah, that really stunk.

name: Mr Pig
line: But...

name: Tree Trunks
line: But... the King's word is law. I can perform my own dang ceremony?

name: Jake
line: Are you up to it, TT?

name: Tree Trunks
line: I'll try. I guess it's time. A-are you ready?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh. Okay, um... do you Mr Pig take me, Tree Trunks, to be your beautiful wedded wife?

name: Mr Pig
line: I do.

name: Tree Trunks
line: And do I, Mr Pig, take him to be your lawful wedded husband, Tree Trunks?

name: Mr Pig
line: I do.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Then you... you may kiss the bride!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Aww, geez, let them all go, Banana Guard Number 3.

name: Banana Guard Number 3
line: Uh... what?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I just can't stay mad at something so cute.

name: Banana Guard
line: Did she just say let everyone go?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Looks like we got the whole place to ourselves... if you know what I'm saying.

name: Mr Pig
line: Wait, d-don't you think there might be cameras down here?

name: Tree Trunks
line: I hope so...

name: Finn
line: Baby!

name: Jake
line: Ooo!

name: Finn
line: I know what you need.

name: Jake
line: What's that?

name: Finn
line: You want your little baby socks, for your little baby feet.

name: Jake
line: Woo!

name: Finn
line: Baby!

name: Jake
line: Yeah?

name: Finn
line: I know what you crave.

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah? What's that?

name: Finn
line: You want to poop your pants all day long. Well, baby behave!

name: Jake
line: Hey, how can you sing like that, dude?

name: Finn
line: Remember when I swallowed that little computer?

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Finn
line: Alright, Stanley. You and your family are safe... Again...

name: Jake
line: Seriously, Stanley. For a watermelon you get into trouble way more often than you should.

name: Jake
line: W-whoa!

name: Finn
line: What the... Shmow-zow! Look at that!

name: Jake
line: That... is the most adorable thing I have ever seen. And he loves your baby song. Sing some more of it, dude.

name: Finn
line: Alright.  Baby! You lookin' so good. You lookin' like you might... want some baby food.

name: Jake
line: Keep it going, man!

name: Finn
line: Baby! You lookin' so fine. You lookin' like you might... just start cryin'.

name: Jake
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Dude! This guy... is a pal for life! It looks like he's got two jiggly bellies stuck together.

name: Jake
line: I've got that on my back. I call it my butt.

name: Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Finn
line: He's the Jiggler.

name: Finn
line: You are the best thing ever. Let's take the Jiggler back to the house and just stick him by our bed so we can wake up...

name: Finn & Jake
line: Next to a little dancing guy every morning!

name: Finn
line: I gotta tuck you in, girl. I gotta sing you sweet melodies about babies. Yeah!

name: Jake
line: Little baby feet!

name: Finn
line: Welcome to your new home. Feast your eyes on... everything!

name: Jake
line: What are you doing?

name: Finn
line: Splitting my toothbrush in half, so he can use half.

name: Finn
line: Here you go. It's for your teeth.

name: Finn
line: Like this.

name: Finn
line: Yeah! You got it.

name: Jake
line: Enough hygiene.  Let's get to it!

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Toothbrush dance.  This is cool!

name: Finn
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Dance... dance...  dance...  I'm not tired! How about you, Jake?

name: Finn
line: Maybe we should go upstairs.

name: Finn
line: You can have the comfiest spot on the bed. Goodnight.

name: Finn
line: Mornin', Jake!

name: Jake
line: Mornin'.

name: Finn
line: Are you ready to get down?  Let's get this party started!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, ok.

name: Finn
line: Where's the little guy?

name: Jake
line: Over there.

name: Finn
line: Hey, pal. You ready to cut loose? Wake and shake, buddy. Let's do this thing!

name: Jake
line: Slam-a-cow! That fool looks rumped.

name: Finn
line: What do you mean?

name: Jake
line: Well, look at him. He's all limp... and weird.

name: Finn
line: Aww... I bet he just needs some breakfast after a night of extraordinary jiggling. Hey! Let's combine everything we can find in the kitchen... and have the Jiggler drink it! That'll wake him up! And then we can... Get  doooowwwn!

name: Jake
line: He doesn't want to drink that goop, man.

name: Finn
line: Then let's just give him some, uh... purple whatevers.

name: Jake
line: You mean the grapes?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Whatever.

name: Finn
line: Hey! I think he's diggin' it!

name: Jake
line: That doesn't sound good.

name: Finn
line: Uhh...

name: Jake
line: Uh, you think we... think we fed the wrong hole?

name: Finn
line: Nah. He just doesn't like purple whatevers. What we need to do is figure out what he likes to eat.

name: Finn
line: Here, Jiggler. What kind of food do you like? Meat? Some banana? This looks like corn... I think. Uh... hot dog. Stanley the watermelon.

name: Finn
line: Look! Jake! He likes it!

name: Finn
line: Wow!

name: Jake
line: No way!

name: Finn
line: His favorite food... is drawings! Awesome!

name: Jake
line: Holy fig, that's awesome! What food are you drawing now?

name: Finn
line: I'm drawing a picture of you.

name: Jake
line: Well, don't feed it me!

name: Finn
line: Come on. Eat him up, Jiggler!

name: Jake
line: No!

name: Jake
line: Ahhh! Keep it away! Shoo! Shoo!

name: Finn
line: Alright. Alright. I got it. Calm down... I'll eat it.  Ahhhhh.

name: Jake
line: Dude! You eating me is just as bad as the Jiggler eating me.

name: Finn
line: Well... You gonna eat yourself, tough guy?

name: Jake
line: Yes. If that is what must be done.

name: Jake
line: I taste awesome.

name: Finn
line: Ok. Alright. Now, let's get back to some jiggling!

name: Jake
line: I'll get the tunes!

name: Finn
line: Like this. Yeah! Woo! Come on Jiggler! wiggle and whistle!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, Jiggler. Go nuts! Go nuts like there's bugs on your butts!

name: Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Finn
line: Jiggler?

name: Jake
line: What the heck? What's wrong with him?

name: Finn
line: Uh... There's nothing wrong with him. We just gotta plug up his holes.

name: Finn
line: See? That worked. Ready to jiggle again, little guy?

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Oh, man...

name: Finn
line: Quick! We gotta plug those holes!

name: Finn
line: Jake, hurry!

name: Jake
line: All I could find was your glass eye collection!

name: Finn
line: What about your eyepatch collection?

name: Jake
line: Aw, man. They're in mint condition.

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Alright! Coming!

name: Jake
line: One... more... patch!  Finished. Ugh. He looks terrible. Finn, I know you don't want to hear this, but I think we should cut our losses and bring this fella back to where we found him.

name: Finn
line: We can't just abandon him. Look at him, Jake. He needs us now more than ever.  Just need to take better care of you from now on, right little guy?

name: Finn
line: Jiggler!

name: Jake
line: Oh... Finn. Ok... Our pet exploded.

name: Jake
line: Maybe we can... scrape him up! And... eyuhh...

name: Finn
line: Oh, holy moly! Don't worry, Jiggler. We'll fix you.

name: Finn
line: Let's gather him up, Jake. He's all over the place... even between the floorboards!

name: Jake
line: And the cupboards!

name: Finn
line: And the galoshes!

name: Jake
line: I wonder... Where's his heinie?

name: Jake
line: Found it! Come here, you!

name: Jake
line: Hey!

name: Finn
line: Come on. Let's put him back together.

name: Jake
line: Ok.

name: Finn
line: Squeeze real hard. He's slipping!

name: Jake
line: Got him!

name: Jake
line: Well, at least he's all in one piece.

name: Jake
line: Sheesh. You think he's dead?

name: Finn
line: No way! I won't let you die, guy! Not this time.

name: Jake
line: Finn. Stop it, man. What are you doing?

name: Finn
line: I'm kissing him! What do you think? It's all I could think to do.

name: Jake
line: Just put him down.

name: Finn
line: He's kissing colors with his dying breath.

name: Jake
line: I think he's trying to tell us something. Finn, this looks like it could be his Mama Jiggler

name: Finn
line: We took this child away from its mama, Jake. We're kidnappers and murderers! I just wanted to have fun and jiggle!

name: Jake
line: Look... Chill out, ok? We can fix this. Check it out.  His mom looks like she's out by Stanley's house... where we found the Jiggler. If we get him back to her, she'll be able to fix him up!

name: Finn
line: Then there's no time to spare.

name: Finn
line: Shhh. Just hold on a little longer, buddy.

name: Jake
line: Did you hear that? Whistling!

name: Finn
line: Perpendicular! It's the mama!

name: Jake
line: Look! The little guy wants to go home!

name: Finn
line: Well. This is it, buddy.

name: Jake
line: Be well.

name: Finn
line: Hey! Stop that!

name: Finn
line: I don't understand. That crazy mama almost killed him.

name: Jake
line: He feels cold.

name: Finn
line: What are we supposed to do now, man? We can't bring him home, or he'll... or he'll...

name: Finn
line: Dang it! Why doesn't she love him? I love him!  You love him! It's not fair!  Ahhhh!

name: Jake
line: Finn, wait!

name: Finn
line: Mama's supposed to love baby! She's supposed to love baby!

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Oh, man!

name: Finn
line: It's yours, idiot!

name: Finn
line: Don't you recognize your own baby?

name: Jake
line: Finn! I figured it out, dude. It's the juice. The Jiggler needs to smell like its mama's juice. That's how wild animals know what’s going on... and this guy right here is all drained out. We gotta toss it in the soup, brother.

name: Finn
line: Alright. Ok.  I loved you, baby. I hope you know that.

name: Finn
line: Word to your motheeeerrrrr!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Awww...

name: Finn
line: I'll never kidnap again.

name: Jake
line: You said it! That was a nightmare.

name: Bella Noche
line: Have you obtained the staff of Stranson Doughblow?

name: Forest Wizard
line: Yes, Bella Noche. We procured the staff using the full extent of our wizardy ways.

name: Bella Noche
line: Then the time has come to reveal my true form, and when I materialize on this...

name: Ice King
line: Oh, this striz is going down, man.

name: Bella Noche
line: ...you will receive your end of the deal.

name: Laser Wizard
line: The lost system of Antediluvian magick—the tightest of all wiz biz.

name: Forest Wizard
line: So right and tight, I get restless leg syndrome about it. Look.

name: Bella Noche
line: And now, it will be yours.

name: Ice King
line: And mine!

name: Forest Wizard
line: What the blood?! Ice King!

name: Ice King
line: Listen, dudes, all I want is to be in the club and plus up my magic. What's the problem?

name: Laser Wizard
line: Your life is my problem.

name: Bella Noche
line: Too late, fools! Bella Noche emerges!

name: Forest Wizard
line: Whoa! What the—?

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: Stop that now, trash cones! Bella Noche must not cross into our world!

name: Ice King
line: Eh, why not, again?

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: Duck!

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: Aw, cram! Here we go!

name: Forest Wizard
line: Uhhhh... hey. Hey, I—I can't feel my magic!

name: Laser Wizard
line: Me neither. What gives?

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: Bella Noche is a being of pure anti-magic! Y'alls got played!

name: Simon
line: Uh, hello?

name: Forest Wizard
line: Oh, what a fool am I!  Aaaaaaaaaaah!

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: Go! Destroy! Throw your boots at it, or—I don't know!

name: Simon
line: Huh?

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: Dang. Sorry, Ice King.

name: Simon
line: This must be it, man.  I've crossed into some super-insane zone where I feel like I'm just normal again.  Or maybe I'm just normal again.

name: Ash
line: Hey, stop looking at yourself. You're ugly, bro. Get lost. This is my busking spot.

name: Simon
line: Sorry, man. No time! Go, carpet!  Whoa!  It's got to be here. Even in my prolonged state of insanity, my immutable essence must have known to—oh, yes.  Hello.  Ah, my research. My jackie—jacket!  Mutation, mutation, mind expa—aha!  "Mystic Rituals And Their Space Time Applications" by Simon Petrikov and Betty Grof.  Betty.  Whoops. Marceline?

name: Marceline
line: A-one, a-two, a-one, two, three, four.

name: Finn
line: Wait!

name: Marceline
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Why are you holding your bass up high like that?

name: Marceline
line: Mm-mm-mmm.  I get better finger action this way.

name: Finn
line: But you look like a nerd. Move it back down. It's better.

name: Jake
line: Move the bass down.

name: Finn
line: A-move the bass a-down.

name: Jake
line: Be reasonable.

name: Marceline
line: Yes?

name: Simon
line: Marcy, it's me, Simon. I'm back, but my body might donk out soon, so get to the Ice Kingdom fast and help me with this time portal so I can find Betty and say I'm sorry before I croakboat! I know that's a lot to process, but hurry, and bring Hambo. Hambo is the key.

name: Simon
line: Okay, Marcy? You got that? Marcy?

name: Marceline
line: A long, long time ago, Simon was my only friend. He was there when I needed help.

name: Marceline
line: All he ever wanted was to find Betty, and now I can help him.

name: Marceline
line: Simon?

name: Gunter
line: Wenk!  Wenk!

name: Marceline
line: Simon!

name: Simon
line: Marceline!

name: Marceline
line: I thought I'd never see you again.

name: Simon
line: I can hardly believe it myself. You're all grown up.

name: Jake
line: Believe! She's like a million years old!

name: Simon
line: One million years? How could it be?!

name: Marceline
line: He's just kidding. I'm only a thousand.

name: Jake
line: And still looking good!

name: Finn
line: Do you remember anything from when you were the Ice King?

name: Simon
line: Nothing specific—just dreamlike impressions.

name: Finn
line: Do you still have impressions from all the times we flipped your bricks?

name: Simon
line: I have... bruises.  Excuse me. I—

name: Marceline
line: Man, Simon.

name: Simon
line: I'm fine.

name: Marceline
line: You're dying!

name: Simon
line: Well, yes, but only in increments. I've still got work to do. Finn and Jake, will you run my generator?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man.

name: Jake
line: Cool.

name: Simon
line: That's great! Keep pedaling! All we need now is the catalyst—an object from the past that has been lovingly tended to through the ages.

name: Marceline
line: Goodbye, Hambo.

name: Simon
line: Because of you, I can say goodbye to Betty and tell her I'm sorry for driving her away. Thank you, Marceline.

name: Simon
line: Where's my Betty? Where's my princess?! Princess! Princess!!

name: Betty
line: Simon, don't leave me like this.

name: Simon
line: Betty? Betty. Betty!

name: Betty
line: Simon? What is going on?

name: Simon
line: I'm a thousand years in the future, love. I opened this portal so we could say goodbye.

name: Betty
line: You're dumping me?

name: Simon
line: No! It's just that everything changed after I put on that crown. I—I went crazy. You ran away. I—I never saw you again.

name: Betty
line: But where would I go without you?

name: Simon
line: I'll never know.

name: Betty
line: I don't understand. You don't seem crazy now. I mean, in the future.

name: Simon
line: The portal is closing. There's no time to explain. Just know that I love you, and I forgive you for leaving me.

name: Betty
line: Simon, I know who I'm leaving you for!

name: Simon
line: Who?

name: Betty
line: You, dum-dum!

name: Betty
line: Simon?  What's wrong? Are you sick?

name: Simon
line: No, I'm old. The crown was keeping me alive, but its magic was negated by the creature Bella Noche.

name: Betty
line: Don't die, Simon. I just got here.

name: Simon
line: Oh, I'm sorry, Betty.

name: Betty
line: I know! I'll fix the crown, and then I'll figure out how to fix you!

name: Simon
line: What? No. Guys, stop her.

name: Jake
line: Uh...

name: Marceline
line: Hmm...

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but...

name: Jake
line: It kind of sounds like a good idea.

name: Betty
line: Right, whoever you are.  I'm sorry. It's the only way.

name: Simon
line: No!

name: Betty
line: Okay, rug, take me to Bella Noche.

name: Betty
line: Get on, Simon!

name: Simon
line: I am getting on... the death bus.

name: Death
line: I've got you in my sights, Simon.

name: Simon
line: It's my time, Betty! I don't want to be the Ice King again. It's like living with eternal diaper butt. I can't do it!

name: Betty
line: Not forever. Destroying Bella Noche and getting your power back will buy me time to find a loophole that'll undo your curse and your death. I can do it! You got to believe me, Simon.

name: Death
line: Get real, man. You're gonna be the Ice King till the sun blows up. This is your one chance. I made a mix tape for the ride "Summer Jams 3"!

name: Simon
line: If I don't let her try, then what am I? What am us?

name: Betty
line: What?

name: Death
line: Eh, fair enough. See you in a few.

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: This brioche won't stop growing.  Ron James, what took...  you?

name: Ron James
line: Yo, my lab got creamed! I had to dummy-rig an alchemical filter out of a dirty bidet and a vaporizer!

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: But will the double-negative magic work?

name: Ron James
line: Heck yeah! Ron James always delivers! Check it out, brotha! Yaah!  In your face!

name: Grand Master Wizard & Ron James
line: Yeah!

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: What the stink is that?!

name: Ron James
line: My lab conditions were not ideal.

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: But you did not deliver!

name: Ron James
line: Peace, man! Aaah!

name: Betty
line: We're here to help!

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: Help how?

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: We're toast, bro.

name: Betty
line: Simon!

name: Betty
line: Hey, don't scare me like that.

name: Simon
line: Just hold my hand to your face. This will be my... last sensation.

name: Betty
line: Don't be a wimp, Simon! Just give me a second!

name: Death
line: You got about 15 seconds.

name: Bella Noche
line: How the—? Wait.

name: Betty
line: Surprise!  Tranch.

name: Death
line: You lose, Simon. Sorry, man.

name: Ice King
line: Uh, huh?

name: Ice King
line: This a party? Huh?

name: Grand Master Wizard
line: Wizard City is saved!

name: Ice King
line: Whoa! Heh. Okay. Whoopee!

name: Ice King
line: So then, Ron James told me this girl I was with flew into Bella Noche and mysteriously defeated it for me! Wow!

name: Ice King
line: Just my luck, right? Black out for a day and meet the woman of your dreams.

name: Muscle Princess
line: I will get you!

name: Ice King
line: Hey, don't be jealous, Muscle Princess. She's gone—kablooey. Let's be realistic, right? We both know you're not my top pick.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, Grod!

name: Ice King
line: No!

name: Ice King
line: Aaah! Go home! You can go! Aah!

name: Flame Person
line: Brrrr. It's freezing in here.  Whoa, I'm losing a lot of weight! Calorie control and moderate exercise are the key. But I don't do any of those things, so this is weird. Hmm...

name: Flame Guard
line: My jets are tiny!  No one look at my tiny jets!

name: Flame Person
line: At least your body is normal, man. My body isn't hot anymore!

name: Flame Person
line: What's going on, man? I'm scared!

name: Flame Person
line: Give me a hug, man! I don't know!  Aaaaaah! Nooooo! My baby brooooo!

name: Flame Princess
line: It's as I feared. The magma in the kingdom's core is cooling down, weakening the life force of our Flame Citizens. I've gathered you here to figure out how to stop this. We need ideas, people!

name: Randy
line: I'll do my best, sis!

name: Flame Princess
line: Randy, you are here to stay safe only. Eat your snacks.

name: Randy
line: I'll do my best, sis.

name: Agnes
line: Perhaps everyone can form into a big love hug to stay warm!

name: Flame Princess
line: That's ridiculous, aunt Agnes.

name: Agnes
line: I'm not that smart.

name: Flame Princess' older brother
line: Blow up the Candy Kingdom! I've been saying this for months now! And I'll say it again! Let's blow 'em up with their stockpile of you know whats! We've debated this too long!

name: Agnes
line: But why the Candy Kingdom?

name: Flame Princess' older brother
line: Their sugar burns hotter and faster with lots of extra calories. Don't make me wait, sister! Also, is it safe to talk about in front of the C-I-N-N-A-M-O-N B-U-N?

name: Flame Princess
line: Cinnamon Bun, what are you doing?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: My nose itches!

name: Flame Princess
line: You don't have a nose.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: What?

name: Flame Princess
line: Well, whatever it is, it won't go away if you don't stop fiddling with it.

name: Flame Princess' older brother
line: Blow up the Candy Kingdom! They are trash people!

name: Flame Princess
line: I'm prepared to do what I need to as a leader. Nothing is off the table, but we need Princess Bubblegum as an ally right now. She might be able to help us solve this.

name: Flame Princess' older brother
line: Very well. Randy, send them an ultimatum! Help us or die!

name: Randy
line: Randy is on it!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Princess!

name: Flame Princess' older brother
line: Yeah, pump those legs, Randy!

name: Flame Princess
line: Quickly, CB, take me to the core entrance.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Okay!

name: Flame Princess
line: Hello, Bubblegum. Thank you for coming.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm glad you sent for me, and please, call me Bonnibel! Hey, what's your first—?

name: Flame Princess
line: Don't act like you're my friend, PB! You're here to help save my kingdom, not because I trust you.

name: Flame Princess
line: We're in the midst of unnatural cold season, but the cause has us stumped.  My people are really freaking out.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, my subjects tend to panic in crisis situations, too.  It's tough; a ruler's got to deal with a lot of subservient dummies.

name: Flame Princess
line: Hmmm...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whoa! Whoa! Hold up. My Mondometer is going cuckoo.  Where does this lead?

name: Flame Princess
line: Behind these doors are the most secret relics in the Fire Kingdom. Forbidden to outsiders. Come on.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, whatever is back there is kicking out mondo energy levels. It could have something to do with the cooling.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Do you wanna save your kingdom or not?

name: Flame Princess
line: Alright, but don't touch anything!  These are the sleeping Fire Giants. They're the ancient protectors of the Fire Kingdom. Their existence is known only to those of the royal line, and their story has been passed down through the generations.

name: Flame Princess
line: With them, I can remake a white-hot new Fire Kingdom. They are our last resort, our greatest weapons. Huh?  Hey! I said "no touching"!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What? Oh, no no no! This little geothermic control module, or whatever it is, accidentally fell out.  I was just putting it back!

name: Flame Princess
line: Huh, strange. The access panel's lock must have corroded.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, ancient technology's always falling apart.  Oh! The readings are over here now!

name: Flame Princess
line: What?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, let me explain. These bad boys are just too dangerous to remain functional, and I can't risk you or your bananas brother using them, especially now that you've lost most of your powers.  So let me just finish disarming...

name: Flame Princess
line: You are way out of line, Bubblegum! You have no control here!  I do!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Aah! Shield, shield!

name: Flame Princess
line: Nooooo!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, nice shot! Ya ding dong!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Cloak.

name: Flame Princess
line: Come out in the open and face me like a princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The Fire Kingdom has always been a threat to my realm!

name: Flame Princess
line: So that gives you the right  to donk up my people's future?!  I won't let you continue to usurp my authority!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And I can't leave my people's safety to chance!

name: Flame Princess
line: Why can't you just trust me?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: 'Cause you're a ding dong. I've got to do whatever it takes to protect my peeps.

name: Flame Princess
line: So be it.

name: Flame Princess
line: You're never going to change, are you? You'll just keep walking all over us little people!  But not today.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Shields off.  Okay, I'll come clean.

name: Flame Princess
line: Yeah, right.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It was me. I messed with the core temperature to get in here. I had to get near your weapon stockpile.

name: Flame Princess
line: But how did you find out about them?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ummm...

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Wait...  Wow, my nose is disgusting!

name: Flame Princess
line: You're still spying on me?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm PB! I spy on everybody. No big D!

name: Flame Princess
line: You're cold, PB!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Eh.

name: Flame Princess
line: And it's not because you're a scientist or leader; it's because you are a bad person! Something inside you is messed up, girl. And whatever it is,  whatever, whatever, PB!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, keep one last fire giant. I'm not a bad person. I want you to see that. I promise.

name: Flame Princess
line: You better not be fibbing.  It's Phoebe. My first name is Phoebe. You, uh, asked earlier.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ice King, call it off.

name: Ice King
line: Roger that, Princess.

name: Flame Guard
line: My jets! Yes!

name: Flame Person
line: Oh no!

name: Flame Princess' older brother
line: I was gonna blow up stuff! It was going to be cool!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmmm...

name: Flame Princess' older brother
line: We were going to war!

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Psst. Lemonhope.

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Hey. That's better.

name: Lemonhope
line: Who are you?

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: My name's Phlannel Boxingday, and I've been watching you and your hard, hot life in this desert from up there  in my cloud trawler. I thought you might need a hand.

name: Lemonhope
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Kid, truth be told, you're looking a little raw. You're totally free to come hang out with me until you're feeling stronger.

name: Lemonhope
line: Mm...

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: It's your choice.

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Ha-ha, let's go, dude.

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: So... read any good books lately?

name: Lemonhope
line: Oh, I can't read. They tried to teach me in school, but... mm, I just faked it.

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Ah-hah... Uh-oh. Hold that thought, buddy. Looks like a Greed Lard's picked up our scent. Dangit, he's a fast one. We can't outrun him, but maybe we can drive him off. I need you to play that flute of yours, Lemonhope. I saw how you rassled those scorpions before. Now play that flute with all your might!

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Keep it up, Lemonhope. It's working! He's turning off!

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: No, wait. He—he's mad. We've enraged him. He's calling his pack. The harp, Lemonhope! Quick, quick, quick!

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: We'll lure the beast into the rocks.

name: Lemonhope
line: No! Phlannel! Stop the ship! Stop the ship!

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: What? What for?

name: Lemonhope
line: STOP THE SHIP!

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: You see, Lemonhope? It's not peeps. It's dosh!

name: Lemonhope
line: Oh.

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Greed Lards eat dosh for food, and 'cause we killed it, we get to keep it all. That's my job, Lemonhope. When I'm not out being free and having adventures, I'm killing monsters that eat dosh and then keeping the dosh. And it just so happens that I'm looking for a new apprentice. What do you think about partnering up with old Phlannel Boxingday?

name: Lemonhope
line: Oh, my gosh, Phlannel, yes!  It's a dream come true!  A dream come true! A dream come true...

name: Lemonhope
line: ♪Poor little Lemonhope.  Throw me a lemon-rope. Is there a home for me and my harp? A place where my  friends... give me hu—?

name: Cow
line: Hey. Hey... What's going on back there? Somethin' don't feel right. Oh, hey! Lemonhope is here! Hey, man, how's it goin—?

name: Cow
line: Whoa, what the heck?

name: Cow
line: Run for it, Lemonhope! Run, run! C'mon! Why aren't you running?

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Morning, Lemonhope! Hey, is there any more white coal down in the hold?  More black diamonds equals more love potions. The old three Rs, y'know what I'm saying? Ro-ro-romance. No, man, I can't wait for some love. It's been so lo—  whoops. Oh, drats. Oh, well. Hey, don't sweat it, buddy. It wasn't your fault.

name: Lemonhope
line: It's not that, Phlannel. I had a bad dream.

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Again? That's the third time this week.

name: Lemonhope
line: I'm free now, Phlannel, to do all whatevs I ever wanted, but all I think about is my old life. What does it mean?

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Well, it's true you are free—free to help the Lemon People or leave them be—but a debt unpaid is not easily forgotten. So you are a prisoner still in deinem kopf.

name: Lemonhope
line: Huh. That's what Mistress always said, and I didn't even listen.

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Ah, Lemonhope, you're a doer, not a listener. You learn with your heart and hands, not your head. So... what will you do, Lemonhope?

name: Lemonhope
line: I'll... I'll go back, and I'll help my people, and maybe I'll feel better.

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: And how will you do it?

name: Lemonhope
line: Um... with my harp  and... my flute!  And help from my friend Phlannel!

name: Phlannel Boxingday
line: Nah, little Lemonhope. Of course, I'll take you as far as I can, but I can't interfere directly in Lemongrab politics. All those old pacts and treaties have me sklonked up tighter than a synthetic zanoit sterilizer bed compressor tube enlarger on garbage day.

name: Lemonhope
line: ♪Lemonhope's family held in Lemongrab's lair. Saving them will save me, but... I am pretty scared.♪

name: Lemonhope
line: Hmm...

name: Lemongrab
line: Looking for something?

name: Lemongrab
line: Well, you found me, fat Lemongrab.

name: Lemongrab
line: Oh, what's that you've got? Ah-ha, your little harp? But what's this?  I've got things in my ears tonight! So now I'm invincible!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Play it, Lemonhope!

name: Lemongrab
line: What? I—speak up, child!

name: Lemonhope
line: I didn't say anything.

name: Lemongrab 2
line: The harp! Hurry! I'll take care of the rest!

name: Lemongrab
line: What?

name: Lemongrab 2
line: The harp, Lemonhope! Play it!

name: Lemongrab
line: Oh, the harp! Didn't I just explain? I've got things in my—

name: Lemongrab
line: My—my—my things!

name: Lemongrab
line: Let—Let me go! Let me go!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: The harp, Lemonhope! The harp!

name: Lemongrab
line: This sounds awful!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Faster, Lemonhope!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Faster, Lemonhope!

name: Lemongrab
line: I can't stands no more!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Faster!

name: Lemongrab
line: AAAAAAAAAAAAAH—!

name: Lemonhope
line: Hmm?

name: Lemonhope
line: Coming!

name: Lemonhope
line: Wait, I'm—I'm—I'm coming!

name: Lemonhope
line: Hello? H—Hello?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You know, I was thinking, Lemonhope. Maybe you'd like to stay here in Lemongrab while Lemongrab recovers. Every kingdom needs a champion, and you're a true champion if ever I've seen one. Plus, I already set up a little room for you.

name: Lemonhope
line: Is he gonna stay like that?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Like what?  Oh, heh, no, no-no-no-no. Once his brains and bodies remix, he should be back to his lonely old self, which seems to be his only stable relationship model.

name: Lemongrab 3
line: Me!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: So will you stay, Lemonhope, and help your people once more?

name: Lemonhope
line: Nah, that's okay.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, but I thought...

name: Lemonhope
line: I mean, you guys are cool and all, but I mostly came back here so I could stop thinking about y'all all the time. I'll be back when I'm tired of being free.  See you in a thousand years, I guess. Peace!

name: Finn
line: Wow. I really thought he was gonna stay.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Me too. I even wrote a song about it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey! Don't laugh.

name: Finn
line: Let me hear it!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No! It's terrible.

name: Finn
line: Come on!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Come on! Do it, do it, do it, do it, do it...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Gah! Okay, okay.

name: Marceline
line: Thanks for helping me record, Finn.

name: Finn
line: No problem, Marceline.

name: Marceline
line: Now, I'm gonna sing something really personal, so don't laugh at me.

name: Finn
line: I would never dream of it... m'lady.

name: Marceline
line: Now, start a slow beat, and keep it steady, or it'll mess up everything.

name: Finn
line: You got it!

name: Marceline
line: Huh? Finn, you messed the beat up!

name: Finn
line: Marceline, if you're thinkin' about your dad so much, then... why don't you go see 'im?

name: Marceline
line: He's not worth the effort.

name: Finn
line: Not worth what effort?

name: Marceline
line: Well... first, I'd have to draw a circle with a happy face in the center and then... uh... douse it with bug milk.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah?!

name: Marceline
line: And then you're supposed to chant something like , "Maloso vobiscum et cum spiritum."  But... I-I don't really wanna see him. I'm still mad about the thing with the fries.  Huh?!

name: Finn
line: Wwwwhhhat?!  Whoa... whoa!! Aaagh!!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Marceline!

name: Marceline
line: Finn... what the heck did you do?!

name: Finn
line: I... reunited you with your family?

name: Lord of Evil
line: Is this kid your evil servant?

name: Finn
line: I'm not evil, Marceline's dad. I'm super good!

name: Lord of Evil
line: "Super good?"

name: Finn
line: What're you doing?!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Stealing your soul.

name: Marceline
line: Dad!  Ugh! You always do stuff like this!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Haha! Oh, Marceline! I never know what's gonna set you off! Whoa! Is this the family ax?

name: Marceline
line: Wha—? HEY!!!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Did you turn it into some kind of lute?

name: Marceline
line: Give it back, and get out!!!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Okay, I'll go. I've got business to attend to, anyway—sucking up all the souls in Oooooo...

name: Finn
line: WHA—Gh—NO!!

name: Lord of Evil
line: See you kids later!

name: Marceline
line: My bass!

name: Finn
line: I've unleashed evil onto Ooo ! We've gotta stop 'im, Marceline!

name: Marceline
line: Fine... but I'm only coming with you to get my bass back.

name: Finn
line: Hey! How do I kill this guy, anyway?

name: Marceline
line: Finn! You can't kill my dad!

name: Finn
line: Oh! I'm sorry! I didn't mean—

name: Marceline
line: No! You literally can't kill my dad! He's deathless!

name: Finn
line: Oh...

name: Fluffy Person
line: Huh?  Who the fluff are you?

name: Lord of Evil
line: Um... Well, I'm sure not the guy who's gonna suck out your soul.

name: Fluffy Person
line: Good 'cause that's, like, my number one fear.

name: Lord of Evil
line: Really!? Well... I know a little exercise for that! Wanna try??

name: Fluffy Person
line: Wow...

name: Lord of Evil
line: First... close your eyes.

name: Fluffy Person
line: Okay!  AAH! You coulda killed me!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Ah, but I didn't! And now, aren't you thrilled just to be alive?

name: Fluffy Person
line: Yeah, I guess... So what?

name: Lord of Evil
line: So... This next part will be all the more... horrifying.

name: Finn
line: There!! Below us! A gathering of Fluffy People! May-haps they've seen your father! Marceline... release the Finn-bomb!  They're all freaked out!

name: Marceline
line: It's because they're scared of him.  Hm. My dad's been here. Come on. Let's go.

name: Finn
line: No! We gotta help this guy. I've got some soul food that Jake packed for me. You like, uh, collard greens or country-fried steak?

name: Marceline
line: Look. You wanna help him? Help me get my bass back.

name: Finn
line: How will that help hi—?

name: Marceline
line: MY DAD STOLE MY BASS GUITAR, FINN!! And when I get it back... I'm gonna break it over his neck and slam my dad back into the Nightosphere!

name: Finn
line: Oh, clam! But first you gotta return the souls your dad sucked back to these sad, little husks. Right, Marceline?

name: Marceline
line: Uh, sure, yeah, yeah, we'll do that.

name: Head Marauder
line: So I popped his head like a cork! And I says, "That's what I think of Expanding Earth Theory!"

name: Lord of Evil
line: Alright.

name: Marauders
line: Huh?!

name: Lord of Evil
line: I've got a joke, too.  What wears a dark suit, is completely evil, and is about to suck out all your souls?

name: Head Marauder
line: Yo mama!

name: Lord of Evil
line: That's right! I'm your mama!

name: Marceline
line: Red Rock Pass. If my dad wants to get through the mountains, he'll have to come through here.

name: Finn
line: We can work together! And smash 'im with this rock! And once he's smooshed, all the souls will go back to their rightful bods.

name: Lord of Evil
line: So, finally taking a run at your old man, huh?

name: Marceline
line: Daddy...

name: Lord of Evil
line: Karate kick!!

name: Finn
line: Marceline!! Keep 'im right there!! HrrrrRAAAAGH!!!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Karate chop!!  You can't destroy me!

name: Marceline
line: No... D-dad... I-I don't wanna destroy you...  Look, just... stay out of my life!!

name: Lord of Evil
line: You're not even alive!

name: Finn
line: You blew it, dude. We're supposed to be a team—a team whose sport is stop-your-dad-from-suckin'-souls... ball.

name: Marceline
line: I just want my dad to care about me.

name: Lord of Evil
line: Of all history's greatest monsters, you are by far the most evil thing I've encountered. Offer your soul to me, dark one.

name: Gunter
line: Wenk wenk.

name: Lord of Evil
line: NO! You can't have my soul! I don't even...! Look, just get in here.

name: Gunter
line: Wenk wenk.

name: Lord of Evil
line: Keep your crummy soul!

name: Ice King
line: Gunter! Who told you you could fly?!

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Huh? No one sucks the life from my penguins except me! ...And maybe polar bears, because that's just nature, Gunter.  You darest encroach upon my domain?!  You've raised my frosty dander! And for that, I shall—  AAAAAOOOOOHHH!! I've soiled my tunic... completely by choice!

name: Lord of Evil
line: YES!!

name: Finn
line: Aw, man! He's growing huge!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna take 'im down!

name: Marceline
line: Finn, you're like an ant to him.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah? Well, this ant's about to get in his pants!

name: Marceline
line: What?

name: Finn
line: You know!  Because I'm going to make him uncomfortable while I release those souls! RAAAAAAAAGH!!!  Give up those souls, Marceline's dad! In the name of justice!!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Huh?  Oh, Marceline. Still following me?

name: Marceline
line: I'll stop following you if you give me back my guitar!

name: Lord of Evil
line: No, Marceline.

name: Finn
line: NO ONE FLICKS ME IN THE BUTT WITHOUT MY CONSENT!!!  Whoooaa!!  The souls... Lumpy Space Princess! He got your soul, too?!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What? Nah. I totally saw Hot Dog Princess get sucked in here, and I wasn't invited?! I was all, "What the lump?" so I'm crashin' this party!

name: Finn
line: Well, I'll save you... I'LL SAVE ALL OF YOU!!

name: Marceline
line: IN YOUR FACE, DAD!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Give back that ax, Marceline! You don't respect it enough!

name: Marceline
line: Well... you don't respect anything! Dad!! DAD!! I'm outta here!

name: Finn
line: BUT—!!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Fine!! Go!! I'm too busy sucking to deal with you!

name: Finn
line: NO, WAIT! Marceline!! Keep talking to 'im! When he's talking, he can't steal souls!!

name: Marceline
line: I said I'm outta here!

name: Finn
line: Diversion... need... diversion.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my Glob, you guys! Drama bomb!

name: Lord of Evil
line: Marceline, do you really feel this way?

name: Marceline
line: Dad, I...

name: Lord of Evil
line: Marceline... of course I love you.

name: Marceline
line: Dad...

name: Lord of Evil
line: I'm sorry I ate your fries. I didn't mean to hurt you.

name: Marceline
line: It's okay, Dad. It's... it's really okay.

name: Lord of Evil
line: No, it's not okay. They weren't even very good. They were really cold. I love you, Marceline. Don't you ever doubt that.

name: Marceline
line: I love you, too, Dad.

name: Lord of Evil
line: Oh, Marceline, I am so—

name: Finn
line: YALALALALALALALALALALALALA!!!!!

name: Finn
line: MALOSO VOBISCUM ET CUM SPIRITUM!!   I'll see you in the Nightosphere, ya sick freak.  YES!!!!

name: Marceline
line: Finn!! How could you do that?!

name: Finn
line: How could I... save the day?

name: Marceline
line: How could you embarrass me like that and then stab my dad?!

name: Finn
line: How could I embarrass-save you??  WHOA! Marceline!

name: Marceline
line: I'm glad he's back in the Nightosphere. That was emotionally exhausting.

name: Finn
line: I'm also exhausted emotionally. Or... wait. I mean, I mean physically.

name: Marceline
line: I've been meaning to ask you... What's with that pocket on your shirt?

name: Finn
line: Oh, Jake's in here. 'Sup, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Are you okay, dude?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, why?

name: Jake
line: You look bored.

name: Finn
line: Naw, that's just how I look when I'm listening to music.

name: Jake
line: Well good, because I'm about to kick it up a notch.

name: Finn
line: Bring it!

name: Finn
line: Who do you think it is?

name: Jake
line: Could be anybody.

name: Finn
line: Hmm... I can't quite make it out.

name: Ice King
line: Eee!

name: Finn
line: Ahh! It's the Ice King!

name: Jake
line: The Ice King?!

name: Ice King
line: Think this is the right address,  mmm is this, is this....

name: Finn
line: Eiiiiaah!

name: Jake
line: Yeah! Kick his butt, dude!

name: Finn
line: Eat my sword, Ice King!

name: Finn
line: Aww.

name: Ice King
line: You can not defeat me, child!

name: Finn
line: I will, though! With a sweet kick!  Psych!

name: Jake
line: Whoo, hoo hoo!

name: Ice King
line: Now I can kill you! Oh wait, wait, wait. I am so stupid! Silly Billy! I came by to tell you the good news!

name: Finn
line: What's the good news?

name: Ice King
line: I'm getting married... to someone who wants to marry me!

name: Ice King
line: My betrothed is right over there!  Hi, honey!

name: Old Lady Princess
line: Hey, cool guy.

name: Ice King
line: I'm a lucky guy—I didn't even have to kidnap this one! She fell in love with me the moment I slipped on her engagement ring!

name: Finn
line: Eww.

name: Old Lady Princess
line: Bye-bye!

name: Ice King
line: The lady penguins are throwing her one of those "bachelorette" parties.

name: Jake
line: This is weird, dude.

name: Finn
line: Hmm... if you get married, what about capturing princesses?

name: Ice King
line: Oh well, no more capturing pretty princesses for this Ice King!

name: Finn
line: Ohhh...  well, fare thee well, Ice King!

name: Ice King
line: Hmm?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, good luck with ye and thy creepy wedding.

name: Finn
line: We totally support your decision to stop capturing princesses!  I'm happy for him.

name: Ice King
line: Sure wish someone would throw me a bachelorette party—oop, I mean, "man-lorette" party.

name: Finn
line: But we hate you.

name: Ice King
line: If you won't throw me man-lorette party, then I'll never have my last hurrah before buckling down with that battle axe! It'll drive me back to a life of stealing hot princesses! Is that what you want?!

name: Jake
line: No. No, no, no, no, no.

name: Finn
line: Dude, we gotta show him a good time and treat him right. Otherwise, he'll go back to imprisoning ladies! I-I can't have that! I—

name: Jake
line: Shhh, I know. I know that you can't have that. Don't worry.  Alright, let's go party, Ice King.

name: Ice King
line: Best man-lorette party ever!

name: Ice King
line: Fah!  Hahahaha! Now I'm gonna go get married! Hehehehe! ♫I'm gonna get married!♪

name: Finn
line: Bye, Ice King! Good luck!

name: Jake
line: Have fun being married!

name: Finn
line: No more stealing princesses!

name: Ice King
line: Yeah--wait. No more s-stealing princesses? Wow.

name: Finn & Jake
line: What?!

name: Ice King
line: I didn't realize I'd have to give up stealing the ladies.

name: Jake
line: But you said you were fine with it!

name: Ice King
line: I know what I said, but, y'know, sometimes you say things and then you don't really mean them.

name: Jake
line: What? Are you serious?!

name: Ice King
line: I'm just not sure I wanna get married in such a hurry. What if she's just after my  Demonic Wishing Eye and Ghost pouch?

name: Finn
line: We just took you out partying so that you could feel better about getting hitched!

name: Ice King
line: Maybe I'll just go back to capturing lots of girls. It's what I feel comfortable doing, y'know? Being free, wind at my back, lots of girls, kidnapping 'em.

name: Finn
line: Alright, here comes my double kick!

name: Jake
