line: Finn, Finn, cool yourself, buddy. We need to get this guy married, remember?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I remember.

name: Jake
line: Watch.  Let big brother handle this.  Hey, Ice King? Don't be nervous. Marriage is the most beautiful thing that could ever happen to a jerk like you.

name: Ice King
line: Really? Why?

name: Jake
line: "Why?"  Poots, that guy is good. Why? Why?

name: Finn
line: Jake—

name: Jake
line: Not now!  Why, why, why, why, why?

name: Ice King
line: My mind is made up—80% sure. No marriage.

name: Finn
line: Well, uh... don't you wanna grow old with somebody? Right?  Just like these old swans.

name: Ice King
line: Bleh, those stinky old swans. Huh?

name: Finn & Jake
line: What?!

name: Ice King
line: Ohhhh, now I get what you guys are trying to tell me! Marriage is a thing that allows me to capture a princess forever and let her live inside of me!  Marriage is the most beautiful thing in the world!

name: Finn
line: Uhh... Yeah—I-I never—uhh... I guess it is.  Jake, this is bad news, man! We gotta go tell him that he can't eat his wife!

name: Jake
line: Eh, let's cross that bridge when we get to it. Look how happy he is.

name: Ice King
line: The wedding? Back on—100%!

name: Finn
line: Phew!

name: Jake
line: All that's left is the lousy wedding.

name: Finn
line: I'm weddy for the wedding!

name: Finn
line: Y'know, even though the Ice King is a wad, I'm pretty happy for him.

name: Jake
line: Uh-huh. This wedding looks lame, man.  Be prepared to be bored outta your mind.

name: Ice King
line: Finn, Jake, you made it!  Come on up here. I'm almost finished tying up my bride.

name: Finn
line: Weird—and your bride is into that?

name: Ice King
line: This is a traditional wedding ritual for good luck in the Ice Kingdom. You see, she'll be hoisted up and then lowered down—and when she touches my beard from above, she will be my queen!

name: Finn
line: Well...  cool, man. I'm glad y'all are happy... being crazy together.

name: Ice King
line: Thank you! Excuse me as we finish preparing for the nuptials. 2, 4, 8, 16, 20, uh—

name: Ice King
line: Yes—32, 64, one hundred and—eh.

name: Finn
line: Huh? Her eyes are huge! I'm gonna go check 'em out.  And stop scratching your ear, man—it's gross.

name: Jake
line: It wasn't me—it was my foot, dude.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, you've got ridiculously large eyes, princess! Are you allergic to somethin'?

name: Old Lady Princess
line: No, Finn. I was just born like this.

name: Finn
line: Why are you crying?

name: Old Lady Princess
line: I'm not crying, Finn—my tear sac is broken!

name: Old Lady in eye
line: Help me!

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Old Lady Princess
line: I didn't say anything.

name: Old Lady in eye
line: The Ice King cursed me! You've gotta set me free. I would rather die than marry the Ice King!

name: Finn
line: He tricked me! And I was happy for that son of a toot!

name: Jake
line: Look at her ring.

name: Ice King
line: She fell in love with me the moment I slipped on her engagement ring.

name: Finn
line: That's what cursed her! Don't worry, princess. I'll remove this ring and save your life.

name: Ice King
line: No! She's my love boat!

name: Finn
line: No, man. You cursed her. She hates you!

name: Ice King
line: Okay, that's your opinion!

name: Jake
line: Wait a minute!  So you knew she was cursed all along, which means you knew she wasn't trying to steal your Demonic Eye Junk or whatever, and you knew you had total control of her!

name: Ice King
line: Yeah, yes, that's right.

name: Jake
line: So then why did you make us go through all that junk about why marriage is worth stuff?!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, I don't know... I'm complicated—and spontaneous!  That's probably why she wants to marry me!

name: Jake
line: She wants to marry you because you brainwashed her!

name: Ice King
line: Silence!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Whoa, wait!  Aw, man!

name: Ice King
line: It's time for the lowering ceremony! Hoist her up!

name: Ice King
line: Hehehehe! Commence the lowering!

name: Ice King
line: Yes, nothing can stop me now.

name: Finn
line: Hyah!  What is wrong with you, man?!

name: Ice King
line: Strangling the groom's nose at a wedding?  What's wrong with you?! You're the one that there's something wrong with!

name: Jake
line: Gotcha!

name: Old Lady in eye
line: Thanks, man

name: Jake
line: Hehe, no problem.

name: Finn
line: Ehh.

name: Ice King
line: I think you dropped something.  Catch!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Old Lady Princess
line: Huh, what?

name: Finn
line: JAKE!  Grrrr.  Oh, hey.

name: Jake
line: Hey.

name: Finn
line: You got the ring off her finger?

name: Jake
line: Huh? Oh. Oh yeah. Now she's not hypnotized, but we're still frozen.

name: Finn
line: I got a plan.

name: Jake
line: Oh, good.

name: Ice King
line: Now, let's try that again.  Lower her!

name: Old Lady Princess
line: You lousy, butt-faced pig! I hate you!

name: Ice King
line: Here she comes. Yes, touch my beard, deary. Yes, that's right. Almost there...

name: Finn
line: Now!

name: Ice King
line: Oh! I'm married, right, snowman?

name: Snowman Priest
line: Yes, it's official.

name: Finn
line: It's official! You done married a dog, dude!

name: Ice King
line: What? What's that supposed to—  Oh no.

name: Jake
line: Wait, what the—? What am I laughin' about?

name: Finn
line: And now everything's back to normal.

name: Jake
line: Well, I wouldn't say everything.

name: Ice King
line: Come on, guys. Help me celebrate my un-marriage.

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Denise, we have concluded you're an interesting and conventionally hot woman. My siblings and I would like to request a date with you. Are you available for a date with Glob on Saturday, Grod on Friday, Grob on Thursday or Gob on Sunday? Please select your dates now.

name: Party God
line: Ahhh-rooo! That's nice.

name: Cloud kid 1
line: Eat it, Lich!

name: Cloud Kid 2
line: Eat it, Lich!

name: Both
line: Woooh!

name: Jake
line: What?! No more crackers? Eeeee.  Prismo! Prismo! Hey man, Hey!

name: Prismo
line: Heeeey.

name: Jake
line: Bad news, you ran out of cheese crackers.

name: Prismo
line: What! No.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man, what are you going to do about it?

name: Prismo
line: Jaaake.  I'm Prismo the wish master. We can have all the cheesy crackers we want.

name: Jake
line: Prismo, you make me happy, Prismo.

name: Prismo
line: Oh, stop.

name: Jake
line: I'm always smiling when I'm around you. I just noticed that. I always am.

name: Prismo
line: I'm always smiling when I'm around you, too.

name: Jake
line: This feels so good.

name: Both Prismo and Jake
line: Peppermint Butler! Death!

name: Jake
line: What's up.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hey umm, those guys are doing selfies on The Lich. Is that safe?

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Definitely going to send these to Denise.

name: Prismo
line: Oh yeah, it's fine, he's harmless.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Yeah, but why isn't he killing everyone in the room right now? Controlling our minds, making us rip each others eyes out while we buttercup one another?

name: Prismo
line: Well, The Lich's primary function is to cause mass death. And since he can't do that while he is trapped in my Time Room,  he's stuck in a standstill, like a machine without a purpose.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: I am so scared right now.

name: Death
line: Yikes.

name: Jake
line: Aw, don't worry, he ain't gonna hurt nobody.

name: Jake
line: Ha! You got a cup on your head. Ha-ha, you dingus!  See, he's docile as a lamb.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hmm. Well, okay, then I guess I can go for a selfie, too.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man, make your dreams come true.

name: Jake
line: Oh, what time is it?  Hey, yo, Clock Face, what time is it?!

name: Jake
line: Aw, boo to that! Yo, Prismo I gotta get back before Finn realizes I'm not home. He gets worried if I stay out too long.

name: Prismo
line: All right, later, dude.

name: Jake
line: Laters.

name: Finn
line: Jake, where were you?

name: Jake
line: I was, umm, in the, uh... All right, man, I'm gonna come clean. I've been doing a lot of partying at Prismo's lately.

name: Jake
line: Come on, man! I don't even take Lady up there.

name: Finn
line: Dude, I found out my human dad is still alive.

name: Jake
line: Whoa, what?

name: Finn
line: He's at some place called the Citadel.

name: Jake
line: Whoa.  Are you gonna go see him?

name: Finn
line: I don't know. Maybe I shouldn't. Maybe there's a good reason why he didn't raise me. Like, he was probably captured by thieves and kept a slave for years.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, or maybe he was ambushed in the wild and hid you so you wouldn't be captured, too.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, maybe it's better not to rock the boat.

name: Jake
line: But... it might also be good to find out if you have any genetic risk factors or allergies or whatever. Plus, you get to see what you'll look as an old guy. Could be cool.

name: Finn
line: Heh. I guess it would be okay to meet him, just to know what I'll look like.

name: Jake
line: Cool. Oh! If we hurry, Prismo might be still partying.

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Come on, just one more game.

name: Prismo
line: I don't know, mang, I was just gonna clean up and crash out.

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Oh, yeah! More players!

name: Cosmic Owl
line: You guys wanna play some Card Wars?

name: Jake
line: No. Prismo, we need to get to the Citadel.

name: Prismo
line: Whoa! You guys do not wanna go there. Seriously.  Check this out.  The Citadel is a nasty-sized prison. Only the worst of the worst end up there. Real stink faces. These guys are the pits—the armpits.

name: Finn
line: Hey, my dad must be like the warden there.

name: Jake
line: I know you can't grant Finn and me any more wishes. So, we brought Shelby along to wish on our behalf.

name: Shelby
line: Hello.

name: Prismo
line: Oh, look at that, a little guy.

name: Shelby
line: So, I wish for ... a pony for my GF!

name: Prismo
line: Done.

name: Jake
line: Shelby!

name: Shelby
line: Sorry, dudes. My girl's been hounding me for a pony for months. I'm gonna get mad points for this.   Oh, hi! So you got it? That's great! You like him? Uh huh ... you gonna name him what? Speedboat? Yeah, that's a good one.

name: Jake
line: Dang, Shelby.

name: Prismo
line: A wish wouldn't have worked anyway. You can only get to The Citadel committing a cosmic crime.

name: Jake
line: So, what do we gotta do? Rob a cosmic bank? Steal a space baby?

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Oh, uh, I just remembered I gotta go home. Gotta groom my feathers  Goodbye! Goodbye!

name: Prismo
line: Listen, if you guys are serious about this,  all you gotta do is find a certain sleeping old man and bring him here.

name: Jake
line: That's it?

name: Prismo
line: Yep. He's on one of those floating islands out there. It kind of looks like an upside-down duck.

name: Jake
line: That doesn't seem much of a crime.

name: Prismo
line: Yeah, but that's all there is to it.  For now.

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Prismo
line: Check it out! I got gifts for you guys.

name: Finn
line: Ha, cool it's a penlight.  Jake, don't look directly me in the—Aaah!

name: Jake
line: Come on, Finn let's go find this old guy.

name: Prismo
line: Oh! One last thing, dudes.  Whatever you do, don't wake him up.  Okay, you can go now.

name: Finn
line: Pew! Pew!

name: Finn
line: You ever wonder what happened to make a place all wrecked up like this?

name: Jake
line: Nope. Hey, upside-down duck!

name: Jake
line: No, wait, it's right side up.

name: Jake
line: Aha!

name: Jake
line: Hey! Get out here, old man!

name: Finn
line: Dude, shh. Don't wake him up.

name: Jake
line: Hey, get out here, old man.

name: Finn
line: Pizow!

name: Finn
line: Old man.

name: Jake
line: Uh oh!  Finn, a little help?

name: Finn
line: Bizzow

name: Jake
line: Gizzow

name: Finn
line: Let's hoof it!

name: Finn
line: Jake, don't jostle the package.

name: Finn
line: Yahct!  All right!

name: Finn
line: There's too many of them!

name: Jake
line: Let's see here.

name: Prismo
line: Oh, hey, your back.

name: Jake
line: Dude's got serious night terrors.

name: Finn
line: What now, Prismo?

name: Prismo
line: Okay, wake him up.

name: Both
line: Finn and Jake What?!

name: Prismo
line: Yeah,  I just wanted one last look at myself.

name: Finn
line: Wait, this old man is you?

name: Prismo
line: That's right Prismo is nothing than dream of a wrinkly old man. Man, I've gotten a lot hairier, but also balder? Tell me how that makes any sense. I'm like a big ol' hairy raisin.

name: Jake
line: So, wait, what happens to him when we wake him up?

name: Prismo
line: Poof! I'm a goner. Thus ends mighty Prismo.

name: Jake
line: Prismo.

name: Prismo
line: Killing a wish master is a cosmic crime. Once I'm dead, the guardian will show up and take you to The Citadel.

name: Finn
line: I don't think seeing my dad is worth sacrificing your life

name: Prismo
line: Ah, don't worry. As soon as my corporeal body falls back asleep again,  in a thousand years,  I'll be back.

name: Jake
line: You sure about this?

name: Prismo
line: Hold on, let me take one last look around.

name: Prismo
line: Huh, thought I'd own more stuff by now. Okay, let's do it!

name: Jake
line: Still feels like a bad idea, man.

name: Prismo
line: Pssh! What could go wrong?

name: The Lich
line: Wake up.

name: Prismo
line: Wa—Wait, I've changed my mind—

name: Jake
line: Prismo, don't worry! I'll put the old man to sleep and get you back!

name: Finn
line: Dude! That means The Lich jacked our entry into The Citadel.

name: Jake
line: Aw, no man, how are you gonna see your dad?!

name: Old man Prismo
line: Hello? Who are you guys? Could any of you strangers tell me how to go home? I'm done with my nap.

name: Jake
line: Old man Prismo.

name: Old man Prismo
line: I just woke up from my nap, but I'm ready to go back to bed. I'd like to go home and take a nap.

name: Jake
line: No, old man Prismo, don't talk to him.

name: Old man Prismo
line: Are you my son?

name: Jake
line: Old man Prismo! No!

name: Finn
line: Oh, dang! I think they're going to the Citadel! I'M COMING, DADDEEEEEEE!

name: Jake
line: Dude! Shooting star! Make a wish!

name: Finn
line: That's not a shooting star.  It's just a firefly.

name: Finn
line: What are you gonna wish for dude?

name: Jake
line: Oh, you know. That something special only two bros can share.

name: Finn
line: I think I'm wishing for the same thing!

name: Jake
line: You mean the...

name: Finn and Jake
line: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant!

name: Jake
line: Oh, man I wanna ride it so bad!

name: Finn
line: How do you even control those things?

name: Jake
line: You can't control it dude. You have to let it give you control.

name: Finn
line: Oh wow!

name: Jake
line: Start wishin'!

name: Finn
line: What the...

name: Hot Dog Princess
line: That's a distress flare from my other Hot Dog Knights. I sent them to rescue my other other Hot Dog Knights who got trapped in a labyrinth! Their message says... "Baby... us... trouble... time...." They must be in grave danger!  Hot Dog Knights are slow.

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, princess. Jake and I are on it.

name: Finn
line: Whoa! Fudge, man! This place is yoga balls huge!

name: Jake
line: Yoga balls aren't that really huge, dude.

name: Finn
line: Hey, man, I can't analyze everything that comes out of my mouth.

name: Jake
line: Should we like, try to cheat and stretch over the walls?

name: Finn
line: Nah, man. Look.

name: Jake
line: Okay, well... then... I'll just hook my legs around this stump and stretch us through so we don't get lost. Like this, see?

name: Finn
line: You're a cool guy, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Thank you.

name: Finn
line: Man, there're so many passage ways and stuff. It'll take us forever to find those Hot Dog Kni-iights?

name: Hot Dog Knight #1
line: Don't eat me, man!

name: Jake
line: Nah, we're here to save you, guy!

name: Hot Dog Knight #2
line: Oh, thank the stars. We were lost!

name: Hot Dog Knight #3
line: How didn't you guys get lost?

name: Finn
line: We're just gonna follow Jake's body back.

name: Hot Dog Knight #1
line: At the centre of the maze, there's a magic creature that grants wishes.

name: Finn
line: Wishes?  Are you thinking what I'm thinking?

name: Finn and Jake
line: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant!

name: Jake
line: This is our chance!

name: Hot Dog Knights
line: Hot dog!

name: Jake
line: Hold on boys, we're gonna get us some wishes!

name: Jake
line: Choo-choo.

name: Finn
line: Dang, Jake. Your body's getting thin!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I got a nice bod!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but now...  not so nice.

name: Jake
line: Okay, well you can take your weird body issues and tuck them somewhere private. Where I can take my healthy body issues... and  FIGHT A GOLEM!

name: Golem
line: TRESPASSERS!

name: Finn
line: Wrap 'im up, Jake!

name: Jake
line: I'm on it!

name: Jake
line: Stop flexing. I can't... stretch.... any more.

name: Hot Dog Knight #2
line: You can do it, Jake! Stretch stretch stretch! Wrap him up more!

name: Jake
line: Come on baby.

name: Jake
line: Golem... taken care of... dudes.

name: Hot Dog Knight #1
line: Jake, you're amazing.

name: Finn
line: Jake, you need to take it easy on the stretching, man.

name: Hot Dog Knight #2
line: Wha... n-no Jake, you can keep going, man. Right guys? Come on, Jake, you can go!

name: Hot Dog Knights
line: Jake! Jake! Jake!

name: Jake
line: Hehe.  Alright. Come on, Finn. The stretching train is leaving the station. Choo-choo.

name: Jake
line: Just gotta keep stretchin'.

name: Finn
line: Uh, yeah.  Wait! Stop, Jake. Ya hear that?

name: Jake
line: No.

name: Finn
line: This place is weirding me out. Keep your eyes open for traps and junk.

name: Jake
line: Whoa! Check that out!

name: Finn

name: Finn
line: ♫ I can walk and sing, I can kill Silly Sam! ♫

name: Jake
line: Hey, what stinks?  Smells like...

name: Finn
line: Pit!  Looks a mite bigger inside the game...

name: Jake
line: Jumpin' over this pit is easy, remember? We could do this backwards with our eyes closed!  Ahh! I'm burning!

name: Finn
line: Jake!!

name: Jake
line: Haha. What, man?

name: Finn
line: Whaa?! Jake, what the shake?

name: Jake
line: Check it out! Extra lives!

name: Finn
line: You still have two left!

name: Jake
line: Ow! It burns! Ow! Haha!

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Finn
line: Dude! What if losing all your lives in here makes you die in real life? Or worse?!

name: Jake
line: ...that makes me just want to sit here and feel bad.

name: Finn
line: No way, man! We're gonna cross that hole! With real-world grit! Come on!

name: Finn
line: Faster, Jake! Get ready to stretch it!

name: Finn
line: Watch out, Jake!

name: Jake
line: Ow! Whew! That was pretty intense, dude!

name: Finn
line: We're pretty intense dudes!

name: Jake
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Ha!

name: Jake
line: What's that sound?

name: Finn
line: Sounds like...

name: Finn and Jake
line: Bouncy Bee!

name: Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Finn
line: Hi-yah!  Oh!

name: Finn
line: You ready to flippin' this guy up, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Easy-peasy, livin' greasy!

name: Jake
line: No!

name: Jake
line: Finn's dead! Finn! No!  Why?  NO!!! Curse this false virtual world!  Oh, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Yo, what up?

name: Jake
line: Oh, Finn! You're alive!

name: Finn
line: Yeah. I got extra lives, man!

name: Jake
line: Oh my gosh. Let's never die again! There's nothing more precious than a life! Ooh, dude, look. Coins! Oh man, oh man!  Heeheehee!  Ooh! Oh, man, dude, these coins are thick! Let's take 'em back to the real world! We'll be filthy stinkin' rich!

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Hunny Bunny!

name: Jake
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Time to use the bomba!  Come to me, bomba.  Bomba!  Oh, bomba! I can't select you without my controller!

name: Jake
line: Let's get outta here, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Man, we've never run away from Hunny Bunny!

name: Finn
line: Firepit, Bouncy Bee, Hunny Bunny. They're supposed to be the easy parts! They're all hard as butts! Sleepy Sam is gonna be the ultimate butt-kicker!

name: Jake
line: Look, Finn. The most important thing to remember is that I still have one giant coin.

name: Finn
line: Man, get a hold of your brains! We need to stay alert for Sleepy Sam!

name: Jake
line: Hey, that's him right there!

name: Finn
line: Get down!  What's he doing? He's probably trying to psych me out!  I'm gonna break you, Sam. When I'm done, they'll call you...uh, Stinky Sam. Stupid Frog.

name: Finn
line: M-m-my mitts didn't- didn't work! Come on, help me punch him!

name: Jake
line: Okay!

name: Jake
line: Let's get outta here, man! We're gonna die!

name: Finn
line: I can see the light! We're almost there!

name: Finn
line: Oh no, man. It's the edge of the screen! We're trapped and they'll be here any second.

name: Jake
line: Wait, dude! The bomba!

name: Finn
line: We can't get the bomba!

name: Jake
line: Wait, dude.  Hmm.

name: Finn
line: Jake? Jake!

name: Jake
line: What if I...?

name: Finn
line: That's not how it works!

name: Finn
line: Jake, let go of that!

name: Jake
line: But we need the bomba!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Oh, holy cow! That was nuts, man!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man. And I got my coin!  What?! A penny?!  BMO!  Oh no! Are you alright buddy?

name: BMO
line: Did you have to- oh no! Wait! Run!

name: Finn
line: No, no, no! Don't kill us, man! No!

name: Jake
line: Aw man, don't kill us! We don't have extra lives!

name: Sleepy Sam
line: Oh wait. Hold up, guys. Check it out! Sunshine!

name: Sleepy Sam
line: Oh boy, that feels good!

name: Hunny Bunny
line: Alright! See ya later, Sam!

name: Finn
line: You mean, that's it? You're not gonna kill us?

name: Sleepy Sam
line: Of course not. The game's over; we won! All we wanted was the sunshine. And to kill that computer that's been imprisoning us for so many years.

name: Finn
line: ...what?

name: BMO
line: Help! Oh no!

name: Finn and Jake
line: BMO!

name: Sleepy Sam
line: Oh sure. He's dangerous! If he hits his button again, back we go.

name: Finn
line: BMO, quick! Hit your button!

name: BMO
line: I can't, Finn! I'm stuck!

name: Sleepy Sam
line: You want him to hit his button? What's wrong with you?!

name: Jake
line: We'll save you, BMO! Finn, go!

name: BMO
line: They're too strong! Use the combo move, Finn! The combo-

name: Finn
line: The combo move? That never works!

name: Jake
line: Listen! You got this, man! I know you-  I know you can do it, buddy! You got this!

name: Finn
line: Okay, okay. You got this, Finn! For your friends!  Up! Down! Left! Left! Right! Right! Down! Spin! Down! Up! Left! Right! Left! Down! Spin! Up! Down! Jump!!

name: Finn
line: Whoa.

name: Jake
line: Woohoo!  You did it, Finn! I knew you had the stuff! Right, BMO?

name: Finn
line: Oh, crud!

name: Jake
line: BMO!

name: Finn
line: I'm sorry, buddy!

name: BMO
line: Finn, I told you about the danger! And now look! You fricasseed my stuff and broke our house all up!

name: Finn
line: I know, I know. I was double butt. For real.  Man! Now that we know what to expect, next time will be way more fun!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, yeah!

name: Finn
line: How 'bout it, BMO? You in?

name: Finn
line: Hey! Don't do the combo move on us!

name: Jake
line: We were only joking!

name: Finn
line: BMO! Stop messing around!

name: Jake
line: Finn, oh my grosh, Finn! It was amazing!

name: Finn
line: Whaaaa?

name: Jake
line: I had a croak dream, Finn! My croak dream!

name: Finn
line: Oh... my glob.

name: Finn
line: For real? With the Cosmic Owl and everything?

name: Jake
line: Mhmm!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, a real croak dream?

name: Jake
line: Yeah man!  There was a rocket ship , you weren't there , and there was a Banana Man  and I ran out of air and in outer space  and isn't that great Finn!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, well no I mean, I don't want you to die! And where was I? I'm your best friend!

name: Jake
line: Aww, come on Finn  There's nothing to worry about! Think about it, I don't know any Banana Man Finn and rocket ships haven't been reinvented yet! I'll probably live another hundred years, easy.

name: Finn
line: Ummm... Yeah, yeah I guess. .

name: Jake
line: Someones downstairs.

name: Finn
line: I'll take a look.

name: Jake
line: Who is it?

name: Finn
line: It's the Banana Man!

name: Finn
line: Shhh!

name: Jake
line: What do we do?

name: Finn
line: I don't know!

name: Jake
line: Is he still out there?

name: Finn
line: Uhh no, he left.

name: Jake
line: Phew, see I told you today wasn't the day! Hey, you wanna make an ice cream pizza?

name: Finn
line: Jake, your croak dream just gave us the upper hand, we can cheat now, now we can cheat fate.

name: Finn
line: We'll track down that Banana Man and crunk up his schemes and save you!

name: Jake
line: Finn,  when I die my individual earth conscious is gonna go all everywhere while glob tallies my deeds!

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: I'm gonna be all around you!  In your nose, in your dreams and socks, I'll be a part of you in your earth mind!  It's gonna be great!

name: Finn
line: Dude, STOP. SAYING. ALL THIS. CRAZY. NONSENSE. It's makin' me messed up. I'm 13. You're messin' me up.

name: Jake
line: No one can change your croak dream, Finn, not even you.

name: Finn
line: We'll see about that, come on!  Wait, just let him walk a few more steps.

name: Jake
line: Why?

name: Finn
line: 'Cause that idiot's about to walk right into the sun and burn up. And we'll be done with him.

name: Jake
line: No man, he's walking into his house! .

name: Finn
line: Oh, what?! He built his house on the sun?! This guy's insane!

name: Jake
line: Finn, did you eat your breakfast?

name: Finn
line: No, why?

name: Jake
line: Because you forgot how the sun works. The sun is actually far away, it's not just sitting on the horizon.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Right on. Lets chase after him!

name: Jake
line: You gotta eat your breakfast man, eat the protein. Helps your brain.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, yeah whatever you say, Mom. Lets go!  C'mon!  What's he doin' with that glass?

name: Jake
line: Whoa, just like in my dream!

name: Banana Man
line: Huh? Hmmm.   Uh, Uh, Uh, Yeah! There we go!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Stop talkin' about your croak dream. It makes me uncomfortable.

name: Jake
line: Dude, just except it!

name: Finn
line: No dude!

name: Jake
line: What are you doing man?  Ahh!!

name: Finn
line: Hand me some leaves and twigs and stuff.  Hmmm.

name: Jake
line: Ahh!

name: Jake
line: Wait, you're not gonna kill him, are you?!

name: Finn
line: Naw, man.  It's just a warning shot to scare him in to moving far away from here.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Ahh!

name: Banana Man
line: Hmmm?  Ha Ha! Look Out! Woo Hoo!  Ha ha! You Hoo!  Hoo! Yeah! Woo! Do it! Yeah! Oh yeah! Woo!  Yeah!  Move it!  Work it! Ha ha!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna try to shoot this arrow again.

name: Jake
line: Careful man, I want to be alive for my croak!

name: Banana Man
line: There we go!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, Jake, were gonna get this guy.

name: Jake
line: Dude, man. I appreciate why you're doing this, but you're not gonna stop me from transcend in to Glob world!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna cry, man. If you say that one more time, I'm gonna... Let's go fetch that first arrow to reuse, 'cause we're out of arrows.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: No!

name: Jake
line: The rocket from my croak dream! Oh, man. I guess... I guess this is it. I've gotta embrace this today!

name: Finn
line: Shushers, you're not getting on that rocket!  Err!  JAKE!

name: Jake
line: You can't stop destiny, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Jake, no!

name: Jake
line: Huh? No, man!

name: Banana Man
line: Huh?  What in the--  No, no, no! It's not ready yet!

name: Jake
line: Yeyuh!

name: Finn
line: Aww!  Nooo!

name: Jake
line: Banana Man! Get your butt on board, we've got a date with destiny!

name: Finn
line: No!

name: Jake
line: Get off! You cant mess with fate!

name: Finn
line: No! I'm not gonna let you die!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Don't do this!

name: Jake
line: Finn.

name: Finn
line: No!

name: Jake
line: Finn, let me go.

name: Finn
line: Please.  Please.

name: Jake
line: You have to let me go.

name: Finn
line: No.  Please.

name: Jake
line: DESTINY!

name: Banana Man
line: There's not enough boom boom sticks in the stick hole! No!

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Take care, brother. You weren't by my side in the croak dream but I'm glad you're here to see me off

name: Finn
line: That's right! I wasn't in his dream! That means...

name: Jake
line: See you on the other side!

name: Banana Man
line: Ahh!

name: Jake
line: Huh? Whaaa?

name: Jake
line: Am I in glob world?

name: Jake & Banana Man
line: Ahhh!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Jake!!  Jake I'm coming with you!

name: Banana Man
line: Ahh!

name: Jake
line: Fiiiiiiinnn, don't try to stop me, Finn!

name: Finn
line: No, it's okay, I'm here to stay by your side!

name: Jake
line: Thanks man, I knew you'd come around.

name: Jake
line: Take it easy there, buddy.

name: Banana Man
line: I just wanted to borrow some sugar!!

name: Jake
line: Poor Banana Man. So I guess that wasn't a real croak dream after all! It didn't really come together quite right.

name: Finn
line: Heh, heh yeah.

name: Jake
line: Hey no wait, in the croak dream it was me and Banana Man,  but this time you were here too.  So...  it must be destined to happen again when your not around!

name: Finn
line: Well in that case, I'll just have to never leave your side ever again for the rest of our lives.

name: Jake
line: Hmm?  What are you doing?

name: Finn
line: I can never leave your side ever again for the rest of our lives.

name: Jake
line: Get off of me!

name: Finn
line: For the rest of our lives!

name: Jake
line: No!

name: Finn
line: I know where you live!

name: Jake
line: No, c'mon!

name: Finn
line: Ooh! Ooh!

name: Jake
line: I know you're not a ghost, Finn! Stop chasing me!

name: Banana Man
line: Aoo hoo! Ha ha!  Uh huh!  Ha ha!  Yeah!

name: Neptr
line: BMO, when is something going to happen?

name: BMO
line: Shh. Just watch. It happens once a month—I promise.

name: BMO
line: This is it!

name: Neptr
line: Oooooh.

name: Neptr
line: But where does it go?

name: BMO
line: That's none of our business.

name: Bug
line: Tickets! Get your tickets here! See the world's greatest tiny circus! Witness the amazing wood-eating termite! The mighty strong-ant!

name: Ringmaster
line: You're late, Blue Nose! Get into makeup!

name: Male audience member
line: You stink!

name: Ringmaster
line: Too much artsy, not enough fartsy. We talked about this, clown!  Heh-heh, wasn't that something? Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls, you're perfectly safe. But at this time, I'd like to ask anyone with a medical condition to please leave the premises at once. What you're about to witness with your own eyes may shock and astound you to your very core.

name: Ringmaster
line: Tonight, I give you the wildest, most dangerous beast anywhere in captivity! The horrible, the stupendous...  Goralina!

name: Ringmaster
line: Attagirl!

name: Dad bug
line: Don't worry, Junior. It's all part of the act.

name: Ringmaster
line: Blue Nose! Boy, am I glad to see you. Come in, come in! Sit down. You did good out there tonight with the belly-dancing routine. Real good. Aw, don't give me that look. I know we said we were going to let the chipmunk go at the end of last season, but Goralina is our big draw. You understand that.

name: Ringmaster
line: We're barely breaking even here—what do you want from me?! Look, there's another show in an hour. You come up with an act that can rival Goralina, then we can talk. But look what she got us last night three whole pennies. Think you can make me this kind of cash? You do that, I won't need the chipmunk anymore. I'll let her go, just like I promised. But you're gonna have to lose the fancy-schmancy stuff and  give the people what they want! Get it?!

name: Ringmaster
line: The old Blue Nose magic.

name: Dad bug
line: Aren't you glad we came back for the second show?

name: Ringmaster
line: Oho! You were great, kid! That's what I'm talking about. With you and the chipmunk in the show, we're gonna have a real one-two punch!

name: Ringmaster
line: Hey... I know what I said, but I want to see how many boxcars this gravy train has on it.

name: Ringmaster
line: Look at her. It's like looking at a big, sad dollar sign.

name: Ringmaster
line: Yipe!

name: Ringmaster
line: Whoa-ho!

name: Strongman
line: Oh!

name: Ringmaster
line: That's right. Lift with your legs first, then put your back into it.

name: Ringmaster
line: There he is. Gotcha! Thought you could skip out, eh? and start your own circus!

name: Strongman
line: Yeah, you! You and your corny clown hat!

name: Other performer
line: Hey, he's smiling!

name: Strongman
line: What's so funny?

name: Other performer
line: You rat!

name: Strongman
line: You creep! What's the big joke?

name: Neptr
line: Ha ha! Neat!

name: Candy Child
line: “Mom, I wanna play outside with consuelo!” “Cool your jets! It’s super dangerous outside. Little kids have to stay in the castle.” “But I’m rowdy.”

name: Candy Child
line: “Yeah, well, but look.”

name: Candy Child
line: “See what happens? You want a playdate with death? That’s why you have to stay inside. And, cause consuelo’s mom is a pain in the neck. I-”

name: Chocoberry
line: In the heat of the sun you burn like a pink little baby!

name: Candy Child
line: Help!

line: What?

name: Chocoberry
line: Oh, a scream!

name: Candy Child
line: Help!

line: Well, now, what seems to be the trouble?

name: Candy Child
line: I saw something in the water, and I was like, “No thanks!”

name: Candy Child
line: Out of my way, muffin man!

name: Mr. Cupcake
line: How rude! Well, whatever that little girl saw will be a mystery forever.

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Transport for seeker X-J-77 Strong has arrived.

name: Mr. Cupcake
line: Oh, trust me, I’m strong indeed. Pow, pow!

name: Mr. Cupcake
line: Eh? Not enough? You need to feel them guns?

line: Verifying.

name: Mr. Cupcake
line: Woah! Well, hello frisky!

line: Todd! I’m right here!

line: Identifying. Dangerous mutant. Initiating defensive mode.

line: Seeking human.

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Human. Come home to safety. Seeking human.

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Human. Come home to safety.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Jake, what about this one?

name: Jake
line: Great. We’re gonna look so great for this funeral.

name: BMO
line: How do you like my bandeau? I was too embarrassed to get a bra fitting. I know they are professionals, but it’s just too intimate.

name: Jake
line: You look great!

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Settlement detected. Continuing search for X-J-77.

name: Banana Guard
line: Get him! Attack! Attack!

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Hostile cylinders detected. Release countermeasures.

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Hostile cylinders immobilized.

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Engaging hostile bobbleheads.

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Neutralizing. Please do not turn your system off during neutralization.

name: Finn
line: Holy mud! It took out the Gumball Guards like they was nothin’!

name: BMO
line: BMO doesn’t like it!

name: Jake
line: We gotta chop this thing into smashaghetti.

name: Finn
line: I’ll take you out with these hug nubs!

name: Banana Guard
line: Ah! I’ll help you, Finn!

name: Banana Guard
line: Ah! Help me, Finn!

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Hostile mutant neutralized.

name: Finn
line: You got this, Finn Mertens. You’re a buff little bionic baby.  Rush! Rush!

name: Finn
line: Rush!

line: Verifying. Human identified.

name: Human Transport Ship
line: Infant PG-8-7 Mertens.

name: Finn
line: Uh… You mean me?

name: Human Transport Ship
line: You will assist this transport in locating seeker X-J-77.

name: Human Transport Ship
line: PG-8-7 Mertens, please climb aboard. Please climb aboard. Come on.

name: Finn
line: Mertens? Wait, do you, like, know me?

name: Jake
line: Got it! Great work distracting ‘em, Finn.

name: Jake
line: You okay, dude?

name: Finn
line: I feel like that ship might’ve been important, but I’m fine.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, my hands are a little sore from smashing, but I’m fine too.

name: BMO
line: Hiyah!

name: BMO
line: Ha ha! Once again, BMO comes out on top.

name: Jake
line: BMO!

name: Finn
line: BMO, you okay?

name: BMO
line: Signal received. XJ-7-7 requests transport.

name: Finn
line: Hey.

name: Susan
line: Hi, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Uh, sorry again my grass arm busted you up.

name: Susan
line: It’s okay. At the time, Susan was gonna bust you up. Where’s Jake? Is he okay?

name: Finn
line: He’s outside. He’s bringing the ship over.

name: Susan
line: The ship?

name: Susan
line: Oh, ship.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: How ‘bout it, Suze? Does any of this look familiar?

name: Jake
line: Me and Finn took this whole bad block down ourselves! Took a bit of fananglin’, but I never hunt what I can’t catch.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey. Looking for this?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I’ve been holding onto the remnants of your cranial implant since you kidnapped Finn and almost killed Jake. You remember that? I’m running a comparative mass spec test now.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yep. Looks like both your implant and the ship have the same technological origin. Human technology.

name: BMO
line: Finished!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Looks like BMO’s finally downloaded the ship’s last commands.

name: BMO
line: Signal received. Proceed to extraction point. Return seeker XJ-7-7 and cargo to Founders Island, Home.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: BMO, can you give us printouts?

name: BMO
line: Yes, okay. Printing.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm. Man, this island’s way far out there.

name: Susan
line: Susan needs to go back here. To this island. Not sure why. Susan having crazy week.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I don’t know, Susan. It’s so far. Even I don’t know what’s out there. It’s a pretty risky solo mission.

name: Finn
line: I’m going too. I mean, we gotta find out where this ship came from. There could be more of them. And, if this is human-made, then there might be other humans on that island. That’d be cool to see, right?

name: Jake
line: I’ll come too!

name: BMO
line: And so will we!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, we won’t.

name: BMO
line: Oh.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, it sounds like you’re all determined. You should borrow my boat, though. This thing is trashed.

name: Jake
line: We don’t need a boat! Have you forgotten? With a little imagination…

name: Jake
line: ...I can be anything that you could ever...

name: Jake
line: ...Oh, I lost focus. Hey, yeah, can we borrow your boat?

name: Finn
line: Are you up here, Fern?

name: Fern
line: Hey. Thanks for letting me crash on the roof.

name: Fern
line: It’s nice up here.

name: Finn
line: Stay as long as you want. I came up here to ask a favor. I might be gone for a while on this trip, see, and I need someone to, uh, cover for me here in Ooo.

name: Fern
line: Are you sure? I mean, hero biz is your whole thing. And, whatever I am, I’m not you.

name: Finn
line: You can just do your own thing with it. Like, if some huge gross monster’s gonna do murder on a buncha innocents, uh, kill it! But kill it you-styles. Just don’t go nuts.

name: Fern
line: Okay, I can handle that.

name: Fern
line: Thanks for trusting me.

name: Finn
line: No, thank you, Fern. I better go pack.

name: Fern
line: Uh… We should figure out a better thing.

name: Finn
line: Let’s figure out something better.

name: Charlie
line: Hey… Dad.

name: Jake
line: Charlie, hi. It’s me! It’s dad.

name: Jake
line: I have to go on a sea voyage, honey. I wanted to say bye.

name: Charlie
line: That’s cool. Hey, you can’t see this shirt, right? This shirt has like, four different breakfasts on it.

name: Jake
line: I can’t hear anything. Bye, love you! Mwah!

name: Charlie
line: Mkay, dad. I’ll tell the other pups.

name: Jake
line: And, I’m telling the other pups!

name: Jake
line: Aw, I’m gonna miss you so much, lady.

line: 아우 너무 걱정하지 말고 그냥 가서 좋은 형님 노릇하고와. 그리고 올때 기념품이나 사오고.

line: Yeah, of course. It’s my boat.

name: Marceline
line: And we care about him, you dingus! Come on! Sorry, Marcy is up past her bedtime.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, it’s true.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I want you to be really careful out there.

name: Finn
line: Don’t worry. We’ve got Susan.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That’s not what I mean. Finn, I get the sense that this trip’s more important to you than you’re letting on. I mean, if you make it to that island, you might find out some pretty heavy stuff. About the humans and where you came from. About yourself. All I’m saying is, you have to promise me, promise me, that you’ll come home safe.

name: Finn
line: I-

name: Fern
line: Hi Bonnie!

name: Finn and Princess Bubblegum
line: Ah!

name: Fern
line: I’m Fern. I kind of already know you.

name: Fern
line: I have a lot of fuzzy half-memories from when I was this guy.

name: Finn
line: Well, just keep the ones where she’s our boss, and forget everything else.

name: Susan
line: Finn?

name: Marceline
line: Hey! Good morning.

name: Susan
line: Boat’s loaded, ready to go.

name: Fern
line: Ah! I flinched.

name: Finn
line: It’s cool.

name: Finn
line: We’ll be back soon, I promise!

name: Jake
line: Bye, kids! Don’t be naughty.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Bye! Good luck! He’ll be safe.

name: Marceline
line: Hey, aren’t you that dude that totaled Starchy’s motorcycle?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ah fudge! What time is it? I gotta go to Veggie Village for the Annual Technology Fair. Will y’all watch my Princess Plant for me?  I usually hire a sitter but- Ehn!

name: Finn
line: Of course, Princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Awesome! Thank you, Finn. I will be back on the Morrow. SCREEEEEEEE!

name: Finn
line: You’re in good hands, Princess Plant.

name: Finn
line: And then the monster got punched in the head and the princess was safe. And everyone was happy!

name: Finn
line: Time to lay down beautiful buddy.

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Time to make sleepies!

name: Finn
line: Ahhh. We killed it, man!

name: Jake
line: I know!

name: Finn
line: Okay.  All we gotta do, is go to the Land of the Dead and reclaim the flower’s soul from death before Bubblegum returns.

name: Jake
line: Okay!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Excuse me, but did you all say Land of the Dead?

name: Finn
line: Oh, what?! Oh, uh… yeah.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: I can take you.

name: Finn
line: Really?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Certainly, Finn.  For a small price. Which we can discuss later! Take my hands, gentlemen!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Stare into where the two walls meet. Now slowly, cross your eyes.  Do it, fools!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: The portal opens!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Say ‘hi’ to Death for me if you see him! He lives in a castle made of light!

name: Jake
line: Uh… okay.

name: Finn
line: Thanks Peppermint Butler.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: And don’t drink the-  water.

name: Jake
line: Whoa man, who knew Peppermint Butler was so-

name: Jake
line: So… um… you wanna…  hop in my paunch and I’ll stretch us down?

name: Finn
line: Uh… Oh look, an escalator!

name: Finn
line: Hey, dude.

name: Finn
line: That must be the main entrance or some biz!

name: Jake
line: Let’s go!

name: Finn
line: Holy schmow!

name: Gate Guardian
line: Welcome to the Underworld. Cause of death?

name: Spear Skeleton
line: Uh… Spear in the neck.

name: Gate Guardian
line: You may enter.

name: Spear Skeleton
line: Yay!

name: Gate Guardian
line: How did you die?

name: Finn
line: Uh…

name: Finn and Jake
line: Because we’re awesome!  Whoo! Ha ha! Ha ha!

name: Gate Guardian
line: Hmm… Step out of line.

name: Finn
line: Awh dingle!

name: Jake
line: Wait up, dude! Follow me, and do as I do.

name: Gate Guardian
line: Hey! I said no!

name: Gate Guardian
line: Hey! Hey!!

name: Jake
line: Ha ha, we’re in! Come on, man!

name: Gate Guardian
line: Man…

name: Finn
line: Yes!

name: Jake
line: Yes!

name: Finn
line: Where do we go now, dude?

name: Jake
line: Up there!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Oooooo!

name: Jake
line: Death’s castle is pretty, dude.

name: Finn
line: Let’s go!

name: Skeleton Guy
line: Hey! What’s up, fellas! Hi. Lester.  Oh man, flesh! Haven’t seen this stuff in forever!  So warm and gushy and softy!  Look at all that flesh jigglin'!

name: Jake
line: Hey! If you love flesh so much, then watch this!

name: Lester
line: Whoo! You don’t know what you’re doing to me, guy! Fellas get over here! Flesh!

name: Finn
line: This is weird, man.

name: Jake
line: Don’t worry! They just think we’re cool!

name: Finn
line: Hmm… Do you guys think we’re cool?

name: Lester
line: No. We’re gonna rip that flesh off you! And eat it!

name: Finn
line: It’s bone-kicking time!

name: Finn
line: Oh shoot! Get-

name: Finn
line: Jake! There’s too many!

name: Jake
line: They’re tryin’ to peel me!  I… am not… a banana!  Hole!

name: Finn
line: It’s not a hole, Jake! It’s just a divot!

name: Jake
line: Sorry!

name: Finn
line: Dude, shrink down!

name: Jake
line: Oh! Sorry.

name: Finn
line: I don’t like the underworld too much.

name: Jake
line: I don’t know. Wouldn’t be so bad if there weren’t folks trying to eat our skin.

name: Finn
line: I wonder how Princess Bubblegum is doing.

name: Princess Bubblgum
line: So! Who here invented this thing?

name: Finn
line: I’m glad she’s not coming back ‘till tomorrow.

name: Jake
line: No she said she’s coming back "on the Morrow."

name: Finn
line: Yeah, on the ‘morrow. That means tomorrow.

name: Jake
line: No man, the Morrow is her bird!

name: Finn
line: Come again?

name: Jake
line: It’s her bird! That thing is crazy fast! It’ll only take like twenty minutes to get back once that conference is over.  Are you listening, man?  The Morrow, is a bird.

name: Finn
line: We gotta go!  Coast is clear!

name: Skeleton
line: Halt!  Hey!  Hey Halt! Why you got your eyes closed, Halt?

name: Halt
line: I’m trying to picture in my mind’s eye where the fleshies are hiding.

name: Skeleton
line: Ooh! You’re a smart guy, Halt!

name: Finn
line: Wait, Jake! Do you hear somethin’? Come on!

name: Group of Skeletons
line: I didn’t see them… They were here, and now they’re gone!...

name: Finn
line: More skeletons! We’ve gotta be really, really quiet!

name: Skeleton
line: Get em!

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: I thought it would be funny!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Ahh!

name: Finn
line: Look! There’s Death’s castle!

name: Finn
line: I don’t see anyone. I guess you double-killed them with that avalanche.

name: Jake
line: Heh, awesome!

name: Finn
line: Now we just gotta cross that river!

name: Jake
line: River!  Man, I’m so thirsty! My mouth’s still all dusty!

name: SkulL
line: Yes…  Drink the water…

name: Finn
line: Whoa, okay Jake, don’t drink the water!

name: Jake
line: Come one! I’m so thirsty!

name: Finn
line: Dude! That skull wants you to drink the water! It’s bad water!

name: Skull
line: Don’t drink the water!

name: Jake
line: See? That means good right?

name: Finn
line: Jake…

name: Finn
line: Jake? Why you makin’ stupid face?

name: Jake
line: Who’s Jake?

name: Finn
line: Dang it, I knew that water was junk!

name: Skull
line: Tricked again by the River of Forgetfulness!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Get out of that water right now!

name: Jake
line: Hey! I don’t know who you are, mister, but I don’t like your attitude!

name: Jake
line: Help! Somebody!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Farewell, everyone!  Okay… Morrow! Back to the Candy Kingdom!

name: Jake
line: Help! Somebody help me! Stranger danger!

name: Death
line: Hey! Hey! I see you!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Your head!

name: Jake
line: Huh?  Who are you?

name: Death
line: Who are you?

name: Jake
line: I don’t know, man! Who are you?

name: Death
line: What do you mean? You’re in my castle!

name: Jake
line: Well, I didn’t know!

name: Finn
line: Dang it, Jake.

name: Death
line: You must leave this place. Now!

name: Finn
line: Death! We’re not leaving until our plant’s soul! And Jake’s memory!

name: Death
line: Another one. Be gone, mortal!

name: Finn
line: No! I promised Princess Bubblegum!  Oof! Oww… What happened?

name: Death
line: You can’t kick me because your brain is stupid!

name: Finn
line: Your brain is stupid!

name: Jake
line: Hehehehehehe, this kid’s pretty funny!

name: Death
line: Alright.  Pick an instrument.

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Death
line: To get stuff from me, you have to beat me in a musical battle.

name: Finn
line: But Jake’s the musical one! And he’s got poo brain!

name: Death
line: I don’t care.

name: Finn
line: I gotta find what I can really play! Oh glob, man!  Oh! Here we go!  Sleigh bells! YA WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW!

name: Death
line: So the contest begins!

name: Death
line: Hey, alright, so... who do you think won?

name: Jake
line: Oh, man! Skeleton guy by a landslide! He was like "Rughhh," he was like .

name: Finn
line: Dude!

name: Jake
line: What? Skeleton guy was awesome! You want me to lie?

name: Finn
line: Yes!

name: Death
line: I’m going to kill you now.

name: Finn
line: No! I still have to rescue stuff!

name: Death
line: Those are the rules in the Land of the Dead. Lose a music battle, lose your life.

name: Finn
line: Oh wait, wait, wait! Before I die, I’m honor-bound to tell you... Peppermint Butler says hi.

name: Death
line: What? You know Peppermint Butler?!

name: Finn
line: Yeah!

name: Death
line: Heh heh heh! Yo, you guys can have whatever you want!  Jake, stand up!

name: Jake
line: That’s me, right?

name: Death
line: Yes.

name: Jake
line: What’re you doin’?

name: Jake
line: What’re you doing?!

name: Death
line: Kiss of death, baby. You got your memory back.

name: Jake
line: Awh, gross! I wish I didn’t!

name: Death
line: Now I shall return the soul of this.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yeah! The Princess Plant!

name: Death
line: I'll see you dudes later.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hello, boys. Where’s my plant?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hello, Princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yay!  Thank you all for taking such good care of my plant! Now come here and give me a hug!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yay, hugs!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Ahem. Mr. Finn, Mr. Jake, I believe you still owe me something in exchange for that favor I did.

name: Finn
line: Sure!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, what is it?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: I’d like your flesh.

name: Jake
line: Quit bein’ silly, Peppermint Butler!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: I’m going to take it from you while you sleep.

name: Finn
line: Do you think it's right for Marceline to invite us to jam without Princess and BMO?

name: Jake
line: It's just a jam sesh. Is that what you're gonna jam with?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man. Balloon music is the future. Listen.

name: Jake
line: Pretty good.  I don't think you mastered it yet.

name: Finn
line: Well, duh. I just started.

name: Jake
line: Oh, dude. There's a note.

name: Finn
line: What's it say?

name: Jake
line: "Hey, guys, I had to run out, but I'll be back," blee-bloo-blop, "Don't go in my house."

name: Finn
line: That's it?

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Just "Don't go in my house" in all caps... written in blood.

name: Finn
line: Hmm.  What are you doing?

name: Jake
line: Eliminating desire from my heart. It helps pass the time.

name: Finn
line: Come on! I can't do that! Let's play Cloud Hunt 'til she gets here.

name: Jake
line: No, man, I got a mental block with Cloud Hunt!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, that's what makes it awesome, 'cause I know I'll win.

name: Jake
line: Oh, what?! Bring it on, brother! Now explain the rules 'cause I forget.

name: Finn
line: Okay. I count to ten and you go hide somewhere. Then, I gotta try to find you. You can hide... anywhere in here. Anywhere in here, ...but Marcy's house is off limits because she said so. Okay?

name: Jake
line: Got it.

name: Finn
line: Okay. I'm gonna start counting. Ready?

name: Jake
line: Yes.

name: Finn
line: Go! One...  Two... Three... Four... Five... Four...

name: Finn
line: Cloud Hunt... GOTCHA! Huh. Hmm.  AH-HA!  JAKE!  Get out of there! Marceline's gonna kill you! Jake! I know this isn't a mirror. What the—?! You're doing it wrong, even! Get out! Get out!!  Dude, get out of there! She's gonna kill us! She'll be home any minute! Did you read the note?! I mean, you read the note! You told it to me!!

name: Marceline
line: Smells like sourdough in here.

name: Jake
line: She's gonna kill us. Once she finds out she's gonna tie us up and eat us like a spider.

name: Finn
line: You don't think I know that?! Hmmmmmmm... We'll wait for the right moment and sneak out... right under her big, fat caboose.

name: Jake
line: Okay, man. I can do this.  Egh! Egh! Egh!!

name: Finn
line: Shh, here she comes!

name: Jake
line: Here she comes...

name: Finn
line: Shh, shh!!

name: Marceline
line: Huh.

name: Jake
line: Let's get outta here.

name: Marceline
line: Hello?

name: Jake
line: She didn't wash hands!

name: Marceline
line: Is someone here?

name: Finn
line: Shh!!

name: Marceline
line: That's what stinks.  Where are those dweebs?

name: Finn
line: This is Jake!

name: Jake
line: And this is Finn!

name: Finn & Jake
line: We're not home right now, so...  ...leave a message!  quiet down.] Leave a message!

name: Marceline
line: Uh... Yeah, hey, you guys. Are you still coming over? It's jam time, so, like, call me, 'kay?

name: Jake
line: Whatcha doin'?

name: Finn
line: Get down.  Love, FINN + JAKE"] When she gets this, she'll leave and we can escape!

name: Jake
line: Brilliant... but how's it gonna work?

name: Finn
line: I'll fly the paper as an airplane down the bedroom ladder. It'll triple barrel roll past the kitchen, open the fridge, and cook some eggs, then eat the eggs, and unfold itself as it lays in the carpet in front of Marceline's door!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, yeah, awesome, yeah!!

name: Jake
line: No, nah, nuts!

name: Marceline
line: Welp... they're not gonna show up, then I'll just work on my own stuff, I guess.  Take one for new concept album based on five hundred years of my journal entries. So here's some preliminary notes.  I... I wanna make this the most emotional album ever. So private and secret, that I'll never let anyone hear.

name: Jake
line: This is so wrong.

name: Marceline
line: No one can ever hear it. Ever. Take one.

name: Jake
line: We've crossed the line! I'm gettin' outta here, man!

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Do it!

name: Finn
line: What? What's it doing?!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Shh, shh, shh!!

name: Marceline
line: Oh, what?! What happened?! Ugh!  Where are you?! Oh, there you are... My broom.

name: Marceline
line: Stupid... thing— Get...  NO! Stupid—  UGH!!   Ugh!

name: Finn
line: Is it safe?

name: Jake
line: I dunno, man. Go scope the scene.

name: Jake
line: What happened, man?

name: Finn
line: I'm not goin' back out there.

name: Jake
line: Well... whaddaya mean? What happened?  Bro?

name: Finn
line: Is she awake?

name: Jake
line: Why are you talking?!

name: Finn
line: I'm wondering if she's awake.

name: Jake
line: Well, if she's awake, she can definitely hear you talking!

name: Finn
line: I'm whispering.

name: Jake
line: Well, now we're both quietly screaming.

name: Marceline
line: I can hear both of you.

name: Finn
line: Disguise yourself, fool!

name: Marceline
line: What're you bozos doing in my lair?

name: Jake
line: Dude, I think she sees us!

name: Finn
line: What the—?! DUDE! You shape-changed to look like me?!

name: Jake
line: Well, yeah!

name: Marceline
line: HEY!  Exssssplain yourselves.

name: Finn
line: We were playing hide-and-seek in your closet and you came home, so we hid in there all day. We saw... everything. And, oh, Glob, I mean, whatever you do to us, I just wanna say, we're sorry.

name: Jake
line: So sorry.

name: Marceline
line: Okay... apology accepted.

name: Jake
line: What?!

name: Marceline
line: I hide in your house all the time.

name: Marceline
line: Anyways, no hard feelings, guys! See you soon!

name: Finn
line: Marceline?  Jake! Jake!

name: Jake
line: Hmm?  Hey, man, did—

name: Finn
line: AAAAAAH!!

name: Jake
line: AAAAAAH!!

name: Finn
line: And when that salsa cloud had you by the tail...?

name: Jake
line: Ha ha, yeah. And I swung him around into that golden cactus?

name: Finn
line: Man, that was algebraic.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man, that adventure was tight.

name: Finn
line: Yeah.

name: Jake
line: I can't wait to get back home, though.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, me, too!

name: Jake
line: I need some sleep—

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna play some Battle Wars with Neptr on BMO for an hour, then work on that flier for PB's laser recital and catch up on my correspondence with my pen pal Danny Gladiolas from over in Maryville.

name: Jake
line: Great minds.

name: Finn
line: And then next what I'm gonna do is I'm— whoop!

name: Jake
line: Finn?  Finn!  Ohh!  Oh...

name: Finn
line: What the...?

name: Finn
line: Man, where's this supposed to be?

name: Finn
line: Uh, excuse me? Sir?

name: Huge King
line: Hmm? Oh! You're awake! Oh, that's wonderful!

name: Finn
line: Oh, thanks. Hey, where am I, anyway?

name: Huge King
line: Why, this is the famed Kingdom of Huge, of course. Heh. You fell through that crack in my ceiling and landed in a normal-sized pie.

name: Finn
line: Mm-hmm. Well, my friend up top is probs pretty worried about me, so I'd best get going. Can you give me a boost back up to that crack or whatever?

name: Huge King
line: Oh-ho-ho! No, no, no. Don't be silly, child. Your friend must be on his way to find you right now. You should wait for him here, or you could miss each other.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. I guess that does make sense.

name: Huge King
line: Of course! Besides, you're just in time to witness the chiming of my wondrous clock! It's set to do its chiming in merely an hour's time!

name: Finn
line: "Krimber"?

name: Huge King
line: Come! Food boys! Shower our guest with the kindnesses of Huge! We will await the clock's chiming in style and comfort.

name: Huge King
line: Dig in, child! There's always more to come!

name: Finn
line: Mmm. Oh! Apple scruffs!

name: Huge King
line: Just wait 'till you see my clock!

name: Bear
line: Ahh, good, you're awake.  Good good good good good. How you feelin'?

name: Jake
line: Ohh...  My--my cabbage aches a little... What happened?

name: Bear
line: Well, here I was, playing some Freecell, and then, wow! You fell down the hole, bounced off parachute #2, and landed on three ol' walnuts.

name: Jake
line: Parachute? Hole? Walnuts? Fell down, wait!  You mean we're falling right now?  Thanks for your help, buddy, but I gotta go.

name: Bear
line: Woah, hold up!  What's your hurry?

name: Jake
line: My friend's still up top. He could be looking for me. Or, he could be in trouble and every second I'm down here I'm falling further away. I gotta get back.

name: Bear
line: Uhhh, I think that's a pretty bad idea. You were unconscious while you were falling, remember? So you mighta been falling for weeks, or even months.  Trust me, it's possible. This is a very deep hole. If you try to climb out, you could run out of food.

name: Jake
line: But, I've got to do something.

name: Bear
line: I feel like you should probably not starve to death, so that when your friend comes looking, you're still alive.

name: Jake
line: Mmm. You know I think you're right!  Finn is a pretty heroic kid, I gotta admit. He'll probably be here in half a gif.

name: Bear
line: Oh, good, good. Well 'till then, please, make yourself at home. Here,  have a walnut.

name: Jake
line: Thanks, man. I'm Jake, by the way.

name: Seven
line: Hi, Jake. I'm Seven-seven-one-eight. Strange name, I know, but I'm pretty sure. See, I carved it in the floor when I first got down here so I wouldn't forget.

name: Huge King
line: Oh!  Oh! So marvelous!

name: Huge King
line: Oh!  Ooh-hoo-hoo! Ah-ha-ha!

name: Huge King
line: Oh. Oh my, oh my.

name: Finn
line: Well, that was actually pretty cool, but I should probably get going.

name: Huge King
line: Wh-a-a-a-at?! But, how can you leave now?  The clock is set to chime again in merely an hour's time!

name: Finn
line: I feel like Jake should've been here by now. I mean, what if he's lost, or--or hurt?

name: Huge King
line: But... this is not the Huge Kingdom Way.

name: Finn
line: Sorry man. I've got my mind made up.

name: Finn
line: Thanks for the food, though!

name: Huge King
line: Food boys!  Seize the child!

name: Huge King
line: I'm sorry son, but this is for your own good. If you just stay put, all you need will come to you in time, like it has unto me. But, you must sit, you must wait.  Yes, yes tie him up with normal spaghetti and bring him food, yes!

name: Huge King
line: Soon you will see, my boy! All good things come to those who wait.

name: Seven
line: It started out as a day like any other. I was a door-to-door sales bear specializing in candles and playing cards, making my way to the Candy Kingdom like I'd done 200 times before.

name: Seven
line: I guess my horse got stung by a bee or something, 'cause all of a sudden he just skronked the math out. We went off-road and I got thrown back into my wagon.

name: Seven
line: When the shaking stopped I crawled out, only to find I was wedged deep in a hole and sinking fast. I had just enough time to rig up a parachute...

name: Seven
line: ...And I've been falling ever since. Sometimes walnuts would fall into the hole, and sometimes rain.

name: Seven
line: And I guess that was enough.

name: Jake
line: Mm. So how did you pass the time?

name: Seven
line: Well, for a long time I just waited to be rescued.

name: Seven
line: 599 Mississippi... 3,600 Mississippi...

name: Seven
line: But that was crazy boring.

name: Seven
line: So then I got really into Freecell and things got a lot better.

name: Jake
line: Freecell?

name: Seven
line: Yeah, it's like Solitaire but there's very few unsolvable shuffles.

name: Jake
line: Mm.

name: Seven
line: It's a great game, great game. I really love it.  But it's nice, you know, to have someone I can play Freecell alongside of.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man. You know, also, I know some other card games we could play. You know, together.

name: Seven
line: I forgot there were games like that!

name: Huge King
line: And then, there was another time--This was several years back--The clock chimed early, and I thought, "oh boy, here we go." But it turned out, one of the food boys had simply gotten wedged under... Finn!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Huge King
line: Are you listening?!

name: Finn
line: Of course. Food boy in the clock.

name: Huge King
line: Huh. Yes.  Anyway, as I was saying, one of the food boys had gotten himself wedged in the...

name: Finn
line: All right buddy, let's run through this again. 'Cause we're only gonna get one sht.

name: Finn
line: When the clock strikes 12, I beckon kindly to yonder food boys.

name: Finn
line: Hey, you guys like clean jokes?

name: Finn
line: Then chuck some delicious food in their mouths. Having never before known generosity, they'll immediately make me their leader and undo my spaghetti.

name: Finn
line: Ha ha!

name: Finn
line: Then, with a perfectly timed serving tray, I'll deflect the hunter bot's brass arrow.

name: Finn
line: Swift but delicate, the arrow will gain heft via the chandelier bat's filched asparagus.

name: Finn
line: Meanwhile, the serving tray from before has entered phase two, sending Ken Mangosteen careening into the clean silverware.

name: Finn
line: But also, the asparagus arrow has caused a domino thing of food to happen, culminating in a huge lemon falling.

name: Finn
line: It's not a perfect plan, but with a little luck, I think it's got a good chance.

line: Uh, Jake, can't we get rid of these Clown Nurses? They make me feel ridiculous.

line: Well, now you know we can't jump off of birds.  I paid them up front. They don't leave until the job's done. Besides...  They're funny.   Look, she just farted.

line: What does that even mean??

name: Jake
line: I don't know... but I'm feeling better already. Ah. That tickles.

name: Big Clown Nurse
line: You want me to stop?

name: Jake
line: No, keep going.

name: Finn
line: You're gross, man.  Look! Deep in the forest of trees, there's a Cyclops whose magical tears can heal any wound. See? See?

name: Head Clown Nurse
line: Maybe you should leave the medical decisions to the medical professionals, and my professional prescription is... your toe needs crazy smooches! It's the only way!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Wha?

name: Finn
line: Wait! Wait! Wait! There's another way! There's my way! Let me show you my way!

name: Finn
line: Ahh! Let me go!

name: Head Clown Nurse
line: It's the only way!

name: Head Clown Nurse
line: It's the only way!

name: Finn
line: MY WAY!!

name: Finn
line: Hmmm...

name: Tree Stump
line: Ring, ring! Look, there's only two choices, bro. Take your pick. There's the path on the left, Hair Fall-Out Path. No more hair again, ever! Or the path on the right, Smelly Path. Makes you smelly forever. Hoohoo, you won't believe it.

name: Finn
line: Isn't there another way?

name: Tree Stump
line: Nope.

name: Finn
line: But what if I just went—

name: Tree Stump
line: No, that's it! You have to choose! There's no other way! Choosing is the only way. Choosing—is the only—way.

name: Head Clown Nurse
line: It's the only way!

name: Tree Stump
line: Hey, listen man, the Smelly Path's not actually that bad!

name: Finn
line: NO! I choose MY WAY!!  My way.

name: Bush
line: Ring ring. Hello, dummy police? Yes, there's a strange dummy lurking around my house. Okay, yes. Thank you. Goodbye.

name: Finn
line: Wha...?  I need to cross the river. The Cyclops is over there.

name: Bush
line: You can't cross this river. It's impossible! Look! The current is so fast, it'll turn your butt inside-out for real, doofus. And the water's so acidic it'll crump your boat in half. It's like orange juice. It's gross. There's a bridge, but it's a trap! Plus, the water's jamming with electric eels. Wow, so weird. Anyway, that's it, there's no other way around, you dummy.

name: Finn
line: But I need to get across.

name: Bush
line: Listen what I'm telling you. There's no way. ...Ugly tramp.

name: Finn
line: Glob, Glob it, Glob it, Glob it...

name: Bush
line: Huh? What are you saying? "Globbit, Globbit"? Who's Globbit?

name: Finn
line: MY WAY!!

name: Bush
line: Glibby glob, man! You're crazy! We're not even half way across! You gotta go back, man! It's the only way, you ugly fat-smelling fat-head!

name: Finn
line: NO, MY WAY!!

name: Finn
line: MY WAY!  Oh, Glob, oh, Glob, oh, Glob, oh, Glob.

line: Uhh, excuse me, friend.  You're pretty tall, can you reach up there and get my wheel for me? Gotta get these melons home to my wife. You know how it is.

name: Finn
line: MY WAY!

line: Rainy!

line: Psycho fink.

name: Finn
line: ♫ I was wrong. Was I wrong? No. Yes... Yes... I was wrong. How could it be? I trusted in my guts, but ended up all nuts. I was wrong. How could it be? Listened to my brain, but ended up insane. The melons rolled...over that lady. I went too far. How could it be?  How did I go... too far? ♫

name: Forest Cyclops
line: Hey! I know you're here for my magical tears, but you won't have any, because I never cry.

name: Finn
line: I don't want 'em anymore.

line: What? Stop lying. You're here for my tears, aren't you?

name: Finn
line: No. I hurt a small, hairy man's wife. I just wanna go home.

name: Forest Cyclops
line: You're just trying to make me feel sad so you can steal my tears when I cry... but I've got a heart of stone, buddy. I'm EVIL!

name: Finn
line: Dude! What's wrong with you? I said I don't want your tears!

name: Forest Cyclops
line: YOU'RE LYING!

name: Finn
line: I'M NOT LYING!!!

line: Ah, no thanks. I think the kisses work better.  Excuse me, don't stop, keep going, please.

line: Hmm...

line: Dude! It's Marceline the Vampire Queen!

line: You still petrified of vampires?

line: Stop making this poor old dude cry!

line: I can make him do whatever I want. Watch. Henchman, amuse me.

name: Marceline
line: Now hop around in a circle.

line: Oh, no. Don't worry, sir. I'll see to it you get set free.

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Marceline
line: I know this place seems a little dead, but don't worry. It'll soon be undead.  Corpses buries in mud that's black, from death I command you to come back! ] Hahaha! Are you ready to lead an evil army of the undead?!

line: Why are you thinking so hard?! Just party hard! Whoo!

line: Then you might love this. The cutest dimple plant ever!

name: Finn
line: Whoa-ho-ho! That's cool!

name: Marceline

name: Finn
line: Hahaha! A dimple!

name: Marceline
line: Okay, henchman, now... I need you to do something.

name: Finn
line: What is it?

name: Marceline
line: I want you to take this dimple plant outside, and kill it!

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Marceline
line: Use my ax bass.

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna murder you. I'm not entirely sure why. I'm sure this will end happy...  AAH! I don't get it! There's always a twist to the stuff Marceline makes me do, but where's the twist in bumping off this bush?!

name: Marceline
line: There is no twist. Kill it now!

name: Finn
line: But wh—

name: Marceline
line: You should've hacked it to pieces when it was still adorable...

name: Finn
line: I-I thought—  Sick!!

name: Finn
line: Hmm...

name: Finn
line: Hey. Can't the sun, like, destroy you?

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, it hurts, but I kinda like it. Reminds me of when I'd scrape my knees up as a kid, and my mom would patch me up... you know what I'm sayin'?

name: Finn
line: Uh... Jake told me I came out of a cabbage.

line: Hey, Finn, I need you to strangle some pixies.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, sure. That sounds good.

name: Marceline
line: Whoa, why are you being so casual about that? Strangling pixies is some hardcore evil.

name: Finn
line: I'm not fallin' for your junk anymore, lady! You just like sayin' poop that jacks with my brain!

line: I knew it! Hey... what about your old henchman? Who was that guy?

name: Marceline
line: Oh, just an old diving buddy.   So, you ready to go strangle some pixies?

line: Yeah, man! I mean, wo-man.

line: Jake?

name: Marceline
line: Ow!

name: Finn
line: Marceline!

name: Jake
line: I'm stakin' that vampire and settin' you free, no matter how terrified I am!

name: Jake
line: She's still controlling your mind with evil! Now, back off and let me vanquish her from existence!

name: Finn
line: I can't let you do that, Jake!

name: Jake
line: I love you, brother. YAAAH!

name: Finn
line: Jake, listen! Marceline is not how she seems! She's a radical dame who likes to play games!

name: Jake
line: What are you even talkin' about, dude?!

name: Finn
line: Oh, man!

name: Jake
line: MARCELINE!  Where is she?!

name: Finn
line: I-I'm free! Jake! You faced your fear and saved me!

name: Jake

name: Marceline
line: Is it cool?

name: Finn
line: Yup!

name: Marceline
line: Finn, I owe you big-time! Changing into a bat and hiding in your pack was genius!

line: Oh, uh, that reminds me. You're fired from your henchman-ship. It's no fun when I can't trick you.

line: Definitely.

line: I'm home!  Who's going to have dinner with me tonight? Sorry fellas, i gotta go make some dreams come true. Where are we headed, dream token? Aha, ah Finn again.

name: Finn
line: Huh! The cosmic owl? Does that mean this dream is important? Is this a prophetic dream? And is this stuff all symbolic or literal?

line: Huh? Sorry, but...

line: What does it all mean, boy?

line: Dang she's gone...wait, what are you asking me? I can't tell you that? Hoo!

name: Jake
line: I don't know, Shelby. I think it's too dark in there!

line: AHH!

name: Jake
line: Pull 'im up, pull 'im up!

name: Finn
line: I think I just had a prophetic dream. Cosmic Owl was in it, he was acting all choco-loco.

name: Jake
line: Finn, you gotta go back to sleep!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

line: Cosmic owl dreams are important always! You gotta Go Back and find them again.

name: Jake
line: Get back in there! It's too important! You don't got time on my class ring, or bets with Shelby, or Stomach fishing! Oop!

line: Alright let's do it!

name: Finn
line: Hey! Cosmic Owl, you still here? Whoop!

line: Buttfeathers!  Love is weird, man! It really does come when you least expect it!

name: Prismo
line: Dude, you've been working on that since you got here! Take a break! You haven't even asked me about my banjo lessons. There going great! Dude?

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Sorry, I just can't stop thinking about her.

name: Prismo
line: Ah, you really are in love, huh! Alright, tell me more about her! Where'dya'meet?

line: In a dream.

name: Prismo
line: What! Who's?

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Finn the human.

name: Prismo
line: What? Who's that! Oh, wait, I know that guy. Look, I don't think you're put in charge of prophetic dreams so you could meet ladies.

name: Cosmic Owl
line: "Hoo" cares. I'm in love!

name: Prismo
line: Oh, what am I even worried about. How will you ever even find her again? Do you have any idea how many people are dreaming every night?

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Yes, I do.

name: Prismo
line: Dude, it could take you a million years

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Then it would be worth it! For love! Forgot my sketchbook.

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Looks like it's gonna be a long night. Ehh.

line: Excuse me, are these weenies?

line: Shrimp puffs, m'azheer.

line: Oh.

line: *sighs*

line: Hi.

line: Oh, is that a weenie?

line: Oh I love shrimp puffs!

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Here.

name: Bird Woman
line: This is a dream come true!

name: Bird Woman
line: Do I know you?

name: Cosmic Owl
line: I'm crashing.

name: Bird Woman
line: Oh!

name: Cosmic Owl
line: I saw you in a dream and I had to see you again, even though just by me being here, events in this dream will come true.

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Oh geez, that poor guy.

line: Whose dream?

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Hm?

name: Bird Woman

line: Um, Finn the Human.

name: Bird Woman
line: Hm.

name: Cosmic Owl

name: Bird Woman
line: No, you intrigue me! So powerful! Wha? What's happening?

line: Oh no!

line: I'll take it.

name: Prismo
line: and so then she's like, "I really like you" and I said "I really like you too" and then she said "I don't wanna hold hands until I'm in love" and I'm like "that's great, I'm all about going slow" and then she's like "what? You don't wanna hold my hand?." Ha ha! Okay, what is going on with that toothpick?

line: Huh?

line: I can get you a new toothpick.

line: No, I don't want a new one! I gotta go!

line: No wait, there's one m—

line: Hi.

name: Bird Woman
line: Hi!

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Are there any appetizers?

name: Bird Woman
line: No, I think it's just ice in this dream. Oh I wish I could dream another place!

name: Cosmic Owl
line: I have an idea.  My apartment.

name: Bird Woman
line: Oh.

name: Cosmic Owl
line: It's a bit of a mess. I'm not used to having company.

name: Cosmic Owl
line: I know right! Hey, do you like board games?

line: Tell me about this.

name: Cosmic Owl

name: Bird Woman
line: It's interesting.

line: Can we?

name: Cosmic Owl

name: Bird Woman

name: Cosmic Owl
line: I guess I just don't even think of it.

name: Bird Woman
line: But you're not powerful enough to see everyone's dreams, are you?

name: Bird Woman
line: Even royalty?

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Like Ice King or something? His dreams are so sad.

name: Bird Woman

name: Cosmic Owl
line: Ha ha ha, we can go right now. Is that what this is about?

name: Bird Woman
line: Yes, let's go right now.

name: Susan
line: There.

line: Susan! Susan, Lub glubs are just pool toys!  Watch, I'm putting an end to all this craziness, with my Pickaxe Hand!  No more craziness.

line: Ooooh... Jakey beefed it!

line: Bad news, dude. There's only two of us and more than, um,  this many of them!

line: We gotta use the fire, like Susan said. Are you okay with that?

line: Yes! I'm okay with that! I'll do whatever Susan says!

line: Susan! We need you!

name: Susan
line: Susan scared... but Susan brave, too.  SUUSSSAAANN!!!!!

line: Susan!

line: Hmm.

line: Good morning, Princess!

line: Finn! You scared me!

line: I am sorry, Princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What are you doing here, Finn?

name: Finn
line: Since I got out of my last relationship, I've been slackin' on the job. So I'm rededicating my life to protecting, serving, and meeting your every need. Jake said I was acting bananas about the whole thing and wanted no part of this.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's 530 in the morning.

name: Finn
line: That's right, Princess. I'm gettin' back on the job hardcore, giving 100% of my being all for you.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thank you, that's very nice.

name: Finn
line: No need to thank me, PB. It's my job.

name: Finn
line: Heh.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thank you.

line: How am I doin' my job, Princess? Am I crushin' it?

line: Yes, but can you move just a bit...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, no, like, out of the way.

name: Finn
line: Oh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, what else do I need? Aw, dangit, I forgot we're out of milk. Now I have to go get it from—

name: Finn
line: Buh-buh-buh! I got it!  Hyah!

name: Finn
line: Milk... You wanted milk...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, I thought you went home.

name: Finn
line: Yes, I do regret the slow return, but I assure you, this is the highest quality milk available. It's mink's milk. I milked a mink. 100% dedication, no limits for what I do for you. I'd throw Peppermint Butler off this balcony if you ask.  Sorry, Peppermint Butler, just joking, but kinda sorta not.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You're really going over the top here. Take it easy. Princess's orders.

line: Okay, I'll just rest here.

line: No, no, resting on the job is not resting. Go somewhere where you can relax!

name: Finn
line: Yes, Princess.

name: Finn
line: Princess, I give my life to you girl, you are the best dang princess in the whole wide world.  Wow, PB, sure is a nice day to be outside!  Hey, watch what you say about PB, bro. Talk garbage about PB one more time, bro. See what happens!  Hold on one sec, PB. I gotta deal with a real tough guy over here.  You got one last chance to apologize before I dishonor you like you did my lady! Alright, bro, have it your way! Yah!  Where's your pants bro? Where's your honor now? Everyone's laughing at your undies! It's real uncomfortable! Wants some!  Wowzers!  No!  Did you drop this car on my lady, bro?!

line: Leave this dump now!

name: Finn
line: You dropped a car on my lady, bro. Now I gotta restore her honor. I hope you're wearing underwear.  Whoa, dude's got awesome powers.  Hey, dude, you got awesome powers!  You gonna kill me, bro?

name: Rattleballs
line: No. Instead, I will pluck out your eyes with the point of my sword, and whenever you try to see stuff, you will think only of me, Rattleballs!

name: Finn
line: Do it! I ain't a baby!  Do it, bro!

name: Rattleballs
line: You have a warrior's spirit!  Something I haven't seen in a long time. But your swordsmanship is . You should learn to master your weapon before you draw it.
