line: What?! You're just gonna tell me I'm terrible and walk away? Teach me sword stuff, man!

name: Rattleballs
line: I know you're back there.

line: I don't eat muffins; I'm a robot.

name: Finn
line: Look, I know you don't know me and we got off on the wrong foot, but please, dude, teach me how to use the sword. Please!  You okay?

name: Rattleballs
line: No. When I was a young robot, I went horseback riding. No one taught me how to post. The horse took a crazy jump, and I came down on the saddle hard. One of my gumballs bounced up inside me. It's been lodged in a weird spot for years.

name: Finn
line: Oh, here.

name: Rattleballs
line: More to the left! Getting closer. Closer!  You got it!  Thank you!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, perhaps you feel a sense of indebted obligation to me?

name: Rattleballs
line: Yes! I will teach you the sword stuff.

name: Rattleballs
line: Lesson one block my eggs!

name: Finn
line: Yut!  Ha, got one!

name: Rattleballs
line: Hahahahaha! Egg-celent!

name: Finn
line: Yeah! That's right! I can take it!

name: Rattleballs
line: You have done well today! You have felt the sting of the yolk, endured the sizzle of the mini-BBQ. Perhaps you are ready to learn my secret technique.

name: Finn
line: Secret technique!

name: Rattleballs
line: Watch!

name: Finn
line: What the—?!

name: Rattleballs
line: The shadowless thrust. Your blade must be swift enough to slice the air between you and the target, removing all wind resistance.  Now you try.  Again.

name: Finn
line: So, am I a master swordsman now?

name: Rattleballs
line: You will be if you train this hard every day... for ten years... and get a robot body.

name: Finn
line: Oh. So, uh, why you livin' in this dump? You should be out in the world, saving fancy ladies and junk.

name: Rattleballs
line: That, my friend, is a long tale... which I will tell you now.  It was a much wilder time in the Candy Kingdom. I was a member of an elite robot police force created by Princess Bubblegum. Her previous attempts at law enforcement had been a bunch of goofs.

name: Shop Owner
line: Stop Him!

name: Banana Guards
line: Go! Go! Go! Go!

name: Rattleballs
line: Our righteous swords cut a swath through the chaos, but we were too successful.  Unfortunately, we were still programmed for violence.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: One, two, one, two, one, two, one, two. Okay, robots, all the number ones, go stand on that platform over there. And all the number twos, just turn around and face the wall.  And no peeking!

name: Rattleballs
line: We were programmed to follow her commands 100%, but through sheer force of will, I was able to overcome it.  We had been judged too dangerous to stay operational and sentenced to death!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Number twos! Chop, chop!

name: Rattleballs
line: I alone escaped, while my compatriots became minimalist furniture.

name: Finn
line: Oh, sorry!

name: Rattleballs
line: I've lived as a fugitive in this junkyard ever since. That is why you must never tell Princess Bubblegum about me. If she ever found out, she would have me destroyed.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Rattleballs is still what?!

name: Finn
line: He asked me not to tell you, but I cannot break my oath to serve you, my lady, 100%.

name: Rattleballs

line: Sorry Ree-B-Z. My oath to the princess comes first, but once you two talk it out, I know she'll see you mean no harm.

name: Rattleballs
line: Rattleballs!

name: Finn
line: RB, don't!

name: Rattleballs
line: You think I'm dangerous, Princess?

name: Banana Guards

name: Rattleballs
line: I no longer crave mindless violence. I have found peace in meditation, gardening, egg throwing. I also hope time has made you less bloodthirsty, princess, but do with me as you will. In my heart I still serve you, 100%.

line: Oh, there are portals all over the universe. I have one in my basement! Every once in a while, a real cutie pie drifts through. Ooh!  Oh, gosh, there she is.  Mm, oh, yeah...

name: Ice King
line: What? I swear I never touch 'em! I can't!  Can't touch this, can't touch this...  Can't touch this, either.  Yep, I can't kill any of them.   I hate them... Okay, alright! 'Nuff messin' around. Let's getcha free from the Spirit Plane.

line: Alright, Finn. This oughta free you from your body prison. Couple-a' rounds of Kompy's Kastle will jog your psychic schnaps. That's what I think. Co-op mode like we always do! Oh, yeah! C'mon, Finn, drop the drawbridge. Kompy's blood lust meter's goin' down. Lemme help ya there.  Whuzza!! You love Kompy!

line: Ohhh, that's not all of 'em. There's this other guy that watches me. He's... super creepy.  Do ya see it?? Oh, it see's you...  Catch it and put it in the Spirit Hole! In the Spirit Hole where it can't see me anymore so you can be free!!  Get it! Get it!!  GET IT IN THE HOLE!!

line: Oh, my what? The cave?? How the...??? ...Weird. That's weird, but whatevs, though.  Whatevs. Ice King! Ice Kiiiing!  Where'd you go, Simon?  Ice King?  Dude, come on, what?

name: Ice King
line: Ha ha, Finn! You fell right into for my brilliant plan  that I formed out of the thin air like a true Magi! Not only did I get you to remove those horrible creatures from my castle, but now you're trapped, and only I can see you. So if you want friends, this is it, pal!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna re-open the hole.

name: Ice King
line: NO, WAIT, MY PLAN FELL APART!!  My... new plan is that you don't open the hole, and I destroy the porcelain lamb which will bring you back to the material plane. Heh heh... heh.

name: Ice King
line: Jake.  AGH, BLUH! GIMME THAT LAMB!

line: NO!!  Finn's trapped in here!!

name: Ice King
line: That's why I have to smash it!!

line: Escaped!  AAAH! My winter body!! I was gonna start up on the elliptical again, but I got depressed, okay?! Don't look at me!!

line: AAH! They're touching me for real! EWW!!

line: Cooool. Whaddaya think, Finn? Can we pull back the veil of static and reach into the source of all being? Behind this curtain of patterns... this random pattern generator... So clever... right here in every home, watching us from a one-sided mirror...  Heh heh heh, whoops! Just wizard-talkin' to myself!

line: Man, it's been so long since I've worn the Jakesuit. I forgot how awesome your bod is, bro. Stretchy-arm power!  I feel unstoppable!  Bam! And I don't even feel it!   BMO, throw your plate at me!

line: Eh?

name: Finn
line: Man, are you kidding?

name: Jake
line: You give up?

name: Finn
line: You have to like, punch me in the face.

name: Jake
line: Hmm. I thought I was. This is hard. I can't even make a fist. How do you control my body so well?

name: Finn
line: Dude, I'm graceful. Mom raised me graceful.

name: Finn
line: Dude, what the Bjork?

name: Jake
line: A-ha! Here we go! Dream Journal of a Boring Man, Volume 12.

name: Finn
line: Uh, Jake, what are you doing?

name: Jake
line: There's all kinds of pain, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Dude, come on, don't do this.

name: Jake
line: Ah. Okay, let's see. Ooh, this one looks good. And it's not too long, only seven pages!  Okay, here we go.   "In my dream, I was eating jasmine rice. But it was also brown rice. And it was also my mother."

name: Jake
line: Huh? Where am I?  Oh, yeah. Hey, Finn, how long have I been out?

name: Finn
line: I don't know. A couple hours

name: Jake
line: Say what?! Why are you still reading?

name: Finn
line: It's actually not that bad. There's a bunch where he knows he's dreaming. Here, let me read you a little.  "So I said to the first guy, if everyone in my dream is me, then you are me. And he said, I am who? And I said, me. And he said, who is me? And I said, you.  And he said, what about you? And I said, no you!"  It's like he's trying to solve a mystery that doesn't exist! You want me to keep going?

name: Jake
line: No, I'm hungry.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I'm hungry too. How about a truce while you go make us some lunch?

name: Jake
line: Oh, I didn't know we were allowed to call truces. I'll totally remember that the next time my doggy bag is hurtling towards a fence post.

name: Finn
line: You know, you could use the opportunity of cooking me food to mess with me.

name: Jake
line: Wait a sec, you just gave me an idea!

name: Finn
line: Yeah?  Uh-oh. Oh, look out, you gonna make me something gross? Soemthing spicy? You know I can take it!

name: Jake
line: Ta-da!

name: Finn
line: Meatloaf? That's my favorite dish.

name: Jake
line: Mmm-mmm.

name: Finn
line: What did you do to it?

name: Jake
line: I assure you, it's delicious.

name: Finn
line: Okay, well, you're really terrible at this.

name: Jake
line: Yummy!

name: Finn
line: Oh, that's just mean.

name: Jake
line: Admit you're wrong, and you can have some of this delicious meatloaf!

name: Finn
line: Nah, I'm good.

name: Finn
line: Jake, it's my special occasion phone! Someone's calling me to tell me about a special occasion.

name: Jake
line: So?

name: Finn
line: So can you walk me over there? I wanna see who it is!  Oh, it's Flame Princess.  I'll talk to her later. I don't want you embarrassing me or, uh, anything. Jake?

name: Finn
line: Jake! Seriously, don't do this!

name: Jake
line: Tell me I win, dude!

name: Finn
line: No, absolutely not.

name: Jake
line: Alright. Say goodbye to Flame Princess thinking you're cool! I'm gonna embarrass the Bjork outta you!

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh, hey, you came! I got worried because you didn't answer special occasion phone. My relatives are waiting inside.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Flame Princess
line: Well, that's why I called on special occasion phone. All my less-evil family members are here for dinner. Come eat!

name: Flame Princess
line: Finn, this is my family.  These are my two younger brothers, my brother who's home from the military, and my judgmental aunt and uncle.

name: Finn
line: Jake, whatever you're about to do, please don't do it.

name: Older brother
line: What are you doing in front of my family?!

name: Flame Princess
line: Hold on, bro. Perhaps it is a non-flameish custom unknown to us.

name: Jake
line: Nope! Just doin' the kind of stuff I do all the time!

name: Older brother
line: This is a nightmare come true for me, sister.

name: Flame Princess
line: What are you doing?!

name: Jake
line: Don't you wanna see more?

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh, my Bjork! No! I don't want to see more! Wait, what's that in your mouth? Jake?

name: Jake
line: Oops! Busted.

name: Flame Princess
line: Are you controlling Finn?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I'm causing Finn pain. We have a bet going on.

name: Flame Princess
line: And you made him dance like a baby, semi-nude, in front of my family? Wow, that's pretty hardcore.

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Flame Princess
line: Good luck, Finn. Hope you win!

name: Finn
line: I will!

name: Jake
line: Hmm!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Finn! Oh, of all days! Where are you going? Jake, where are you?

name: Jake
line: I'm right here.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Oh!

name: T.V.
line: 'Sup?

name: Jake
line: What's T.V. doing here? I thought all the kids found apartments.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: No matter what, I think he's stay-at-home.

name: Jake
line: Ha-ha! That's my boy. Momma's basement baby.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Jake, what are you doing? Please tell me.

name: Jake
line: Oh, it's this bet we're doing. It's not really a bet. It's more like a showdown. I'm trying to get him to admit that it's hard when someone wears you as a suit. How do I win the bet, Lady?

name: T.V.
line: Hey, Dad? Why don't you try jumping in a volcano?

name: Jake
line: Yes!

name: Finn
line: So, what are we doing, bro?

name: Jake
line: The Universe is going to have a full-on make-out session with you, bro. I'm talkin' minimum tier 8. Behold!

name: Finn
line: Fire Wolves? That's your plan? Please.

name: Jake
line: Oh no, bro, that's just fortuitous circumstance!  Allow me to take advantage! here, pup pups! Want some kibble? Want steak flavor? Steaky-steaks?

name: Jake
line: How you like it, bro? Pretty painful, huh?

name: Finn
line: Eh, whatev.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Looks hot.

name: Jake
line: Oh yeah, bro! The pain-train has arrived at the station! Choo-choo!

name: Finn
line: I'm ready, bro! Bring it! You're nothin', lava! You're a bum! I can handle you!

name: Jake
line: Look, just say stop, and you won't get burned.

name: Finn
line: Never!

name: Jake
line: Okay, bro. This'll pretty much wreck up your whole life, so think about it.

name: Finn
line: Bring it! Yeah, baby, feels good, love it, lovin' that heat on my skull!

name: Jake
line: Okay...I'm gonna lower you some more...probably gonna cook up your brain.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah, give it to me!

name: Jake
line: Dang, he's flippin' crazy! This isn't gonna do anything, he's never gonna give up!

name: Finn
line: What happened? You robbed me of the win!

name: Jake
line: You're right, man. My bruises are hickeys from the Universe. And I should just accept that.

name: Finn
line: Yeah boy! In yo' face!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, in my face.

name: Jake
line: Dangit, Finn.

name: Big Clown Nurse
line: Who's ready for rehabilitation?

name: Head Clown Nurse
line: We'll start with full-body immersion therapy.

name: Finn
line: No!

name: Jake
line: Yes!

name: Jake
line: Beep beep! Look out! Beep beep! Pillow delivery! Look out buddy!

name: Finn
line: Uuf!

name: BMO
line: Uuf!

name: Finn
line: Come on, Jake...

name: Jake
line: Sorry buddy,  just trying to cheer you up some. I mean here you are chillin' out with history's coolest friends, building an actual pillow fort, but you just sit there sulking--I mean, what gives!?

name: Finn
line: I guess I'm just thinking about Flame Princess. I told her a joke the other day and she didn't even laugh or anything. I guess it's over between us.

name: Jake
line: That's it?! A joke?

name: BMO
line: Maybe she just didn't get it yet.

name: Finn
line: Yeah right, BMO. More like she used up all her laughs on some other guy's jokes probably. Man, having a girlfriend is hard.

name: Jake
line: No! Being crazy is hard. You're getting all hung up, all hung up on imaginary problems. You gotta focus on what's real, man.  You see this cup? This is literally my favorite cup.  Now it's gone forever. So it's not real, and I don't care about it anymore.

name: BMO
line: Oh no! My favorite window!

name: Finn
line: I don't even know what you guys are talking about. I think I just need some alone time.  Gotta let my mind fester a bit, you know? I'll be back in a little while.

name: Jake
line: Finn! Festering is always bad, man! There's no good kind of festering! Finn!

name: Finn
line: Man, this looked smaller from the outside. What's this now? What the?! Jake, what's in here?! Jake?

name: Finn
line: Oh, whoa!  Did Jake build this part too? That guy needs some more girlfriends or something.

name: Finn
line: Hey Jake! You need more girlf--what the...? Door's gone?

name: Finn
line: Hmm, maybe there's another door in yonder pillow town.  I don't get this at all.

name: Pillow children
line: Dragon!! Blanket Dragon! Run!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Pillow child
line: Oof! Hey mistah, you betta get wunnin'! Bwanket Dwagon!

name: Finn
line: Now this, I understand!    Oh. That's it?

name: Pillow child
line: Wow.

name: Pillow people
line: Did you see that?

name: Finn
line: Hey, uh, how's it going?

name: Quilton
line: Puhoy there! I am Quilton, son of Pillowford, and you have saved our village! You and your sharp pillow.

name: Finn
line: Hah, it's nothing; I kill things all the time.

name: Quilton
line: Oh, nonsense! This calls for a celepillowbration!

name: Roselinen
line: There you are, Finn the Human.

name: Finn
line: Oh, hey there... Um, you can just call me Finn if you want.

name: Roselinen
line: All right, Finn. My name is Roselinen, daughter of Quilton. You have to call me the whole thing.

name: Finn
line: Oh, uh...

name: Roselinen
line: Just kidding!

name: Finn
line: Heh. Oh, uh, your dad seems fun.

name: Quilton
line: Oh, ha ha, oh my! Puhzah!

name: Roselinen
line: Yeah. Um, you wanna dance?

name: Finn
line: Oh, well...  I...have a girlfriend.

name: Roselinen
line: Dummy, it's a dance, not marriage.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, okay!  This place is weird.

name: Roselinen
line: Are you telling me that birds in your world don't poo little pillowcases?

name: Finn
line: Naah, just regular poo.

name: Roselinen
line: Hey, like this.

name: Finn
line: Eh, yeah, i-it's really cool. Where I come from, I live with my best friend, who's my brother. And he's a dog. We fight stuff; it's cool. It's really different than here. I mean, where I'm from, blankets and pillows are used for bedding.

name: Roselinen
line: Well they're used for that here too.

name: Finn
line: Heh heh uh.

name: Quilton
line: Woo oo ooh hoo hoo! Pill-ightful!

name: Finn
line: Ah man, it's been nice, Roselinen. But I gotta get back to my home.  Quilton, I need your help to find a portal to my home world.

name: Quilton
line: Of course, we will do our best to help you, Finn the Flesh Pillow. But you're not making a fold of sense!

name: Quilton
line: Please, share our food. You need nourishment.

name: Finn
line: It tastes... like... a pillow...

name: Quilton
line: I'll give your compliments to the pillow.

name: BMO
line: Oh, there you are! You found your mug. I thought you said you didn't care.

name: BMO
line: That mug is empty.

name: Jake
line: I wonder what Finn's up to...

name: Jay
line: Roar! I'm the Blanket Dragon!!

name: Bonnie
line: Well, I'm daddy! Sha-pow!

name: Roselinen
line: Jay, Bonnie. I bet your dad's just about finished chopping wool. You guys wanna bring him his lunch?

name: Jay & Bonnie
line: Yes!

name: Finn
line: Alphanumeric!  Pillow sheep! You have more fluff than sense!

name: Jay & Bonnie
line: Daddy!

name: Finn
line: Oh!  What is this!  A pack of fearsome pillow goblins?!

name: Bonnie
line: Ha ha, daddy, we're your kids!

name: Roselinen
line: Psst, Finn, they've brought you lunch.

name: Finn
line: Oh, they have, have they?  Tiny pillows. Mmm mmm mm mmm.

name: Finn
line: Darling, you've outdone yourself.

name: Quilton
line: Honk, honk!

name: Jay & Bonnie
line: Grandpillow!

name: Roselinen
line: What's my father doing here?

name: Quilton
line: Puhoy!

name: Jay & Bonnie
line: Grandpillow!

name: Quilton
line: Oh oh oh, come here! Oh, but I've come to speak with your father.

name: Finn
line: What is it, Quilton?

name: Quilton
line: When you first arrived here, you told us of a mysterious door that led you to our world.

name: Finn
line: Yes, of course.

name: Quilton
line: Archaeologists found this in the Pillow Catacombs  The Pillownomicon.

name: Finn
line: Oh my glob.

name: Quilton
line: There is no information about the door, save for the fact it shows up periodically, and then disappears.

name: Finn
line: Quilton, I need to find that door.

name: Jake
line: Uhhh, hey BMO, I gotta snag my mug from you.

name: BMO
line: Oh, really?

name: Jake
line: Hey don't sweat it, I'll make us some hot chocolate.

name: BMO
line: Jake, you drive a hard burger.

name: Finn
line: Hello?

name: Rasheeta
line: Ah yes, come in.

name: Finn
line: Are these The Great Abracadabra Mountains? And are you Rasheeta the Great Oracle, dweller of said mountains?

name: Rasheeta
line: Yes, you must be Finn the Human Man, seeker of the wandering portal.

name: Finn
line: Yes, I've searched for decades--how did you know?

name: Rasheeta
line: I've read it in the Tea Leaves,  this newspaper I found from the future.

name: Finn
line: Does it say how I get home?

name: Rasheeta
line: The real question is are you sure you want to?

name: Finn
line: Uh... yeah!

name: Rasheeta
line: Well don't worry, you won't be here long.

name: Finn
line: So there is another way to...  Oof...

name: Rasheeta
line: Not long now.

name: Finn
line: Oh...

name: Bonnie
line: Father?

name: Jay
line: What did the oracle say, father? Have we come to the right spot finally?

name: Finn
line: I think so, but the oracle spoke in riddles.  Gonna have to fester on this one for a bit...

name: Roselinen
line: Oh, Finn. I know you have to go, all these years I've known, but now that it's time...  Oh man, I'm just all messed up about it. Just promise me you'll remember us,  when you're back in your real life.

name: Finn
line: Hmm, that reminds me, Roselinen, of something Jake told me just before I came to this world.

name: Jake
line: You're getting all hung up on imaginary problems, stay with your new wife. You've known her longer now than any of us. You're not even sure if I ever really existed. And I'm pretty sure I didn't look like this.

name: Finn
line: Man. How did he see it all coming so clearly?  Come on, everyone. Pack your things, we're going home.

name: BMO
line: Ha ha he, ha ha he, goodness, Jake, why don't you do this with your other babies?

name: Jake
line: Well, Rainicorn babies age rapidly. They don't need their parents a couple hours after they're born.

name: BMO
line: That really stinks, huh?

name: Jake
line: Mmmmm.

name: BMO
line: Hot chocolate is ready!

name: Roselinen
line: Finn... Finn.

name: Finn
line: Wha—where?

name: Roselinen
line: Are you comfortable?

name: Finn
line: I'm... alright.

name: Bonnie
line: Um, dad...  dad. We.. just.. wanted to say... that we--

name: Jay
line: That... we love you dad.

name: Finn
line: I remember... back... when I was dad.

name: Jay
line: Dad, you are dad...

name: Finn
line: I ain't dad yet! Oh, no, wait! Here it comes! Woo hoo hoo hoo hooooo, BOY!

name: Finn
line: HUP!

name: Jake
line: Hey buddy, you feeling better already?

name: Finn
line: Huh? Oh. Uhh, I don't know, man. I just had the number one wildest dream.

name: Jake
line: Really?

name: Finn
line: Yeah! I was--  Hello? Oh hey! Oh.  Yeah, thanks! Yeah, okay, bye.  That was Flame Princess. She said she didn't get my joke until just now and that it's really funny and awesome!

name: BMO
line: . Ha ha! I knew it!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, that's great man. Now what about this dream?

name: Finn
line: What dream?

name: Jake
line: The dream you were just talking about.

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Just a second ago!

name: Jake
line: The dream you just had in the pillow fort!

name: Finn
line: Pfft!

name: Jake
line: Oh man! Alright, what's next?

name: Finn
line: Haha, let's see...  First we visit Tree Trunks for apple pie, and then we go to Bubblegum's science music thing!

name: Jake
line: Wait, what about the movie at the drive-in?

name: Finn
line: That's after we make dream sandwiches!

name: Jake
line: Whoo!  Let's go, apple pie!

name: Finn
line: Whoo!

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: TT!

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh my, look who's here! Yoo-hoo!

name: Jake
line: Oh yeah!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Howdy, Jake! Howdy, Finn!

name: Mr. Pig
line: Hello!

name: Jake
line: What'cha ya doin' here?

name: Mr. Pig
line: I never really left.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Mr. Pig's been so kind helpin' me, hehe, tend to my rose garden.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Hmmm.

name: Finn
line: Cool.

name: Jake
line: Cool cool.

name: Mr. Pig
line: Cool cool cool.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Cool cool cool cool!

name: Mr. Pig
line: Oh, you.

name: Finn
line: Where's the apple pie, Tree Trunks?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, my stomach is jonesin' for it bad!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, you all are so early that I haven't even started!

name: Mr. Pig
line: I love her so much.

name: Finn
line: WHOA! You love 'er?!

name: Mr. Pig
line: Whaa? No!

name: Finn
line: You just said you love 'er.

name: Mr. Pig
line: You're crazy.

name: Jake
line: Dude, come on, we heard you.

name: Mr. Pig
line: I think I am in love with her! But I don't know how to go about it...

name: Finn
line: Dude, you should just tell her how you feel!

name: Mr. Pig
line: Phew...

name: Tree Trunks
line: There you are, what are you boys chattin' about? Hmmm?

name: Mr. Pig
line: Uh-huh, alright okay...  Ms. Tree Trunks... Ma'am, today, I wish to speak my feelings.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Mr. Pig, what's going on?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Ohhhhh!

name: Mr. Pig
line: Mmmm, that's good.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Shush. I feel the same. I have a feeling that this is the feeling others call... love.  What should we do then?

name: Mr. Pig
line: We should hug.

name: Jake
line: Tree Trunks... you gonna bring some pie to Princess Bubblegum's thing?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Uh... Yeah, Jake, yeah!

name: Jake
line: Well... Okay...  See you later then.

name: Jake
line: Where is she?

name: Finn
line: You givin' me a back rub, bro?

name: Jake
line: What?  Yeah, yeah, yeah...  Is that-?!  It's Tree Trunks!

name: Jake
line: Pie! Pie!!  Lay it right here.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh Jake, I tried to bake an apple pie, but this cutie kept distracting me.

name: Jake
line: No apple pie?!

name: Jam Jam
line: This is making me uncomfortable...

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: They're snuggling too loud!

name: Another Candy Person
line: What's happening? I forgot my glasses!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Huh? Oh, gross!

name: Finn
line: Hyeah! Break it up, break it up! Okay, the love show is over! Princess, please continue.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hm!

name: Jam Jam
line: Ah! Ah! This is too much!  It's driving me crazy!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Cinnamon Bun, do something!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: ...Okay. Hey everyone! The concert is over!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's not what I-

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: The concert's over, Princess!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Princess, how's about a slow song so me and my man can dance cheek to cheek.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hm!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Why's everybody givin' me the hairy eyeball?

name: Finn
line: Y'all are too affectionate. It makes people feel... bothered when you and the Pig your affection in public!

name: Tree Trunks
line: They don't want us to flaunt what we have?

name: Finn
line: You two need to hide your love... or else, you'll end up making the whole world throw up!

name: Mr. Pig and Tree Trunks
line: We promise to keep our affection hidden.

name: Finn
line: Thank you.

name: Jake
line: Have you seen my other shoe?

name: Finn
line: I think I saw it in the closet!

name: Jake
line: Ahhh! Under my shoe?! Outta here!

name: Candy Mother
line: This carriage is for babies!  For babies!!

name: Finn
line: Nice stacks of sandwiches!

name: Jake
line: You shouldn'ta bought so many flavors! I had to make a sandwich for each flavor, and for each flavor combination!

name: Finn
line: I'm makin' a cheese sandwich!  Tree Trunks! Pig! Come on!

name: Tree Trunks
line: We're trying to hide our love, but it's so difficult!

name: Jake
line: Try harder!

name: Finn
line: Doesn't look like Tree Trunks and Pig are around!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, looks like the cost is clear!

name: Gingerbread Actor
line: Look at this cup!  Now, look at this cup! Look at this one!

name: Jake
line: Aw, man!

name: Finn
line: Just try to ignore it and watch the movie!

name: Jake
line: I can't ignore that!

name: Jake
line: Stoooooop!

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks, this has gone on long enough! No more spending time with the Pig, unless you do it, inside your own home.

name: Tree Trunks
line: But Finn, an unmarried couple living together one roof, that's undecent!

name: Finn
line: Then, why don't you two just get married?

name: Tree Trunks
line: We don't wanna rush things-

name: Mr. Pig
line: Uh... marriage is a big step.

name: Tree Trunks
line: -we need time to get to know each other.

name: Finn
line: Then I guess we only have one option.

name: Finn
line: Alright.

name: Mr. Pig
line: You can't do this! Wait

name: Tree Trunks
line: Nooo!

name: Mr. Pig
line: Stop!

name: Candy Person
line: Take 'em away!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Sweet meat!

name: Mr. Pig
line: Little dove!

name: Finn
line: Sorry, Tree Trunks.

name: Jake
line: So... where do you live?

name: Mr. Pig
line: I'm homeless.

name: Jake
line: Oh...

name: Mr. Pig
line: I guess I'll just go back to eating criminals.  I miss her...

name: Tree Trunks
line: I don't know what I'm going to do without him, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Why don't you make apple pie to take your mind off of it?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Dream of love... Is it really over? Can I overcome these tears? I close my eyes, feel that he's still with me. Still standing with me here...

name: Mr. Pig
line: Dream of love... Are we truly parted? Must this Pig forever walk alone? In my dreams, our love is just a dream to me... but in my heart, it lives and breaths and grows.

name: Tree Trunks
line: And even though, we ain't allowed to be together. I cross my heart and promise to be true.

name: Mr. Pig
line: Well, I'm still lovin' you, girl, from halfway 'cross this great, big, world!  And in my dreams, I'm holding hands with yoooooooooooou!

name: Tree Trunks & Mr. Pig
line: Dream of love... Dream of love...  It's only a dream of loooooove. Dream of love... Dream of loooooooove, it's only a dream... of love.

name: Tree Trunks
line: I close my eyes, and feel his arms around me, in my dreams... he's not so far away.

name: Finn
line: Go to him.

name: Jake
line: Go.

name: Jam Jam
line: I'm freaking out!!

name: Finn
line: You know what? I like it. It's nice.

name: Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Jake
line: Mmmm, apple pie I've been waiting to kiss you all day!

name: Finn
line: Just about done.

name: Jake
line: Mm, oh boy.

name: Finn
line: How much Softy Cheesy for ya deezy? A little? A lot?

name: Jake
line: Blech! None!

name: Finn
line: But you used to love Softy Cheese!

name: Jake
line: I don't wanna talk about it.

name: Finn
line: What was that?

name: Jake
line: Probably an owl.  Mm... Mm, mm...  A ghost!!

name: Finn
line: Dude. It's just Ghost Princess. Hey, GP.   She's weird, huh?  How's it goin'?

name: Jake
line: Are you haunting us?

name: Ghost Princess
line: Yeeeeessss...

name: Jake
line: Oh, okay.

name: Finn
line: Well, could ya knock it off??

name: Ghost Princess
line: Sorry... It's just... I'm doomed to haunt this mortal plane...

name: Jake
line: Oh. Well, let's hear more about that, honey.

name: Ghost Princess
line: Until I discover the cause of my death, my soul can't ascend to the 50th Dead World. But as a ghost, I have no memory of my mortal life... and no idea how I died...

name: Finn
line: It's a crime case!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, step back, nephew. We don't know she was moidered!

name: Finn
line: That's right. We don't even know how she was moida'd, but I'm the hard-boiled sleuth who's gonna crack your case wiiiide open!

name: Ghost Princess
line: OH! That sounds wonderful!

name: Ghost Princess
line: This way, gentlemen!

name: Jake
line: Whoa. Your neighborhood is... uh... very peaceful.

name: Ghost Princess
line: It's the cradle of my despair...

name: Jake
line: Right, right.

name: Ghost Princess
line: Well... here's me.

name: Finn
line: Our first clue!  "Female." It's a good start, but we need more. Jake, it's time to interrogate the neighbors. We'll do it good cop bad cop style. I CALL BAD COP!

name: Jake
line: Awww...

name: Finn
line: Yo, ghost! Yo, yo! Yo, wake up, fool! Yo, yo, yo, yo, yo, yo, yo, yo, yo.

name: Boilbee
line: What?!?!

name: Finn
line: Yo, ghost, whaddaya know about the lady buried next to you?

name: Boilbee
line: What, you mean her?  She's been here longer than almost anybody!

name: Ghost Princess
line: He's right...!

name: Boilbee
line: And don't think I don't see what you do, Ghost Princess.

name: Ghost Princess
line: What...?

name: Boilbee
line: Sneakin' off at night, scarin' peeps, hauntin' at all hours... 'cause you can't deal with your issues!

name: Clarence
line: Leave her be, Boilbee.

name: Boilbee
line: Whaaat?

name: Clarence
line: A princess deserves empathy, not your sass.

name: Boilbee
line: Nyeee... nyeee... Butt out, Clarence!

name: Clarence
line: Some of us still want to feel, you know? The vital...  ...magnetism of life.  The vibrating energies that connect all living and... nonliving beings.

name: Boilbee
line: Nyaaargh! I don't like your words! Arrrgh...

name: Ghost Princess
line: I'm Ghost Princess. Have we met before? I feel like we have.

name: Clarence
line: I don't think so, m'lady, but I am honorèd.

name: Finn
line: Whadda you know about Ghosty-pees gettin' murdle-lurdled?

name: Clarence
line: Sorry, I don't know anything. I can't imagine anyone who would harm someone as beautiful as this.

name: Jake
line: Whoa. Smooth.

name: Clarence
line: Did you try looking yonder?  That's where the ne'er-do-well ghosts hang out.

name: Finn
line: Right... Ne'er-do-wellers. Let's do this, Jake.

name: Jake
line: You stay, and eat cheese puffs!

name: Finn
line: Geez. Look at this place. It's all bunked up.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, no wonder this is where the ne'er-do-wells go when they deezy. I got a feelin' these ghosts are gonna be harder to shake than Boilbee.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, well get ready, 'cause this biz is gonna get ridonk.

name: Jake
line: Cool, man. Hey, can I be bad cop now?

name: Finn
line: No. Okay, let's check this guy out.

name: Jake
line: What's it say?

name: Finn
line: "Some donkus." WAKE UP, DONKUS! WE GOT QUESTIONS! DINGUS! TIME TO SING, YA CANARY!  BAM!! YAH!  What'chu know about Ghost Princess, huh?! Give it up, Dungus!

name: Jake
line: Hey, man, take it easy.

name: Finn
line: You do your job, I do mine!  TELL ME WHAT YOU KNOW, PUNK!! Uh-oh.  What's this? A busted knife. Is this your knife, bro? TELL ME!!!  Jake, good cop...

name: Jake
line: Alright. Cool off, bad cop!  This ghost ain't home, man!

name: Finn
line: Well, you're lucky my partner's here... pal.

name: Jake
line: He's not worth it, man.

name: Finn
line: These ghosts think I'm playin'. They think it's all a big game. But you know what? You know what I'm gonna do?

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna turn this game... UP-SIDE-DOWN!!!

name: Ghost Princess
line: So, you really don't know how you died either?

name: Clarence
line: Of course not.  Two, please.  And we might never find out, but that's okay because right now, in this moment, I'm feeling pretty sweetles, you know?

name: Ghost Princess
line: I feel... sweetles also in this moment also.

name: Clarence
line: That's great, Ghost Princess. I'm glad we can feel this way together, in the face of uncertainty.

name: Ghost Announcer
line: Llllladies and gents! The center for Ghost Community Outreach and ghostdates.com present... SPIRIT WAVES!

name: Clarence
line: More beautiful than I could imagine.

name: Ghost Princess
line: Are you talking about Spirit Waves...?

name: Clarence
line: I'm talking... about you, Princess.

name: Finn
line: YYYYAAAAAH!!  GHOSTS! YOU GHOSTS! COME OUT!

name: Jake
line: I think this place is abandoned, man.

name: Finn
line: They're just hidin' 'cause they know they're guilty!

name: Muscular Ghost 1
line: Yo! Yo! That's my grave! Why're you fops trashin' our spot?!

name: Finn
line: We thought you were... hiding.

name: Muscular Ghost 2
line: Dude. We were at the Spirit Waves show.

name: Muscular Ghost 3
line: Kill these fools!

name: Finn
line: BRING IT ON, YOU MAMAS!

name: Clarence
line: Hold up! These guys are with me.

name: Muscular Ghost 3
line: ...A'ight, Clarence, but only because of that one time when I did that thing by accident and you were cool about it.

name: Muscular Ghost 1
line: It's your lucky day, punks.

name: Jake
line: Phew! Thanks, Clarence!

name: Finn
line: Yo, I'm sorry we haven't solved the case yet.

name: Ghost Princess
line: It's alright, Finn... I'm calling off the investigation.

name: Finn
line: What? Why?

name: Ghost Princess
line: I don't feel tormented anymore now that I'm with Clarence.

name: Finn
line: Oh. That's... that's cool.

name: Ghost Princess
line: It's hard to explain, but it's like we already know each other.

name: Clarence
line: I feel it, too. Our spirits must be intwined in the cosmic wheel of time.

name: Jake
line: Nice!

name: Clarence
line: Let's go to my private mausoleum where we can be... private.

name: Finn
line: Yugh!

name: Ghost Princess
line: Thanks for your help...!

name: Finn
line: A'ight.   Man... I wanted to crack the case, y'know?

name: Jake
line: Look on the bright side, guy! We looted all this sweet grave booty! Ka-ching!

name: Finn
line: Jake! You looted?! That's bad, man! You're supposed to be good cop.

name: Jake
line: Oops... I didn't know it was wrong.

name: Finn
line: Come on, let's put all this stuff back.

name: Jake
line: What?! All of it?!

name: Finn
line: Yes, Jake.  Huh. This dagger says, "Rence."

name: Jake
line: What's that?

name: Finn
line: I guess some donkus's real name was...  ReeeeEEEENCE?!!

name: Ghost Princess
line: Have we met before?

name: Ghost Princess
line: It's hard to explain, but it's like we already know each other.

name: Finn
line: Is this your knife, bro?

name: Jake
line: This ghost ain't home, man.

name: Jake
line: What is it, dude??

name: Finn
line: ...We gotta dig up the princess.

name: Finn
line: Look!  Sorry.  Lookit!  "Cla-rence." Clarence was some donkus!

name: Jake
line: Some donkus skee-bopped Ghost Princess!!

name: Jake
line: STOP!

name: Finn
line: Clarence is your murdler!

name: Clarence
line: Warrior Princess! Give up your kingdom!

name: Warrior Princess
line: Never! Not even to you, my love!!  Aaagh...  Clarence... I--...

name: Clarence
line: My love...  NOOOOOO!!!

name: Clarence
line: I... did it?

name: Ghost Princess
line: I forgive you, Clarence! Take my hands! Ascend with me to the 50th Dead Wooorld...!

name: Clarence
line: I can't! My soul is stuck! I have to know how I died! Oh, Glob... My life is like a fart.

name: Jake
line: Whoa, wait a minute. Say that again!

name: Clarence
line: MY LIFE IS LIKE A FART!!!

name: Jake
line: I know you, man! From the Squeez-E-Mart!

name: Clarence
line: Huh? Uh... Squeez-E-Mart? I'm starting to remember!   I was a broken man.

name: Clarence
line: More.

name: Tonya
line: Think you've had enough, man.

name: Clarence
line: I don't care. My life is like a fart.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Clarence
line: My life is like a fart!

name: Tonya
line: HEY! HEY, STOP THAT!

name: Jake
line: CITIZEN'S ARREST!  Hey, be careful, man!!

name: Finn
line: So that's why you don't like Softy Cheese!

name: Ghost Princess
line: Claaareeence!!!

name: Clarence
line: Ghost Princess!!!

name: Jake
line: Congratulations, you kids!

name: Finn
line: Haha, yeah!

name: Ghost Princess
line: Goodbyyye...! Thanks for everything!

name: Clarence
line: Thanks for everything! Goodbye!

name: Finn
line: You sure you're ready for this, man?

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Gimme one a' them cheesy dogs, man.

name: Finn
line: All gone?  Lemme see. Move your tongue left...

name: Jake
line: Wah-vah.

name: Finn
line: ...And right.

name: Jake
line: Vah.

name: Finn
line: I'm proud of you, pal. Real proud.

name: Finn
line: Well, looks like your new house is done.  Whoop! Jake! You wanna check out the new house?

name: Jake
line: Naah,  don't let me interrupt you. You two have fun.

name: Flame Princess
line: I wanna see inside!   I love it!

name: Finn
line: Great!   This doesn't hurt as bad as it used to.   Oh gob! Oh gob! Oh gob!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Haha, I'm okay!

name: Flame Princess
line: Hmmmm...

name: Flame Princess
line: Oh!  Do the thing that I like.

name: Jake
line: Now do the thing I like.

name: Jake
line: Hehehe, classic.  Alright Finn, that's enough.

name: Flame Princess
line: Thank you for building my new home, Finn. I'm so happy.

name: Finn
line: You... wanna hug?

name: Flame Princess
line: Yes.

name: Jake
line: Woah! Hold on "mama."

name: Jake
line: Okay bro, tin foil's on. You can hug now.

name: Finn
line: Bye.

name: Flame Princess
line: Bye, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Bye!

name: Jake
line: Looks like your date went pretty good buddy.

name: Finn
line: Uh... I don't know, was the hug okay? Give me some tips man.

name: Jake
line: Bro, you gotta let things take their natural path. Look, look , let me explain some junk about dating. Right now, , you're at Tier 1, which is hugging. But pretty soon,  you'll be at Tier 2, which is smooching. Then down the road , you'll make it to Tier 5, where she'll let you discover all fifteen feet of her loong, beautiful stomach. Then after awhile, you'll make it to Tier 8 , where you touch her horn for the very first time. Very special.

name: Finn
line: What about Tier 15?

name: Jake
line: You stay away from that! Do not do Tier 15!

name: Finn
line: Dude, I got no idea what you're talking about.

name: Jake
line: Don't worry about it dude, just let things naturally move to Tier 2. Oh and um, you need a shower dude.

name: Finn
line: What?!    Oh gross.

name: Finn
line: Do you think Flame Princess could smell me?

name: Jake
line: Probably.

name: Finn
line: Crup.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: 'Sup, guys?

name: Finn and Jake
line: Princess Bubblegum?!

name: Jake
line: What are you doing here?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Collecting taxes, you guys weren't home. So I let myself in.

name: Jake
line: Oh.

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna take a shower. Princess, do not inhale!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What? Why?

name: Finn
line: Just don't.  Hyap!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What's that all about?

name: Jake
line: Aah, he's just smelly from a day of running around with his lady-friend.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ooh, a lady-friend, do tell.

name: Jake
line: Uh, I shouldn't say. It's his business.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, come on, you can tell me.

name: Jake
line: That's his personal biz, you gotta respect the man's p-biz.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, you're right, I'll respect it.

name: Jake
line: Flame Princess! He's hanging out with Flame Princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?!

name: Jake
line: And I don't mean to be telling stories out of school. But pretty soon,  they're gonna be taking it to Tier 2.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, this isn't possible.

name: Jake
line: Oh, it's possible.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I just never thought, Flame Princess. I-uh-I have to go.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Morrow!

name: Jake
line: Mmm, weird.

name: BMO
line: Guess who's late for their video chat.

name: Jake
line: President Porpoise!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, no.  Oh gob, I thought I'd be ready for this.

name: Finn
line: Yyyaawn!  Whoop. Jake, I'm going to see Flame Princess, be back later.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn!

name: Jake
line: Ok Princess, you need to stop breaking in here.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I have something important to tell you. About relationships.

name: Finn
line: Ah, that's okay, Princess.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I just hope, you'll understand.  Relationships  are like layers of sedimentary rock.......

name: Finn
line: Jake, Flame Princess is waiting for me. I'm gonna bounce out.

name: Jake
line: Uh, ok,  Tier 2 baby!

name: Finn
line: Word.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: If too much frustration builds, the magma will erupt causing a catastrophic super-stratum of igneous rock to form......

name: Jake
line: What? Where am I?

name: Mini-snowman
line: Jake, you're president now!

name: Jake
line: Oh my glosh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Jake!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wake up!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Jake, where's Finn?

name: Jake
line: He stepped out.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Will you tell him why he can't see Flame Princess anymore?

name: Jake
line: Oh, oh!  I see what's going on here!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Great! I cannot stress how important it is that they not see each other.

name: Jake
line: Oh man, PB is totally jealous of Flame Princess!

name: BMO
line: Jump, punch, kick, kick!

name: Jake
line: What's up man?

name: Finn
line: Yo, dude! So what did Princess Bubblegum want?

name: Jake
line: She doesn't want you see Flame Princess anymore. She's crazy jealous!

name: Jake
line: So, you at Tier 2 yet?

name: Finn
line: I got about five hugs, does that count?

name: Jake
line: Nnoope.

name: Finn
line: Uhaah.. Well, I'm still at Tier 1.

name: Jake
line: I know exactly what'll get you Tier 2.... A "sappy poem."

name: Jake
line: Say something about her "spectrum."

name: Finn
line: Ee-eww! Let's see.... She's bright. She's beautiful. She makes me feel... confused, l-like something's filling up my chest, like I can't breathe, is it because she's so.. dangerous? Glob, Jake, I can't stand it!

name: Finn
line: Inspiration...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whatcha doin'?

name: Finn
line: Oh, uh, hi, Princess. I'm, uhh, writing something for Jake.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, well, speaking of Jake. Did he explain everything to you?

name: Finn
line: Yyeah.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And you understand?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I understand.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, sometimes you want someone and you  want to kiss them, and be with them. But you can't, because responsibility demands sacrifice.

name: Finn
line: What are you trying to say?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm trying to say that you're a hero, Finn. You're my hero. So, I'm glad you understand why you can't be with Flame Princess.

name: Finn
line: Grr... Bubblegum! I can't do this anymore!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Now you like me?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, what are you talking about?

name: Finn
line: What am I talking about?!  PB, I was.... geh...eh..  I was in love with you! Okay?! And you didn't love me back! Now I'm ready to move on, and it's like...rrmph!! You're gonna build me up all over again! Well, I'm done! I'm done.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, no!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn! Jake, where's Finn? Is he with Flame Princess?

name: Jake
line: Back off, Bubblegum! That's his "man's biz."

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Is he with her?!  Or not?!

name: Jake
line: You heartless monster! Do you have any idea how much he's CRIED OVER YOU? Finn deserves to be happy, even if his blooping face gets burned off!  You should be  ashamed!  You're SICK!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What are you..? This isn't about some  petty love triangle! Flame Princess is physically unstable!  Her elemental matrix can't handle extreme romance! Glob, if Finn tries to kiss her, she'll burn so hot, she'll melt right through the planet's crust, down through the molten core, then she'll be thrown back and forth by gravity until she burns out the world from the inside! Why do you think I had her father keep her locked up?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Will you take me to them?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Faster!

name: Finn
line: Your wavelengths are my weakness, your emissions are what I've been missing.

name: Flame Princess
line: Ahhh.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Ohhhh-uh, Flame Princess!

name: Finn
line: FLAME PRINCESS!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, there's no time! You have to...

name: Jake
line: Are you alright?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Ohhh-tsst. Flame Princess!

name: Jake
line: It's hot!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wait, wait! Don't move. This is good! If you stay on the hole for 24.8 seconds, the reaction will be deprived of oxygen.  She'll go out.

name: Jake
line: Geh.. What about Finn?

name: Finn
line: Hey!  What's wrong? Please, say something.  Please...  I need you...  to be okay.

name: Flame Princess
line: Huh, ummm.

name: Finn
line: Are you okay?

name: Flame Princess
line: I'm okay. I'm okay.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: She's stabilized. We're safe... for now.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, Finn.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?

name: Jake
line: Jeeeaalous?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Shut up.

name: Jake
line: Alright. Whaddaya wanna see next?

name: Finn
line: A cheetah! A fart!

name: BMO
line: A cookie! An external hard drive! Ooh, ooh! Change into Finn, but give him my body!

name: Finn
line: BMO, your ideas are boring.

name: BMO
line: What? Your head on my body isn't boring! It's weird!

name: Jake
line: Alright, I'll try to turn into a cheetah farting.  I can't do the spots.

name: Finn
line: Sparkles on the house? LET'S SQUISH 'EM!

name: Jake
line: Did you squish the sparkles?

name: Finn
line: No. They're around this holo-message player. It's got a cartridge with it.

name: Jake
line: Oh, snap!  Well, plop that cartridge in the slot, playah!

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Okay!

name: Joshua
line: Hello, boys.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Dad!!

name: Joshua
line: If you're hearing this prerecorded hologram message, it's because I passed on, and my spirit sparkles guided you to its secret hiding place. Right now, I'm holding both of you in my hands. You're both still little squishy babies.  I made you boys something. It's a dungeon. A proper dungeon. Full of evil monsters, traps, and magic. The whole kazoo!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Whoa! Kickin'! Kickin'!

name: Joshua
line: Now, this next part of the message is just for you, Jake, so Finn, cover your ears.  Jake... really, this dungeon is for Finn. I know I won't be around forever, and I wanna make something that will force Finn to toughen up.

name: Jake
line: What?!

name: Joshua
line: Now, tell Finn to uncover his ears now.

name: Jake
line: Dude, take your hands off your head.

name: Finn
line: WHAT?!?!

name: Joshua
line: Alright, boys. Now to give you some incentive, at the end of the dungeon, I'm going to put the Family Sword. It's made out of Demon's Blood.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, what the--?!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, dang!

name: Blood Demon
line: Give me back my blood, Joshua!

name: Joshua
line: Kee Oth Rama Pancake.

name: Blood Demon
line: Waaaaah!!

name: Jake
line: Whoa!!

name: Finn
line: Geez-louise!

name: Joshua
line: The dungeon's eighty paces west of here under a dumb-lookin' rock. And Finn, this dungeon's gonna kick your tail. I bet you won't even get past the first trial, ya whiny baby!

name: Finn
line: What?? What was that about?

name: Jake
line: Uh...

name: Dumb Rock
line: Duh... duh... du-ugh... duh...

name: Finn
line: Whoo!

name: Jake
line: Whoa! Burgers and hotdogs! Yeah, yeah, YEAH!

name: Finn
line: Wait, Jake!

name: Jake
line: But... burgers and hotdogs..

name: Finn
line: Didn't you say you were hungry for burgers this morning?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, so?

name: Finn
line: And I said I was hungry for hotdogs?

name: Jake
line: Mm-hmm, I remember.

name: Finn
line: I don't think those burgers and hotdogs are burgers and hotdogs at all.

name: Jake
line: Aaaahh...

name: Finn
line: DUDE!!  Look!

name: Joshua
line: Finn, cover up those nubs on your head.

name: Finn
line: Man... again?

name: Joshua
line: Alright. Hey, Jake, I wanna remind you what this dungeon's for.  In order for Finn to stop whining, he needs to be put through a trial that forces him to take charge of a situation.

name: Jake
line: But Dad, Finn's already figured that out. He's a good kid with a kind heart.

name: Joshua
line: Remember, Jake, this is a prerecorded holo-message. I can't hear you if you're talking to me right now.

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna go walk around!

name: Jake
line: Okay!

name: Joshua
line: Jake, I need your help. You gotta call Finn a whiny baby.

name: Jake
line: But—

name: Joshua
line: Butts are for pooping! Do it for Poppy!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Over here!  Check it out, Jake. I found two ways. This way has some kinda flower trap, and that way... has that guy.

name: Ugly Monster
line: None shall pass!

name: Jake
line: Ugh... Let's take the flower path!

name: Finn
line: Mmm.

name: Ugly Monster
line: Wait! Why don't you wanna take my path?!

name: Jake
line: Because... you're super gross, man.

name: Ugly Monster
line: Oh...

name: Finn
line: Cheer up, man. We're only tellin' you you're gross because we're your bros.

name: Ugly Monster
line: Really?

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Bros are real with each other, and you're gross, brother. Take a bath.

name: Ugly Monster
line: Thanks, brother. Hahaha.

name: Finn
line: Hahaha, no probs.  Hey, what did Dad say?

name: Jake
line: Um... He said he's surprised a whiny baby like you made it this far.

name: Finn
line: What?! Why's Dad sayin' all that jive??

name: Jake
line: Mm...

name: Imaginary Joshua
line: Jake, do it for Poppy!

name: Jake
line: Because... you cry like a baby... Baby!

name: Finn
line: Dude... you're pickin' on me, too?

name: Jake
line: Whoa.

name: Finn
line: I don't even cry much. I only cry when it's healthy, like when people die.

name: Brown-haired witch
line: Partake of the fruit...

name: Finn
line: Pff, blech... If I didn't cry when people died, I'd have a cold butt for a heart.

name: Blonde witch
line: The fruuuuit...

name: Jake
line: Waaaah, I cry when people die. Waaah, I'm Finn.

name: Black-haired witch
line: Partake of the fruit!

name: Finn
line: Maybe I will partake of the fruit.

name: Jake
line: Dude, don't eat that!!

name: Finn
line: Why not? All the people that I care about in this world are being wads.

name: Imaginary Joshua
line: Don't you blow Poppy's cover!

name: Finn
line: Whoa.

name: Jake
line: Time to go, baby.  Finn, come on!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna hang here. With these fruit babes. They'll be my best buds now.

name: Jake
line: Rrrr... Yah!

name: Jake
line: There's another cartridge.  Alright, man, Dad told me not to tell you this, but—

name: Imaginary Joshua
line: Don't tell 'im!

name: Jake
line: You're not real.  Dad asked me to call you "Baby" because he wants you to be tough.

name: Finn

line: Come, one and all, and join the dance!

name: Lemongrab
line: How dare you? How dare you release my prisoners? Soft Lemongrab! Softer than an old graham cracker! YOU'RE SOFT!!

name: Finn
line: Yike!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, no! We're locked in. Finn, give me your phone, I'm calling Jake!

name: Finn
line: What? No! Let's, um... we could do another prank! I brought some of your super-spicy hot sauce! Ah, so spice!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, this is serious!

name: Finn
line: But, my other plan worked.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, your other plan failed, which was part of my plan, which worked.

name: Finn
line: Your plan? But I thought we were having fun together.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, I have citizens who need me. I can't always treat everything like a little boy game.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Yeah, no, that's cool.

name: Lemonhope
line: Mistress! Mistress, look! Something scary is happening now!

name: Lemongrab
line: How dare you? How dare you? After all I've done for you?! You try to steal my Lemonhope away?! You're too old, princess. Too old for pranks. Too old!  I've tried imprisoning! I've tried reconditioning! You leave me no choice. Lemon Children!  Go forth! Go forth now!

name: Lemon Children
line: Sorry, sir.

name: Finn
line: Get to safety, princess! I'll hold 'em off.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?

name: Three-pronged Lemon Child
line: Sorry, sir!

name: Finn
line: Wait, so do you not like any games, or just little boy games?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn...

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Lemon brothers! Stop! Stop and listen!  It has cost me much, but I have learned that lemon need not squeeze lemon to survive. Lemonhope, go forth, grow strong, and return for us!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You're going to love the Candy Kingdom, Lemonhope. You're learn all about playing, and play-math, and learning all day long, and you'll never get yelled at. Unless you drink my soda from out of the fridge.

name: Lemonhope
line: Yes, mistress.

name: Jake
line: Yo, man, how's it going? Terrible?

name: Finn
line: Well, yeah, mostly. But I think I learned something.

name: Jake
line: Go on.

name: Finn
line: Well, I'm thinkin' maybe age isn't just a number. Maybe older people, like, really are different. Y'know? Like, less fun inside.

name: Jake
line: So whatcha saying here?

name: Finn
line: I'm saying I think I really sponked up. I gotta patch things up with Flame Princess.

name: Jake
line: Oh, dang! Didn't you hear? She's got a new boyfriend already!

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Jake
line: Man, I'm just kidding.  She might, though.

name: Finn
line: You getting all bit up by mosquitoes?

name: Jake
line: I don't know... I'm getting bit up by something.

name: Finn
line: Man, I can't believe you said this was a good swimming hole.

name: Jake
line: I said it might be good. It's not, though.

name: Finn
line: True.

name: Jake
line: Wanna just go?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. This place smells like green beans.

name: Mudscamp
line: My name's Woobeewoo.

name: Jake
line: Oh, whoa!

name: Woobeewoo
line: I need your help. My people are in trouble. I'm a mudscamp.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, Woobeewoo! Of course we'll help. Why didn't you just say something before?

name: Woobeewoo
line: I'm shy. It took me a while to work up the nerve.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Right on. You good now?

name: Woobeewoo
line: We'll see.  Come, I'll take you to my village.

name: Woobeewoo
line: Here we are the village of my people. It doesn't have an official name, but I call it South Woobeewoo.  Uh, this way.

name: Woobeewoo
line: This is the village elder. He'll fill you in on the "deets."

name: Woobeewoo Elder
line: Greetings, heroes.

name: Jake
line: Bleehhh! Aw! Ehhh!

name: Woobeewoo Elder
line: I'm so sorry about that. You know, we--we secrete stink oil all day out our awful-sauce glands. You know, I guess I should have warned you. Anyway, lemme cut the cheese.

name: Woobeewoo on right
line: Cut to the chase.

name: Woobeewoo Elder
line: Yes... I mean--I mean, of course "cut to the chase," I mean, for many--for many moons now our village has been under siege by the Mega Frog. He's 100 stories of 110% 10-speed terror, like, bam, like, fresh out the grease. I mean, he chases us all up and down from first base to home, trying to eat us alive. We--we've always managed to escape, but it's c-razy scary, I mean, w-what if you got ate? Think about it.  All alone in a stomach full of acid.  "Mommy! Mommy, Mommy, help me!"  "Billy, is that you? Mommy you sound exactly--"  "Mommy you sound exactly like m--"  "Mommy, you sound exactly like me!"  "Billy, uh--"  Anyway. If this keeps up, we'll have to move to the city and get jobs. We don't know how to--how to do anything cool. Look,  see, th-they're already practicing, the poor fools. They don't know what they're in for.

name: Jake
line: Whoa, relax, buddy! You're talkin' to the right couple of guys.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man! Me and Jake will bust this Mega Frog up, right up his bumble-stop.

name: Woobeewoo Elder
line: That is excellent news. I mean, h-here, take this, please.  It's not much, b-but it's all we have--  it's--it's a bag of lollies.

name: Jake
line: That's nice! Thanks, man.

name: Woobeewoo Elder
line: Now farewell, heroes! We're counting on you... for reals!

name: Jake
line: Hmm.

name: Finn
line: Gettin' anything?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but it's hard to make out. Could just be some footprints... or an old doodie.

name: Finn
line: Word... Hey, I have an idea. We can use those lollipops to leave a trail. That way we won't get lost out here.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, that's a great idea, man. I was just gonna throw 'em all on the ground anyway.  Whomp.  Whomp.  Whomp.  Whomp.  This way.  The thing with frogs is they got a real subtle smell. Kinda like when you open up a new thing of, um... CDRs.

name: Finn
line: Like... electric celery?

name: Jake
line: Yeah... but subtler.  Mm-HMM! Just as I suspected.

name: Finn
line: Sweet. These'll take us right to him.  Come on, Jake!

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Huh. We've passed this butt tree, like, three times.

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Finn
line: We should probably backtrack--get reoriented and all that.

name: Jake
line: Word.  Wait, these prints are all messed up!

name: Finn
line: Whoa. Yeah! Guess we better follow the lollipops back. Where's those at?

name: Jake
line: We ran out of those a while ago.

name: Finn
line: Snaaaap. Totally lost. Dang! Do you think maybe the Mega Frog made all those footprints on purpose? So we'd use up all our lollies and get totally lost?

name: Jake
line: What? Nah, man! Frogs are mighty dumb, you know that. He's probably runnin' around like that 'cause he's lost!  Plus, we're not even lost. I just gotta stretch up past these trees and see where we're at.  Dang. It's all misty! It's kinda nice up here, though.  AAAAAAAAH! Man, forget that! I can't see anything through that mist. Plus, I got struck by lightning. We're just gonna have to set up camp and wait out the storm.

name: Finn
line: Cool! I call fire patrol!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, me, too!

name: Jake
line: Do you remember how to make a fire with sticks?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man--it's easy.  Uhhh, rub 'em together, right?

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Jake
line: I don't think it's workin', man.

name: Finn
line: I think I saw some guy do it like this once.

name: Jake
line: That's not it. I think you're on to something, though.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, here we go!

name: Finn
line: Friction!

name: Jake
line: Come on, boys, come on!

name: Finn
line: Mwah!  I don't know.

name: Jake
line: You just gotta get some momentum going.  AAAAAAH! Glob-globbing stick! Glob-globbing swamp!  AAAAAAAAAAAAH!  Oh, hey, you got the fire goin'. Right on!

name: Finn
line: Jake, how did you--?  What the--? It's the Mega Frog! Quick, put the fire out!

name: Finn
line: Jake, look!  He's just sittin' there! What's he doin' out there?

name: Jake
line: I don't know, but let's pound him while he's vulnerable.

line: Okay, Sweetles.  What?

name: Jake
line: Whoaa!

name: Finn

name: Jake
line: Oh, what?!  Yeah, . Hey, whoa! That gives me a great idea. We can make a Finn and Jake out of sticks and stuff and lure the Mega Frog out here, then ba-donk him right while he's all confused!

name: Finn
line: Yeaaaah! That's a great idea, man!  That's a great idea, Jake.

line: Fuh-fuh-fuh... fuh-fuh-fuh-fuh-fuh-fuh-fuh-fuh...

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: Wha--?  AAAAAAAAAAAAHH!  Jake!  RUN!  Jake, stretch us outta here!  Come on, Jake!

line: I need your help. My people are in trouble... I'm shy... I mean, he chases us all up and down from first base to home. We've always managed to escape--.

line: You can't break your own curse by kissin' somebody. Somebody's gotta kiss you.

line: Oh. Weird. Well, thanks, man. I don't know a lot of dudes who'd do that to help a guy out.

line: Oh. Huh. Oh, this darn zipper Oh, brother.

line: Aah! Ah ha ha! You're one of those old fashioned revenants, aren't you? You can't come in unless I invite you in! What do you think would even happen if you just walked in here, huh? You're so dumb, you sad old relic. How 'bout some garlic?

line: I've got gallons and gallons of warm red teenage blood, and you can't have it! Pbht! Eh, yeah? Yeah! Open up a murder-hole, buddy!

name: Hierophant
line: Oh! Marceline, listen to me. You will never defeat The Vampire King. You can't even defeat me in your current state.

line: and hurling spiky purple gobs at me. Here's the dope You need me.

name: Finn
line: Does everyone have to get caught up in this mentality? I'm going to march right over to Gumbaldia on a last-ditch diplomatic mission. Want to come?

line: You bet! And that's the number one priority for kick-butt diplomacy - the cuteness offensive!

line: You want unreasonable? Get a load of my unreasonably bad boy battle automaton! Her name is The Cake.  My niece would never have the ambition for a project like this. But ambition is my whole deal! You want a closer look, boy? I grant it to you.

line: So there's truly nothing I can say to change your mind?

line: Princess Bubblegum has made her bed, and now she must lie in it. But not get back up because she'll be dead.
