line: Man, I almost thought that was something really serious.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I don't believe it. A signed peace treaty? Finn, you're amazing. I could hug you right no- ...Did you stop at a craft store on the way here?

name: Finn
line: Oh, the glitter juice. It's part of a weird Gumbaldia treaty-signing ritual. Once I got to know him, your uncle was actually pretty cool. As I get older, I see the most important thing is to empathize with my friends and enemies. Like, co-exist instead of cutting off people's heads and stuff.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Peps?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You've been doused with Gumbald's dumdum solution!  Gumbald!

name: Finn
line: Where are you going!?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Candy citizens, we are going to war!

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Hoopty hoo, hoopty hey! Let's cut 'em up, folks.

name: Finn
line: I donked up.

name: Green Knight
line: Don't halt. Continue running. I command it.

name: Gumbald
line: My thanks to you all for joining me here today. I hope you're enjoying the hors d'oeuvres.

name: Gumbald
line: It seems that the Princess avoided our attempt at a peaceful resolution. But it was still a good plan... Aunt Lolly.

name: Gumbald
line: This magnificent dessert shall make the whole war relatively swift and painless.

name: Lolly
line: Eh, I love to plan.

name: Crunchy
line: Hey. What's a plan?

name: Gumbald
line: Oh, cousin Chicle, you've still got it. Ladies and gentlemen, it's time to unleash plan B. My formidable legion of Candy Kingdom haters. Ricardio, Bandit Princess, Samantha the warrior dog, Peacemaster, Me-Mow, Pete Sassafrass, Ash the Warlock, Sir Slicer, Scorcher, the Green Knight, and finally, the Iced King.

name: Ice King
line: Uh, I think I might be here by mistake. What are we doing again?

name: Gumbald
line: It's Gum War!

name: Finn
line: Finn to Prubs, come in, Prubs.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, Finn! How's the mission going?

name: Finn
line: So far, no sign of the Bird Man. Why's this guy so dangerous?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Some say he's a half-man, half-bird that poops fire while he flies. It's all rumors so far. That's why I need you and Jake to find out everything you can about him and report back to me.

name: Finn
line: Where are you?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Under the sea. The mermaids are trying to beach themselves. I came to see why. Turns out they're just lonely.

name: Finn
line: Maybe I'll go hang out with them after this biz.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Sounds great, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Okay. Bye, PB.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Bye!

name: Jake
line: C'mon, let's go look for that creep!

name: Finn
line: Whoa.

name: Finn
line: Huh? Where am I?

name: Xergiok
line: This is the rookery, where I and my bird friends dwell!

name: Finn
line: So are you, like, the Great Bird Man?

name: Xergiok
line: That's what they call me nowadays. But when I first met you, Finn, and you, Jake, you knew me as  Xergiok, the Goblin King!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Whaaa—?!

name: Xergiok
line: When we first met, I was crazy for smacking goblin hams. I was cruel, selfish, brutal. But every thing changed after I was defeated by the two of you!

name: Jake
line: So, you got some sleek new shades, and now everything's different?

name: Xergiok
line: Oh, no, my change has been deep. And these whatsits are only curtains for empty windows.

name: Finn
line: Whoa. What happened there?

name: Xergiok
line: I miffed off a wizard, and he took my eyes.  I wonder what he wanted them for—some kind of lotion... or potion... or time-traveling spell. I'll never know. Never, ever, never. But losing my eyesight was only the beginning of my wonderful change! I started meditating and doing yoga. Now I can "see" with my heart and smell with my soul.

name: Jake
line: You smell with your beard?

name: Xergiok
line: I smell with my nose!

name: Jake
line: Lame.

name: Xergiok
line: Om.

name: Finn
line: What are you doing?

name: Xergiok
line: Oh, Taffy! You heard my call!  Climb aboard, boys.  Taffy will take us to the lower level, and you can have a bite to eat!

name: Finn
line: Oh, uh, me and Jake will follow you. Jake needs to stretch out and stuff.

name: Xergiok
line: Okay, great! Well, follow me!

name: Finn
line: It's crazy, right?! The way dude's eyeballs are just hangin' there.

name: Jake
line: I know! I almost told him 'cause it was driving me nuts!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, me too!

name: Jake
line: Do you think he's got evil intentions behind his reborn star-child act?

name: Finn
line: I don't know. But if he does, I'm gonna find out.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, me too.

name: Xergiok
line: Nice and cool down here, isn't it? A-ha! Listen to the babies! Num-num time!

name: Jake
line: Aw, hey, that's cute.

name: Xergiok
line: There you go, little ones. Suckle, suckle!

name: Xergiok
line: They're small, but they sure can take a lot out of you. Whoo! Dizzy. Sometimes feeding really wipes me out. I hope you'll excuse me while I refocus my qi.  See you in a while!

name: Finn
line: Now's our chance to do some snooping.

name: Finn
line: Jake!  I found his weapon stash!

name: Jake
line: Hmm.

name: Finn
line: What is it? A fighting stick? A dagger?

name: Jake
line: This one's a letter from the hospital.

name: Finn
line: You can read those bumps with your fingers?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I learned braille from my ex.

name: Finn
line: Your ex was blind?

name: Jake
line: Nah, just cool.  "Dear Xergiok, thank you so much for your donation. The kidneys fit great."  Well, geez, maybe he has changed his ways!

name: Finn
line: Maybe. Let's keep looking.

name: Finn
line: Doy!

name: Finn
line: Oh!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Oh, crease!

name: Xergiok
line: Psychic links! Cardamom, my friend, I'm coming! I'm com—  Mother of Gob! Hold on, Cardy!  Okay, here I am, buddy. Ol' Xergy's here.  Let's see now—  Aw, dang!

name: Finn
line: Wha—?

name: Jake
line: Shush, child!

name: Xergiok
line: Ah, Finn and Jake, you are here!

name: Finn
line: Where'd you learn that heal spell?

name: Xergiok
line: I use no magic. I manipulated space with a vibrational chant. You see, now the injury has transferred to me!  Ooh, yeah, that hurts, baby! Whoo! Can't you see, Jake? I love these birds more than I love myself. What am I to the deafening roar of the macro-cosmos? Nothing much. Just a vessel to carry the message of friendship to y'all beasts and dirt!

name: Finn
line: Dirt?

name: Xergiok
line: Yeah, look!  Hello, friends! Go for a ride!

name: Finn
line: Listen, man. About your eyes.

name: Xergiok
line: Yes, a wizard stole them.

name: Finn
line: Alright, but not—

name: Jake
line: Finn! What are you doing, man?

name: Finn
line: Dude, he's changed!

name: Jake
line: Are you sure?

name: Finn
line: Uh, yeah, man. Isn't it kind of obvi?

name: Jake
line: Alright, tell him.

name: Xergiok
line: Tell me what?

name: Jake
line: Your eyes weren't stolen by a wizard. They're in your beard.

name: Xergiok
line: Alright. Oh, where are they?

name: Finn
line: Dude, your eyes are in your beard.

name: Xergiok
line: A-ha, what? Good job, guys. Goofin' on the blind guy—real nice!

name: Finn
line: No, man, they're right here.

name: Xergiok
line: What my life?!

name: Finn
line: We didn't tell you 'cause we thought you might still be a wong lord!

name: Xergiok
line: And these aren't grapes, right?

name: Finn
line: No, man.

name: Xergiok
line: Hmm. Finn and Jake, could you help me onto Cardamom's back? I would like to be high in the clouds, bathed in the pinks and the blues of the desert twilight, when I restore my sight.

name: Jake
line: Sure, okay.

name: Xergiok
line: Climb aboard! Vanilla! Chocolat! Cinnamon! Agave! All my friends, to the sky!

name: Finn
line: How's it feel, man?

name: Xergiok
line: Oh, yeah, it's overwhelming. This view takes me back. I always loved the sunset. And the silhouettes of my little goblins lined up to receive their spankings!  Well, the past is the past. I wanna thank you guys for finding my eyes. I don't know where I got that idea about the wizard!

name: Jake
line: You were in the desert a long time, man.

name: Xergiok
line: Yes, twenty years.

name: Jake
line: Nah, it was more like one year and change, dude.

name: Xergiok
line: Yes, things certainly have changed for me in that time. Say, who's ruling the uh, Goblin Kingdom since I left?

name: Jake
line: Whisper Dan.

name: Xergiok
line: Oh, Whisper Dan! That's cool. Cool, cool. Hey, you guys wanna ride back to your crib?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, sure, man.

name: Jake
line: Uh, wait. Xergiok, this is the Goblin Kingdom.

name: Xergiok
line: I know, but I was thinking—now that I'm wiser, I could rule as king again!

name: Finn
line: That idea is terrible.

name: Xergiok
line: Well, you know, I disagree! And I have my army of bird friends, so anyone who disagrees with me should get a  SPANKING!

name: Goblin Guard 1
line: Hey, Jeff, is that your real laugh?

name: Goblin Guard 2
line: No, it's Xergiok.

name: Goblin Guard 1
line: Oh, Glob!

name: Jake
line: Oh, dang!

name: Xergiok
line: Oh, yeah, baby!

name: Finn
line: Come on, man. Are you for real?

name: Xergiok
line: Attack, birds, attack! Where's the butt on this thing?  That sort of looks like a butt!  Yeah!  You like that? Huh?!  Whoa!

name: Xergiok
line: Wait! Cardamom! Nougat! Stevia! Dang!

name: Jake
line: You lost your friends, dude.

name: Xergiok
line: Yeah, I feel myself hitting bottom again. Yup, okay, here we go.

name: Xergiok
line: Here, Finn. Take my eyes and bury them forever. I will not need them again.

name: Finn
line: Okay, man.

name: Xergiok
line: Thanks.

name: Jake
line: Are you gonna be alright, man?

name: Xergiok
line: It's cool.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Bye!

name: Finn
line: Dude, that sucks. I hope he finds peace, or something.

name: Goblin Guard 2
line: He's going to the reservoir!

name: Goblin Guard 1
line: Um, why is he doin' that?

name: Goblin Guard 2
line: Maybe he's thirsty.  Oops, I guess he was just sad.

name: Finn
line: Should we save him?

name: Jake
line: Nah, man, he's fine.

name: Finn
line: What the—?

name: Xergiok
line: I found a girlfriend!  I'm in love! Woo!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Calling all curlys!

name: Finn
line: Careful! You'll wreck my gift for Princess Bubblegum.

name: Jake
line: Whoops. Hey, what's it supposed to be, anyway?

name: Finn
line: It's... a scale model of the Candy Kingdom, made out of my saliva!

name: Jake
line: ...Sooo this means you wanna give 'er your spit, huh?

name: Finn
line: Yup!  HEY, NO—

name: Jake
line: It's okay, dude. I totally get it. Haw haw haw.

name: Finn
line: I just wanted to give 'er somethin', uh... to celebrate her science... thing.

name: Jake
line: You mean her... Super Science Barbecue?!

name: Finn
line: You think it's science-y enough for 'er?

name: Jake
line: Relax. She'll love it!  And then she'll love you. Heh heh heh...

name: Finn
line: Wha?!

name: Jake
line: Hey, there's Bubblegum!  Hide it behind your back, man!  Princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh. Hi, guys! Just gettin' the grill cookin' for tonight's BBQ!

name: Finn
line: Oh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What's that you got behind your back there, Finny?

name: Finn
line: Oh, I... I made you somethin'.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Really? Can I scope it?

name: Finn
line: Yes. Close your eyes.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: A'ight.

name: Finn
line: Get ready to open your eyes!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Achoo!  Can I open my eyes?

name: Finn
line: No, wait, uh, keep 'em closed for, like, three more hours!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm gonna open my eyes.  Oh, Finn! It's pink! I love pink! Oh, thanks, Finn!

name: Chet
line: Princess! Princess!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Better not say nothing, you!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes, Chet?

name: Chet
line: Um... So, I called grill-meister for the BBQ, but Pepper won't give up the spatula!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Fine, fine. You can have it...  ...when you pry it from my cold, dead hands!!

name: Chet
line: NOOOO!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey... If you two aren't watching the grill, then who's watching the....  ...GRILL?!?!

name: Finn
line: MEAT!! WAH!!  DIE, YOU FIRE!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn! That was awesome.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Heh... Thanks, Princess. I'm always happy to help.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I see. Your heroic brain is fascinating in a scientific way. Many scientific minds are going to be speaking at my barbeque. You should talk about something, too. You'll do that for me, right?

name: Finn
line: Anything you want...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks, Finn!  Listen, I have to deal with this.  See you tonight?

name: Finn
line: Uh... Yeah!

name: Jake
line: Buddy, just breathe into me.

name: Finn
line: Ah?

name: Jake
line: You're just gonna give a speech to a buncha' brainiacs.

name: Finn
line: I can't hang with those guys. I'm full of stupid.

name: Jake
line: Then we'll just borrow some brains by goin' to the place where knowledge liiives!

name: Finn
line: Oh, Brain Town!

name: Jake
line: Uh, no, the library.

name: Finn
line: The Library of the Undead...

name: Jake
line: No... Just the regular library.

name: Jake
line: Hey, Finn, let's split. This turned out to be boring.

name: Finn
line: But I have to cram this info!

name: Jake
line: Okay, okay... I'll just keep readin' this book about figs.

name: Finn
line: And I'll just read this book about pigs.

name: Jake
line: Haha! Whatcha doin'?!

name: Finn
line: I'm bored now, too!

name: Turtle Princess
line: Shh! Hey! That's completely inappropriate!

name: Finn
line: But... w-w-we were just enthusiastic about learning!

name: Finn
line: Hmm... So, if I can't book-learn for beans, we'll just get some smarty to explain scientific junk to me!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, then you can at least sound smart... but where're you gonna find someone like that?

name: Finn
line: Jake... we're goin' to college.

name: Professor worm
line: And the great question endures... "Who would win in a battle between Nietzsche's Übermensch... and Mandroid?" The answer is...  WEREWOLF QUEEN! IT'S ALWAYS WEREWOLF QUEEN!

name: Finn
line: Rad!

name: Jake
line: Heh heh heh heh heh.

name: Finn
line: Jake. You can just shrink yourself down.

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Professor Worm
line: And when I finally meet the Werewolf Queen, she will take me on as her royal consort and we will rule in blood!

name: Finn
line: Hey, teach. Can you talk more about scientific... uh... stuff and things?

name: Professor worm
line: Well... sure, I could...  if this wasn't a class on THEORETICAL FIGHTONOMICS!

name: Finn
line: Ohhh...

name: Professor worm
line: Are you even in this class, Mister....

name: Finn
line: Uh... Wormy... uh, Wormy McSquirmy!

name: Professor worm
line: McSquirmy, huh? Well, we'll just see about that, I—  Oh! There you are. W. McSquirmy. I'm sorry. Yes, you're registered and you haven't shown up for a single class!

name: Worm
line: Truancy hurts us all, McSquirmy!

name: Finn
line: Hey! Ow! Please! Where's your compassion?!

name: Professor worm
line: Let's kill 'im!!

name: Worms
line: ASSAIL!!

name: Worm with glasses
line: Excelsior!

name: Finn
line: Jake, let's get outta here!  OW!

name: Professor worm
line: And stay out of Academia!

name: Finn
line: Well... that's it. I'm all outta ideas on how to learn this junk.

name: Jake
line: OH! Let's just solve this thing with magic!

name: Finn
line: No... That's the easy way out.

name: Jake
line: Yeah. It's the easy way out!

name: Finn
line: Oh! Oh, yeah! Let's go visit Choose Goose and his magical shack!

name: Choose Goose
line: Magic, you say?!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, Choose Goose! I need magic! Some kind of mind-enhancing magic.

name: Choose Goose
line: Ah, yes, the quest you are on, requires  the Glasses of Nerdicon!

name: Finn
line: So... I just put those on, and then I'd be able to give that lecture... and Princess Bubblegum will totally dig it. Yeah! Whadaya want for it, CG?

name: Choose Goose
line: Lately, I've been feeling drained. I only wish to be entertained.

name: Finn
line: Hmm... Oh!

name: Choose Goose
line: Well done! The glasses, you have won!

name: Finn
line: Everything small is just a small version of something big!! I understand everything!!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, bud, are you okay?

name: Finn
line: Oh, Jake... I'm better than okay. I know exactly how to impress the princess.

name: Jake
line: More spit bubbles?

name: Finn
line: No. No. Those spit bubbles were as fragile as my old perception of reality. But wait! Maybe you're on to something! I could show the princess bubbles the likes of which no one has ever seen!!

name: Jake
line: And how will you do that?

name: Finn
line: I'll start with a solid bulleted list!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks again to Dr. Dextrose for sharing your fascinating research on the future of cuteness.

name: Finn
line: Yes, yes, how charming. What... quaint notions.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And now for a special guest lecture by one of Ooo's greatest heroes... Finn the Human!

name: Finn
line: Ladies and gentlemen... and princess...  I'm here to talk about multi-dimensional bubbles! But I'm not just going to talk about blowing bubbles! I'm going to blow... your... minds!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm?

name: Finn
line: This is a bubble-blower of my own design. With this, you can blow bubbles in different dimensions.  This two-dimensional bubble casts a one-dimensional shadow.  A three-dimensional bubble casts a two-dimensional shadow.  A fourth-dimensional bubble casts a three-dimensional shadow... IT IS BEYOND COMPREHENSION!  Beyond space!! Beyond time!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn... that would mean you've created...

name: Finn
line: Yes... A BLACK HOLE!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: FINN!! DO SOMETHING!!

name: Finn
line: It's okay. I'm sure the solution is on my bulleted—  LIST!!  Don't worry. I have everything under control.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: UNDER CONTROL?! MY GUESTS ARE TERRIFIED!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: YOU'RE TRYING TO KILL US ALL?!?

name: Finn
line: NO, OF COURSE NOT! I'M TRYING TO GIVE YOU THE GREATEST CONFERENCE EVER!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn...! You've gone insane!

name: Finn
line: What?! No way! I'm, like, the smartest guy in Ooo, thanks to these glasses!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Glasses? Finn... take those off. You're not yourself!

name: Finn
line: But—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Please!! I need the real you!

name: Finn
line: What's goin' on?!  WHOA!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You blew it, Finn! With this!

name: Finn
line: Then I'll kill it... with this!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Be careful!  Finn!! Look out!!

name: Finn
line: Wha? Fourth-dimensional! Jake! Let me go!

name: Jake
line: Finn!! Don't do anything stupid!!

name: Finn
line: I can't help it, man!!  I'm all about stupid!! YAAAAAAH!!!

name: Jake and Princess Bubblegum
line: FINN!!!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn... My Science Barbecue was a fiasco...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What's this?  "Make hyper bubble. Cause black hole. Become insane. PB takes off the glasses. Save the day. Win the heart of the princess."? Finn, you knew all this would happen?!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Knew what? I wrote that list when I was insane with smartness!

name: Ice King
line: Una— unacceptable. Mm... un-unacceptable. Unaccepta—aah!  Lemons! Whew! Mm.

name: Ice King
line: Gunter? Y-you having a bad dream? Gunter?

name: Ice King
line: Oh, my Glob.

name: Empress
line: Hello, Simon.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, lady! Hi.

name: Empress
line: Wait, you don't remember me?

name: Ice King
line: Oh, man. I'm so sorry. I stalk a lot of ladies. Were you at Shelby's barbecue?

name: Empress
line: Huh. Looks like you've lost it all the way. You've crossed the valley of tears and come out the other side but a shadow.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, thanks.

name: Empress
line: Well, all the better for you to...  submit.

name: Ice King
line: I like where this is going.

name: Empress
line: Don't resist.

name: Empress
line: Sell your spirit to the skies. Surrender to The Empress eyes.

name: Ice King
line: Empress, my darling! My great eternal love! How can I serve you?

name: Empress
line: Bring me blood.

name: Ice King
line: At once!

name: Ice King
line: Alley-oop!

name: Penguin
line: Wenk-wenk!

name: Empress
line: Oh, this is so sad.

name: Ice King
line: Here you go, my love.

name: Empress
line: What's this? Don't you have any human?

name: Ice King
line: Humans? Well, Finn's the only human around here. Try a penguin.

name: Penguin
line: Wenk!

name: Empress
line: Ugh.

name: Ice King
line: You know, Empress is a kind of penguin, and your name is Empress. That's kind of cool, right?

name: Empress
line: Bleh. Tastes like cheese water. Where's the top-drawer stuff?

name: Ice King
line: Oh, uh, don't be like that, Honey-poo. I'll fix it. I'll do anything for you.

name: Empress
line: Bring me the blood of Finn!

name: Ice King
line: Okay.

name: Empress
line: Oh, look. I've gotten to my bit. "Today I met a super-pretty cyclops lady with fangs. She told me to eat a fat boulder, and I did it." Ha! I'd forgotten that one.

name: Marceline
line: The Empress!

name: Jake
line: Vampiyah, I'm gonna kick yah Vampiyah, I'm gonna lick yah Vampiyah Aah! Uh-oh. It's P.B.'s outside clock!

name: Finn
line: Ahh. You did a tremendous job guarding the cabin, Jake. But it looks like you need to be relieved.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I need relief. P.B. still working on new vampire-busting gear?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but she's almost done. No sign of Marceline, though. I think she ditched us to fight the vampires by herself. Solo-style. We'll go look for her after P.B.'s device is up and running. So, how did you pass the time?

name: Jake
line: Patted my laps and made some rhymes. Stoop, stoop, sittin' on the stoop Stoop, stoop, sittin' on the stoop

name: Finn
line: Is that P.B.'s outside clock? Looks like it's been staked. What did you do?

name: Jake
line: I heard a loud snap, and my vampire-hunting reflexes kicked in!

name: Finn
line: Dude, that was her Uncle Gumbald's outside clock.

name: Jake
line: Yeeegh! She doesn't have to know I broke the clock. Let's blame it on the vampires! Or we can hide it! Whoo! Problem solved? Yeah? Whooop!

name: Ice King
line: Snap!

name: Finn
line: Aaah! What was that?! Vampiyah! Aah! Aah! Hyah! Hah!

name: Ice King
line: Snap, snap, snapping branches for fun

name: Empress
line: Oh, ho, ho, this is riveting. "The Empress is so nice. Today she let me polish her boots with my tongue. That's almost like kissing, right?"

name: Ice King
line: Hey! Who's my hunny bunny?!

name: Marceline
line: Simon!

name: Empress
line: Marceline!

name: Marceline
line: What has she done to you? Did she bite you?!

name: Ice King
line: Hey, calm down. You're destroying the mood. I'm trying to get her to bite me later.

name: Empress
line: Minion! Honestly, I'm standing right here as you collude against me with my sworn enemy. It's a bit rude.

name: Ice King
line: Sorry.

name: Finn
line: Eh! Stake! Yeah!

name: Marceline
line: Finn?

name: Finn
line: I got your back, Marceline! Ha! Huh?

name: Empress
line: Ow. How dare you stake my back?

name: Finn
line: I was aiming for your heart!

name: Empress
line: Ice King, bind the interlopers in ice.

name: Ice King
line: Heh.

name: Ice King
line: Let's keep it down, huh? My baby's resting.

name: Finn
line: Aaaaaah! No way! Waaaaaaah!

name: Ice King
line: Shush!

name: Marceline
line: Simon, you have to resist the Empress!

name: Ice King
line: But she's a woman. Aha! Ohh.

name: Marceline
line: She's a vampire! I hunt vampires because of you!

name: Ice King
line: Because of me?

name: Marceline
line: Staking vampires, protecting the last remaining humans, it felt like I was protecting you. It was the only thing that brought me happiness during those years.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, Marceline!

name: Marceline
line: Simon? A-are you remembering?

name: Ice King
line: Pa-chazz!

name: Finn
line: Shmowzow.

name: Marceline
line: Please, Simon! Remember our history!

name: Ice King
line: Our what now?

name: Empress
line: Oh, Marceline. I heard everything. I was invisible. All your tiresome mortal emotions, they'll all be over soon.  Minion, I order you to kill Marceline.

name: Ice King
line: Whaaa?? No way! She's my pal!

name: Empress
line: Are you disobeying me?

name: Ice King
line: Hey, it's called real talking.

name: Empress
line: and you still can't get anything right, can you?

name: Finn
line: Here's our chance!

name: Ice King
line: Please, baby, don't say that.

name: Empress
line: You're my thrall.

name: Ice King
line: I am enthralled by you!

name: Marceline
line: You distract the Empress.

name: Marceline
line: Squeeze!

name: Ice King
line: Yaaaah!

name: Empress
line: Ha!

name: Marceline
line: No!

name: Ice King
line: Heuk!

name: Empress
line: Drat. Aaaaaaaah!

name: Marceline
line: You got this comin'.

name: Ice King
line: No!

name: Marceline
line: Simon, what are you doing?

name: Ice King
line: Let me go! If you want to hurt my lady, you'll have to go through me!

name: Marceline
line: Uuuuuugh!

name: Empress
line: Now, Oaf! Kill her!

name: Ice King
line: Sweetie, there's no need to raise your voice.

name: Empress
line: What?! Okay, that's it. Turn and look at me.

name: Ice King
line: Oh! Are we gonna gaze into each other's eyes again?

name: Empress
line: You must fall deeper under my spell. Sell your spirit to the skies.

name: Ice King
line: I can see myself in your pupils. Hee-hee.

name: Empress
line: You're not even hypnotized. At all.

name: Ice King
line: Them gigantic sparkly orbs of yours could hypnotize an earclops.

name: Empress
line: So, you're not.

name: Ice King
line: Eh-heh, no.

name: Empress
line: You're stupid donkey

name: Ice King
line: B-but honey, wh-why you being so mean to me?

name: Empress
line: Because you're too thick to even fall under my spell. And you got no class.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, so you're doing that? You're gonna start name-calling? You want to play the blame game?! Okay! Well, if you weren't so perfect and and pretty and statuesque and and

name: Finn
line: Come on, Simon. It's over.  It's gonna be okay, man. Nope, nope. This way. This way. Come on, let's get you some ice cream.

name: Marceline
line: That's the last time you're gonna toy with his heart.

name: Empress
line: Psht! If you really cared about him, why'd you let him degenerate into this pathetic clown character? He used to have more of a silver-fox thing going on, with his hair and those cute glasses. He was happier then, you know. When he was serving me.

name: Marceline
line: Aaaaaaah!

name: Empress
line: Dang, girl.

name: Marceline
line: Aaah! Aaah! Aah! Gah!

name: Empress
line: Open those peepers!

name: Marceline
line: Eat a stake! Huhn No!

name: Empress
line: Ugh! I don't understand this.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Marceline! Yeah, you're welcome! Hunh Um Marceline?

name: Marceline
line: All right. I shouldn't have tried to go it alone with the vamps. From now on, we'll do this team-up style.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, team. You're still invisible.

name: Marceline
line: Oh! Heh whoops.

name: Jake
line: Oh!

name: Marceline
line: Hm.

name: Voice
line: Whoo, show me them legs!

name: Jake
line: Shelby?

name: Shelby
line: Hey, Dancing Bug! Uh, come on, man. Shake it.

name: Pincer Beetle
line: No. I really couldn't—Okay! Maybe I could!

name: Scorpion
line: Whoa, dang, DB. You're the best bug at this party!

name: Shelby
line: What? Hey, I got moves, too, guys.

name: Scorpion
line: Yeah, right, Shelby. What are you gonna do? The Worm?

name: Shelby
line: No. I'm gonna do parkour.

name: Scorpion
line: Hmm.

name: Shelby
line: Haha!  Parkour!  Ah, oh no. I really hurt myself.  Guys, I'm so dumb!

name: Shelby
line: Ugh. Hey, somebody forgot their—oh, cram!  Um...who are you?

name: Kent
line: Pbht!

name: Shelby
line: Oh. There's-There's a note. "Hey, dude, the tip of your tail got snipped off, so now you have a little brother. We named him Butty Butterson. Signed, the other bugs."  I'll call you Kent for short.

name: Shelby
line: Jake..Jake!

name: Jake
line: Hmm? Whoa, Shelby! What's going on there? With your butt?

name: Shelby
line: It's fine. I was goofing off, got hurt. Now I got a little brother. I named him Kent.

name: Kent
line: I'm Kent!

name: Shelby
line: Whoa! A talking brother.

name: Jake
line: You can chop up a worm and get two? I thought that was a myth.

name: Shelby
line: Myth is a powerful force in my life, dude. So the thing is, I don't know beans about being a big brother. Can you give me some tips?

name: Jake
line: Ah, it's easy. You just give him something sharp and get him to fight bad guys.

name: Shelby
line: That's it?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, you might have to stretch all big if he gets in real trouble. But, yeah.

name: Shelby
line: Alright. Sounds good.

name: Kent
line: Someday, you'll be Kent's food.

name: Kent
line: Oh wow.

name: Shelby
line: Hey, how'd you do that?

name: Kent
line: I don't know.

name: Shelby
line: Hmm. Okay, Kent. This is real important. You're my little brother, so your purpose is to fight bad guys. So go fight some bad guys. Or girls. Don't discriminate.

name: Kent
line: Oh. Okay, brother.  Boo-oop. Boop, boop, boop, boop, boop, boop, boop!

name: Kent
line: Hyah!  A bad guy. Ah! Let's fight!  Aaah! Hey, get back here! Don't run! I'm super new at fights. And at being alive.

name: Dewdrop
line: Hi.

name: Kent
line: Who are you?  Where am I? Why do my parts hurt?

name: Leaf Beard
line: Oh, good, you're awake. I am Leaf Beard. I found you blonked out and bruised in the tunnels. But if you drink of our dewdrops, it will fix up all your ouchies.

name: Kent
line: Pbht!

name: Leaf Beard
line: The rat king has made his way to our end of the roots. You should be more careful.

name: Kent
line: Oh. Oh, okay. What's a rat king?

name: Leaf Beard
line: Oh. You're not from the roots.

name: Kent
line: I'm from my brother's butt. Maybe.

name: Leaf Beard
line: The rat king's been destroying our home, chewing up the roots of this tree. This tree that gives us life!

name: Guy
line: Hey!

name: Kent
line: So, he's a bad guy?

name: Leaf Beard
line: So sick, nasty bad.

name: Kent
line: That means I got to fight him. That's what my brother said to do! Where's my sword?

name: Leaf Beard
line: Your sword was shattered to butts when I found you.

name: Kent
line: Oh...bummer.

name: Leaf Beard
line: Yes. Bums.

name: Kent
line: What do I do?

name: Leaf Beard
line: Um...I don't know. But the blacksmith could make you a new one, probably.

name: Dewdrop
line: That's who I am. And I am very good at me. Okay, so, like, the rat king has been messing up the roots, yeah? Chewing on them with his teeth. The sword has to be made with the strongest tree stuff so even his teeth can't break it! Bring me the freshest ingredients and I'll do it up.

name: Kent
line: Boo! Cool, cool.

name: Mouse Wizard
line: Greetings.

name: Kent
line: Hey, man. I'm looking for some unbreakable ore. Y'all got that here?

name: Mouse Wizard
line: I have what you seek. But consider this instead.  I offer you this treasure of glittering emeralds. You'll be infinitely rich and live the rest of your days in comfort.

name: Kent
line: No, I'm good. Just the ore, please.

name: Mouse Wizard
line: Oh, ho! Well done! By resisting the temptation of wealth, you have passed my test.

name: Kent
line: Nah, I just don't care about money. My name's Kent. I'm supposed to fight bad guys.

name: Mouse Wizard
line: Alright. That's pretty weird, but...here you go.  The unbreakable ore. Uh... Uh..you can just—yeah.  Oh, there, there she goes.

name: Kent
line: Ha, ha!  Boop, boop, ba-doop, ba-doop, ba-doop, boop, boop, boop.  Whoop, whoop!

name: Mouse Knight
line: Greetings. Come to fight me, eh?

name: Kent
line: My name is Kent, and if I had a sword I'd totally fight you. But for now, I'm looking for a clod of mystic earth.

name: Mouse Knight
line: Yes. I have what you seek. But consider this instead.  I offer you the hand of one of my beautiful daughters. You'll become a good husband and live the rest of your days in true love.

name: Kent
line: Nah, I don't care about being a good husband or wife or whatever. All's I care about is fighting bad guys.

name: Mouse Knight
line: Dang, homes. That's cold.  Here you go. Mystic earth.

name: Mouse Thief
line: Greetings.

name: Kent
line: Dude, you know why I'm here!

name: Mouse Thief
line: Yeah. And I got what you want. But consider this instead. Hiya!  Drink this sap, and you'll have life eternal. You'll never meet death and you'll outlast the world.

name: Kent
line: Um...I was born earlier today, so I don't really get a sense of my own mortality. No, thank you.

name: Mouse Thief
line: Hyah!  The sacred flame.

name: Dewdrop
line: Oh, what?

name: Kent
line: I name this sword..Punch Party!  I feel so cool right now.  It's party time.  Whoa! Uh!

name: Rat King
line: Greetings.

name: Kent
line: Who's there?

name: Rat King
line: I am the rat king.  Why are you here?

name: Kent
line: I-I've got, like, this rad sword, and...I'm gonna fight you with it.  Yes!

name: Rat King
line: Who are you fighting me for? Your brother?

name: Kent
line: What?

name: Rat King
line: Instead, why don't you join me? I offer you cosmic power. You'll be a king and live the rest of your days as a god.

name: Kent
line: You're messing up the tree, and I totally live here! You're a bad guy!

name: Rat King
line: Yeah.

name: Kent
line: Don't do that!

name: Rat King
line: How do you plan to defeat me?

name: Kent
line: I'm...making...this...up...as I go!

name: Shelby
line: Having a brother around looks kind of fun.  Where are you? Little Brother? Are you happy?  Or do you feel weird? Have you changed a lot? Or not? Are you ever gonna come back here? I shouldn't have been so hasty. You were just a little baby. Or maybe you weren't. I'm not really sure how little brothers work.

name: Kent
line: You were the first friend I ever had.

name: Both
line: No one can compare. Together we could probably fight a bear.  So if you're ever sad/lonely, don't be, 'cause I'll be  right here next to you. 'Cause that's what big brothers are supposed to do.

name: Shelby
line: Whoa!  Kent proceeded his fantastic journey to me. It was all super good. But he had also partaken of the food of the underworld, and so he was compelled to return there by dewdrop law. That's what he said, at least. Maybe he was having second thoughts about infinite riches, true love, and eternal life. Or maybe he had just decided that fighting bad guys wasn't really his deal.  But I do know this—free from the rat king's cursed teeth, that spring, for the first time in many years, the willow tree was in bloom.

name: Jake
line: You want some more eggs, BMO?

name: BMO
line: Yes, please.

name: Jake
line: How 'bout you, Finny? Need a refill?

name: Finn
line: I'm pretty full, man... but lemme see if I can... rearrange.  Nope. Can't do it.

name: Jake
line: I don't know if stomachs work like that, dude.

name: Finn
line: Sometimes it helps.

name: Jake
line: Can't argue with that!  Ahh...

name: Finn
line: Ahh...

name: BMO
line: Ahh...

name: Jake
line: Hello? Lady, it's gonna be fine. Mm-hmm. Alright, I love you, too. Bye.

name: Finn
line: Lady Rainicorn again?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man. She's worried about introducing me to her parents at lunch today. She thinks they're gonna freak out.

name: Finn
line: Um... maybe give her parents some treasure?

name: Jake
line: No way! That's our treasure! Wait. I've got it, dude! I'll invite them over early, smooth them over using my personality, and we'll all be best friends before Lady gets here so she doesn't have to feel nervous! It's perfect! I'll just send them a quick Prism-gram.  Mm-hmm.

name: Finn
line: What's it say?

name: Jake
line: Hold on. It's still converting the light waves into brain waves.  Ahh... They're into it, dude!

name: Finn
line: Sweet! Let's go powder our noses!

name: Finn
line: Why's Lady so nervous, anyway?

name: Jake
line: Well... she didn't really say, but it might have somethin' to do with the Rainicorn-Dog Wars.

name: Finn
line: There were wars between rainicorns and dogs?

name: Jake
line: Horrifying wars. For thousands of years, rainicorns battled dogs over territory in the Crystal Dimension... but Lady and I are cool.

name: Finn
line: Dude! Her parents are probably all full of dog-hatred from the war-times! They're gonna see you're a dog and forbid Lady from ever hanging out with you again!

name: Jake
line: ...Nah. That could never happen.

name: Finn
line: You didn't think this through enough... IT COULD HAPPEN!!

name: Jake
line: AAAH! I'M A MORON!

name: Finn
line: Don't worry. I've got a plan that's gonna solve this biz. Homies help homies. Always.

name: Jake
line: I'm ready to hear your plan, homie.

name: Finn
line: Haha, yeah! This plan is perfect!

name: Jake
line: You know, I thought painting ourselves rainbow-color using condiments and stuff from the fridge so we could pretend to be rainicorns was a good idea when you pitched it to me five minutes ago, but now I'm not so sure, man.

name: Finn
line: Come ooonnn. Trust me, homie.

name: Jake
line: No, no, no, new plan. First, we're gonna clean this place up, and then—  Huh?!

name: Ethel
line: Jake?

name: Jake
line: AAAAH...  LET'S HIDE AND BURN THE HOUSE DOWN!

name: Bob
line: Hello?

name: Jake
line: 안녕하세요.

name: Ethel
line: Jake, is that you?

name: Jake
line: Uh-huh.

name: Ethel
line: Are you going to let us in?

name: Jake
line: Y-yeeeaaah...

name: Ethel
line: AAAAAAHHHH!!!

name: Jake
line: I can explain!! I can explain!!

name: Ethel
line: OOOHHHHH, he's so handsome! Oh, Bob, our daughter's finally found a handsome rainicorn to love!

name: Jake
line: You think I'm a rainicorn?

name: Bob
line: I think we can spot a member of our own species, Jake. We're not blind.

name: Ethel
line: Well, we are a little blind.

name: Bob
line: Yes, I guess we are a little blind.

name: Jake
line: Uh, well, hey! Come on in! It's awesome to finally meet you both!

name: Ethel
line: Your house is very colorful. I like that!

name: Finn
line: Haha! The plan is working, homie!

name: Bob
line: Jake, what is that thing that's talking?

name: Jake
line: Uh... that's um...

name: Finn
line: I'm Jake's rainicorn roommate! Everyone do the traditional rainicorn rain dance!

name: Bob
line: Jake, please ask your goblin butler to stop insulting my heritage!

name: Jake
line: Uh... y-yes!  Get outta here, goblin! Go fetch us some rainicorn snacks!

name: Finn
line: But—

name: Jake
line: Come on, homie, help me!

name: Finn
line: Ha! You got it, homie!

name: Jake
line: Uh... please, c-come upstairs.

name: Jake
line: My goblin will bring us snacks in a moment.

name: Bob
line: Thank you, Jake. I'm glad the wife and I made the trip from the Crystal Dimension.

name: Ethel
line: Yes, we're eager to know more about the studly young rainicorn that's dating our daughter.

name: Bob
line: Ethel...

name: Jake
line: Well, ask me whatever you like, Ethel, Bob!

name: Ethel
line: I am a little curious about your goblin. He looks a little odd.

name: Jake
line: Well... he's actually a human.

name: Ethel
line: Oh, Bob! Our future-son-in-law must be filthy-rich to afford a human butler!

name: Bob
line: Shh.  Thank you, Jake, for being interested in our daughter!

name: Jake
line: Uh... No problem, Bob!

name: Ethel
line: Oh! Let's play some traditional rainicorn games!

name: Bob
line: Jake, do you know Cameladabalawabapp?

name: Jake
line: Uh, s-say it again?

name: Bob
line: Cameladabalawabapp!

name: Jake
line: Ohhhh!  Cablatapuamba—! I thought you said "Kabloderaga—"!  Ah, man, I love gettin' down and dirty with some Cablatapuamba—! Ha! Y'all should go first, though.

name: Bob
line: Hmm. Bold move letting your opponent move first, Jake. I respect that. Very well. Cameladabalawabapp!!

name: Ethel
line: Oh, Bob!

name: Bob
line: Haha! Your turn, Jake!

name: Finn
line: Snacks! Get your snacks!

name: Jake
line: Finn!  Dude! I have to show Lady's parents that I have rainbow powers! I need homie help!

name: Finn
line: Hmm... I got a plan, bro-ham. Just stretch your horn at me, and I'll take care of the rest.

name: Jake
line: You're the best, homie.

name: Finn
line: Homies help homies.

name: Jake
line: Haha!  Cablatapuamba—!

name: Ethel
line: Very unusual color palette, Jake.

name: Bob
line: Yes. Subtle.

name: Jake
line: Whoo! Oh, yeah!  Finn?

name: Bob
line: How about we play some more traditional rainicorn games, my boy?

name: Jake
line: I, uh... Oh. Um... let's do it!

name: Bob and Ethel
line: Let the games begin!

name: Jake
line: I'm sorry.

name: Jake
line: Yo, my bad! I'll get 'im!  Hey, man. How's it goin'?

name: Finn
line: IT'S "GOING" CRUD-COW!

name: Jake
line: I know, I know, I'm sorry. But they really like me. Your plan is working perfectly!

name: Finn
line: Being poked in the buns and laughed at was not in my plan! Not in the plan!

name: Jake
line: Look, Finn, you know I got yo back fo'-eva', but right now, you're the only one who can help me. Come on, homie.  Homies help homies.   Hey, guys. You ready to get this game goin' again?

name: Ethel
line: Oh, no, we're pooped.

name: Bob
line: Yeah, we're about ready to break out our picnic basket and dig in!

name: Jake
line: Wohhh, no. You're my guests. Let me take care of you.  Homie... help me cook something, please.

name: Finn
line: ...Okay.

name: Jake
line: Thanks, Finn.  Okay. Don't worry about a thing. Finn'll make a great lunch. He's a little raw, but he's got great taste.

name: Bob
line: What?! Wow! So wealthy, and so generous!

name: Ethel
line: Ah! I was hoping!  I was afraid to ask!

name: Finn
line: WAAAH! Jake!! I think they wanna eat me!!

name: Ethel
line: Of course we do! Jake said you'd "make a great lunch"!

name: Finn
line: JAKE! COME ON!

name: Jake
line: Man, oh, man, oh, man, oh, man....

name: Finn
line: AAAH! Knock it off, Bob!!

name: Ethel
line: Don't you touch him!!

name: Jake
line: Come on, stop it, guys! Come on, y'all, I said stop!  NOW, THAT'S ENOUGH!!! Nobody's eating Finn!! He's not my butler, and he's not food! Finn is my friend!  I'm sorry I let the lies get so far outta hand. I just got so scared of losing Lady!  But if they hate me, so be it. No more lies.

name: Ethel
line: You're a dog?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I just...  Look, I'm sorry about everything. I was—

name: Bob
line: YAAAAAY! HA-HEEEY! HURRAAAAY!

name: Jake
line: Uh... uh...  Lady?!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 어, 나도 우리 부모님 때문에 걱정했었어! 우리 엄마아빠는 개라면 완전 맛이 가거든! 개가 전쟁터에서 우리 아빠 생명을 구해줬었어!

name: Finn
line: What did she say?

name: Jake
line: She said she worried that they'd freak out... 'cause her parents are bananas for dogs!

name: Finn
line: J.J. FLIP! What the zip?!

name: Jake
line: Yeah! She says a dog saved her dad in the war!

name: Finn
line: Wow! That's flippin' awesome.

name: Ethel
line: Finn.

name: Finn
line: ...Wha?

name: Ethel
line: Listen, I just want you to know how sorry we are about... trying to eat you.

name: Bob
line: It's just we thought we'd never get another chance. We thought humans were extinct.

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: Jake
line: So... this isn't human?

name: Ethel
line: Oh, no. This is soy people!

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: Ethel
line: I've never tasted real human before, but they say you can't even tell the difference!

name: Jake
line: Ew... Soy?  FINN, YOU'RE DELICIOUS!

name: Jake
line: Finn, lunch is ready!

name: Finn
line: Ugh, what are you cooking?

name: Jake
line: It's good! I learned it from Rainicorn.

name: Finn
line: I'm not eatin' that. It smells funny.

name: Jake
line: Dude, this took me, like—

name: Finn
line: Let's go over to Tree Trunks's and get some apple pie! Apple pie! Apple Pie! Apple Pie! Apple Pie! Apple Pie! Let's go!

name: Jake
line: Whoa!  Eh.

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks!

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks! Tree Trunks?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Apples... my apples...

name: Jake
line: Apples?

name: Tree Trunks
line: You!  You took my apples!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, whoa!  Tree Trunks, it's us, Finn and Jake!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Finn... and, and Jake?

name: Finn
line: It's okay, Tree Trunks. We're here to help you. Just tell us what happened.

name: Tree Trunks
line: They took 'em. They took all of 'em.

name: Jake
line: All of what?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Apples. My apples that I raised with love from, from mere seedlings. Without my special apples, I won't be able to bake any more apple pies.

name: Finn & Jake
line: NOOOOOOOO!

name: Finn
line: Don't you worry, Tree Trunks. We'll find those thieves and bring them to justice.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Let me show you the crime scene.  You see, boys scads of apple trees but, but no apples.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Is anything else missing, Tree Trunks?

name: Tree Trunks
line: No, Finn, they didn't touch my rocks, or my birds, or my flowers, or, or nothing.

name: Finn
line: Hm. Well, I don't see any footprints. What'cha got, Jake?

name: Jake
line: No ghost doodies. Oh. Oh, wait.  Oh, no. No.

name: Finn
line: Hm. Tree Trunks, is there anyone you can think of who might want to crunk you up?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, no, Finn. I take great care to assure that-that I'm loved by even the most heinous cretins—

name: Jake
line: Hey, guys, I found something! Look!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Uh!

name: Raggedy Princess
line: Oh, heheh, hey, Finn. Heheh.

name: Finn
line: Oh, hey, Raggedy Princess. Have you seen anything fishy going on?

name: Raggedy Princess
line: Um, no, heheh. I've been kinda down in this hole for a long time.  I got knocked down here by some ne'er-do-wells. It was terrible. I was so scared.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Ne'er-do-wells? They stole my apples.  I'm gonna sass those boys up nasty!

name: Finn
line: Awesome. Where do we find these guys?

name: Jake
line: Oh, the Candy Tavern, man. I used to hang out there back when I used to snatch old ladies' purses.

name: Jake
line: Don't worry, I stopped doing that a long time ago. I didn't know it was wrong.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Okay, you two, let's get going.

name: Candy Tavern Person
line: Whoa!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, my!

name: Finn
line: Uh, does Princess Bubblegum know about this place?

name: Jake
line: Be cool, man. You're gonna queer the deal.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah. Try not to act suspicious, Tree Trunks.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Okay, I won't.

name: Finn & Tree Trunks
line: Where—?

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Where's my dang apples?

name: Finn
line: Oh,  Tree Trunks, you're so silly. But, but listen, you wouldn't happen to have seen any—I don't know—apples around, have you?

name: Bartender
line: "Seen any apples?" Y'all ask a lot of dumb-butt questions... almost like you're trying to solve somethin'.

name: Finn
line: What? Oh, no-no-no-no-no-no.

name: Bartender
line: Mmm... clean, too. Almost like some  do-gooders!

name: Jake
line: Hold on, we gotta go potty.

name: Finn
line: Dang. They almost got us, but I think we blend in pretty well now.

name: Tree Trunks
line: This, this toilet paper's drying my mouth all up.

name: Finn
line: Uh, Tree Trunks, don't eat that.  Here.   You gotta watch her, man!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, I look just like an army brat!

name: Bartender
line: What can I do for you?

name: Finn
line: You know where a guy might maybe score some apples?

name: Bartender
line: Well, when you put it like that.... A couple of buddies I know have some apples for sale. I'll show you.

name: Bartender
line: Hey, fellas, these folks been askin' 'bout your... apples?

name: Jaybird
line: Okay, show 'em the apples, Smudge.

name: Jaybird
line: Grab 'em!

name: Jaybird
line: You go back, and you tell your boss to stop looking for those apples 'cause they're ours now!

name: Finn
line: Wha-what boss?

name: Jaybird
line: Your boss! Dr. J?

name: Finn
line: We don't know any Dr. J.

name: Jaybird
line: Liars! Come on, Smudge   ...gonna take my apples.

name: Jake
line: What just happened?

name: Finn
line: I guess these guys who stole Tree Trunks' apples also stole Dr. J's apples, and they thought we were workin' for him!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Finn? Finn.

name: Finn
line: Hm?

name: Tree Trunks
line: This could be dangerous, a-and if you want to go back home, I understand, but I need to do this.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, Tree Trunks, me too.

name: Jake
line: Hey, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Hm?

name: Jake
line: What's that on your face, buddy?

name: Finn
line: Oh, that guy bopped me one. Must've had a ring on.

name: Jake
line: Y'know, I think I seen that symbol somewhere before. Yeah, right next door to where I used to hawk stolen bikes.

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Jake
line: I didn't know it was wrong.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, you see? That guy must work here or somethin'.

name: Finn
line: Hello?

name: Wormo
line: Who's the heck happening? What?

name: Finn
line: Uh, we're here about the apples?

name: Wormo
line: Oh, okay. Let's see your ring.

name: Finn
line: Um...

name: Jake
line: Here.

name: Wormo
line: Come on in. Follow this guy.

name: Wormo
line: My boss is gonna be real psyched I found someone to buy his apples. A whole crate.

name: Finn
line: What the?

name: Wormo
line: What's wrong, guy?

name: Finn
line: These aren't apples.

name: Wormo
line: Oh, ya didn't mean diamonds? All ne'er-do-wells call diamonds "apples." Like calling money "bread" or rock-knockers "butter-slaps."

name: Jaybird
line: Hey, Wormo, we're back—what the?!  What are they doing here?

name: Wormo
line: They're here for the apples.

name: Jaybird
line: That's the dang Dr. J gang, Wormo! Grab 'em!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Um, sir?  I promise if you let us go, we won't tell no one about your apples.

name: Wormo
line: Feed 'em to the pig.

name: Smudge
line: Yeah, the pig.

name: Jaybird
line: Heheh, yeah, all right.

name: Mr. Pig
line: Uh, I'm sorry, y'all. They're makin' me do this. I-I'll try to make it quick.

name: Dr. J
line: Hold it!

name: Jaybird
line: Dr. J!

name: Dr. J
line: Yeah, yeah, and I want my apples back.

name: Jaybird & Dr. J
line: Get 'em, boys!

name: Finn
line: Aw, don't cry, Tree Trunks.

name: Tree Trunks
line: But we're never gonna find those apples.

name: Mr. Pig
line: Apples? You guys looking for apples?

name: Jake
line: Uh, yeah, why?

name: Mr. Pig
line: 'Cause I can hear a bunch of apples in this room.

name: Jake
line: Wait, you mean "apples" as "diamonds"?

name: Mr. Pig
line: No.

name: Jake
line: "Apples" as "apples"?

name: Mr. Pig
line: Yep.

name: Finn
line: You mean apples that we eat?

name: Mr. Pig
line: Yes.

name: Tree Trunks
line: With all due respect, Mr. Pig, sir, my apples were stolen by a dirty, rotten criminal who needs to be put in jail.

name: Mr. Pig
line: I'm just telling you the facts, ma'am. What I hear is a whole pigload of apples inside that closet.  They sound scared.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Well, I hate to tell you this, boys, but there's no apples in this closet.  You see, uh, I'm the only one who knows how to open this closet.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, so I was the apple thief after all.

name: Finn
line: No, Tree Trunks, that's preposterous.

name: Tree Trunks
line: No, Finn, I'm a criminal,  and I need to pay the price.

name: Banana Guard
line: Banana Guard speaking.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Uh, this is Tree Trunks. I've done somethin' horrible, and I want you to come over and arrest me.

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks, you don't need to do this.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Thank you, Finn and Jake, but I won't let myself slip away from such a terrible crime. Goodbye.

name: Finn
line: Tree Trunks.

name: Banana Guard
line: Ah, this is hard to watch. I'm gonna look away.

name: Banana Guard
line: This place could use a scarecrow.

name: Finn
line: Huh? Wait, what'd you say?

name: Banana Guard
line: Uh, I-I said this place could use a scarecrow.

name: Finn
line: A scarecrow, no footprints, all those magpies on the roof, Raggedy Princess in the ditch, and all the apples in Tree Trunks's closet.

name: Banana Guard
line: Boy, this place could use a scarecrow.

name: Finn
line: That's it!  I knew it!

name: Finn
line: The magpies have been stealing the apples and accidentally dropping them in this hole!

name: Jake
line: And that's why there weren't any footprints around the tree!

name: Finn
line: Yes. And the magpies were able to steal the apples because Raggedy Princess wasn't sitting on the fence post to scare them off!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Does this mean I'm innocent?

name: Jake
line: As innocent as a baby's butt cheek!

name: Finn
line: Awesome! This calls for a celebration! You know what that means, Tree Trunks!

name: Tree Trunks
line: I'ma bake you the biggest and the tastiest apple pie you boys ever tasted.

name: Banana Guards
line: Whoa.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Uh, you boys better stick around if you want a bite of my apple pie.

name: Banana Guard
line: She slapped my butt!

name: Finn
line: What's wrong with you, man?

name: Jake
line: I ate all the candy in your backpack, and now I'm sick.

name: Finn
line: I didn't bring any candy.

name: Jake
line: Oh, no. That explains why it didn't taste right.

name: Finn
line: Nothing tastes right today. Like, I thought we were going to get into some serious flavor with these sand people, but they're just standing around like garnish.

name: Jake
line: That's how I feel—like a dying parsley. So what's goin' on with the spoon? Marceline and the spoon.

name: Finn
line: Um...  nothing.  Wait, there she goes!

name: Marceline
line: Yo, wake up, sand dude.  I think they're dead.  A spoon.

name: Finn
line: Yea-uh. The Spoon of Prosperity!

name: Jake
line: It doesn't look like mu—

name: Jake
line: Oh, my gosh, I feel so much better! Hungry, even. Guys, let's go home!

name: Finn
line: We've gotta get this spoon to Princess Bubblegum first.

name: Jake
line: ♪Let's rock!♪

name: Marceline
line: What's PB want with that spoon, anyway?

name: Finn
line: Beats me.

name: Jake
line: Sometimes it's better not to know.

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, I guess that's true with Bonnibel.

name: Jake
line: Hey, guys, look what I found!

name: Marceline
line: Is that quicksand?

name: Jake
line: Yeah!   Heh. Quicksand is pretty fun. Heh.

name: Finn
line: Quit messing around, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Okie-doke.

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Hmm. Hey, is this whole place made out of sand?

name: Marceline
line: Sure looks that way.

name: Jake
line: Uh, give me a pull, please.   Stop, you guys are tickling me! Let me try this other thing.  Flesh drill!

name: Finn
line: I'm not sure that's a good idea—

name: Jake
line: Yaah! Rug burn! Ow! Ow!

name: Jake
line: Aah!  Whoo! It worked! Jake drill worked, you guys.

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Check it out! My piggies are free.

name: Marceline
line: You just demolished half the underground city!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, only half.

name: Finn
line: You also sealed our exit.

name: Jake
line: Our only exit.

name: Jake
line: No regre-e-e-ets!  I'm sorry.  This little piggie stayed home, and so should have I. I know! I'll dig us out of here.

name: Finn & Marceline
line: No!

name: Finn
line: You'll bury us alive!

name: Marceline
line: Undead!

name: Finn
line: Finn to PB. Come in, PB.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, hi, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Princess, we're trapped in the underground city.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah-yeah. That sounds great.

name: Finn
line: Huh? No, we need help!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's great!  Gre-gre-great! Great, great!

name: Finn
line: Guess we lost the signal.

name: Marceline
line: Any more bright ideas?

name: Jake
line: Snacks!

name: Marceline
line: How are snacks gonna get us out of here?

name: Jake
line: I wanna eat snacks... because I am hungry.

name: Marceline
line: I'm hungry, too. Bust the snacks, Finn.

name: Jake
line: Bust, bust, bust!

name: Marceline
line: Hey, where are my red erasers? They were in here.

name: Jake
line: Uh-oh. I thought they were candy.

name: Marceline
line: You... ate all... MY RED?!?!

name: Jake
line: Oooh. I'm sorry!

name: Finn
line: Calm down, Marceline. There's gotta be some red stuff in these ruins. I'll go explore. You guys hang out here and save your energy.

name: Marceline
line: Thanks, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Be cool.

name: Jake
line: So how hungry are you?

name: Jake
line: Aah!  I'm sorry. Please don't eat my blood!

name: Marceline
line: Jake, I don't want to hurt you, but you should know things get crazy when I'm hungry.

name: Jake
line: Like... how crazy?

name: Marceline
line: I'm gonna go into feral mode.  It's not gonna be pretty.

name: Marceline
line: I know. Let's tie me up. That way, you won't be scared.

name: Jake
line: And that will keep you from draining my bloods?

name: Marceline
line: Not physically, no, but as a prop, I think it'll be good for both of us. You know, psychologically.

name: Jake
line: Hurry, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Red, red, red. I guess even a vampire queen's face would melt off if she tried to eat lava.

name: Marceline
line: Get me a bucket of lava, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Yo, you know better than that.

name: Marceline
line: Do iiiit...

name: Jake
line: Don't go crazy, okay?

name: Marceline
line: I'm frickin' hungry.

name: Jake
line: Why did you leave me here, dude?

name: Finn
line: Okay, here we go. Yeah, look at that!  Something crazy red behind this door. Hmm.  Why are y'all holding this door shut? You don't look like sand peeps, neither. More like wisemen-zerts . Oh, well. Gotta feed the Marcy monster.  'Scuse me. Up, sorry. Okay. Uhh... hi-yah!  Oh, dag.

name: Finn
line: Cool... What the heck happened here?  Whoop!  Ew. Whoops. Y'alls got turned into sand people. Don't go in the light. Go like this.  Around it. Next time, you guys. Hmm...  Whatever's down there's gotta have red blasting out of every hole. Hey, you're not still alive, right?

name: Finn
line: Okay. I was just making sure.  Bet that guy was a creep.  This hole is deep.

name: Jake
line: Oh, my Glob. Oh, my Glob, where are you, man? Marcy's wiggin' out!

name: Marceline
line: Jaaaake...

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Marceline
line: I can smell your insides, Jake.  They smell...  red!

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, lemme see in there.

name: Marceline
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Finn
line: Maybe I should go back. Well, I've already gone this far.  Shebang! That oughtta be enough red to un...  Oops.

name: Finn
line: You mean the guy with the big thing on his head?

line: What?! No! How long?

name: Finn
line: Dude, like, a really long time. Like five hundred years.

line: Five hundred— Chum! I must've zoned out!

name: Finn
line: What the heck were you two doing?

name: Crab Demon
line: Once we turned the city to sand, we were gonna reanimate their bodies and conquer my homeland at the center of the planet.

name: Finn
line: Hm, that's dumb.

name: Crab Demon
line: Time to go back home a true loser.

name: Finn
line: Can I have this big ol' ruby, then?

name: Crab Demon
line: That's an emerald.

name: Finn
line: Clearly it's a big ol' ruby.

name: Crab Demon
line: I don't know what to tell you, man.

name: Finn
line: I would like the ruby.

name: Crab Demon
line: It's yours, buddy.  I'm outties. ]

name: Finn
line: Peace. Hyup!    Whoops.

name: Jake
line: Okay,  all done now. Nice and snug, right?

line: Jake...

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Marceline
line: I won't be able to... to control myself much longer. I can feel the feeding frenzy coming on.  I just wanna let you know I'm sorry.

name: Jake
line: You're sick!

name: Marceline
line: Yeah...

name: Jake
line: C'mon, Jake, think...  It's no good! I need brain food.  Oh, dang, I ate everything!  I'm so hungry! Baby's gonna starve to death! Unless...

name: Marceline
line: What?

name: Marceline
line: What are you doing?

name: Jake
line: I'm cooking up a crazy vampire! That should heat up nice! The sand will keep the meat moist.

name: Marceline
line: You're gonna eat me?

name: Jake
line: You was gonna eat me!

name: Marceline
line: Yes, I am.

name: Jake
line: Cook, baby, cook!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Bleh. The trick is rollin' it. Phew! Check out this ruby I got.

name: Jake
line: That's an emerald, dude.

line: You too now?! Emeralds are green, boyee.

name: Jake
line: This thing is green.

name: Finn
line: Why is everybody messin' with me? It's like a dark gray-ish red. Mostly gray. Sometimes red things are gray!

name: Jake
line: You're a little colorblind... and there's nothin' to be ashamed of!

name: Finn
line: Oh... whoops.

name: Jake
line: I'm sorry you had to push that thing so far.

name: Finn
line: Uh, what's goin' on with Marcy?

name: Jake
line: She was threatening to eat my insides, so I'm cooking her. I know that sounds crazy, but I had no choice.

name: Jake
line: I'm operating on my lowest survival brain function right now. What?

name: Finn
line: Chill, man!

name: Jake
line: No, we gotta book!  Go!

name: Marceline
line: Go where, Jake?  I gotta suck out your insides first, right?

name: Finn
line: Nay-nay, brah!

name: Marceline
line: Time to eat!  Huh? What the—?

name: Finn
line: Bubblegum?

line: Hey, guys. I saw my seismograph had gone off the charts, so I figured you might be in trouble, right?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but watch out for Marceline. She's gone rabid!

name: Princess Bubblegum

name: Marceline
line: Woof. Thanks, Bonnie. That's enough low-grade red to get me home, at least. Come on, guys. Let's go.

name: Finn
line: Are you alright, PB?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Did you get the Spoon of Prosperity?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, here you go.

name: Finn, Jake, & Marceline
line: Whoa.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Peeps will never starve in my eternal empire. Sand worm, up!

name: Marceline
line: Come on, Marce. It'll only hurt for a second.

name: Marceline
line: That's nothing in the face of eternity.

name: Marceline
line: A second hurts really bad in the face of eternity.  But only for a moment.

name: Marceline
line: Wait. I have an even better idea.  Sunscreen. SPF 10... million.  Hmm! I have exactly enough to reach my umbrella.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Ha!

name: Bubblegum
line: You really like chopping wood, huh?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: I'm not chopping wood. I made a toothpick from the ancient elm. See?

name: Marceline
line: Uh, knock, knock.

name: Bubblegum
line: What the dip, Marceline?

name: Marceline
line: Sorry. It was supposed to be a joke. Actually, I have something really serious to ask. I want you to do the procedure, the one we talked about.

name: Bubblegum
line: I'm sorry, but I don't think you'd make a good blonde.

name: Marceline
line: No, not that. I don't want to be a vampire anymore.

name: Bubblegum
line: Oh, my globness.

name: Marceline
line: You said you were working on a cure, right?

name: Bubblegum
line: Well, the machine is built and the serums are ready, but are you sure you want to do this?

name: Marceline
line: I'm sure. Some bad things happened to me when I was little. When I became a vampire, I was just a messed-up kid. Now it's 1,000 years later, and I'm still messed up.  I don't want to spend eternity like this, with this emptiness. I want to grow up.

name: Bubblegum
line: Okay. Let's do this.

name: Bubblegum
line: This means someday you'll die. You know that, right?

name: Marceline
line: I guess that will be my last adventure.

name: Bubblegum
line: Marceline I'm so very, very, very excited to test my new lab out on you.

name: Marceline
line: Well, don't get all sentimental on me.

name: Bubblegum
line: Come on over here. You know I care about you. I think you're making the right choice. Your natural life spend is going to be richier and fuller than you can imagine. And someday, when you die, I'll be the one who puts you in the ground. But, you know, this operation might not even work.

name: Marceline
line: Whooooooooa! This tickles really bad!  Did it work?

name: Bubblegum
line: Well, I sucked all your vampire effluvium into this bucked. Possibly we won't know the results for a couple of days. In the meantime, you need to get plenty of rest. I'll check your vitals in the morning.

name: Marceline
line: Thanks, P. Brains.

name: Marceline
line: No!   Huh?

name: Cloud Dance
line: It's breakfast time for my sweet babies.  Sweet babies! Operator! Put me through to Finn and Jake. It's an emergency.

name: Jake
line: Victim's lost a lot of blood. Clean entry wounds. It's an expert job.

name: Cloud Dance
line: Poor miss baby. She used to be my best cream cow. But now her milk is nonfat. And nanette, my beautiful calf is decaf!

name: Jake
line: That's terrible!

name: Villager
line: Every farm in our village was attacked. Not a goat or a cow or a duck left un-sucked.

name: Jake
line: Well, I've heard enough. Come on, Finn. Let's go arrest Marceline.

name: Finn
line: Wait a minute. We don't even know if Marceline did this.

name: Jake
line: That's right. I forgot about Ooo's extensive vampire community.  Come on!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but we need to conduct a proper investigation.

name: Jake
line: I know that. Ain't no rookie.

name: Finn
line: All right, come on. I'll let you be bad cop.

name: Jake
line: I'm already bad cop. Okay, let's not pay seeds. Me and my partner will "interrogate" the suspect police-style. Meanwhile, you sharpen up your pitchforks mob-style.

name: Villagers
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Hey, man, that's not right. Marceline's our friend.

name: Jake
line: Physical contact! Officer resisting arrest! Boom!

name: Finn
line: Ow!

name: Marceline
line: Ohh, woof. Marceline want to go ny-ny.

name: Bubblegum
line: Don't go ny-ny, Marci. I'm worried.

name: Marceline
line: For real? Why?

name: Bubblegum
line: Well, the process was experimental. Like, are there side effects? What happened in your sleep last night? Nobody on record has ever cured vampirism, unless you count killing vampires as curing. In that case, you've cured tons, right?

name: Marceline
line: "Tons" is an understatement.

name: Bubblegum
line: That Shnoz was nasty, nasty times.  Hey, cover up. The sun's hitting the door.

name: Marceline
line: I'm still undead?

name: Bubblegum
line: We don't know yet. So just chill. Oh, hey, guys. How you doing?

name: Finn
line: Jake did excessive force on me.

name: Jake
line: I'm sorry.  Let me kiss it!

name: Finn
line: Ew! Ew!

name: Bubblegum
line: Hurry up. Get in here.

name: Jake
line: You done it this time, Marceline. You sucked the life out of defenseless animals!

name: Marceline
line: I ain't done nothing.

name: Jake
line: You think I'm buying that boom-boom mountain?

name: Marceline
line: Oh, get some proof.

name: Jake
line: You want proof? Look.

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Proof of how off I'm gonna go if you don't confess.

name: Finn
line: Yo, chill, Jake.

name: Jake
line: I'm wilin' out!

name: Finn
line: Listen, Marci, I can barely control this guy, and the villagers are getting crazy. They want to run you over with a wagon, and I'm offering you a way out.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hey, dillweeds, I just swept the place.

name: Jake
line: Sorry.

name: Marceline
line: Finn, be real for a second.

name: Finn
line: All right.

name: Marceline
line: Look into my eyes, man. I didn't do it.

name: Finn
line: To be honest, it looks like you're not sure if you did it.

name: Marceline
line: Okay, I'm not sure! Something weird happened last night. I had a weird dream about stuff.

name: Jake
line: Dream stuff always means something.

name: Finn
line: We'll figure this out, Marci, together. We promise.

name: Marceline
line: Thanks, Finn.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: That's cool, you guys, but clean this mess, also, you bums.

name: Villager Little
line: He's a gob-gleebin' vampire hugger! We got to tell the town! Book it, Terry! Run, Terry! Run!

name: Villager Woman
line: How long do we have to stay in the laundry house, cloud dance?

name: Cloud Dance
line: Until Finn and Jake avert the threat. We can't afford to lose more livestock. We're struggling as is to keep our kids fed. Let's just stay in here until the dirty vampire gets what's coming to her.

name: Villager Mother
line: But I want to bop her in the nose!

name: Cloud Dance
line: Hey, now, it's too dangerous, okay? A small town, we gotta stay close. Each of us play a vital role, and I can't afford losing any of you. Not you, Clubhouse Sandy, or you, Seed Man, or even you, Sandwich Paul.

line: Sensei Paul.

line: Let's leave the fighting to the fighters, okay, Paul?

line: That hurts. You don't know I teach aikido.

line: Finn's been turned!

name: Villager
line: Wha?!

name: Villager Little
line: He does the vampire's bidding.

name: Cloud Dance
line: Well, there it is. Tonight we burn the beast Marceline.

name: Marceline
line: Woof. I can barely stand up. Look at this. It's my new dance. It's called "I got arthritis." Ohh. The end.

line: You should have hung back with P.B.

name: Marceline
line: But I've got a bad feeling like you guys are gonna die without me.

name: Finn
line: Dang, Marci. Have some faith. Geez.

line: Guys, look.

name: Cow
line: Moo!

name: Finn
line: Get it!  You see it?

name: Jake
line: No. But what's that?

name: Finn
line: Must be its filthy lair.  What's wrong?

line: Remember how I said my fear of vampires was based on ignorance?

line: Yeah.

line: Okay, but I'm gonna hold on to your shirt.

line: Moo.

line: I think they're in the process of being turned, eh?

line: Ugh, glob. Something big just dropped in my gut.

line: Hang in there, bro.

line: Jake!  Hey, get back here!  Dang! Lost him! Marci? Hey, Marci, you still out here?

line: Oh, hey, man. Did you see a scary beast go by? I chased it out here, but it got away.

line: Oh, we found that beast, and we took care of her real nice You vampire hugger!

line: Wait, what?

name: Cloud Dance

line: You dumb bumbags!

name: Cloud Dance
line: Now look at the other yonder.

name: Finn
line: You're gonna explode my friend.

name: Fat Villagers
line: Blow her up! Blow her up!

name: Cloud Dance
line: Oh, flip, you're right. This is way messed up. Run, Finn! You got to beat the sun!  Go, Finn! Go!

name: Finn
line: Aaaaaaah! Marceline, nooooo!

line: Don't let anyone read my diaries. Burn them, Finn! They're embarrassi

name: Finn
line: Jake... you made this?

name: Finn
