name: Jake
line: Uh-huh.

name: Finn
line: Jake! You're awesome!  So cool...

name: Finn
line: A suitcase?! Oh, man!

name: Jake
line: I found it at the dump and then buried it without lookin' inside.

name: Finn
line: Whoa. Wait a second, man. I know this case.

name: Finn
line: One night, while you were away at Lady's house, I was dancing in the woods...

name: Ice King
line: Evil tapes! Evil!

name: Finn
line: Perchance I saw the Ice King doing something suspicious, so I trailed 'im to the dump, where he buried this case in the ground.

name: Ice King
line: You're evil, tapes! Full of evil secrets! That's why I'm going to bury you where no one will ever find you... under all these boogers!  Wee, hahahahaha! Wee, hahahaha!

name: Finn
line: I waited for him to leave... but he played in those boogers for hours. I decided to come back later for the case... but I lost track of it.

name: Jake
line: Whoa! And I found it?

name: Finn
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Jake
line: Heh-heh-heh. Let's have a secret screening! I'll make some fliers for it!

name: Jake
line: There. Now nobody will bother us.

name: Finn
line: Jake! Jake, come on!

name: Finn
line: Okay. You can play this , right, BMO?

name: BMO
line: Yes, Finn. It goes in my butt!

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: Jake
line: This is so exciting!

name: Ice King
line: Hello, dear diary. Pretty good day so far. Got up bright and early and had a healthy and slimming breakfast, did fourteen minutes of cardio ...

name: Jake
line: Dude... what are we watchin'?

name: Finn
line: I think it's the Ice King's diary.

name: Ice King
line: ...I mean, I'm not gonna win carpenter of the year or anything, but it's a place to hang up the old toothbrush.

name: Penguin
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Gunther? Hey, Gunther. Get-get away from the camera, sweetie. Papa's recording his innermost thoughts. 'Member? I explained this to you?  Hey, Gunther?  GUNTHER!!!

name: Penguin
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Well, anyway, as you can see, I'm not wearing my—

name: Penguin
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: I'm not wearing my—

name: Penguin
line: Wenk wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Sweetie, I raised my voice because you were giving me the silent treatment. You understand?

name: Penguin
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: I love you.

name: Jake
line: Can we fast-forward?

name: Finn
line: No, man, we might miss something.

name: Ice King
line: There must be more to life than this...

name: Penguin
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: I know. You don't like when I'm contemplative. ...C-contemplative... No, con-temp-la—Let's put on a play!

name: Jake
line: What?!?

name: Ice King
line: Oh, Ice King! You're so cool! You take such good care of yourself! I wanna be with you!

name: Penguin
line: Wenk. Wenk wenk.

name: Ice King
line: No, Gunther, beard stays on.

name: Penguin
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Gunther, I need ya to wear the beard!

name: Penguin
line: Wenk!

name: Ice King
line: Gunther!

name: Jake
line: Hey, pause it, BMO.

name: Finn
line: There's gotta be some evil secrets in here. I wanna keep watching.

name: Jake
line: Okay... Well, why don't I make us some snacks? So I don't have to watch... this...

name: BMO
line: Can we sit on the floor? I feel so far away from you guys!

name: Penguin
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Now hold still...  You moved! Hey, what's this?  "Secret tapes"?! I wanna watch! I'll catch ya later, Gunther!

name: Penguin
line: Wenk!

name: Ice King
line: Gunther, no! Gunther...  Dance pa—  GUNTHER!  Dance party!

name: Finn
line: Thanks, Gunther.

name: Jake
line: You're Gunther.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, fine! Who needs you? More dance party for us, right, Gunther?  Oh... Eh...  May I have this dance? Heh!

name: Finn
line: There's probably some evil secrets coming up.  Someone wants to see the secret tapes!

name: Jake
line: What? Oh, but I was so clear in my flier!

name: BMO
line: Let's peek through the window and check who it is! Maybe it's just pizza.

name: Finn
line: Right!

name: Jake
line: Wait! Wait!

name: Finn & BMO
line: What?

name: Jake
line: You guys are checking too loud!

name: Finn
line: Oh! You're right.  More quietly!

name: BMO
line: I am quieter now.

name: Jake
line: Cool.

name: Ice King
line: Hey, guys, it's me. Can I come in and watch the secret tapes with you? I brought some gifts!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Aah!

name: Finn
line: Okay. If we're quiet long enough, Ice King will think no one's home and go away.

name: Ice King
line: Eh... No one's home. Guess I'll go away.

name: Ice King
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: Just turn your alarm off!

name: Ice King
line: Hmm. That sounds like BMO!

name: BMO
line: My alarm says it's time for Finn's bath. Finn, get naked.

name: Finn
line: No, just hit your snooze button!

name: BMO
line: I cannot self-snooze. It's against my programming.

name: Finn
line: Well, then, tell me how to do it!

name: BMO
line: Press and hold.  Then, press the button on top of my head.  I'm sorry. ...We can still take a bath...

name: Finn
line: He must know we're watching his tapes. We need to find his secrets faster.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, diary! Thank you for listening to me!

name: Finn
line: Fast-forward, BMO.

name: Finn
line: Play, BMO.

name: Ice King
line: So there we are. Turtle Princess is frozen and in my little ice wheelbarrow, and there was... magic in the air. We were both feeling it.  But before I could leave the library, Finn and Jake show up. You know how Jake is. Stretch this, stretch that, bah! He knocks off my crown and then Finn bonks me on the nose. Still hurts, too. The worst part is Turtle Princess took away my library card!  You know, dear diary, I'm starting to worry that all these entries sound exactly the same, and that my life is just me running in place on some... giant hamster wheel.

name: Jake
line: Fast-forward, BMO.

name: Jake
line: I'm gonna take a nap...

name: Finn
line: No! These tapes are important! We just don't know why yet. BMO, fast-forward to triple speed!

name: BMO
line: Okay.

name: Finn
line: BMO, play normal speed.

name: Ice King
line: Come on, baby... in the pocket...  I can't do it...

name: Jake
line: Maybe he's talkin' in secret code.

name: Finn
line: Telling evil secrets in secret code... He's brilliant!

name: Jake
line: Well, how do we decode the secrets?

name: BMO
line: Why don't we call others for help?

name: Finn
line: BMO, you're brilliant!

name: Jake
line: Well, who do we call?

name: Finn
line: Um... The smartest person we know, Princess Bubblegum!  She's brilliant...

name: Finn
line: Hey, Princess Bubblegum.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Jake and I found a bunch of secret tapes! We were wondering if you'd help us decode them.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Codes?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, they're really stupid, but, y'know... Maybe they're encoded or whateva.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, you called the right person. I know a lot about codes. Let's start with—

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: Ohh...

name: Finn
line: Hey, Princess. We got disconnected.

name: Ice King
line: Hello, Finny.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Hey/Uhhh, you sound weird!

name: Ice King
line: Must be a bad connection. That's why we were disconnected earlier on the telephone.

name: BMO
line: Ice King is on the phone outside!

name: Finn
line: So... how's the weather in Candy Kingdom?

name: Ice King
line: Oh, the usual. There's ice everywhere and it smells like penguins!

name: Finn
line: The only thing that smells like penguins is you, Ice King!!

name: Ice King
line: How did you—

name: Finn
line: What're you doing?!

name: Ice King
line: I wanna watch secret tapes with you guys. It'll be nice.

name: Finn
line: No, man!

name: Ice King
line: But—

name: Finn
line: He doesn't know that we're watching his tapes. We gotta find these evil secrets before he uses them against us!

name: Ice King
line: Oh... Fine. No more nice. NOW YOU GET ICE!!  Try watching those tapes with FROZEN EYEBALLS!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, okay, I'm up.  Ah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, everybody. I've asked you here today because you are the best of the best.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Anyway, recent data shows an increased chance of threat to the Candy Kingdom.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: So I'm developing a new defense.  I've installed sleeping gas in the Gumball Guardians. If any bum tries to attack us, they will be sprayed without mercy. Isn't that nice? The only thing is the gas will spread and knock out anyone who breathes it—anyone but you guys, my trained elite. So watch closely. I'm gonna show you all how to overcome the gas  with sheer willpower.  Hit it!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Now make a fist with your brain and punch against sleepy times, saying, "No! NOOO! NOOOOO! Don't go on gentle into that good night."

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Hi!

name: Marceline
line: Yo, Bubblegum!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Marceline! You're up late.

name: Marceline
line: No time for chitchat. Let's hang out—right now.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm, I don't know. I'm, uh, kinda busy.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Uh,  hi.

name: Marceline
line: Listen, Bub-Bubs. I tracked down Maja the Sky Witch.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, what?!

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, I tailed her to an enchanted forest, but it's all jammed up with barrier spells.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ohhh, I think I see where this is going.

name: Marceline
line: Well, you love getting out your big brain and... and... I just thought it'd be cool to spend some quality time with you.  I need your help, okay?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: But why are you so interested in finding Maja?

name: Marceline
line: It's just really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really important to me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whoa. Okay, but—

name: Marceline
line: Come on, I got your pack-pack.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Um, sure, but—

name: Marceline
line: Hold on to that "but," PB.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whee!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Haha! Whee.

name: Marceline
line: Gah! Something's wrong. Huh? Hey!  This stuff—it's like a brick wall!  Let's just blow the whole thing up.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmmm.  It's a Sleeping Gate Bramble.

name: Marceline
line: How do we kill it?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: All we have to do is take the path of least resistance.

name: Marceline
line: Alright, so where is it—the path?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's in here  and in here . Now  take a deep breath  and be passive.

name: Marceline
line: Grrrr!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hello, friend. Trouble relaxing? How 'bout a cup of chamomile tea?

name: Marceline
line: Wow! Wild digs.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Tell me about it. My googoomamameter is going babies. And look at my watch!

name: Marceline
line: It's... pink.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's running backwards. There's serious witchery afoot here.

name: Marceline
line: Come on, Princess. We don't got all night.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What are those things?

name: Marceline
line: Totem cairns.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wibba-wha?

name: Hambo

line: Hambo!

line: Yeah, girl. What took you so long? I thought you gave up on me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Your teddy bear?

name: Marceline
line: I'm sorry, man!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yo, wait a sec!

name: Marceline
line: WHAT?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Marcy, how old are you? It's a trick, right? Come on!

name: Hambo
line: Help me out, dum-dum!  Boo-hoo. Boo-hoo-hoo-hoo

name: Marceline
line: Get off!  Buddy!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: NO!

name: Marceline
line: BONNIE!

name: Marceline
line: You killed him?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Don't be dense! Hambo can't even talk! Snap out of it, girl.

name: Marceline
line: He's been with a witch this whole time. Maybe he can talk now.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's seriously what this is about? Rescuing your old teddy bear?

name: Marceline
line: Yeah. Sorry I didn't tell you. You might not have come otherwise.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Um, yeah. Raggedy Princess can make you a new Hambo in, like, three seconds... or Raggedy Princess can be your new Hambo. She'd do it, too. That girl's got, like, zero self-respect.  That's mean—don't tell her I said that.

name: Marceline
line: I'm not getting a new Hambo. There's only one Hambo.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's just a doll.

name: Marceline
line: See this?   Voooooooo...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What's that? You gonna bop me one?

name: Marceline
line: It's comin' in for a landing. What'cha gonna do, PB? Wanna keep dissing Hambo?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm sorry, Marceline. Let's go get Hambo.

name: Marceline
line: Disengage.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We should track that bird-rabbit thing.

name: Marceline
line: Right.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm.  Bang.  There goes some broken branches. It left a trail.

name: Marceline
line: I see it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey! Hold on now!  This bag's mad heavy!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Glommit!    MARCELINE!  I thought you needed my help.  Huh.  Nice trick, Maja.  You in there, Marceline? Hyup!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: WHOAAAA!  Woof.   Okay, PB, use your brain. Where would this witch keep Hambo? Break it down.  Micro... and macro... the picture... becomes... clear... and... call it!  Nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, wait...  yes.

name: Marceline
line: Where are you, Maja, you creep?  Oof.  What?  Hambo!  No!

name: Crabbit
line: Caw, caw!

name: Marceline
line: You again. I'LL KILL YOU! Give me Ham— Uh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Jeez, man. This must be all of her stolen junk. Ugh, what a creep.  Psh, a Ford Broncus.  Hmm...  Whoa!  "My Privates"? Come here, biddy.  Bam. Whoops!  What the—?  Invoices?  Receipts?  "Zumma zoom bleep blop for the purchase of Hambo." Whoa, WHAT?!

name: Maja
line: That's my private box. Maja's mitts only, ya goof.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: So you purchased Hambo? From some weenus named Ash?

name: Maja
line: That's right. He was a weenus so I wrote it on there as my personal joke.  But the sale is still legit. Hambo's mine! His body's all juice-logged with sentimental affection—a savory spell spice. So get out of my face, alright?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Where's Marceline?

name: Maja
line: She's busy with my Crabbit... crow-bit... crow-rabbit. I knew that tranch wouldn't respect my proof of purchase. So what about you, bozo?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: By the laws of my kingdom, I must honor the exchange of goods for legal tender. But guess what—I'm not leaving without Hambo.

name: Maja
line: So what are you gonna do about it?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'll tell you what I'm gonna do.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Marceline!  Yoink!

name: Marceline
line: Hambo!  Oh, it's me, buddy!   How did you—?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I took care of it.  Let's bust out.

name: Crabbit
line: They got away with your  Hambo.

name: Maja
line: Huh-duh! I let them!

name: Crabbit
line: You what?

name: Maja
line: I made a trade... for this!  Bing!  Mmmmm.  Sentimental freshness! Ah, the psychic resonance on Hambo is nothing  compared to this baby!  WHOO! Hahahaha!

name: Crabbit
line: Listen, Maja. I am not your familiar anymore. I wanna be a dancer.

name: Maja
line: That's cool. Then why don't you dance to this?!

name: Crabbit
line: AAAH!

name: Maja
line: Nice moves!  Now you're the weenus!  Hey, don't go!  Ahahahahaha! I'm cookin' up something big, Crabbit! This is my victory lap! Ahahahahaha!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Alright, guys. Hammer all these safety signs around this dungeon hole. I've gotta jet off on my swan to take care of some royal junk.

name: Finn
line: You got it, Princess.

name: Jake
line: Whatever you want, mama.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Bubblegum, away!!

name: Jake
line: Ow. Ow. Ow.

name: Finn
line: There. That's the last sign, Jake. Now no one will go down this hole, ever. Probably a lot of dangerous, awesome stuff down this hole. I better go take a look.

name: Jake
line: Don't, dude. For you see, that's the secret entrance to the Dungeon of the Crystal Eye!

name: Finn
line: Whoa.

name: Jake
line: Legend has it that the eye rests in the deepest chamber of this accursed dungeon. Man, we shouldn't even be talkin' about it, 'cause it's lunch time.

name: Finn
line: The crystal eye. I wanna meet this dungeon.

name: Jake
line: Maybe after lunch.

name: Finn
line: Eh, I'll skip lunch. Just catch up with me when you are finished.

name: Jake
line: *Pfft* Yeah, right.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: Without the aid of my magnificent powers...  ...Huh? Huh? You'd get killed down there.

name: Finn
line: Hey! I can do things without you! You wanna bet I can't?

name: Jake
line: Nope. Come get your sandwich.  Listen to Jake, Finn. He only wants what's best for--  Ahh! Help me! Ahh! Come put her out of her misery, dude!

name: Finn
line: We are betting! I bet that I'll get that crystal eye and be back within 11 minutes.  Ready set go!

name: Jake
line: I better go after him.

name: Jake
line: No, Jake! Stay here, with me...

name: Jake
line: Oh, my...

name: Finn
line: Dungeons! Chambers! Woah.  Evil creatures!  Treasure chests!

name: Finn
line: Doorways!  Traps!  I'm in my elemeeeeeeeeent!!

name: Finn
line: Aww!

name: Finn
line: Oh?

name: Finn
line: Whoa! Somebody come pick up your freaky cat.

name: Demon Cat
line: Greetings, Frank the Human Boy.

name: Finn
line: How did you almost know my name?!

name: Demon Cat
line: I have approximate knowledge of many things. For instance, I know that I am possibly going to slay you and munch on your eyeballs.

name: Finn
line: Huh, yeah right. That sounds like idiot talk!

name: Demon Cat
line: You're trespassing on my dungeon, manling. And I am the thing...  ...you should be afraid of.

name: Finn
line: You can't hurt me! I'm a radical boy on a mission for the crystal eye!

name: Demon Cat
line: I'm going to unzip your skin and wear you like a little coat.

name: Finn
line: Unzip this!

name: Finn
line: Bleep!  OOF!

name: Demon Cat
line: Now, you DIE!!

name: Demon Cat
line: Wait a minute.  Is that dog smell?! You... you have a dog with you? I'm outta here!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, right! Good excuse! Slaps, that cat was kicking my buns! And it might have finished my buns if it weren't for Jake's stank. Dang it, Jake! I'll get that crystal eye on my own! With my own odors.  Hmm, no to skeletal remains door.  No to giant monster mouth door.  Oh! Giant key door it is!

name: Finn
line: If Jake was here, he could stretch his hand into a key and open it.  Yeah! Key hand!  Ouch!  Hey! What the jug is that?

name: Finn
line: Oh, sweet, the key!

name: Finn
line: Ew, jelly cube?!  Come on! Give it to me! Don't flaunt it if you're not gonna give it up!  I'll never get that crystal eye! No. No, I just gotta stay pumped.  Pump it up, pump it up! Whoo! Whoo! Shake it! Shake it! Ahh!  Steady, Finn. This place is probably more creeped out of you than you are of it.

name: Bucket Knight
line: Halt! Come no further adventurer, for you see none can defeat... the Bucket Knight!

name: Finn
line: Okay, then I won't fight you.

name: Bucket Knight
line: No! You must challenge me to--

name: Finn
line: Hey cutie, do you know how to get to the crystal eye from here?

name: Bucket Knight
line: Yes, it's through that door over there, but--

name: Finn
line: Thanks!

name: Bucket Knight
line: Hey! You can't pass through that door with out battling me!

name: Finn
line: Yes, I can. Because I'm huge compared to you.

name: Bucket Knight
line: Just add water and...  ...exponential growth!

name: Finn
line: Aw, buckets.

name: Bucket Knight
line: Now, activate thine own powers, and we shall engage in thrilling single combat!

name: Finn
line: Heh, thing is... I don't really... have any powers.

name: Bucket Knight
line: I see...

name: Finn
line: AAAAH!! Dang it, Jake wouldn't be running! He'd grow all big, and sock you right in the nose hole!  Aw, nutzoids!  Come on! All aboard the knuckle train to fist planet!

name: Finn
line: Oww... I rode the knuckle train? But... I... I'm in my element.

name: Finn
line: AHHHHH!!!! Ow! OW! Ow! OW! Ow! Uhh! That... sucked.  Alright, Finn, you're in a heavy pickle here. You don't have Jake, and you're on your own. But you can still handle this. You can still get that crystal eye!

name: Demon Cat
line: Hey, my dinner is back. And your dog isn't with you! That's what you said, right? Jack the Dog is not "accompanying" you?

name: Finn
line: You mean Jake?

name: Demon Cat
line: Jake, Jack, whatever. He's not here, which means I'm going to rip your heart out.

name: Finn
line: Crud, crud, crud, crud, crud!

name: Demon Cat
line: You can't hide from me, Jim. I know almost everything, remember? I know exactly where you might be, Jim. I'm about to pounce on you.

name: Demon Cat
line: One... two... three!  Aw, man! I thought you'd be behind this rock. Hmm...  Alright. I know where you are now! And I'm about to pounce again!  One... two... three!  Aw, man! Well, there's only a few more places to look.

name: Finn
line: Oh, Jake... I'm such a fool. A silly, silly fool.  Who the heck--?!

name: Guardian Angel
line: Hey, it's okay. Shh, I'm your guardian angel, Finn. I'm here to save you.

name: Finn
line: Re...really?

name: Guardian Angel
line: Mmm-hm. Come here, let the angel pick you up.

name: Finn
line: Okay.  This is radical.

name: Guardian Angel
line: Are you comfortable? Would you like some snacks?

name: Finn
line: I'm fine, thank you.

name: Guardian Angel
line: Here, let me clean you up, and mend your clothes.

name: Finn
line: Ha ha ha ha ha!

name: Guardian Angel
line: I'm taking you to the chamber of the Crystal Eye....

name: Finn
line: Aww, yeah!

name: Guardian Angel
line: ... where I'm going to cook you and eat your flesh.

name: Finn
line: Wow... Wait! What??!

name: Guardian Angel
line: Trust in your  guardian angel!

name: Finn
line: Put me down, lady!

name: Guardian Angel
line: As you wish.

name: Finn
line: Man, everybody wants to eat me up. It's probably 'cause I'm so sweet.

name: Guardian Angel
line: Now for little kid soup.  The secret is a low flame over a long period.

name: Finn
line: That's Jake's secret, too. I sure hope he saves me.

name: Guardian Angel
line: I will save thee, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Lady, you are sick! Oh, Jake.

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: What are you doing here?!

name: Jake
line: I was looking for you, knucklehead! I was so worried, that right after lunch, I plunged into the dungeon after you.

name: Jake
line: Strangest thing, though, I kept runnin' into obstacles.

name: Reaper
line: Choose your dueling weapon!

name: Jake

line: We wait, like, two hours.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Let's do something else.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Like what?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Mm, video games?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I don't like video games.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Me neither. I don't even have a system to play on or anything.

name: Banana Guard 1
line: I got a video game back at my place. But I just got it so I could stay in shape.

name: Banana Guard 2
line: How do you get in shape playing a game?

name: Banana Guard 2
line: Uh It's like a yoga video.

name: Banana Guard 1
line: So it's not a game at all.

name: Banana Guard 2
line: No, it is. It's a video game.

name: Banana Guard 1
line: Uh, it's a video.

name: Banana Guard 2
line: Yes.

name: Banana Guard 1
line: A yoga video.

name: Banana Guard 2
line: Game. A game.

name: Banana Guard 1
line: Video.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You guys.

name: Finn
line: We brought The Moon!

name: Jake
line: What do we do?

name: Moon
line: Die like pigs!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hold her off till Marci wakes up!

name: Finn
line: She's not doing anything.

name: Jake
line: You gonna try something?

name: Finn
line: Okay, I guess. Whoops!

name: Jake
line: What was that?!

name: Finn
line: I don't know, man, I think I just got tapped out!

name: Jake
line: "Tap out"? When do you ever tap out?

name: Moon
line: Pigs!

name: Finn
line: She's doing something weird! Jake, help!

name: Jake
line: I can't! I feel like I'm in a slow-motion terror dream!

name: Finn
line: Banana Guards, help!

name: Finn
line: Princess, I can't stop her!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You kind of have to, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Rats! Okay, let me get my sword.

name: Moon
line: Marceline.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's locked, dipstick!

name: Moon
line: Open, pig! Open, pig! Pigs!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Come on, Marci, wake up! Wake up!

name: Marceline
line: It's spring again And the yard is full Of tiny flowers You used to call them weeds And you killed them al

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: But they were growing too tall

name: Marceline
line: What?! I can't hear you!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I said, "Wake up, Marceline."

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I said Wake up. Huh?

name: Moon
line: Pigs! Pigs!

name: Marceline
line: You!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Marceline!

name: Moon
line: Pigs, pigs!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Did you just yell "pigs" at the lock until it opened?

name: Princess Bubblegum & Marceline
line: Oh!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: In your face!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Marci, now!

name: Jake
line: Finn.

name: Finn
line: Yes!

name: Jake
line: Finn, she's dead.

name: Finn
line: Oh, thank glob.

name: Finn
line: JAKE, WAKE UP! I FOUND A TRUCK!

name: Jake
line: What?

name: BMO
line: What's happening?

name: Jake
line: Whoa!  Where did ya get this baby?

name: Finn
line: I found it in the woods. I named it "Hot Daniel." Anyway, I figured we could do some pretty sick stuff with it.

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah? Like what?

name: Finn
line: Hmm. I don't know. Launch it off some ramps, maybe get it going thirty miles per hour, crank the wheel into a gnar right-hander, spray dirt everywhere like a big hurkin' dirt wave?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, buddy!  Nice! Let's crank this beast up.

name: Finn
line: Can't—engine's busted, I think.

name: Jake
line: Nuts. BMO, you know anything about cars?

name: BMO
line: Nope.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Maybe...  Ice King, you know anything about cars?

name: Ice King
line: Nope. Not a car guy—too confusing. Got better things to do with my life.

name: Finn
line: Hmm.

name: Jake
line: Wait... I know someone who's good with mechanics.

name: Banana Man
line: Hey! Hey, guys! Hi!

name: Jake
line: Hey, Banana Man.

name: Banana Man
line: Wow! I haven't seen you fellas since you destroyed my home, my land, and my rocket.

name: Finn
line: Aw, jeez, yeah. Sorry, Banana Man—just sorta happened.

name: Banana Man
line: Don't worry about it! Feh! Bygones! I'm just excited you called me over. We're neighbors. We should help each other out. I got the soda and the jams.

name: Finn, Jake, & BMO
line: Cool!

name: Banana Man
line: I see the problem. The top of your engine is gone, specifically, the cylinder head.

name: Finn
line: Hm. Okay. That word sounds cool... but what does it mean?

name: Banana Man
line: Let me explain.  The cylinder head is the top to the cylinder block.  Think of the cylinder head as an airtight lid to your engine that regulates air, fuel, and exhaust.

name: Finn
line: Okay. Cool. Informative.  What is he pointing at?

name: Banana Man
line: Now this lid is important because it works to get fuel into your engine.  You see, your engine has cylinders, and these cylinders are pistons. When the piston in the cylinder moves down, it creates a vacuum, pulling in fuel from the intake.

name: BMO
line: You mean an air-fuel mixture?

name: Banana Man
line: That's right, BMO.  Have a gold star, dear.

name: BMO
line: Yay! BMO is so pretty and smart!

name: Banana Man
line: Then the piston returns to the top, compressing the air-fuel mixture. Then a spark plug fires off, creating an explosion, driving the piston back down, powering the engine.

name: Finn
line: Sweet. So where's the cylinder head, then?

name: Banana Man
line: Hmm. Well, sometimes people store parts they're working on in the car.  Ah! Bingo!  Found it.

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Drive time!

name: Banana Man
line: Well... n-not quite. We don't know why they took the cylinder head off. Uh, it could be cracked, the gasket head could be warped, the rod bearings could have damage from water—you see, that's the cool thing about cars.  One tiny little thing messes everything else up so nothing works! So it's up to us to figure it out!

name: Finn
line: Cool.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, alright.

name: Jake
line: Whoo. I'm bushed. You guys wanna pick this up again in the mornin'?

name: Finn
line: Sure.

name: Banana Man
line: Sounds good!

name: BMO
line: Not BMO. This grease monkey's torqued up on automotive styles.  Yeah,  boyee!

name: Finn
line: Okay, BMO. Good night, Banana Man.

name: Banana Man
line: Have a good evening, gents.

name: BMO
line: Time for the night shift.

name: Starchie
line: It's ten past the hour, and this is Graveyard Shift, hosted by me, Starchie the Gravedigger, your weekly five-hour dose of all the strange haints, phantasmagoria, and phenomena I see working in the Candy Kingdom Graveyard. Hello, caller. You're on the Graveyard Shift.

name: Banana Guard
line: What? Am I—oh, hi! Um, longtime listener, first-time caller. So, uh, I think Princess Bubblegum has been replaced by, like, a lizard person.

name: BMO
line: A lizard?

name: Banana Guard
line: Yeah, a lizard. I love your show.

name: Starchie
line: Oh, Starchie is very interested in this topic. What led you to this discovery, caller?

name: BMO
line: They are wrong! You look more like a hippo than a lizard.

name: Banana Guard
line: Well, um, my friend is a very highly-placed official in the Candy Kingdom, and I've noticed—

name: Banana Man
line: Hi, BMO.

name: BMO
line: Stay back, lizard!

name: Banana Man
line: Sorry, BMO. I-I didn't mean to startle you. I couldn't sleep. I kept thinking about the truck... and biodiesel! Oh, and I figured out what's wrong with the engine block. So what are you working on?

name: BMO
line: Aerodynamics.

name: Banana Man
line: Swe-e-e-et! You know, it's been really nice hanging with you fellas and working on the car.  It gets a little lonely at my space-age banana dome.

name: BMO
line: You don't have a girlfriend?

name: Banana Man
line: No. I-I don't want to be alone, but... I've gotten pretty good at it. I putter around the house, keeping busy with my little projects. But it would be nice to find someone.

name: Starchie
line: Hold up. Princess? Is that you?  Ah, spooky.

name: Finn
line: Yo, BMO. Coffee.

name: BMO
line: Thank you.

name: Finn
line: Car looks nice, BMO.

name: Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Banana Man
line: Uh! Ah! I fixed it! Are we best friends yet?! Oh. Oh, hey. I-I fixed it.

name: Finn
line: N-i-i-i-i-i-ice.

name: Banana Man
line: I discovered the cylinder head was warped so I went to the junkyard and got a new one.  Bingo.

name: Finn
line: Whoo.

name: Jake
line: Biodiesel.

name: Finn, Jake, BMO, and Banana Man
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Awesome!

name: Banana Man
line: Yow-ee-wow.  She's beautiful.

name: Jake
line: Well, then go over and talk to her.

name: BMO
line: Yeah, come on, Banana Man! You're lonely!

name: Banana Man
line: Oh, no, that's okay. Having someone to love takes up time I could use to work on stuff.

name: Jake
line: That's the craziest thing I ever heard.  Pardon me, miss. My friend here is super smart, and he rebuilt this truck.

name: BMO
line: He's very smart and very single!

name: Female Banana Guard
line: Okay...

name: Jake
line: Anyway, his name is Banana Man. If you like what you see, give him a call.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: He-e-e-elp m-e-e-e-e-e-e!

name: Finn
line: We gotta save Bubblegum!

name: BMO
line: No, Finn! She's a lizard!

name: Jake
line: You gotta stop listening to all those conspiracy shows.  They twist up your noodle so you can't tell what's real.

name: Finn
line: Look, there she is!

name: Jake
line: You want some tea?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Sure!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks, Jake.

name: Finn
line: So, what's up with the angry mob, PB?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, they think I've been replaced with an evil lizard replicant. It's sheer nonsense.

line: Eat this bug!

name: Finn
line: Punch it, 'Nana Man!

line: What the fridge?

line: Kill it!

line: No, no! I'm the real one!

line: Hmm...

line: Hey, speedy.  You're comin' with me.

line: It's not like that! Hot Daniel is dead!

line: Heck yeah! We’re home.

name: Finn
line: That was definitely the longest adventure we’ve ever done.

name: Jake
line: What about when you got trapped in a mind dungeon for a buncha years?

line: This trip was longer in emotional time.

line: Yeah, I’m burnt out. No more adventure for a while, okay?

line: Yes, yes, yes!

line: Let’s go take hot showers!

name: Finn
line: Hey!

name: Finn
line: Well, that’s weird. We should defs check it out after we hit up the tree house.

name: Jake
line: Yeah. We gotta get to the bottom of this hot shower.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Does everything seem pinker to you?

name: Jake
line: Home always looks different after a long trip. You’re seeing it with fresh eyes and newfound wisdom. And sometimes there’s also a new strip mall or something. So, everything being pink is probably not a big deal, and also, I’m tired.

name: BMO
line: I like the pink. Why you worry so much, worry baby?

line: Haha, yeah, why you worry so much, worry baby?

line: What the heck happened to the tree house?

name: Finn
line: Candy… Fern?

name: Finn
line: Oh, I do not like this.

name: BMO
line: Is this some kind of sick joke? Because I love it.

name: Finn
line: Huh? Big Baby Root Beer? No one buys this brand. It’s too sweet.

name: Fern
line: Hello?

name: Finn
line: Ah!

name: Fern
line: Hey! You look like me.

name: Finn
line: Fern?

name: Fern
line: Who’s Fern? I’m Fun the human!

name: Neptr
line: And I’m Nectr, the little robot!

name: Shelby
line: And I’m Shelby the worm… the gummy worm!

name: Fern
line: Welcome, strangers! It’s so cool that you’re inside our house.

name: Finn
line: Dude, when did you guys turn into candy?

name: Shelby
line: We’ve always been candy, you silly billy bean!

name: Jake
line: Oh, okay, I get it.

name: Jake
line: We’ve obviously stumbled into another alternate dimension where everyone’s a different version of themselves. Yawn.

name: BMO
line: But we haven’t gone through any portals. BMO would know.

name: Neptr
line: Hello!

name: BMO
line: Neptr is so cute now! I’m going to start treating him as an equal.

line: You were supposed to take care of Ooo while I was gone. What happened with that?

name: Fern
line: What?

name: Finn
line: You used to be this volatile plant boy, remember?

name: Fern
line: Really? Well, I’m candy now. And, I’m in control of my emotions.

name: Shelby
line: I’m in control, too. Of my body!

name: Jake
line: Wow, gummy Shelby’s a lot of fun. I think I’m okay with candy world.

name: Finn
line: No way. Let’s talk to P.B. I’m sure this is all one of her experiments gone wrong.

name: Neptr
line: You seem upset, friend. The tower will fix you right up.

name: Finn
line: The what, now?

name: Fern
line: Oh, boy! Let’s run outside!

name: Lemongrab
line: Hello, it’s me!

name: Fern
line: Lemonpink!

name: Fern
line: He was inside the lemon.

name: Lemongrab
line: Drink up, babies! Squeeze!

name: Lemongrab
line: I used to have a lot of fear and sadness, but now I’m fine!

name: Jake
line: Hey, I want some of that!

name: Finn
line: No. That is body juice.

name: Lemongrab
line: Hmm? What’s that? Did you spurn my fluids?

name: Finn
line: No…?

name: Lemongrab
line: Maybe someone’s feeling a little sour!

name: Fern
line: Wuh-woah!

name: Neptr
line: You know what sours get!

name: Shelby
line: Sours get the tower!

name: Fern, Neptr, Shelby, and Lemongrab
line: Sours get the tower! Sours get the tower!

name: Fern, Neptr, Shelby, and Lemongrab
line: Sours get the tower! Sours get the tower!

name: Finn
line: Come on, Jake. Let’s go see Bubblegum.

name: Jake
line: Stop striding! It just keeps you agitated.

name: Finn
line: I’m freaking out, Jake. This place is weird.

name: Jake
line: What I’m hearing is, you’re stressed out because everything’s candy.

name: Finn
line: Aren’t you?

name: Jake
line: Not really.

name: Jake
line: Lemongrab’s always been a weirdo. At least now he’s helping people.

name: Jake
line: And Fern is, like, laughing and joking around. Maybe they don’t need you to fix them.

name: Finn
line: Hmm.

name: Finn
line: I always believe you when you use that voice.

name: Finn
line: Sweet P.?

name: Finn
line: Hey, buddy. What are you doing out-

name: Finn
line: -Hey! You’re meat!

name: Sweet P.
line: Yes, I’m meat. But everything else is weird.

name: Finn
line: Wow, Sweet P., that’s almost exactly what I’ve been saying.

name: Jake
line: Sweet P., do you remember what happened?

name: Sweet P.
line: One day, the candy came and turned mommy and daddy into something… different.

name: Tree Trunks and Mr. Pig
line: Sweet P.!

name: Mr. Pig
line: We’ve been looking for you everywhere!

name: Mr. Pig
line: We just love you so much, son. You’re gonna get into a great college!

name: BMO
line: They look so happy, like dogs.

name: Finn
line: Don’t worry, Sweet P. We’re headed to the candy kingdom to see Princess Bubblegum about all this.

name: Sweet P.
line: She’s not in the candy kingdom. She’s in the terrible tower. Look!

name: Finn
line: Come on, Jake, that’s kind of weird, right?

name: BMO
line: I think it’s magnificent!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Sweet P.! Yoo hoo!

name: Tree Trunks
line: We brought some rollers and a bucket of sweet juicy caramel.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Let’s get you back to normal.

name: Sweet P.
line: But mama, I am normal!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Just sit tight there like a windowpane, and you’ll be back to normal like a windowpane.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Back to normal.

name: Jake
line: Hmm. Okay, you’re right. This is pretty freaky-deaky.

name: Sweet P.
line: I’m gonna go now.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Sweet P., come back!

name: Finn
line: Uh… Let’s get to the tower.

name: Jake
line: And never be the guy with no phone, Finn. You’ll think it’ll make people wanna talk to you more, but people just forget to invite you to things.

name: Finn
line: You’ve convinced me. Plus, I like late night bedtime calls when you’re sleeping over at Lady’s.

name: Jake
line: Ooh. Something smells nice. Nice and toasty.

name: Finn, Jake, and BMO
line: S’more!

name: Finn
line: Stay back, s’more!

name: Jake
line: Get it, get it, get it, get it!

name: Marceline
line: Woah, dudes.

name: Marceline
line: I was just playin’.

name: Finn, Jake, and BMO
line: What? Marceline?

name: Marceline
line: No, it’s Marshmaline, the Campfire Queen.

name: Marceline
line: Would you like to hear a song? I’ve written just the ditty that’ll cheer up anyone that’s overwhelmed with work or responsibility.

name: BMO
line: Yay! I love Marshmaline songs!

name: Finn
line: No time for tunes. Do you know where Bonnie is?

name: Marceline
line: Of course! Follow me.

name: Finn
line: Marshy… Where’s P.B.?

name: Marceline
line: She’s everywhere!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Good tidings to you, my friends.

name: BMO
line: Yahoo!

name: Finn
line: What… What happened to you?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, this?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I’ve become what I was always meant to become A pure candy elemental.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: ‘Scuse me.

name: Finn
line: What about Tree Trunks, and Lemongrab, and Marceline, and everyone else?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I fixed ‘em, obviously.

name: Finn
line: “Fixed ‘em?” But they’re your friends!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Those aren’t mutually exclusive concepts.

name: Marceline
line: That means it’s fine.

name: Finn
line: No. It’s not fine!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Don’t fret. I can fix you too.

name: Finn
line: I can feel my bones turning gummy!

name: BMO
line: Me, too!

name: Jake
line: We gotta get out of here before-

name: Marceline
line: Hugs!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I’m connected to all candy throughout all the galaxies. Once you’re candy, you’ll be part of me too!

name: Finn
line: No! That plan sucks.

name: Finn
line: Oh, my gosh!

name: Finn
line: Ah! I’m sorry! I’m sorry! I’m sorry!

name: Finn
line: I’m sorry! I’m sorry! I’m sorry!

name: Ice King
line: Skyhooks!

name: Finn
line: Ice King?

name: Finn
line: Hold on to me, bro!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Wait, we forgot BMO!

name: BMO
line: Goodbye, boys! It’s better this way!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, well. They’ll be back.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: They have nowhere else to go.

name: Finn
line: Are we in…

name: Jake
line: Cloud Kingdom.

name: Finn
line: Looks like we got away before the candy curse became permanent.

name: Ice King
line: That’s right. My skyhooks saved the day.

name: Finn
line: Thanks for getting us out of there, Simon.

name: Ice King
line: Aw, I can’t take all the credit. It’s all thanks to my skyhooks!

name: Finn
line: Hey, why are you even up here?

name: Ice King
line: We live here, now. Me and the skyhooks.

name: Jake
line: Finn...You gotta see this.

name: Finn
line: Oh...my...

name: Finn
line: ...butt.

name: Ice King
line: Skyhooks!

name: Kenneth
line: Uhh, hello? Hi. Uh, is this the secret mee—

name: Candy Person
line: What errand? What haste?

name: Kenneth
line: Uh. Oh, shoot. Oh! "To beelzebub with the brewer's knave!"

name: Starchie
line: Ahh, Kenneth.

name: Kenneth
line: Hey, Starchie.

name: Starchie
line: Glad you could make it. I officially call this meeting of the veritas brigade to order.  Lux in tenebris.

name: Kenneth, Banana Guard, Nurse Pound Cake & Science
line: Lux in tenebris.

name: Starchie
line: So, anybody have weird stuff to report?

name: Nurse Pound Cake
line: Well, sometimes at night, I see a shadowy figure around Princess Bubblegum's tower. I have a feeling it might be otherworldly!

name: Starchie
line: Whoa, this is some good stuff. We are this close to finally exposing the princess' shady dealings.  Meanwhile, PB remains blissfully unaware up in her ivory tower.

name: Kenneth
line: Excuse me. I believe I've made a startling discovery of my own.  I've developed this high-tech device. It broadcasts waves that—theoretically—disrupt parallel dimensions!

name: Starchie
line: Whoa, Kenny boy, you're blowing my mind.

name: Peace Master
line: So...a tinkerer, eh? Fiddling at the fringes of unknown realms. Tell me, Kenneth, will you be ready when the flames of those evil places consume everything you hold dear?!  I thought not!

name: Starchie
line: Hey, Peace Master.  Ohh!  Oh! My noodle.

name: Peace Master
line: There is something very wrong dwelling in the Candy Kingdom...a dark entity I plan to purge from the face of Ooo.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh! Uh oh!

name: Peace Master
line: Its presence has infected every home, every place of business, even here in this very room.  Yes, this foul creature watches us even.. Now!  I know you can hear me. Tonight your reign ends.  'Cause I am totally gonna vanquish you!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whoa! Holy flippin' flap! Red alert!  Pep But, start brewing up some chamomile tea so I don't stress out!

name: Peace Master
line: Sorry, I hate evil so much.

name: Starchie
line: It's all cool, Peace Master. Truth sleuths keep it real.

name: Peace Master
line: Yes. As lone scouts, we may fall, but together we will stand as a mighty force!  Oh, dang. I gotta go.  But I shall return in one hour!

name: Starchie
line: Alright, Peace Master. We'll be ready.  Mm. Dill-icious!

name: Peace Master
line: Dun-de-dun-dun-dun, Peace Master! Dun-dun-dun-dun-dun-dun.

name: Peace Master's Daughter
line: Finally.

name: Peace Master
line: Uh, sorry about the wait, guys. Daddy was pontificating.

name: Peace Master's Daughter
line: Hey, Dad, can we go to the Sorcery and Dark Arts fair tomorrow?

name: Peace Master
line: No, honey, that stuff is highly inappropriate for kids. Daddy works very hard to protect you guys from that kind of stuff. If you only knew of the monstrosities that lurk around every corner.

name: Peace Master's Son
line: Dark Arts!

name: Peace Master
line: Stop laughing! You're stressing daddy out!  See?! See what happens when you mess with the dark arts?  I'll get you, dark one! You wrecked Peace Master's minivan!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yo! Red alert!  Right, guys? What'cha doin' about it?!

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Whoa, be careful about old man naptime, please. That could have been it for me just now.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What is going on here?

name: Banana Guard
line: Don't.  No!  Hey, watch your pieces, man.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I thought you were gonna whip these guys into shape, Colonel.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: PB, you can't teach a butterfly to bark. You know what I'm saying?  Well, they like my stories. They're good listeners. It ain't like them old days with those hard-nosed Rattleball boys.  Say, what happened to them Rattleball boys?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, you guys. Keep up the good work.

name: Finn
line: What was your count?

name: Jake
line: Uh, 3 minutes. What about you?

name: Finn
line: Uh, 3 minutes, 30 seconds.

name: Jake
line: What's that? Your invisible watch?

name: Finn
line: No, I was just pointing at my wrist.

name: Rattleballs
line: 57 seconds.

name: Jake
line: Oh, dang, we were both counting fast.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Rattleballs, are you sure you're waterproof?

name: Rattleballs
line: No.

name: Jake
line: Do you even need to breathe, Rattleballs?

name: Rattleballs
line: Continue training. 3, 2, 1...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, Peps, where's the tea?!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Uh, just a second.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Just leave it out for me. I'm gonna go find Finn or Rattleballs or somebody to run down this Peace Master bozo.  "Take my time"? Alright.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Ooh-wah, oooh-wah. My light will move in darkness. I go unseen by low level biddies.  Whah-ha!  Yes! Light of the hermit, reveal my nemesis, and in the folds of Horus, carry me in haste! Fold, I say!  Yaaaah!

name: Peace Master
line: You going stinkhouse, baby? Ooh.  Whomp! Almost got me, but my lucky talisman sensed your presence.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Haha!

name: Peace Master
line: Look here, friends. The beast lies exposed!

name: Starchie
line: Oh, this is a mistake. That's my boy, Peppermint Butler.

name: Peace Master
line: His powers of darkness made me go crazy and crash my minivan earlier!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: You need to chill, Peace Master. I'm just a harmless, old butler.

name: Peace Master
line: Mm?  Ha ha!  In you go! You see this?! My dark wizard gobbler poots evil souls into the void.

name: Starchie
line: You can't do that to our friend!

name: Peace Master
line: Oh. I see how it is. Maybe y'all should get in here, too.  Digest!

name: Kenneth
line: Dimension disruptor, come on! Please, please, please, please!  Yes!

name: Peace Master
line: Impossible!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Time-out.

name: Peace Master
line: You can't time-ou—

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Whazaa! Whoop!

name: Peace Master
line: No! Your dirty hobo birthday tricks won't save you long time! You hear?! You still here?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Uh, no? I-I don't know. No.

name: Peace Master
line: Then hear my challenge! On the field of wizard battles, armed in my talismans of light, I will destroy you and free my children from the spell you cast over their minds!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: I accept!

name: Peace Master
line: See you tomorrow, butler.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: See you tomorrow, momo.

name: Peace Master
line: Tomorrow!  Peppermint Burfer, show yourself!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Yeah, yeah, I'm here...momo.

name: Peace Master
line: You're the momo. Your spells are no match for my righteous charm sack.

name: Peace Master's Son
line: Dark arts!

name: Peace Master
line: My kids!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: You like hunting monsters, do you?  Lords of the Nightosphere, he must pay a penalty.  Transfigure this babe into a super-weirdie!

name: Peace Master's Son
line: Ha!

name: Peace Master
line: Noooo!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Bam!  Now you got a monster kid.

name: Peace Master
line: Son!

name: Peace Master's Son
line: Look, Pappy! Dark magic!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Remember, you still got two non-monster kids. And if you want to keep them that way, you better toss all your charms down the hole!

name: Peace Master
line: I will smite thee.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: A'ight.

name: Peace Master's Daughter
line: Whoa, sweet!

name: Peace Master
line: Nooo!  Alright, alright. Okay, you win.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: One more thing. Show us your underwear.

name: Peace Master
line: You fiend.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Now, um, uh, walk around like a big chicken.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Now eat some dirt off the ground.

name: Peace Master
line: Please don't make me.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: 'Ey! You want three demon babies?!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Okay, stop. I took it too far.  We're done here. R-Run along, children.

name: Peace Master's Son
line: Dada, can I go to the park and eat flies?

name: Peace Master
line: Yes?

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Princess, I think I got something on camera 206!  Just look at that sicko.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Where's Peace Master?! Gah, I am freaking out here!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Princess, your chamomile tea.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whff! Thanks.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Well, how do I check my e-mails on this?

name: Finn
line: Hey, Kim Kil Whan. We solved the mystery of the haunted office. It was Clockbear the whole time... Yeah, uh, Jake's around here somewhere.

name: Jake
line: Man, it's crazy to think I was born here. In this alley. Popped right out of my dad's head for some reason.  Yaah! You scared me there, what with the appearing out of thin air and staring at me all creepy and now you're just reaching towards me.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Let's go, son.

name: Jake
line: Son? I ain't nobody's son but Joshua and Margaret! Though it is weird that you got exactly the same stretchy power as me.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: It's not weird. It's fate! We have to leave, like -  right now!

name: Jake
line: Wait, can Finn come with us? We're kind of a package deal.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Oh, that's kind of a bad idea. Our home world's atmosphere is, uh, poisonous to his kind.

name: Jake
line: Well then I'd better write him a note.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Destiny calls!

name: Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Finn
line: Jake?

name: Jake
line: Who are you, anyway?

name: Warren Ampersand
line: My name is Warren Ampersand. I'm your alien bio-dad! Heh-heh.

name: Jake
line: Why do you keep laughing?

name: Warren Ampersand
line: I'm nervous.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Welcome to your home planet - Nerraw.

name: Jake
line: Great fantasy sci-fi vibe, man. And that black hole really adds an extra dimension to the place.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Years ago, I left this beautiful planet and traveled to Ooo to implant my destiny-rich, stretchy DNA into a compatible host.

name: Jake
line: That explains a lot, actually.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: But now I'm dying.

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Warren Ampersand
line: I used the last of my strength  to bring you home.

name: Alien
line: He's here!

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Aliens
line: Is that Jake? It's really him! Did you see him? Look over there. Look. That's Jake!

name: Jake
line: Warren, how does everyone know me?

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Because you're the most important person to have ever lived. Behold! The Jakeseum!

name: Jake
line: A museum? All about me?!

name: Aliens
line: It's Jake! Jake! Jake! It's Jake!

name: Alien 1
line: Will you sign my prophecy book?

name: Alien 2
line: Will you sign my pretzel?

name: Jake
line: This is wild. But it feels so right, you know?  Hey! It's my fifth birthday party. And my graduation. And when I put a snail in my mouth. And when a snail put me in its mouth. And...  No. I don't remember this one.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: That's an artist's interpretation of the great prophecy. Tomorrow, you are prophesied to battle Ixcano, a monster with tentacles stretching across the galaxy to strangle everything. You alone can banish him to the darkness.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: I've researched your world and created the ideal child room. See?  Space stuff, dinosaurs, and cowboys.

name: Jake
line: Cool. But you know it's a little late to try connecting with me, right?  Is that clown cake for me?

name: Warren Ampersand
line: I got you something else, too.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: What do you think of your old dad's present?

name: Jake
line: I love it! Still never gonna call you dad, though.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Oh, I wouldn't dream of asking. But I hope you don't mind if I still wear this.

name: Aliens
line: Good luck, Jake! Savior us!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: This is the Sacred Temple of Pannishment. The temple door can only be unlocked by a stretchy dog.

name: Jake
line: With key ha-a-a-a-a...  Uh...

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Beyond this door, there lies an ancient, awesome weapon called the Panzark.

name: Jake
line: I am so ready for this. This must be why I can stretch.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Yeah, that totally tracks.

name: Jake
line: Hup!

name: Jake
line: This is so complicated and rewarding.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: You're doing great, son!

name: Jake
line: Almost there.

name: Aliens
line: Jake! Jake! Jake! Jake! Jake! Jake! Jake! Jake!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: The Panzark!

name: Jake
line: Yay!

name: Jake
line: Saving the galaxy's exhausting. I'm dying... for a soft pretzel with mustard.

name: Jake
line: "Pri-tzels"! Oh. "Pri-vate".

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Hello, there, you handsome young devil. Have we met?  Oh wait, it's just me! I didn't recognize this smooth, young skin or these vigorous kneecaps.

name: Jake
line: Oof!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: It's another clown cake, with a side of cocktail hot dogs.

name: Jake
line: Dude, weren't you, like, dying?

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Shush, son!  Ixcano approacheth!

name: Jake
line: Oh, dang.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: I'll go grab the Panzark.

name: Jake
line: So how do I-

name: Warren Ampersand
line: You just gotta stretch through the convolutions of the Panzark to activate its kill beam.

name: Jake
line: More stretching, huh?  Here comes the hero.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Stretch, baby! Stretch!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: You're doing it, son!

name: Jake
line: Ugh. This is too much.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Jake!

name: Aliens
line: Jake! Jake! Ja-

name: Jake
line: What's going on? Where's that Ixcano jerk?

name: Warren Ampersand
line: I have a confession. There is no Ixcano. I made it all up.

name: Jake
line: So... you're not really dying?

name: Warren Ampersand
line: No, I was dying. I needed to siphon your precious stretchy essence to keep me young and virile. I use these belts as a conduit. The more you stretch, the stronger I grow! I've done it hundreds of times, to hundreds of sons.  But I never felt guilty before. Maybe it's because you're so much cooler than my other kids.

name: Jake
line: Well, I am cool.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Or maybe it's this feeling your kind calls... low-key affection? I- I low-key affection you, son.

name: Jake
line: I'm sorry, Dad.  I wasn't powerful enough to destroy Ixcano!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: What? No. It was just me stretching the whole time. The Panzark. The people.

name: Jake
line: You're just saying that to make me feel better.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: I'll prove it.  "I'm Finn! I like pizza and dangerous girls." And here's Joshua!  "I'm no Warren Ampersand, but I guess I raised you."

name: Jake
line: Do more!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: "I'm Lady! Neigh." Oh, I know. You like parties!  Here's a bunch of party bears!

name: Jake
line: Make more party bears! And make the tree house! Put party bears on the tree house! Put party bears in the sky!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Okay.

name: Jake
line: Keep stretching, you old phoney. It only makes me stronger!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Belt switch! But how?!

name: Jake
line: Old-fashioned grifting, ya rube!

name: Jake
line: My real dad taught me that trick.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: But I was a proud pop!

name: Jake
line: I'm the proud pop of a whole bunch of pups. The belt totally applies to me as well.  See?

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Five stretchy pups.

name: Jake
line: Whuh-oh.

name: Warren Ampersand
line: You saved me after all!  Out of juice. I need those pups!

name: Jake
line: Don't even think about it!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Can't wait to meet my grandkids and drain their essence.

name: Jake
line: Aw, nah!  Leave my kids alone!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: If you destroy me, you'll be stuck on that rock forever!

name: Jake
line: My pups are worth it!

name: Warren Ampersand
line: Not the singularity! I just wanted to live forever!  I see now. This fleshy form has taken me as far as it can. I'm going 4-D, baby.

name: Jake
line: Bye, Warren Ampersand. Thanks for reminding me what it means to be a good dad  by being the worst dad ever. Never even got a pretzel.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Ogdoad, master of Level 8 shadow world, the winning vessel issues forth its pure essence.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Aha aha aha...

name: Peppermint Butler
line: You must overtake the vessel as night overtakes the day. By your very nature, you cannot deny my will.

name: Ogdoad
line: Hello, what jazz is this?  Peppermint Butler! That's the last straw! I will fill you with the shadow of a thousand brown portals!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Oh, no, Ogdoad! You are mine!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Peanut Butler, bleh, Peppermint Butler, cease these dark magic activities .

name: Ogdoad
line: Hey! Let me go first! I got stuff to do today!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: What'd ya do that for?!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: You neglect your duties to the princess. She has been in her lab for nine weeks. She needs to get out, socialize. Look,  her suitors, her faithful suitors, waiting for a chance to share her burdens.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: No, man! She won't date those old bags.

name: Gumball Guardian
line: You must try.  The Candy Kingdom worries for its leader, and it worries for you, dark one.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Alright, you guys. All you guys are gross. How long have you been waiting to court the princess?

name: Suitor #1
line: 87 years.

name: Suitor #2
line: 120 years!

name: Suitor #3
line: I'm Gerald.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Geez! How long have you been here, Krusty?

name: Krusty
line: Three hundred years, so what? It's not too late, right, boys?

name: All the suitors
line: It's not too late! Take me on a date! It's my right! Princess all night—

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Shush!  What's your deal?

name: Braco
line: I'm Braco, and I was born to court the Princess Bubblegum.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: How old are you?]

name: Braco
line: 21 years. I inherited my father's place in line after his ascension.

name: Braco's father
line: Hey.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: And you want to court the princess?

name: Braco
line: Yes,  my heart instructs me so.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Alright, buddy, I'm giving you a shot.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: But it won't be easy.

name: Braco
line: I was born for this. Love will win on this day.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Sounds good, man.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Prubs!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, what?  Who's that?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: This is Braco.

name: Braco
line: Son of Loghan, who was begat by Hobus.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, yeah?

name: Braco
line: I want to take you... on a date.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thank you, Braco. That's very sweet, but no.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Princess this lab reeks like brown mist; it's unhealthy. You've got to get outside and do some research on boys .

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That is way out of line, Peps, and you guys are donking up my research!  Hello! Donk, donk!

name: Braco
line: Princess, I love you! I-I love you so much it hurts.  The pain it—Huh?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmmm, what you're feeling is called "infatuation." The pain is the product of you overvaluing a projected, imaginary relationship with me.

name: Braco
line: No, Princess! What I feel is real! Meet me in the garden tonight  and unlock the mystery  of meee!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Braco!

name: Braco
line: Come to me tonight.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay Braco, but just for research, alright?

name: Braco
line: Yes, Princess.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Good job, man! You take it from here.

name: Candy Gardener #1
line: Yo, who's that with PB?

name: Candy Gardener #2
line: That's that Braco guy.

name: Candy Gardener #1
line: Are they on a date?

name: Candy Gardener #2
line: No, brah, the princess don't date.

name: Braco
line: Oh, look,  a miracle of nature like you.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Now hand it to me...  hmmm.  Okay, I have what I need for now.

name: Braco
line: Uh-huh.

name: The Morrow
line: Screech!  Screech!

name: Braco
line: Aww,  N-Nope, no. No tears for Braco! What did she say? "I have what I need for now." So she will see me again!  I shall not falter, Papa! .

name: Braco
line: Dear personal diary, in a consequence of my latest romantic misfortune,  I decided to consult the man who knew best about her majesty,  father's father. Amongst his dearest possessions, he kept a book containing every secret of seduction through superficiality.

name: Braco
line: The art of "peacocking."

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hi, Braco. Nice... hat.

name: Braco
line: I know right.  I am "peacocking" you to rally your attention.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Mhmmmmm .

name: Braco
line: Ummm, so what's that on your head?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: My crown?

name: Braco
line: Oh, uhh—

name: Braco
line: Oww.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmmm .

name: Braco
line: Princess! Ahhh.

name: Braco
line: Dear personal diary, I am in terrible pain.  AAAAAAAHH! She is in her castle somewhere, a lonely heart. Do not fear, Princess;  I won't let you down .

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Princess, Finn and Jake are here as requested.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, guys.

name: Finn
line: Hey, PB,  what's up?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: This is a soul stone.  I need one for something I'm working on. Of course, it's really rare, but my scanners found one. It's in the Vapor Swamps.  I printed the map with all the detail.

name: Finn
line: PB, who's the new guy?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Hey, man.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, that's Braco, a suitor of mine.

name: Finn
line: Oh, cool. That's cool—you're dating, that's coool. See ya, Princess.

name: Finn
line: What'd ya think of that Braco guy? I mean, he seems kinda weird  and passive and baby lambish  and too unheroic for Peebs.  And then I smashed that peach!

name: Braco
line: Jake and Finn, I seek your aid. I need to ask you for that map, therewith I can bring the soul stone to Bubblegum. Then she'll love me!

name: Finn
line: That road you're on leads to nowhere.

name: Braco
line: Oh, oh,  thank you!

name: Driver
line: Huu-ah! This is how far I go.

name: Driver
line: Hurry, man, GET OFF!

name: Braco
line: Ah! Oh! Uhhh.

name: Giant Insect Monster
line: Hey, I see you!

name: Braco
line: Oddsbodikins!  AHHHHH!

name: Braco
line: Uhhh.

name: Braco
line: The soul stone. This journey has come to an end.

name: Guardian #1
line: AHHHHHH! YOU BROKE MY HANDS!

name: The Beast
line: STOP!

name: The Three Guardians
line: The Beast!

name: The Beast
line: RAAAAWR! Why have you stolen my treasure, boy?!

name: Braco
line: For the one I love.

name: The Beast
line: Huh. Take the stone.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmmm.

name: Braco
line: Guess who.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Braco. Ehhh, what happened to you?

name: Braco
line: Oh, look, can it be?  It's a soul stone!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, yeah, sorry, but I don't need that anymore. I just finished programming a proper simulation of a soul. In fact, this is much easier to manipulate than a real one.  Braco?

name: Braco
line: Hmmm,  WHY WON'T SHE LOVE ME?!  Ahhh!

name: Ogdoad
line: Set me free, you tranch!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Give me the key to the shadow realm!

name: Braco
line: Ahhhh!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: You said you were going to handle this. You are doing a bad job.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Alright, I got this. Peace.  What's up, man? PB is not in to you?

name: Braco
line: Yeah, man, I'm throwing the towel.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Whoa, come on. PB's a tough nut, but don't trip out.

name: Braco
line: Then you must help me... to crack the nut.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: No problem, man.  We'll use magic, shadow demon magic!

name: Ogdoad
line: Say what?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: For your freedom, a spell.

name: Ogdoad
line: Yes.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Make this man-noodle Braco into a walking love magnet!

name: Ogdoad
line: He he he he, this I can do, but can you pay the price, Braco?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: The price is your freedom, man.

name: Ogdoad
line: This price lies outside of our arrangement. To receive, you must pay!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hmmm, alright, well, maybe no dark magic.

name: Braco
line: I'll pay any price... for love!

name: Ogdoad
line: SWAZAA!

name: Braco
line: Waaahhh! .

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Release!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Uhhh, who's that? Huh, what?

name: Braco
line: Am I a walking love magnet?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Well, you paid the price, no doubt, and I wanna have your babies.

name: Braco
line: To the princess, then!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: No, wait! What about meee?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And what's your number-one priority?

name: Princess Bubblegum Bot
line: To find someone to share my life with.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Awesome, he he he.  You ready to go on some dates?

name: Princess Bubblegum Bot
line: Uh, yeah, who should I date?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: There's a guy named Braco who's really nice.

name: Princess Bubblegum Bot
line: Ooh, where is he?

name: Braco
line: I'm here!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Braco? What happened to you?!

name: Braco
line: I paid the price for love, was it worth it? Do you love me?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes, I love you.

name: Braco
line: Then marry me! We'll travel the world, have adventures, make the babes, get fat and weird, and float up to 50th Dead World, right?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, Braco, I don't want any of that mess. I do love you, but it's the undifferentiated love I feel for all candy citizens. I couldn't permit one of my citizens to suffer the way I saw you suffering over me. And so I made you this. Meet my doppelganger, P-Bot.

name: Braco
line: Uhhh, this feels super-wrong.

name: Princess Bubblegum Bot
line: Oh, Braco,  let's get out of this smelly lab.

name: Braco
line: Okay!  Thank you, Princess!  Woohoo!

name: Princess Bubblegum Bot
line: Woohoo!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You're welcome, my love .

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Where is he? Where's Braco?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I let him go, Peps. I knew he couldn't be happy without me so I built him a robo-wife.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: You should have given him to me!

name: Finn
line: Hey, man.

name: Jake
line: Oh, hey, Finn!  So you got my map?

name: Finn
line: Yeah.

name: Finn
line: So... how's your experiment going?

name: Jake
line: Ah, it's goin' great. I really feel like I fit in,  so to speak.

name: Finn
line: So... are you ready to come home?

name: Jake
line: Nah, I think I was just gonna keep being a brick for a while.

name: Finn
line: Umm... what are you doing again?

name: Jake
line: Finn, ever since I was little, I wanted to see what it's like to be a brick in a brick shack when the brick shack falls down. And this shack is gonna fall down. Just look at it. Like sandcastles in the sun, baby.  You're too young; you wouldn't understand.

name: Finn
line: You're right. I don't understand. But I'm cool with your mystical journey or whatever. I'm gonna leave this walkie-talkie so we can stay in touch. Just in case.

name: Jake
line: What? No, man, bricks don't stay in touch!

name: Finn
line: Dude, BMO is, like, really worried about you.

name: Jake
line: Aww. You tell that little goofball I said hi.

name: Finn
line: I will.  Well, I guess I should head back.

name: Jake
line: Oh. Really? So soon?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, well, it took me, like, half a day to get here. Besides, you're just a brick, right?

name: Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Finn
line: Alright, see ya, Jake!

name: Jake
line: Bye! Okay, back to being a brick.  I'm so bored.

name: Jake
line: Ooh, I'm starting to get a little tippy in my teacups.

name: Jake
line: A bunny!

name: Jake
line: Looks like our long-eared friend is on to something. Bunnies love to dig. He's making a supreme effort, and I think I can guess why.

name: Jake
line: That's right. A carrot, grown out here free and wild, probably the result of a seed pooped out by a passing bird.

name: Jake
line: But what's this? A mysterious rustling in the bush. Could mean trouble. Mr. Bunny seems to think so. His sensitive whiskers quiver at the hint of imminent danger.

name: Jake
line: Unfortunately for Mr. Bunny, this is what nature is all about. It's a male deer. Not a threat to Mr. Bunny in the predatory sense, but still above him in the food chain. Mr. Bunny, wishing to avoid an encounter, hops away to safety.

name: Jake
line: Wow, deers are jerks.

name: Finn
line: Hey, man. You know I can hear everything you say, right?

name: Jake
line: What?! Arrrrrgh! No! I had no idea.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but you saw me leave the walkie-talkie, and I left it on. You know that, right?

name: BMO
line: Hi, Jake!

name: Jake
line: Hi, BMO.

name: Finn
line: Need anything? A soda?

name: Jake
line: No.

name: Finn
line: So what's Mr. Bunny doing now?

name: Jake
line: It's not about the bunny! The bunny is incidental to the brick experiment.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Sorry, man.

name: Jake
line: Forget about the bunny.

name: Finn
line: Sorry, man.

name: BMO
line: Sorry, Jake.

name: Finn
line: Look, we'll, uh, we'll leave you alone.

name: Jake
line: Finn? Are you still there? Finn? BMO?

name: Jake
line: Mr. Bunny retreats to its warren. Its homemade comfort is some consolation to help pass the hungry night. Twilight falls on the peaceful forest, a twilight unaware of the struggles it both soothes and conceals. The crickets begin to stir, rehearsing their musical rhapsodies. In the distance, flashes of heat lightning illuminate a purple summer sky. Even angry deer, at last, must come to rest. And so it is with our erstwhile antagonist, who has disappeared into a stand of trees, perhaps to dream of tomorrow's pointless battles.

name: Jake
line: Oh, my Gob, it's a crazy storm! This might be it! This weather might knock the whole thing down!

name: Jake
line: If a definition of bravery exists, then this must be it. A lone bunny, facing off against the elements, ineffectually pushing around some twigs with his pink bunny nose, a symbolic gesture, perhaps, but sometimes that's all we have. The wind is beginning to pick up. It's becoming clear that Mother Nature has not just knocked on the door, she has come in, sat down, and poured herself a drink. Mr. Bunny has no friends, no family, no loved ones of any kind. The wind is really picking up now. Small puddles gathering around the entrance to Mr. Bunny's cozy home are beginning to grow in size and connect with one another. It won't be long now. But what's this?! Looks like this unflagging little hero of a bunny will have some help, though! A family of friendly beavers appears to have taken up the cause.

name: Jake
line: Often called nature's architects, these intrepid mammals are sparing no effort to shore up the endangered burrow. Here's an unusual sight. It's a Sea Lard! You'd expect to see a few mudscamps out in weather like this, but here we have a rare treat indeed. This little beauty is pretty far outside of her natural habitat, but I've heard it said by wise old salts schooled in ancient maritime lore that storms will sometimes blow them off course to a remarkable degree. Looks like we've got some pretty good evidence tonight. Yes, sir, sometimes those old sailors know what they're talking about. It's a triumph of experience versus the secondhand verities of musty academic tomes. This feisty Sea Lard is pitchin' right in to save the rabbit hole, belying its slothful reputation. She uses her prodigious swiveling behind to increase the size of the hole, while the beavers continue to reinforce the sides with straw and stick. Times like these, supposed cruelty and indifference of the natural world, all too often its most salient feature, pale before the nobler instincts of even our most humble kin.

name: Jake
line: In the morning light, few signs remain of the summer storm that battered this idyllic glen. The beavers are finished with their work and are heading home. The Sea Lard looks like she's gonna wander the woods for a while. Maybe she'll find her way back to the ocean and write a novel about her experiences. Mr. Bunny is exhausted but can rest easy knowing that his home is secure. But alas, the bunny's rest is short-lived. The deer is back.

name: Jake
line: The deer, perhaps confused by the antler-like appearance of Mr. Bunny's protective dam, is now testing the situation.

name: Jake
line: The bunny is unsure of where this is going.

name: Jake
line: And with a single smash from the deer's powerful front hooves, the bunny's home is under attack! Mr. Bunny has hopped to safety and can only watch as the deer continues its relentless rampage on the only home he knows. A couple more mighty smashes, and the dam—the dam has been breached! Water is now flooding in! The deer continues its attack! This deer's misplaced rage, combined with its size and weight, is more than enough to bring down the weakened walls, which are now starting to give, aided by the unforgiving weigh from the tree above. Even Mr. Deer, in his blind fury, seems to sense what's about to happen as he steps to one side!

name: Jake
line: It's over. The warren has been destroyed.

name: Jake
line: An injustice of astronomical levels. Words fail me.

name: Jake
line: Actually, he doesn't seem that upset.

name: Jake
line: He's on his feet, checking out his new surroundings—even the deer is impressed! As if confused by the events, he performs a comical double-take and retreats into the forest. Ladies and gentlemen, this bunny is indomitable!

name: Jake
line: This bunny has the right attitude. Who cares about being a brick in a wall of a fallen-down shack? There's something bigger than that, and the bunny has answers.  Teach me, Mr. B!

name: Jake
line: Aw.
