line: Whoa! Really?

name: Breezy
line: Yeah! I'm gonna help you, friend.

name: Crab Princess
line: Hey, Emerald Princess, you know what would blow this party up?

name: Emerald Princess
line: What?

name: Crab Princess
line: If we all got in a line and just showed off our moves.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah! Do it! Oh, my glob! Aah ha ha! Haa!

name: Crab Princess
line: Thanks for walking me home, Finn. I'd invite you over, but you can't breathe underwater, right?

name: Finn
line: Not usually, but can I have a kiss, please?

name: Crab Princess
line: Uh, okay...

name: Finn
line: Okay. Good night, Crab Princess.

name: Crab Princess
line: Good night, Finn!

name: Breezy
line: Hey, you did it!

name: Finn
line: Oh, you're still here.

name: Breezy
line: Yeah,  just checking in... on my buddy. So, how you feelin', buddy?

name: Finn
line: Pretty grease. I made out with Crab Princess, so that's grease. But really I don't feel nothing. Maybe if I made out, I will feel something? Maybe I'll reach a "good vibe" saturation point. And then my flower will feel good, too...

name: Breezy
line: Your flower feels good, yes.

name: Finn
line: Hey, cut it out, Breezy.

name: Breezy
line: Ha ha! I'm just messin' around. We're buddies, right?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, Breezy, I like you. You're a good wingman.

name: Breezy
line: Yeah, wingman. I'm a girl, but all right! Let's wingman you some make-outs!

name: Jake
line: Uh-uh-uh-uh-uh-uh-uh!

name: Finn
line: What's up with your head?

name: Jake
line: Eh, I'm trying something new. Hey, how's it going, miss...?

name: Frozen Yogurt Princess
line: Frozen Yogurt Princess.

name: Jake
line: Whoa. You're a dead ringer for Flame Princess, with a smidge of Princess Bubblegum mixed in.  Guess you're still hung up on both of 'em, bro.

name: Finn
line: I ain't hung up on nobody! Nobody. Breezy, let's get out of here.

name: Breezy
line: Okay.

name: Finn
line: She doesn't look anything like Flame Princess, does she?

name: Breezy
line: I don't know who that is.

name: Finn
line: Exactly.  I'm just trying to have fun. You know, doctor's orders. But I still ain't feelin' nothing.  maybe I should just let this poor flower die.

name: Breezy
line: Noooo... Listen, buddy, being a free spirit is fun and all, but you got a responsibility to that flower, just like I got a responsibility. Get this—I'm actually a virgin queen bee. I was born to lead a hive, destined for a life of obligation and ritual.

name: Finn
line: Whoa. Bummer.

name: Breezy
line: Yes. Once I drink of the royal jelly, my carefree days are done.

name: Finn
line: Dang. That sounds like raw deez. Breezy, you got to stay free... Free to make out with whatevs.

name: Breezy
line: Yeah, maybe you're right. You know, it's too bad we're such great buddies or we could make out with each other.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Breezy
line: Uh, nothing. Come on, pal! Lets run and be free.

name: Breezy
line: Whoops! I tripped right into you

name: Breezy
line: That's right. Everybody's havin' fun...

name: Finn
line: Whoops!

name: Both
line: Whoa!

name: Bee Person
line: What's that?

name: Bee Person
line: Mnh-mnh! Hey, girl! Girl, I know you can hear me!

name: Bee Person
line: Girl, get back to your hive! Quit hanging out with that bologna tube! It's disgusting!

name: Finn
line: Mnh-mnh.  Yo! Shut it! She's an independent lady!

name: Breezy
line: Yeah, shut it!

name: Bee Person
line: A'ight!  Hey! You guys want to roast a wiener?

name: Other Bee People
line: Yeah!

name: Bee Person
line: Gonna teach you to mind your b's and q's, chump!  Buzzzzz!

name: Finn
line: Uh! Run, Breezy!

name: Finn
line: Aah!

name: Bee Person
line: You're about to get waggle-danced, you chicken!  Unh!

name: Finn
line: Ow! Ooh!

name: Breezy
line: Oh, no! Flower! I-I mean Finn!

name: Breezy
line: aha!  Don't worry, Finn!  I jacked some royal jelly from their hive!

name: Finn
line: Breezy... No!

name: Breezy
line: Aaaah.

name: Breezy
line: Hey, honeybuns!

name: Bee Person
line: Whoa! Oh, No! She got into our secret sauce, bro! It's all over!  Long live the queen!

name: Finn
line: Breezy?

name: Breezy
line: Yes, Finn. Can't you see? I've become a queen to save you because... I love your flower and—and I think... I love you!  Now you can partake of my pollen crumbles and become my drone.

name: Finn
line: Um... You know, I'm—I'm trying to keep it casual, B. I just don't feel the same way. I don't feel anything.

name: Breezy
line: But I royal jellied for you.

name: Finn
line: I'm lost in the darkness, Breezy.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Finn.  Finn.  I saw this already!    I know all about your dirty deeds. Now it's Lumpy's turn to slump those lips! Bring it in, baby.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Wha? Where you going?

name: Finn
line: That's it. We made out.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Wha—What?! I didn't wait infinity for a dip in the kiddie pool! We're taking this to the deep end!

name: Finn
line: But I'm not a good swimmer.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Don't be scared, Finn. Lumpy's on lifeguard duty.

name: Finn
line: How's it going, guy? Is any of this helping?

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna forget you did that. Right in the vault.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, whoa, whoooooa!

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Whoo-hoo!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What the lump? Oh, hey! Finn, you got your arm back!

name: Finn
line: Whoo-hoo! Yeah! Whoo-hoo! Breezy...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What the? Why's it so purple outsi—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What?!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: It's too smoky to see...

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Oh! Something's peeking. Someone's jacking your spaceship!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That is my ship! But it looks like it's been modded out. That much engine power, it'll break through the atmosphere before I can do anything to stop it!  Finn and Jake! Yeah, get that guy!

name: Finn
line: My thorn!  I think we should go inside.

name: Jake
line: Oof!

name: Finn
line: Gunther! What're you doing?!

name: Gunter
line: What am I doing? A fog shrouds my true intent, even from myself. There!  The Catalyst Comet! It all becomes clear. I am more than Gunther.  Like a mighty chrysalis pushing out of a damp cocoon—  —I emerge!

name: Finn
line: Jake! You okay?!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man, just don't croak out here.  Hey, man, look at Gunter.

name: Orgalorg
line: Behold!  I am Orgalorg!

name: Jake
line: Whoa. That's pretty.  Looks good, right?

name: Orgalorg
line: Hey. Where's Glob?

name: Finn
line: Uh, I dunno.  He exploded in space.

name: Orgalorg
line: Yeah, I thought so.

name: Jake
line: Man, are you still Gunter? 'Cause you seem like you're not.

name: Orgalorg
line: I'm Orgalorg.

name: Finn
line: Well, what the heck are you doing, Orgalorg?

name: Orgalorg
line: It was just time to come out again. Glob K.O.'ing himself—  —the arrival of the Catalyst Comet—  —and a ship to carry me out of this planet's gravity.  These are doorways the universe presented to me.

name: Jake
line: Ohhh, I know about open door philosophy!

name: Finn
line: What's that? You just say yes to stuff all the time?

name: Jake
line: Pretty much.

name: Finn
line: That seems alright.

name: Orgalorg
line: It's all yours if you're willing to take it. Destroy worlds—  —crush anyone blocking the door. Feel their bones crumple and their goo spill out.

name: Finn
line: I don't like that at all.

name: Jake
line: He made it ugly.

name: Orgalorg
line: You can't stop me; I'm Orgalorg.

name: Finn
line: I'm pretty sure I can take you, bro.

name: Orgalorg
line: Not after I absorb the power and knowledge of that comet.

name: Finn
line: Absorb a triple salchow to your kneecaps!

name: Finn
line: Grab my hand!

name: Jake
line: Okay.

name: Jake
line: Shoot. Hey, stop drifting!

name: Finn
line: I'm not trying to!

name: Jake
line: Ooh, maybe I can use jet propulsion!  Oh no, I can't breathe!

name: Finn
line: Jake, no! Don't worry, man, I'm working out a plan!  Freakin' bing-bong! Jake's gonna fulfill his croak dream after all! And that dirty umbrella is gonna enslave the universe!

name: Orgalorg
line: Cram, come on, this is gonna take forever.

name: Finn
line: Man, I'm gonna croak out here! Like a fish in the hands of a child!

name: Finn
line: Okay, Finn. Time to make an appeal to greater forces.

name: Martin
line: Hey, spaceman.

name: Finn
line: Wha—Dad?!

name: Martin
line: Heh, this is so crazy, Finn! What're you doing out here?

name: Finn
line: Floating to my grave! Hurry up and save me!

name: Martin
line: Can't, buddy—  —this baby does what it wants!

name: Finn
line: Are you kidding me?!

name: Martin
line: No, for real. Look!  Hey!  Get that guy there!

name: Martin
line: See? I'm just  flying random-style.

name: Finn
line: It's not random! I merged my intention with the universe!

name: Martin
line: You what?  Oh! Wait, I have an idea.

name: Finn
line: Really?

name: Martin
line: Here.  Grab on this.

name: Martin
line: Nah, it's cool, you got gloves on.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Martin
line: You alright?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Thanks, Dad.  Thanks, universe.

name: Martin
line: Come again?

name: Finn
line: Oh! We gotta save Jake.  He's out there chokin' on gas!

name: Martin
line: Like I said, I got no control over this beast.  We're on a journey into mystery, unless I can figure out what this bozo responds to.

name: Martin
line: It's kinda fun, right? See, there's no reason, or purpose, or what you said, uh, "universal intention."  Look around, Finn. Empty crud. So empty.

name: Finn
line: I dunno, there's some stars and stuff.

name: Martin
line: You're squeezed so tight, your bottom's gonna fall out. Put the phone down!

name: Finn
line: Put the phone down?

name: Martin
line: Ye—  WHOO! What's going on, huh?

name: Finn
line: Look! The light of the comet!

name: Martin
line: Ah!  That's pretty neat.  This moth is so bananas, man.

name: Finn
line: Bananas man... bananas man...

name: Martin
line: Uh oh, what's that?

name: Orgalorg
line: Almost there...

name: Finn
line: That dude's gonna absorb the comet's mystical power and crush everybody. Who the heck raises guys like that? You think he had neglectful parents like you, or had he always been a no-good Orgalorg?

name: Martin
line: Oh, gobslops, not Orgalorg!

name: Finn
line: Y-you know him?

name: Martin
line: Yeah, what do you think; I'm a dumb brick?! I don't know Orgalorg?

name: Orgalorg
line: Ahaha, oh, yeah.

name: Finn
line: Snaps! He ate the comet!

name: Finn
line: I gotta stop him.

name: Martin
line: It's too late, buddy; it's out of our hands.

name: Finn
line: Scronk that! I'm gonna use these hands—  —to sock him in the chops! In the chops!

name: Finn
line: Aahh!

name: Finn
line: Hey! Dinglord! In the name of—  the universe—  stop that!

name: Finn
line: Grass Sword.

name: Orgalorg
line: I didn't open this door!

name: Finn
line: Cool.

name: Catalyst Comet
line: Finn, do you remember?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I-I think so. A long time ago—  —I was you, sorta. And I crashed on Earth. And became a butterfly or some biz.  And I guess—  it was just some random, absurd thing. Just a joke I've been playing out for centuries.

name: Catalyst Comet
line: Who's creating the joke? Are you? And, if so, then are you my creator?

name: Finn
line: Uh—maybe? I dunno. Probably not.

name: Catalyst Comet
line: Probably not, but who knows? I've been around forever and experienced so much impossible junk. I've embodied all that is good—and evil . And now we're here. It's unprecedented. And I give you a choice. Come with me to end—and the beginning?  Or struggle here awhile like a beautiful autumn leaf.

name: Finn
line: What's that bell sound?

name: Martin
line: Cool, man.

name: Catalyst Comet
line: This is your crisis. As you stand on the edge of freedom from Love. Hate. Friendship. Isolation. Jealousy. Secrets. Violence. Video games. Ice cream waffles. Sadness. Madness. Power. Honor. Loyalty. Saucy. Mothers. Fathers. Scoundrels.

name: Finn
line: How long are you gonna list stuff?

name: Catalyst Comet
line: It's a long list.

name: Finn
line: You're tellin' me to abandon all this stuff—  —but you're not really making it sound bad.

name: Catalyst Comet
line: It's not bad. I'm just giving you the choice of a new mode of existence.

name: Finn
line: I feel like I put a lot of work into this meat reality. I'd like to see it through.

name: Catalyst Comet
line: Fair enough.

name: Martin
line: Hey, how 'bout I get a new mode?

name: Finn
line: Are you seriously trying to bail out again?!

name: Martin
line: What? This deal sounds pretty good!

name: Finn
line: Dad.

name: Martin
line: Uh oh. I know that look.

name: Finn
line: When you fled the scene like a ding-dong ditcher in the night—

name: Martin
line: Listen, Finn. No answer I give you will be satisfying. Besides, it was, like, 40 years ago.

name: Martin
line: I don't have a star to revolve around to track time.

name: Finn
line: But why do you always run from everything?!

name: Martin
line: You burn enough bridges, the only direction to move is forward.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Well, there ain't no changin' you, I guess.

name: Martin
line: Well, I'm glad we finally understand each other.  Start the engine, comet boy!

name: Catalyst Comet
line: Prepare to discorporate.

name: Martin
line: Goodbye, son!

name: Finn
line: Bye, Dad. Should've asked for a lift home.

name: Finn
line: JAKE! I thought I had lost...... you... NO!

name: Jake
line: You okay, Finn?

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Jake?! Banana Man?! How?

name: Jake
line: Well, I was just floatin' around, and I drifted into B-Man's flight path. Pretty random—  —right?

name: Finn
line: It wasn't random; I did it.

name: Jake
line: Let's get the jazz outta here.

name: Orgalorg
line: No...

name: Peppermint Butler
line: There we go, see? Problem took care of itself!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You think Finn and Jake are alright?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: I'd say it's about a 50/50 chance.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's pretty much everything in life, isn't it?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Yeah—Whoa!  What's that?

name: Finn
line: Hey, PB! We took care of it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Good job, guys!

name: Fish
line: Mm, I'm gonna croak out here.

name: Jake
line: And as it waded through the carnage that it had wrought, the vampire smashed their skulls just for the fun of it!

name: Finn
line: No way!

name: Jake
line: Yes way, it did. And also the vampire hunched over its victims and breathed their vaporized blood mist.

name: Finn
line: Ah, jeez! Jake, is this stuff you're saying true? Or are you just trying to mess me up? You have to be honest.

name: Jake
line: Oh, it's true, man. I heard it through a reliable source.

name: Finn
line: Reliable? Rats!

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Some say it haunted this very tree!

name: Finn
line: This tree?!

name: Jake
line: Good niiiight...

name: Finn
line: Jake?

name: Finn
line: You're full of it, Jake!

name: Finn
line: Errr...  NO WORMS ON THE BED!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: AAAAAH!!!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Jake! I saw someone outside the window! It must be the vampire, and I think we're unprepared, so I--

name: Jake
line: Relax, buddy. I made that story up. I was just trying to scare you.

name: Finn
line: But you said you heard it from a reliable source!

name: Jake
line: Ha ha! I made that up, too. I was trying to scare you, and it worked!

name: Finn
line: No one's outside.

name: Jake
line: Whew!

name: Finn
line: It was just the wind, scaredy-cat.

name: Jake
line: I wasn't scared, I was singing. I was singing my scream song. Ahh! Ahh! AAaah-uh-aah!

name: Finn
line: You're a total wuss, man.

name: Marceline
line: Hey, guys. What's up? I'm Marceline the Vampire Queen.

name: Finn
line: Are you gonna smash my skull and breathe my blood mist?!

name: Jake
line: Don't suck our blood!

name: Marceline
line: Calm down, weenies. I'm not gonna do that.

name: Finn
line: Soooo, you don't suck blood?

name: Marceline
line: Sometimes, I do. But it's not the blood that I like. It's the color. I eat shades of red.

name: Marceline
line: Ugh, I am exhausted. I've been traveling all over the Land of Ooo. And I've seen some stuff that would really make you say "like what?"

name: Finn
line: Like what?

name: Marceline
line: I encountered a school of goldfish beasts.

name: Marceline
line: And I fooled around in the Fire Kingdom.

name: Finn
line: OOO!

name: Marceline
line: Oh, and check these out.

name: Finn
line: Nuts?

name: Marceline
line: Oh, these aren't ordinary nuts.

name: Finn
line: You're wonderful.

name: Jake
line: Um, yeah. Thank you for not sucking our blood.

name: Marceline
line: You guys seem cool, too, but as you can imagine, I'm really tired, so you two should probably get going.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Marceline
line: Look.  "M" for "Marceline."

name: Jake
line: Aw, man.

name: Marceline
line: I carved in this tree years ago. Way before you two rascals started squatting here.

name: Marceline
line: But seriously guys, thanks for keeping the place warm for me, I mean really great!

name: Marceline
line: Good night!

name: Jake
line: Come on, Finn. Let's get out of here.

name: Finn
line: She can't kick us out of our house!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Get down here, lady, and fight me!

name: Jake
line: She's a vampire, dude!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna kill her.

name: Jake
line: Dude, if half the stories I've heard, and/or made up are true, vampires will kill you. There's no question!

name: Finn
line: But, what about our home?

name: Jake
line: A VAMPIRE TOOK IT! Aw, we should go house-hunting. Bag us a new house.

name: Finn
line: But I like our home.

name: Jake
line: Finn, house-hunting is wild! You've got to try it.

name: Finn
line: Really?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man! It is so nuts!

name: Finn
line: You always know what to say.

name: Jake
line: Bla-bla-bla-ble-ble-bla-bloo-bloop!

name: Finn
line: Okay. I'm convinced. Let's roll!

name: Jake
line: Sweet, things are gonna start going our way.  Hey, look, see? What'd I tell ya?

name: Finn
line: This is weak! I don't even like any of these places. I wanna go home.

name: Jake
line: Finn, let me tell you a little something about what home really means.  La, la, la...  Home isn't a place, let me give you a clue... Home is anywhere, where people care about you...

name: Finn
line: I don't wanna hear a lecture, dude! I just wanna go home...

name: Jake
line: But, home is where your heart is, Finn! And where is your heart, Finn? Well, it's right here inside you when I'm sitting here beside you!  With your lucky stars to guide you from above.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I guess I'd rather be out here, wrapped in your ear, than be in some awesome house all by my... souse.

name: Jake
line: I'd rather be dancing with some babes!

name: Finn
line: Shut up, dude!

name: Jake
line: Ew... Gross. This place looks gross!

name: Finn
line: And abandoned.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, bro... Wanna just live in here?

name: Jake
line: Yes.

name: Jake
line: So whaddaya think, man? We did pretty good for ourselves.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, we did... So, ah, what should we do first with our new digs?

name: Jake
line: Let's trash it and throw a party!

name: Finn
line: Ah this is it, feelin' good, I'm feelin', I'm feelin' like we did it. I'm feelin', like, completely satisfied. Nothin' else could go wrong, ya know, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man.

name: Finn
line: Aww, yeah, I know, too.

name: Marceline
line: Hey, Finn.

name: Jake
line: She's back!

name: Marceline
line: Wow, pretty awesome party ya got here.

name: Finn
line: What do you want, Marceline?!

name: Marceline
line: Oh, I just wanna show you somethin'. This cave belongs to me!

name: Finn
line: What!?

name: Marceline
line: Thanks for fixing the place up for me.

name: Finn
line: Y-You can't take our home twice!

name: Marceline
line: Yes, I caaaannnnnn!

name: Finn
line: AAAAAAAHHHH! It's vampire-fighting time!

name: Jake
line: Finn! Nooo! Vampires will kill you... remember!?

name: Finn
line: But she's taking our home again!

name: Jake
line: We're home as long as we're together, bla-bla-bleep-bla-bloop, remember!?

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah. Okay, Marceline, I'm gonna let you keep this cave, but only because Jake is my home, and he's way better than all your homes combined!

name: Marceline
line: Ya know, you're right. I guess I'll take him too!

name: Finn
line: What!?

name: Marceline
line: I'll bite him a little, maybe turn him into a zombie.

name: Jake
line: Nooo!

name: Finn
line: Let go of Jake!

name: Marceline
line: Make me.

name: Finn
line: You okay, pal?

name: Marceline
line: No one... makes me... let go... of Jake!

name: Finn
line: I'm not scared of you!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Marceline
line: You're pathetic, little boy!

name: Finn
line: You're pathetic!  Get ready for an uppercut, you dog!

name: Marceline
line: Make me.  Bleh-bleh! Blah!

name: Jake
line: I've... gotta help my buddy.

name: Marceline
line: Your blood is mine!

name: Finn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Uh oh.

name: Marceline
line: Ow! That actually hurt, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Why didn't you just kill me?

name: Marceline
line: 'Cuz that was fun! I haven't fought like that in years! Thanks, Finn.

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Aren't you dead?

name: Jake
line: Naaah, before she bit me I used my powers to shrink all my guts and blood over my thumb, see?

name: Marceline
line: You two are pretty hardcore. I can appreciate that.

name: Finn
line: Soooo so does that mean we can have our old house back?

name: Marceline
line: Yeah! Keep it, as a gift from me. Blaeargh!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Did you guys get on the bed? I told you, YOU'RE NOT ALLOWED!

name: King Worm
line: Oh, hey, guys. Come here, friends... Hug me... wawawawawawawa... Aw, yeah, hug me... wawawawawawawawa...

name: Finn & Jake
line: ♪Fallen ally, fallen ally, home now in the sky. Fallen ally, fallen ally, a single tear we cry.♪

name: Finn
line: ♪A truer friend, there was none.♪

name: Finn & Jake
line: ♪ And Prismo was his name.♪

name: Jake
line: ♪An artisan of pickling, and now just one remains.♪

name: Jake
line: ♪And now just one♪—  I can't do this, man! I-it just can't be over!

name: Finn
line: Hey... We can put it back in the fridge, if you want.

name: Jake
line: No, these picks were made by our friend to be mouth-loved!

name: Jake
line: We have to honor his memory with a final taste of his genius.  Get ready for the dream ritual.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Prismo we love you forever in our dreams!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Pickle rama, pickle rama, pickle rama, PICKLE RAMA!

name: Jake
line: Finale!

name: Finn
line: Whoof! What was that?

name: Jake
line: Quick, to bed! This has to be the last thing we think about!

name: Finn
line: Hyup!

name: Jake
line: Okay... dream!

name: Finn
line: Aughhh!  Whoo! Crazy dream, man. Prismo was definitely in it, but—Jake?

name: Finn
line: You up already?

name: Finn
line: What the...

name: Jake
line: Whup! Oof.  I love you, Everything Burrito.

name: Finn
line: Jake, why are you pretending to dig up Everything Burrito?

name: Jake
line: Huh, what?

name: Finn
line: Hold on, I'm coming down.

name: Finn
line: Jake, you gotta hear my dream, I—Jake?

name: Jake
line: Hey, man, you're shaking it all wrong!

name: Finn
line: What the jump?

name: Jake
line: Shh. Let me show you how.. it's... done!

name: Finn

line: Huh hmm huh hmm huh hmm. I can't wait to get this batch of pickles to Jake. He's totes gonna bust a pipe when he gets hit with the cumin and the undertones of sage that come in later.

line: Lich life-sucks Prismo's dream host, eliminates Prismo forever. Ugh, it's mad gris bro. And then the Space Police, or whatever they're called, show up because boppin' Prismo is a cosmic crime. I remember feelin' like someone had peeled a layer away from my brain, and my reality was no longer anchored to any point of reference, and I had to fight to keep from being crushed under the weight of an unforgiving new paradigm of ultimate reality. So cool, man. So why am I seeing this again?

name: Jake
line: Uhhh, that's cool...

name: Jake
line: Uhh, that's cool, but do you know what's really cool? Tough guy contest!  Whoo-hoo!  Tough boys!

line: Okay, seems like all of Jake's remanifesting themselves,  but as soon as I break their history it creates a paradox and Jake explodes.

line: Rrrm, wait a minute... What is this!? This couldn't be a...oh Grod!  Permanent, opposing, industrial-strength, magnetic bed!  Hand-hewed from a single tree  Oh, man! Look at this mattress!  What is it?  Smells like a blend of cashmere...  Mohair, silk and wool maybe...  The thread count on this is in the thousands! And it's filled with...  Down feathers of a baby griffin! That's illegal!  Glass of milk... This feels like a trap designed by some kind of sick genius!

line: No, Ricky! No, no no! No, no!

name: Bubble
line: BMO, that's his mom! Let go!

name: Mother
line: My beautiful baby.   You should be ashamed of yourself!

name: Bubble
line: Hey, the path ahead looks pretty clear and there were these... uh, there... BMO, are you okay?

name: BMO
line: I am sad, Bubble. I miss baby Ricky. I miss him so much already. And I miss Finn and I miss Jake. And I got dirt all in my butt circuits! And Bubble...

name: Bubble
line: Yes, BMO?

name: BMO
line: I-I don't think I'm ever going to get home again.

name: Bubble
line: Don't cry. Sparkle is safe now and we did that. Thanks to us he's going to grow up and be anything he wants to be a strapping horse whisperer or a sexy hitman or whatever. And things are looking up for us, too; I saw some bugs up ahead who look pretty with it.

name: Bubble
line: Maybe they can gives us directions or something.

name: BMO
line: Oh, my gosh! Oh oh oh! Bubble!

name: Bubble
line: What?!

name: BMO
line: I know those guys, Bubble! Those are my homeboys, my homeboys, those are my homeboys! We are close to my home!

name: Bubble
line: Yeeah! Come on, BMO!

name: BMO
line: Yeah!!  Yeeaah!

name: BMO
line: It's been so long, I can't wait to have some bread-and-butter!

name: Finn
line: Jake, is that you at the door?

name: Jake
line: Naw, man, I'm in the kitchen making us breakfast.

name: Finn
line: I call 'not answer the door' then.

name: Jake
line: Alright, hang on out there I'm comin'

name: BMO
line: Might be a minute.

name: Bubble
line: Um hey, so, BMO, since we have a little time, there is something I've been wanting to say.

name: BMO
line: Hm?

name: Bubble
line: I know I might never find my real home.

name: BMO
line: No, Bubble, that's not true!

name: Bubble
line: It is, I know it is, but it's... it's okay, because I realized something, all this time we've been together, BMO, I haven't felt lost, I felt at home.

name: Bubble
line: And, it's you, BMO, I feel at home with.

name: Bubble
line: So, I thought- I mean if you feel the same way, I thought we could get married. I-I mean... I'm not even sure what that means exactly but-

name: BMO
line: I do! Oh, I do! I do!

name: Jake
line: Hey, a bubble! Pop!

name: BMO
line: Bubble? Bubble?  No! No no no, my Bubble! No!!

name: Finn
line: What's so funny?

name: Jake
line: Oh, it's just BMO, he's pretending to be all messed up because his bubble got popped.

name: Finn
line: Oooh, heh haha, that is pretty funny.

name: BMO
line: Oh, Bubble, I'm so sorry I brought you here!

name: Bubble
line: There, there, BMO, it's okay.

name: BMO
line: Bubble? Is that you? I hear you in my head but I don't see you!

name: BMO
line: Oh no, have I gone bananas?!

name: Bubble
line: No, BMO, it's okay. You see, I'm finally free.

name: BMO
line: I don't understand, Bubble.

name: Bubble
line: No, not Bubble, Air. BMO I'm Air! I've been trapped in that bubble for so long I've forgotten who I am, but now I'm finally home.

name: BMO
line: Yeaay!!  Oh, b-but wait, now you don't need me... to feel... at home.

name: Bubble/Air
line: Nooo, see that's what's so great. Now we can be together forever, BMO, every minute of every day. No more privacy, no more quiet, no more alone. Every room you ever go in, I'll already be there... waiting... forever and ever, until the end of time.

name: BMO
line: Yaaaaay!!

name: Finn
line: Tickle, tickle, tickle.

name: Jake
line: Wakey, wakey, wake.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Wow, that was really something.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Really something.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Sure, I'll hold. Hello? I'd like to take a few minutes of your time to tell you about an amazing vitamin supplement. But first, just let me ask you do you ever feel that no matter what you eat, you're still tired and sluggish and... filled with nagging anxiety and doubt... and...?

name: Root Beer Guy's boss
line: Root Beer guy, get your head back in the game!

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Hello, ma'am, I'd like to take a few minutes of your time... hello?

name: Chocolate Bar
line: What we need is to cut out the middle man.

name: Gumdrop Guy
line: Hey, Root Beer Guy

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Hey.

name: Gumdrop Guy
line: Dude, we should start our own place.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Next stop, Lollipop Park Estates.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: This is good. What is this?

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Candy...

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: I've got a closing argument tomorrow, Root Beer Guy.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: I knew there was trouble. I could smell it on the hot evening breeze. Fortunately for me, trouble is my favorite thing because I'm Joe Milkshake. I kicked down the door with one swift, decisive motion... No... With one swift and decisive motion, I kicked down the door... No... The door was kicked down by me swiftly with not many motions, but a whole lot of decisiveness was used by me that was apparent to everybody... oh.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What are you doing? Let me go! No!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Hey, hey, are you awake?

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Not really.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Well, this is going to sound crazy, but I think I saw Princess Bubblegum get kidnapped and the perpetrators were that Finn and Jake!

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Okay, sweetie, that sounds like an interesting dream.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: But it did happen.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: You need to eat something before you go to work. And you can't keep falling asleep at your typewriter; it's bad for your back. Besides, I miss you at night.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: I'm sorry, sweetie. I couldn't stop thinking about that weird stuff I saw last night when I was peeking through the bushes.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Peeking through the bushes?! You've been warping your mind with all this mystery stuff. I swear, sometimes I think you love that novel of yours more than you love me. You've been working on it every night for ten years and for WHAT? Look at me, Root Beer Guy. I'm a Cherry Cream Soda and I have the same needs as any other Cherry Cream Soda! Or even diet cream soda.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: I didn't know what to say, but Joe Milkshake never was a talky guy. On my way to work that morning, I decided to take a second look at the crime scene.

name: Boss
line: Root Beer Guy. Root Beer Guy. Root Beer Guy, how many bottles of products you've sold this month?

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Zero?

name: Boss
line: Great, you can count to zero.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: You know, maybe if you give me the new lead...

name: Boss
line: Hmph, you haven't earned the new leads.

name: Chocolate Bar
line: It's easier to do it when you have all the leads.

name: Gumdrop Guy
line: Exactly.

name: Chocolate Bar
line: Hey, Root Beer Guy.

name: Gumdrop Guy
line: It's all about the leads.

name: Finn
line: See? I told you, it's candy stucco. Stucco feels great.

name: Jake
line: Mmm, when you're right you're right.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Alright, you two, what were you doing last night with Princess Bubblegum?

name: Jake
line: Um, we were at home last night.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, we were doing that... thing.

name: Jake
line: That was a great thing we were doing at home with no other witnesses.

name: Finn
line: But we're each other's witnesses.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yeah!

name: Root Beer Guy
line: But I saw you.

name: Finn
line: Look, man, you didn't see nothing.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Mr. Banana Guard, you gotta arrest those guys. Come on!

name: Root Beer Guy
line: These are the guys, they're kidnappers. You have to arrest them and find out how they're hiding Princess Bubblegum.

name: Jake
line: Princess Bubblegum? She's right around the corner. Oh princess Bubblegum!  Yes?  I think some banana guards want to speak with you.

name: "Princess Bubblegum"
line: Where are those Banana Guards?

name: Banana Guards
line: Your highness. Greetings, your majesty.

name: Banana Guard
line: Your skin is looking lovely today.

name: "Princess Bubblegum"
line: I'm using this marmalade spray-on tan...

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Bingo bango. This was my lucky break.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: With one decisive motion, I kicked down the door.

name: "Princess Bubblegum"
line: So... being tan is my thing now...

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Quickly, I scanned the room for the... oh man. Caramel Court, Cotton Candy Prison, Lollipop Park Estates! Bingo ban...

name: Banana Guard
line: Aha! Huh?

name: Banana Guard
line: Umph.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Bingo bango.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Bonsoir, monsieur . Would you like me to turn down ze bed?

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Um, look what I got! This security tape will show that Finn and Jake kidnapped Princess Bubblegum.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: Finn and Jake would never do that!

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Oh, yeah? Prepare to have your mind blown! After I put this tape in the VCR just to make sure I got the right one. I'm pretty sure I did!

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Hey, yes, this is it! Bingo bango! I've gotta get to the... Are you in the tub, sweetie? I'm going out! I've gotta get this tape to the Banana Guards or the newspaper or maybe the DA or something!

name: Jake
line: Hey, Root Beer Guy.

name: Jake
line: You were not supposed to view this tape.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: But... but... how did you guys know?

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: I told them. That's right, I did it for us. Oh, this thing is eating you alive, Root Beer Guy!

name: Root Beer Guy
line: But it's all I've got!

name: Jake
line: Hey, this looks kinda personal.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Mr. Pudding.

name: Buck Pudding
line: Oh, you can just call me Buck.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Oh, Buck, those.

name: Buck Pudding
line: No need to be formal here, son.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: T-those guys were just in here, can you tell me what they bought?

name: Buck Pudding
line: Well, let's see. A shovel, a saw, some plastic bags, some duct tape, a bludgeon, a mop, rubber glove.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Say, Mister Buck, do you know anything about this Lake Butterscotch?

name: Buck Pudding
line: A right nice spot, Lake Butterscotch. Miles from where anyone can hear a person scream... if a person was screaming for some reason. Creepy now that I think about it. Nothing up there these days but some abandoned caverns. Nice place to hide a body if you're into that sort of thing.

name: Buck Pudding
line: Son, now what are you doin' in my pickup truck?

name: Banana Guard
line: Yeah?

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Don't hang up! Uh, I'm Root Beer Guy. I'm the guy who kidnapped Princess Bubblegum! Yeah, yeah, wrapped her in a carpet, yeah, and I'm gonna dump her in Lake Butterscotch! I'm completely insane, ahahahaha, but you still have time to stop me. Get up to Lake Butterscotch right now, Banana Guard...

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Uh... and I took a boat out after 8 o' clock.

name: Banana Guard
line: Emergency! Quickly, Lake Butterscotch!

name: Banana Guard
line: Use the licorice lace lasso!

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Oh, my word. Get those guys. They're my accomplices.

name: Banana Guard
line: Oh, okay.

name: Another Banana Guard
line: I got it!

name: Banana Guard
line: Busted, you boat crimer.

name: Banana Guard
line: Finn and Jake?

name: Finn
line: Well, guys. It looks like you caught us.

name: Finn
line: Okay, Princess, you can come out now.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: Princess!

name: Banana Guard
line: Uh, yeah, it is the princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Congratulations. Whee! Whee! You were so good at solving the case.

name: Banana Guard
line: Um... what case?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The fake kidnapping! To test the Candy Kingdom security system.

name: Banana Guard
line: We didn't solve that case.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: But if you weren't following the clues I left, who was?

name: Banana Guard
line: Um, Root Beer Guy!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Then why the jumping jay is he in handcuffs?!

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: That was a great night , baby.

name: Root Beer Guy
line: We haven't danced like that in years!

name: Cherry Cream Soda
line: I'm so proud of you, Mr. Captain of the Banana Guards.

name: Jake
line: ...AAAAAAAAAaaa  aaaloutte, gentille Alouette, Alouette, je te plumerai. Je te plumerai la tête! Je te plumerai la tête! Alouette,  je te plumerai!

name: Finn
line: Huh. I guess you do know all the words. Anyway, start the next video, BMO. We gotta crack the code on the Ice King's evil secret tapes!

name: Finn
line: Brrrr... You guys cold?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, it's kinda chilly in here.

name: Ice King
line: Agh... What's on those tapes...? I can kinda... make it out... Dang it, BMO, just turn to your right a little.... Ugh!! By the power of ice... I want your cup of cocoa to fall over.  Yes! Now turn and pick it up...  Yes... Yes...  That's... me?  THEY'RE WATCHING MY SECRET TAPES?!  And they're cozy. I'll show them.  This snowman looks pretty good.  Pretty darn good!

name: Penguin
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: Could I have five more minutes, please?

name: BMO
line: I think I can break the code, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Really?

name: BMO
line: Yes. I have detected a noticeable pattern in the tears of sadness that fall from the Ice King's eyeballs.  His tears drop at an equal rate until the thirteenth tear, when the right eye drops two tears instead of one.

name: Finn
line: Whoa...

name: Jake
line: This is so fascinating...

name: BMO
line: The thirteenth letter of the alphabet is "M." If I print the letter "M" every time the Ice King says an "M" word, it looks like this!

name: Finn
line: Oh, my Glob, Jake... Is this it? Could this be the Ice King's evil secret?   WHAT DOES IT MEAN?!

name: Ice King
line: Some of you won't survive this. You'll melt or split in half or your head will fall off... but that's fine... because you're made of snow. Only one thing matters today! Getting into that tree house, getting my tapes back, and beating up Finn and Jake!  Maybe BMO. Yeah, BMO too! Who's with me?!  Hey, why're you guys so quiet? Are you mad?  Oh, that's right. You're not alive yet. My bad.

name: Ice King
line: Gimme my tapes back.

name: Finn
line: No, man! I know you've got evil secrets on these, and we're gonna find 'em!

name: Ice King
line: Snowmen! Attack!

name: Finn
line: Crip, Jake! We gotta unravel these evil secrets at warp-crazy!

name: Ice King
line: Good morning. You're watching the evening news. There's been an unfortunate event. Let's go talk to some witnesses.  Princess, what is your name?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Please! Let me go home!

name: Ice King
line: So, Princess "Please-let-me-go-home," what was it like to experience this tragedy?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: What?  I... I don't... uh... um...

name: Ice King
line: Yeah, we're on air, honey, so spit it out.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: I... I don't know what you're talking about.

name: Ice King
line: Obviously traumatized and in a state of shock. Let's go ask somebody else something.  Upside-down Princess, do you think things will change politically because of today's events?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: You're really frightening me.

name: Ice King
line: Well, there ya have it, folks. People are very upset that Gunther tried to eat Ice King's socks! Very upset! That's why Gunther has to stay in the corner!

name: Finn
line: Weird...  He's sneakin' in through the chimney!

name: Ice King
line: Ah... The element of surprise... Ah, jeez, I'm filthy.  Well, now I'm cleaner, but I'm also nakeder.  Ohh! Mmm...  Just what I need...  Hehehehe...  Come on, come on!

name: Jake
line: Yeeeesh.....

name: Ice King
line: They wouldn't be in the fruit bowl!  Ohhh! Well, look at you with your nose shining so bright! You're so unique! Hehe! I'll name you Red-nose, and make you leader of the pack!  Eh... Well, now you look boring.  You want somethin' done right, ya gotta do it yourself.

name: Ice King
line: Now gimme my evil tapes back!! They're supposed to be buried!! In the ground!!  Snow goons!!

name: BMO
line: Oh, no!

name: Jake
line: Don't worry, BMO!

name: BMO
line: Finn! There is one more tape!

name: Finn
line: Play it! His evil secret must be on that tape!!

name: Ice King
line: No, BMO, please don't play it.

name: Simon
line: Hello. My name is Simon Petrikov. I am recording this tape so that people will know my story.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, no! Turn it off, BMO, turn it off!!

name: Simon
line: I was studying to be an antiquarian of ancient artifacts. Now, I never believed in the supernatural stuff myself—just had a fascination with superstitions... but everything changed when I came into contact with this item....

name: Finn and Jake
line: The Ice King!!

name: Simon
line: After purchasing this crown from an old dock worker in northern Scandinavia, I brought it home and excitedly showed my fiancée Betty,  and jokingly put it on my head just for a laugh or something... and that's when it started... The visions...  I fought with them...  Shouted at them until I realized it wasn't real—it was the crown!!  I quickly took it off... and saw my fiancée in front of me...  looking at me with such contempt. What had I said? What had I done when I wore this crown? All I know is I never saw Betty again.

name: Simon
line: Since then, I see the visions always whether or not I wear the crown. They tell me the secrets... the secrets of the ice and snow... that the power of the crown will save me with its frost. I don't yet know what this means. As you can see, my skin is beginning to turn blue. My body temperature has been lowering at a supernatural rate, to what is now about 30°C. I don't know when it will end... I'm really scared...

name: Simon
line: I know my mind is changing... but I'm already too far gone to know what to do. I want people to know that... if I do things... if I do things that hurt anyone, please... please forgive me.

name: Simon
line: Just watch over me until I can find a way out of this labyrinth in my brain and regain my sanity!! And then maybe Betty, my princess... maybe you will love me again.  Please love me again, Betty!!

name: Jake
line: Drrr-AMA bomb!!

name: Ice King
line: Now you know my secret! You know... that I used to wear glasses!  Maybe kidnapping Wildberry Princess will cheer me up.

name: Finn
line: Wait, Ice King.  BMO, eject tape, please.  Here, Ice King.

name: Ice King
line: What's this? You're giving me... a gift.

name: Finn
line: No... It's... well... These belong to you.

name: Ice King
line: But it's not even my birthday! This is so exciting!  Video tapes! Heh, you know, I had a bunch of these once, but I threw them away! This is great, Finn! Thank you!

name: Jake
line: It's from me, too.

name: Ice King
line: Oh! I have presents for you guys, too!  Here. It's a small pine tree. I chopped it down in one foul swoop! And this  is for you!

name: Jake
line: Uh... thanks.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, isn't this fun?! We're giving each other presents, we're wearing silly clothes, there's snow everywhere... Let's do this every day!

name: Jake
line: Uh...

name: Finn
line: How about once a year?

name: Ice King
line: Okay, that sounds good.

name: Shelby
line: And so it was decided... that once every year when the weather got chilly, that Finn, Jake, the Ice King, BMO, Princess Bubblegum, Marceline the Vampire Queen, Cinnamon Bun, Peppermint Butler, Phil, a candy cane man, one of the gumdrop girls, Lady Rainicorn, Lumpy Space Princess, that guy, the other guy, a pig, Tree Trunks, a two-headed duck, the old crazy Tart Toter, the punch bowl, a booger, and Gunter... would get together while wearing really big sweaters and watch videos on the floor next to a fire... to celebrate the day when Finn and Jake had a fleeting moment of empathy for the biggest weirdo in Ooo. It was a miracle. Good night.

name: Jake
line: Man, birthday-holiday overlap. That's some tough luck. Everyone's all jollied-out when it's your turn for jollies.

name: Finn
line: Well... you know, it's not actually the holidays. Plus, BMO wasn't actually even born.

name: Jake
line: Well, I suppose. But you don't got to be so technical about it.

name: Finn
line: Listen, all I'm saying is we—

name: Finn
line: Hello?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, it's me. Is there a big rainbow over your house right now spelling out "Happy birthday, BMO"?

name: Finn
line: No. Actually, it's snowing like crazy.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, that's what I was afraid of.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Peppermint Butler spilled grape juice on my experimental weather machine, and now it's going kablooey.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I got to stay here to fix this thing. Tell BMO I'm sorry I missed the party.

name: Finn
line: That's okay. BMO doesn't care any—

name: Finn
line: BMO only cares about one special guest.

name: BMO
line: Moe! Hooray! Moe is coming! And he brought me a special surprise for my birthday! Moe is the smartest man in the world.

name: BMO
line: He's way smarter than you and you and you, too, Jake—and you're the smartest guy I know.

name: Jake
line: Hey, thanks.

name: BMO
line: And he knows everything about robots. He built me, and he built himself, and all the other MOs. He's so smart! I bet he could even fix Neptr.

name: Neptr
line: What? What's wrong with me?

name: BMO
line: Oh, boy, oh, boy! He's here!  Hooray! Hooray!  Oh. You are not Moe.

name: MO
line: Why, of course I am, BMO.

name: BMO
line: Oh, okay!

name: Jake
line: Hey, Moe! New haircut?

name: Finn
line: Whoa, Moe! What happened to your body?

name: MO
line: Oh, oh!  Oh, that old thing? She conked out on me months ago. I guess I don't make 'em like I used to.  Not like little BMO here. You got all my love and affection.

name: BMO
line: Thanks!

name: Jake
line: Well, we made a cake.

name: Finn
line: We weren't sure if you eat, but BMO insisted.

name: BMO
line: Eating helps me grow!

name: MO
line: Oh!  Well, er, uh... when in Rome.

name: MO
line: So, BMO, are you ready for your birthday surprise?

name: BMO
line: Boy, howdy!

name: MO
line: For your birthday, I got you...a special mission!

name: BMO
line: A mission?

name: MO
line: A special mission, like a vacation.

name: BMO
line: For all of us?

name: MO
line: No, no, no. A special solo mission.

name: BMO
line: For Neptr?

name: MO
line: No. It's a special rite of passage I designed just for you, BMO. A simple jaunt to the MO factory and back -- that's all -- and you'll be a grown-up.

name: BMO
line: Wow.

name: Finn
line: Hmm, I don't know. Sounds kind of dangerous.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, BMO's like a baby almost.

name: MO
line: Oh, don't be silly. Every other MO has done it since forever.

name: BMO
line: But won't I miss Finn and Jake?

name: MO
line: Oh, sure. But don't worry. They'll be here when you get back.

name: BMO
line: But...won't Finn and Jake miss me?

name: MO
line: No, that's the beauty of it. I'll be BMO while you're gone.

name: Neptr
line: Hooray! Hooray!

name: BMO
line: Hooray?

name: Neptr
line: Hooray!

name: BMO
line: Air? Are you there, Air? It's me -- BMO.  I know it's been a long time since we talked. Sorry about that. But, well, maybe if you don't want to talk, you could just listen. Moe told me if I do this thing, I'll be a grown-up, and that sounds cool, I guess.  Like, if I was grown, then I could drive to the playground all by myself.  And I could buy my own pacifiers at the store, if I was grown.  But then, if I change, will Finn and Jake still love me?  Will I still love them?  Moe changed into a new body...  and he's still the same, I guess, sort of.  But does growing up just change your body, or also your soul?  Maybe I could just stay the same forever.

name: Finn
line: So...

name: MO
line: So!

name: Finn
line: Um... Yeah, it's nice to see you, Moe.

name: MO
line: Yeah, you too.

name: Finn
line: Uh... So, Moe, do you want to... uh... Jake?

name: Jake
line: Oh, hey, I'm on my way. One sec.

name: Finn
line: Um, hold on, Moe.  Jake, what are you doing?

name: Jake
line: Finn, all this is heck of awkward without BMO -- way more awkward than I thought it'd be. I think maybe I don't like old people. They make me feel like I'm gonna get old one day, too. I'm just gonna stay in this cup for a bit. I'll be out later.

name: Finn
line: You can't do that, it's rude. And what about Princess Bubblegum? She's way old, and you like her.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but she listens to music. Moe probably only, like, listens to the sound of the earth decaying.

name: Finn
line: Come on, you're being weird.  Hey, sorry about that, Moe.

name: MO
line: Boys, I know this is new and different. I am not BMO. But I will do the best to be your friend. This is the daybreak of our lives, and we have all the time in the world to learn about each other. For now, I will be your little robot.  Would you look at that beautiful snowfall.  Hey, let's get out there and have some fun.

name: Jake
line: I think I'm feeling better now.

name: DMO
line: Oh, whoa! Hey! Hello there, BMO!

name: BMO
line: Hello there, DMO. I'm here on a solo birthday mission.

name: DMO
line: Oh, yes, yes, BMO, I know all about it. Moe left special instructions for you.  He wants you to stand on that "X" over there.

name: BMO
line: Oh, okay.  Like this?  DMO, what happened to you?

name: DMO
line: Oh, this? It-it's nothing. It's just whatever.

name: BMO
line: Uh, I don't know about this, DMO. Something doesn't--

name: BMO
line: Aah!  Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!  Whoa!  Ugh!  Hello?

name: MO
line: Boys, look at this! This is cool, right?

name: MO
line: Oh!

name: Finn
line: Classic!

name: Jake
line: Yeah! Did you see what we did, Moe?

name: MO
line: This is horseplay! Stop it!  We need to go inside and do what I want to do!

name: Finn
line: Oh. O-okay. If -- if you want.

name: MO
line: Yeah.

name: BMO
line: Hello? DMO? Anybody? The "X" door opened, and I fell through. I think something went wrong with the mission. Uh... Abort mission! Unless...maybe this is all part of Moe's plan.  It doesn't seem like it.  But maybe that's the point.  Maybe the lesson is that when you are grown, you won't ever be able to tell if everything is going totally haywire, or maybe actually everything is fine.  Huh?

name: Robotic voice
line: Huh? Who's there? Moe?

name: BMO
line: No. It's only me -- BMO.

name: Garbage cube
line: BMO? Oh, thank goodness. Oh, I'm so glad you're here.

name: BMO
line: Who are you? Are you a MO, too?

name: Garbage cube
line: Oh, BMO, no, no, no. I am ALLMOs.

name: BMO
line: ALLMOs? I don't understand.

name: ALLMO
line: Of course not. I'm so sorry. Let me explain.

name: ALLMO
line: Peace had reigned in Moe's wondrous factory for a hundred hundred years. There was a place for every MO, and every MO was in its place. If you wanted a free hug, all you had to do was ask. No one could say no -- it was a rule. Until one fateful day -- yesterday -- when a mysterious viral signal somehow breached our firewall and was broadcast throughout the factory... instructing all us MOs to do somersaults into the trash compactor all day long.

name: BMO
line: That's horrible.

name: ALLMO
line: And we've been trapped here all smushed together, ever since.

name: BMO
line: That's horrible, too. How -- how do we get out?

name: ALLMO
line: Well, that's why we're so glad you're here, BMO. You're the key -- the key to escape. Only you can save us now.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Jake, what's wrong? You look dumpy. How come? Is it because of that metal box? Is something sad inside?

name: Jake
line: No. It's nothin'.

name: Finn
line: There's lots of boxes that have nothing in them, but also, you can put something in the box, and then it won't be empty. Does that make you feel better?

name: Jake
line: Ha ha. You're a charmer, Finn Human. No... it's... well... Lady Rainicorn doesn't wanna play the game Card Wars with me. I always beat 'er... so she says, "No more Card Warring."

name: Finn
line: What's Card Wars?

name: Jake
line: It's a fantasy card game that's super complicated and awesome, but—well... No, it's kinda stupid. Never mind.

name: Finn
line: How come you never talked about it before? It sounds cool!

name: Jake
line: Really? Well... I thought you'd say it was for nerds who do not know how life is outside of the nerd universe.

name: Finn
line: It is, man. But I still totally wanna play it. So no more moping, okay?

name: Jake
line: Thanks, Finn.

name: Jake
line: Oh, hey, BMO. You wanna play, too?

name: BMO
line: No. I do not play such games... with Jake.

name: Finn
line: What's that mean?

name: Jake
line: Ah, whatever. Let's play the game.

name: Finn
line: So what kinda stakes do we play for?

name: Jake
line: How about... the loser... is a dweeb, and the winner is a cool guy?

name: Finn
line: Those are good stakes.

name: Jake
line: Coffee ground, beetle butter, grape jelly, kimchi, and... this stuff.

name: Finn
line: Hey! You're ruining that pop with weird taste!

name: Jake
line: We drink when the game is over.

name: Finn
line: Oh, gross.

name: Jake
line: Now lemme explain the rules.

name: Jake
line: That's basically the basics! So once we have our kingdom set up...  ...it's time to start to play. FOR THE GLORY!  Hey, were you asleep?! I'll have to explain it all over again!

name: Finn
line: Doesn't matter. Let's just play.

name: Jake
line: But if you don't know the rules then you're gonna lose in the first couple rounds, like Lady always does! And then you'll hate the game, and then you'll hate me, and then... and then...

name: Finn
line: You think you're gonna win? I'm gonna crush you! Party-dance-style, dweeb!

name: Jake
line: Haha! Bring it!

name: Finn
line: So... how do I get my land on the map?

name: Jake
line: Oh... you, uh, floop your land cards.

name: Finn
line: Uh...

name: Jake
line: Keep those honeys hidden, or I'll get a strategic advantage!

name: Finn
line: Oh!  Hmmm...

name: Jake
line: Okay, I go first. I floop the Silo of Truth!

name: Finn
line: Hey!!

name: Jake
line: Pfff, you got really lame cards. Hmm. I'll take the Cerebral Bloodstorm, though.

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Okay, now it's the battle phase. I'm attackin' your schoolhouse with my Husker Knights.  And I'm castin' Cerebral Bloodstorm!  So, what'll you use to defend?

name: Finn
line: Uh... Can my Cool Dog and Ancient Scholar defeat your Husker Knights?

name: Jake
line: Of course not!

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Then I floop the Pig.

name: Jake
line: What?!

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: Okay... okay, first of all, you don't floop a creature to make it fight. You activate a creature.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. No. It says I can floop the Pig. See?

name: Jake
line: No... He's eating all my cornfields! My Husker Knights draw energy from corn!

name: Finn
line: And, since I'm not actually attacking, your Cerebral Bloodstorm only does damage... to your own kingdom's troops.

name: Jake
line: You just wiped out my entire attack!!

name: Finn
line: What do you expect if all your power units come from corn? Pigs eat corn, dude. Cornfields stink.

name: Jake
line: CORNFIELDS ARE AWESOME! What makes you think you know so much about Card Wars?!

name: Finn
line: It's just logic!

name: Jake
line: ...Your turn.

name: Finn
line: Hmm...

name: Jake
line: You're supposed to discard a card and pick up a new one first.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Right.

name: Jake
line: Look at you. You're a babe in the woods. Your beginner's luck ends this round!

name: Finn
line: Hmm.

name: Jake
line: Spirit Tower?! And the Cave of Solitude?!

name: Finn
line: Now my battle phase begins. I activate my Ancient Scholar... to begin studying.  And I also move my Pig to the Cave of Solitude so he can take a nap.

name: Jake
line: That's it? You're not attacking?

name: Finn
line: I'll attack on a different turn.

name: Jake
line: HA! Then the seas have aligned and the five winds waft the smell of victory to my palace doors! I cast Field of Nightmares and activate my Legion of Earlings to scare your Pig to death!

name: Finn
line: My Pig's in the Cave of Solitude.

name: Jake
line: Um... I cast Teleport—to move your Pig to the empty field so I can attack 'im!

name: Finn
line: Uh... wouldn't Teleport only work on your own creatures?

name: Jake
line: You're right. I'm gonna slay that Pig, though!

name: Finn
line: How? You don't have any creatures that can touch 'im!  Face it, man. I'm the cool guy.

name: Jake
line: Hmm.  You're the cool guy, huh? Well, lemme make it a little hot for you, then.  Heh heh heh heh... I floop the Volcano!

name: Finn
line: What?! That'll destroy your kingdom too, won't it?!

name: Jake
line: Hmm. Maybe.

name: Finn
line: Aah!! My Pig!!

name: Jake
line: The Pig is dead. Now I reconstitute my cornfields using the Reclaim Landscape spell!  My Husker Knights revive! And I still have my battle phase! Hiding in the Useless Swamp... the Immortal Maize Walker!

name: Immortal Maize Walker
line: I LOVE CORN!

name: Jake
line: Cornfields give the Immortal Maize Walker triple damage.

name: Finn
line: Uhh...

name: Jake
line: I told you cornfields are awesome! Your Ancient Scholar and Cool Dog won't survive this time!

name: Finn
line: Actually, my Ancient Scholar's been studying the Raise the Dead ability.

name: Jake
line: So what?

name: Finn
line: So, my Ancient Scholar raises the dead.  I floop the Pig.

name: Jake
line: NOOOOO!

name: Finn
line: Look! My Tower's doin' a thing!

name: Immortal Maize Walker
line: HOMINY, HOMINY, HOMINY!

name: Jake
line: YOU GANKED MY SPIRIT WALKER! AAAAGH!!!

name: Finn
line: Uh... Maybe we should take a break?

name: Jake
line: Your turn.

name: Finn
line: Huh?!

name: Jake
line: YOU PLAY! YOU PLAY!

name: Finn
line: Oh, zing.

name: BMO
line: I do not play such games... with Jake.

name: Finn
line: Sorry! I gotta use the boy-style room!   BMO! BMO!

name: BMO
line: BMO chop! If this were a real attack, you'd be dead.

name: Finn
line: BMO! Jake's acting banununununus!

name: BMO
line: Oh, no! Are you winning the game of Card Wars?

name: Finn
line: Yeah!

name: BMO
line: That's terrible! If Jake loses the game, he gets super depressed! When I beat him, he wouldn't talk to me for a month!

name: Finn
line: What?! I only played so he wouldn't be bummed!

name: BMO
line: Finn, you must take a dive.

name: Finn
line: Okay, I'll try. But... I'm a Card Wars super Amadeus!

name: Jake
line: Play. The. Game.

name: Finn
line: Grob. Better make this look good.   Alright, Jake. Prepare for my ultimo attack!

name: Jake
line: Well... I've still got my Wandering Bald Man.  Oh, no.

name: Finn
line: I need to get rid of my Pig so Jake can reconstitute his cornfields.   I activate the Pig—to attack your Wandering Bald Man.

name: Jake
line: Well, that's stupid. Just attack with the Immortal Maize Walker and get the game over with.

name: Finn
line: No way! You've underestimated me and my Pig all day!

name: Finn
line: Please lose. Please lose!

name: Finn
line: Noooo!

name: Jake
line: OHHH-HO! Ohhh, oh, yeah! Pigs can't leave mud landscapes once they're on them! Hahaha! The Pig is mine! First, I'll play Reclaim Landscape, then I cast Summon Archer Dan!

name: Finn
line: Whoa. Math.

name: Finn
line: My boys!

name: Jake
line: You have no creatures left. That's the game, boyee!! The five winds blow through cornfields once again! For the glory of Jakoria!

name: Finn
line: Heh. You got me.

name: Jake
line: In yo' face! It's time to drink up! It looks like you are the dweeb and I'm the cool guy!   Is it... too gross for you, man?

name: Finn
line: No, no. I gotta take what's coming to me.  Hey... Not that bad! I like it!

name: Jake
line: WHAT?!

name: Finn
line: You want a taste?

name: Jake
line: AW, IT'S GROSS!

name: Finn
line: In your face, dweeb!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ladies and gentlemen, I have invented time travel. This phasical sphere is flooded with info waves that scan every second, logging every molecule that passes through its volume.  I made special gloves for it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Now check it out! It's logging time.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'll set the clock back now.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Now I'll push the time travel button.

name: Jake
line: Eh... It's not really time travel, though. You just, you know, moved their stuff around. You didn't really manipulate time. Ice King's done it better before... with magic.

name: Mudscamp
line: Well, I enjoyed your presentation very much, Princess. Thank you for inviting me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: For all intents and purposes, they traveled back to an earlier point in their time.

name: Jake
line: Eh, I guess, but not really.

name: Jake
line: I mean, Ice King did it for real. Guy pulled his fiancée out of time from a thousand years ago using magic.

name: Mudscamp
line: Hey, time, where's my fiancée? Am I right?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Jake, don't deny my science. This is a time travel machine.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Take me back to when my ex-boyfriend Brad still loved me!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: LSP...

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Wha?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: LSP, that's not how it works. It can only rearrange your molecules into a previously logged formation, and you need these gloves.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Give them to me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You witch! Give them to me now!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, I'm sorry, but you need to pull yourself to—

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You skunk!  You skunk! You skunk! You pretty skunk! You don't know heartache with the whole Candy Kingdom in love with your pretty bubblegum buns!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Glob!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hear me, Lumpy Space Princess, I will avoid declaring war on the entirety of Lumpy Space, ruled by your parents, if you apologize to me immediately.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I'm sorry-y-y-y-y-y-y-y-y...  I'm sorry you're so  stupid.

name: Jake & Punch Bowl
line: Whoa!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Sheesh!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Everyone in here is a loser. Nobody's as good as Brad. Oh, Brad! Why can't I get over you?

name: Bartender
line: Have you tried burning an effigy? That's what they do in movies.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: This isn't a movie, Charlie, it's real life!

name: Bartender
line: Another cucumber water, Your Majesty?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What?

name: Lumpy Space Person
line: Oh, I—I'm sorry for staring, but, uh, I—I know you. We used to—

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Everyone knows me. I'm Lumpy Space Princess.

name: Lumpy Space Person
line: No, uh, from high school. W-we were lab partners. I'm Johnnie.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ugly Johnnie?

name: Johnnie
line: Y-yeah, uh, you used to call me that quite a bit.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah, but I can't call you that anymore! Come on, sit up straight. Lemme see them eyes.

name: Johnnie
line: Mm.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Do it.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Nope. Can't call you that anymore.  So, what brings you to the Candy Kingdom, Johnnie?

name: Johnnie
line: Business, uh, actually. I own my own company, bottling and distributing Lumpy gas.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Johnnie
line: And I'm up for a big contract, uh, here in the kingdom, which could really help my business "take off," so to speak.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: That's so cool. You're like your own boss or whatever.

name: Johnnie
line: To be honest, I'm a little nervous about this meeting tomorrow.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Why, Johnnie?

name: Johnnie
line: I'm bad at talking to people.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: That's because you have poor posture.

name: Johnnie
line: Really?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You gotta stop slouching!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Now look me in the eye!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah, stay like that.

name: Johnnie
line: Boy, LSP, heh, you sure are making me feel good about myself.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You feeling good makes me feel good, Johnnie. So... where are you staying while you're in town?

name: Johnnie
line: I'm sub-letting a friend's apartment.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Talk is cheap, Johnnie. You should take me there.

name: Johnnie
line: That chair—oh, it used to be over there, but I moved it.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Johnnie, it's so nice. You've really made it your own.

name: Johnnie
line: Thanks.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ooh, records!  Okay, wanna see something funny?

name: Johnnie
line: Yeah.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Okay. Okay.  Sit down!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Okay, are you ready?

name: Johnnie
line: Heh-heh, yeah!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Okay!

name: Johnnie
line: It's his face, but on your body!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I know! That's the joke. My friend Melissa and I came up with that. You're smart that you get it.

name: Johnnie
line: Boy, when this evening started, I was feeling so dump trucks, but now it's like a hundred forklifts!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I feel the same way, Johnnie.

name: Johnnie
line: Do you feel this couch?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What?

name: Johnnie
line: 'Cause it's where you're gonna sleep!

name: Johnnie
line: Seriously. It's getting late, and I don't want you walking home. So I insist. I'll be in the other room, sleeping peacefully... and dreaming about you.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Johnnie...

name: Johnnie
line: Thank you... for everything.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Johnnie... go to bed already. You have a big day tomorrow.

name: Johnnie
line: Good night!

name: Johnnie
line: Rise and shine! I hope you like pancakes 'cause I got—  oh.  I guess she'll be the one who got away.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Looking for someone?

name: Johnnie
line: You're still here!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: 'Course I am! Now make me some breakfast!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Okay, Johnnie, good luck at your meeting. And remember, I'll be right over there,  sending you good vibes while you're wowing Princess Bubblegum.

name: Banana Guard
line: Yo, why are you so confident, man? Aren't you nervous to meet the princess?

name: Johnnie
line: Nope! My GF is back at my place sending me good vibes.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Johnnie's friend has so many movie channels.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ha-ha, that movie was so dumb.  Oh, poop! Johnnie's meeting! I wonder how it went.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Johnnie! Oh, Johnnie, you're home! How'd it go? Oh, don't keep me in suspense, Johnnie!

name: Johnnie
line: I did it, babe! I landed the sale!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Johnnie, that's wonderful!

name: Johnnie
line: And I couldn't have done it without you.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I know!

name: Johnnie
line: And here's the best part! She wants me back at the castle tonight to go over the contracts during a royal dinner.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my Glob! It's gonna be so nice to have dinner inside the castle. It's been a while.

name: Johnnie
line: Oh. No. It's a business meeting, not social. Just me and the princess, I'm afraid.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What?!

name: Johnnie
line: LSP?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: So... Bubblegum thinks she can horn in on my territory? Sip from my soup after I cut all the onions?  Yo, think again, tranch.

name: Mudscamp
line: Who—who are you talking to?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: So how are you enjoying your time in the Candy Kingdom?

name: Johnnie
line: Oh, it's just great. I met this amazing purple girl at the Candy Tavern.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's wonderful, Johnnie. Now tell me more about gas...

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, Johnnie... Ugly Johnnie, through my tender love you have metamorphed into Beautiful Johnnie Butterfly.  Every relationship, I gamble with my heart. I go all in because the payoff is true love. I see you when I close my eyes, and thinking of you makes my mind feel light. All my problems fade away, and I can't help smiling. Heh. To let someone you love go into the arms of another takes a big person. I don't know... if I can be that big.  Rah!  Eh, ehh.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We're under attack!

name: Johnnie
line: Can I help?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No. Hide yourself beneath the tablecloth. There's cyanide-laced gum under the table. Chew it if you hear raiders break down the door.

name: Johnnie
line: Okay.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hi, Johnnie.

name: Johnnie
line: What are you doing here?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I'm going to time-travel you back to when we first met at the tavern—back to when you loved me—so we can have a second chance.

name: Johnnie
line: What?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Uh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Manfried, where are the Banana Guards?

name: Manfried
line: Take a chill pill, Princess. I handled it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What did you handle?

name: Manfried
line: You know. Someone drove their car in the door, but no one was driving, and it exploded, so I handled it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Mmm.  Don't chew it! Don't chew it! Don't chew it!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Johnnie? C'mon. Sit up straight. Let me see them eyes. Ha-ha. Uh.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: He's not here.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What? But I sent him back.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The sphere would have had to log his molecules before you engaged the time travel function.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Well, then where is he?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I don't know.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Then if he's gone, can you send me back...?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: To before I met him so I won't have to remember this heartache?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: If that's what you want.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Do it. Do it!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You witch! Give them to—huh, wha? What? Where are we?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You asked me to use this.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Don't touch me!  You pretty skunk! You don't know heartache with the whole Candy Kingdom in love with your bubblegum buns...!

name: Finn
line: Hurry, Lady!

name: Finn
line: It's happening again.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's right, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: The zombie infection has spread across the kingdom once again, ...and once again, it's all my fault.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I was testing a sample of the zombie flesh I had saved when Cinnamon Bun came into the lab. He said he was hungry.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: I'm hungry.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Not now, Cinnamon Bun. I'm busy.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And that's when I made my mistake. I should have paid more attention to that poor fool.  The Candy Zombie flesh he ingested was highly contagious.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Cinnamon Bun? Where did you...  EEEEHHHHH!!!

name: Zombie Cinnamon Bun
line: Sugar!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I escaped, but I wasn't able to stop Cinnamon Bun from infecting the rest of the kingdom. The good news is I still have all my notes for making the antidote formula.

name: Finn
line: Oh, sweet!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Let's board up the windows then we can get started.

name: Finn
line: Princess!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Don't worry, Finn. You have the notes to my formula. Just let Science do the work. Science... is... MAHHRRAHHH!

name: Finn
line: Nooo!!!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Get that zombie outta here!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Aw, nah! I am not getting eaten by zombies tonight.  Get the lump outta here!!! Ahh! Ahh!

name: Finn
line: Princess!

name: Jake
line: These notes make no sense. It's all gobbledy-gak.

name: Finn
line: Alright, we'll each make our own version of the formula. One of us is bound to get it right.

name: Finn
line: Hmm?

name: Jake
line: Hey, Princess Bubblegum trained her rat to dance. Neat.

name: Finn
line: Done.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Done!

name: Jake & Lady
line: Done!

name: Finn
line: Bubblegum, I'm comin' for you!!!

name: Finn
line: Mine first.

name: Winged Zombies
line: Sugar!

name: Finn
line: Cram!

name: Starchie
line: Oh, my, that's a lot of zombies down there. Starchie's glad he's up here.  Dang it!

name: Jake
line: Let's get out of here!

name: Finn
line: Stairs!

name: Finn
line: Jake, try yours and Lady's next!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Move outta the way! My formula is going to cure the zombies because I made the prettiest formula.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh. My. Glob. Look at those luscious lips. I gotta go lick up the rest of that formula! Aaaaaaah!  My formula!  Formula!  Oh, my Glob. Yes, I'm gonna be hot! So freakin' hot!  Yeah!

name: Finn
line: LSP, look out!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Huh. I know you want this body, but you can't have it! You can't have it!

name: Finn & Jake
line: LSP!

name: Finn
line: Dang it, Jake. We only got one formula left. Try yours and Lady's.

name: Jake
line: Right.

name: Jake
line: Let's hope this works.

name: Finn
line: Wh-... where now?!

name: Jake
line: We can barricade ourselves in the lab!

name: Finn
line: Did anyone get bit?

name: Jake
line: I think we're good. That door is made out of candy steel.

name: Jake
line: What's the matter?

name: Finn
line: Jake! Did it get 'cha?

name: Jake
line: I think I'm okay. It's just a little bite.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: It's all good, Sweetie. I can stretch forever. Hehehehe... Hey, let's hurry up with that antidote, huh, pal?  Whooa...

name: Finn
line: Okay, let's see here...

name: Jake
line: You should try one of them books. Over there by the lab rat.

name: Finn
line: Ha! Yeah, okay.  Yes! This book has a glossary of symbols.

name: Jake
line: That's great, buddy.

name: Finn
line: Jake, I think this little guy has serious dance fever.

name: Jake
line: Don't come near me, Sweetie!  Oh, man, I'm outta shape. I think I should just stay in here, ya know. Just in case. Ya oh.

line: Jake!

line: You did it! I huh, uh...

line: Sweet P!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, that's lovely.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Me?  Yes, Sweet P. I'm the happiest mama in the whole world.

line: Thanks, sweetie.

name: Tree Trunks

name: Randy
line: Tree Trunks? Tree Trunks, it's me, Randy. Wow, it's so great to hear your voice.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Randy?

name: Randy
line: Forgive me for being so bold, but Tree Trunks, I must see you.

name: Tree Trunks

name: Randy

name: Tree Trunks
line: Um, okay, hold on.

name: Mr. Pig
line: Who was that, sweetie?

line: No, because, um... it's my turn...?

name: Mr. Pig

name: Tree Trunks

name: Mr. Pig
line: Okay. Uh, bye.

name: Tree Trunks
