name: Randy
line: We did it, babe. We finally graduated high school.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Yes, Randy, we did.

name: Cookie
line: Tree Trunks, would you sign my yearbook?

name: Tree Trunks
line: I sure will, Cookie. Do you want me to sign on my fencing photo, my Homecoming Queen photo, my horseback riding club photo-

name: Cookie
line: Would you sign your swim team photo?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Yes. That's my favorite.

name: Randy
line: When you get done with that kid stuff, let me know. I got grown-up stuff to discuss.

name: Tree Trunks
line: I was about to say the same thing to you.  Randy, I've decided to take some time for myself and see the world. I'm eighteen and I need adventure, Randy. I need-  What?

name: Randy
line: Baby...

name: Randy
line: ...let me be your adventure.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Okay, why not?

name: Randy's father
line: Kiss her, son!

name: Randy
line: Our wedding photos are here. Just in time for the honeymoon. Babe?

name: Tree Trunks
line: It's over, Randy. I'm a wild child.  Goodbye.

name: Tree Trunks
line: "Goodbye, Randy."

name: Randy
line: Okay.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Hmm? Oh, Randy, I'm so sorry you went to all this trouble.

name: Randy
line: Huh?

name: Tree Trunks
line: I mean, I'm flattered, but I have a family now and I can't run away with you.

name: Randy
line: That... Tree Trunks, that's not why I asked you here.

name: Tree Trunks
line: It's not?

name: Randy
line: No. I just wanted to ask you for my grandmother's ring back.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh.

name: Randy
line: I'm going to propose to my girlfriend this weekend. I've got the chocolates, and the flowers, but I need that ring.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Well, I'm sorry, but I threw that ring down a bottomless pit.

name: Randy
line: Oh no!

name: Tree Trunks
line: No, wait, that's not right. I used that ring to propose to my second husband, Danny.

name: Randy
line: Oh, no.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, Danny.

name: Tree Trunks
line: At sea, I made a new life for myself.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Mr. Faidutti.

name: Mr. Faidutti
line: Yes, Captain Tree Trunks.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Mr. Faidutti, pick up that mop, you bug.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Mm hmm.

name: Crew member
line: Captain Tree Trunks, we're approaching a ship off the port bow!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Good.  Drown all but the tightest men.

name: Danny
line: No!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Impudence.

name: Danny
line: I beg of you, madam, while I am tight, my brother is not, and yet I love him.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Hmm.

name: Danny
line: My name is Daniel Prince and this is my brother, Peanut. Please look into your heart and pity him, for though our family is quite wealthy, he has had a difficult life.  You are a very beautiful elephant, but I fear your bandit ways have made you hard.

name: Tree Trunks
line: He was right. I left my post that very day so that I could spend the rest of my life with Danny.

name: Tree Trunks
line: That evening, we were wed.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Peanut?

name: Danny
line: Kiss my mouth, baby!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Yeah!

name: Tree Trunks
line: My joy, however, would be short-lived. Was Danny smooth? Yes.  Was Danny tight? Yes.  But was he a liar? Yes, yes, yes!

name: Crew members
line: Ah!  Woop woop woop woop woop.

name: Tree Trunks
line: A liar in cahoots with Mr. Faidutti to get me away from my ship.

name: Tree Trunks
line: I marooned Danny, and I kaboomed Mr. Faidutti.

name: Tree Trunks
line: No more tight men.

name: Tree Trunks
line: That Danny was really, really, really something.

name: Randy
line: Okay, I get it. But what about the ring? What happened next?

name: Tree Trunks
line: I savvily invested my pirate treasure and became a powerful shipping magnate.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Come in.

name: Wyatt
line: Uh, I'm Wyatt, your new secretary. These flowers are from "Robot Body Moe".

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, again? Throw those in the trash.

name: Wyatt
line: Okay, ma'am.  They're a little - a little big. Oh, boy.

name: Tree Trunks
line: The other way, like a vase.

name: Tree Trunks
line: He melted my heart.

name: Wyatt
line: Hey-hey!

name: King of Ooo
line: Somebody kiss me now!

name: Tree Trunks
line: I sold the company and gave all my money to the King of Ooo.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Swim with me, Wyatt, you sweet boy.

name: Wyatt
line: Oh, uh-

name: Tree Trunks
line: I'm never wearing clothes again!

name: Wyatt
line: I, uh, might keep my shirt on.

name: Tree Trunks
line: I thought Glob had told me, "Here's someone who needs your love." But what he really must've said was, "Go suck an egg, Tree Trunks."

name: Tree Trunks
line: No more pie.

name: Wyatt
line: But that's my pie.

name: Tree Trunks
line: You're draining my life away.

name: Wyatt
line: Take care of me!

name: Tree Trunks
line: No. You've emptied me of my joie de vivre.

name: Wyatt
line: I've got the ring! If I don't give it back, it means we're still in love!  I'm throwing it in a bottomless pit!

name: Randy
line: Wyatt threw my ring in a pit?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Yeah, sorry about that. Uh- huh?

line: I followed you because I was afraid that - And now I see you-

line: Oh, no.

name: Randy
line: I just wanted my grandma's ring back.

name: Tree Trunks
line: And I just didn't want you to worry over nothing.

name: Mr. Pig
line: R-Really? Oh, geez.

line: There you are!  How could you, Tree Trunks?

name: Wyatt
line: You wish, babe. I've been following him  to you! But if Tree Trunks is gonna be stepping out on her man with one of her exes, it's gonna be me!  Tree Trunks, help me. I need you.

line: My ring! Just give me...

line: Um, I'm sorry I didn't trust you. I just know you've had a lot of adventures in the past and things are kind of boring now.

name: Tree Trunks
line: It's true. I sometimes miss those wild times, but back then, I couldn't even tell the difference between a good adventure and a bad one. I was just a leaf in the wind, blown about by my whims. But now I'm on solid ground. You and Sweet P are my - uh-

line: My powers! Foul and noisome whelp! You've not seen the last of my wintery fangs! I'll cleave the warmth from your bones and stop still your beating heart with my claaaaws...
