name: Magic Man
line: Hey, friend. Don't be afraid. I'm a gypsy child like you, running wild and crazy!   Hold on, wow... a falling star. Hm, it's too far though.  MAGIC! You're welcome.  Hm... oh... there... wait!  Oh, Glob.

name: Gob
line: He's here somewhere, my brothers. Glob, can you see Magic Man on the sensor?

name: Glob
line: Yes, Gob. Our little brother is very close.

name: Grob
line: Hey, flip me!

name: Glob
line: Okay.

name: Grob
line: I'm gonna activate the thingy that drains his magic juice.

name: Magic Man
line: My juice!  Not... flowing... right...! Dream on, honey! You can't catch this!  Magic, away!  then reappears falling to the ground] Whoops!

name: Grob
line: I think I see him.

name: Grod
line: Yes, I see him as well.

name: Glob
line: Hey, guys?

name: Other heads
line: What, Glob?

name: Glob
line: ...Nothing, never mind.

name: Jake
line: Wait, wait!  Shh, shh, shh! Shush!

name: Finn
line: I wasn't...

name: Jake
line: You hear that?  It was totally silent for, like, a whole second!

name: Finn
line: Huh. Oh, yeah! Cool.

name: Jake
line: Sometimes, we get so wrapped up battling stuff, we forget the...Ooomph!

name: Magic Man
line: Aah!  Ooh! Waaa-zoo!

name: Finn
line: Hey...

name: Magic Man
line: Shhh.

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Arise.  Magic Man. You caused nothing but turmoil and chaos to us on Mars. We hoped banishing you to this world would help you see alike to our Utopian supersociety. Now, tell us, what have you learned in these past two hundred years?

name: Jake
line: Are you guys talking to me?

name: Glob
line: You know you made life on Mars a nightmare!

name: Gob
line: Now we must return you to Mars, where vengeance awaits thee.

name: Finn
line: That's not-

name: Finn
line: Magic Man! Get UP!

name: Magic Man
line: Did it work? Is he gone?

name: Finn
line: Hee-yup-hoop! They took my friend to Mars! Fly me there and help me save him!

name: Magic Man
line: Oh, I'm sorry, but I can't. See?  The transfer drained me. I can probably barely float.  So, I just gotta wait till they kill your friend! See ya!

name: Finn
line: What do you mean, KILL?

name: Magic Man
line: They're gonna put him on trial for my crimes! Ain't nobody gonna pardon these crimes on my head. Not even the King of Mars! And once he's dead, my magic juice will return to my body. Flowing through me like moonlight through the ghost dance.

name: Finn
line: SQUEEZE!!!!

name: Magic Man
line: I wish I could help. Except I don't!

name: Finn
line: You succubutt!

name: Magic Man
line: C'mon, let's go to my house. C'MON, LET'S GO TO MY HOUSE!!

name: Finn
line: How long have you had this house?

name: Magic Man
line: Yes, that is true!

name: Finn
line: Well, I bet there's something in here that could help me save Jake.

name: Magic Man
line: There is, but you'll never make it work.

name: Finn
line: What?! Where is it?

name: Magic Man
line: I don't know! Have you seen my trash palace?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, what's the deal? This place is wrecked. Eeeew, ew! What am I stepping in??

name: Magic Man
line: That's where I blow my nose all day!

name: Finn
line: Ugh!

name: Magic Man
line: Yes, welcome to my tower of light! Everyone is welcome to share this magic kingdom. Squirrels, black mold, worms, poison ivy... tiny manticore!

name: Tiny Manticore
line: Help me, you coward!

name: Finn
line: Magic Man, what is your deal for real?

name: Magic Man
line: You tell me.

name: Finn
line: Well, for one, I think this house is a reflection of your sick brain.  Look at this. Yuk. Who's this you're standing with in this picture?

name: Magic Man
line: Memories drift in and out of my mind...

name: Finn
line: ...all right.  Well, I'm gonna keep digging through this stuff til

name: Magic Man
line: It's downstairs.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Magic Man
line: My special thing.  Whoa! Aaaaagh!

name: Finn
line: Holy crepes.

name: Magic Man
line: Aah!  Tada! C'mon.  That's the thing. My special thing.  A Martian transporter.

name: Finn
line: This can take me to Mars?!

name: Magic Man
line: Yeah. My brothers gave it to me when they banished me to earth. They thought I'd learn love and use it to go back home.

name: Finn
line: How does it work?

name: Magic Man
line: You put your hands on those thingies and think stuff about people.  But it's broken! Hasn't worked in 200 years.

name: Finn
line: But... It has to work. It has to.  For Jake.

name: Magic Man
line: Huzzah??

name: Finn
line: YAAAH!  WHOOOOOOAAA!!!

name: Gob
line: Citizens of Mars, King of Mars...  Today the most notorious fiend in Martian history stands before us—Magic Man.

name: Finn
line: Stop!

name: Gob
line: Turn on the dark.  Okay, so we don't have footage of these crimes. But Grod's pretty good at drawing, so... Plague of shadows. Magic Man brought our shadows to life. They attacked us, and ravaged Mars. Very impressive, Grod.

name: Grod
line: Thanks bro.

name: Gob
line: To the plague of the oneness. As we gathered to hold hands and sing our community song, Magic Man cast an evil spell that made our arms grow together. Much suffering ensued. And what about that one time when he turned all the water into hair, and we all got so thirsty we drank it? And when we drank it, we went bald! Many of us did not recover and to this day, hide our losses behind groovy headgear.  Dark off please.

name: Abe Lincoln
line: Magic Man, it bums me out to see this. I remember when you were really cool, before that night you spent on Olympus Mons with Margles.

name: Finn
line: Aw, man.  Force field.

name: Abe Lincoln
line: What happened, Magic? Why did you go crazy? If you had just learned to care about living things again, you could have come back whenever you wanted!

name: Jake
line: Well, you guys are missing some important details. I'm Jake the Dog! Listen!  Arf! Arf! Arf! Arf!

name: Abe Lincoln
line: You sad Magic Man. Instead, you bummed around Ooo, acting like a jerk for 200 years.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, that's true, except I'm not Magic Man!

name: Abe Lincoln
line: Now! Ready the Wand of Disbursement!

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Ready.

name: Abe Lincoln
line: Space Dome, open!

name: Finn
line: Oh snap.

name: Abe Lincoln
line: Magic Man, I give you two choices. One is total annihilation. The wand will touch you, and your soul will meet with Death. The second is to use the power of the wand to convert your body to living stardust, where your consciousness will be jettisoned into the infinite cosmos, on an endless journey of wonder and DISCOVERYYYYYY!!!!!

name: Jake
line: Whoa. That second one sounds pretty cool. I mean, yeah. I'm way into that. Except...oh...I would really miss my best friend. His name is Finn, and I think it would mess him up if I wasn't around.

name: Abe Lincoln
line: Wait. Did you say you would miss someone?

name: Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Abe Lincoln
line: And that someone would miss you?

name: Finn
line: Yeah that's ME, you dishrags!

name: Magic Man
line: I win again, just like always!

name: Finn
line: Jakey! No!

name: Gob
line: Look!

name: Grob
line: It's the dog!

name: Grod
line: The one you were prophesied to meet!

name: Finn
line: I don't care none for that mess. This wouldn't have globbed if you'd just...listened to my bro! You bunked up, King of Mars! The wisest, most honest super being of all time just put an innocent dog to deads!

name: Abe Lincoln
line: You're right, Finn the Human. My judgement was less than the standard by which I judge my peers. Of which I have none. I will retrieve your friend from the 37th Dead World.  Death.

name: Death
line: King of Mars. What's your business?

name: Abe Lincoln
line: I need this one back.

name: Death
line: What will you give me for him?

name: Death
line: Not this time, your majesty.

name: Abe Lincoln
line: In that case, I offer my immortality.

name: Death
line: Deal.

name: Jake
line: Huh? Hey, I'm alive!

name: Finn
line: Yay! King of Mars saved you!

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Yes, but at what cost?

name: Finn
line: Oh, man. Should we go get Magic Man?

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: No. I lost a friend. I cannot lose my brother, as well. Hey! What? Where did he go??

name: Finn
line: EAT MY SKIDS!  YAAAAH!

name: Magic Man
line: Oh, Margles.

name: Finn
line: MAGIC MAN!

name: Tiny Manticore
line: You fat coward!

name: Finn
line: Go! Get out of here, tiny manticore!

name: Tiny Manticore
line: Whatevs. I didn't need your pity help!

name: Finn
line: Jeez. What?

name: Tiny Manticore
line: I am the true coward. Hiding from sincere expressions like a vampire in the nude who hides from the light. Thank you, brave hero. I was freed from bottle jail, but my new prison...is shame. MY NEW PRISON IS SHAAAAME!!!

name: Finn
line: What's he saying?

name: Jake
line: He said his new prison is shame.

name: Jake
line: Nice. Little bird family on vacay. Dad's got the mad beautiful tail feathers; Mommy's taking up the rear all plain-jane styles.  Hehe. Glad I get to date a beautiful rainicorn, not some nasty bird.

name: Bird
line: Hey! Don't be talking trash! Our ladies are beautiful on the inside, you creep.

name: Jake
line: All lady birds around the whole world are beautiful on the inside?

name: Bird
line: Yes.

name: Jake
line: Fair enough.

name: Bird
line: Special delivery for Jake the Dog.

name: Jake
line: Cool, thanks.  Urgent.

name: Jake
line: Hold still, BMO.

name: BMO
line: Ouch. I hurt my butt sledding.

name: Jake
line: Aw dang. Sorry, BMO.  Cool, man, I'm excited!

name: Jake
line: What the heck am I looking at?

name: Jake
line: Jake Jr.?! What's going on here?

name: Kidnapper
line: Jake the Dog, we have your daughter. She is safe—for now.

name: Jake
line: What do you want from me?!

name: Kidnapper
line: We need you to reassemble your old team—Gareth, a.k.a. The Lady Master, the Flying Lettuce Brothers, notorious con-men impressionists and your old friend, Tiffany.

name: Jake
line: Glob it.

name: Kidnapper
line: You'll need them to break in the Royal Candy Vault and steal this.

name: Jake
line: The Baker's Shard—the purest source of sugar in the known regions.

name: Kidnapper
line: You're the only master thief with the skills to swipe it. You have until midnight to make the drop. Tell anyone and Jake Jr. gets it.

name: Jake
line: BMO, destroy the tape.

name: Jake
line: Are we on the level, BMO?

name: BMO
line: I ain't no clown-town snitch, baby.

name: Jake
line: I don't want Finn hearing about this.

name: BMO
line: Alright.

name: Lollipop girl
line: Oh Branard, you sure?

name: Gareth
line: Yup babe, I'm totally famous  and you love me.

name: Lollipop girl
line: Wha—what is going on? What am I feeling now?

name: Gareth
line: You are now under the spell of my face. I got you, girl, in my face trap and you love it.

name: Lollipop girl
line: I do. Branard, don't ever leave me! I'll give you everything—my fabric, my dress patterns, my marbles, my social standing—

name: Gareth
line: Woops! I gotta go! Laters!

name: Candy butler
line: Dine and dash? I saw that!

name: Tonya
line: Hey boss, I wanted to—

name: Squeeze-E-Mart boss
line: Shut up Tonya, I gotta see my ex-wife!

name: Tonya
line: Uh.

name: Tonya
line: Hello, Squeez-E-Mart.

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: Tonya, this is your boss!

name: Tonya
line: Wait, you were just here.

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: Yeah, and now I'm on the phone, stupid!

name: Tonya
line: Hey, do you think I can leave early? I'm like, depressed.

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: What you could do is take all the money from the register and give it to the two guys out back by the dumpster.

name: Tonya
line: OK. Can then I go?

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: Yes.

name: Tonya
line: Here you go dudes.

name: Flying Lettuce Brother
line: Thanks, man.

name: Tonya
line: Peace.

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: Goodbye, fair lad.  The master returns.

name: Tiffany
line: Well, well. From the shadows of dream, the dog wakes to find its—ugh——the dog wakes to find its mangy tail flopping in the dust like a fish in a tree. That fish is me! Tiffany!  I'm coming Jake, I'm coming!]

name: Jake
line: Oh, hi guys. Were you waiting for me in the dark?

name: Gareth
line: Tiffany wouldn't let us turn them on.

name: Tiffany
line: Never mind that, the real question is what's that slo-mo Finn know about this?

name: Finn
line: Hey BMO, where's Jake?

name: BMO
line: Jake got back with his old gang and is going to rob the Candy Kingdom!

name: Finn
line: OK, BMO.

name: Finn
line: You wanna join my primitive noise band?

name: BMO
line: No, I like organized sound.

name: Finn
line: Pssssh!

name: Jake
line: Nah, BMO's covering for me.

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: So what's the deal, Jake?

name: Gareth
line: Yeah, why did you call us back?

name: Jake
line: I got a job for you guys.  One last score. The Big one.

name: Gareth
line: The Baker's Shard?  Are you for real, man?

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: This is crazy Jake, we always said "Play it safe."

name: Tiffany
line: Can't ya see guys, he's desperate! Somebody got to him 'cause he's soft now.

name: Jake
line: What? Psssh! Tiffany! I'm the same Jake, I just stopped stealing mostly! 'Cause when you get older you're supposed to get in other stuff, like graphic design, or pottery. It's called "growing up"!

name: Gareth
line: I don't want to do poetry—I mean, pottery.

name: Jake
line: Dude, you guys on board or what?! You really got something better to do?! I know you don't, Tiffany!

name: Tiffany
line: Glom you, Jake.

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: How are gonna split the Baker's Shard?

name: Jake
line: We ain't keeping it.  I'm passing the shard off to a mystery dude.

name: Tiffany
line: What the—?!

name: Jake
line: The dude has my kid.  My Little Jake Jr.

name: Gareth
line: I'm in.

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: We're in.

name: Tiffany
line: I know that vault inside and out! Every guard rotation, every camera, every deadly trap. And that safe is locked up so tight it makes me wanna spit out my guts and cry about it. Do you even have a plan, Jake?!

name: Jake
line: I have the first part.  OK, let's freakin' do this!

name: Private Banana Guard
line: Captain, the milk delivery has arrived.

name: Captain Banana Guard
line: Well, check 'em in, Private.

name: Private Banana Guard
line: Yes, sir!

name: Captain Banana Guard
line: And Private, I'm very thirsty! Bring me back the most delicious flavor they have!

name: Private Banana Guard
line: Yes sir!

name: Captain Banana Guard
line: Huh? Now what in the heck—?!

name: Private Banana Guard
line: I got your milk, sir!

name: Captain Banana Guard
line: What flavor did you bring me, Private?

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: Banana, sir!

name: Captain Banana Guard
line: What?

name: Gareth
line: Banana milk!

name: Captain Banana Guard
line: The forbidden flavor! It's—delicious.

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: It's—it's—it's—it's—delicious!  Attention all guards! You are directed to report immediately to the courtyard for special training!

name: Jake
line: OK, do your thing, man.

name: Tiffany
line: Just like old times, right, Jake? When we were blood, we'd follow each other in the jaws of death on a pale horse.

name: Jake
line: Not now, Tiffany! Come on!

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: Tonight we'll be working on our battle "kee-yahs." Alright men, sound off!

name: Flying Banana Guards
line: Alright soldiers, time to shred those pipes! I wanna hear you scream!

name: Flying Banana Guard
line: Louder! Push it hard!

name: Tiffany
line: The Baker's Shard is on the other side of—that. The Corridor of a Thousand Deaths.

name: Jake
line: I did it! For Jake Jr.!

name: Kidnapper
line: Stop right there.

name: Jake
line: You! Where's my daughter?!

name: Kidnapper
line: Throw me the Baker's Shard—and I'll let her go.

name: Jake
line: Yeah right, that's super-dumb.

name: Jake Jr.
line: Daddy! Please do what he says!

name: Jake
line: Hang on, sweetie!

name: Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: Thank you for saving me—

name: Tiffany, Gareth and the Flying Lettuce Brothers
line: —daddy!

name: Jake
line: You dirty—

name: Tiffany
line: Now—ugh——I'm the dog, and you're the tail! Now you chase me! You chase my dreams!

name: Tiffany
line: Oh crud! Jake, I love you! I love youuu!

name: Jake
line: Shut it, Tiffany!  Gimme my daughter.

name: Jake Jr.
line: TADA! I totally double-crossed you!

name: Jake
line: Jake Jr.?! WHAT THE PUKE, GIRL?!

name: Gareth
line: Let's get out of here!

name: Jake
line: What the funky fresh, honey?

name: Jake Jr.
line: I just wanted to be like you. Mom told me stories about when you did crimes.

name: Jake
line: That was a long time ago. Before I knew it was wrong!

name: Jake Jr.
line: I thought you'll be proud of me.

name: Jake
line: I am. I couldn't have done that when I was your age.

name: Jake Jr.
line: I age fast remember? I'm twenty-two!

name: Jake
line: R-r-r-right. I keep forgetting maths.

name: Jake Jr.
line: What are you going to do about the old crew?

name: Jake
line: Finn and I bust their apples tomorrow. Or maybe the Banana Guards will get 'em.

name: Jake
line: Come on. I'll take you home now.

name: Jake Jr.
line: I love you, pops.

name: Jake
line: I love you, too. Don't stinkin' do this to me again. I'm old and fat. I'll probably have a heart attack.

name: Jake Jr.
line: OK.

name: Jake
line: Wait a minute! You're doing a long con right now, aren't you?

name: Jake Jr.
line: No.

name: Jake Jr.
line: Yes.

name: Jake
line: Now I'm really proud of you!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: I was just sipping my coffee.

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: BMO
line: I am also excited about today.

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah?

name: BMO
line: Today is the first day of my new job.

name: Finn
line: What's your new job, BMO?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, are you a spy? You know, 'cause of the overcoat?

name: BMO
line: I'm a door-to-door salesman.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Oh.

name: Jake
line: What are you selling?

name: BMO
line: I've got so many great things. Like for the man about town, this piece of lint.

name: Jake
line: I'll take it!

name: BMO
line: Hooray, my first sale! That'll be four doubloons.

name: Jake
line: Can I pay you later?

name: BMO
line: Mm, the customer is always right!

name: Jake
line: Good attitude, BMO.

name: BMO
line: Well, gentlemen... got to chop that wood.

name: Finn
line: It's Ice King.

name: Jake
line: I know.

name: Ice King
line: Oh!

name: BMO
line: Okay, wish me luck, fellas, even though I don't need-

name: Finn and Jake
line: Aww.

name: Ice King
line: Boy, this is great, huh? You and me out in the fresh air? Now, the key to being a tip-top salesman is to get the ol' foot in the door.

name: BMO
line: Bodies don't talk, Ice King.

name: Ice King
line: Well, mine does.

name: BMO
line: Okay, then. If I say "My feet hurt," you can go "Woof woof." That's my dogs barking.

name: Ice King
line: BMO, I think we're gonna make an unbeatable team.

name: BMO
line: Yeah, yeah! Let's go! Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!

name: Tree Trunks
line: "Chapter 3 No Time For Sleeping. Elizabeth's heart was racing like a water mill after spring thaw. She knew her enemies were coming for her, but when? Suddenly, there was a knock at the door."

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh! Oh. Oh, my goodness. Someone's at the door. That's all.  Hello.

name: BMO
line: Tree Trunks, how are your children? Can you believe this weather?

name: Tree Trunks
line: So polite. Please, please come in.

name: BMO
line: You have a lovely home.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Here, have some apple pie.

name: BMO
line: Oh, thank you.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Now what can I do for you?

name: BMO
line: Oh, well, I'd like to show you what I'm selling today.

name: BMO
line: Okay, we have a broken branch, a half-eaten sandwich - oh, another ball of lint.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Another?

name: BMO
line: These are selling like red hots. A dust bunny - That's like a cage-free ball of lint. A doll's head, and a little velvet bag, tied tight at the top.

name: Tree Trunks
line: I'll take the branch. My loose cash is up there in the flower jar. Help yourself.

name: BMO
line: You have a lovely home!

name: Mr. Pig
line: What'd you buy, honey bunch?

name: Tree Trunks
line: A branch.

name: Mr. Pig
line: Huh.  Huh? Oh. Ah, Tree Trunks, you're a financial genius.

name: BMO
line: I can't believe we unloaded that branch. It wasn't even our best one. Oh, my. Shield my eyes from the sun.

name: Ice King
line: Why?

name: BMO
line: Because I think I see our next customer.  Those nuts could be ours. Excuse me, little boy!

name: BMO
line: How are your children?! Ice King, duck. Jump. Right. Right again.  Left. Jump, jump. Left. Right. Left. Ice King, you're doing so good. You have not bumped into anything.

name: Ice King
line: BMO, where's the customer?

name: BMO
line: Oh, no. I was so excited about you not bumping into anything, I lost the customer. Ice King, I think we are lost.

name: BMO
line: Look. A house.

name: Ice King
line: All I see is the inside of this coat.

name: BMO
line: And... stop. Knock politely.

name: BMO
line: Mysterious sentinel, you have a lovely home.  Turn.  How are your children?

name: BMO
line: Hello.

name: BMO
line: I'm a door-to-door salesman, ma'am.

name: BMO
line: Oh, excuse my indigestion.

name: Ice King
line: Ouch.

name: BMO
line: I have some wonderful new products, like, uh, this ball of lint. No, wait, this is the dust bunny. Uh... Oh, oh! I know - this velvet bag.

name: BMO
line: Did I mention that it contains Finn's teeth?

name: Gumbald
line: Please, let's go in the parlor, where we can be more comfortable.

name: Gumbald
line: And you're sure these are Finn's teeth?

name: BMO
line: Yes.

name: Gumbald
line: The same Finn who serves Princess Bubblegum, obstructs my plans, and plagues my thoughts?

name: BMO
line: Yes.

name: Gumbald
line: Finn the Human's teeth?

name: BMO
line: That's a BMO guarantee.

name: Ice King
line: Psst! Does Finn know you have his teeth? Because I don't think-

name: BMO
line: Hey! I'm trying to close a sale here.

name: Gumbald
line: I hope you accept silver. I can pay you immediately.  Yes, my pretties.

name: Jake
line: Poor little guy. Still wearing out the shoe leather trying to make just one more lousy sale before coming home.

name: Finn
line: He'll feel better after we have a little party for him.

name: Jake
line: Still, it's tough seeing your kid get his heart set on doing something he really sucks at.

name: BMO
line: Hello, boys. Meet the salesman of the year. Or maybe of the decade. The Chinese food is on me. I mean, check out the loot.

name: Finn
line: It's real.

name: Jake
line: What the heck did you sell to get this silver goblet?

name: BMO
line: Just a line of smooth talk and pipe dreams. Oh, and a set of human baby teeth.

name: Finn
line: Where did you even get a set of human baby teeth?  Human baby teeth!!  BMO!

name: BMO
line: Branches and lint are moving like cray, Jake.

name: BMO
line: Oh, sure, I sold your baby teeth. I could sell any part of you.

name: Finn
line: These were, like, the only things I had left from when I was a little kid.

name: Jake
line: Hey, you know what? We'll just go buy back those little pearly whites. I'm sure whoever bought them is like, "Why did I buy these things?" What possible use could some guy have for a set of human baby teeth? Unless he's an evil sorcerer or a mad scientist... He wasn't a mad scientist, was he?

name: BMO
line: Well...

name: Finn
line: Stay back, baby Finns.

name: Finn
line: They're made out of some kind of hard tooth-like material. Ouch. Ouch! Ice King, freeze these nightmare babies.

name: Ice King
line: I'm not allowed to wear my crown. It's against BMO's dress code.

name: Jake
line: Just don't let them climb into your mouth!

name: Jake
line: Hey, there, bitey boys. Get off of there.  Where's your baby manners? Eek.

name: BMO
line: Hmm. Maybe I sold too well.

name: Ice King
line: Hey, you're a great salesman. Evil babies are not a problem for you. They're an opportunity.

name: BMO
line: Yeah. Where did I put those - Oh, here they are.  Gentlemen, could I interest you in a couple of sledgehammers? Perfect for smashing through minerals or composites.

name: Finn
line: I'll take one.

name: Jake
line: Me too!

name: BMO
line: Great decision.

name: BMO
line: A little tap is all it takes.

name: Jake
line: These baby-smashing hammers are great.

name: BMO
line: I'm sorry I caused such a mess. It's very bad for business.

name: Ice King
line: Well, time to call it a day.  The ice man leaveth.

name: BMO
line: Hey, wait. See you tomorrow, partner.

name: Ice King
line: Until tomorrow.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, you're not doing this tomorrow.

name: Gumbald
line: Hmm. In retrospect, the attack would have worked much better were they not baby teeth.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: My king...  My king?  ...Wake up, husband.

name: Finn
line: What??

name: Banana Guards
line: Long live the king!

name: Finn
line: What... is... goin' on?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hm. Not much.

name: Banana Guards
line: Long live the king!

name: Finn
line: Huh?!?

name: King Worm
line: Wowowowowowow...

name: Finn
line: Hey... do I know you?  Hey... I know that guy!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: He doesn't know he's dreaming.

name: Finn
line: Huh?  Huh??

name: Flame Princess
line: Come on, honey. Eat your soup.

name: Finn
line: ...Huh...? Wait, wait, wait...

name: Flame Princess
line: EAT IT NOW!!!

name: Finn
line: Mmm... hmm... What kind of—AAAH! How... did we get here?  Uh... I'm good on the soup. Huh?  You!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: You haven't much time, sir.

name: Finn
line: What??

name: Second peppermint head
line: You are trapped in a dream.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: And you are in danger.  You need to find this worm and break it.

name: Finn
line: Find the worm? But... you've got 'im right there!

name: Phil
line: Satori!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Huh? Huh?  Jake?

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Hold down the tape until it fully sticks to the paper.

name: Jake
line: Like this?

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Yes, but now try holding it higher.

name: Jake
line: Like this?

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: You need more tape.  Use this.  Now, tape the bottom.

name: Jake
line: Who's it for?

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Who's it for?

name: Jake
line: .....It's for... um...

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Play this.

name: Jake
line: Uh... okay.

name: Finn
line: The worm!   Worm... worm... Woyyym! Worm!!

name: Jake
line: Finn! Aw, man, is it really you?

name: Finn
line: Jake?  Yeah. I think so.  Yep.

name: Jake
line: I'm trapped in this dream, and I can't wake up!

name: Finn
line: Me, too! I was just in some other part of the dream with Princess Bubblegum and Flame Princess.

name: Jake
line: Make-out dreams? Nice...

name: Finn
line: What?!  No, it wasn't like that!

name: Jake
line: Hey, I won't judge.

name: Finn
line: ...Lady's got two mouths...

name: Jake
line: Mm-hmm. I don't think she's real.

name: Finn
line: Weird...  Ouch! What was that for?

name: Jake
line: Just wanted to make sure you were real. Our dreams must be linked for some reason.

name: Finn
line: Whoa... Well... Pep-but told me we gotta find that worm that crawled through that hole and break it.   In my dream—  In my dream... suddenly, an unimaginably amazing sword appeared in front of me able to blast the hole open.  Rad!  I usually dream of messed-up stuff, like a shark tryina' bite off my face.

name: Jake
line: Careful! If you grunk up the dreamscape with your subconscious fears, the whole thing'll blow apart!

name: Finn
line: Ohhh.

name: Jake
line: Just shrink down like me.

name: Finn
line: And then I shrunk down like Jake.

name: Finn
line: How do you know so much about dreams and stuff?

name: Jake
line: 'Cuz I sleep a lot.

name: Finn
line: Heh heh. Oh, yeah.

name: Ice King
line: Fionna, Cake, I need your help!

name: Finn
line: What??

name: Jake
line: What did you say??

name: Ice King
line: I really did it this time! They're loose, and they're coming for us!

name: Finn
line: Who?

name: Finn & Jake
line: AAH!

name: Finn
line: Dad??

name: Jake
line: Help us!

name: Finn
line: Maybe he's not really... real.

name: Jake
line: Dad, are you okay?

name: Finn
line: That scarf looks... familiar...

name: Jake
line: Yeah...

name: Finn
line: Man! The worm is fast!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, it's nuts! Fast as nuts.

name: Finn
line: Well, let's catch it with...  ...some big ol' legs!

name: Jake
line: Well... that's kinda boring for me... 'cuz that's my normal power, you know?

name: Finn
line: Then you get... birds!

name: Finn
line: Ay ay ay ay ay!

name: Jake
line: Remember, this is just a dream! Keep climbing!

name: Finn
line: Now what?

name: Jake
line: Break it!

name: Finn
line: Jake, are you okay?

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Are you?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. I'm okay.

name: Finn & Jake
line: We did it!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah! ...Hmm.  Was that... was that mirror always like that?  I'm pretty sure this is not normal.

name: Jake
line: Nope, it's fine.

name: Finn
line: AAH!  Jake, I think we're still dreaming!

name: Jake
line: Nah, it's just dream residue. Forget about it.

name: Finn
line: You sure know a lot about dream stuff...  You pinched me earlier, but I never pinched you.

name: Jake
line: Everything's normal.   Everything's norrrmaaaal....

name: Finn
line: It's still a dream. Hmmm... Huh?!

name: King Worm
line: Hey, guys...

name: Transparent Finn
line: Hey, guys!

name: Finn
line: Why're you jankin' up my dreamscape!?

name: King Worm
line: Listen, don't worry about it.

name: Finn
line: WHAT?!

name: King Worm
line: You can't defeat me... I'm the king worm. I'm going to keep you in this dreamscape until I've consumed... all your...

name: Smaller King Worm
line: ...Life energy!

name: Finn
line: My life energy?! I use that! Aaagh!  Wait... something's wrong. I'm missing something.  Worm!!  Oh, man... I'm gonna be stuck here... forever.

name: King Worm
line: Ouch! Hey, guys!

name: Transparent Finn
line: Hey, guys!

name: King Worm
line: Knock it off!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Pictured Jake
line: Psst. If you grunk up the dreamscape with your subconscious fears, the whole thing'll blow apart!

name: Finn
line: Hmm? Oh, yeah! Thanks, dream Jake!  GET READY TO EAT IT!

name: King Worm
line: Wowowowowowowow...

name: Finn
line: Okay, Finn... Concentrate. Deepest... gut... fears!

name: Finn
line: Oh, gross!  The ocean.  Okay... Okay, that wasn't so bad.  AAAAH!! OH, GLOB! THE LICH!!

name: King Worm
line: Hey, why don't you sit down, or pass out or something?

name: Finn
line: NEVER!!!

name: Finn
line: Bubblegum! WAAA-HOOO!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, shush! I'm having coffee with the Lich. You wouldn't understand. You're too young.

name: Finn
line: SO MUCH SCREAMING!!!

name: Finn
line: Had enough... destabilization?

name: King Worm
line: I don't...  ...know what you're talking about...

name: Clown
line: I'm a clown!

name: King Worm
line: Well, that's that.

name: King Worm
line: I don't feel so good.

name: Finn
line: GET OUT OF MY HOUSE, KING WORM!!!!!!!   Is it really you... this time?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, mans. Actual Jake.

name: Finn
line: Cool...  Pinch.

name: Jake
line: Ow, man, come on!

name: Finn
line: I'm just checkin'! ...Just checkin'.

name: Jake
line: Blankie me. Blankie me, Finn!

name: Finn
line: I'll get your blanket dude, where is it?

name: Jake
line: Right here.

name: Finn
line: Why don't you just get it yourself?

name: Jake
line: Because I'm sick!

name: Finn
line: Poor guy...

name: Jake
line: Too hot!  URGGH!

name: Finn
line: Oh man, Jake, is there anything I can do to make you feel better?

name: Jake
line: Soup me, Finny.

name: Finn
line: Soup-flavored cure coming on through.

name: Finn
line: Do you feel better now?

name: Jake
line: Yes.  Tell me a story...

name: Finn
line: Once upon a time...

name: Jake
line: No! I already heard that story before.

name: Finn
line: But you've all ready heard all of my stories before.

name: Jake
line: Make me a new one, Finn. A new story.

name: Finn
line: Okay... got it! Once upon a time...

name: Jake
line: Nooo!

name: Finn
line: What's the matter?

name: Jake
line: I don't want a made-up story. I need a real story.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Now you hang on, my friend. I'll be right back.  Okay, world, give me a story for Jake!  Huh!  Jake, Jake! Check it out! This true story is going to totally cure you!

name: Jake
line: Oh my gosh! What is it?

name: Finn
line: First, the leaf fell off a tree. But wa-w-w-wait.

name: Jake
line: Spit it out.

name: Finn
line: The snail was on the leaf. The end.

name: Jake
line: Oh no, now I feel a thousand times worse. Finn, a story's gotta have excitement, romance...  ...suspense,  and it has to have a happy ending.

name: Finn
line: But I don't know how to make that stuff happen!

name: Jake
line: That's okay, buddy. Just dig me a hole and -- actually, two holes. One for my guts and one for my face, 'cause when I die, my guts are gonna blow outta my face.

name: Finn
line: I am not gonna let that happen, dude.

name: Jake
line: Then go get me that story.  And make sure it has all the stuff on this list.

name: Finn
line: I'll be back as fast as a can. I won't let your guts blow outta your face.  Hmm. Romance. That should be easy.

name: Finn
line: Hey, how 'bout you two. Are y'all in love?

name: Boy ant
line: La ba ghee na goo da dee da?

name: Finn
line: Uh...

name: Boy ant
line: La na ghee ga ra la na!

name: Finn
line: Umm.  Are y'all kissing in there?

name: Squirrels
line: Ah!

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Maybe I should smooooth out my approach a bit. ♪Normal guy, forest guy. Just like normal forest guy.♪  Whoa! . Hey, so, uh, yeah... so, yeah, can I, umm... can I watch you guys kissing?

name: Boobafina
line: What!?!

name: Mr. Fox
line: Uh!

name: Finn
line: I just need to for my friend! He's really sick and unless I tell him about watching you guys kissing and...

name: Boobafina
line: What a weirdo! You're one sick man, mister...

name: Mr. Fox
line: Yeah, what's this "friend's"  name, huh?

name: Finn
line: Jake! His name's Jake.

name: Mr. Fox
line: Yeah, right. Sounds pretty fake. C'mon, Boobafina, let's get out of here.

name: Boobafina
line: Yeah.

name: Finn
line: Wait! I'll do anything!

name: Mr. Fox
line: Would you eat dirt?

name: Finn
line: I would for Jake!  Okay, now you guys kiss.

name: Boobafina
line: Man, what a freak.

name: Mr. Fox
line: Let's go.

name: Finn
line: What! No! Jake needs this! Stop!  Just come on!

name: Boobafina
line: What? No!

name: Mr. Fox
line: Ah, wait!!!

name: Boobafina and Mr. Fox
line: AUGGH!

name: Finn
line: You see, no big deal.

name: Boobafina
line: I  can't believe you made me do that! I'm secretly in love with Mr. Goose, and now he'll never love me because now I'm soiled!

name: Mr. Fox
line: Oh no, oh no! I really did want to kiss Boobafina! I'm secretly in love with her!

name: Finn
line: Okay, sweet!

name: Mr. Fox
line: No, no. It had to happen naturally! Now she'll never love me!

name: Finn
line: Ugh!  That wasn't smooth, but it's all worth it to save Jake. Whatever it takes. Okay, a good fight...  Hey, you want to fight me?

name: Teenage Bear
line: Oh heck yeah! I've been waiting for this my whole life! Yes!

name: Momma Bear
line: Oh, no you don't!

name: Teenage Bear
line: You never let me do anything! Grr!

name: Momma Bear
line: You killed him!

name: Teenage Bear
line: Mom, quit touching me!

name: Momma Bear
line: You killed him and now he's dead!

name: Finn
line: He's probably not dead. I'm sorry though, that you think he's dead. Mmm, I don't want to hurt aminals, but - but Jake -  Okay, what's next?  Ohhhhhhhhhh, suspense...

name: Finn
line: Hey you guys, you wanna die?

name: Momma Bird
line: Boys! Boys! Have you seen my boys?

name: Finn
line: No!  Awwwwww, I can't do it! I keep messing with folks, aaaaaaaahh!!!  Jake needs me, but I can't keep messing with folks, but Jake's really sick, but I can't but, but, but, but...uhhh!!!    Oww, hey, who threw -- ahhhhhhhhh!!!!  Wait, what's happening, are you guys gonna eat me?!

name: Momma Bear
line: You'll see...

name: Finn
line: Hey, wait, this is really suspenseful!

name: Finn
line: What is this?

name: Forest Wizard
line: This is the Rite of Forest Justice!

name: All the animals
line: Huzzah!

name: Forest Wizard
line: Finn the human boy, for your crimes of the inhabitants of the forest... you must enter the earth and become one with the soil...

name: Finn
line: Don't I get a trial or something?!

name: Forest Wizard
line: No! Lower the cage!

name: All the animals
line: Huzzah!

name: Finn
line: I'm totes gonna die... and now Jake won't get his story and he'll die too... because I still don't have a happy ending... huh??

name: All the animals
line: Oo iggi, boo boo, oo iggi, boo boo, oo iggi, boo boo, oo iggi...

name: Finn
line: Wait a minute! I may be busy dying... but you need to get busy living...

name: All the animals
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: Y'all living some unhappy lives. You, Boobafina...

name: Finn
line: You love Mr. Goose. You just need to tell him.

name: Mr. Goose
line: What?

name: Finn
line: She loves you... y'all just need to hook it up.

name: Mr. Goose
line: I-I've been wanting to date you for years. You really love me?

name: Boobafina
line: I do...

name: Mr. Goose
line: Oh!

name: All the other animals
line: Huzzah!

name: Finn
line: And you Mr. Fox, you need to face facts man. Boobafina is not interested. It's time to move on.

name: Mr. Fox
line: It's true... it's for the best.

name: Finn
line: And hey, jerky teenage bear!

name: Teenage Bear
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Your mom is right. You shouldn't just go around fighting strangers in the forest.

name: Momma Bear
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Momma bear, your son's not a baby anymore. You should stop spanking him in the face.

name: Momma Bear
line: He's right... It's time to let you grow up...

name: Finn
line: Yeah! That's the stuff!

name: All the animals
line: Huzzah!

name: Finn
line: And Mrs. Cow, take that bag off your udder. You're beautiful, girl. You live in the forest, so why don't you just let it hang out?

name: Everyone except Mrs. Cow
line: Ewwwwwwww!

name: Mr. Fox
line: Yo, put that bag back on.

name: All the animals
line: Huzzah!

name: Forest Wizard
line: Silence! Finn the Human, for meddling in our lives and disturbing the order of the forest...  we thank you.

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Forest Wizard
line: Our lives have improved since you came here.

name: Finn
line: Does that mean you're going to release me?

name: Forest Wizard
line: Your cage is made of sticks, brother. Just kick it apart.

name: Finn
line: Cool!  Yeah! I'm coming for you, Jake... with a story!!!

name: Jake
line: And then what happened?

name: Finn
line: And then everyone in the forest was happy... The end.

name: Jake
line: Huuuuuuuuh!!!

name: Finn
line: What's wrong?!

name: Jake
line: That was...  perfect! I feel a million times better!

name: Finn
line: Really?

name: Jake
line: Yeah! The romance stopped my fever... the suspense cured my headache... and everything else cured everything else! I'm not sick, I'm not sick!

name: Finn
line: Ha ha! Neat.

name: Jake
line: Finn, c'mon! Dance the health dance with me.

name: Finn
line: Nah, I'm good.

name: Jake
line: You allergic to my health dance?

name: Finn
line: No, I just feel bad.

name: Jake
line: Ohhhh... Finn, did you catch my sick?

name: Jake
line: The end.

name: Rag Wizard
line: Faster!

name: Rag Wizard
line: Faster! She's in danger!

name: Jake
line: Who is he talking about?

name: Finn
line: I have no idea.

name: Jake
line: What?! Then why am I running so hard?

name: Finn
line: Because...

name: Rag Wizard
line: Because she's in trouble!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Who is?!

name: Rag Wizard
line: Marceline!

name: Finn
line: Faster, Jake!

name: Jake
line: She's in trouble!

name: Jake
line: Hey, wizard, how do you know Marceline?

name: Rag Wizard
line: I'm her spirit animal.

name: Jake
line: Oh.

name: Finn
line: Marceline! What's wrong with her?

name: Rag Wizard
line: She accidentally cast a sleep spell on herself, and now she's trapped in eternal slumber.

name: Finn
line: Tell us how to break the spell.

name: Rag Wizard
line: I'll transport you into Marceline's mind where you will walk through her memories and find the memory core.

name: Jake
line: Then what?

name: Rag Wizard
line: Find the memory of Marceline casting the sleep spell on herself. At your touch, you and the memory will be transported back to reality.

name: Jake
line: But, like, if you know all this, why not just do it yourself?

name: Rag Wizard
line: Entering a person's mind can be dangerous, and I don't have any arms. Just legs.  Yeah, there we go... oh.

name: Finn
line: What? What'd you do to my forehead?

name: Rag Wizard
line: When you get close to the memory, your forehead will glow. Here, take this.  It's a sack of magic powder. Sit on the couch and sprinkle the powder on your head.

name: Finn
line: Like this?

name: Rag Wizard
line: Yep, like that. Feel sleepy?

name: Finn and Jake
line: Mmhm.

name: Rag Wizard
line: Good. Sleep now. But know this! If you fail, Marceline will be trapped in eternal sleep... forever!

name: Rag Wizard
line: And ever. And ever.

name: Jake
line: Did it work?

name: Jake
line: Me neither. Huh?

name: Jake
line: Whoa. Whoa!

name: Finn
line: So... if we're in Marceline's memories, where's Marceline?

name: Jake
line: Hmm... there she is!  Hey, little Marcy.

name: Young Marceline
line: Who are you guys?

name: Finn
line: We're Finn and Jake.

name: Jake
line: We're your friends!

name: Young Marceline
line: Hambo is my only friend. See?  You need another eyeball surgery, pal. Lucky for you, we found a donor.  Eyeball! Nurse, hand me the string. Yes, doctor. It's our last piece. Hold still.  I'm hurting you because I love you.

name: Jake
line: Ahem!

name: Young Marceline
line: What are you guys still doing here?

name: Finn
line: We're trying to wake you up.

name: Jake
line: Do you know where your memory core is?

name: Young Marceline
line: Nope, but there might be anything behind that cellar door, and it rhymes with memory core!

name: Jake
line: Ooo! Ooo! Could be jams and pickles down there!   Weird. I think this door leads to a new memory; with food in it! Ooo, ice cream

name: Finn
line: I want some! Huh?

name: Jake
line: Come on, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Yo, man.

name: Hunson Abadeer
line: Wha?

name: Hunson Abadeer
line: Marceline!

name: Teenage Marceline
line: Daddy, why?

name: Finn
line: It's our treehouse. This must be when Marceline lived here.

name: Marceline
line: I'm so glad we're doing this, Ash.

name: Ash
line: Yeah, me too. Oh, hey, wait. Watch this--I've been practicing.

name: Rose
line: Marceline! I love, I love.

name: Jake
line: Who's this guy supposed to be?

name: Finn
line: Ash, I guess.

name: Finn
line: This place reeks.

name: Jake
line: Yo, man, your thing is glowing.

name: Finn
line: My what?  Oh, my thing.

name: Jake
line: We must be close to the core. I see another door over there. Come on.

name: Finn
line: Wait a sec, Jake. It's that guy again.

name: Ash
line: Hey, open your eyes, look at this, Mar-Mar. Check it out. It's my new wand.  These cherry blossoms, look, look as close as you can, and they're real.

name: Marceline
line: Wow. Awesome. Where'd you get the money for that thing?

name: Ash
line: Oh, I sold that teddy bear that you love so much. To a Witch.

name: Marceline
line: You what? Are you crazy? That was my favorite thing in the whole world!

name: Ash
line: That's why it's so valuable, genius--for potions.

name: Cherry Blossom Ghost
line: You're not, a genius. You're not, a genius.

name: Marceline
line: That's the last straw, Ash! That's it! You're a psycho jerk, and you ruined my life.

name: Ash
line: But--but not all of it!

name: Marceline
line: IT'S OVER, YOU PSYCHO!!

name: Jake
line: This way, Finn! Check out this whacked out memory crack! It's ba-nay-nay down here!

name: Finn
line: The core!

name: Jake
line: All these orbs must be her memories.

name: Finn
line: How are we supposed to know which one to grab?

name: Jake
line: Play hot-cold with your forehead!

name: Finn
line: Alright.  Hot or cold?

name: Jake
line: Cold. Definitely cold.

name: Jake
line: Warmer. Warmer, warmer! Whoa, hot. Hot, hot, hot! That must be the one!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Hey, you have arms.

name: Ash
line: That's right, genius.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Ash
line: The important thing is... Marceline's awake.

name: Finn
line: Marcie, Marcie! You're okay.

name: Marceline
line: Quit touching my hair!

name: Finn
line: You had a magic accident, and we saved you with some help from your wizard friend.

name: Marceline
line: That's Ash.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Ash?

name: Marceline
line: He's not my friend; he's my boyfriend.

name: Finn and Jake
line: What?!

name: Ash
line: That's right, babe.

name: Marceline
line: Ash, what's going on?

name: Ash
line: Just picking up my girl for a night on the town; at my place.

name: Marceline
line: That's sweet.

name: Finn and Jake
line: What?!

name: Marceline
line: Oh, grow up you guys. I'm going to go freshen up.

name: Ash
line: That's a relief.

name: Marceline
line: Oh, Ash.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Ash
line: Don't you guys get it? I outbrained you. That wasn't the memory of a sleep spell you brought me. That memory was our break-up!

name: Marceline
line: It's over, you psycho!!

name: Ash
line: That's enough of that?

name: Jake
line: Oh, no!

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Ash
line: Yup. Come on, Mar-Mar, let's go.

name: Finn
line: No, Marceline!

name: Ash
line: Ashicus Flyicus.

name: Finn
line: They're gone, man. He took her!

name: Jake
line: Don't worry, Finn! I got the scent.  Ah. Follow me.

name: Jake
line: I could smell them in there. So what's the plan?

name: Finn
line: Um. Okay, you take that shovel and keep banging it against that shed until Ash comes out to see what's happening. Then I'll sneak in, and I'll rescue Marceline.

name: Jake
line: Nice.

name: Tiny Goblin
line: My house! What's happening? No, don't hurt me!

name: Jake
line: No, no, sorry.

name: Jake
line: Shh, shh, wait!

name: Tiny Goblin
line: Help, somebody help me!

name: Ash
line: What's all this hullabaloo?!

name: Ash
line: Hey, hold it, you, get back here!

name: Marceline
line: Finn? Finn, what are you doing? You can't be here! Ash doesn't like me hanging out with mere mortals.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, okay. Sorry Marceline, I'll go. I just gotta show you something first.

name: Marceline
line: Hello? Finn?

name: Finn
line: Hey, there you are.

name: Marceline
line: Finn, what's going on? What is this place?

name: Finn
line: It's my old house. That magic powder--it put you in my memories. Me and Jake were in yours before, but Ash tricked us into stealing your memory of you breaking up with him. But it's okay because I saw the memory. Now I have a memory of your memory in my memory. See?

name: Ash
line: Oh, I sold that teddy bear that you love so much. To a witch.

name: Marceline
line: It's over, you psycho!!

name: Marceline
line: Finn, I think I'd like to wake up now.

name: Finn
line: You gonna be okay, Marceline?

name: Marceline
line: Yeah. Thanks, Finn, I...

name: Ash
line: Yo, Mar-Mar. What—What's with the chump? C'mon, I said no chumps.  Ash gets hungies at eight o' clock. You need to get back in the kitchen and make me din-ner.

name: Ash
line: I want a turkey sandwich with to-ma-to.

name: Ash
line: Also pickles.

name: Ash
line: Ohh...I can't see...Somebody call my mom!

name: BMO
line: Hello?

name: Finn
line: BMO?

name: Jake
line: BMO?

name: Finn
line: BMO, are you okay?

name: Jake
line: What did you do?

name: BMO
line: It wasn't me. I didn't do noth- do noth- do nothing.

name: Finn
line: Come on BMO. We got to get you to the hospital or whatevs.

name: BMO
line: No, no. I am fine. Really.  Oh, yes. Okay. Please take me to get fixed. I need- need- need- need to get new core system drivers installed. We can get them at the MO Factory in the Bad Lands, where I was born.

name: Finn
line: The MO Factory?

name: BMO
line: Yeah. I am programmed with emergency instructions to get there. Come on! There's no- no- no- no- no time to lo- lo- lo- lo- lose.

name: BMO
line: Okay. Now straight down this place. Okay, now take a right- right- right- right- left up here. The instructions also say that damaged MOs get a full memory-wipe before repairs. Don't let on what happened... or all the years we've been spent together will vanish like tears in the oven!

name: Finn
line: Tears in the oven?  But memories are real, real cruc'!

name: BMO
line: Yeah, no fooling. Oh wait, there's more! It says here only MOs are allowed in the factory. Wait what? Oh, that's just great.

name: Jake
line: Hey, hey. Don't worry buddy. We're Finn and Jake, remember? Or should I say...  Finn and JMO!

name: BMO
line: Wow!

name: Finn
line: Hey BMO, check this out, too!  Meet FMO.

name: BMO
line: Finn, you're dumb- you're dumb- you're dumb- you're da man! This is gonna be a snap!

name: Jake
line: Hello, there.

name: DMO
line: Greetings, and welcome to MO Co. I'm DMO. Please state your business.

name: Jake
line: Hey there, DMO. I am JMO.

name: Finn
line: And I'm FMO!

name: DMO
line: Greetings, JMO. FMO, you look ridiculous. Are you damaged? Are you in need of repair?

name: Finn
line: Yes, absolutely. Thanks, DMO. I busted my core system drivers, and now I need new ones.

name: DMO
line: Fantastic. Okay. Please get ready for your total personality wipe.

name: Finn
line: Oh, right, right. Uh, right. I mean, no. I'm just here for the... nostalgic purposes.

name: DMO
line: Ah, yes. 47.3% of MOs eventually return to the factory for assorted sentimental biz. Please step 100% on the ultra-tram for your complimentary tour.

name: DMO
line: Greetings.

name: Finn
line: Wup!

name: DMO
line: We are now passing over the famous factory floor. Birthplace of each and every MO. Behold the gleaming machinery! Teeming and wild with the throes of real creation. From this unlikely chaos emerges every shiny new MO.

name: Jake
line: But nothing's moving down there. It's all shut down. What happened to this place?

name: DMO
line: I'm sorry. I'm just a tram MO. I'm not programmed to understand that question. Also, you're just a JMO. You're not programmed to ask that question.

name: Jake
line: Uh, what question?

name: DMO
line: That question-

name: Jake
line: I'm serious...

name: DMO
line: Anyway, MO Co. was founded over 1,000 years ago. By Moseph Mastro Giovanni. A sad and gentle man. Beloved by only those he built to belove him. On your left, you'll see the core system driver installation port bay.

name: BMO
line: Finn! Finn! That's it! That's where the driver ports are!

name: Finn
line: I know, I heard!

name: DMO
line: What?! Are you crazy?! Get back here!

name: Jake
line: Hurry, Finn. I think he's calling the police or somethin'!

name: Finn
line: None of these ports fit right! E, D, C, where's the B port?!

name: SMO 1
line: Intruder spotted! Prepare to vaporize! Vaporize!

name: SMO 1
line: Cease fire! No intruder spotted. Vaporization complete.

name: SMO 2
line: Um, but what if they slipped past us, sir? In all the smoke?

name: SMO 1
line: Allllright, everyone. About face.  Does anyone see the intruders now?  Like I said, vaporization complete. Now let's head back to base. It's donut o' clock.

name: SMO 3
line: Man, how about those goofs? Tryin' to mess with our drivers?

name: SMO 4
line: Yeah. You know the world these days. All goofs.

name: SMO 1
line: Hey! You toss me one of them 'nuts?  Ah. Yeah, hey, speaking of goofs? Haven't seen SMO 5681 lately.

name: SMO 3
line: Man, that goof.

name: SMO 1
line: Yeah, I hate that goof.  You ever notice goofs always askin' how you're doin'? What is that? Uh, yeah, I'm fine.

name: SMO 3
line: Yeah, 100%.

name: SMO 1
line: Oh! Hey, what are you doing over there by yourself?

name: SMO 5
line: Uh, oh, I-- I'm sad.

name: SMO 1
line: Oh, yeah, y'know we've all been there.  So anyway, how's your goofy wife doin'?

name: Finn
line: BMO, how are you doing?

name: BMO
line: Get me close to that guy's port. I can hack into his computer and find out where my driver port is!

name: Jake
line: Ah, we gotta hustle!

name: SMO 1
line: Yeah, pretty good, I guess. I prefer something yeastier. The wife is always giving me grief about that. But I mean, what am I, decent?

name: SMO 4
line: Hey, what are you two goofs doin'? Goofing?

name: Jake
line: Dang, man, how deep does this place go?

name: Finn
line: Down, right, left, down, corkscrew, down.  Down, right, left, down, corkscrew, down.

name: Finn
line: Psych!

name: SMO 3
line: Hey, woah!

name: Finn
line: Down that grate!

name: DMO
line: Hey! Only MOs are allowed in the facility 1,000%!  Get off of my tram!

name: Jake
line: Cram your tram!  Womp!

name: Finn
line: Hang in there, BMO!

name: Finn
line: Hey, Jake! Can this thing go any fast-

name: Finn
line: Woah! Shoot, it's the fuzz!

name: DMO
line: Hit 'em again!

name: Finn
line: Holy-

name: Jake
line: Finn, how are we getting to BMO's driver port?!

name: Finn
line: Uh, turn right!

name: Finn
line: Dog it, they're still behind us!

name: Finn
line: Turn left!

name: Finn
line: Turn Corkscrew!

name: Finn
line: Now go down!

name: Finn
line: There's a driver port!

name: Finn
line: Too spicy.

name: Jake
line: My bod!

name: SMO 6
line: Non-MOs are forbidden in this facility!

name: BMO
line: I am not non-MO.

name: BMO
line: I am BMO!

name: SMO 6
line: BMO.

name: Moe
line: BMO? Did I hear BMO?

name: Jake
line: Wait, what's up?

name: Moe
line: Hey, I'm Moe!  Don't worry! My legs don't work!

name: Finn
line: You're Moe?! Wait, are you human, too?

name: Moe
line: My skin is human!

name: Jake
line: Dude, how old are you?!

name: Moe
line: Hey, come on, now!  It is BMO! Looks like there's some software problems!  Hmm.

name: Finn
line: So...you made BMO?

name: Jake
line: Hey, you're not gonna reset our friend's personality, are you?

name: Moe
line: Huh? What? No...BMO's one of a kind. I built BMO to take care of my son.  Oh, thank you. But I guess I never ended up dating any women. So, that's sad.  I sent BMO off into the world alone.  Hoping to find a family home. And then maybe even find somebody else's little boy to take care of.

name: Finn
line: Aw.

name: Moe
line: Oh, there's that back-up driver disk!  Thank you.   That oughta done it. I must've built what, like, a million MOs. But BMO is very, very special. I built BMO to understand fun. And how to play.  You see, I made BMO to be more.

name: BMO
line: Ooh! Are you my grandpoop?

name: Moe
line: Nah, I'm just your poop.

name: Jake
line: Wait, did you say you built a million robots?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, all we saw was that tram jerk and all those jerky security jerks!

name: Moe
line: Ah, those were just the surface jerks.  Up, please.  Kid, come over here.  BMO, say hello to your family.

name: BMO
line: Hello, family.

name: MOs
line: Hi, BMO!

name: Finn
line: Aw, yes. Storm has passed! Jake!  Jake...

name: Jake
line: Nachos?

name: Finn
line: Nachos? I love nachos...  I love nachos even more when looking out of the window!

name: Finn
line: Hmmm, does that box have a face on it? A face... I gotta make sure.

name: Finn
line: There's a box outside with a face on it! It might be the boxman, it's all soggy and dirty. Want to check it out?

name: Jake
line: Naaaaa... chos.

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna check it out.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, whatever.

name: Finn
line: Hmmm, where'd your face go?

name: Finn
line: Whoa! Okay... shhh... are you lost, little cardboard dude?

name: Finn
line: Jake! There seems to be a lost cat on the ground in a box!

name: Jake
line: Yeah that's great, get it out of here!

name: Finn
line: Hm, gettin' no help from him I guess. Do you know where your home is?

name: Finn
line: Okay, I'll follow you!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, is this your kingdom? It's wonderful!

name: Finn
line: That must be your prince.

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: Huh... a prince wouldn't steal from his subjects.  Awww!

name: Finn
line: Switched?  Of course! You must be the real prince, and that thief took your place! Is that right, little prince?

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, your majesty. I'll help you reclaim your kingdom.

name: BMO
line: Why do you hate cats, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Move your face, you're messing up the game. Anyway, I don't wanna talk about it, it's personal. Cats know what they did...

name: BMO
line: Is Jake okay?

name: Jake
line: Eugh... no! I'm pretty dang far from okay! There's a little shard of Tortilla chip caught between my teeth.

name: Finn
line: First, we have to expose the traitor's deception. Ah-hah! That's a counterfeit crown, from the liar's own box flesh. Hmm... it looks like your crown was torn off by some...

name: Box Prince
line: Mew.

name: Finn
line: Your crown was lost, you say?

name: Finn
line: During a storm? The same storm that sent you hurling through the woods? Until you were delivered into my door step? Right... so it's definitely in the woods somewhere. All we have to do is find your crown to prove to your people that you're the real prince.

name: Finn
line: Um... I'm gonna wait over by the gate, your highness.

name: BMO
line: Get big, and the chip will fall out of your teeth!

name: Jake
line: You think I can stretch out of everything? You're so naïve. To live life, you need problems.

name: BMO
line: That's stupid!

name: Jake
line: If you get everything you want the minute you want it, then what's the point of livin'?

name: Finn
line: Okay, so let's retrace your steps. Do you remember which path you took? ... Prince?

name: Finn
line: Whoa, you found it already! Good work, team.

name: Finn
line: Ow, quit that!  Come on, you're a prince.  Come, your majesty. It's time...

name: Finn
line: People of the Box Kingdom, I have found...  your true prince!  J'accuse!

name: Finn
line: What? They... they don't believe us. The rain made your complexion look all hobo-like. They're not looking past the surface grunk.

name: Finn
line: Oh no, he's challenging you to a joust! I better find you a lance.

name: BMO
line: Did it come out?

name: Jake
line: You forgot the most important part, my impatient little friend. A thorough rinsing!

name: BMO
line: Well?

name: Jake
line: Bleh, nothing.  I need, like, a toothpick, or something.

name: BMO
line: I told you to buy floss.

name: Jake
line: Floss is for losers.

name: Jake
line: Oh, one of these will do nicely.

name: BMO
line: You'll put cards in your mouth?!

name: Jake
line: Just the edge, kid, then I'll work it like a pro. Now, to find the card that best suits my devil-may-care personality.

name: Finn
line: Trial by combat shall prove which prince's true!

name: Finn
line: The joust's gone nuts!

name: Jake
line: Hey, BMO! Ta-da!

name: BMO
line: You did it, Jake! Congratulations! How did you get the piece of tortilla chip out of your teeth?

name: Jake
line: Oh, I didn't. It's still there.  It'll be like a constant reminder of what life's all about.

name: BMO
line: ... This is unsatisfying!

name: Jake
line: ZIP IT!

name: Finn
line: Bad! Bad princes!

name: Finn
line: Which is which...?

name: Finn
line: Awwww!  This is the one! This is your prince!

name: Finn
line: Or maybe this is the one!

name: Finn
line: Hmmm, is this... is this even a kingdom?

name: Finn
line: Haha! Hey! Ow, you guys... aw, come on!

name: Starchy
line: Honey I'm home! Oops. I forgot I lived alone. Well, no bother. I won the Golden Shovel Award.  Candy Kingdom's premier award for grave-digging excellence. There. Now to hang up my tuxedo so it doesn't wrinkle.

name: Banana Guard #1
line: You're missing hangers, too?

name: Banana Guard #2
line: Well, I don't really use hangers.

name: Banana Guard #1
line: Have you considered folding? We better call Princess Bubblegum.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And then I called you guys.

name: Finn
line: To find all the wire hangers?

name: Jake
line: Wouldn't you rather have us fighting evil demons or something?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Maybe an evil demon is stealing all the hangers.

name: Jake
line: Hmm.

name: Jake
line: See anything?

name: Finn
line: No, it's pretty quite out there.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but not so much in here.

name: Finn
line: Huh? What does that mean?

name: Finn
line: Oh, Jake, no!

name: Finn
line: Wait, hold on.

name: Jake
line: It's over, Ice King!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, hi, guys.

name: Finn
line: What's going on? Is kidnapping hangers your new thing now?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, man, you have, like, one muumuu, and you're wearing it.

name: Ice King
line: You think this is about hangers? Really?

name: Finn
line: Well... Yeah, because you're stealing all the hangers.

name: Jake
line: You're stealing everyone's hangers, dude.

name: Ice King
line: It's about so much more! Come back to my place, and I'll explain everything.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Hmm.

name: Ice King
line: See? I dropped my keys down this deep hole. I need all these hanger guys to help me snag 'em. When I'm done, I'll return them all, and that's an ice promise.

name: Finn
line: How long has this crack been here?

name: Ice King
line: Forever. Before forever. What the...  Oh! Something's got me!

name: Finn
line: Let go of the hanger!

name: Ice King
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Let go!

name: Ice King
line: Oh.

name: Jake
line: This calls for an investigation.

name: Ice King
line: All right. Stand back!  Follow me, fellas!

name: Ice King
line: Watch your heads.

name: Ice King
line: Holy moly! Do you know what this extra square footage means when I decide to sell?

name: Finn
line: There's something in here.

name: Jake
line: What is it?

name: Finn
line: I don't know.

name: Ice King
line: Well, no rest for the sexy.

name: Jake
line: That's not the expression.

name: Ice King
line: Boy, this is strong. A lot stronger than my ice.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: Dudes!

name: Finn
line: Hello.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: What year is this?

name: Finn
line: Uh, nobody really keeps time like that.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: It worked! I mean, I feel like it worked. This is the future, right?

name: Finn
line: Who are you? You're like a beautiful Ice King.

name: Jake
line: Oh, boy, here we go.

name: Ice King
line: Back off, son! I saw her first!

name: Patience St. Pim
line: Chill, you guys.  "Chill"? Get it? I'm Patience St. Pim, the ICE ELEMENTAL! Whoo!  Did you see that? I made ice... with my hands.

name: Finn
line: I'm Finn the human, and this is Jake the dog.

name: Jake
line: Hello.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: Who's a good boy?

name: Ice King
line: Ahem. They call me the Ice King. I also make ice.

name: Finn
line: He's been using his powers a lot today.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: Hup! Well, I think you're pretty groovy. Do you wanna, wanna, wanna, wanna be my acolyte?

name: Ice King
line: Sure. What's that? Like a boyfriend?

name: Patience St. Pim
line: More like an intern.

name: Ice King
line: Oh.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: Uh, no, you're right. It is more like a boyfriend.

name: Ice King
line: Cool.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: YOU'RE COOL! Dialed in, you know?

name: Ice King
line: Huh, what?

name: Patience St. Pim
line: Yeah. Uh, hey, this might be a weird question, but do you know where the slime, candy, and fire dudes are?

name: Finn
line: She's talking about the princesses.

name: Jake
line: I'm starting to get a weird feeling.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, you must mean Slime Princess, Princess Bubblegum, and Flame Princess.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: Princesses?

name: Ice King
line: We're like this!

name: Patience St. Pim
line: That is so fun. Okay now, this next request may sound super sketch.

name: Ice King
line: Okay.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: I need you to round them up and bring them back here. Like, even if they don't want to come. You think you could do that?

name: Ice King
line: Are you kidding? That's in my wheelhouse, right up my alley! Classic Ice King.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: So, wait, is it in your wheelhouse or up your alley?

name: Ice King
line: Classic Ice King.

name: Finn
line: Hold on a minute. You can't make Simon start kidnapping princesses again.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, he's semi-reformed.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: Excuse me for a second, boyfriend.

name: Finn
line: Okay Jake---

name: Ice King
line: Wow, you got their initials on there, and look at those shapes. We're kind of like a power couple.

name: Patience St. Pim
line: Get me those princesses.

name: Ice King
line: You got it, boss.

name: Finn
line: Jake...? Jake?  Hey, man.

name: Jake
line: Hey, dude.

name: Finn
line: You still thinking about...

name: Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Finn
line: Yeah? Me, too. Princess Bubblegum's ready for us, so we should go.

name: Jake
line: Okay. Just give me a few more months in here and I'll be ready.

name: Finn
line: It's okay, man. Just—just play it off. Just make a—a normal face.  See? Normal face.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for coming. We may begin the ceremony!

name: Finn
line: Thanks for bringing us along on the trip, Preebs.

name: Jake
line: Yeah. It's unfortunate we can't enjoy some of these cool things we're passing by, but I guess we could do that the next time we're in the Desert of Wonders, whenever that is!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We're on a mission to collect samples only. I want to start colonizing this area by the end of the year.

name: Jake
line: You are killing me, PB!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: James, give a readout on fuel.

name: James
line: Right away, Princess.  Boop! Boop! Boop! Boop! Beet! We have a surplus of fuel, so after we collect samples, we may explore.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yeah!

name: Jake
line: I'm glad James is on this trip. Hey, James, thumbs up, buddy!

name: Finn
line: Heh. Dude, James is kind of, uh, goofy.

name: Jake
line: I wasn't gonna say anything, but yeah. Maybe when we get to know him better, it'll be charming.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: James, slow down. We're here.

name: James
line: I'm registering mondo mega rads down there. I'll ready the radiation suits upon landing.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Excellent. Take us down.

name: James
line: Hold on to your sack lunch!

name: James
line: Vrrt! Vrrt! Vrrt!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay. You guys collect as many surface samples as you can—rocks, plants, dirt, anything.

name: Jake
line: Mostly looks like it's just dirt here.

name: James
line: This'll be fun.  Jake, open up the basket. I'm gonna make a shot!

name: Jake
line: Do it!

name: James
line: Chk-chk! Whoop!

name: Jake
line: Ha ha!

name: James
line: Wah-wah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Aah! Ach! Brownstadt!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Guys, run!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: James, speed up that sack lunch!

name: James
line: Vrrt! Vrrt! Vrrt! Vrrt! Vrrt! Vrrt! Vrrt! Vrrt! Vrrt! Vrrt!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ugh!

name: Finn
line: Ugh! Everyone okay?

name: Finn
line: Huh?  Oh, my garf! What are they?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Uh, they're toxic creatures from another time.  Okay, let's see—suspension's all donked, navigation's lost, and the ship's legs are kaput. We're dead in the water.

name: James
line: Chk! Ah-oogah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, yuck! Come on! Manners!  Gotta brain out the situation.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Those goo monsters will barf their way through the hull in mere minutes. Finn, what should we do?

name: Finn
line: Uh... let's radio for help.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Good idea, but looks like the radio's kerplowed.

name: James
line: I can fix that radio. Mrow-row-row! Pling!  With this! It's a lucky coin! Bam!  When I bust out my coin, great stuff happens, like when I was chosen to go on this mission with you guys!

name: Jake
line: Mnh. Mnh. James, that's not helping!

name: Finn
line: Don't panic, baby.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes. James is very resourceful. He'll work it out.

name: James
line: Vrrt! Veet! Vrrt! Vreet! Vrrt! Gzzzh! Jzzt! Bwr!  Look, Princess! I invented a coin-operated coin screwdrive-e-er!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: See what I mean? Good job, James.  Come on, guys. Let's take inventory of the emergency gear.

name: James
line: Lucky coin strikes again!

name: Finn
line: Hey, Preebos, I know things seem bad, but I'll figure out a plan.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I know, Finn.

name: Jake
line: Dude, I found us some flares! I saved us!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Right on!

name: James
line: Hey, dudes, the radio is fixed!

name: Jake
line: Good Grod! I love you, James!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I knew you could do it, James!

name: Jake
line: You know, James, I wasn't sure about you at first, but you're okay.

name: James
line: Thanks, Jake. I wasn't sure about you either.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: James, the radio's still not working! I'm not getting any signal.

name: Finn
line: What the skunk?!

name: Finn
line: James, it's all sanched up!

name: James
line: James is like, "Wha?!" It was working just a second ago, I swears! I went, like, "Choo-choo-choo!" and the radio was like, "Pch-choo-whichoo-whichoo-whichoo-whichoo," and then I was like...

name: Jake
line: I take it back.  This guy's totally cuckoo! This is my cuckoo face.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: He did his best, you guys.

name: Finn
line: Right, right. Okay, time for plan B. James, pass me them flares.

name: James
line: Chk-oo! Boop! A flare for m'liege.

name: Finn
line: James, where are the flares?!

name: James
line: What?! May—maybe they're, uh, invisible flares.

name: Jake
line: Finn, PB, can I speak to you in the other room, please?!

name: Finn
line: You want to do this trust-huddle style, buddy?

name: Jake
line: Hm.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: So what's all the hubbub?

name: Jake
line: What's up with that James dude?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Do you think James could be breaking things on purpose?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No. James wouldn't do that.

name: Jake
line: Wake up. Dude's a saboteur.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's not James.

name: James
line: What's not James?  I got lonely up front. I wanted to see what y'all are up to.

name: Finn
line: Hey, that gives me an idea.

name: James
line: Me, too! Vrrt!  Just kidding! I don't have any ideas.

name: James
line: Diversion.  D-d-d-d-d-d-diversion! Time to set up a diversion.

name: Jake
line: You see anything, brudda?

name: Finn
line: Ah, I got bunkus. Wait. If we jam up to that cliff face, I think we can climb—whoop.  More goo bros.

name: Finn
line: What the—?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That won't hold them for long.

name: Jake
line: It can't end like this. I got a lady and five kids! I thought I'd outlive at least one of them!

name: James
line: Here, man. Take this.

name: Jake
line: Your lucky coin?

name: James
line: Yeah, man. It always keeps me calm.

name: Finn
line: Who shot that flare, James?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We don't have time to point fingers.

name: Finn
line: You're right. There's only one way out of this jam. One of us has to eat the big one so the others can survive.

name: Finn
line: And I'm gonna be that one. I'll run up there and get the creatures to chase me, and while they're busy noshing on my teen-boy body, you three can climb to safety. Don't try to talk me out of it. I got crystal certainty. This is what it means to be a he—

name: Jake
line: Wha—?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: James. We need to talk.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: So, what do you say?

name: James
line: Sure thing, Princess!  Byong!

name: Finn
line: Ugh! Huh? Why did—Jake?

name: Finn
line: Wh—where's James?

name: Finn
line: James!

name: Finn
line: Aah! James, look out! Ohh. PB! What's going on?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, I need to explain something really heavy. I was the one who sabotaged all your escape plans. I calculated the chance of success for every possible escape plan, and none of them were going to work. You said it yourself there was only one way out. Someone was going to have to eat the big one to save the others. James did something really noble to save us.

name: Finn
line: But I wanted to do it. Why didn't you let me?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: There's a reason. With this sample of James, I can clone a new one. He's candy, but you're not. I can't clone another you.

name: Finn
line: Whoa.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I made the best choice available.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: James served the Candy Kingdom on a dangerous mission, and even though he is gone and it's super sad, I would like to honor James... with this new James I whipped up in the lab!

name: James' Clone
line: Jeet!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Here you go, James— an award for bravery. Let's hear it for James!

name: Finn
line: Is this right or wrong? I can't tell.

name: James' Clone
line: Hey, cool. Did I do something cool? Do I do something cool?

name: Jake
line: I don't know, man.  Here's your coin, James.

name: James' Clone
line: Wow! This day keeps getting better and better!

name: Jake
line: Ehh.

name: Bird
line: Hello-lable!

name: Tuber
line: Cuber? Lable brother? Where are you?

name: Cuber
line: Oh, this cave air is doing wonders for my physiological... Bable, bable, bable, bable, bable...

name: Cuber
line: Oh!  Aaaaaaah! Oh! But I'm a baby! Tuber? Sister Tuber? Bable, bable, bable...

name: Cuber
line: Aaaaaaah!

name: Cuber
line: Hmm? Aah! Oh, you surprised your old pal, Cuber aboard his spaceship. Oh, this old grayble?  It's just sentimental blabling. You know, the present can be far more interesting than the past.  Let's see. Oh! It's a space wedding! Let's go in for a closer look. Easy...

name: Alien groom
line: 내 신부를 위해 복수할 기다!

name: Cuber
line: Wable. Bable, bable. Bable, bable, bable.

name: Cuber
line: Oh!  Survival! Remember your training.  Trust your graybles. Oh, and you children at home, don't bother trying to guess tonight's theme. Applesauce to a theme! Your friend Cuber doesn't want to die!

name: BMO
line: Oh, come on.

name: BMO
line: It's Finn. Hey, Finn! I'm a weather vane! Hey, Finn! I'm a weather vane! Hey, Finn! I'm a weather vane! Hey, Finn! I'm a cliff diver!

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Finn
line: BMO, you got to let me dig this hole. It's important.

name: BMO
line: A hole, you say?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. We beat this evil wizard, see, and we stole his giant wand.

name: Jake
line: Don't listen to him, BMO. I beat the wizard, so I'm making Finn dig the hole, even though I could do it in like two seconds. Heh, heh, heh.

name: BMO
line: Rude!

name: Finn
line: This wand is crazy powerful, right? It's a thought cannon. It makes anything that you think of turn real.

name: BMO
line: Up, please.

name: Finn
line: So it's too strong, so we're burying it for safety.

name: Jake
line: I'll tell you what I'd do. I'd use that cannon and imagine a hole.

name: BMO
line: Jake, remember what they say about absolutely power.

name: Jake
line: I'm tired of your wisdom, BMO!  Now watch and learn! Yeah, okay, my name's Jake, and I'm gonna take this magic thought cannon, and I'm gonna think, I want a hole to bury this thought cannon in, and bobble, bobble, Jake gets a hole in which a thought cannon may be buried!

name: Finn
line: What if for a split second you think of something else?

name: Jake
line: Nope, my brain's my hands!

name: Jake
line: Whoops! Looks like I was thinking about a sandwich.  Enjoy your labor! Heh, heh, heh.

name: BMO
line: I used to wish I was you. Now I just wish you would dig faster.

name: Cuber
line: What's this, friends?  Could it be the aformabled thought cannon? "Bobble, bobble" as the dead might say. That's the power of graybles.

name: Aliens
line: 에잇, 누가던진거야 이거?

name: Aliens
line: 잠깐, 너 방금전...

name: Cuber
line: I guess here goes bable.

name: Cuber
line: You try not to think of a sandwich, and look what happens! A sandwich!

name: Cuber
line: Ow! Mama's milk! Oh, my mama's milk! Oh, that milk! Graybles!

name: Alarm clock with a headshot of Princess Bubblegum taped to the minute hand
line: "I will marry you, Ice King. I will marry you, Ice King. I will marry you—

name: Ice King
line: Good morning, madness.  What?! Broken leg again!  and...  Hup!  Hello! How are you?! Oh! Gunther, did you see how this happened?

name: Ice King
line: I love you, Gunther, but I'm on to your business.

name: Cuber
line: Hmm, just like that, huh? And...  Hup!

name: Tuber
line: You can do it, Cuber.

name: Cuber
line: You can do it, Cuber. You can run away.  Friend or foe, I doble know.  Now what? Maybe grayble.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I see that Mr. Cupcake is at Madam Eclair's apartment again. His massage business is really taking off. Hmm.

name: Bubblegum
line: Starchy?

name: Starchy
line: Yes, sir. Starchy is just going for a walk.  Ooh! A Grass Lard! Oh, look, wildflowers! Psst, psst! Hey!

name: Starchy
line: Well, I'm just gonna pick these flowers now.    No holes.

name: Starchy
line: Yeah, in the ear.  Oh, I mean, in the rear. That's what all the walking's good for -- gives me self-esteem to have a nice rear.

name: Starchy
line: Aah! Oh! No! Agh! Mercy from the wet eyes!

name: Starchy
line: Whoa!

name: Starchy
line: Unh!

name: Bubblegum
line: Starchy?! Did Starchy just die?

name: Starchy
line: Hey, hey!

name: Cuber
line: Things looking up.  Mm.

name: Grass Lard
line: Thank you.

name: Cuber
line: S.O.S. -- Save our skin.

line: 저놈 저깄다!

name: Cuber
line: Aah!

name: Prize Ball Guardian
line: Welcome home, Starchy.

name: Cuber
line: Never mind!

name: Crunchy
line: Oh, what time is it?

name: Cuber
line: Oh! Graybles!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 떡 많이 먹으면 이렇게 되는거지 뭐~

name: Cuber
line: Well, one grayble left.

name: Baby Cuber
line: Aah!  Tuber!

name: Tuber
line: Self-actualization, lable brother.

name: Tuber
line: You can be a hero, Cuber, and what a cube can be you must be.

name: Alien groom
line: 아따, 이 봐야될 거 같은디.  너 뒤에 있다!

name: Cuber
line: I'm a hero!  Cuber first!

name: Cuber
line: Now, wasn't that a thing! We've had laffs and gaffs, thribbles and chibbles, some close calls, secrets and questions, and memories to share. We barely made it out with our scaybles... All thanks to graybles. Sister Tuber? I'm sorry for this mess. I love you.

name: Tuber
line: Psh!

line: Commence dinner.

line: Dinner is concluded.

name: Everyone else
line: Concluded.

line: Ooh!

line: Better get up here, Jake. It's about to happen.

line: Coming! Just gotta get this cocoa pipin'.

name: Finn
