line: Well, what're we gonna do?

name: BMO
line: Who wants to play video games??

name: Finn and Jake
line: BMO!!

name: Jake
line: What's on the menu, BMO?

name: BMO
line: I've created a new game called Conversation Parade.

name: Finn
line: Hah! Alright!

name: Jake
line: Start it up, BMO!

name: BMO
line: What do you think about the stars in the sky?

name: Finn
line: 'S okay, I guess.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, they're cool.

name: BMO
line: That is an interesting response! Battery low... Shut doooowwwwn...

name: Finn
line: Booooo.

name: Jake
line: BMO, that was weak.

name: Finn
line: What now?

name: Jake
line: Ooh, ooh! Dude, I know somethin' totally rockin' we can do!

name: Finn
line: Whoa! What?!

name: Jake
line: Let's use our imaginations, man!

name: Finn
line: Barf that! Imagination is for turbo nerds who can't handle how kick-butt reality is! I'm a kick-butt reality master!! I would rather die than be imaginative. I mean that.

name: Jake
line: Eh. Your loss.  AAAH!!! Lava!! Lava all around us!!  Lava on the floor!

name: Finn
line: Shut up, man...

name: Jake
line: Seriously, man! There must be an enchantment on the house or somethin'!

name: Finn
line: I'm not playing you child-style games, guy. Watch and learn as I master... reality.

name: Jake
line: NOOOOO!!

name: Finn
line: AAAAH!!!  Ah! Ah! Ah! Ah! Jake! What the hey-hey?!

name: Jake
line: I was just playin' around with my imagination...  ...and then everything got intense.

name: Finn
line: It's like... whatever you imagine becomes real... That's bananas!

name: Jake
line: Don't imagine blowin' apart my own brain... Don't imagine my eyeballs coming alive and flying around with rocket packs...

name: Finn
line: Dude! Imagine that BMO invented a better video game, and that he has new batteries.

name: Finn and Jake
line: WHOA!

name: Finn
line: But first stop imagining lava!

name: Jake
line: I can't! My imagination's too amazing!

name: Finn
line: Imagine turning your imagination off!

name: Jake
line: I can't, dude... but I think I can imagine an imagination turning-off machine... that is upstairs, surrounded by a crud-load of traps, ghosts, monsters, and poison fountains, and... and... girls. Cute girls, and hamsters.

name: Finn
line: Can't you make it easier to get to that machine?

name: Jake
line: You can't hold this baby back! That's bad parenting, mamma!

name: Finn
line: Then it's up to me to take your imagination downtown! Let's go to the den and suit up!

name: Jake
line: Neat!  Grab that missile.

name: Finn
line: Okay.

name: Jake
line: And... get that cosmic gauntlet.

name: Finn
line: Nah. There's a better one over by the desk. Ah! UNH!  What did I just hit?!

name: Jake
line: I'm imagining a wall. You can just go around it.

name: Finn
line: Really? That's it? There isn't any invisible, angry troll or anything?

name: Jake
line: Oh, there's one now.  Look out!

name: Finn
line: Aah! I can feel it on my foot!  I'll kill you, troll! Yah! Yah! Yah, yah, yah, yah!

name: Jake
line: You're kickin' too high! He's shorter than you!

name: Finn
line: Yah, yah!

name: Jake
line: Alright! You're gettin' him, man!  Uh-oh. Now you're uppercutting his family.  Heh heh heh heh heh! You just kicked his wife in the face!  She's comin' back for revenge.

name: Finn
line: Cram this! We gotta book it to your imagination machine! Yah!

name: Jake
line: The knife storm, remember?!?!  Oh, boy... Ooh... Finn, I found some candy.  It tastes like banana candy, man.  Here, man. Try some.

name: Finn
line: Okay. Try to imagine some kind of steel umbrella over the bridge so... we don't get knifed.

name: Jake
line: Okay!  It is done.

name: Finn
line: Haha! Ha! Hey, you did it, man!

name: Riddle Master
line: No, voyagers. To pass this bridge, you must first pass the test of the riddle.

name: Finn
line: An imaginary riddle master?

name: Finn
line: Ask me your riddle, Riddle Master. I accept your test.

name: Riddle Master
line: Then brace yourself, fool, for this riddle comes from a mysterious, far-away land.

name: Finn
line: LAY IT ON ME!!

name: Riddle Master
line: Yes, um... The riddle, uh... It... cometh... uh...

name: Jake
line: I can't imagine a riddle.

name: Finn
line: Dude, just make it super easy.

name: Riddle Master
line: THE RIDDLE COMETH! Tell me, voyager. What is simple, and yet also... a riddle?

name: Finn
line: Man, that riddle sucks.

name: Riddle Master
line: THAT IS THE WRONG ANSWER!! The penalty is... DEATH BY SNAKES!!

name: Finn
line: YEAH, RIGHT! I'VE GOT A MISSILE!!

name: Jake
line: You exploded the snakes right at us!!

name: Finn
line: I can feel them all over my face! Imaginary poison coursing through my veins!!

name: Jake
line: I'm sorry, brother! I'm so sorry!

name: Finn
line: Let's just get to your imagination machine and we'll be okay!!

name: Jake
line: AAH! A big bowl of baby elephants, chainsaws, and doo-doo's flyin' towards us!! JUMP, DUDE!!  Here come's a soul-eater! Snap its neck!  The Bazooka Goblin has you in its sights!

name: Finn
line: Hey! Don't shoot us with that bazooka!

name: Finn
line: Don't you do it...

name: Finn
line: DON'T DO IT, MAN!!!

name: Bazooka Goblin
line: Hee... heehee... hee... Okay.

name: Jake
line: YEAH!

name: Finn
line: AW, YEAH!

name: Finn
line: Alright, use your powers or something. This poison is about to kill me.

name: Jake
line: Alright. Goin' up. Check it. My imagination-off machine is left of the bed.

name: Finn
line: Is it clear?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I mean there's a bunch of cute girls... but they shouldn't bother you.

name: Finn
line: Oh! I found the shut-off lever!

name: Jake
line: Cool, man!  Dang, girl. If you weren't a figment of my imagination, I'd want to have your baby.  What're you laughin' at?

name: Finn
line: Alright. I'm gonna turn it off.  UNH!! You said it was clear of danger!!

name: Jake
line: Dude... I can't see anything... I must've imagined... an invisible monster!!

name: Finn
line: What?! Well, how do I kill it?!

name: Jake
line: I'm comin', buddy! Alright, Invisibo. Eat a piece of this!  Hurry, Finn! Get to the lever!

name: Finn
line: Okay! I'm doin' iiiit!!  Aw, yeah! The imaginary poison is gone, Jake! Jake?  Hey, come on. Wake up, man.

name: Jake
line: Hello, Finn. I am awake and healthy.

name: Finn
line: Jake... what happened to your bombastic personality?

name: Jake
line: I do not know what you mean. I am perfectly bombastic.

name: Finn
line: Nah, man, nah. Somethin's wrong. Tell me something amazing!

name: Jake
line: But Finn, I cannot tell you something amazing as there is nothing amazing happening around us that I could describe for you.

name: Finn
line: Ah, see, man, you suck now! Crap, it's your imagination. You need that thing.

name: Finn
line: Jake... Stop it, man. You're just playing one continuous note.

name: Jake
line: One note is all that is needed.

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna turn your imagination back on.  Jake! Your imagination on-off switch has vanished!

name: Jake
line: True. Doth thou not remember shutting down mine imagination?

name: Finn
line: I remembereth.

name: Jake
line: I am happy that my imagination is gone. It was purposeless.

name: Finn
line: No! It was the opposite of that stuff. I know this now...  ...only too late. Okay, man. I'm gonna try to imagine an imagination back-on switch for you, and so you know, if there's anything dainty inside my imagination, I'm gonna be mad. Imagination... go...  What the stuff? Well... this isn't so bad.  Nothing lame, at least. Hey! And there's Jake's imagination switch!

name: Finn
line: Cram. Oh! Maybe I can try imagining something.  Now for that switch.

name: Bellamy Bug
line: Good morrow, sir! My name is Bellamy Bug! Would you care for a crotchet doily my daughter made? She imbued it with her tears. You see, she recently broke up with a gentle dandy.

name: Finn
line: No! How'd you get in my Imagination Land?!

name: Bellamy Bug
line: I don't know, my young fellow! You tell me. Perhaps I represent your secret desire to be civilized!

name: Finn
line: REPRESENT THIS!  And this.  which both punch him.]

name: Bellamy
line: Oh! I say! Oh! Ah! Ouch! Ah!

name: Finn
line: Haha... Penguins... Hahahaha! Heh, alright.  I hope this works, Jake!  Haha, yeah!  Hey! Get away from that! Don't push that hyper drive button!

name: Jake
line: Aaaah!! I can imagine EVERYTHING!!!

name: Finn
line: Take a hike, fairy! Normal style!

name: Jake
line: Aw, man... I imagined my mom naked!  Yugh!

name: Finn
line: You okay?

name: Jake
line: I think so. Lemme check. Mmmm... Yup. She's clothed now. And hey, man! It's clear out now! We can go on an adventure!

name: Finn
line: I don't know, dude. I think we got all the adventure we need right here...  with... lava on the floor!

name: Jake
line: Huh?!  AAH! AAH! MY LEGS ARE MELTING! Just kidding.

name: Finn
line: Hahahaha! Good dog.

name: Finn
line: Oh, geez. Oh, geez. Ugh, come on. Uh... Come on. Come on.

name: Bubblegum
line: Finn, don't worry about it. We've got bigger fish to fry right now.

name: Finn
line: But...

name: Bubblegum
line: It's fine. Pep-but used to love being scattered all around. He used to tell me that.

name: Peppermint Butler's mouth
line: Lies!

name: Bubblegum
line: Those farmers won't keep this thing busy for long.  So it's up to the four of us to stop him. Are you ready, Marceline? Marceline? Hey, what's wrong?

name: Marceline
line: Me, I guess.

name: Bubblegum
line: What?

name: Marceline
line: Me. I'm wrong. This—all of this—this is all my fault. Even just fighting the vampires in the first place screwed everything up. Sure screwed me up, anyway. And, geez Louise, trying to fix it—trying to fix me... Just made things a thousand times worse. So why even try, you know? What's the point?

name: Bubblegum
line: What? Marceline, no. Come on! We're always the underdogs, you and me, and we always pull through. Like that one time, you remember? The case of the purloined egg?

name: Marceline
line: No! I told you, that's it. I'm done.

name: Cloud Dance
line: All right people, this is our last stand! It's gonna take every one of us to see this thing through—me, Onion Man, Short Man, Terry— whoa!—Short-Stack, Good-Beard, DeShawn, Seedman, Sandwich Paul, Angry Susan...

name: Cloud Dance
line: Muy Linda, Dr. Belstar...

name: Farmer
line: Help!

name: Cloud Dance
line: ...Limbo Man, Quasar, Dogman, Tightwad, Raspberry Sam...

name: Farmer #2
line: Up here!

name: Cloud Dance
line: ...DJ Fresh-Start, and my boy Big Trace.

name: Finn
line: You sure you're not coming, Marceline? We could really use your help. Marceline? Okay, maybe later then.

name: Jake
line: Come on, Finn! Let me hear that war cry!

name: Marceline
line: Well, you finally did it, big guy. You won. Well played. I just kind of wish you would gotten it over with a thousand years ago and saved us all some trouble.

name: Marceline
line: Better late than never, I guess.

name: Ice King
line: You remembered my song!

name: Marceline
line: Simon? W-what are you doing here?

name: Ice King
line: Well, I saw through my peeping scope that everything was going boom and exploding and monsters, and all my friends were in grave danger and horrible torment.

name: Marceline
line: And you wanted to help?

name: Ice King
line: No! I felt left out. I'm just a phone call away, you know.

name: Marceline
line: I'm sorry, Simon. Next time, for sure.  Anyway, you don't want in on this fight. This one's a loser.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, I see. Sittin' this one out, huh?

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, I guess. And don't try to talk me out of it.

name: Ice King
line: What? No, no, I'm right there with you. You and me—we're survivors, right? Like cockroaches or rats. Sure, you could fight and try to save the day, but what if you lose? Then what? You could die. Better to rot and hide like a rat, right, buddy?

name: Marceline
line: Ugh!  Did you just call me a cockroach, Simon?!

name: Ice King
line: What? No! No, no, no, no.

name: Marceline
line: Thanks, buddy.

name: Ice King
line: Yes.

name: King of Ooo
line: Ahh, this is nice. Getting a little warm for royal fineries, though.  Mm-hmm!

name: Crunchy
line: Princess? It sounds pretty bad out there. Perhaps you should protect your people.

name: King of Ooo
line: Yeesh, it does sound bad! Hey, banana men, listen to your princess! In my kingdom, we look after our own—me! You look after me! Close the gates!

name: Banana Guard
line: S-she's beautiful.

name: Banana Guard #2
line: You're preachin' to the preacher, brother.

name: King of Ooo
line: I'm beautiful! Close the gate!

name: Banana Guard
line: No. You're not beautiful.  We see you clearly now. You're earwax!

name: Banana Guard
line: You're earwax!

name: King of Ooo
line: Aah! Huh?!

name: Crunchy
line: And the power returns to Crunchy!

name: King of Ooo
line: Aah!

name: King of Ooo
line: But you love m-e-e-e-e!

name: Crunchy
line: And instead of a wax idol, they shall have a true princess... Wrought of iron, with teeth of diamonds. Her heart is ice! Her will is fire! Princess Crunchy, the unforgiving!  Go fight that thing for me!

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Finn, this ain't workin'. It's just fart grabbin'.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but what else can we do?

name: Bubblegum
line: Dudes, I don't know.

name: Farmer
line: Look!

name: Chet
line: Whoa!

name: Marceline
line: I'm gonna poop my pants if Finn kills this guy instead of me!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Wha?!

name: Marceline
line: King? Vampire king? You still in here? Hello? Too bad.

name: Marceline
line: Oh, boy! Ooh, I am famished!

name: Farmer
line: The beast weakens!

name: Cow
line: Whoa-ho-ho. Whoa!

name: Bubblegum
line: Marceline?

name: Finn
line: Marceline?

name: Marceline
line: Sorry, what?

name: Finn
line: I was just saying we stocked your fridge with lipstick and stuff, so you'll have lots to eat.

name: Marceline
line: Aww, thanks, dude.

name: Jake
line: Also, we got you crosswords, "sudukus," and connect-the-dots. Just take her easy, buddy.

name: Marceline
line: Sure.

name: Bubblegum
line: Oh, hey, I was thinking—so, once I usurp Crunchy, I'll have my castle back again, and there's plenty of room there if you don't want to be alone.

name: Marceline
line: No, I think I need to ruminate a little—think about being a vampire again.

name: Finn
line: Are you, uh... Do you feel bad? I don't want to say, like, "I'm sorry about who you are" or anything if you're feeling okay, but I don't know how bad news all of this is... Right?

name: Marceline
line: Nah, I'm cool being a vampire again. Being mortal was good... At the same time, it was terrifying. Now I'm a vampire with fresh mortal memories and—I don't know—more empathy or something... More grown-up. Bonnie, thank you for helping me grow up. Now, I guess we get to hang out together forever.

name: Finn
line: Take care!

name: Bubblegum
line: See ya, Marcy!

name: Jake
line: Later, Vampire Queen!

name: Vampire King
line: Your friends seem nice.

name: Marceline
line: Um... Are you, like, in my head now, or what?

name: Vampire King
line: For now.

name: Marceline
line: Well, just don't get in my wa—

name: Finn
line: The Tree of Blight.

name: Finn
line: Every hundred years, it spews evil spores across the land.

name: Jake
line: Then let's burn its butt down to the root rubbin's.  Finn, I can feel a bunch of eyeballs peepin' us from the woods.

line: Huuugs!

name: Finn
line: What the—?! Is this an extra butt?!  Quick, Jake! Burn the tree!

line: Huuuugs!  Gonna hug you up, boy! I'm gonna snuggle you to pieces!

name: Jake
line: Dude! The tree's about to 'splode its evil juice all over!

name: Finn
line: No!  Jake, hurry!

name: Jake

name: Jake
line: Oh...!  When you see the wicker devil in tree afterlife, tell 'im Jake says, "Hello."

name: Jake
line: Hey, buddy, you okay?

name: Finn
line: Didn't even tell me its name...

name: Jake
line: Wha..,?

name: Finn
line: Oh, sweet! Ha-ha-ha!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Hot to the touch!

name: Jake
line: Hmmmm... Dude, why're you so huggy?

name: Finn
line: I just feel affectionate, I guess. Hugging helps.

name: Jake
line: Hmm...  You've got a fever, man.

name: Finn
line: I feel hot.

line: Finn, you're hurting me.

name: Jake
line: I think you need a good night's sleep.

name: Jake
line: You feelin' better today?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. I feel like a million clams.

name: Jake
line: Good. Hey, you think we have enough candy litter?  Litter for lunch! Mmm!

line: Huh? Not again!

name: Finn
line: What's the matter, Cinnamon Bun?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Please, Finn. If you're gonna hug me again, don't make it as hard as you hugged me last night.

name: Finn
line: Uh... I didn't hug you last night.

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Yes, you did! My love handles still hurt! You came into my room around midnight and gave me a squeeze—a really strong one!

name: Finn
line: CB says I hugged 'im. Haha. Cinnamon Bun, you got some crazy notions. I tell ya.  Oh, Cinnamon Bun.   What a crazy story, buddy.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, buddy, but you were pretty huggy last night... buddy.

name: Finn
line: Wait. You don't think I actually snuck into Cinnamon Bun's room and hugged him, do you?

name: Jake
line: I'm just sayin' you were really clingy.

name: Finn
line: But no. Why would I? And don't tell me it's because I have repressed emotional feelings for Cinnamon Bun.

name: Jake
line: No. I have a theory, ...but I don't like it.

name: Jake
line: Your questionable behavior started about an hour or so after you got hugged by that wolf man, right?

name: Jake
line: Well, I've been thinkin' that maybe that wolf man wasn't what he seemed. Maybe he was some sort of hug wolf. Yeah, here it is.  "Hug wolves—a subset of wolf men which roam the countryside with a fervid hug lust. Every night, hug wolves must go out and hug people to satisfy their insatiable craving for hugs. To become a hug wolf, one must be hugged by an alpha hug wolf on the night of a full moon."!

name: Finn
line: Like last night!

name: Jake
line: Yes. So you must be a beta hug wolf. A lower-level creature.

name: Finn
line: Well, how can I get uncursed?

name: Jake
line: Lemme, um... read the book a little more. Says there's no known cure.

name: Finn
line: Uh... I'm scared, Jake...

name: Jake
line: No hugs!!

name: Finn
line: I'm sorry!  I feel hot! Rrrrr!!

name: Jake
line: What's wrong, BMO?

name: BMO
line: I am terrified of Finn.

name: Jake
line: Hmm. Well, that plant's not gonna protect you.  You can get this under control, buddy. ARE YOU READY TO OVERCOME THIS THING??

name: Finn
line: I think so.

name: Jake
line: I said... ARE YOU READY TO OVERCOME THIS THING??

name: Finn
line: Yeah. I heard you. I said I think so.

name: Jake
line: I'm tryin'a' getcha to shout.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Okay. IS THIS GOOD?!?

name: Jake
line: Never mind. Now. I want you to think about hugging a cactus. How would that feel?

name: Finn
line: Prickly and painful.

name: Jake
line: Good, good, you're doin' great!

name: Jake
line: No, you can't hug anything.

name: Finn

name: Jake
line: Oh, no, the hug lust is already takin' over your brain!

name: Finn
line: I want to hug you, Jake! Close!

name: Jake
line: Finn... say something to reassure me.

line: I'LL HUG YOUR MOM!

line: Hug wolf, away!

line: Surely this frosted drink will soothe my fevered tempers.  Hellooo? Good heavens! A lycanthrope! AAAAH!!

line: Hug you up, bro!

line: People of the Candy Kingdom, all I've ever wanted was to keep you all safe, ...and because I can't undo the hugs I've caused, my sole wish is to be locked up forever in the Candy Dungeon.

line: You sad mobs. Y'all wish you had this sweet dang bucket!  Yaaaah!  Aah! It's mine time!  Get beat dead-meat!  My tool! Die!  Oh, a li'l zombie carrot.  I should've washed it.

line: Impertinence.  Nyah! Grow! Grooow!

line: You poor things... Living down here has made you all weird, hasn't it?  Jake, I've got to save these guys! They're my people, and it's my duty to lead them outta this gross cave! Starting with you, Miss, uh...

name: Finn
line: Hmmm...  Perfect!  How's yours, Susan?

name: Jake
line: Heh. That's adorable. Hup!

name: Susan

name: Finn
line: Susan!  Susan!! No! You can't eat the ones that talk! They're special! They got aspirations.

line: Ohh-ho.

line: Hey, buddy! We did it! Finn? You okay?

line: We're all wild animals, brother.

line: Yeah... I guess we are... brother.

line: "I'm not talking today"

line: "Me too"

name: Finn

line: Finn, Jake, I invited some Bikini Babes over to dance to this song!  It's my favorite song, it makes me so happy!  Um, why are you not talking?

line: "Oh dang, the toast?",

name: Finn

name: Finn
line: Hey, Jake, do you think you should date someone just like you or someone who’s like your opposite?

name: Jake
line: I don’t know. I’m the "first come first serve" kinda guy. Get in line, ladies! This Rainicorn thing can’t last forever!   I didn’t mean that. Don’t spread that around.

name: Finn
line: So it’s not good to weigh someone’s qualities against your own?

name: Jake
line: Well, no. I mean, if you feel something, you feel something!  It’s not about personality matrixals and charts, it’s all about the bu-bumps in your heart!  You can’t stop the pumps and bumps! Pumps and bumps! Pumps and bumps!

name: Finn
line: Alright, well, what about BMO and Ice King?

name: Jake
line: What about them?

name: Finn
line: Would they make a good couple?

name: Jake
line: Whoa! Wait! Did BMO say something to you?

line: No no!

name: Jake
line: Oh, I see. You’re being weird.

line: It’s not that weird! Come on!

line: Do what thoust will be the whole piece of Law.

name: Jake
line: BMO and Ice King?

line: Yeah!

name: Jake
line: You’re creepin’ me out.

name: Finn
line: I’m just thinkin’ out loud.  What, can’t think out loud?

name: Jake
line: Oh, is that what you’re doing?

name: Finn
line: Yeah man! Pffft, jeez don’t be judgy.

name: Jake
line: I’m not!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, you are!

name: Jake
line: How could you know that?

name: Finn
line: I can hear it in your tone.

name: Jake
line: You can?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, wise-guy.

name: Jake
line: Hey, what’s that in your pants?

name: Finn
line: What?! Not again!  Oh. I don’t know.  Whoa, look.

name: Jake
line: Crazy.  Careful, dude.

name: Finn
line: What the--?

name: Jake
line: What the heck?! Are they alive?!

name: Finn
line: Hey, are you guys alive?  I don’t know, man, I think they’re some kind of magic toy.

name: Jake
line: Maybe it’s black magic. Maybe we shouldn’t mess with them.

name: Finn
line: No, man, look! That’s you!  You’re totally shedding on the viola.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, that’s good. How many more thingies are in there?

name: Finn
line: Dude. Like a lot. Come on! Let’s check this out at the house.

name: Jake
line: I’ll make a special spagot  with a new sauce.

name: Finn
line: Sheesh. So many. PB, you hang out with Lady.  C-listers, go back in the bag.

name: Jake
line: Who’s in the C-list?

name: Finn
line: Tiffany, Donny.  Well, he’s okay.  Xergiok... a bunch o' these guys!

name: Jake
line: That’s not very nice.

name: Finn
line: Don’t worry, man. They’ll get involved eventually.

name: Jake
line: Involved with what?

name: Finn
line: I don’t know. Involved. Check out Lady and Princess Bubblegum!

name: Jake
line: What are they talkin’ about?

name: Finn
line: It’s hard to say, but I think it’s got something to do with Lady being preggos .

name: Jake
line: Whoa! What kinda narrative are you trying to create here?!

name: Finn
line: That’s your narrative, buddy.

name: Jake
line: Alright, well, what else ya got goin’ on?

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Not much really. I got Ice King over here.

name: Jake
line: Ice King? He’s not C-list?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, well, I saw his drum kit in here. Here we go.  Okay, jam out, little Ice King.

name: Jake
line: No. Don’t play with that hack. Aww, man. Hmm.  They’ve got good chemistry. Who’d have guessed?

name: Finn
line: Chemistry...

name: Jake
line: Hey, Finn, eat the food before it gets cold.  I made a new sauce! Umm, earth to Finn, are you okay?

name: Finn
line: Yeees.

name: Finn
line: Whoooooa.

name: Jake
line: You’re up early.

name: Finn
line: I didn’t sleep.

name: Jake
line: You stay up all night readin’ trash books?  I told you, man. Those datin’ books.  That stuff is mess you up.

name: Finn
line: I’m not reading. I’m playing with the little wees.

name: Jake
line: Oh, let me see little me.  Me look so lonely. Hey, Finn, pass me little Lady.

name: Finn
line: Uh, you guys broke up.

name: Jake
line: Wha?

name: Finn
line: She’s with someone else now.

name: Jake
line: Who?!

name: Finn
line: He’s a cool guy, don’t worry about it.

name: Jake
line: Ahhhhhh!  What the ball, man?!

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: What? What do ya think “what”?!

name: Finn
line: Come on, they’re not real, they’re like toys. These guys here, they’re goin’ out.  Pretty serious. And look at Choose Goose and Lollipop Girl. They’re still testing the waters.  But I think things are gonna work out. Check out Xergiok and Turtle P.  Weird. But cool. Right, Jake?

name: Jake
line: I don’t like where you’re going with this. It ain’t wholesome. I’m gonna go to Lady’s for a few days. To clear my head.

name: Finn
line: Okay. Whatever whatevs.  Weird.  Huh?

name: Jake
line: I’m back! I got over all that messed up stuff you did.  Yeesh. You okay, man?

name: Finn
line: I don’t know.

name: Jake
line: What’s little Finn doing?

name: Finn
line: He’s... thinking.

name: Jake
line: He looks sad. What’s he thinking about?

name: Finn
line: I don’t know. Probably lots of stuff.

name: Jake
line: Where’s little Rainicorn?

name: Finn
line: Probably still crying.

name: Jake
line: Wha?

name: Finn
line: She’s not handling the break-up very well.

name: Jake
line: Aww.

name: Finn
line: PB's good, though.  After little Finn dumped her, she started working out. Looks like she’s really into it.

name: Jake
line: This is messed up, dude. You’ve crossed the line from weird curiosity to some dark messed up stuff.

name: Finn
line: I know!

name: Jake
line: The destruction!  The depravity!  The wrongness of it all! I’m taking that bag back to the cliff where we found it.

name: Finn
line: No, man! I gotta fix this mess! Look at me, man! I’m staring into the shadow of my darkest mind hole! I gotta help him!

name: Jake
line: You can’t! Just let them do their own biz, man!

name: Finn
line: I junked them up too hard though! I gotta step in!

name: Jake
line: How would ya do that?

name: Finn
line: I’m gonna talk to him.

name: Jake
line: But he can’t hear you.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, why is that?

name: Jake
line: Hmm. Maybe we’re on different dimensional planes and the border between our planes is like a two way mirror. So we can see him, but he can’t see us.

name: Finn
line: Lemme try this. Finn! Can you hear me?  We’re connected! FINN!

name: Jake
line: Try shakin’ him.

name: Finn
line: Why?

name: Jake
line: Maybe we’re vibrating on different intervals. Try shakin’ him at different speeds and see if he responds.

name: Finn
line: Okay. Fiiiiiiinn! Fiiiiiiiiiinn!

name: Jake
line: Now go faster!

name: Finn
line: FIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIINN!

name: Jake
line: Faster!

name: Finn
line: FIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIINN!

name: Jake
line: Go slower, he saw you!

name: Finn
line: Okay.  Fiiiinn. Can you hear me?

name: Little Finn
line: Wah wah wah.

name: Jake
line: Whoa! Neat!

name: Finn
line: I made you do those crummy things. I’m why yous guys is fighting. I’m the big you. I came to apologize. I will never interfere with your lives again.  Don’t worry I will take care of it.  Sorry, my arm got tired.  Never mind. It’ll be fine. Goodbye, little Finn! I’m not coming back!

name: Jake
line: Now what?

name: Finn
line: Hey, ladies! This is big Finn! I caused all the problems! It wasn’t anyone’s fault! Don’t be mad at each other! Have a… dance party! Okay, goodbye! I’m not coming back!

name: Jake
line: Is that gonna do it?  Get the C-listers out.  Good party. Oh, flip!  Look who’s hittin’ it off with the Ice King!

line: Ugh. I'm covered in noobs.

line: T.V., 잘 지내니?

line: I've got hunger cranks.

line: Hmm? Oh, yes. That's very  interesting.

name: T.V.
line: Kim Kil Whan.

line: Hm.

name: T.V.
line: Rrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrraahh!  Mom, when are we gonna eat?! I'm going nuts!

line: T.V., 말조심해!

line: Seriously, Mom, Dad's already three hours late with the food!

line: You hush, Junior. You know Dad's a wonderful cook.

line: Viola, when's the last time you even heard from Dad?

name: Viola
line: Oh, you know. Dad is... distractible.

name: Jake Jr.
line: "Distractible"!

name: T.V.
line: Yeah, I love Dad and everything, but he's only ever met me twice.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Charlie, Viola, T.V., Jake Jr., Kim Kil Whan, 제발! 너네 아빠가 너를 얼마나 보고 싶어하는데.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Whoo!

name: Finn
line: Whoo! Whoo-hoo!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah! We're real late! Happy birthday, puppies! Okay, so, putting it out there—I didn't remember to bring you guys any birthday presents, but I did bring lunch!  It's macaroni salad.

name: Viola
line: Dad, you're beautiful!

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Dad! We have new business to discuss.

name: Jake
line: Happy birthday, Kim Kil Whan.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Birthdays are old business.

name: Jake
line: Whoa, neat. Um, well, how are things going, Son?

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: "Things"? "Things" have switched hands.

name: Jake
line: Heh.  I get it.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Dad, when I say that things have switched hands, I mean to say that things you have previously claimed ownership of have transferred from your hands to my hands, in that...  I bought your tree house.

name: Jake
line: What?!

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: What the deed to your tree house. How acquired through legal trade. From whom the deed's previous owner, Marceline The Vampire Queen...  in exchange for one lunatic bass.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: When effective immediately.

name: Jake
line: But, Son, why?

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: We will convene at the property.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Sorry I'm late. Okay, so, as the deed-holder of this tree house I am now your landlord.  The first thing I'm going to have to do is assess your treasure room.

name: Jake
line: But son!  What would your mother say? Doing this to your poor Pip-Pop!

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: I'm sorry Dad. Deeds don't bleed.

name: Jake
line: Okay son. Get ready to be glitter-stunned by all this treasu--Oh, yeah. We spent all of it.  All we have left are these vintage photos I got at the flea market. They're interesting!

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Woof.  All right.  So I guess this is the apartment the two of you can afford. It's a ladder.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Yeah? Yeah. Send them on over.  Sorry about that.  Anyway, as you can see, this beauty offers direct first and second floor access. Superb craftsmanship and etcetera. I suppose you're familiar.  Yes, Finn?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, uh, when are we going to get our house back?

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: What?  Excuse me.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Good afternoon! Yes, right this way.  I've got 37 available units to show in this building so we're going to want to get right to it. Please step inside.  There you go. Is that everyone? Good, good. Please make your way upstairs and we'll begin the tour.  And you two make yourselves at home. Rent's due on the first, no overnight guests. Oh, and flush once after you boom-boom but before you start using the TP, and then once more in the middle of using the TP if you're going to use a lot. It's easier on the pipes. Okay. Call me if you need me.

name: Jake
line: Hey Finn. I'm real sorry about this. Somehow I feel like it's kinda my fault.

name: Finn
line: Nah man. It's really not so bad. Let's just sleep on it tonight.

name: Jake
line: You're gonna sleep... like that?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man. It's tough. I'm a tough kid.

name: Jake
line: I promise, I'll work this thi--Aaah!

name: Creature
line: Gee but it's great to be back home, eh Mr. B?

name: Mr. B
line: Haha, yeah. I can't wait to wash my gross, fat butt.

name: Goblin
line: Oh, oh holy cow. Oh, oh boy, please hurry. Yes, he's inside my apartment right now! Oh, I'm so scared!

name: Jake
line: Hey buddy, you okay?

name: Goblin
line: Glob, now there's two of 'em!

name: Jake
line: I just feel if we're patient this whole thing will work itself out before you know it.  Haha! See, man? Help is on the way!

name: Finn
line: Man, can I tell you something? I don't even know what's going on here. I mean like, what the heck is a deed? How come he can buy our house when it's OUR house and Marceline gave it to us and we live there?! A-and now we're arrested?! This is crazy! It's crazy!!

name: Jake
line: Man, don't you know? The laws ain't made to help earthy cats like us.

name: Finn
line: They're not?!

name: Jake
line: Nah, man. Listen. Here on our planet, back in the old days, back in the REAL old days, it was just every man for hisself. Scrooblin' and scrat-scroblin' for the good stuff, the greenest valleys, and scrat-scroblin'. And the strongest, meanest men got the best stuff. They got the green valleys and were like, "The rest of you, y'all scrats get sand!" And THAT'S when they made the laws, you see. Once the strong guys got it how they liked it, they said, "This is fair now, this is the law." Once they were winning, they changed the rules up.

name: Finn
line: Woah, just like Kim Kil Whan!

name: Banana Guard
line: Hey, good news, fellas.  Your bail's paid. You're free to go.

name: Jake
line: Haha, that's awesome!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, awesome!

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Yeah. Real "awesome."

name: Jake
line: Hey, Kim Kil Whan! Aw buddy, I knew you'd come around!  Haha, fathers and sons, man. That's that REAL thick chowder.  What's this?

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: This is a bill for the bail I just paid.

name: Jake
line: Ooh.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: You're really in it deep here, Dad. It's time for you to get real, get a job. No more games.

name: Jake
line: Come on, son! Just let me do the--

name: Jake
line: Man, where did I go wrong?

name: Finn
line: I don't know. But I'm not tryin' to be sleepin' on a ladder anymore, so let's just get a bunch of scroot together and buy our house back. Then you two can hash it out later.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, you're right. So, wanna rob a bank or somethin'?

name: Finn
line: Well, actually...I was thinking maybe Kim Kil Whan was right.  Maybe we should get jobs or somethin'.

name: Jake
line: Oh yeah.... Yeah. Oh no, wait! I just remembered I buried a ton of gold in the front yard!

name: Finn
line: Yuss!!

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Oh yes, yes, absolutely. Small pets are allowed with an additional deposit.  Excellent.

name: Finn
line: Watch it!

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Excuse me.

name: Breakfast Princess
line: We are delighted to host this year's Princess Day in Breakfast Kingdom! Please enjoy the continental breakfast expertly prepared by our Breakfast Chefs. Now, on to more pressing matters. Brigands have been attacking our western seaports, dozens of unregistered princesses roam the land, and trade deficits are at an all-time high. Historically, Breakfast Kingdom has traded one sack of sugar a month to Slime Kingdom in exchange for four eggs, but egg production has plummeted!

name: Slime Princess
line: I can't just pop out eggs on command! I'm an artisan!

name: Breakfast Princess
line: You have an egg in you right now.

name: Slime Princess
line: How dare you?

name: Muscle Princess
line: Yeah, and what about that peanut juice, Peanut Princess? My body needs juice!

name: Peanut Princess
line: I'm not giving out a single drop of nut butter. Not until Raggedy Princess pays me!

name: Raggedy Princess
line: Fine! Take it!  Take all my socks!

name: Peanut Princess
line: You still owe me a pair of jorts!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Aaah!  You guys, I'm bored out of my face! I make a motion to stop talking about dumb stuff that's lame!
