line: Uh, no I didn't...

name: Jake
line: Haha, nice try, Finn. Let's get outta here.

name: Finn
line: That one's going in the vault.  Aaaaand... It's gone.

name: Ice King
line: Ach! Where the turd is my Demonic Wishing Eye?! Grrrr...  I've looked everywhere! Ugh...

name: Gunter
line: Wenk!

name: Ice King
line: What is it, girl?

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: You know where it is? Lead the way! Oh boy, this is just wonderful!  Hmnh.  Agh! You just want me to brush you! You know this brush is for princesses only?  Ah, princesses only. No Gunthers!

name: Ice King
line: What are my options here? Hmm. Hm-hm.  Gunther! What is your damage today?  Ooh! Wizard market!  W-I-Z-...

name: Ice King
line: Hey!  You're really peeving me off, Gunther! Go stand in the corner!

name: Ice King
line: I said stand in the corner.

name: Ice King
line: Ugh. You make me sick.  Try not to break anything while I'm gone.

name: Finn
line: Gunther?  Uhhh...  Jake? We gots penguins.

name: Jake
line: Hm-huh? Hmm? Oh, yeah...  thanks...

name: Finn
line: Come on, you guys! Get off me, now.  Wah! Wah! Grah!

name: Penguins
line: Wah! Wah! Grah!

name: Finn
line: Jake?

name: Jake
line: Huh?  Hey!  Now shoo, ya little creeps!  Oh... this is unusual.

name: Finn
line: Glip... driggle!

name: Jake
line: Eh... What's with these super penguins?

name: Finn
line: I don't know! I'm guessing it's the Ice King.

name: Jake
line: Well, where is he, then?

name: Finn
line: ICE KIIIIING!

name: Ice King
line: Wizards rule.

name: Ice King
line: Doot-doo, deet-dee-doo. Ah, let's see.  That's the symbol for magic items, right?  Hey, this is the magic items shop, right?

name: Huntress Wizard
line: What's it look like, ya donk?

name: Ice King
line: I know that, I know! Why can't they write it on the sign, though? Why's it all gotta be secret? Let's just put it all out there, huh? Equal distribution of magic to the people!  No more symbols! No more initiations!  Ya feelin' me, Huntress Wizard?

name: Huntress Wizard
line: You tryin' to get killed, Ice King?

name: Ice King
line: Uh-uh, I was just steppin' to ya, girl, with my intellectual wizard politics.  No, don't go.  Well, "Swing at every ball," that's what Jay T. Doggzone says.  Hello?

name: Bufo
line: ...So then he was telling me to beef in the eye of Glob and stuff.

name: Laser Wizard
line: Whoa. Did you do it?

name: Bufo
line: Heck yes, I did.

name: Forest Wizard
line: Yo, I wouldn't do that.

name: Laser Wizard
line: Get over it, man. Don't you want to reach the highest initiation of the secret schools?

name: Forest Wizard
line: Of course, man. In shadow, we find the light...  safely sealed in darkest night. So make sure y'all keep it tight. Wizards only, fools.

name: Ice King
line: Keep what tight?

name: Laser Wizard
line: A secret you never should've heard, Ice King.

name: Ice King
line: Yo. Guys. Chill. I lost my Demonic Wishing Eye.  Just get me a new one and I'll jet. I didn't hear nothin' about no weird, secret wizard club that I want to be a part of.

name: Forest Wizard
line: Loose lips sink the ships, Ice King.

name: Bufo
line: Sorry, man.  Nothing personal.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, slid—  You guys!  Ah!  Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Okay, I give up.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Gunther?!

name: Jake
line: Nice ice!

name: Finn
line: What's goin' on here, man? Call off your super bros.

name: Jake
line: Well, that's great.

name: Finn
line: Where's the Ice King, Gunther?  Gunther?! What? Alright.  Whoa!

name: Finn & Jake
line: WHAAAA!

name: Finn
line: Is this happening everywhere?

name: Jake
line: I don't know—lemme see.  Whoop!  Dang!

name: Finn
line: What do ya see?

name: Jake
line: Hold on.  Oh no! NO!

name: Finn
line: What, dude?!

name: Jake
line: Hold on, man. Wait. Oh, Glob! This can't be happening!

name: Finn
line: Tell me!

name: Jake
line: Eh, it's over. We've been conquered.

name: Finn
line: Who's been conquered?

name: Jake
line: Everyone.

name: Finn
line: By the Ice King?

name: Jake
line: No, dude! By Gunther.

name: Finn
line: Holy shmow! Gimme that!  Gunther's heading for the Candy Kingdom! We gotta save them!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, okay.

name: Finn
line: Hurry, Jake! Wait—I'm still in my pajayjays.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yo, Finn, are you seeing these penguins?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, it's Gunther! He's taking over the whole thing!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, he'll have to beat my Banana Guards and my Gumball Guardians.

name: Jake
line: That's not gonna work.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What did he say?

name: Finn
line: He says your plan is bunk.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, what's your plan?

name: Finn
line: I got a plan.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You do?

name: Finn
line: When we get there, I'll do my plan in addition to your plan. Two plans. Laters.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Uh, alright, so you're not gonna tell me your—

name: Finn
line: I'm outies!

name: Jake
line: You're not gonna tell her the plan?

name: Finn
line: No, I gotta be mysterious.

name: Jake
line: What? I thought you weren't into Bubblegum anymore.

name: Finn
line: I'm not. But this is how I act now with all the ladies, you see? I keep 'em in a state of confusion. That way, I've always got options in case Flame Princess doesn't work out.

name: Jake
line: OH MY GOSH! Where is this coming from?!

name: Finn
line: It's called "future farming." I read it in that book you have by Jay T. Doggzone.

name: Jake
line: Jay T. Dogg—awww, dude! Don't read that book! It's gonna mess up your brain. I keep that book around for laughs. It's all really bad advice.

name: Finn
line: Oh, okay. I'll stop it, then.

name: Jake
line: No, well... you can still be mysterious—that's fine.

name: Finn
line: What? Now I'm confused.

name: Jake
line: Never mind—I didn't say nothin'.

name: Finn
line: Hey P-Bubs! Are you ready?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes. The calvary  is standing by.

name: Finn
line: Cool. I'm gonna rally some citizens and do this other plan.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, but what—?

name: Finn
line: Good luck!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Jake, what's with all the mystery?

name: Jake
line: Uhhh...  Oh snap, look out!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Banana Guards, defend!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Aw, jeez.

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Evil presence detected. Must defend candy. Dange— aaah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You'll never get past these walls... I think.

name: Finn
line: This... is my plan. I got the Candy Kingdom underground to help me collect all the bottles in the land.

name: Jake
line: Breaking news that mystery plan of yours is a smash hit.  Because the—of the glass... I guess all they care about is bottles, huh.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: But what'll happen when they run out of bottles?

name: Finn
line: I won't let that happen, Prubbs.

name: Gunter
line: We-e-e-e-e-enk...

name: Finn
line: Stay back!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wait a minute!  Put away your weapons and we'll get you more bottles.

name: Finn
line: Peeb! There aren't any bottles left!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I have a third plan.

name: Jake
line: So, we make them new bottles. Then the Gunthers break the bottles, and then we pick up the glass and make new bottles again?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yup.

name: Finn
line: What, like, forever?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes.

name: Finn
line: Bubb, your plan... bunks.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Heh, yeah.

name: Jake
line: I like it. I got a rhythm goin'!

name: Gunter
line: Wenk!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What? What do you want? I don't—

name: Finn
line: He wants to smash the Gumball Guardian's head!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We're going to make more bottles. Just wait, okay?

name: Finn, Jake, and Princess Bubblegum
line: NO!

name: Gumball Guardian
line: Goodbye... Princess!

name: Ice King
line: Hey. What's goin' on here? Why's this place all crazy? I was just flying by and—  Gunther! You took my stuff!

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: That's bad. You know what you get now?!

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: That's right, you get the squirty-squirts.  Bad, bad. Now take off my Demonic Wishing Eye.

name: Ice King
line: Alright, Gunther. Now go home.

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: That's right, walk. And while you're walking home, you think about what you did.  It's getting worse and worse with him. He just—he hates it when I leave the castle. I'm sorry, guys.

name: Jake
line: Uh, dude? Where have you been?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, and why are you all jacked up?

name: Ice King
line: Heh... well, I got into some crazy wiz biz over in Wizard City. Honestly, I don't even know how I survived. Basically, it was the craziest showdown ever. I— I wish I could tell you all about it, but you know—"Wizards only, fools." Keep it tight.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Princess, he did it! Root Beer Guy set up the force field!

name: Finn
line: But he sacrificed himself to do it.

name: Jake
line: It's an ugly scene, man.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Let me see.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Rest in peace, Root Beer Guy.

name: Maja
line: Give up now, Princess, and I, Maja the Sky Witch, promise not to completely donk up your kingdom.

name: Darren
line: I make no such promise. Darren must feed.

name: Crunchy
line: Oh, Glob! Oh, oh, oh!

name: Maja
line: Oh, well.  What can you do?

name: Candy Person
line: Crunchy, chill. Chill.

name: Maja
line: Keepers of the clock, masters of dimension, bear witness!

name: Maja
line: By my power, I compel you to converge!

name: Maja
line: Past and present, be one. Awaken the terror of a forgotten age in this moment that is all moments in the blink of an eye.

name: Maja
line: Darren, the ancient sleeper, arise!

name: Darren
line: I had a dream I was fighting an army that could birth new soldiers from their own blood. I was endless. Does that make sense?

name: Maja
line: Yes. You want to go conquer the Candy Kingdom?

name: Darren
line: What's that?

name: Maja
line: It's a place that contains the highest levels of caring and sentimental affection in all of Ooo.

name: Darren
line: What is caring? What kind of world is this?

name: Maja
line: It's a feeling I use in my magic to give me power. Like this shirt that was once the prized possession of Princess Bubblegum. With the feelings in this shirt, I was able to summon you.

name: Darren
line: I don't—walk me through this.

name: Maja
line: All right.

name: Darren
line: This kingdom of candy...

name: Maja
line: Yes?

name: Darren
line: I will lay it to waste, turn their people to salt.

name: Maja
line: Yeah...

name: Darren
line: And garnish a million meals with the salt, which we will eat for eternity.

name: Maja
line: That's not my plan exactly, but you'll be fine. I promise.

name: Darren
line: I promise, as well, to deliver destruction so thorough that all realities are affected.

name: Maja
line: Okay. We'll talk about that.

name: Darren
line: All realities.

name: Maja
line: Hey! We'll talk about it!

name: Maja
line: Break this witch out, Darren.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: How long will your force field hold, Gridface Princess?

name: Gridface Princess
line: The sleeper's magic is older than legend. I don't know how he disabled both Gumball Guardians, but at least I know my tech is tight. The field will hold long enough for you to think of a weak plan.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Colonel Candy Corn?

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Uh, yes, Princess.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ready the cannons. You got me? If they get through that barrier, I don't want to have to use our ground troops.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Will do, Princess. And let me just say... thank you for putting this old crease back in the field. I haven't been the same since my lovely Linda passed away.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah. Good luck.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Oh, I tried dating again, you know? But these young girls think I'm too serious or something.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Why don't you date someone your own age?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Peppermint Butler, come on!

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Oh, women my age don't hang out. Where are they hiding?

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: I need a young girl with an old soul to heal my heart.

name: Darren
line: This is taking too long.

name: Maja
line: Then do the thing!

name: Darren
line: I call forth the Legion of Cadmus, the Dragon's Teeth!

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: What am I supposed to—oh! Party's starting. Load 'em up, soldiers!

name: Candy soldier
line: Yeah, just put it in there. I don't know.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Oh, dang!

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Fire!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn and Jake, are you ready to—what the...? Finn?  Where the jam is Finn?!

name: Banana Guard
line: I don't know. Weren't they just here?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What the jam?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: All right. Finn or no Finn, PB's got to get in that biz.  Hyah!

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Why have you stopped firing?

name: Candy soldier
line: We ran out of ammo, colonel.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: That's nonsense, soldier.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: This is how you defend your kingdom! Fire, you wimps!  Ya-ha!

name: Candy soldiers
line: Ah!

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: For the kingdom!

name: Candy soldiers
line: For the king...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, zang!

name: Candy soldiers
line: ...ingdom!

name: Maja
line: Eat it, tranch!

name: Darren
line: It's over, Princess. Prepare to be annihilated across all dimensions.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Princess! No!

name: Maja
line: Wait, Darren! Dial it back. I need her residual feelings.

name: Darren
line: What the flip is feelings? Darren only understands life and death!

name: Darren
line: Wah!

name: Maja
line: What the slizz?!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yeah, boy!

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: Hi, Darren.

name: Maja
line: The Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant?!

name: Darren
line: Eli, were you asleep forever too? All this stuff is different now. What are we even doing here?

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: Yes, it's been a difficult adjustment.

name: Finn
line: Blaze his face, Eli!

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: Yes, master.

name: Ice King
line: Yo! Leave me out of it!

name: Maja
line: No!

name: Darren
line: Yeah, right.

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: Finn, his weakness is his brain seed.

name: Finn
line: Okay!

name: Finn
line: Whoo-hoo-hoo! Whoo-hoo!

name: Finn
line: Oh, uh!  Aah!

name: Darren
line: Thank you.

name: Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Banana Guard
line: Well, I guess my kids still have a daddy.

name: Colonel Candy Corn
line: Bam, you dope!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Party tonight in the Candy Kingdom!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, where's Finn?

name: Finn
line: Hi.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay. Y'all bring food and bevs. Finn, you make the guac, all right?

name: Finn
line: I'll make the guaaaaaaaaaaac.

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: Finn! Finn!

name: Finn
line: Yo! What's up, APTWE?

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: What do I do now?

name: Finn
line: Dude, I don't know. Probably not go back in the basement. You're so big'uns. You should be free, boy.

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: Free to do what? I need psychic commands.

name: Finn
line: Can you help me dice tomatoes for this guac?

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: No.

name: Finn
line: You see, man, I feel weird giving you orders. You should just do your own thing. Realize your potential.

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: But this is what I am—a war machine who serves its master.

name: Finn
line: No, man. You're more than that.  Whoops. I see into your brain, remember? You'll do great. Just go for it. I believe in you, man.

name: Finn
line: Oh, word. Thanks.

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: Maybe Darren was right. There's no place for my ancient ways.

name: Finn
line: Don't think like that, dude! Come back and see us whenevs!

name: Ant
line: I'm doing this for a reason. What choice is there?

name: Baby birds
line: Hungry! Hungry! Hungry!

name: Mama bird
line: Must feed babies.

name: Sun
line: Hey! Elephant. I'm more ancient than you. Someday, I will engulf the solar system. What was and what will be are meaningless. Meanwhile, you should wonder are you just a two-headed pile of meat on a crash course with the cosmic dump? Or do you contain the soul memory of a million dead stars? How do you light a candle without a match?

name: Maja
line: Hello? Who's that? Why can't I see jack?

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: You bonked your head. You're in a coma, but I can help.

name: Maja
line: Um, all right. Are you, like, powerful?

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: Yes. I can fly and do lasers from my nose.

name: Maja
line: Okay. I can run with this. Take me to the Candy Kingdom and shoot your laser nose at it.

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: No. I must decide, in this moment, what is best. For now, I am the match and the candle.

name: Maja
line: What?

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: I will be your friend and keep you alive, until you regain consciousness, maybe.

name: Maja
line: Ugh, that plan sounds like dirt!

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: See through my eyes, Maja.

name: Maja
line: Ah! It's bright! Wait! You're the flippin' elephant! You laser-nosed me! Somebody help! Oh, my Glob. Somebody!

name: Leaf
line: Well, this wasn't part of my plan.

name: Caterpillar
line: Hey, man. I'm gonna eat you.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What the...  "mmmmn Princess Bubblegum, we are starving, immediately send us all of your candy. How dare you, ours, Lemon Grabs."  Bull gunk! I left them a lifetime supply of candy!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey Finn! Hey Jake! Can you come up here? I have a job for you!

name: Finn
line: Okay!

name: Jake
line: Sorry CB, we'll finish this up later.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Preebs.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, guys. I got a letter from the earls of Lemongrab. They've gone through all the food that I've sent them.  This case contains precious candy seeds for the Lemongrabs to grow new food.  So, I need you two to deliver these seeds to Lemon Castle.

name: Finn
line: For sure. We'll do it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Good luck, gentlemen!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Bye, girlfriend!

name: Jake
line: Hey, Lemongrabs! You home?

name: Finn
line: Holy--!

name: Finn
line: Jake? Jake, Jake, Jake, Jake!

name: Jake
line: Kiss it!

name: Finn
line: Aah! Sorry, dudes--got no food! No... food!  Hey!

name: Jake
line: Hey! Weirdos!  Get the birthday cake!

name: Lemonjon
line: Are you lemon?

name: Finn and Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: What the thing is up with this guy?

name: Lemonjon
line: Does your head come to a nub?

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Lemonjon
line: You are un-lemon.

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Cool, man. Hey, do you know where--?

name: Lemonjon
line: I am Lemonjon. I see you made it past our Lemon mmmmmmmeringerie!

name: Finn
line: Wait, what?

name: Lemonjon
line: They're quite hungry.

name: Finn
line: Yeah. What the heck's going on here?

name: Lemonjon
line: There is no food, only Lemons--Lemons with bellies empty but for lemon lusts!

name: Finn
line: Whatever, Lemonjon. We've gotta give those dumb-butts these seeds.

name: Jake
line: Where should we go?

name: Lemonjon
line: Mmmmmmmy senses tell me that they're in the dungeon. They've been there for three weeks. Three weeks, dungeon.

name: Jake
line: I wonder who put them in there.

name: Finn
line: I don't know, but we gotta bust them out! Which way to the dungeon, Lemonjon?

name: Jake
line: Oh, cool!

name: Finn
line: Thanks, man!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, thanks, man!

name: Jake
line: Hmmm.

name: Jake
line: Hmmm.

name: Finn
line: Yo, Lemon-wipes!

name: Jake
line: Yech.

name: Jake
line: Um, maybe we should hands... for safety.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, sure!

name: Jake
line: So, where'd you want to look ne-- Eeeh!  Uh, Finn?!

name: Finn
line: Oh, sorry dude.

name: Finn
line: Stay close to me.

name: Jake
line: Nope!

name: Jake
line: I think this is it.

name: Finn
line: All locked up!  There they are! Hey, Lemongrabs, we're here! We're gonna get you out, just hold tight!

name: Lemongrab
line: Go away.

name: Lemongrab 2
line: No food here.

name: Jake
line: Maybe the kidnapper's in there, too, coercing them.

name: Finn
line: Probably the grossest one of all, too--beet red skin, barf, poopin' all its junk-sculpture.

name: Jake
line: Ah, stop, man! You're just makin' it worse!  Let's just get this over with.

name: Finn
line: Lemongrabs, you're free!

name: Lemongrab
line: They broke the door! The door is broken now!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: FIX THE DOOR!

name: Jake
line: Fix the door? What?! What? Fix the door? Fix--what? What's goin' on here? Fix the door. Finn, what's goin' on? Fix the door.

name: Lemongrab
line: It doesn't matter anymore.

name: Lemongrab 2
line: There is no more candy to hoard. Let them keep what crumbs they find, for there are no crumbs.

name: Lemongrabs
line: NO CRUMBS!

name: Finn
line: Are you saying you locked yourselves down here with all the food so you could eat it yourselves?

name: Jake
line: You know there's guys starvin' up there?!

name: Lemongrab
line: Hmm. No, no. You do not understand. It is not us for whom they starve, but them...

name: Lemongrab 2
line: ...for whom they starve.

name: Lemongrab
line: Mm! Yes, yes! For the candy food was not consumed--no, no--but was given life!

name: Finn
line: Wha--?

name: Lemongrab
line: You see, Finn,  when Mother Princess last visited Lemongrab...

name: Lemongrab 2
line: ...when she saw fit to create me, Lemongrab...

name: Lemongrab
line: ...she left behind a little something-something the secret formula for creating candy life! She must have meant for us to have it, to keep making more family.

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Yes, yes! All her fault!

name: Lemongrab
line: What? What'd you say?

name: Lemongrab 2
line: I said, "all her fault."

name: Lemongrab
line: Oh, indeed! For once we had commenced, how could we desist?

name: Lemongrab 2
line: I looked deep in myself and found that I'm a guy who can't stop making candy life from the food he needs.

name: Lemongrab
line: Me, too.

name: Lemongrab 2
line: It just felt so pretty okay inside, greeting each new placid face...

name: Lemongrab
line: ...and hearing each new piercing song!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: We used the last of the food to make Plop-Top, here.

name: Lemongrab
line: Mm. I thought we said Dump-Dome.

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Who cares anyway? They've brought no food! We're all going to die!

name: Finn
line: Look. We brought these seeds.  They're special candy seeds.

name: Jake
line: You can grow new food now.

name: Lemongrab
line: Oh, yes.  Hmm, mm-hmm, mmhm. Yes.

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Yes, yes. There we go!

name: Lemongrab
line: Ha-haaa! We'll call you Seed-Wad!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Ooh!

name: Jake
line: You really are gonna die.

name: Finn
line: ...and all your boys, too!

name: Lemongrab
line: Our... boys?

name: Finn
line: Come on. We'll take you to see Princess Bubblegum. She knows more about candy than anyone; she built a whole kingdom out of candy!

name: Lemongrab
line: Yes. Okay.

name: Lemongrab 2
line: For our boys.

name: Lemongrab
line: But first we will notify the children of our impending departure...

name: Lemongrabs
line: ...so they won't worry about us while we're away.

name: Lemongrab
line: Okay, yes. The hard times are over!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Mmmm, here's the plan...

name: Lemongrab
line: We will go to the Candy Kingdom and take all their candy from them! Then we will give that candy precious life and build a candy army so we may then go forth and pillage candy for all to eat!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: Now go, young Lemonjon!

name: Lemongrab
line: Go! Go!

name: Finn
line: What's going on, Lemongrabs?!

name: Lemongrab
line: It's all  your fault!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: All your fault!

name: Lemongrab
line: We warned you!

name: Lemongrab 2
line: We warned you about us!

name: Finn
line: Yaaaah!  What the--?

name: Finn and Jake
line: Whoaaaaaa!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Are you alright?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but look!  He's heading right for the Candy Kingdom!

name: Finn
line: And he's too big to duke it out with! Unless...

name: Jake
line: Giant poison candy aspirin!  I've got this one, but it might be too small.

name: Finn
line: No. We'll kick him in his heart 'til he's history. Those must have been Lemonjon's guts we saw before. His heart is his weak spot.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but we'll never find it again in time... unless that's it there  with the juice coming out. Remember all that juice, from before?

name: Finn
line: Oh yeah, that's probably it.  Whoaaa!  Oh, man!

name: Jake
line: Tastes like vitamins.

name: Jake
line: Are you sure this is it? It's not even doing anything.

name: Finn
line: Just smash it already, grandma.

name: Jake
line: Right.

name: Finn
line: Oh, nice one, Jake.

name: Lemonjon
line: Whoa, hold the phone! What is this powerful new juice coursing fromst my core source?  The juice aches. Is this the rumored ache of feeling? The feeling of caring unknown to Lemons? New thoughts emerge! If I act, the Candy People will suffer. If I don't, the Lemon people will suffer. The greater good demands but one course only that I dissolve the bonds uniting me and become component to all!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, dang!  That Lemonjon turned himself all up into lemon candy! Man, that Lemonjon's all right.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: ...and... there... we... go.  All done! The last trace of the candy life formula is out of their heads!

name: Finn
line: ...and I snatched this  out of the Lemon castle, boyee!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Now we all just have to keep a closer eye on those two so they don't get in to any more trouble.

name: Jake
line: But how come we don't just fix their hearts like we did with Lemonjon so they're more selfless and less selfish?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, no, no. Their hearts are fine. They're just like this.

name: Lemongrabs
line: Hmm!

name: Finn
line: Man, I still can't believe Marceline is 1,000 years old and has never seen Heat Signature. This movie is gonna blow their minds.

name: Finn
line: Marceline! We brought Heat Signature.

name: Marceline
line: Woot! Woot!

name: Jake
line: Woo!

name: Marceline
line: Hey, so I want you all to meet Finn and Jake. They aren't... completely lame.

name: Finn
line: Whatup?

name: Marceline
line: Guys, this is Wendy...

name: Wendy
line: Hey.

name: Marceline
line: Booboo...

name: Booboo
line: Hello. Hello.

name: Marceline
line: ...and Georgy.

name: Georgy
line: Hey.

name: Marceline
line: We used to be in a gang together back in the underworld.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Yeah, that's pretty sweet. Hope y'all like getting your minds blown, cause it's showtime.

name: Finn
line: What is wrong with this couch?

name: Jake
line: Ehh, that made my teeth hurt.

name: Marceline
line: Oh yeah. Sorry, I don't ever really sit on there. I just float usually. We... kinda all do.

name: Finn
line: Aww, what? man, no fair.

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, well, too bad you're not vampires. So, anyways, I...

name: Finn
line: Wait! Hold on just a second.

name: Finn
line: Marceline, we insist you turn us into vampires. Or ghosts, or whatever. We just wanna fly.

name: Marceline
line: All right, all right. Fine.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Yes!

name: Wendy
line: Come on, Marceline! you're gonna turn these goofballs?

name: Marceline
line: Don't worry, I've got something more fun in mind.

name: Finn
line: Okay, Marceline, we're ready now.

name: Marceline
line: Okay, hold that thought.

name: Georgy
line: Huhuuuhhuh...

name: Marceline
line: I'm gonna perform the biting ritual. You guys close your eyes and don't open them until I say so. If you do... your heads will EXPLODE! Okay, Finn. You first.

name: Marceline
line: Bite.

name: Marceline
line: Chomp.

name: Marceline
line: Boop boop. Boop. Boop. Okey dokey. All done. How do you guys feel?

name: Finn
line: Pretty... much... the same.

name: Jake
line: My neck sort of hurts.

name: Booboo
line: Don't you feel a little hungry...for blood?

name: Finn
line: I felt it. Jake, do you feel it?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I could go for some blood.

name: Finn
line: Oh no. Jake. Now we're gonna have to drink blood for all eternity.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, what if we turn evil? I'll hafta start wearing cologne.

name: Marceline
line: Relax, guys. You can satisfy your bloodlust without killing. Look.  You just eat the color. Here, Jake. You try.

name: Finn
line: Ugh. Come on.

name: Jake
line: Sorry, bro.  Oh, snap! I feel... stronger.

name: Finn
line: Whooooa... Marceline, can we float now?

name: Marceline
line: Mmm... Not yet. That's a really advanced power. First, you gotta go through vampire orientation.

name: Georgy
line: Huhuuuhhuh...

name: Marceline
line: Think you chumps can handle it?

name: Finn and Jake
line: Oh, baby, yeah, baby, baby, baby, yeah, baby, yeah, yeah.

name: Marceline
line: Okay, guys, the first phase of vampire orientation is learning...  ...invisibility.

name: Marceline
line: Ah! Hey!

name: Marceline
line: You ready for the power of...invisibility?

name: Finn
line: With all my heart.

name: Marceline
line: Good. Now, spin!

name: Marceline
line: Give it a whirl, Jake!  Now chant, "INVISIBLE!INVISIBLE!"

name: Finn and Jake
line: INVISIBLE!INVISIBLE!

name: Marceline
line: Yup. It worked?

name: Jake
line: We're invisible!

name: Finn
line: You're invisible!

name: Jake
line: Hey. Then how come we can see each other?

name: Marceline
line: Because you guys become vampires at the same time. So you are forever linked.

name: Finn and Jake
line: AWW YEAH!

name: Booboo
line: Marceline...you're friends with some real morons.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my glob, Melissa. Ever since Clara stopped eating meat, her skin looks so good. I mean, she still looks fat, but like, I can't say that junk to her face.

name: Jake
line: Wow! LSP's a hobo!

name: Finn
line: Let's mess with her.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I'm doing so awesome on my own. Like, right now, I found this can of beans.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Finn? Jake! Put down my stuff!

name: Finn
line: She knows it's us.

name: Jake
line: She must recognize our voices.

name: Finn
line: Let's disguise them.  We're invisible!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Melissa, I have to go. They got into my toilet paper. Melissa, I have to go!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Give it back, you guys!

name: Jake
line: Weeeee!

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Whoo-hoo-hoo! Yeah, Jake!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Nooooooooo!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: MY BEANS!!!

name: Booboo
line: Time to join in on the fun!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You guys ruined everything! I'm gonna kill you!

name: Finn
line: But we're undead.

name: Jake
line: Geez, we really scared her.

name: Marceline
line: Nice vampire scare, guys.

name: Finn
line: Thanks.

name: Booboo
line: Yeah, pretty good, fellas.  You guys ready...for the next vampire lesson?

name: Finn
line: You know we are.

name: Booboo
line: Good.

name: Finn
line: Ow! What's the point of this lesson?

name: Georgy
line: Kick 'em harder!

name: Finn
line: Ow! It hurts!

name: Jake
line: Ohhh!

name: Marceline
line: Okay, everyone! Stop the toughness lesson!

name: Georgy
line: What?

name: Marceline
line: Finn, Jake. You guys okay?

name: Finn
line: We're okay.  It's all worth it.

name: Georgy
line: See? They're fine.

name: Wendy
line: When did you go all soft? You used to like teaching people about kicks.

name: Georgy
line: Hey, guys, I think you're ready to learn how to float. All you have to do is jump off that ledge.

name: Finn
line: Cool.

name: Marceline
line: W-wait! There's more beginner lessons you need to learn before floating. Like... uh... the spooky vampire walk. See? Spoooooky... wooo!

name: Finn
line: Heh heh. No way.

name: Jake
line: We wanna fly!

name: Marceline
line: You guys stop right now.

name: Georgy
line: Marceline, chill out. It's going to be okay. We've got a plan.  Now, get in your flying positions.

name: Finn and Jake
line: VAMPIRES FOREVER!!! WOOO!

name: Marceline
line: What are you guys waiting for? You said you had a plan.

name: Wendy
line: We do. It's to let them die!

name: Finn and Jake
line: We did it! Yeah! Woohoo! Awesome!

name: Wendy
line: Way to go, Marceline.

name: Marceline
line: Hey, you guys need to stop trying to kill my friends!

name: Booboo
line: They gotta die someday.

name: Wendy
line: Hey! Let's invite them to our place! When they show up...

name: Wendy, Booboo and Georgy
line: We'll suck their guts out through their brains!

name: Finn
line: Did you see us?

name: Wendy
line: Yeah, you guys were pretty amazing.

name: Booboo
line: Hey, we're gonna throw a party... in honor of your new vampire skills.

name: Finn
line: Holy snaps, that's awesome!

name: Marceline
line: They're lying to you guys. They just wanna suck the guts out of the top of your head.

name: Finn, Jake, and ghosts
line: What?

name: Booboo
line: She's just jealous of you.

name: Wendy
line: We'll see you at midnight at our place.

name: Marceline
line: Guys, promise me you're going to that party.

name: Finn
line: We're not gonna go.

name: Marceline
line: You're not?

name: Finn
line: Nah. I'm kinda tired from doing vampire stuff all day. We're just gonna chill.

name: Marceline
line: Oh. Okay.

name: Finn
line: Well, we're going back home.

name: Jake
line: Peace.

name: Finn
line: Number 25, Blood Drive.  Hey guys, we're here! Wow! Look at you guys! That's awesome!

name: Finn
line: Uh...  Georgy, what's wrong? Jake, what's happening?

name: Jake
line: I think they're testing our vampire abilities.

name: Finn
line: Oh, sweet. VAMPIRE KICK!

name: Georgy
line: Aw, come on. Will you knock it off already?

name: Wendy
line: You know you're not even real vampires.

name: Finn
line: Pssh. Then why am I flying, Wendy?  Oh.  Yo, man. I think Marceline tricked us.

name: Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Marceline
line: VAMPIRE KICK!!!  Finn. Jake. I'm so sorry I got you into this. I should've never pranked you so perfectly.

name: Finn
line: It's okay. You're here now to beat up those ghosts and save us.

name: Marceline
line: Oh, no, vampires can't beat ghosts. It's sort of a Rock-Paper-Scissors thing. I just came to apologize.

name: Finn
line: Aw, man.  I can't believe we're gonna die just because we wanted to be comfortable watching Heat Signature.

name: Georgy
line: Uh... did you guys say... Heat Signature?

name: Commander
line: Have you located the enemy's heat signature, Private?

name: Private
line: Yes, sir. But I also noticed something... strange. Something... I can't explain.

name: Commander
line: Well, spit it out, man!

name: Private
line: I... I... I can't seem to locate... our heat signature.

name: Finn
line: This stink-ups mega bam-bam to the J-stop. Could we just go back to the brain-eating or whatever?

name: Georgy
line: MMM-HMM. After the movie.

name: Finn
line: Well, can't we just--

name: Marceline and ghosts
line: Shhh!

name: Georgy
line: Shut!

name: Private
line: Look out, Commander!

name: Commander
line: Aaaagh! My heat signature!

name: Jake
line: What'ya building?

name: Finn
line: Um, it's just a little stick fort.

name: Jake
line: Oh, rad!

name: Jake
line: Look. It's just my size.

name: Jake
line: Hey, get away from my fort, you big stinky monster!

name: Finn
line: I like it when you get small, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, me too.

name: Jake
line: Whoa, whoa!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, Peppermint Butler!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Finn, Jake, the Princess wants to see you.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: As princess of Candy Kingdom, I'm in charge of a lot of candy people. They rely on me. I can't imagine what might happen to them if I was gone. And after my brush with death at the hands of the Lich,  I realized something.  I'm not gonna live forever Finn.  I would if I could.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: But modern science just isn't there yet.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: So I engineered a replacement who can live forever.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I call her... Goliad.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Wow!  Aww! She's cute.

name: Finn
line: Hi, Goliad. I'm Finn.

name: Jake
line: And I'm Jake.

name: Goliad
line: Hi, Finn. Hi, Jake.

name: Finn
line: Hi, Goliad.

name: Goliad
line: Hi, Finn.

name: Finn
line: What did you use to make her?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, um...  Pretty standard candy creature soup.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Some acids.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Some algebra.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And I threw in one of my baby teeth so she had my DNA.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Wow, DNA?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah. All it takes is just one little tooth, or,  a single hair.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's all it takes.

name: Jake
line: Princess Bubblegum, are you okay?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm good. Haven't slept for a solid 83 hours, but... yeah, I'm good.

name: Jake
line: Aw, you should go to bed.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I can't go to bed, Goliad has huge, mondo mama brains.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I still need to fill them with knowledge...  about how to rule a kingdom.

name: Finn
line: What? Let us teach her.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Uhh, okay. I guess that will be all right.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Yea!  Yeah! Teachers!  Yeah, woo-hoo!  Teach, teaching teachers.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Woow, woow, woow!

name: Finn
line: C'mon, Goliad.

name: Finn
line: See ya later, Princess! Get some sleep!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Huh? Whu...? Bye guys...

name: Finn
line: Look, Goliad. This is a preschool. I'm gonna set up some obstacles and all that for you to learn on, is that okay?

name: Goliad
line: Yeah, thanks Finn. I'm excited to learn.

name: Finn
line: Okay, great. Jake, you go and get some kids from inside to help with the lesson and such.

name: Jake
line: Okay. C'mon, Goliad.

name: Goliad
line: Yes, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Uhm...

name: Jake
line: Uhh...

name: Red Gumball/Candy Child
line: Stinking, durken...

name: Candy Nanny
line: Now, now, settle down.

name: Goliad
line: Jake, these kids seem pretty scary.

name: Jake
line: Ah, nah, these kids ain't nothin'! Kids groove doozyploon! Check this out.

name: Jake
line: Hey, there kids, who wants to play--

name: Jake
line: Uhh, easy now children. Easy-

name: Peanut Child
line: Get his brain! Get his brain!

name: Peanut Child
line: Get his eyes!

name: Jake
line: Listen up, you kids better stop donkin' around! You're gonna mess up Goliad!  It's my way or the highway, get it? I'm Don Juan Cherry Tempo! Now march, glib blobbit!

name: Jake
line: Don't be acting all crazy.

name: Jake
line: Wow, holy shmow!

name: Finn
line: Oh, hey, y'all are just in time. You ready to pop this croc's back Dr. Goliad?

name: Goliad
line: Yeah, I think so Finn. I've learned a real lot already so far. Sooo much... from Jake.

name: Jake
line: Uh, you know, Finn... maybe this isn't such a good idea, actually.

name: Finn
line: Oh, no, it's cool. I got helmets for everybody.

name: Finn
line: Okay, Goliad, you ready to lead?

name: Goliad
line: Ready!

name: Finn
line: Okay, in 3, 2, 1...  Go!

name: Goliad
line: Alright, listen up! You kids better stop dunking around and get on that ramp!

name: Goliad
line: You're gonna mess up Goliad! I'm Don Juan Cherry Temp—  Cherry Tempo! It's my way or the highway, Glob-globbit!

name: Finn
line: Stop stop! No, Goliad, no! Leading isn't about scaring people, you gotta stay calm and use your head. Use that beautiful brain, girlfriend.

name: Goliad
line: My brain? Are you sure?

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Don't be shy. Try it on me, lead me.

name: Goliad
line: Okay, Finn.  Okay.

name: Finn
line: No, Goliad, that's wrong, too.

name: Finn
line: You can't just control people or whatever, it's messed up.

name: Goliad
line: No, Finn. This way is good. Everyone did what I wanted. Really fast, no mistakes, calm like you said. This is definitely is the way to lead. Definitely.

name: Finn
line: Um, no, no. ...Wait, is that true?

name: Jake
line: C'mon, Goliad. Let's go see Princess Bubblegum.

name: Finn
line: Princess! Princess!

name: Jake
line: Goliad's got mind control powers!

name: Finn
line: She got the wrong idea about leadership!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, I was afraid this might happen. Where is she now?

name: Finn & Jake
line: She's chilling in the garden!  We left her outside the garden!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hello, Goliad.

name: Goliad
line: Hello, Princess.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I hear that you learned a lot today.

name: Goliad
line: Yes, I led the children.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: But Finn said you used yelling and mind control.

name: Goliad
line: Yes, it was good.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Goliad,  let me tell you about leadership. You see this fat bee? It's gentle  and makes the flower happy, and pollinated. They both get what they need... ...and that's how leaders should be.

name: Goliad
line: No, Princess. Bee cares not for flower. If getting pollen hurts or kills flower, bee would not care.  Bee is stronger than flower.

name: Goliad
line: Goliad is stronger than bee.  Goliad is stronger than all.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, no. She's too far gone, too corrupted. If we're not careful, she can throw an ultra-tantrum and wind the castle apart. I will have to disassemble her and try again.

name: Goliad
line: No, Princess.   This is my castle now.

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, Princess. We'll stop her!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, Finn. She's far too powerful. Here's the plan I'm going to build another Candy Sphinx in my lab. It's the only thing that can possibly match her. Just keep her busy 'til I return.  And don't think about the plan! She can read your minds!

name: Jake
line: Ugh, eyeball... Just tuck that eyeball back in its hole.

name: Finn
line: Goliad, no!

name: Finn
line: Jake, don't swallow!

name: Finn
line: Uhh, you're in Finn's bubble.

name: Finn
line: Don't think of the plan... Think of something else. Think of something else.

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, Princess. We'll stop her!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, Finn, she's too—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Anyway, like I was saying, she's far too powerful—

name: Princess Bubblegums
line: Finn, she's far too powerful. Here's the plan.

name: Baby Finns
line: I'm a buff baby that can dance like a man.  I can shake-ah my fanny, I can shake-ah my—Ahh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Here's the plan. I'm going to—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Goliad! No!

name: Goliad
line: Wait, brother, why must we fight? Rule with me!

name: Goliad
line: No, brother! Don't you see? They're turning us against--

name: Goliad
line: So be it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Finn, are you okay?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, that dude saved me.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That's Stormo, Goliad's new brother.

name: Finn
line: Wha-- What are they doing now?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: They're about to have a psychic showdown.

name: Jake
line: Wow, man, so, like... I guess they're so evenly matched that it's a stale—  It's a stale—

name: Finn
line: They're so evenly matched that it's a stalemate!

name: Princes Bubblegum
line: Yes. Stormo sacrificed himself to keep Goliad in check for all eternity.

name: Finn
line: Well, that's pretty cool, but... I don't understand. If Goliad and Stormo are the same, how come Stormo is a good guy?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, that's simple I used some of your heroic DNA in Stormo's recipe and not Goliad's.

name: Finn
line: Oh, whoa so, that means Stormo is like... my son?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, yeah... in a way.

name: Finn
line: Happy birthday, Stormo.

name: Finn
line: You got that cooler, buddy?

name: Jake
line: Yup!

name: Finn
line: Good, 'cause we're gonna need it for this... ROOF PARTY!  Watch this, everybody! Triple flip with chips for the dip!

name: Jake
line: Watch this, everybody! A cooler! With stuff... for the thing!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Finn, you always focus an endless amount of energy on everything you do.

name: Jake
line: What about me? What do I focus my energy on, Cinnamon Bun?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Uh, Jake... you don't really focus at all.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: I said you don't FOCUS AT ALL! Hey, Finn, do another flip.

name: Finn
line: YUP! YAH!

name: Cinnamon Bun
line: Hahaha!! You're a dynamo, Finn!!

name: Finn
line: YEAH!! I NEVER SLOW DOWN!!

name: Stranger
line: "Never slow down?"

name: Finn
line: Whoa. Dude, can you, like, get offa' me?

name: Stranger
line: Do you think your energy could be used to power a huge machine?

name: Finn
line: I guess so, man.  Hey, Jake  Your friend is super weird, dude.

name: Jake
line: I thought he was your friend.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's starting, everyone! The celestial alignment!

name: Finn
line: Jake! That party was super fun!

name: Jake
line: Man, I'm sleepy.

name: Finn
line: Then go to sleep, man!

name: Jake
line: Huh? Oh, yeah, right.  Goodnight, homie.

name: Finn
line: Hyump! Ahh!  Goodnight, hamlet.

name: Jake
line: Hrrnf!! Ahh... What?  Alright, alright, you old gut.  Oh, I'm sluggin' it today...  Wake up, Finn. Got a busy day ahead of us. Finn? Hmm. Hmmmmm.

name: Stranger's voice
line: Welcome, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Huh?  UNTIE ME SO I CAN BEAT YOU WITH THAT SACK!!  You're that—

name: Stranger
line: Yes, the charismatic stranger from last night! Also...  the Grand Master of the Gnomes!

name: Gnomes
line: Hup! Hup! Hup!

name: Gnome Ruler
line: And...  ruler of the Beneathaverse!

name: Finn
line: 'S pretty nice. Hey, why don't you guys just untie me, and we can pretend this whole thing didn't happen?

name: Gnome Ruler
line: Oh, no! I've been searching all over Ooo for the perfect power source! A living dynamo! Something that... never slows down.

name: Finn
line: Uh-oh.

name: Gnome Ruler
line: And last night, I finally found—

name: Finn
line: It's me.

name: Gnome Ruler
line: Yes!! It's you!! You will have the great honor of powering the Upturnoverdrive!

name: Finn
line: That does what now?

name: Gnome Ruler
line: It will flip over the entire world! Then we'll be the ones on top, buddy!

name: Finn
line: THAT'S BIZONKERS!

name: Gnome Ruler
line: Yes, but the engineering is very sound.

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Gnome Ruler
line: Your energies will be harnessed by our most advanced technology. The Cyclonic Rodentarod!

name: Finn
line: Ha! You may have captured me... Hugh!  ...but you can't make me run!  Ow! Well... you can't make me run very fast.  OW!! Jake's on his way to mess you guys  UUUOOOOAAAHH!!

name: Jake
line: Fiiiinn!!  Fiiiin!! Fiiiin!?!  Man, where is that kid? I'm really startin' to worry...  Take my sammich, BMO. I'm gonna go find Fi—   A dancing bug!  Hey, man, you're shakin' it all wrong!

name: Dancing Beetle
line: But shakin' it's all I know!

name: Jake
line: Shhh... Let me show you how it's done!  Aw, yeah! Huh-hah! Yeah! Whoo!

And they'd be pretty crunchy... actually you'd think they'd be soft but they weren't. I'd be like "Wow dad! You'd made these pretty good!"  Yeah, that was dad.

line: I'm a bush!

name: Marceline
line: Hoo!

line: I think I will. Betty? I'm the reason you're doing all this.

name: Simon Petrikov
line: Remember how we met? When we both reached for the same book in the library, and I said you should check it out first? And when you returned it, you left a note inside, because you knew I'd borrow it next? It was the funniest, smartest note I've ever read.

name: Betty
line: I... have to work.

line: Betty, I love you so much, but you can't help me like this.

name: Betty

name: Betty
line: I-I

name: Simon Petrikov
line: Stay with that feeling, Betty! Stay with it! Betty!

name: Betty
line: Simon?

name: Simon Petrikov
line: Betty! I can't believe it's really you!

name: Betty
line: Technically I'm a magical A.I. avatar derived from Betty's memories.

name: Simon Petrikov
line: Close enough!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Shwang! The system appears to be stabilizing. Crown shields are coming back online.

name: Marceline
line: What does that mean?

name: Princess Bubblegum

line: What about me?

line: Don't freak out, but you're gonna be deleted.

line: Oh, no!

line: I-I-I-I-I-I-I-I

line: Betty!

name: Ron James
line: We're heading for Big Butt Rock. At sundown, we'll gather on the Cheek's Peak, and using the ah-has, deep feels, and woo-woos we score from the journey, we will chant a totally original spell, thus forming an entirely new school of magic!  Kind of like those jerky secret societies, but less jerky.

line: Just got one more stop.

line: Finn and Jake's crib? They won't come. They're out of our league.

line: Hey, Abracadaniel's here, with a bus full of lame wizards.

name: Jake
line: Here we go. They're probably gonna try to lure us on some dumb trip.

line: Hey, water nymphs! Uh...hi. Uh...do you girls feel like, uh...going on a road trip?

line: Um...no thanks.

name: Abracadaniel
line: Okay, but what if I...

line: Ew.

line: Hey, ladies! Hellooo.

line: No, but his eyes are just... gorge.

name: Jake
line: Oh.

name: All
line: Wooo!

line: Uh, why'd we stop?

name: Ron James
line: Well, this ain't goin' the way we planned, but fate has decreed that this place is just what we need. Draw your inspiration from this muddy, old cow pasture. Here, bros.  We got a stock full of T.P. and magic ink.

name: Abracadaniel
line: Let's all write down arcane, cryptic words in unexpected new combinations and patterns. Maybe the nymphs can dance on top of the bus to be, like, our muses.

name: Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving
line: Inspire us, water nymphs!

name: Nymph
line: We don't want to. We'd rather write.

name: Ice King
line: I'll dance if dancing is needed.  Doo-doo doo doo-doo. Yah yah, doo-doo wah  Dance, dance, dancin' dance writing.  I'm dance, dance, dance, dancin'. Top of the bus, window...
