line: No, man, ghost flies are filthy! They carry diseases, such as tuberculosis, polio, dysentery. They leave those little fly doodies on your soul.

name: Jake
line: Aah!

name: BMO
line: Finn, Jake! What's wrong?!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Ghost fly!

name: Jake
line: Thank goodness we lost him. He's gone.

name: Ghost Fly
line: Whoo.

name: BMO
line: Run! Just run!

name: Finn
line: Ay-ay-ay-ay!

name: BMO
line: Hmm.  Kya! Kya!

name: Jake
line: We should ask what its unfinished business is. Ghosts always have unfinished business.

name: Finn
line: Ghost fly, what's your problem?!

name: Finn
line: Come on, dude. Tell us your unfinished business!

name: Finn
line: Aah! It's no good. He's a tortured little spirit. We need help to communicate with this ghost fly.

name: Jake
line: Nah, man, let's just get someone to banish it—someone with serious paranormal juice.

name: BMO
line: Is he coming soon?

name: Jake
line: I think so. His ways are kind of mysterious.

name: Finn
line: That's cool.

name: Ghost Fly
line: Woo?

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Let's get this ritual rolling. I got stuff to do.

name: Ghost Fly
line: Woo!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hey! No! Unclean demon, feel the sting of holy water!

name: Jake
line: Thank you.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: These circles will protect you from the ghost's attacks while I prepare the banishing ritual. Worry not, fellow believers, for in this bag, I possess all the darkest and most powerful tools of magic ever to be assembled in one place. We're perfectly safe—as long as...  we... have...

name: Jake
line: Well, huh. How about that? No biggie. We'll just hang out inside these magic circles until morning. That's when ghosts go to sleep. Yep. Just got to make it... till morning.

name: Ghost Fly
line: Woo!

name: Finn
line: Hmm?

name: Finn
line: The end of my story. And it's so close.

name: Jake
line: Don't do it, bro. It's a trap.

name: Finn
line: I know. It's an obvi trap. But wait. What if... watch this. Ha!  Mm?

name: Jake
line: Dude, what are you—?

name: Finn
line: If I extend the circle...  farther... I can get closer to the magazine.

name: BMO
line: Theoretically, that is possible.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but I'm still getting a "woo-jah" feeling. This seems like a bad idea.

name: Finn
line: Just have to stay inside this circle.

name: Finn
line: Ha ha! How'd you do it, Rusty? How'd you shake them otters?   Man, what a great ending!

name: Jake
line: Finn? What's wrong, buddy?

name: Jake
line: Oh, Finn, you're disgusting!

name: Jake
line: Aw, that's it! I've had it with this ghost fly! I wish I were a ghost so I could punch him with my ghost fist!

name: BMO
line: Jake, I have a radical option. I've been studying a karate move that could temporarily stop your heart long enough for you to fight the ghost on his own plane of existence.

name: Jake
line: What?

name: BMO
line: It's okay! I learned it out of a magazine.

name: Jake
line: Finn...  All right. But first you got to give me some unfinished business so I can come back as a ghost.

name: BMO
line: Tell me a joke.

name: Jake
line: Okay. What do you call a bear that only attacks guys named Paul?

name: BMO
line: Kya!

name: BMO
line: I killed Jake! Yay, BMO!

name: Ghost Jake
line: Whoa! BMO, you killed me. Whoa. Wow. Wow!

name: BMO
line: Jake! I can't hear you! I will start your heart up in five minutes, okay?  This many!

name: Jake
line: Okay. Five minutes. Whoa.

name: Jake
line: Is this some kind of low-level dead world? That's a bummer.

name: Jake
line: Aah!

name: Jake
line: Aah! Oh, stuff! Aah!

name: Jake
line: Ohh! Ohh! Get away!

name: Jake
line: Aah! You killed it! Aah!

name: Jake
line: Aah! Aah! Get away!

name: Ghost Soup
line: Oooooo...

name: Ghost Fly
line: Hmm?

name: Ghost Soup
line: Hoooooo!

name: Jake
line: That's right. You never finished the soup. That's your unfinished business!

name: Ghost Fly
line: Woo-woo.

name: Jake
line: And now that you've finished it, you get to ascend to a glorious, new peaceful realm.

name: Jake
line: Ahhh. Bam!  Shouldn't have tried to kill me, son!  Yes!  What's happening? Oh, BMO must be bringing me back! Yes! Yeah, BMO!

name: Jake
line: Mm. BMO?

name: Finn
line: Jake, I missed you, bro!

name: BMO
line: Jake!

name: Finn
line: Don't ever leave me again!

name: Jake
line: Good job, BMO! You brought me back.

name: BMO
line: Yes. Yay, BMO. BMO is so good.

name: Doctor Princess
line: Whew!

name: Finn
line: He's heading for that cube. Come on, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Finn
line: Whaaaat?!?! He's gone!

name: Jake
line: What?! What happened?!

name: Prismo
line: Hey, hey! Did you guys see that? You know that was a ghost wearing a dead guy? That might be the nastiest thing I've ever seen. Na-na-na-na-nasty! Nasty jazz! Nast--

name: Jake
line: Hey, hey! Easy, buddy! That's our friend Billy! He got possessed by the Lich!

name: Prismo
line: Oh! Sorry, sorry! I didn't mean nothin' by it! I mean, I have a lot of nasty friends. My uncle is nasty. I'm basically honorary nasty.

name: Finn
line: Do you know where he went? We have to find our friend.

name: Prismo
line: Who knows?

name: Finn
line: Uh. Oh.

name: Prismo
line: Actually, it depends on the wish I granted him.

name: Finn
line: "Wish"?

name: Prismo
line: Yeah, he wished for the extinction of all life and I did it. I guess it changed his timeline or something?

name: Finn
line: WHAT?!?! OH GLOB!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, wait a minute. How can that be if I'm still here kickin' it with my main man, Finn?

name: Prismo
line: Oh, that's because you're safe in my time room until you make your wish.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Ohhhh.

name: Jake
line: I wish that life wasn't anymore extinc—

name: Finn
line: Whoa! Wait, Jake. Don't mess this up. Think about it if we wish everything back to normal, the Lich could just jazz it up again.

name: Jake
line: Oh yeah. Jazz.

name: Finn
line: Hmmmm.

name: Jake
line: Hmmmm.

name: Finn
line: I got it! I wish... the Lich... never... even ever existed!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Mom? Mom, what's wrong?

name: Finn's mom
line: Finn, I need you to do something for me. It's very important.  I need you to take the mule into town and sell him for as much as you can.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: What! Sell Bartram?  But, I love Bartram. What the heck, Mom!

name: Finn's Mother
line: Shhh! Finn please, just do as I say.

name: Trami
line: Got it?

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Dad?

name: Trami
line: I push you, you fall down.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: The Destiny Gang?

name: Finn's Mother
line: Everything will be fine, Finn, I promise. Now just do as I say.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: I'm sorry, Bartram. I guess Dad must be in real trouble to be doin' this. But, I bet there's a lot o' fine folk lookin' to buy a good mule. Why, I bet I could even come visit sometimes. Won't that be swell, Bartram?  Bartram? Dang it Bartram! Bar Bar!  What the- Bar Bar, how'd ya get up there?  Whoa!  Jake, look! Golden crown! Unbelievable! We can sell it and keep Bartram! Bong, bong.

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Hold it right there!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Who are you?!

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: I'm a thousand years old and this is my crown!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Okay, okay! But, um, maybe I could just borrow it for a little while.

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Noooo! No! Noo! This crown is magic. Bad, terrible magic. Too dangerous for mortal fingies like yours!  One thousand years ago, my beloved friend Simon Petrikov gave his life to save this foolish, unworthy planet from annihilation.  A frightful bomb was poised to bathe the land in mutagenic horror,  but using his mastery of ice and snow, Simon froze the bomb in mid-flight only inches from the ground, where it remains to this very day.  Today, ever ripe and ready to blow.  But he alone was not saved. Trapped under the giant weight of the enormous bomb, poor Simon perished!

name: Farmworld Simon
line: Little help?

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: And the horrible crown, grieving its lost master, loosed a spasm of magic so wild and crazy the entire earth was buried in ice for four hundred boring years.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Uhh, none o' that is true, 'cause magic is fake. Daddy says the false prophets of old used cheap parlor tricks to control the people.  And to get babes. Like 10 or 12 hot babes each.

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: No! Magic is real!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Lady! You been down here too long! Why don't you, just let me-

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Step off! Or I will use this!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Lady! Quit it with that thing!

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: I'm sorry. You must DIEEEE!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: WAAAAAAAAAAaaaaah… ooo… uuum…

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Oh, man! This thing! Dang it!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Go, Jake!

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Aaah! Go back to the underworld, ya beast.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Sorry, gotta save my dad!

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Destroy the world more like it!  Dummy. I give up.

name: Farmworld Simon
line: The crown. Go get it.

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: I know you're not really talking to me. I'm not crazy!

name: Farmworld Simon
line: Get the crown! Go get it!

name: Farmworld Simon
line: Get the crown, Marceline! Go get it!

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: I can't. My knees!

name: Farmworld Simon
line: Oh, that's really disappointing I must say. I'm just—uh, whatever, you're really letting me down right now.

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Okay, alright.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Cool crown! Who wants a cool crown? I found it on a dead magician dude!

name: Guy #1
line: I'll take it!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Awesome! How much cash ya got?

name: Guy #1
line: Ohhh, I'm poor. Uh, but what about I trade you for a personal concert at your house? I'll come over later and sing ya like, four songs. I mostly do covers, but I have originals too. Do you own any spoons?

name: Farmworld Finn
line: No.

name: Tromo
line: Let me see that!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Hey!

name: Tromo
line: Heh!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Wait, Destiny Gang. I gotta sell that to pay you guys!

name: Tromo
line: Trami, what you think? Is it my style?

name: Trami
line: Big Destiny will know. Yo, boss!

name: Big Destiny
line: Snap! Huh? What is this?  Are you tellin' me what to wear, Trami?

name: Trami
line: No, boss, you look good!

name: Big Destiny
line: You think I should reinvent my style and put a stupid thing on my head?!

name: Trami
line: No, man! You tell us what to wear!

name: Big Destiny
line: Otherwise you would dress like an idiot! Bam! Crown shorts!

name: Trami & Tromo
line: Amazing!

name: Big Destiny
line: Yeah-ha-ha!

name: Tromo
line: Clap harder, trash bag!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Okay, you guys. Gimme my money and leave my parents alone.

name: Tromo
line: Property of old dead person go to Big Destiny.  One-arm needs to learn the rules, unless you want your butt handed to you.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: I guess it wasn't really mine.

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: It's mine! I'm a demon... half-demon.

name: Big Destiny
line: Tromo! Jack up crazy lady! Trami! Take mule back to crib for din-din.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Whaat!  Bar Bar!

name: Trami
line: Tough luck, One-arm!

name: Big Destiny
line: See you soon, bad-style Junktown!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Bar Bar.

name: Tromo
line: End of the road, bat lady!

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Oh, my bones!

name: Tromo
line: Haha! Ah!  My eye! I will junk your face! What the!

name: Choose Bruce
line: Destiny gang, get outta town! We're sick of bein' bullied around!

name: Tromo
line: You make biiig mistake! Especially you, One-arm!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: My name is Finn Mertens! And tell big D I'm comin' for my stuff!

name: Tromo
line: Ohhh, you come n' try!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Are you okay, lady?

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: You must promise to—promise to return the crown to its hide-hole.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: I promise.

name: Choose Bruce
line: You'll need this Finn if you want to win.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Choose Bruce, what is it?

name: Choose Bruce
line: It's a weapon for your arm. With this you will defend from harm.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Feels natural. Like peeing outside. Sort of.

name: Choose Bruce
line: Best not to take the lift my friend, else the D gang'll see ya comin' in!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: No. I want them to see me. I'm-a go up there AND SHOW THEM MY FACE!  Yaaaaaaaaaa-huh? Hello?  Bar Bar? I'm comin'! Bar bar!  I want my stuff, ya big dump!

name: Big Destiny
line: You want Big D's crown, huh?

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Yeah, and Bar Bar.

name: Big Destiny
line: Here ya go then.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Wha?

name: Big Destiny
line: That is your final possession, the last thing you will ever own.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: What do you…mean?

name: Big Destiny
line: Look down there, stupid.

name: Big Destiny
line: Town is on fire! See? I made it on fire! Fix up Junktown! Look at old man cry!  That's what happens when you mess with Big D! You get crushed! Your family get crushed! Booya!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Suck my shirt!  Choose Bruce!

name: Choose Bruce
line: All my stuff is gone! Now they're goin' after your home!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Bar Bar, come on!

name: Choose Bruce
line: Hurry, Finn! You can win!

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Finn! Return the—whoa!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: I will, but we gotta stop the Destiny gang first. Come on Jake! Good boy!

name: Destiny Gang
line: Destiny! Destiny! Destiny!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Noooo!

name: Big Destiny
line: Yeah! How did I even get here, son?!

name: Finn's Mother
line: Nooo!

name: Finn's Father
line: Fiiinn!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Mom! Dad!  You said this thing is magic?

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Yes. Powerful and dangerous.

name: Farmworld Finn
line: But you lost your mind in a cave.

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: Whatever. You just gotta believe me, okay? For serious, ya donk.

name: Big Destiny
line: I am Big D! Wooooo!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: I believe you.

name: Farmworld Marceline
line: You do?  Wait! Noooooo! Dang it!

name: Farmworld Finn
line: Aaaaaah!!

name: Finn
line: Wha—?! Jake, I told you to stop staring at me right at the time when I wake up.

name: Jake
line: I'm staring because I can't move my head.

name: Jake
line: No, really, I can't move.

name: Finn
line: I can't move either.

name: Jake
line: What's happening?!

name: Finn
line: What? What was that? Who goes there?

name: Jake
line: Hey! Who is that?

name: Finn
line: Jake, use your peripheral vision!

name: Jake
line: Ooooh...  Ice King!

name: Ice King
line: I shouldn't be laughing, I'm sorry. Oh, I know, I'll do the opposite.  Oh, boohoo.  Ah, this is weird.

name: Finn
line: What did you do to us, Ice King?

name: Ice King
line: Whoa, whoa. I didn't "do" anything to you, okay? C'mon, guys, I'm your friend.

name: Jake
line: So why can't we move?

name: Ice King
line: Ooh, because I froze you... with this.

name: Finn
line: Freezing Potion A.

name: Ice King
line: I sprayed it on you while you slept.

name: Gunter
line: Wenk! Wenk!

name: Ice King
line: No! Gunter, no! This one likes to break bottles, don't ya?  Tuck-ety tuck! Let's move to the living room.

name: Jake
line: Why are you doing this, Ice King?

name: Ice King
line: Why? Oh, because I love you guys. But you don't love me, do ya?

name: Jake
line: You tried to kill us, like, four times.

name: Ice King
line: I only try to kill you 'cause you're princess-blocking me all the time! Anyway, now that you're frozen, we can bond and stuff. And the sooner we do, the sooner I can spray you with this.

name: Finn
line: Unfreezing Potion A?

name: Ice King
line: Ah, I underlined the "un" so I wouldn't mix 'em up.

name: Jake
line: Just unfreeze us now, man.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, 'cause we're already friends.

name: Ice King
line: We are?

name: Jake
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Ice King
line: What's my favorite color?

name: Finn
line: Uh, yellow? Orange? Blue—no, no, lavender! Lavender! Yeah!

name: Jake
line: Um, ooh, uh... rainbow?

name: Ice King
line: You don't love me. I know a lot about you guys. Jake, you don't put ice in your drink because you have sensitive teeth.

name: Jake
line: Wha—?

name: Ice King
line: And Finn, your favorite food is meatloaf.

name: Finn
line: How did you—?

name: Ice King
line: And Jake, sometimes you don't cry because you're afraid of real emotion. It's okay. Let it out.  You don't love me—  Bad penguin!

name: Gunter
line: Wenk!

name: Finn
line: You lock your bottles?

name: Ice King
line: Huh, in this economy?  Ah, I'm gonna go make some lemonade.

name: Jake
line: Don't touch my lemons, Ice King! Ice King!

name: Finn
line: Jake, look!

name: Jake
line: Gunter! No, Gunter! No!

name: Finn
line: No, Gunter, no!

name: Gunter
line: Wenk!

name: Finn
line: No, Gunter! No!

name: Jake
line: No! Gunter! No!

name: Finn
line: Gunter, stop!

name: Gunter
line: Wenk, wenk!

name: Jake
line: What're we gonna do?!

name: Finn
line: When someone loses one sense, their other senses are enhanced—like a blind man who can smell and hear really well. I'm gonna try using my now-enhanced brain sense to make contact with an Astral Beast who will help us.

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Finn
line: Whee! Haha! Whee! Astral Beast, come to me!

name: Finn
line: Come to me, Astral Beast...

name: Ice King
line: I've got lemonade! You want some, Jake?

name: Ice King
line: Huh? Gunter...  No, Gunter! No bottles. Look at me.

name: Gunter
line: Wenk!

name: Ice King
line: What am I gonna do with you?  You're going to have to wear a leash.  This should keep you out of trouble.  Now, our first bonding activity will be walking in each other's shoes—so to speak. To better understand each other's perspectives, we're going to dress up like each other. Me first!

name: Ice King
line: It's adventure time! I'll save you, Princess! Let's have babies, Princess, and let's teach them to be good babies! Oh, Princess, sure, I'll kiss you. I'm a hero. Hey Finn, don't you think it's weird there's two Finns? Finn?  Not talking? Now, I'm gonna dress like Jake.

name: Jake
line: Noooo! No, no, no, no, no!

name: Ice King
line: Okay, okay! We'll bond in another way.

name: Ice King
line: So, I wanted to show you something telling of my soul. I take artful black and white photographs of my penguins' body parts. Photography is art; let's see some art.  Okay, first one. See how Gunter is staring into the camera? He's saying, "Here I am. Look at me. Accept me." Okay, second one.  This is a haunting image of a penguin's flipper. Look at how it penetrates the negative space. Oh yes, this one is very—

name: Jake
line: I can't take this any more! Dang it, Finn! What are you doing in there?

name: Finn
line: Astral Beast! Where are you? You come here NOW!  Wheee...!

name: Ice King
line: ...Yeah, I've thought about it a lot, and having a little gallery show might be nice. A little cheese, a little cider... could be nice, y'know?  Maybe bring a veggie plate? I think people would appreciate that.

name: Jake
line: Key! Gunter. Gunter. Psst! Pssssst. Come here, Gunter.

name: Ice King
line: This next one is very rewarding...

name: Jake
line: Grab it, Gunter. Pick it up!  Pick it up!!  What are you waiting for? Just grab it!

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.  Wenk, wenk. Wenk, wenk, wenk, wenk, wenk.

name: Jake
line: Gunter! Come back.

name: Ice King
line: Gunter!

name: Gunter
line: Weeenk.

name: Ice King
line: You are being naughty, Gunter. You've interrupted my thing.  Now you stay right here and go to sleep.  Sleep.  Aw. So cute. Alright, back to art.

name: Jake
line: Gunter. Gunter, wake up.  Go... get... the... key.  Consarn it, Gunter!

name: Ice King
line: Okay, time for a break. Who wants lemonade?  Ooh, don't want to lose this.  Gunter! Jake! No! You're bonding without me.

name: Gunter
line: Wenk.

name: Ice King
line: It's for your own good, sweetie.  Now then.

name: Jake
line: Wait, you're sleeping up here?!

name: Ice King
line: Well...  not before our next bonding activity late-night gab session! Do you want to talk about girls? Do you have a crush on anyone?

name: Jake
line: Uh, yeah, my girlfriend? Lady Rainicorn?

name: Ice King
line: Ohhhhhh! Don't worry, I won't tell anyone.  Know who I have a crush on?  Princess Bubblegum.

name: Jake
line: You don't say.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, I do. I've liked her for quite some time. Feels weird to say it out loud.

name: Jake
line: What?  He fell asleep with his eyes open. Finn! Finn, snap out of it!

name: Finn
line: Astral Beast! WHERE ARE YOU? Show yourself! Why not? Does this dance please you, Astral Beast?  Does this please you?!

name: Finn
line: THIS IS IIIIT!

name: Finn
line: The Astral Beast cometh.

name: Ice King
line: Crows like a rooster, laughs] Who's "hungie"? Jake, you "hungie"?

name: Jake
line: I'm hungry.

name: Ice King
line: Alright, fair enough. Well, how 'bout I make us some omelettes?

name: Jake
line: That sounds pretty good, actually.

name: Ice King
line: I'm gonna put my foot in it. Eating a part of me will bring us closer together.  I'll be inside of you!

name: Jake
line: Dude, you're back!

name: Finn
line: Yup. I just got back from the Astral Plane!

name: Jake
line: Where's your Astral Beast?

name: Finn
line: It's on its way. It's gonna be awesome.

name: Jake
line: What kind of beast?

name: Finn
line: Uh, I'm not sure. I couldn't see it in the Astral Plane. But I heard it. It sounded really intense.  Maybe a gorilla?

name: Jake
line: A gorilla, huh?

name: Finn
line: Aw, junk! Did I summon butterflies?!  I'm the worst.

name: Jake
line: Hey, come on now, you're not the worst.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I am.

name: Jake
line: No, you're not! You're the best!

name: Finn
line: ...at being the worst.

name: Finn
line: What are you doing?

name: Jake
line: I'm using my enhanced brain sense to tell your astral beast to slap some sense into you.

name: Finn
line: Oh. That's cool. I deserve it.

name: Jake
line: No... you... don't!

name: Ice King
line: Well, I don't want to use too much foot. It'll overpower the eggs. Take away from the omelette.  Huh? Aah!

name: Ice King
line: Finn! and Jake! and a bunch of butterflies! and a sword!

name: Ice King
line: What do you want from me?

name: Finn
line: What do we wa—? We want you to unfreeze us, you lunatic!

name: Ice King
line: No! We're not friends yet. You haven't eaten my omelette.

name: Finn
line: Friends don't eat each other, Ice King. That's not how friends work. Now unlock this bottle and unfreeze us.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, alright. I don't know how you're doing this, but it is impressive.

name: Ice King
line: Wait a minute... which bottle is thi—?  I think they brought me the wrong bottle. Gunter's still upstairs.  Gunter! Gunter! Gunter! Gunter!!

name: King Of Ooo
line: There. Right there. See?

name: Finn
line: Uhhh...Yeah. It's a small thing?

name: Jake
line: Hey, do you have bigger chairs?

name: King Of Ooo
line: Stools.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: King Of Ooo
line: They're stools; not chairs.

name: Jake
line: Well can I have a bigger stool, then?

name: King Of Ooo
line: Jake, stop interrupting!

name: Jake
line: Sorry.

name: King Of Ooo
line: Enhance!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa, hey, whoa!

name: Jake
line: Looks like a mushroom. Someone throwing mushrooms?

name: King Of Ooo
line: Yes, very good, it is a mushroom! Or a toadstool. That's why you're sitting on stools.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Oh.

name: King Of Ooo
line: See, you guys gotta trust me on this one, okay? I picked those stools for a reason. Trust my process! You can get up now.

name: Jake
line: My legs.

name: King Of Ooo
line: No, nobody's throwing mushrooms.  I believe they're flying on their own. That's where you two come in.

name: King Of Ooo
line: Okay, the flying mushroom came from that direction,  so I want you two to head that way until you find one. A big one. and I want you to capture it, and bring it back.

name: Jake
line: Why?

name: King Of Ooo
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Why?

name: King Of Ooo
line: Trust my process.

name: Jake
line: Okay, but why, though?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, we're curious.

name: King Of Ooo
line: I wanna ride it around instead of walking. I think people will respect me more.  Hey. Hey, you, what's your name?

name: Dirt Beer Guy
line: I'm Dirt Beer Guy.

name: King Of Ooo
line: What would you think if you saw me on a giant flying mushroom? Dirt Beer Guy

name: King Of Ooo
line: See? Don't fail on this one, boys.  Don't you dare fail me.

name: Finn
line: Actually, I'm kinda glad we're walking in this direction. We never walk in this direction.

name: Jake
line: Hey, how long do you think capturin' a flyin' mushroom takes?

name: Finn
line: Well we gotta find one first.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, that too. How long?

name: Finn
line: Mm. An hour to capture, aaand, if we don't find him by dinner, we'll tell KOO to send out a Banana Guard patrol.

name: Jake
line: Tell who?

name: Finn
line: KOO.

name: Jake
line: ...King Of Ooo?

name: Finn
line: Yeah.

name: Finn
line: Did you notice he was wearing Princess Bubblegum's clothes?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, that was sorta cool. But you know, PB just left her kingdom to 'im. And all her stuff, so what's that about?

name: Finn
line: Hmm.

name: Jake
line: I smell mushrooms.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, good job, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Check it out.  Big enough for KOO's tiny heiny!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, the only thing, though, is it's not flying.

name: Jake
line: Mmm, yeah...

name: Finn
line: I guess we could just sit here... and wait for it to fly?

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Okay, so here's what happened. I had sent my top employee, Rennie Hamlin, to check on one of my properties...

name: Rennie
line: Okay, boss, I'm here now.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: ...Joshua and Margaret Investigations!

name: Rennie
line: Yep, there's definitely been a break-in.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Check out the damage. I'll call you back in thirty seconds.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Rennie?

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: And he's been like this ever since.

name: Finn
line: Poor guy.

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Something terrifying has taken residence in Joshua and Margaret's old office, and it's not paying rent. So I want you guys to find out what it is and get it out.

name: Jake
line: Yes, sir, son!

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: You have one hour! Bye, dad.

name: Jake
line: I wonder what it could be.

name: Finn
line: Maybe it's a gross rotting fish gob with long, slimy tentacles.

name: Jake
line: Maybe it's a teenage silverware werewolf squatter.

name: Finn
line: Hey, you know what it could be? It could be a ghost. I think I saw a ghost there when I was a baby. Maybe it's like a ghost hotspot.

name: Jake
line: Ghosts, huh? Whoa, wait! What if it's...

name: Finn and Jake
line: Ghost Mom and Dad!

name: Finn
line: I have to brush my hair!

name: Jake
line: I'll go get tulips for Mom!

name: Jake
line: Man, I've never been this excited about ghosts before.

name: Finn
line: This could be one more chance to tell Mom and Dad how much we love them.

name: Jake
line: And show 'em that their kids are awesome.

name: Jake
line: Hello? Ghosts? If you're in here, please vacate my son's property!

name: Finn
line: Unless you're Mom and Dad ghosts!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, in that case, I brought flowers!

name: Finn
line: Look. There's the broken window. But I don't see any signs of squatters... or ghosts.

name: Jake
line: I'll sniff 'em out.

name: Finn
line: Hey Jake, why don't we own this place?

name: Jake
line: I dunno. Kim Kil Whan is a good businessman. Plus I'd feel kinda weird dealing with this stuff.

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Just looking at all this is like, "Whoa, memories!" Like this ticker tape machine. Remember when Mom and Dad brought us to work and we made a fort of ticker tape?

name: Jake
line: It was right over there! And over here you gave me a wet willie one time.

name: Finn
line: Ew. No I didn't.

name: Jake
line: Right. I know you believe that's true, but memories distort over time. Classic false memory syndrome.

name: Finn
line: Maybe you're the one with a false memory syndrome.

name: Jake
line: Classic false memory syndrome response.

name: Finn
line: You hear that? Can you use your dog powers to locate that sound?

name: Jake
line: Way ahead of you, pal. Uh... over there!  Aha!

name: Finn
line: Anything?

name: Jake
line: Nope. This is a nice bathroom, though. Man, this whole office is nice. It's kinda bunk how Mom and Dad stopped using it.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, it's weird that they had this whole other life, and they just dropped it for us babies.

name: Jake
line: We were babies forever.

name: Finn
line: Man, we suck.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but they knew what they were getting into. Whoa! Who moved the sofa? Who put forth those chairs?! Who set the table?! What's going on?!

name: Finn
line: This griz is poltergeist biz.

name: Jake
line: But I don't want that.

name: Finn
line: Embrace the paranormal, bro.  Are these candles real or poltergeist mind-tricks?

name: Jake
line: Look!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Poltergeist!

name: Margaret
line: Ooh, goody. It's on now, dear.

name: Joshua
line: Well done, Margaret, love.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Dad!

name: Joshua
line: Hello, future people. I'm Joshua of Joshua and Margaret Investigations, and behind the camera you have my lovely wife and partner, Margaret.

name: Margaret
line: Hello.

name: Joshua
line: We're making this tape to document the strange phenomena in our new office. Like this weird message spelled out in-  Oh, applesauce.

name: Margaret
line: You've really stepped in it now, darling.

name: Joshua
line: Indubitably. But something is definitely trying to chat us up, and we're gonna catch it on film. I got this fancy ghost-hunting doohickey. It's supposed to record EVPs and such.

name: Margaret
line: Gracious, there it is!

name: Joshua
line: Margaret! Margaret! There's another one over here!

name: Finn
line: Dude! This place is full of ghosts! We should split up and see if we can get them to appear.

name: Jake
line: I'll take the bathroom!

name: Finn
line: That's the spirit. Hmm. "Spirit."

name: Finn
line: Maybe Mom and Dad left some books about ghost hunting. Hmm.

name: Finn
line: A ghost!  It seems like the ticking precedes each ghost encounter. Okay, Finn, what ticks? Metronomes, bombs, pencils...

name: Jake
line: The bathroom is a lot scarier than I was expecting.

name: Finn
line: ...hearts, egg timers, typewriters.

name: Finn
line: What else?  Whoa, lil' ghost babies! Wait, that's baby Jermaine! And baby Jake! And baby me!

name: Baby Jake
line: Babababa!

name: Finn
line: Oh yeah?

name: Baby Jake
line: Oh! Yip! Yip! Yip! Yip!

name: Finn
line: Oh, snap. I guess it was me. Hold on. These babies ain't ghoulish ghosts at all. They're like time... disto...to...morphs? Hmm.

name: Jake
line: Scared? No way! I'm primitive! I'm real! Ghosts, you can't touch this dog! You've got ethereal hands! I'm alive! I'm filled with hot blood! You'll never see through me!  Gotcha, ghoul!

name: Mole Man
line: Pardon?

name: Jake
line: Aah! Oh, sorry for interrupting your poop.  Hey, sorry again, man, but I have a qu-

name: Jake
line: I gotta get out of here! No, Jake. You gotta stay for your boy Kim Kil Whan. Ghost! Quit freeloading off my son!  That's a father's job.

name: Joshua
line: Margaret, stay away!

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Joshua
line: Something's about to happen!

name: Jake
line: Dad?

name: Finn
line: So, I can see you, and you can see me. And we're occupying the same space now. So this time stuff must be getting more intense.  Whoa!

name: Finn
line: Hey, creeper, stop creepin' on baby Jake!  Baby Jake?

name: Jake
line: Finn! I'm freaking out, man! I just saw the most messed-up thing!

name: Jake
line: Dad?

name: Joshua
line: Margaret, stay away! Something's about to happen!

name: Margaret
line: Something's about to happen with me, too!

name: Joshua
line: Margaret! Aah!  Yowzas!

name: Baby Jake
line: Hello, Daddy! Hello, Mommy! It's so nice to be here with you now!

name: Jake
line: That's so not how I was birthed! I'm no melon baby! I'm a majestic womb baby!

name: Finn
line: Jake, calm down.

name: Jake
line: I'm gonna go hog-wild on the next ghost I see!

name: Rennie
line: Boy, do I love real estate!

name: Jake
line: Aah!

name: Kim Kil Whan
line: Rennie?

name: Jake
line: We're trapped in a ghost trap!

name: Finn
line: Relax, bro. There's no ghosts. What we're experiencing are time slips. Point is, something is causing this.

name: Finn
line: You ready?

name: Finn
line: Time dingalings! Wait, that ticking. I know who this is!  Clock Bear!

name: Jake
line: One of the dudes that escaped Dr. Gross' menagerie.

name: Finn
line: He must be the one causing the time slips. There's us from before.

name: Finn
line: Are you sick?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I'm pretty disgusted with the whole situation!

name: Finn
line: I meant Clock Bear.

name: Finn
line: He's sucking up all the spilled time!

name: Jake
line: That doesn't sound scientific!

name: Finn
line: Jake, take care of Clock Bear. There's something I gotta do!

name: Jake
line: Wait, I'm still confused! And having feelings!

name: Joshua
line: Oh boy, our first case! Looks like we have a poltergeist!  And it's got a little crush on me. What a sassafrass! Gotta get this one tape!  Whoops!

name: Jake
line: If this was all time weirdness, I guess that memory was true. I did see my own birth. Far out.  Oh! Must be a leftover time ghost.  Hmm.

name: Shape-shifter
line: We have to leave!

name: Jake
line: We're doin' what now?

name: Finn
line: It was just Clock Bear... No, I don't think he has any money.  Jake? Jake!  Oh, no! Something's happened to Jake! He could be in grave dang-  ...Okay, then.

name: Finn
line: The Goblins have suffered long enough, Xergiok!

name: Xergiok
line: Shush! You guys can't live without me, right?

name: Goblins
line: Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!

name: Jake
line: You got problems, man.

name: Xergiok
line: Blah!

name: Finn
line: Wands are for wimps!

name: Xergiok
line: You may have beaten me this time, but— Ogh!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Haha! Yeah!

name: Finn
line: And stay out, Muffin Top!

name: Goblins
line: Finn and Jake! Finn and Jake! Finn and Jake!

name: Gummy
line: Nyaaar! Great job, warriors! You've freed us. I am Gummy, royal goblin chief of staff.

name: Finn
line: Nice to meet you.

name: Gummy
line: Nyaan! I'm sorry. I have not known a friendly touch in some time. You see, Xergiok loved to be a jerk to us...

name: Xergiok
line: It's spanking time!!! Hiyahhh! Yeah!

name: Xergiok
line: Sigh.  Yahhh!

name: Goblin
line: Ow! Ow!

name: Goblin
line: Ah, heck, Maria, I need to ask you something,  Do you want to do this marriage thing with me?

name: Goblins
line: Awwww!  Isn't that sweet?

name: Maria
line: Oh, my love, the answer is yes.

name: Xergiok
line: Boom! Hahaha!  Congratulations.

name: Maria
line: Oh!!!

name: Xergiok
line: HA HA HA.

name: Gummy
line: We need a good king to rule us, like you mayhaps?

name: Goblins
line: Yeah, yeah!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, be their king.

name: Finn
line: No, man, I'm an adventurer for life.

name: Goblin with Cane
line: If there isn't a king to not tell me to not start a riot, I could start a riot, then!

name: Goblin
line: No rules, baby! Start that riot!

name: Goblins
line: Whoo! Yeah!

name: Goblin
line: Flip this table!

name: Goblin with Hammer
line: No one can tell me no!  Aah!

name: Gummy
line: Please, Finn,  we need a king.

name: Finn
line: Stop the riot!

name: Goblins
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: I'll become your king! To save y'all, from yourselves.

name: Gummy
line: We have a new king!

name: Goblins
line: Woohoo! Yeah!

name: Jake
line: Finn's gonna need a queen... I'll do it.
Outside the Throne Room

name: Gummy
line: Allow me to show you the grounds, Your Majesties.

name: Jake
line: Show me what we got, Gummy. Show it to me!  Dude! I'm psyched!

name: Finn
line: Hahaha, yeah!

name: Gummy
line: The Goblin Birthing Pits, Your Majesties.

name: Goblin in the Pit
line: I'm being... born.

name: Finn
line: That's pretty neat.

name: Gummy
line: The Garden of Living Fountains.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Whoo! Awesome.

name: Gummy
line: The Royal Game Archive, complete with controller hats.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Ooooh.

name: Gummy
line: The Royal Dragon Stables.

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Gummy
line: And finally, the royal bedroom, with king-sized bed for the royal couple.

name: Jake
line: Can you make that a bunk bed?

name: Gummy
line: Yes, my queen. Whisper Dan.

name: Jake
line: I call top.

name: Finn
line: And I call...

name: Gummy
line: Wait! For you, great king, the Book of Royal Rules.

name: Finn
line: Hmmm. Sounds boring.

name: Gummy
line: Oh, no worries, my Liege. I'll read it to you.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Jake, want to stay awake and hear some rules?

name: Finn
line: Alright, lay it on me, Gummy.

name: Gummy
line: Introduction, colon, the 623 royal rules were established in moon year 16, in response to Elder Gorflox's repeated requests for an organized...  Awaken, Your Highness!

name: Jake
line: No way, dude.

name: Gummy
line: Your Excellency! Let's go. We have much to do!

name: Finn
line: Whoo!!

name: Gummy
line: This is where you may perform your daily processes, my king

name: Finn
line: Whoooaa!!!! Look at that huge mirror... and it's painted baby blue—boy style.

name: Gummy
line: Come, sire, it is time to brush your teeth in the front of the "boy style" mirror.

name: Finn
line: Whooo!!! Awesome!

name: Goblins around the sink
line: Oh, no, no, no, Your Majesty! Let us brush your teeth

name: Finn
line: Yaaaah!! Whoa, ease up, dudes. Finn access only.

name: One goblin around the sink
line: Aaaah, he's a rule breaker! Don't spank us too hard.

name: Gummy
line: Spare them, Your Majesty! Spank me instead!  Set my buttocks ablaze!

name: Finn
line: Guys, what are you talking about?

name: Gummy
line: Rule 1 The king shall not brush his own teeth... in the book of royal rules I read to you last night.

name: Finn
line: Oh! Oh. Guys, put your hams away.

name: All three goblins
line: Whaa??

name: Finn
line: I'm not gonna spank your hams. I'm not that kind of king!

name: Gummy
line: So then... we may brush your teeth, my lord?

name: Finn
line: You can brush my teeth... I guess.

name: All 3 goblins
line: Yaayyyy!!!!!!

name: Finn
line: This brunch looks great! Can't wait to dig in.

name: Gummy
line: Uhhh, I will cut that, Your Highness.

name: Finn
line: Gummy, as king, I order you to let me cut it.

name: Gummy
line: I'm sorry, sire. The royal rules don't allow it.

name: Finn
line: I'm cutting it, Gummy!

name: Gummy
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Thank you, Gummy.

name: Gummy
line: Uhhhhh, a thousand pardons, my lord. You're not going to chew that, are you?

name: Finn
line: Yeah.

name: Gummy
line: I'm sorry, sire. The royal rules don't allow it.

name: Finn
line: Gummy, just let me do this. No one will know.

name: Gummy
line: I would know.

name: Finn
line: Uhhhhhh, Jake, this is nuts.

name: Jake
line: Maybe, but rules are rules.

name: Gummy
line: Master, eat your food. I chewed thoroughly and heated it to goblin body temperature.

name: Finn
line: I'm not hungry, Gummy.

name: Gummy
line: You look a little bit down. Would you like me to weep for you?

name: Finn
line: No, Gummy. It's just....

name: Goblin
line: Sire, sire!!!! There's trouble in town square. A thief!!

name: Finn
line: A thief? Hahaha, yes! I'll handle it!

name: Gummy
line: No, sire! The king is not allowed to fight. He must give a speech to the thief. That is the royal rule, my Liege.  There's the thief!

name: Thief
line: Give me them hot buns, lady!

name: Finn
line: Hey, thief!

name: A goblin
line: It's the new king. It's him!

name: Finn
line: I got a speech for you—

name: Gummy
line: Nooooooo!  The Royal Speaker must give the speech.

name: Finn
line: What.

name: Gummy
line: Ya see?

name: Royal Speech-taker
line: Since the dawn of time, the balance of what is right and what is wrong has...

name: Thief
line: Ha ha ha, I'll take this.

name: Gummy
line: Yes, you can feel it slowly working, eh?

name: Finn
line: I can't let this go on.  Hands off, thief!!

name: Finn
line: Ha!! Here you go, old lady.

name: Old lady
line: Oh, no, the new king! Just as cruel as the last king.

name: Finn
line: I—you—what?

name: Another goblin
line: Oh, king, we beg you not to slay the old lady.  Aaaah!!!

name: Finn
line: No, wait.

name: Old lady
line: Don't slay me! You may keep the hot buns, Your Majesty!

name: Another goblin
line: I'm ready for my spanking, Mr. Xergiok part two.

name: Rest of group
line: We're ready  for our spankings, sire.

name: Finn
line: ♪I just want to help y'all as much as I can, and y'all just keep showing me your goblin hams.  When I became king, I didn't think y'all would show me your rears, but I'll accept my boring fate, and shed this tear...  'cause I can't seem to cure you of your groundless fears.♪

name: Gummy
line: No. No more spankings...  Aaaahh!!!!

name: Finn
line: Gummy, don't be afraid. I'm gonna stick to the rules now, okay?

name: Gummy
line: My lord, I'm sorry, y-you haven't heard? Xergiok is returning with an evil army. Come look through the scope!  You see?

name: Xergiok
line: Prepare to destroy them all!

name: Gummy
line: Ohhh...

name: Finn
line: If I defeat Xergiok as king, I can prove to the goblins that an active king can be a good king, but I can't let them know until it's all over. Stay fainted, Gummy.  Ooooooooh! Whisper Dan, have you seen Jake?

name: Jake
line: I'm in here.

name: Finn
line: Xergiok's back with an army of Earclopses. Let's bust them up.

name: Jake
line: pbbbbbbbbbbbbb. All right, man, how do we do this?

name: Finn
line: Hmmmmmmm.

name: Jake
line: What if they figure it out?

name: Finn
line: No way, man.

name: Gummy
line: I'm going to be honest with you, king Finn. When I'm scared, I feel most safe in your lap.

name: Xergiok
line: Line up for you spankings, goblins!

name: One goblin
line: Ohhhhh, too late—in my pants.

name: Finn
line: Jake, the goblins can't see me being unkingly. I need a disguise.

name: Jake
line: Jump in my mouth.

name: Xergiok
line: Who among you has the courage to face Xergiok?

name: Finn
line: Shut your kissin' hole, Xergiok! It's time for a beatin'.

name: Xergiok
line: I salute you, foolish warrior! You can be my personal sla—

name: Finn
line: wowowowowowowowowoowowoow!

name: Xergiok
line: How in the world?

name: Xergiok
line: Eat this!  Whoa!  Ha ha, you missed me—

name: Gummy
line: Oh, great king, with the help of a brave soldier, you thwarted the evil Xergiok.

name: Goblins
line: Hurrah!!!

name: Finn
line: C'mon, dude, lets get out of here.

name: Jake
line: Alright.

name: Finn
line: Well, looks like they got the king they wanted, buddy.

name: Jake
line: Yep.

name: Finn
line: And we're going home to adventure.

name: Jake
line: Mmhmm.

name: Finn
line: High five us, dude.  Hey, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Wha?

name: Finn
line: Why do the insides of you smell like vanilla?

name: Jake
line: Ohh, uh, a wizard put a curse on me.

name: Finn
line: Huh, neat.

name: Finn
line: Birthday boy-e-e-e!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Enjoying your party?

name: Finn
line: It's great having fun with all my friends. Well, some of my friends mostly Banana Guards.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, sorry about that. The Candy Kingdom is in full lockdown until I can sort out the rumors about my Uncle Gumbald. He's been gone for years, but we should stay vigilant.

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, PB. Now that I'm 17, I'm feelin' ready for anything. Feels like I'm really hitting my stride, y'know?

name: Marceline
line: Finn, I want to give you your gift before I forget. It's a harmonica.

name: Finn
line: Awesome!

name: BMO
line: Finn, I designed an exciting new game for you.

name: Finn
line: Show me.

name: BMO
line: It's called "Birthday Boyfighter.

name: Finn
line: Looks like another hit.

name: Starchy
line: Finn, Starchy didn't get you squat.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: I got you a present too. It has emotional and metaphorical significance.

name: Finn
line: It's beautifully wrapped. Wonder what it is.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: It's an elk's heart.

name: Finn
line: Oh, cool. I don't have one of those.

name: Finn
line: What's that sound?

name: Starchy
line: It's zombies.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Sounds like hooves.

name: Starchy
line: Zombie cows.

name: Finn
line: You're green!

name: Green Knight
line: I'm the Green Knight! And before you ask, yes, of course, I brought you a birthday present. It's a battle axe.

name: Finn
line: That's some axe. Am I an axe guy though? I've always thought of myself as a sword guy.

name: Green Knight
line: But only if you play me a game for it.

name: Finn
line: What's the game?

name: Green Knight
line: Oh, this game is called "All you have to do is strike me with it, and it is yours."

name: Finn
line: Mm?  I can't axe some stranger. Wait a minute! Where's Jake? I know what's going on.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, I don't think you do.

name: Finn
line: Relax, Princess. Jake loves playing birthday pranks on me.

name: unidentifiable Banana Guard
line: Yes, of course One of Jake's classic pranks.

name: Finn
line: Okay, I'm in.

name: Green Knight
line: May your aim be steady.

name: Finn
line: Sure thing Jake!  I win!

name: Banana Guards
line: Yeah, Finn! Yeah, Finn!

name: Jake
line: Happy birthday, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Jake! When did you Whose head did I Are you pranking me?

name: Jake
line: What? No. My prank is this fake-out gift. Huh?

name: Jake
line: What's this guy's deal?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, nuh-uh! Banana guards, surround him! And be on the lookout for anything else strange!

name: Banana Guards
line: Hup, hup, hup, hup, hup, hup, hup, hup, hup! Surrender, please.

name: Unidentifiable Banana Guard
line: Princess, is that strange?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes!

name: Unidentifiable Banana Guard
line: I did good.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: My guards!

name: Finn
line: I got this. Raah!  Eel!

name: Marceline
line: Get him!

name: Jake
line: Aw.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: He might have an invisible shield. But I'm not sure, because it's invisible.

name: Jake
line: Owiee. Yes. It's an invisible shield.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: An invisible shield. I've got a device for the dissolution of invisible shields.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Impossible.

name: Green Knight
line: Heh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Back off, everyone. He's using some advanced mystery tech.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, let's talk.

name: Green Knight
line: What do you want to talk about?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Where did you come from? Why are you playing this weird game with Finn?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: He's playing Mr. Laughing Silent Guy.

name: Finn
line: Game's over, bro.

name: Green Knight
line: The game isn't over until I strike you.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Let's come up with a better way to settle this, like reasonable late teens.

line: I'm listening.
