line: You didn't even try.

name: Jake
line: I did try.

name: Jake
line: Horses are hard.

name: Jake
line: How's that?

name: BMO
line: Eh, it reads.

name: BMO
line: Steady, girl.

name: Jake
line: Wha...

name: BMO
line: Shh, shh, shh.

name: BMO
line: I'm going to mount you now.

name: BMO
line: Hup!

name: BMO
line: Good girl.

name: Jake
line: So, what's the plan anyway, BMO?

name: BMO
line: The plan is to punch the toads to the stump and bring justice to the peeps!

name: Jake
line: Ow.

name: BMO
line: Oh, and by the way, Jake, from now on, you can call me... Angel Face.

name: BMO
line: Hyah!

name: Jake
line: Yow!

name: BMO
line: I used to be a guy who ran from Glob with the wind at my back and the devil on my shoulder.

name: BMO
line: Now I'm the guy chasing those guys, yet the devil is still here, sleeping in my couch.

name: Jake
line: BMO, that hurt when you dug your boots into my side belly.

name: Jake
line: Are you gonna apologize or...

name: BMO
line: Horses do not talk.

name: BMO
line: Over there! Hyah!

name: BMO
line: Whoa!

name: BMO
line: Jackrabbit Johnson.

name: BMO
line: This guy's wanted for stealing piglets from their mothers while they are feeding.

name: BMO
line: Makes me sick.

name: BMO
line: He was last seen in dead goat gulch.

name: BMO
line: What do you say, girl?

name: BMO
line: Want to catch this donkey and split the reward?

name: Jake
line: You have 45 minutes left before my next sammich.

name: BMO
line: Time's a-wasting!

name: Jake
line: Hyee!

name: BMO
line: Hmm.

name: Jake
line: BMO, I'm tired.

name: BMO
line: Looks like my horse needs a rest.

name: BMO
line: Slow down, horse.

name: BMO
line: ♪ Being a robot cowboy ♪

name: BMO
line: ♪ Is a lonely job ♪

name: BMO
line: ♪ But somebody has to protect the piglets ♪

name: BMO
line: ♪ I got nobody but my horse ♪

name: BMO
line: ♪ And my friend the cactus guy ♪

name: BMO
line: ♪ It's okay because I like them a lot ♪

name: BMO
line: ♪ That's okay, I like being a robot ♪

name: BMO
line: ♪ Cowboy ♪

name: BMO
line: Be careful, Jake.

name: BMO
line: This is where Jackrabbit Johnson's gang of lowlife bandits lays low.

name: BMO
line: Hyah!

name: BMO
line: Bang! Bang!

name: BMO
line: Put them up, partner!

name: BMO
line: Hyah!

name: BMO
line: Pyew, pyew!

name: BMO
line: Pyew, pyew, pyew!

name: BMO
line: I want answers!

name: BMO
line: You can't do this to us!

name: BMO
line: No answers, eh?

name: BMO
line: No use to me!

name: BMO
line: How about you, frisco?

name: BMO
line: I'm not going to talk.

name: BMO
line: Why am I talking to you then?!

name: BMO
line: Hooah!

name: BMO
line: Yah! Unh!

name: Neptr
line: BMO, what did you do?

name: BMO
line: It's Jackrabbit Johnson's right-hand man, Tumbleweed Terk.

name: Neptr
line: I spent the last three months building all of this.

name: Jake
line: Oh, that's where you been?

name: Neptr
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Neptr
line: BMO gave me a Finn Cake.

name: BMO
line: Don't talk to my horse, Tumbleweed.

name: Neptr
line: Aah.

name: BMO
line: Where is Jackrabbit Johnson?!

name: BMO
line: I know you know where he's headed.

name: Neptr
line: I don't know!

name: Neptr
line: Tumbleweed terk's always the last to know.

name: Neptr
line: It's just like I told the other bounty hunter, I swear.

name: BMO
line: I don't believe a word you say.

name: BMO
line: Now take a message to your compadre.

name: BMO
line: Tell him his pal, Angel Face, is itching to get together.

name: BMO
line: Tell Jackrabbit Johnson to meet me at Dirtwater Flats, just like the old days!

name: Neptr
line: Okay.

name: BMO
line: Sock citizens of dead goat gulch, we can rebuild!

name: Jake
line: Neigh!

name: Me-Mow
line: Grrr.

name: BMO
line: Uhh...

name: BMO
line: I don't remember where Dirtwater Flat is.

name: BMO
line: Better stop for the night.

name: BMO
line: We can make a campfire here.

name: BMO
line: And we will talk about what we will do with the reward money.

name: Jake
line: No.

name: Jake
line: It's been fun, BMO, but it's time to go home because there are no more sandwiches.

name: BMO
line: But I want to finish the adventure.

name: Jake
line: Which direction is the house?

name: BMO
line: I'm not sure.

name: BMO
line: Get down!

name: Me-Mow
line: Getting kicked out of the guild of assassins... check.

name: Me-Mow
line: Capturing my first bounty...

name: Me-Mow
line: Check.

name: Me-Mow
line: Going to Finn and Jake's treehouse and getting revenge...

name: Me-Mow
line: Unchecked.

name: Finn
line: Finn and Jake's treehouse?

name: Me-Mow
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Finn
line: Who are you, and why do you want to get revenge?

name: Me-Mow
line: I... Am... Me-Mow!

name: Finn
line: Me-Mow?! Whoa.

name: Finn
line: You've gotten bigger.

name: Me-Mow
line: Have we met before?

name: Jake
line: Finn, is that you?

name: BMO
line: That's Jackrabbit Johnson!

name: Me-Mow
line: Finn?

name: Me-Mow
line: It is Finn!

name: Me-Mow
line: Tricked again!

name: Jake
line: Look... It's me-mow, BMO.

name: BMO
line: I don't care.

name: BMO
line: That's my bounty!

name: BMO
line: Yaah!

name: BMO
line: Jake, transform...

name: BMO
line: Horse!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, did you have a real gun all this time?

name: BMO
line: I am old enough to vote.

name: Me-Mow
line: Hey, Jake, if you can hear my internal monologue, I'm going to kill you!

name: BMO
line: Your Daisy days are over!

name: BMO
line: I am the whaler 'round these parts!

name: BMO
line: Huh.

name: Me-Mow
line: Sounds like you're out of ammo.

name: BMO
line: No, you heard incorrectly.

name: BMO
line: Bang, bang, bang!

name: Me-Mow
line: I'm coming for you!

name: Me-Mow
line: Ugh!

name: Me-Mow
line: Blast you, Finn and Jake and Angel Face.

name: Me-Mow
line: This prison cell's not going to hold me.

name: Finn
line: Oh?

name: Me-Mow
line: Hey, Finn and Jake! I'll get my revenge! You hear me?! Revenge!

name: Finn
line: Hey, BMO, are you sure you took down all the wanted posters?

name: BMO
line: Yes.

name: Armadillo
line: Stick 'em up.

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: BMO
line: This bounty belongs to me!

name: BMO
line: Get out of here!

name: Armadillo
line: Yaah!

name: Finn
line: Thanks, BMO.

name: BMO
line: You're welcome.

name: Finn
line: Boiled eggs. In the fridge.

name: Finn
line: Jake! You're back! I've missed you so mu- Oh.

name: Jermaine
line: Uh, hi Finn. It's just me.

name: Finn
line: Jermaine! You and Jake both have sort of a grapefruit nature to you.

name: Jermaine
line: I came to your playhouse because I'm worried about Jake.

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, he's fine. He left a note.

name: Jermaine
line: How long ago did he leave that?

name: Finn
line: Uh, I dunno. Maybe five weeks?

name: Jermaine
line: Whoo. Finn, you know you can call me if you're in trouble, right? Our brother's missing, and I come here finding you doing a lazy man's load with a hundred boiled eggs.

name: Finn
line: It's all they have at the store.

name: Jermaine
line: I'm just worried, 'cause I had a dream about Jake - a vision.

name: Jermaine
line: I think he's all alone in outer space. I don't think he can come home, and he's running out of birthday cake and cocktail hot dogs.

name: Finn
line: Jake's in space?!

name: Jermaine
line: I know! It's chilling.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Oh! So, this cosmic stuff, planets and space...  This is Normal Man-type subjects.  We're going to Mars!

name: Jermaine
line: Mars?!  Is it too much to hope that "Mars" is the name of some bookstore you like?

name: Jermaine
line: Is that a boat? I haven't seen a boat in years.

name: Jermaine
line: Ah, this is a pretty old house. What's that on the shelf? A little pegasus?

name: Jermaine
line: Into the basement. Sure is lots of broken glass and decay down here. I'll be honest - I was just talking a lot because I'm nervous.

name: Finn
line: I know.

name: Finn
line: Jake.

name: Jermaine
line: Mars.

name: Finn
line: Dang. Looking real prosperous around here.

name: Jermaine
line: Who's the statues, do you think?

name: Finn
line: Maybe Margles? But I've only seen a photo of her. Wait! Betty?

name: Betty
line: Oh, Finn. Uh, how is-

name: Finn
line: I haven't seen you, Betty, since you double-crossed everyone.

name: Betty
line: I-

name: Finn
line: Ya slopped up!

name: King Man
line: Finn! Empathy!

name: Finn
line: Normal Man.

name: King Man
line: Nay! King Man!  Finn, Betty is tormented. Just look at her.

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: Betty
line: I'm trying to get better. I'm filling this hole with sand - grain by grain.

name: King Man
line: We're going to cure Betty's obsession with the Ice King and the magical madness inflicted upon her.

name: Betty
line: G-G-G-G-Gah

name: Finn
line: If you inflicted it on her, shouldn't you be filling the hole?

name: King Man
line: Empathy, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Aah!

name: King Man
line: Okay, so, Jake's in space.

name: Jermaine
line: Yeah.

name: King Man
line: And you don't know where in space.

name: Jermaine
line: Yeah.

name: King Man
line: And you don't know where in space, even though literally every single place in this dimension is  "in space".

name: Jermaine
line: Again, yeah.

name: King Man
line: You are a real cutie. Okay, here we are. To locate Jake, you will need to retrieve our space telemetry capsule - deep within Mars at the end of a deadly three-part mind maze.

name: King Man
line: Don't fret, cowardly dog. Betty will go with you.

name: Betty
line: I... should really get back to my sand.

name: Finn
line: Nah. You should come with us.

name: King Man
line: Now, only Martians may enter the maze, so you'll need hats to fool the guard over there.

name: Jermaine
line: Okay, cool. Where are the hats?

name: King Man
line: Space.

name: Jermaine
line: Wha- Aw, come on, man!

name: Jermaine
line: Eeh!

name: Finn
line: Um, Door Man?

name: Guard Man
line: I'm Guard Man.

name: Finn
line: Well, I am Boy Man.

name: Jermaine
line: Uh, and I'm... Jer Man.

name: Guard Man
line: Sure.

name: Finn
line: "Jer Man" was really funny.

name: Jermaine
line: Thanks, Finn.

name: Finn
line: Hey Jermaine, get a load of these frogs. What do you think's going on with all these frogs, Jermaine? Jermaine?

name: Jermaine
line: What? I don't know.

name: Finn
line: Oh, whoa. That one looks different - kinda... special.

name: Finn
line: Yip!

name: Fern frog
line: Remember!

name: Finn
line: Whew!

name: Betty
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: I'm okay. These guys mean business, though. If you look them in the eyes, they get outraged.

name: Finn
line: You got all that, Betty? Betty! Hup!

name: Betty
line: Oh! There's more on this side.

name: Finn
line: Hyup!

name: Betty
line: Guys, I think I figured out the frog puzzle.  It's really quite simple.

name: Betty
line: I found the next challenge! I think maybe if I solve this equation, we'll be able to pass through to the next chamber.

name: Finn
line: And if we mess up, that guy pecks our tummies open, right?

name: Betty
line: No. See, the work is already full of errors. I just need to correct them.

name: Jermaine
line: Um, I'm not trying to complain or anything, but none of these puzzles have anything... to do with... me.

name: Betty
line: Look see? This quadrinomial has been improperly factored. He forgot to double cube root the bottom partial nominator.  There we go. I'll have us out of here in no time.

name: Finn
line: Well, just let me know if you need any help - with anything besides these maths problems.

name: Betty
line: X plus square, hypotenuse cubed plus Y minus three...

name: Finn
line: Hey! He's jukin' the stats!

name: Betty
line: What?

name: Finn
line: He's changing the dang numbers around!

name: Betty
line: He's changing. Oh no.

name: Finn
line: Come on, Jermaine!

name: Jermaine
line: Up there? You're gonna break your neck!

name: Finn
line: Hey!

name: Finn
line: If anyone else feels like solving any of these puzzles, just jump right in, you know?

name: Jermaine
line: Hey! Over here! I hear something.

name: Past Betty
line: ...if you water them once a week they'll totally be fine. No! I know! Six months studying ancient petroglyphs in the Outback?!  I can't believe it!

name: Betty
line: That's me.

name: Jermaine
line: Uh-doy!

name: Finn
line: You looks so happy. And sane.

name: Betty
line: I was. But I never took that trip. I met Simon the next day, and he was just so amazing. I put everything on hold to help him search for the Enchiridion.

name: Jermaine
line: Listen, Betty, I may not be a psychiatrist or a life coach, or even know what you're talking about, but maybe you should try focusing on yourself a little more, you know?

name: Betty
line: Can I though? I spent so much time dedicated to Simon I'm not sure there's even any "me" left anymore.

name: Past Betty
line: Good point, Future Betty! Maybe it is too late to save you, but with your power and my joie de vivre-ay, maybe the two of us could save Simon together! Think about it.

name: Finn
line: Oh, come on, Betty! Get it together! Even if you are a lost cause, she-

name: Jermaine
line: -Or whatever she represents-

name: Finn
line: -is not.

name: Past Betty
line: Or am I?

name: Betty
line: No, Finn's right. You'll thank me for this later, Past Betty.

name: Past Betty
line: Hmph.

name: Past Betty
line: And don't forget to water my plants. Okay, got to go! My flight leaves in an hour!

name: Finn
line: Good job, Betty.

name: Betty
line: Thanks, Finn. Sorry I couldn't be more help. I was a little preoccupied.

name: Jermaine
line: Oh really?

name: Finn
line: Anyway, where's the space thingy?  Space thingy! Space thingy!

name: Jake
line: Space what-y?

name: Finn and Jermaine
line: Jake!

name: Jake
line: Hey everybody.

name: Finn
line: Hey, long time no see, brudda!

name: Jake
line: Hey, what's with the hair, brudda?

name: Finn
line: Man, you're lucky you missed it. I had lice crazy-bad! I think I got them from Marceline, who got them from Ice King.

name: Jake
line: Nice.

name: Finn
line: Anyway, how'd you even get here?

name: Jermaine
line: Eugggh!

name: Jake
line: Beats me. I was just eating a sausage on some stupid planet, then all of a sudden there was a beautiful rainbow explosion and a loud noise - sort of like a space telemetry capsule activating. Then here I was, standing next to this Mars door.

name: King Man
line: Congratulations, everybody. Now, who's ready for a nice boiled egg?

name: Finn
line: Me!

name: Jake
line: Me!

name: Jermaine
line: Wait a minute. What even happened in there? Where's the telemetry capsule?

name: King Man
line: Don't you see, Jermaine? You were inside the capsule all along, learning valuable lessons while you programmed its Jake-extracting telemetry with your minds.

name: Jermaine
line: Of course.

name: King Man
line: And you, Betty - finally you've learned that most pressing of lessons - that sometimes, for our own good, we must accept the loss of that which we hold most dear.

name: Betty
line: I've learned that I just got to work even harder to get it back.

name: King Man
line: What?!

name: Betty
line: Like, did you see Finn in there? He was indomitable!

name: King Man
line: Yeah I guess but-

name: Betty
line: So as I stared into that endless white void, I came up with a plan.

name: King Man
line: A plan?

name: Betty
line: For me, to save my Simon, and for you, to finally pull Margles back from the maw of GOLB.

name: King Man
line: Marg-

name: Finn
line: Whoop! Huh?

name: Jake
line: Whoop!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Whoopiiieee...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Cheers, Lumpy Space Princess.

name: Jake
line: Bouncing!

name: Finn
line: Princess, this tea party sucks in a big way! But thanks for the invite!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, don't worry, Finn. The Mallow Tea Ceremony takes years to master.

name: Finn
line: Princess! I think I just now mastered it!  One more bounce.  Alright!  Unh! Tea partying's hard, huh, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Oof! Yes!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What?! No way! It's super easy!

name: Finn
line: Lumpy Space Princess, you big faker! You're floating, not bouncing!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Fine. I'll prove it.  Huh? Ah! Oh, no!  Oh, snap!

name: Jake
line: AAAAAGH!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh. Sorry I bit your leg.

name: Jake
line: You're still biting me!!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, my gosh. Oh, right. Sorry.

name: Finn
line: Dude! Your leg!

name: Jake
line: This is... new. It's nothin' ominous, though. Just a bump.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Nah, that's no bump. It's the early stage of the lumps.

name: Finn
line: Is it serious?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: It just means he's changing into a Lumpy Space guy, on account of my bite. It's just like, um, y'know... werewolf rules?  Ar, rawr rawr rawr rawr rawr rawr!

name: Finn
line: Oh, no!

name: Jake
line: What? You think I'm gonna turn all lumpy like her? Get outta here.  Wha? Finn, I think I'm freakin' out!

name: Finn
line: Calm down, bud! I'll... I'll sock the lumpiness outta ya!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hey, now!  Royal intervention! Surely there must be an antidote to the lumps.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah. There's an antidote, but you have to go all the way to Lumpy Space to get it. And Jake has to use it by sunset.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What happens if he doesn't take the antidote by sunset?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: He'll be lumpy, like, forever.

name: Finn
line: LSP, please! Can you tell us how to reach Lumpy Space?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah, I mean, there's a portal nearby. I can show you whenever.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Take us now! Take us now!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I should not have drunk that much tea!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Don't go telling everyone about this portal or whatever. It's kind of a secret.

name: Finn
line: Where is it?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Portal's that Frog and mushroom.

name: Frog
line: Password, please.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Whatevers2009!!

name: Frog
line: Good day, Princess. Is your father okay with you entering Lumpy Space with two...  non-Lumpers?

name: Finn
line: Just say yes! Yes, yes, yes!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah, whatever, fine.

name: Finn
line: AAAAH!! Whoa... Lumpy Space. So, where's the antidote?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hold it. First, you should check out my house. It's, like, kind of lame, but way less lame than, like, your house.

name: Jake
line: Uh, could you skip to the part where you tell us where the antidote is?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: It's up there at Makeout Point.

name: Finn
line: That's so close! We can run there in no...  ...time. Aww, what?!! It's, like, a million-mile fall into space!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah. You have to travel by car in my world, or else you'll fall into the Lumpy Abyss.

name: Lumpy Space King
line: Daughter!! Have you brought smooth people into our domain?!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I had to, Dad... I'm trying to help them, so don't lumping yell at me!

name: Lumpy Space Queen
line: WHAT DID YOU SAY?! What did you just say?!?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I SAID, "LUMP OFF," MOM!!!

name: Finn
line: Uh...

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: WHAT?!?!

name: Finn
line: Vroom vroom??

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, yeah.  I need to borrow the car.

name: Lumpy Space King
line: You have made your mother cry for the last time, daughter! You are hereby banned from using the royal car!!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Shucks! I lumping hate them! I'm really, really sorry, Finn. But I can't help you because my parents are horrible idiots.

name: Finn
line: Don't you know anyone else with a car?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: My friend Melissa has a car. But she's dating my ex-boyfriend Brad.

name: Finn
line: Call her NOW.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hmm.   Call BFF 66.

name: Melissa
line: Hello?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hey, Melissa. What's up?

name: Finn
line: What's she saying?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I'm asking her, jeez! Melissa, just listen!

name: Melissa
line: Have you forgotten what day it is?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Melissa. I'm trying to help out some friends.

name: Melissa
line: Tonight is the weekly Promcoming Dance!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, Glob. I forgot.

name: Finn
line: What'd she say?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Tonight is the weekly Promcoming Dance!  It's gonna be so flipping awesome!

name: Finn
line: LSP, we don't have time for this. Ask for the ride, LSP.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh—  Wha?!

name: Finn
line: Melissa,  you should totally drive us to Makeout Point to make out with hot boys!

name: Melissa
line: LSP, you're so baaaaad... be there in a sec!

name: Finn
line: Biyah.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hmm.

name: Finn
line: Sorry. But Jake's lumpiness is worsening!

name: Jake
line: Actually, I think I'm beating it back with sheer willpower!   Oh, my.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yeah, whatever. Just don't mess with my phone again.

name: Melissa
line: Hi!

name: Finn
line: Ugh... OKAY! Let's go, let's go, let's go!!

name: Jake
line: Aw, Finn, this music ducks, right?  Ah. I love this song. We should totally TP Shandala's house!  Gracious! That was terrible! Finn, if you can't save me from the lumps... if I do turn... if I become lumpy like them, I want you to—

name: Finn
line: It's not gonna come to that. But if it does, I'll bury you beneath the nicest, most shadiest tree!

name: Jake
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! I'm saying that if I go totally lumpy, then I want you to get used to lumpy Jake. What did you think I was sayin'?

name: Finn
line: Oh, um...  Heh heh.  CAN'T THIS CAR GO ANY FASTER?!

name: Melissa
line: We're already here! Hi, Finn.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: We've been here for, like, five minutes.

name: Finn
line: Finally! Huh? This doesn't look like Makeout Point.

name: Melissa
line: This is Brad's house. You wanted a ride to Makeout Point? You think I want to make out with you?!

name: Finn
line: Uh...

name: Melissa
line: Well, maybe I do, but... wait.  I HAVE A BOYFRIEND, FINN!!

name: Finn
line: LSP, we gotta hurry! Jake's running out of time!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Hey. This is hard for me, too. I mean, I used to eat chili cheese fries with Brad... so there's gonna be a lot of romantic tension on this ride!

name: Brad
line: Hey.

name: Melissa
line: Oh, Braaaaad...

name: Brad
line: You miss me yet, LSP?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Scooch over, Finn. I'm gonna sit in the back.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: This is it.

name: Finn
line: Let's go!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Wait. Watch yourself, Finn. The guys who use the antidote up here are notorious for being...  smooth posers.

name: Finn
line: What does that mean?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: It just means what it means. Hurry. Get the antidote so we can get outta here.

name: Finn
line: Thanks, LSP.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: BUUUUMPS.

name: Jake
line: Um... bumps.

name: Finn
line: Uh, yeah, bumps.

name: Jake
line: Aw, man!

name: Finn
line: Hey, guys. Lookin' smooth!

name: Glasses
line: Really? You think we're smooth?

name: Finn
line: Well, mostly you in the center, but yeah!

name: Monty
line: Why are you sucking up to us?

name: Finn
line: My best friend needs an antidote for lumpiness.

name: Lenny
line: Chyah, lumpiness suuucks. Hey, Monty, time's up, sphere-hog!  My turn!

name: Finn
line: So the antidote is in that orb you were sitting on!

name: Lenny
line: This orb is the antidote, bruh.

name: Finn
line: Can my friend borrow it?

name: Lenny
line: Yeah, sure, as long as you give it right back.

name: Finn
line: Hammacow. Thanks, fellas.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What's taking so long? Did those smooth-heads give you the orb already, or what?

name: Finn
line: Wait!!

name: Lenny
line: Is this another friend of yours?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What do you care? Just give 'em the antidote already, and stop being such a poser.

name: Monty
line: Sorry, kid.  We changed our minds.

name: Finn
line: Why did you have to say all those rude things to them?!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: What? I was helping you.

name: Finn
line: Thanks a lot!  They were right about to hand over the antidote!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You're welcome a lot.

name: Finn
line: You insulted them! And they got mad! And now Jake's gonna be lumpy forever! THIS IS ALL YOUR FAULT!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Wow. Now I know how you really feel. I was just trying to help, but whatever.  No. No, not whatever! I know I mess things up sometimes, but I'm really trying! And you're supposed to be my friend!  Not like the fake ones I have here! So do what you want! I'm going to Promcoming! Are you coming or not, Lumpy Jake?

name: Jake
line: No. Because no matter how messed up and lumpy I get, this guy never turns his back on me!  Oh, yah. Right behind ya. Just gotta turn my back on this guy.

name: Finn
line: JAKE! IT'S ALMOST SUNSET!!  Jake... I didn't save him... I...  I'LL KILL YOU, LUMPY SPAAAAAACE!!

name: Monty
line: Jam on, man!

name: Finn
line: Huh? I thought you guys left!

name: Monty
line: We were drawn back by your plaintive wail. We dig your directionless fury.

name: Finn
line: Um, thanks.

name: Monty
line: Respect. Here.  Take it. Win your girl back!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, there's no girl. But there is still time to save Jake! Do you guys know where Promcoming is?

name: Monty
line: Promcoming takes place way down on that land-lump.

name: Finn
line: Awesome. Do any of y'all have wheels?

name: Monty
line: Nah. We were all ditched here just like you.

name: Finn
line: Well... you think I can make it to that land-lump if I jumped off this cliff?

name: Monty
line: You kidding?! A smoothie like you will plummet right into the eternal void!

name: Finn
line: What if I was lumpy? Could I float over?

name: Lenny
line: No, no! It's too dangerous!

name: Glasses
line: I'd say there's a 50/50 chance of you making it!

name: Finn
line: That's good enough for me. Now bite me!!

name: Finn
line: Yes! I can feel the multiple bites accelerating the lumpification process! I'm starting to float!

name: Lenny
line: Don't jump, guy!!

name: Finn
line: I have to! For my buddy.  RAAAAAAGH!!!!

name: Glasses
line: Wow. He's insane.

name: Finn
line: Ah, I made it! And there he is!

name: Jake
line: Yeah! Promcoming! Yeah! Cool!

name: Finn
line: Jake! I'm mostly lumpy now! And I totally think you should sit on this sphere!

name: Jake
line: No!

name: Finn
line: Sit on it!

name: Jake
line: No!!

name: Finn
line: Please, Jake! You're my best friend! Just sit on the sphere!

name: Jake
line: Chyah! I remember you! You're just a smoothie wannabe lumpy poser!

name: Finn
line: Sit on it!! Before I turn completely lumpy!!

name: Jake
line: NO!!

name: Finn
line: Oh, no! I can feel the lumpiness... about to consume me!!  Oh, yah. Being lumpy's the best.

name: Jake
line: Hey. Stop talkin' to yourself, dumb guy. Take your ball and get outta here.

name: Finn
line: Fine. I don't want you to have it anyway.

name: Jake
line: So I can't have it now, eh?

name: Finn
line: That's right. It's mine.

name: Jake
line: GIMME THAT BALL!!

name: Finn
line: NO! You can't have it!

name: Jake
line: I want it! Give it to me!

name: Finn
line: You want it that bad? Go get it, then!

name: Jake
line: Bumps, bi—   Oh, I'm not lumpy anymore! Oh, no. Finn buddy! You gotta sit on this!

name: Finn
line: No! You can't make me! Smooth—OOF!

name: Jake
line: Finn! Hey, Finn! Hey, buddy! Finn

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Hey, dude. We made it.

name: Finn
line: Man... There's something cold under my butt.  Oh!  The antidote! Just in time, too! LSP, I'm sorry I blew up at you before. I didn't mean it. I was just really stressed out.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You know, it's fine. You and Jake can make it up to me by dancing this last dance with me.

name: Finn
line: Sounds good to me. Whaddaya say, Jake?

name: Jake
line: That sounds totally lame.

name: Jake
line: I'm just kidding. Let's dance!

name: Jake
line: Ah.

name: BMO
line: Stand and deliver, boy, because I'm Robbing Hood. Give me all your funny money, Sheriff of Naughty-hams.

name: Neptr
line: But BMO, I don't want to be the bad guy. I want to be Robbing Hood's pal, Friar Tux.

name: BMO
line: No, Neptr.  Ha ha! Friar Tux would never have a mustache like that.

name: Neptr
line: No fair. En guard!

name: BMO
line: On Blitzen!

name: BMO
line: You're terrible!

name: BMO
line: Whoa!

name: BMO
line: Eeeee!

name: Neptr
line: Aaaaa!

name: Jake
line: What? Hey! What are you kids doing breaking the treehouse?

name: BMO
line: Uh...

name: Finn
line: Yo, BMO, what happened?

name: BMO
line: You got too much money, honey. All of this dosh is threatening the structural integrity of the treehouse.

name: Finn
line: Who would have thought we could have too much treasure?

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: I'm sorry, master.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant!

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: You told me to stay inside the money room, but now I am outside. What is your punishment, master?

name: Finn
line: No punishment, dude. Just chill where you are.

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: All right. I will chill where I am until you command me.

name: Finn
line: So what should we do with all this swash?

name: BMO
line: You should give it to Robbing Hood.

name: Jake
line: No way, BMO. This is our treasure.

name: BMO
line: Aw.

name: Finn
line: Hey, maybe we could, like, spend it?

name: Jake
line: Really? How much of it?

name: Finn
line: Dude, like all of it. Then we can find completely new treasure.

name: Neptr
line: Neptr knows just the place to blow your grease. Behold, this recent advertisement.

name: Jake
line: Whoa! We get mail?

name: Finn
line: Check it out, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Dang! Wildberry Kingdom got all fancy.

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: I continue to chill.

name: BMO
line: Come on, Naughty-Hams.

name: Patron
line: Thank you.

name: Finn
line: Nice place. So how are we gonna spend all this gish?

name: Jake
line: I don't know. I've never really spent money before. I've only stolen it or hoarded it.

name: Finn
line: Ha!

name: Jake
line: So... here we are in the middle of town.

name: Jake
line: Let's parse out some dough to spend.

name: Strawberry Guard
line: Hey! What are you doing? No people or money allowed in the fountain, ya dums! Where's your sense at?!

name: Jake
line: Sorry, man. We were just looking to spend some cash in town.  Want some?

name: Strawberry Guard
line: Fellas, goofing in a public fountain is punishable by a lashing, and you're trying to bribe me.

name: Strawberry Guard
line: Ooh! Now that's what I'm talking about, fellas.   Have a good time in the fountain.

name: Jake
line: Whoa. Spending money is kind of fun.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, this'll be easy.  Ho, ho, young berry lads!

name: Wildberry kid
line: Yeah?

name: Finn
line: Go buy the most expensive meats and furniture to adorn our new fountain home. Keep the change for your families in need. Hyup!

name: Wildberry kid
line: Thanks, but we're, uh, middle-class.

name: Finn
line: Really?

name: Wildberry kid
line: Uh, yeah, upper middle.

name: Jake
line: Just get the darn furniture.

name: Strawberry Guard
line: Hey, no furniture or meat in the fountain! You'll wreck up the water!

name: Strawberry Guard
line: You can't buy me off twice, fellas.

name: Strawberry Guard
line: Ah, maybe you can, fellas, maybe you can.

name: Finn
line: Dude, we bought all this furniture and meat, and we still have a ton of gamboni left.

name: Jake
line: Hmm.  Look at those gams! Hey, yo, Legs! Legs! You want a bag of money?

name: Legs
line: Sure!

name: Jake
line: Well, what are you gonna do for it?

name: Legs
line: Well, um, I'm a dancer by trade.

name: Jake
line: Show me.

name: Legs
line: Hup!

name: Jake
line: Finn, look. I made this guy dance.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man. Whoo!

name: Strawberry Guard
line: Hold it! No dancing in the streets without a permit!

name: Jake
line: Go away, dude.

name: Strawberry Guard
line: Hey, you can't talk to me like that.

name: Strawberry Guard
line: All right, I'm going!

name: Jake
line: This is crazy. People do anything for money. And I've got a ton of money. Dance harder, Legs! Harder!

name: Jake
line: This bores me. You're boring! It's time to push this thing further. Middle-class berries, watch after this treasure while I'm gone.

name: Wildberry kids
line: Okay.

name: Jake
line: Ahem.

name: Goji Berry Man
line: Mabel, do you hear something?

name: Jake
line: Good evening.

name: Wildberry People
line: Oh no! We're being robbed!

name: Finn
line: Oh, no, we're not robbers. We're actually here to give you money.

name: Goji Berry Man
line: What?

name: Jake
line: Listen. I want to see you two do things  for this bag of money.

name: Goji Berry Man
line: Okay, man.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, nice. Goji Berry Man, you sleep on the left side of the bed normally. Now you sleep on the right!

name: Goji Berry Man
line: Okay.

name: Mabel
line: I don't like sleeping on your side. It's too close to the wall!

name: Jake
line: Mr. Goji Berry, you sleep on your back now—and on top of the covers.

name: Goji Berry Man
line: I can't sleep on my back, man. I got sleep apnea. I won't get any sleep. My wife won't get any sleep. My dance instructing will suffer.

name: Jake
line: Turning down all this smoosh, huh? Dance instruction pays more than I thought.

name: Goji Berry Man
line: Wait, man! There's got to be something else we can do to get those gold coins.

name: Jake
line: Well, sure, man. As a matter of fact, you can have all the gold coins... all the gold coins you can eat!

name: Jake
line: Dinner is served!  Yummy, yummy, yummy. Hey, you kids need some desert? I'll just see what I can rustle up—in the toolshed!

name: Finn
line: Guys, I'm super sorry about my friend. Here.

name: Finn
line: Don't eat it, ya dums!

name: Jake
line: How much do you think I'd have to pay them to lick the dust off all this dusty stuff?

name: Finn
line: Dude, I do not approve of the way you're spending money right now.

name: Jake
line: Dude, they're not doing anything they don't want to. They want my sweet cheddar, and I want to see some stuff in exchange. It's mutual—free market.

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: Free market!

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, brother. I'll help you see the error of your ways.

name: Finn
line: Berry lads! Berry lads! I need to spend all this blingo fast.

name: Wildberry kid
line: Okay.

name: Finn
line: Take me to the seediest alley in the kingdom.

name: Wildberry kid
line: That's Crudberry Back Alley... in Crud Town.

name: Finn
line: Friendly Crudberries, I have money for you! Come get it!

name: Hobos
line: Money? Money!

name: Finn
line: Easy, fellas! Let's pass these out one at a time.

name: Finn
line: Hey, take it easy, breh.

name: Hobo
line: Give us that money!

name: Finn
line: I-I-I don't want any trouble.  I'm trying to help you.

name: Finn
line: Whew!

name: Jake
line: How much coin would it take for you to be my berry foot warmer?

name: Finn
line: Dude!

name: Jake
line: Oh, hey, man.

name: Finn
line: Jake, this money is bad. We got to get rid of all of it right now.

name: Jake
line: Okay, I got a plan. And this time, it's gonna involve all the money.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Finn and Jake?

name: Jake
line: Princess, are you ready to earn all this cay-ash?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: What...?

name: Jake
line: All of this sweet, sweet crunkle is yours if you let me...  sit on your head.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Get out of here!

name: Jake
line: No one can say no to this much dinero. ♪M-m-money♪

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Jake, I am warning you.

name: Jake
line: ♪M-m-money♪

name: Jake
line: ♪M-m-money♪

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Aah! Guards! Guards! Seize Finn and Jake and prepare them for execution!

name: Jake
line: Or don't do that and get paid mad bucks.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: And take all their money!

name: Jake
line: Take all my money?!

name: Jake
line: Well, we were trying to get rid of all that skrilla anyway, right?

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Finn and Jake, yes, you have insulted me, but worse than that, you have abused the power of money!

name: Wildberry Princess
line: We will deal with you swiftly and ironically by encasing you in your own molten gold!

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Release the golden flood!

name: Strawberry Guard
line: Oh, no! Aah!

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Who dares?

name: BMO
line: Ho, ho, ho! Robbing Hood is the defender of the poor!

name: Neptr
line: Me too!

name: Jake
line: Good shot, BMO!

name: BMO
line: I was aiming for the rope.  Yeah!

name: Jake
line: Let's bounce, po' boy.

name: Wildberry Princess
line: Finn and Jake, if you ever return to Wildberry Kingdom again, I'll have you double-dipped in gold! Unless I get a written apology.

name: Finn
line: Huh? Gold piece. You want to flip to see who writes that apology letter?

name: Jake
line: How about you write it, I sign it.

name: Finn
line: No way, man.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Yeeeaaah!

name: Finn
line: What's for B-fast, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Everything burrito!   I love you, everything burrito.  Oh, man. I think someone wants to eat everything burrito! I won't let 'em get ya, baby!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Come on! Get ready!

name: Jake
line: Ready!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Yaaaaah!

name: Cute King
line: Peep!

name: Jake
line: So cute!

name: Finn
line: Look at their little faces! Haha!

name: Jake
line: Haha!

name: Cute King
line: We're not cute! We're evil, ...and we're here to dominate you!

name: Finn
line: Get the camera, Jake!

name: Jake
line: I can't! I'm paralyzed by the cuteness!

name: Finn and Jake
line: BMO! BMO! BMO! BMO!

name: BMO
line: What? What? What? What?

name: Finn and Jake
line: BMO! Get the camera!

name: BMO
line: BMO is camera!

name: Cute King
line: Enough! Now... bow down to me, Cute King, and my legion of Cuties!

name: Finn
line: Great shot, BMO!

name: Cute King
line: Since you won't take us seriously, we will kill you. Until then, enjoy your burrito, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: My burrito!

name: Finn
line: It's perfectly fine.

name: Jake
line: No, Finn... They probably poisoned it!

name: Finn
line: Naaaaawww...

name: Jake
line: They knew my name. They knew about the burrito.

name: Finn
line: Man, you're letting your brain dial turn your fear volume up. You'll see. Those Cuties are nothing but an afternoon's delight.

name: Finn
line: Jake? What're you doing in my bed?

name: Jake
line: Oh, nothing much. You know, just... chillin'.

name: Finn
line: Wait a second... Are you still messed up about those little guys?

name: Jake
line: A little.

name: Finn
line: Look, man, whaddaya say tomorrow morning we go track those little guys down and find out just what their deal is? Sound good, buddy?

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Thanks, buddy.  Man, you sound just like Mom sometimes.

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Good ol' Mom.

name: Jake
line: She always knew just what to say.

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Goodnight, brudda.

name: Jake
line: Goodnight.  Finn! Finn!  Finn, wake up, man!

name: Finn
line: Wha? Huh?

name: Jake
line: I think someone's in the house.  For real, man! Shh, listen.

name: Finn
line: Uh...

name: Jake
line: I swear, man! I really heard something.  Finn!!

name: Finn
line: I heard.  Okay. Who's out there?

name: Jake
line: What the—?! That's my sword!  What do they want with my sword, man?!   It came from downstairs.

name: Finn
line: Alright. That's it.

name: Jake
line: Where are you going?

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna go man-handle those guys's banandles!

name: Jake
line: ...What?!

name: Finn
line: Well, they broke a window, but I don't see any of 'em.  I guess they left.

name: Jake
line: Oh, no. OH, AWWW, NO!

name: Finn
line: Jake, what is it?!

name: Jake
line: Awww, no! It's a dead goat, man! Its guts are all over the place! It's all chopped up and spread around and...  Ah, no, wait, it's just a blanket. I think I left it here this morning.

name: Voice
line: Jaaaake! Fiiiinn! This is the voice of your moooom! I've come back to tell you how dumb you always aaaare!  I hate you guys so muuuuch!

name: Finn
line: Get 'im, Jake!

name: Jake
line: Aaah! Aaah!

name: Finn
line: Jake, I got 'im! He's freakin' out, man! What do I do?!

name: Jake
line: Shake 'im!

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Jake
line: Shake 'im around 'til he stops!

name: Finn
line: Okay.  Rrrrrrr!  They stopped.

name: Jake
line: Okay. Now tell 'im not to talk about our mom!

name: Finn
line: How do you even know our mom?

name: Cutie's first head
line: We've been watching you.

name: Cutie's second head
line: Learning your weaknesses.

name: Finn
line: What?! Why?!

name: Cutie's first head
line: For tomorrow morning.

name: Cutie's second head
line: When our army comes and kills you both.

name: Cutie's first head
line: You think we're so cute, when actually... we're the opposite of that!!

name: Jake
line: Hold 'im!

name: Finn
line: Oh, gross.

name: Jake
line: Well?! Do you believe me now, Finn?!

name: Finn
line: I... I don't know what to believe anymore.

name: Jake
line: Well, that's close enough. Let's start settin' up some barricades!

name: Jake
line: There's gotta be a thousand of 'em!

name: Finn
line: Wait. Jake, look.

name: Jake
line: These guys aren't a threat to anyone.

name: Finn
line: These guys are a threat to themselves.

name: Finn
line: Oh, hey, it's what's-his-face!

name: Cute King
line: No... My men! Quickly, men! Pick yourselves up before the enemy sees!  Come on, now. That's it. Easy does it.  Bravest warriors! I ask you must we have our butts handed to us by everyone we meet?! How will we ever splash around in the brains of our enemies if you guys can't take two steps without exploding?! Bliblob, I'm lookin' at you!  Can I please just get one victory?! ONCE?!  Now don't start that.  Don't you do it!

name: Jake
line: Wanna just smash 'em all?

name: Finn
line: What?! No, man, look. These guys aren't gonna quit until they win or die, ...and they're not gonna win, so what if we let 'em win, just this once?

name: Jake
line: What?! And mess up my stats?!

name: Finn
line: No. We'd be winning by helping them to win. That's a win!  And then they'll be happy and leave us alone.

name: Jake
line: Alright.

name: Finn
line: Yessss! Now, let's rally an army so we can look intimidating.

name: Jake
line: Who're we gonna call?

name: Finn
line: All of our friends.

name: Finn
line: My army of friends! Today, we will lose this battle, but we will also win it!  When the enemy charges, crumble like a cookie. When you feel their puny punches, fade like a flower, and writhe in your own blood!

name: BMO
line: But, but... how are we to bleed if none of this is real?

name: Finn
line: With faith, m'lady... and ketchup!

name: Jake
line: Ketchup is delicious and deceiving!

name: Finn
line: And hey, guys... Let's keep the acting subtle. Less is more.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: No way. First, I'm gonna fall in love with one of those little guys, and then I'm gonna fall out of love, and then, I'm gonna totally fake-die of a fake heart attack!  "OH! MY HEART! MY HEART HURTS BECAUSE I FELL OUT OF LOVE! AND NOW I HAVE TO DIE! OOOOHHHHH!!!"

name: Finn
line: Get ready, y'all. Together, we fall!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Not yet, Cinnamon Bun!

name: Cute King
line: YAAAAH!

name: Finn, Jake, Lumpy Space Princess, and BMO
line: Whoa.

name: Finn
line: Oh, no!  My blooood!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: One last kiss before dying, my love.  Farewell forever. Oh, oh, my heart! Waaah!

name: Jake
line: I'm dead.

name: Cute King
line: Victory... is... OURS!  Finally. I can do the victory dance!  La! La-da! La-da-da la! La-da-da la da!  La-la-da-la-la-la!

name: Jake
line: BAAAHAHAHAHAHA! Ah, I'm sorry, everybody! Ah, I couldn't keep it in! Hahahaha!

name: Cute King
line: No...  This is ketchup?!

name: Jake
line: Tastes better than blood. Or does it? Hey, Finn, you think blood tastes better than ketchup?

name: Finn
line: Jake. Look.

name: Jake
line: Aw, nuts.

name: Finn
line: Cute King, wait up.

name: Jake
line: We wanna apologize for being fakers.

name: Finn
line: We did it to protect you from yourselves.

name: Cute King
line: It doesn't matter now. No one will ever fear our strength.

name: Finn
line: But strength isn't your strength. Adorable cuteness is!

name: Cute King
line: Can I use it to control others?

name: Finn
line: Um... yeah, sure! Just be righteous about it.

name: Cute King
line: Show me where to start.

name: Ice King
line: Huh? Who could that be?

name: Cute King
line: I command you to make me a sandwich!

name: Ice King
line: What?! No one commands the Ice King to make no sandwich!

name: Cute King
line: What about now?

name: Ice King
line: Okay.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 흑흑흑 안돼. 내가 왜 그랬을까?

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 걔네들 찾았어요?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: My GPS shows Finn and Jake over there . I think that's where the Ice King has them hostage.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 걔네들 안전할까요?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm sure the boys are fine. The Ice King isn't usually a serious threat.  Besides, this'll be easy with the two of us.  We've got science on our side.

name: Tea robot
line: Your tea is ready.  Pouring. Pouring.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 제이크가 실종되기 전에 내가 월남국수 면이 질기다고 말했어요. 아, 내가 왜 그런 말을 했을까. 무슨 나쁜 일이 생겼으면 어떡해?! 걔가 만든 국수 맛없다고 한 게 우리의 마지막 대화였어요.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: It's okay, Lady. Jake knows you love him.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 미안해요. 내가 국수를 너무 많이 먹었나 봐요.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Don't worry. Just try to relax.  I'll work on my holo-entry.  It's been three weeks since Finn and Jake disappeared while battling the Ice King. I've activated a secret GPS implanted in Finn's ear. It has lead us to an uncharted black ice cave... but I've spent hours calculating every possible danger and am well-prepared.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 그놈이 칼을 들고 덤비면 어떡해요?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Then I'll pull out my Electrode gun.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 그놈이 공주님을 해치려고 하면요?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Then... I'll use my Ball Blam Burglerber! Lady, it'll be fine.   We've got science!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 아.. 맞아요, 내가 좀 걱정이 심한 편이죠. 전 반 살은 시체들이 우리 집을 공격하는 악몽에 시달려요. 우리 삼촌, 외숙모, 사촌들이 다 집에 있었어요. 아기가 위층에서 우는 소리까지 생생히 들린다니까요. 내가 우리 가족들을 지킬 수만 있다면 — 그 꿈 꾸는 동안 얼마나 스트레스 받으면 이빨까지 무지하게 갈아요.  다음날 일어나면 이빨들이 금 가있어요. 보통 전 그냥 그런 것 꿈이려니, 내가 걱정을 사서 하지 하며 잊어버리려고 해요. 제가 그 반 살은 시체들에게 정말 두 번이나 공격당했었잖아요.  I become too stressful during that dream. I even grind my own teeth!  When I wake up in the morning, all my teeth are cracked up! I usually try to forget about it, thinking that it's just a dream or I'm being paranoid, but I was actually attacked by zombies before, twice!")

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmm. I suppose that's true.  Let's roll.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 으으, 잘 안 보이네.

line: Hold up, Lady.

line: Don't worry, Lady!  Ball Blam Burglerber-ber!  My field of vision!  HEY!!
