line: Lady, phase through the wall!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 공주님 무기들!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Come on. There's no turning back now.

name: Ice King
line: This is total bunk! You copier! You're only in love with her because I'm in love with her!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: Ice King.

name: Ice King
line: I've been playing this game a lot longer than you, pal! I've been workin' my moves, smooth-talkin' 'er, showin' 'er magic tricks! Don't ignore me! Come back!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm picking up three heart signatures. Ice King must be talking to Finn and Jake.  Go to the right, Lady.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 공주님 저 땀나게 만드시네요.   와, 이 방은 예쁜 새 소리에 대한 내 사랑보다 더 크네!

name: Princess Bubblegum and Lady Rainicorn
line: Ew.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Lady!  Lady, are you okay?

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 으, 네. 걱정 마세요. 저 완전, 완전 괜찮아요. 자, 가요. 일어납시다!  으, 안 되겠네. 혼자 가세요. 전 짐만 될 뿐이에요.  Guh. I don't think I will make it anyway. You should just go alone. I'll just be a burden for you.")

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No, Lady. I won't leave you while you're hurt. Come on.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What are you playing at, Ice King?  Three heart signatures. ...Getting closer.

name: Ice King
line: Hey.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: AH!

name: Ricardio
line: Princess! What a pleasant surprise...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ricardio!

name: Ricardio
line: Yes, it is I. Did you find my dungeon stimulating?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Where are Finn and Jake?!

name: Ricardio
line: What do you see in those two?  A boy... and a dog. You deserve more mature companionship.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Poisoned with Zanoits.

name: Ricardio
line: You see, I thought I only wanted your heart, but I was wrong. I was unfair to you. I want the full package.  Princess...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What...?

name: Ricardio
line: I'm a man now.  I made myself this body for you, Princess,  Synthesized from Ice King's living tissue—his bones broken and reassembled.

name: Ice King
line: It hurt, ooh, boy! How about a hug? Gimme a hug! I need it!  Oh!

name: Ricardio
line: Silence, Simon!  All for you, Princess!  Now marvel at these powerful, articulate limbs!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: STOP!

name: Ricardio
line: Attached with supple and delicate sinews.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: AH!  LADY!

name: Ricardio
line: Now, my darling, we can finally be united as man and wife.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, Ricardio. I'll do it. I'll be your wife.

name: Ricardio
line: Ah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: If you can beat me  at hand-to-hand combat!

name: Ricardio
line: Oh, my... How Valkyrian. Princess, you are absolu—

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You think we're intellectual equals?! It only took me seconds to get you off your guard! And this "body" you designed is self-congratulatory garbage! See, I know a thing or two about building a body out of biomass,  and you don't... leave your heart exposed!

name: Ricardio
line: I just wanted to impress you!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You didn't.  Get out of my sight.

name: Finn
line: Princess? PRINCESS! RICARDIO IS BACK, HE'S IN THE BLACK ICE CAVE, AND HE'S PEACOCKING HARDCORE!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I know... and he poisoned you both with Zanoits, but I took care of it.

name: Finn
line: What happened? How did we get here?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I dragged you all here on Lady's back.  It took two days. And another day to make you guys an antidote.   And fifteen minutes to build the Ice King a new heart.

name: Ice King
line: Hey, Finn.  Hee hee!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I made it out of Ricardio's sinews... and some toffee and maracas.

name: Ice King
line: Coochie coochie coochie!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm glad you guys are up. Please make the Ice King leave.

name: Ice King
line: Hahaha! Shooka shooka shooka!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: ICE KING, PLEASE LEAVE!!!

name: Ice King
line: Ah-hay!!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: How are you feeling, Lady?

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 제이크 깨어났어요?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yes. He's awake.  Oh, Lady. I should have never put you in danger.  I saw on the heart monitor. I didn't know.

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 괜찮아요. 비밀로 한 제가 잘못이죠.   Jake!

name: Jake
line: Lady! Oh, Lady!

name: Lady Rainicorn
line: 자기야, 나 완전 중요한 할 말 있어.  나...  I...") I am pregnant!

name: Jake
line: ...I'M... PUPPIES!?

name: Finn
line: Jake, so I just had this weird thought.

name: Jake
line: Well, that's normal; people always have weird thoughts around campfires.

name: Finn
line: Well, I don't know. Isn't is sort of strange that we keep pets? We kind of make them worship us.

name: Jake
line: What?! Nah.

name: Finn
line: No, seriously, think about it. We're their only source of food and water and, like, tummy rubs. They basically have to love us.

name: Jake
line: What's wrong with tummy rubs?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, tummy rubs are pretty great.  That one star is so crazy, looks like it's vibrating.  It's so cool. Wonder what it is, a planet? Do people live there? Are they friendly? Do they keep pets?

name: Jake
line: Alright buddy,  that's a little too much campfire. Time for bed.

name: Finn
line: Whoa... holy.  Oh, dang.   Uh, okay.  Man, this is screwy. Maybe it's the can of beans we had for dinner.  Looks- uh- homey. Wuh-oh! Whoa-Aah!  Oh- right.

name: Mr. Fox
line: Mmm, Boobafina, just pay me back when you can.

name: Finn
line: Aww.

name: Astral Mr. Fox
line: Hello?

name: Finn
line: Oh! Hey, you can see me?!

name: Astral Mr. Fox
line: See you...? But if I didn't see you... Wait, what did you originally ask me?

name: Finn
line: Oh, forget it, it's cool.

name: Astral Mr. Fox
line: Do you, want a drink or something? I think I only have water anyway. .

name: Finn
line: Whoop, here I go! Bye!

name: Astral Mr. Fox
line: Oh, that was sort of rude. I hope he comes back.

name: Finn
line: That guy seemed lonely, not a lot of foxes up at this hour.  Guess you get a lot of work done though.

name: Bounce House Princess
line: Quittin' time!  You don't have to go home but ya', oh, you know how it goes!

name: Finn
line: Bounce House Princess. . I didn't know B.H.P lived in a cave.  Hey, this place is pretty nice.

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Bounce House Princess
line: Forty-one, forty-two, forty-three, forty-four, forty-five. forty-six, four-seven, fourth-eight, forty-nine... fifty! . Fifty-one, fifty-two . Who's there?!

name: Bounce House Princess
line: Oh my glob, oh my glob, oh my glob, oh my glob!   six four three two one! .

name: Finn
line: Dude, what's your deal?

name: Bounce House Princess
line: Everything's okay now.

name: Finn
line: Aww, geez, poor Bounce House Princess.

name: Finn
line: Wha?

name: Bounce House Princess
line: Bounce House Princess, you listen to me! Are you gonna' shut yourself off from other people forever?! I mean he or she could be really nice and- okay, mm, maybe if I just say very still, it'll just- it will just go away.

name: Finn
line: Gosh, I hope BHP's okay, I feel bad for just splittin' like that. Maybe they sorted it out, they could have stuff in common. You never know until you speak to the person.  Oh, hey, Cloud Kingdom.

name: Finn
line: What the? Ice King?

name: Ice King
line: Yeah, I guess there's some cool people here, musics a little loud but the but the punch is top-drawer.

name: Lauren
line: Mm hmm

name: Ice King
line: Hey, you should come to one of my parties sometime; I'm friends with some pretty cool people too you know?

name: Lauren
line: Uh huh, who are your friends?

name: Ice King
line: Oh, uh- like that guy, Finn.

name: Lauren
line: Finn?!

name: Ice King
line: Yeah, Finn and I are pretty tight!

name: Lauren
line: Hmmm

name: Cloud Woman 2
line: Oh, hi, are you the ice-dude?

name: Ice King
line: That's me, ice-dude. . Hey, have you ever seen the inside of an ice bear cave?

name: Lauren
line: Did you say you know Finn the Human?

name: Cloud Man 1
line: Hey, buddy, buddy! Care to freshen me up?!

name: Ice King
line: Yeah, yeah, now scram.

name: Lauren
line: Hey, is Finn seeing anyone right now? Could you introduce us?  Oh my glob! Is he here now?!

name: Ice King
line: So I guess you're more into the 'little brother-type'? Huh.

name: Cloud Man 2
line: Hey Lauren, I heard your grandpa's given out ice!

name: Ice King
line: Ice?! I'll give you ice!  Oh, looks like I put this party- on ice. Oh wait, you want ice? You, oh, you got iced!  Anyway, oh, don't look at me like that Lauren. . Eh, this party was weak anyway.

name: Finn
line: Poor Simon. Poor Simon, I guess? Poor Simon... sort-of? It's like some part of him wants to be a sad wong-lord.  But why would anyone want that? Is there some... incentive?

name: Finn
line: Sheesh, I wonder if being a sad loner gives you more raw material to form song ideas. Is that where creativity comes from? From sad-biz?  I am so high up now. I am so high up, there is no "high up". It's all just...  Whoa! What the--? Whoooa!  Space Lards! Ah man, Jake would be flipping out; trying to get that super-rare milk. Make a sick flan with that milk. Oh, well.

name: Finn
line: Whoa! What's going on? You can't see me, right?

name: Finn
line: I'm in the Mother Lard! . What? Space birth!  Okay, here we go! Whoa!  Bye, guys. Oh, that was creative and it wasn't sad either so maybe birth is the greatest statement in all the universe.  Hey, baby, ya' gonna give me a boost? . Here comes Mars. What the heck is going on though?  Everybody's leaving!

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Fire defense missiles!

name: Star Man
line: Missiles away! Impact with Catalyst Comet in 5, 4, 3, 2, 1!

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Yes! Do you think it worked, Star Man?

name: Star Man
line: Uh, yeah, probably, right?  Shoot! No effect! It's still coming right at us!

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Was that all of our missiles?

name: Star Man
line: Uh, yeah, I'm surprised we even had those ones. Like who would we shoot a missile at? Who'd we shoot at?!

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: I'm thinking, Star Man!

name: Star Man
line: Rooot!

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Grob. Assessment.

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: We're sunk, bro. This whole place is gonna be a stinkin' molten dump in a minute.

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: It doesn't make sense. Every 1,000 years, the Catalyst Comet mysteriously reincarnates itself and collides with Earth, bringing with it an agent of change. But the comet has never been so off schedule - and it's never freakin' hit Mars!

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: What do you think, Finn the Human?

name: Finn
line: Wha? Who, me? You can see me too?

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Yes, I am Glob.

name: Finn
line: Oh yeah. Hey, do you ever say "Oh my Glob?"

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: No, but sometimes Gob does.  You're dreaming so far from home, it must be comet related.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but, I gotta question.

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: What's that?

name: Finn
line: Well, if just being born is the greatest act of creation.  Then what are you suppose to do after that?  Isn't everything that comes next just sort of a disappointment?  Slowly entropy-ing until we deflate into a pile of mush?

name: Grob Gob Glob Grod
line: Well, it’s not enough to have created something amazing, right? What if I just let my Martian supersociety go to butt?

name: Finn
line: But what's it worth if we're all gonna get blowed up right now?

name: Star Man
line: Whoa! What are you doing?!

name: Finn
line: Ahhh!  Oh my bod!

name: Jake
line: What is it, boyi?!

name: Finn
line: ...Glob is dead.

name: Evacuation Man
line: Hello, Star Man, this is Evacuation Man, what's the sitch, can we go back yet?

name: Star Man
line: Yes! Gob Glob Grod Grob diverted the comet, it's back on its normal path to Earth.

name: Evacuation Man
line: And what about the G-Man?

name: Star Man
line: No sign of Glob.

name: Martin
line: Ahh! Computer! What did we hit?!  Oh, blobs...  oh, for real blobs...

name: Finn
line: Hey, I think Bounce House Princess needs our help.

name: Jake
line: Let's do it!

name: Jake
line: Dude... how long are we gonna follow this frog?

name: Finn
line: I just wanna see 'im put on that crown.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Wooow!

name: Jake
line: It looks cool in there!

name: Finn
line: Too bad we don't have the key to this.

name: Jake
line: What're you talkin' about?  I got two keys right here!

name: Finn
line: Whoo-hoo!

name: Jake
line: Wow! Look at this place!

name: Finn
line: Jake. Are these donuts?

name: Jake
line: They look like donuts.

name: Finn
line: But maybe they're poisonous donuts!  Yeah! Sniff it, Jake! Suck up those toxins!

name: Jake
line: Wait a second... I don't know what poison smells like.

name: Witch
line: Hey!   Razzamafoo!

name: Jake
line: Hey!

name: Finn
line: What gives?!

name: Witch
line: You ate one of my donuts!

name: Jake
line: No, I didn't. I just sniffed it.

name: Witch
line: RAAAAAGH!! You're lying! The stink of magic dog lips is everywhere!

name: Finn
line: Holy slug, lady! Calm down!

name: Jake
line: Listen, Mrs. Witch.

name: Witch
line: I never married!

name: Jake
line: Well, I never ate your donuts.

name: Witch
line: You... you're eating one right now!

name: Jake
line: No, I'm not!  Whoa-hoa! Hm... That's weird... I don't even remember grabbing this. My subconscious must be hungry, huh? Huh... whatever.

name: Witch
line: MAGICUS NOMORICUS!

name: Jake
line: Uh-oh.

name: Finn
line: AAH!  Dude, are you okay?

name: Jake
line: Yeah... I think so. Just a little chilly.  WHOA!

name: Witch
line: Ahahahahahehehe!

name: Finn
line: What did she do to you?

name: Witch
line: I stripped him of his magical powers!

name: Finn
line: For stealing one of your billions of donuts?!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, it's not like I killed your husband or somethin'.

name: Witch
line: I AM NOT MARRIED!

name: Finn
line: The point is you overreacted.

name: Jake
line: And what gives?  I used to have like eight more of these things.

name: Witch
line: The only way I'll give back your powers is if you admit your error and say you're sorry and mean it! ...'Cause I can tell the difference.

name: Jake
line: Well, you can forget it because you're the one who's wrong!  ...Right?

name: Finn
line: Total support, dude.

name: Witch
line: RRRRAAAARRGH!!  Go-backicus-from-whence-you-came-icus!

name: Finn
line: Aw, now you're just makin' these up!

name: Witch
line: Are you alright, my... my donut pretties? Heh heh... Wait a second. YOU'RE A BAGEL! LIARS! LIARS EVERYWHERE!

name: Finn
line: There's gotta be a way to get your powers back! Where'd they come from, anyway? Were you born with them? Or... did you have a freak industrial accident?!

name: Jake
line: Ha. That takes me back. Let me just...  remember.  I see a memory. When I was just a pupster... I'm rollin' around in a mud puddle, and I'm just... lovin's it. Oh, no!  Whoo... Remembering is hard work.

name: Finn
line: What happened next?!

name: Jake
line: Oh. Um... I went into the mud, and... I guess I became a magic dog?

name: Finn
line: Okay! Then our course is clear! We'll roll you in every mud puddle in Ooo until we find the one that'll restore your powers.

name: Jake
line: That's nuts, man. You got any idea of how many mud puddles are in the land of Ooo? Four? Maybe even five?

name: Finn
line: Jake, come on! We've always been lucky, buddy! Maybe the first mud puddle we find will be the right one!

name: Jake
line: Nonsense... but I like it!

name: Finn
line: Then away! Hyuh! Whoo-hoo!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, let's do it!

name: Finn
line: Oh, my gosh!

name: Jake
line: I forgot that I don't have magic powers anymore. How do we search for the mud without my powers?

name: Finn
line: We run! Run like energetic little boys!

name: Jake
line: This whole time, I thought running was some sort of... leg magic.  Huh... Look at me. I'm runnin'!  Oh, no...   Running... is... evil...

name: Finn
line: Come on, lazy bones!

name: Jake
line: It's too hard!

name: Finn
line: I guess you could ride on my backpack.

name: Jake
line: I can't reach.  You good, Finn?

name: Finn
line: You're... strangling me... a little, is all.

name: Finn
line: Look there! Across the River of Junk! There's an ideal mud puddle.

name: Jake
line: I'll stretch into a boat!  I'm startin' to really miss that old magic of mine.

name: Finn
line: We can swim this river easy!  Come on, Jake!

name: Jake
line: Man, that looks exhausting.

name: Jake's subconscious
line: You're right, Jake. It is exhausting.

name: Jake
line: What are you?!

name: Jake's subconscious
line: I'm your subconscious!

name: Jake
line: Okay, what are you doing here?

name: Jake's subconscious
line: I'm here to tell you that what you're feeling deep down inside is true! It is way too hard to swim across the river. It's easier to wear a hat.  Here! Have a hat!

name: Jake
line: Ha ha!

name: Jake & his subconscious
line: Yeah-hea-hea-hea! Heh heh!

name: Jake
line: Man, I'm glad I met you.

name: Finn
line: Jake! Stop talking to yourself! Cross over already!

name: Jake
line: Uh, I can't swim that river, dude. My subconscious says it's too hard. Check out this hat, though.

name: Finn
line: What's wrong with that guy?  Then just wait for me there!

name: Jake
line: Whatcha workin' on, Finn?  Look at you! Doin' stuff!  Oh, is it a chair?  A chair for my butt—?  Mud-venture!

name: Finn
line: Did it work?!

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah! I can feel this workin'! In fact, you should roll in the mud with me, Finn! We can both be magic!

name: Finn
line: YEAAAAH!  This isn't working at all.

name: Jake
line: This isn't the right mud. I was just really hopin' this was over and done.

name: Finn
line: Okay... Then let's just go find another mud puddle.

name: Jake
line: Actually... I'm feeling kinda chubby-tired. Can't we do this tomorrow?

name: Finn
line: Agh! This is stupid! Just go back to the witch and apologize and get your powers back!

name: Jake
line: Never! I'd rather be powerless forever then apologize! I'm lazy but prideful.

name: Finn
line: YOU'RE NOT EVEN TRYING, MAN!  First, you won't run,  a-and now you keep—and... a-and no matter what, I ju—you...

name: Jake
line: Adventuring is too much hard work for a bro without his powers.

name: Finn
line: But you are an adventurer.

name: Jake
line: Nah, from now on, I'm just your regular old dog. ...Ironic given my current man-baby body.

name: Gary
line: Behold the beautiful mermaid of the river.  Which one of you mortals wants to mate with  all this? Heh heh heh...

name: Finn
line: Oh, um... How do I say, "You're the grossest thing ever," without offending you?

name: Gary
line: RAAAAAARGH!!

name: Jake
line: I'll scare her off, Finn!

name: Finn
line: How do we beat power like that?!

name: Jake
line: Finn! I've got an idea!

name: Finn
line: What is it, buddy??

name: Jake
line: Rub my belly! Yeah, I'm one of those kinda dogs.

name: Finn
line: YAAAAH!

name: Jake
line: Finn?  Finn! Come on, Finn! You gotta save yourself! I'm just a dog! Aw, man. Oh, geez... Okay. Then I'm back on the team!  I'll save you!

name: Finn
line: Jake?

name: Jake
line: Don't worry!  Hey, Finn... Can you help me to get up there?

name: Hatchlings
line: Hungry! Hungry! Hungry!

name: Jake
line: If only I had my powers back!

name: Witch
line: The only way I'll give back your powers is if—

name: Jake
line: I know, I know! I have to apologize to that Witch.

name: Witch
line: Oh, you're doing so well... and I hate you so much!!

name: Jake
line: Hey!  Witch! I need my powers back! So I'm sorry! I'm so sorry I ate your donut!

name: Witch
line: Razzamafoo.

name: Jake
line: ...Oh.  So do I get my powers back?!

name: Witch
line: Mmm... Apology denied.

name: Jake
line: What?! Why?!

name: Witch
line: Because you took too long. Now you have to apologize while doing a variety of humiliating things.

name: Jake
line: No way, Jose!

name: Jake's subconscious
line: Come on, dude. It's the only way to save Finn.

name: Witch
line: Who is that?!

name: Jake
line: He's my subconscious.

name: Witch
line: Then he has to do it too.

name: Jake's subconscious
line: Aw...

name: Jake
line: I, Jake the dog, while slow-dancing with my subconscious, with flowers in my underwear, do humbly apologize...

name: Witch
line: Wait, wait. Start over.

name: Jake
line: You're recording this?!

name: Witch
line: It's for my newsletter.

name: Jake
line: No way. I have my dignity.

name: Witch
line: Then guess what, cool guy? You can forget about getting your powers back... EVER!!

name: Jake
line: Oh, no, dude! What do we do now?

name: Jake's subconscious
line: I'm dyin', Jake.

name: Jake
line: Wha?!

name: Witch
line: Hm. He says he's dying. Let that be a lesson to all you cupcakes.  Hah...

name: Jake
line: Why are you dying, bro?

name: Jake's subconscious
line: Because... I'm the subconscious of your old magical self.  Goodbye, Jake...

name: Jake
line: No! No!

name: Witch
line: So I've finally broken you.

name: Jake
line: Yeah!  If only... I were a humbler guy, my subconscious would be alive, and my best bud wouldn't be trapped in a mermaid's nest!

name: Witch
line: YES! GLOAT, GLOAT, GLOAT! Alright, I think you've learned your lesson.  I forgive you.

name: Jake
line: My powers! How can I ever thank—  Ha! Got your cane!

name: Witch
line: WHAAA! OOF!   But didn't you learn your lesson?!?

name: Jake
line: NOPE!!!

name: Hatchlings
line: Hungry! Hungry!

name: Gary
line: Remember to save the brain for dessert.

name: Jake
line: Honey, I'm back! How about a big kiss?   You guys are so cute! I could just maul you to death!

name: Finn
line: Jake!  I never should have doubted you!

name: Jake
line: Well, I'm glad you learned your lesson that in a crunch, there's nothin' I wouldn't do for ya.

name: Finn
line: Ahhh, so is that how you got your powers back? You apologized to the witch?

name: Jake
line: Uh...  No way! I must have found the right... mud puddle! Yeah... I don't remember. Heh... eh-heh...

name: Finn
line: Jake, why didn't you stick to the plan?

name: Jake
line: Psshh. Hey, you wanna bump baby lumps?

name: Finn
line: Sick. No. Just try to follow the plans, okay?

name: Jake
line: Yeah.

name: Finn
line: Come on out, cuties. It's safe now.

name: Jake
line: Now get out of here.

name: Finn
line: Hey, you hear something? Up there.  It's a fat, fat warrior beat. It's all...   It calls me forth.

name: Jake
line: Eh, it's probably just puberty calling.

name: Fight King
line: Fighters! Fighters!  Seek you glory from the Fight King?

name: Finn
line: Mmmm... Maybe.

name: Fight King
line: Then step forth beyond the Moonlight seal to bathe in blood and glory forever.

name: Finn
line: Nah. This is a trap.

name: Jake
line: Ka-psshh.   We snuffed out that trap like champs! Trying to get us up in that cursed arena.

name: Finn
line: Then I'd bet the exits would all magically seal behind us.

name: Jake
line: We'd probably have to fight Gladiator Ghosts.

name: Finn
line: Yeah. That sounds... so dumb... and FLIPPING AWESOME!

name: Jake
line: We're back!

name: Fight King
line: Fools! All exits are sealed!  Now you must fight my Gladiator Ghosts!

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Okay.

name: Finn
line: I'mma beat you with your own thing. Give it up!  Hah-hah!  Ooomph!

name: Primo
line: Hyperion, I'm sorry!

name: Primo
line: Hyperion, my love!

name: Hyperion
line: I'll kill you for breaking your promise!

name: Finn
line: Yeah. Ah-ha-ha-ha.

name: Fight King
line: Good... Take these branches of palm.

name: Finn
line: Yeah.

name: Jake
line: That prize kinda stinks. Let's go, Finn. My thighs hurt.

name: Finn
line: Aw, man. Okay, it was fun. I'm keeping the branch.

name: Fight King
line: Where do you think you're going?  You must earn thy freedom by defeating each of my ghosts! When you are ready, speak the Fight King's name, and I shall raise you for... battle.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Okay, I have a plan. We'll do what the Fight King says, and defeat his ghosts to earn our freedom.  You're gonna follow my plan, right?

name: Jake
line: Mmm-hmm. But, hey, if you replace me with a dummy, I could stay down here and dig for lava. Then I'd forge a molten hula-hoop.

name: Finn
line: That's an entirely different plan... than my plan. What's the hula-hoop for?

name: Jake
line: Morale, dude, This tomb will be as fun...  ♪ As a tropical island, as a tropical island, as a tropical island, as a tropical island. ♪

name: Jake
line: Check it out, dude.  Ba-duh-buh-da. It's a dirt dummy Jake. Just like in the plan.

name: Finn
line: We're ready... I guess, Fight King.

name: Fight King
line: Gladitoria continues for you, human, and, er... dog?

name: Finn
line: Yup. This is dog.

name: Fight King
line: Arise, Priscus, Verus!

name: Verus
line: Forgive me, Priscus!

name: Fight King
line: Pity. The dog falls.

name: Priscus
line: Et tu, Verus?

name: Finn
line: Heh.

name: Fight King
line: The combat endeth. Now come closer, champion.

name: Jake
line: Dig-dig-dig-dig-dig-dig-dig. Two gongs? Something crazy's going on up there.  It's me, Jake. Been here the whole time. Huh?

name: Fight King
line: Come closer, my champion. You have proven worthy of my favor.

name: Finn
line: Hah. Word.

name: Jake
line: Oh, this is bad.

name: Fight King
line: Accept your prize.

name: Jake
line: Finn?

name: Fight King
line: Ah... The dog lives.

name: Jake
line: Yeah. I lives. Finn, come with me, man.  Whoa! Dude?

name: Finn
line: Sorry, man. But you crossed my kill zone.

name: Fight King
line: Fighters, rest now.

name: Jake
line: So, how's your side of the plan going?

name: Finn
line: Plan? What plan?

name: Jake
line: To escape. I dig and stuff, and you fight to win, 'member?

name: Finn
line: Yeah. I fight. To hear bones breaking and meat tearing.

name: Jake
line: Ghosts don't got meat.

name: Finn
line: I fight... to FIGHT!

name: Jake
line: Hmm... Finn's acting weird. Probably due to a decrease in morale. Gotta get him that lava hula-hoop.

name: Finn
line: We're ready for our next fight, Fight King.

name: Jake
line: Gotta liven up this unhallowed ground.... for Finn.  ♪ On a tropical island, underneath a molten lava moon. Hanging with the hula dancers, asking questions 'cause they got all the answers... ♪

name: Finn
line: Habet! Habet! Habet! Heh-heh-heh.

name: Achillea
line: Amazonia, I'm sorry!

name: Finn
line: This next take-down is for you, my king! Rahhh...  Heh-heh-heh.

name: Triumphus
line: I need your forgiveness...

name: Jake
line: ♪ Puttin' on lotion, sittin' by the ocean, rubbin' it on my body, rubbing it on my body... ♪

name: Rutuba
line: Non pugnent, Flamma!

name: Finn
line: Eludere!

name: Rutuba
line: Cum missione, my friend!

name: Finn
line: Hoc habet! Whaaa!

name: Amazonia
line: Achillea...

name: Finn
line: I have defeated every gladiator.

name: Fight King
line: No, for there is one more opponent.

name: Finn
line: Who?

name: Fight King
line: Your dear companion!

name: Jake
line: ♪ Get me out of this caa-a-ve, 'cause it's nothing but a gladiator graa-a-ve. And if I stick to the plaa-a-n, I think I'll turn into a lava maa-a-n. I think I'll turn into a lava man! ♪

name: Fight King
line: Why do you stop?

name: Finn
line: Fight King, this Jake was a farce. Let me face the real Jake!

name: Fight King
line: Then this is round two, my vassal! Take his head for me!

name: Finn
line: Yes, my king.

name: Jake
line: What about the plan?

name: Finn
line: This is the plan, Jake! Raah!

name: Jake
line: You're gonna kill me?

name: Finn
line: That's right! Everything has been building to this! The final battle! Brother against brother! TO THE DEATH!

name: Jake
line: No!

name: Fight King
line: Yes...

name: Fight King
line: Yes...

name: Finn
line: Fight King!!! I can't do it.  I can't kill him, Fight King. I can't kill my best friend.

name: Jake
line: Finn?

name: Finn
line: Not without a BIGGER SWORD!

name: Fight King
line: Yes... FINISH HIM!!!

name: Jake
line: No!

name: Fight King
line: Aaarghh...

name: Finn
line: Wink.

name: Jake
line: What?  Dude, did you...? Was that all fake? Did you act all that out? Was that part of your plan?

name: Finn
line: Mmm-hmm.

name: Jake
line: So you planned to get all cozy with the Fight King and almost kill me from the get-go?

name: Finn
line: Pretty much.

name: Jake
line: Why didn't you say so?

name: Finn
line: Because you always bungle my plans. But, if you had bungled this one...  I might have, for real, chopped your head off.

name: Jake
line: That's some funky junk, brother.

name: Finn
line: Hey, Jake, you notice how all these ghosts are walking in pairs?

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah. I bet they're like us. Best bros who got trapped in that arena.

name: Finn
line: But now they're free!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Hold on, Sweet Pig Trunks. We're coming.

name: Tree Trunks
line: There, there, Sweet P, it was just a dream.

name: Sweet P
line: Just a dream.

name: Mr. Pig
line: That's my brave little boy. Now you better get dressed; today's your first day of school!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Now eat up.

name: Sweet P
line: Yum!

name: Mr. Pig
line: That's fuel you're gonna need later to soak up allll the education!

name: Sweet P
line: Yesh, dahd!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Okay, there's your lunch and an apple for the teacher.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Golly, it's awful nice of y'all to take Sweet P to school on his first day.

name: Finn
line: Our pleas', T.T.!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, first day of school can be real tough. We wouldn't want Sweet P freaking out or awakening any latent evil spirits within himself!

name: Mr. Pig
line: Well, we're gonna miss you, son.

name: Jake
line: You think he's still secretly evil, that he's still all "Lich-y" in there?

name: Finn
line: Mm, not sure.

name: Jake
line: I don't know, Finn, he just seems so... sweet!

name: Finn
line: Mm.

name: Mr. Pig & Tree Trunks
line: Bye!

name: Sweet P
line: Bye!

name: Jake
line: So far so good.

name: Finn
line: Fat squirrel in trub! Gah!  Oh, no!

name: Jake
line: Wait, Finn. Let's just see how this plays out.

name: Jake
line: Daww!

name: Finn
line: Hmm...

name: Finn
line: Alright, welp, see you later, Sweet P!

name: Jake
line: Bye.

name: Sweet P
line: Bye, Teddy-Man.

name: Kid 1
line: Hey, Baby-Man! Did your grandma knit your clothes?

name: Sweet P
line: Yeah, and she's my mom!

name: Kid 1
line: Why are you laughing, Baby-Man? You're not even a real kid!

name: Sweet P
line: Huh?!

name: Kid 1
line: You're nothing but a big, weird baby-man!   Baby-Man!

name: King of Ooo
line: Let's see what we got here. Hello there. Intimidated by those bullies, eh?

name: Sweet P
line: Uh, yeah.

name: King of Ooo
line: What's your name, kid?

name: Sweet P
line: Sweet P!

name: King of Ooo
line: I'm the one true King of Ooo. This is my attorney, Toronto. Sweet P, there are all kinds of education, you know.

name: Sweet P
line: No?

name: King of Ooo
line: Yes, sir, all kinds! Such as... dancing. You could blow off this podunk school and get a proper dance education! Then you can come back and really show those mean kids and make your parents proud!

name: Toronto
line: Hey, King of Ooo!

name: King of Ooo
line: Yes, Toronto?

name: Toronto
line: You are a certified dance instructor, right? Show the kid the dance you do.

name: King of Ooo
line: Nooo, that dance is too tough for an amateur!

name: Toronto
line: Aw, come on. You gotta show the kid. It's awesome!

name: King of Ooo
line: Yeah, I know it's awesome, but I really don't think the kid is ready.

name: Toronto
line: Ready?

name: King of Ooo
line: I don't think he's tough enough to be ready.

name: Sweet P
line: I'm tough enough to be ready!

name: Toronto
line: See?! The kid is tough... and ready!

name: Sweet P
line: Please?!

name: King of Ooo
line: Aah, I do see it!

name: Sweet P
line: Eee!

name: King of Ooo
line: You've got a good eye, and you're a good dog!  Watch this, kid.

name: Sweet P
line: Ahh!

name: King of Ooo
line: Well, we got us a prodigy here. You're ready for advanced classes.  Hey, you mugs, wanna see some world-class dancing? Just turn around!

name: Candy Person 1
line: Ah, leave me alone!

name: Candy Person 2
line: Leave me alone, too.

name: Candy Person 3
line: I'm turning around!

name: Toronto
line: Teeth!

name: King of Ooo
line: Ha, ya did great!

name: Toronto
line: You should come back tomorrow, kid, for more dancin' lessons!

name: King of Ooo
line: Have a gold star!  Show that to your parents, kid. They'll love it! But... don't tell 'em where you got it, or you'll ruin the surprise. Just think how proud they'll be at your big, uhh, end-of-the-year recital! You understand?

name: Toronto
line: Of course Sweet P understands; he's a good boy!

name: Sweet P
line: A good boy!

name: Mr. Pig
line: So, how was school?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Yes, how'd ya do?  A gold star?!

name: Mr. Pig
line: I'm gonna put this where we can see it every day.  Thumbs up!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Thumbs up! Come on, thumbs up!

name: Sweet P
line: Thumbs up!

name: King of Ooo
line: Thumbs up!

name: Toronto
line: Thumbs up!

name: King of Ooo
line: Well, this is our place.

name: Toronto
line: We'd invite you in, but the place is a mess.

name: King of Ooo
line: He's right; we're filthy. Listen, we all need a break. Go on home, kid, and we'll see you tomorrow!

name: Sweet P
line: Mm!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Sweet P, uh, we're going on a date. You're smart and educated enough to stay at home all by yourself.

name: Mr. Pig
line: The proof is on the fridge!

name: Sweet P
line: Mama and Papa will be so surprised if the refrigerator is all covered with stars when they get back. One more star should do it. I need to find King of Ooo and Toronto to get me that last star.

name: Toronto
line: I don't know, K.O, they've gone rancid.

name: King of Ooo
line: Horse feathers! A lick of gold paint is all it needs!  Just a couple more garbage stars, eh, Toronto?

name: Toronto
line: Mo' stars means mo' dosh!

name: King of Ooo
line: Soon we'll have enough scratch to fund my big comeback! This kid is great at helping us rob people!

name: Toronto
line: And best of all, he doesn't know a thing! Because if he did...

name: King of Ooo & Toronto
line: We'd have to take care of him!

name: Toronto
line: What was that?!

name: King of Ooo
line: Sweet P? What did you hear?

name: Toronto
line: What does it matter?! None of it was good!

name: King of Ooo
line: We gotta take care of him.

name: Sweet P
line: Aaa!

name: King of Ooo
line: I shouldn't have said that out loud.

name: Sweet P
line: Mom, Dad!

name: King of Ooo
line: Hey, kid! Toronto and I talked it over, and we decided that we're not going to  "Take care of you."

name: Toronto
line: We're going to burn down your orchard!

name: Sweet P
line: Nooo!

name: King of Ooo
line: Yup, we're gonna burn it down—unless...

name: Sweet P
line: Unless?

name: King of Ooo
line: You leave home and your loving parents and come dance with us forever.

name: Toronto
line: Forever!

name: Sweet P
line: No! No, no, no, no, no!

name: King of Ooo
line: Come on, Sweet P. The people love you!

name: Sweet P
line: They do?

name: King of Ooo
line: Well, mostly they love to laugh at you. I mean, look at yourself. You're a— a— a big, weird baby-man!

name: Toronto
line: Baby-Man, Baby-Man

name: Sweet P
line: Stop.

name: Lich/Sweet P
line: I have learned much from you. Thank you, my teachers. And now for your... education.

name: Lich
line: Before there was time, before there was anything, there was nothing, and before there was nothing... there were monsters.  Here's your gold star!

name: Sweet P
line: Mr. King of Ooo?

name: King of Ooo & Toronto
line: Monster! Monster! Waaaaah!!

name: Sweet P
line: Just a dream!

name: Tree Trunks & Mr. Pig
line: Morning, son - Sweet P!

name: Sweet P
line: Surprise!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, my, my, where did you get all this bling?

name: Sweet P
line: Uhh, my teachers!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Wow, how nice of those teachers!

name: Sweet P
line: Mm-hmm!

name: Kid 1
line: Hey, Baby-Man, guess who we are!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay. I'm going to lower the screen. Tell me what you see.

name: Finn
line: Crunchy, you look like a rainbow! It's beautiful! Can you guys see that?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Nope. Only you can see it because you're hooked up to the aura visualizer. But actually I'm lying. We can see everything you see on this screen. Now I'm gonna send that image into Crunchy.

name: Crunchy
line: Whoa!

name: Finn
line: The aura's gone!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Except...  Crunchy's true essence manifested in the material plane!

name: Finn
line: I wanna see Peppermint Butler's aura!

name: Peppermint Butler
line: You don't wanna see that!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, we do! Right, Princess?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Sure, Finn! Just let me re-calibrate the device!

name: Jake
line: No! Bunk that, I'm tired! C'mon, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah. Yeah, me and Jake, we gotta peace out.

name: Finn & Jake
line: G'night!

name: Finn
line: Hey- what's goin' on in here? Yo, guys!

name: Banana Guards
line: Hey, Finn!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, what's that? Security cams?

name: Banana Guard 1
line: Yeah, man! You gotta see some crazy stuff—

name: Banana Guard 2
line: Yo, shut up!

name: Banana Guard 1
line: Oh, shoot...

name: Finn & Jake
line: What?

name: Banana Guard 2
line: Nothin'!

name: Finn & Jake
line: What is it?

name: Banana Guards
line: Nothing!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Show us now!

name: Banana Guards
line: Show you what?

name: Finn & Jake
line: What you said!

name: Banana Guards
line: We didn't say nothin'!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Too late for take-backs! We practically know everything already! Now show us!

name: Banana Guard 1
line: Okay, but you can't tell anyone.

name: Banana Guard 2
line: Yeah, this is our weird secret.

name: Jake
line: Of course, dude!

name: Banana Guard 1
line: All right. Now look at monitor three. Can you see it?

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah! That's, uh... Who is that?

name: Jake
line: That's Chocoberry. Why are you guys spyin' on Chocoberry?

name: Banana Guard 2
line: No, man! Look there, in the corner!

name: Finn
line: Who's that?

name: Banana Guard 1
line: Zoom in, dude!

name: Banana Guard 2
line: Plus, plus, plus, plus, plus, plus, plus, plus...

name: Finn
line: WAAAAAAAAAAAAUH! Lemongrab! What the—?

name: Banana Guard 1
line: This is our weird secret, okay? Remember that!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: How long has this been going on?

name: Banana Guard 1
line: He's shown up every night for the past two weeks!

name: Banana Guard 2
line: He goes to different rooms and just stands there!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: And you didn't tell me?!

name: Banana Guard 1
line: If we told you, then we knew you'd mess up our weird TV show!

name: Banana Guard 2
line: Banana guarding is boring!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'm gonna talk to him.

name: Banana Guard 1
line: Oh, no! Ya see?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Sorry, guys!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Lemongrab!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: NNYUGH!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Why are you stalking my peeps?!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: I AM WITHIN MY RIGHTS!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, but what are you doing?! It's creepin' me out!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: ...Uh... I AM THE EARL...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: ...Yeah?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: The earl... OF NOTHING!!! Ugh, nugh...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wait! What do you mean "nothing"?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: CASTLE LEMONGRAB HAS NO CITIZENS!  YEOOOU HAVE EXCESS CANDIES! YOU MUST DONATE! DOOONAAATE!!!

name: Starchie
line: In your dreams, you freak!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: But you don't get along with others! I don't understand you, Lemongrab!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: No one... no one understands! I am alone! And you made me like this.  YOU MADE ME! YOOOU MAAADE ME!!!  YOU'RE... MY... GLOB! YOU'RE MY GLOB!

name: Finn
line: What are we gonna do?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Something totally bum-slops.

name: Candy People
line: No, no, we won't go! No, no, we won't go! No, no...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Please, please! All I need is three healthy volunteers to move in with Lemongrab! He's all by himself with no one to govern!

name: Candy People
line: No, no, we won't go! No, no we won't go!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Come on, Mr. Cupcake! Just for a little while?

name: Mr. Cupcake
line: UUGH!  I can't, Princess! My arm is broken!

name: Finn
line: Dude! You didn't have to do that...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Alright! What's it gonna take, people?!

name: Jamaica
line: Two things, Princess! Yeah, that's right! Back up, fools!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You got nerve showing your faces here, notorious Pup Gang!

name: Finn
line: Buncha bad apples!

name: Blombo
line: Back up, Finn! I'll take you out!

name: Toughy
line: We came out of hidin', 'cuz all y'alls is scareds of Lemon Man! But we ain't afraid! So we gots demands!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: ...And what is that?

name: Jamaica
line: One—total amnesty for past crimes committed by the Pup Gang!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Mmmm... Granted.

name: Jake
line: Yo wait! They threw a basketball at my head one time! Are you gonna let that slide?!

name: Jamaica
line: We only did that 'cuz you're old!

name: Jake
line: You sacks! I'll rip your cups!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Jake, please! What is your second demand?

name: Toughy
line: We want the big cash money wad! Enough to provide for our delinquent mothers, so that hopefully they'll show us the love we always dreamed about in our sad, young lives!

name: Jake
line: Hmm.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I grant you the big cash money wad! Now off with you, to Castle Lemongrab!

name: Toughy
line: Yo, Lemongrease! We're gonna live here at Lemongrab now!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Yes.

name: Jamaica
line: I'm Jamaica, and this is Toughy, and Blombo!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Blombo, what is that?

name: Jamaica
line: What?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: On Blombo's ears...

name: Jamaica
line: That's his headphones!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: BLOMBO! Take them off! Blombo, you must heed my INSTRUCTIONS! TAKE OFF YOUR THIIINGS!!!

name: Toughy
line: Whoa! Settle down, Lemongrease!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: I-I-I AM NOT GREASE! THIS IS UNACCEPTABUUUUUUUUUUUUU—

name: Blombo
line: What? What's goin' on?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: All unfit citizens of Lemongrab must be RECONDITIONED!

name: Blombo
line: Man! Are you crazy?!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: YYYEEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAOOOOUUUHHH  MMMEEEEEEEEEE  EEEEAAEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!! I HAVE TO USE MY SOUND SWORD NOW!!!  IT'S A SOOOUND SWOOORD!!!

name: Jamaica
line: You guys... What? Where are we?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: YEEEEEOU are in my reconditioning chamber!  You will receive four to three units of juice now!  Oooouuah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Crunchy, wake up, Crunchy.

name: Crunchy
line: Aaagh... Glob? Is that you?

name: Finn
line: No sign of Lemongrab for three days! I think it worked!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Maybe... Let's keep looking.  Awww, geez!  Hey!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Nhuh?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What happened to your new citizens?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: They didn't understand my lemon stylez. I like this way better.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hmmm... I wonder if you don't understand their candy stylez! C'mon, lemme show you something!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You see, Earl, candy people are mad special.  They need constant stroking, and snuggling...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ah!  Here. You try.

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: MMMMN?!  Uh... Goo goo? Uh... Goo?  PUT YOU IN MY OVEN! IT'S GROOOSS!!!  And who says YOUR way's right, anyway? I look in the lemon heart you gave me and see MYYY lemon way to act! And that MUST be right!

name: Lemon Camel
line: MOOO!!!

name: Finn
line: Man, that guy's a real D-list!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, dear! His Candy Citizens!

name: Finn
line: Let's crush this mess all accordingly!

name: Jake
line: Crazy lightbulb hardcore style!

name: Finn
line: Yeah!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No. He's my responsibility. I have to try to help him!

name: Finn
line: Okay, that's cool, too.

name: Jake
line: Hop on!

name: Princess Bubblegum, Jake, and Finn
line: Lemongrab? Lemongrab!

name: Jake
line: No Lemongrab.

name: Finn
line: C'mon! Let's find the Pup Gang quick!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wait. I have a plan. You guys go on ahead.

name: Finn
line: Okay, cool!

name: Finn
line: What do you got, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Just an empty room with a catcher's mitt!

name: Finn
line: ...Weird.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Oh, no!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: This is serious! Pup Gang got four units... Maaaybe... Maybe ten units for trespassers?  YOU GOT TRICKS, HUH?! YOU GOTTA FALL DOWN SOMETIME! AND WHEN YOU DO, TWELVE UNITS!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Lemongrab, stop! Please! Earl, I can help you!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: NO! NO! NO MORE HELPING!  YOOOU'RE THE ONE WHO MADE ME THIS WAY! HOW CAN YOOOU HELP?! YOU WANNA UNLOAD YOUR PUNKEST BOYS ON ME?! AND TRYYY TO CHANGE MY WAYS?! YEH POISON! YEH POISON!!!  YOU NEED RECONDITIONING!  RECONDITIIIIIION!!! YEEEEOOOOOOOUUUU!!!

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Whoa, whoa, what the hey?!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Wait, Lemongrab, look!

name: Lemongrab clone
line: Hello? Am I in the right room?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: NEEEEH! WHAT?! WHO'S THIS RIGAMAROLE?!

name: Lemongrab clone
line: I'm Lemongrab!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: O-oh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I made him for you, in your pantry. For you to be with!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: T-two Lemongrabs? Hmmm!  Hmmm... Yeah, okay!

name: Lemongrab clone
line: Yeah!  All in favor of pardoning the prisoners?

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Aye!

name: Lemongrab clone
line: PARDONS FOR ALL!

name: Finn, Jake, and Princess Bubblegum
line: Good bye, Lemongrabs!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Take care, boys!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Yes! Yes, indeed! A-ha-ha! A lemon gives by taking...

name: Lemongrab clone
line: ...and cares by YELLING!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Hmm!

name: Lemongrab clone
line: Hmm!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: Well, okay! STOP BY ANY TIIIME!!!

name: Lemongrab clone
line: BUT CALL FIRST!!!

name: Earl of Lemongrab
line: YES, GOOD-BYYYE!!!

name: Finn
line: Jake. Jake!  Hey man, shouldn't we conserve our energy? The Ice Cream Marathon starts tomorrow.

name: Jake
line: I know what the Ice Cream Marathon is.  I've been training for weeks. And I am determined to eat more ice cream at the Ice Cream Marathon than anyone else!

name: Finn
line: You sure like ice cream.

name: Jake
line: Ice cream is good!

name: Jake
line: What the croak was that?

name: Finn
line: It came from over there .

name: Finn
line: Whoa, Jake! Check it out!

name: Finn
line: It's a brave little Gnome Knight.

name: Jake
line: What? That's a frog dressed up like a Gnome Knight.

name: Frog
line: Actually, I'm a Gnome Knight who was magically transformed into a frog. And then I decided to continue being a knight.

name: Jake
line: And now you're, like, attracting a mate?

name: Frog
line: No! I'm on the verge of death!

name: Jake
line: Oh. Well, you should just let go, man.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, you've had a good run.

name: Frog
line: No! I cannot die until I find a being whose spirit is brave and pure to take over my quest.

name: Finn
line: Quest?

name: Jake
line: Uh-oh.  Somebody's gonna do a quest for a frog.

name: Finn
line: Tell me more about this... quest.

name: Frog
line: I have to guard  these magic beans.

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Frog
line: Two of the beans are good, but one is horribly evil! I have no idea which is which. So I've spent my life guarding them, preventing them from ever being planted.

name: Jake
line: Beans?! Ah ha ha! Magic beans... hee! We'll be right back. Come on, Finn. I think I dropped my spoon in the bush.

name: Finn
line: We will take your quest.

name: Frog
line: You will?

name: Finn
line: Sure!  Consider it guarded.

name: Frog
line: Also, take this .

name: Finn
line: Oh. Okay. Thanks.

name: Frog
line: No, thank you.

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Dude, what's goin' on?

name: Finn
line: We took over the quest!

name: Jake
line: What?! The beans?  Now wait a second!

name: Gnome Knight
line: Nope, too late.

name: Finn
line: Ah, I miss him already.

name: Jake
line: Well, we should get a move on if we wanna make the Ice Cream Marathon.

name: Finn
line: What about the quest?

name: Jake
line: Really? We have to do the bean quest?

name: Finn
line: I gave him my word.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, I wasn't here for that, so... can't we guard the beans and eat ice cream?

name: Finn
line: No, man! We're on the job. And like you always say, "Work and fun don't mix..."

name: Jake
line: "...unless you're a clown." I do say that a lot.

name: Jake
line: Gee, sittin' in this hot sun, guarding beans. It sure beats 26 miles of vanilla ice cream. Or caramel ice cream. Or peach ice cream. Hey, what if we plant the beans ourselves?

name: Finn
line: That's a terrible idea.

name: Jake
line: No, wait, hear me out. See,  if one of these beans is evil, then it's our duty to crush it, once and for all! Plus, two of the beans are good. If we plant them, we'll be bringin' twice as much good into the world!

name: Finn
line: And we can make it to the Ice Cream Marathon!

name: Jake
line: I hadn't even thought about that!

name: Jake
line: I'm gonna take a cat nap.

name: Finn
line: What? But we have to be ready for evil!

name: Jake
line: If we take shifts, there's less chance of us falling asleep at the same time.

name: Finn
line: Alright Finn, Jake's a lazy bum and this soil is ripe with evil. I cannot go to sleep until that evil bean sprouts and is destroyed.

name: Finn
line: AAAH!  Wake up, Jake! This is it!

name: Jake
line: Huh?  Oh!

name: Finn
line: Aah! Bean pod!  I can't tell if it's evil yet.

name: Finn
line: Huh? Baby Pigs dressed in silly costumes?

name: Jake
line: Aw, look how cute they look all sleepy and snore-y.

name: Finn
line: Careful, Jake. It could be a trap. We should test them to see if they're... evil.

name: Finn
line: Okay. Each one of you take one test and one pencil. You have one hour to complete the test and prove we shouldn't kill you.  And begin.

name: Jake
line: Aw, they're so cute they can hardly hold their pencils.

name: Finn
line: That doesn't fare well for their...  grade point average.

name: Jake
line: Nothing evil could be this adorable.

name: Finn
line: Hmm, you might be right.  The only thing on here is a cute drawing of an ice cream cone under "Do you have allergies?" Yeah,  nothing evil. Okay, the pigs are good.

name: Jake
line: YES!  You hear that, guys? You passed! A-plus! A-plus-plus!

name: Finn
line: Oh, no!  Jake, get ready. The second pod is about to drop. PROTECT THE PIGLETS!

name: Jake
line: Stay back, babies!

name: Finn
line: Show me what you have to offer, pod!

name: Finn
line: Magical wands?

name: Jake
line: What? COOL!

name: Finn
line: Stop, Jake!

name: Jake
line: WOW!

name: Finn
line: Is it evil?

name: Jake
line: It's a wand that poops glitter! What's good-er than that?!  Whee-hee-hee-hee-hee!

name: Finn
line: Hmm...  Hahahaha! Glitter on its own could be evil. But with rainbows? Over my dead body!

name: Jake
line: Hey, let's have some fun with these pigs before the evil pod shows up!

name: Finn
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Phew!

name: Jake
line: I'm exhausted!

name: Finn
line: They look so sleepy and peaceful. We have to stay alert. The evil pod could appear at any time. When it does, we must be ready to destroy it immediately.

name: Jake
line: And then go to the Ice Cream Marathon, right?

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man.

name: Jake
line: Okay. I'll take the first shift.

name: Finn
line: Rhombus.

name: Finn
line: AH! Look! The third pod!

name: Jake
line: It's bigger than the other two, dude!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, man. We've gotta kill it now.

name: Jake
line: Huh?  It's squirting!

name: Finn
line: Squirting?!

name: Jake
line: See? Squirting. Right here.  Tastes good.

name: Finn
line: Dang, man! Don't just lick stuff! It's evil!

name: Jake
line: No, it's not. It's... ice cream!

name: Finn
line: Is the evil sucking you in?  JAKE!

name: Jake
line: That was awesome.

name: Finn
line: Are you poisoned?! Are you dying?

name: Jake
line: No, man! It was awesome!

name: Finn
line: Look, Jake! It's filling back up!

name: Jake
line: Aw, yeah!  This pod makes ice cream out of nothing! It's the "goodest" thing that's ever happened to me!

name: Finn
line: Well, if this pod's not evil....  The piglets are gone!

name: Jake
line: And so are the fairy wands.

name: Finn
line: Let's go! The screaming sounds are getting stronger near Mushroom Town!

name: Finn
line: Piglets! Stop this!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Oof!

name: Finn
line: Cram! Now I must find these wicked piglets' weakness and use it to "retribuse" them.

name: Jake
line: Well, I found my weakness .

name: Finn
line: That's it! Ice cream!

name: Jake
line: What about ice cream?

name: Finn
line: Yes... yes! HA! The exams confirm my memory of the piglets being allergic to ice cream.

name: Jake
line: Just the thought of that scares me, man.

name: Finn
line: I see one of them! Get ready to release! RELEASE!

name: Jake
line: Ah, gross! That's--EW!

name: Finn
line: Ah, gross man!

name: Finn
line: JAKE! Jake!  Jake, are you okay?

name: Jake
line: Ahh, I can't stop dancing!

name: Finn
line: Wha--?

name: Jake
line: It must be the glitter! Oh, I really can't stop groovin'! It feels weird! Go on without me!

name: Finn
line: YAAAAAAAAAH!

name: Finn
line: "Freezed" to meet you!

name: Finn
line: Hope you saved room for dessert!

name: Finn
line: Killing you with ice cream!

name: Jake
line: Whoo! Yeah, man!

name: Finn
line: Whoa!  Jake! There's one left... and I think he's trying to surrender.

name: Jake
line: Kill it!

name: Finn
line: But he's dressed as a little construction worker! It's freakin' adorable.

name: Jake
line: He's tryin' to trick you! Kill it!

name: Finn
line: I just don't know if I can bring myself to do it, Jake.

name: Mushroom Mayor
line: Why, thank you, Finn and Jake, for sort of saving our village.

name: Finn
line: You're sort of welcome.

name: Mushroom Mayor
line: Now if you'll excuse us, we need to start removing all of this ice cream from our homes and businesses.

name: Jake
line: Not so fast! I'll take it from here, folks.

name: Finn
line: He likes ice cream.

name: Finn
line: Haha, nice job, tubby. But save room for the Ice Cream Marathon.

name: Jake
line: I've always got room for ice cream, Finn. You know that, man! Ugh, I'm going to the Ice Cream Marathon.

name: Finn
line: He just really likes ice cream.

name: Mushroom Mayor
line: Oh.

name: Jake
line: Ha-ha-ha. Okay, now make him look angrier!

name: Finn
line: Alright, give me a second.

name: Jake
line: Nope, not funny anymore. Sorry, dude—you ruined it.

name: Finn
line: Man, I don't have patience for this animation junk. Whoever does this must have no life whatsoev—

name: Finn
line: Oof... Why did I do that?

name: Jake
line: Yo Finn, did you order a brick?

name: Finn
line: Hm, I don't think so.

name: Jake
line: False alarm; it's just an email.

name: Finn
line: Who's it from?

name: Jake
line: Looks like Ice King's handwriting.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Eeeww!

name: Finn
line: Escape, Jake! Escape!

name: Jake
line: Alright, alright, hold on.  Oh man! Thing must've had a computer worm in it!

name: Finn
line: Whaa? Aaaah!

name: Ice King
line: Hey, Princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: What now, Ice King?

name: Ice King
line: Remember that time last summer when you said you'd only go out on a date with me if I was the last guy on Ooo?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I doubt I said that.

name: Finn and Jake
line: P-bubs! P-bubs, P-bubs!

name: Finn
line: The computer went...

name: Jake
line: Open video and...

name: Finn
line: The email...

name: Jake
line: Potato trampoline...

name: Finn
line: Brick window with the plastic...

name: Jake
line: Then crashment!

name: Finn
line: Banana hummingbird...

name: Jake
line: 47 grapes!

name: Ice King
line: Anyone having any...  computer problems?

name: Finn
line: How do we stop the computer worm, you pile of goo?!

name: Ice King
line: E-ha-ha-ha-ha! My worm exists beyond your comprehension within the universal source code...

name: Finn
line: STOP TALKING LIKE A NERD AND GIVE IT TO US STRAIGHT!!!

name: Ice King
line: Once the glitch does its work, the whole world will be deleted! Except for me and my "Bubblygums."  Ow!! Well, see y'all! I'm gonna prepare for my... date. Ahaha!

name: Donut Guy
line: AAAAAHH! MY BEAUTIFUL FACE!! MY HOPES AND DREAMS—RUINED!!!

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, Princess, we'll take care of this thing.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, me too.  I'm gonna take care of it, too.

name: Finn
line: Okay!

name: Finn
line: Don't worry, guy! I got you!  YEOW! JAKE, HELP ME!!!

name: Jake
line: Okay, shh, you're safe!

name: Finn
line: Come here, guy!

name: Sugar Cube
line: No... Stay away from me!

name: Finn
line: I'm trying to help you, yo!

name: Sugar Cube
line: I saw what happened when you picked up Todd.

name: Finn
line: But... No!! Jake, this isn't working! We need a plan.

name: Jake
line: Aw, man. Okay, here is my dream plan. You were wearin' tights made of green feathers. These tiny green feathers. And I was this wisecracking coelacanth that only ate popcorn. Anyway, we were in this—

name: Finn
line: THAT PLAN'S NOT GOOD!

name: Jake
line: Hold on, I'm almost done. So we were trapped inside this huge egg, and after a while you started dancing in this kind of sign language. And then Ice King's glitchy stuff started eatin' my dream up. I peed in my pants, but you went up and talked to it. You just... talked to it.

name: Finn
line: Then talk to it I will.  Hey man, tell me the haps.

name: Jake
line: Yeah, tell us your feelings! Get deep.

name: Jake
line: "Sllabfoog uoy pleh tnac I..."

name: Donut Guy
line: OH, SWEET LORD, MY FACE! MY PERFECT...!!

name: Jake
line: Slaw frog yokel snacky. Snacky slaw frog yokel. Sea salt yack let a snacky. Yeah, that sounds good!

name: Donut Guy
line: AAAAAAAAAAH...!!!

name: Finn
line: Jake, I think I found a way in!

name: Jake
line: No, wait, dude. I think I cracked the code!

name: Finn
line: There's no time!

name: Jake
line: AAAAAAH!!!

name: Finn
line: AAAAH... AAH!!!

name: Jake
line: This must be the universal source code!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Ice King and Bubblegum?

name: Finn
line: Jake! Don't touch anything!

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Finn
line: I think the shiny things are the building blocks of the universe, man! They store every single thing that is a thing back on thing!

name: Jake
line: Okay, enough exploring already. Where is this glitch guy? I'm gonna smash his jimmies.

name: Finn
line: Jake, what is it?

name: Ice King
line: Oh, Princess Bubblegum? Guess who? Can you guess? Can you? I'll give you 3 chances.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: No.

name: Ice King
line: OK, four chances.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Ice King, give me the anti-virus, or I'll shoot you with my candy horse tranquilizer!

name: Ice King
line: But sugar, look what I brought you! A box of chocos!  Hm... Still good.  Argh. Look, I can't prove it, but...  ...you made a promise we'd have at least one date if...  ...if I was the last person on Ooo...  You promised...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, well, even if I did promised, you're not the last person on Ooo, because I'm still here.

name: Ice King
line: Well, uh... Ooh, I-I have a hand too, y'know? I can lend you one...  Check out my cool hand!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, that's disgusting.

name: Ice King
line: Grrrr!!!

name: Finn
line: Come on, Jake, pull it together, man.

name: Finn
line: Jake?

name: Jake
line: Oh, no, my arm!  We had so many great times together...

name: Jake
line: Dooby, dooby, dooby, dooby, skeebily, skeebily, dapdy doo...

name: Jake
line: Huh? Who's that?  Awww.

name: Jake
line: Let's do this... for Righty!

name: Finn
line: That's the spirit!  ADVENTURE TI--!!!  Oh, my gams!! Hold up, dude, my body's changing!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, come on, woman, I'm trying to be nice! Can't you at least make the best out of this?  Are you praying to me? I'm into this.  ...I'm still into this.  Still into it.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: GIVE ME THE ANTI-VIRUS!

name: Ice King
line: I can't, monkey peeps, I didn't make one! The glitch will delete everything until we're all that's last!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You mean, forever?!

name: Ice King
line: Well, yeah! I mean, you say that like it's a bad thing.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Come on, Finn and Jake....

name: Jake
line: So, hey, Finn, how do you plan on taking this guy out?

name: Jake
line: Okay, I guess it's worth trying.

name: Jake
line: Aah! What we do now?

name: Finn
line: We gotta get those things... outta his stomach.

name: Jake
line: Hey, Finn! Remember that gross video Ice King sent?

name: Finn
line: Ugh, yeah.  Yeah!!

name: Jake
line: Let's double team these locks!

name: Finn and Jake
line: We did it!

name: Jake
line: You should wash your hair!

name: Finn
line: You should wash your mouth!

name: Ice King
line: Huh? No way! Impossible!  Uh...

name: Jake
line: Everything back to normal, huh?

name: Finn
line: Seems like it.

name: Donut Guy
line: Aah! My face!! My beautiful face is back to normal!!! Aaah!!!!

name: Finn
line: Hey, have you seen the princess anywhere?

name: Donut Guy
line: Yes, she's in the Ice King's castle. AUGGH!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Useless--  Ugh! --computer!  You sassa-frassin-- Nu!! --hammer-slammin-- Ruh! --wamma-jammin...  Ugh!  Ugh!  Ah-ya-ya-ya-ya!  Finn and Jake!  My heroes!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, no big deal. Geez...

name: Princess Bubblegum's hand
line: I missed you!

name: Jake's elbow
line: I missed you, too!  Whoa, you taste different, baby! You been playin' basketball in someone else's hockey rink?

name: Finn
line: Ahem... Hey, Bubs, where's the Ice King? I wanna kick his boingloings!

name: Jake
line: Yeah. Where is he? I wanna kick his boingloings, too!

name: Ice King
line: Uh... guys? Hello? Princess. Uh... Let's forget all about this...  Ugh get off of me, you creep! Ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow!

name: Finn
line: I'm here just in time!

name: Finn
line: ♪Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa......♪

name: Jake
line: Whoa!

name: Jake
line: Don't let the dragon, drag on, man.

name: Finn
line: Mhm.

name: Finn
line: Thanks!

name: Randy
line: Sign my rock.

name: Finn
line: Okay.

name: Candy Person #1
line: FINN!  HAVE DINNER WITH ME! PLEASE! PLEASE! PLEASE! PLEASE! FINN!

name: Finn
line: Sure, man. Yeah. Sure, sometime.

name: Candy Person #1
line: How about... EVERY NIGHT! THIS WEEK!

name: Finn
line: Well, maybe one night.

name: Candy Person #1
line: C'mon, man! Every night!

name: Randy
line: No, man! You get out of here!

name: Candy Person #1
line: BOOM!

name: Finn
line: Hey, y'all! Don't fight!

name: Jake
line: We should get out of here, Finn. I think someone called the heat.

name: Candy Person #1
line: HAVE DINNER WITH ME! HAVE DINNER! I WANT DINNER! FINN!

name: Finn
line: Sucks!

name: BMO
line: Finn, can't go outside today?

name: Finn
line: I guess I could. I just don't wanna deal with those guys right now.

name: BMO
line: Ooooohhhhhh.... Deal with me!  Let's play,  Cops and Robbers!  Give me your bank account! Bang! Bang!  Reach for the roof and give me all your gold bricks.

name: Finn
line: Ah, okay, okay, don't hurt me!

name: BMO
line: Don't worry, Finn.  It's only me, BMO! I'm wearing  a disguise!

name: Finn
line: Hmm....

name: BMO
line: Your beauty's destroyed!

name: Finn
line: Hot job! BMO, how do I look?

name: BMO
line: Like the devil!

name: Jake
line: Whoa! Intruder! Finn! There's an intruder in here!

name: Finn
line: No!  It's me! It's Finn!  This is my alter-ego.... Davey Johnson!

name: Jake
line: Ohhhhhh.

name: Finn
line: I'll dress up like this so no one bothers me about being Finn.

name: Jake
line: Do you think that'll goin' to do the trick?

name: Finn
line: I dunno!

name: Candy Person #1
line: Is that Finn?

name: Finn
line: Hello! Ahem, hello, hello, helloo...... ahhhhhHHH   Hello! I'm Davey!

name: Randy
line: Oh, I thought it was Finn on account of he's wearing Finn's exact clothes.

name: Davey
line: Hi! I'm Davey!

name: Candy Person #15
line: Ah, so what?

name: Davey
line: You wanna have dinner with me?

name: Lollipop Girl
line: Go away, weirdo.

name: Davey
line: Haha!

name: Coco Bird Vender
line: Hey! You've gotta pay for those, man. I'm trying to run a business here!

name: Davey
line: I gotta find a job!  I need a job!

name: Broom Store Owner
line: Can you sweep a broom?

name: Davey
line: You betcha!

name: Davey
line: Jeez louise! Quittin' time already?

name: Broom Store Owner
line: Sure is, Davey.

name: Davey
line: Take 'er easy, boss.

name: Broom Store Owner
line: Goodnight, Davey.

name: Finn
line: Man, today was awesome. Just normal, y'know? Just like a normal day. No drama, or any of that. Just super normal. Man it was great.

name: Jake
line: That's cool. Goodnight, Finn.

name: Finn
line: I'm Davey.

name: Jake
line: Haha! Yeah.

name: Davey
line: I'm Davey!

name: Jake
line: Hey, Finn, you wanna have dinner instead of breakfast today? Finn?  That must be him.

name: Candy Person #1
line: I MADE YOU DINNER, FINN! WHERE WERE YOU?!

name: Jake
line: Uhh.... What's going on?

name: Davey
line: Oh, heya, mister, thanks for putting me up last night. I'm just chopping some wood so's I can build a little log cabin to live in.

name: Randy
line: Hey, I'm Randy.

name: Davey
line: Randy, wanna get dinner tonight?

name: Randy
line: Nah, I'm busy. I like to wonder at night.

name: Jake
line: Finn what's going on?

name: Davey
line: You gotta start calling me Davey, mister. Because that's my name!

name: Davey
line: Daaaaaaaaaavvvveeeeeeyyyyyy!!!

name: Jake
line: Oh, no! Have you lost your teacups, man?

name: Davey
line: Mister, I don't know nothing about that. I'm just a working joe... trying to stake my claim... under the sun... and look out on the beautiful green fields called... life!

name: Jake
line: Uhhhhhhhh........

name: Randy
line: Hey, Davey, where do you want these logs?

name: Davey
line: Oh, just attach 'em to the cabin. Like how it should be. So it looks like a cabin. We're gonna build a right wall and front wall. Ummmmm-

name: Randy
line: How about the roof?

name: Davey
line: Maybe, maybe.

name: Randy
line: I've been holding these.

name: Davey
line: They look good.

name: Randy
line: How do you put good looking wood on a cabin?

name: Jake
line: Gotta figure a way to get Finn to act normal.

name: BMO
line: Pew! Pew! Pew! Pew! Pewwww.....

name: Jake
line: Ah! Give me the wallet! Or feel my claw! The wallet!

name: BMO
line: Watch out! A robber!

name: Jake
line: I'll cut you! I mean, rob you!

name: Davey
line: Oh, no!

name: Jake
line: I'm a robber and I'm gonna rob this guy's life! And there's nobody who can stop me. Unless there's a hero around here.  Like there's someone here who is actually a hero in disguise. They can probably stop me.  C'mon, Finn. Be a hero.

name: Randy
line: What? What are we talking about?

name: Jake
line: Butt out, Randy!

name: Randy

line: Alright. So, this is the Nightosphere, I guess.  It looks banay-nays.  Marceline says they got tons of crazy ways out here.  Right, Marceline?  Marceline!  Marcy!!  Hehehe.

name: Hunson
line: Okay. But I know you'll come around eventually. Or maybe you won't! I don't know. You're an independent woman!  Well, I'm gonna take a nappy.  Oh! I almost forgot!

name: Marceline
line: Dad!

name: Hunson
line: Whoops! Hahaha!  You should put this amulet on. It'll grant you wishes for, like, ponies. Or whatever kids like.

name: Hunson
line: Ha! Yes you are, sweetie.  Daddy's little monster!

name: Marceline

name: Finn
line: Okay!

name: Marceline
line: I know you just wanna give your little girl the world, but Daddy I'm not just your little girl. I've got my own life, I've got my own plans, I hope you understand and like the way that I am because I want your respect and I want to be here. But I don't wanna rule the Nightosphere.  Psssh. Whatever, Dad. [Puts the amulet on. A suit comes out of it and wraps itself around her. The phone is dropped and tentacles are seen. The phone is picked up and Marceline is seen looking like her father's monster's form in "It Came from the Nightosphere." The camera zooms out to show Finn approaching Marceline while she laughs evilly.

line: We got mad prison overcrowding down here, fellas.  So I gotta put you in the cage with the stuff. Sorry about that. But, you know, not really.  Aw, my stomach!

line: Hey! What're you guys doin'?! You can't run up to the front of the line! These good people have been waiting forever! Shame on you both! Everybody, shame them!  Boo, sir! I "boo" what you're doing! Step back!  Back!  You will not cut the line!  Again!  You stay back here! And wait your turn like the rest of us!  Under... stand?!

line: "B.R.B. - Jake". Hmm. B.R.B... B.R.B. Bring regular babies. Big red balls. No. Beautiful rump burger.

name: Finn
line: "What's your favorite food?" "Anything! As long as it's made of cheese!"  Aw, man, these comics are like if someone put my soul on a page.  Hmm? "You write the caption." Okay! Hmm.  "Ouch! Hey, this isn't helping."  Yeah.  Ja - I mean, BMO!

line: Check this funny caption I just wrote.

name: Finn
line: What? No, it's - it's like... this guy's problem is a tiger biting his foot, and talking to this guy isn't helping! Like, "Ouch! Hey, this isn't helping!" You know, like, it's, you know, like...

name: BMO
line: Was the tiger already biting his foot? Or did the tiger bite his foot after he lay down on the couch? Because that is the bearded man's responsibility.

name: Finn

line: Bwee-woo-bwee-woo! This is a drill!  I repeat, this is a drill!

line: Hey, what do you think you're - Oh! Princess Bubblegum!  Thank you, Princess.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Der Witz Und Seine Beziehung Zum Unterbewussten. "The Joke and his Relation to the Unconscious". It's printed in Gebrochene Schrift, which I think is easier on the eyes.

name: Finn
line: "Der Witz Und... Der Witz Und... See-einy... Bezeyhung... Zumbewuzzzz..." Ugh! PB's too smart. That's why she doesn't get my joke. I mean... it's funny.  It's funny. "Ouch, hey this isn't-"  "This isn't helping."  Uh, it's super funny. Turbo-nerds like PB just aren't the right audience for this sort of thing, you know? I should show this to normal people, the common folk. The busy woman on the go. The regular Joe or Josephine. Or somebody like Ice King, who's desperate for my approval.

name: Ice King
line: Finn, this is so funny! A kitty with big teeth?! Come on!

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I didn't draw that, but cool. Well, thanks for-

name: Ice King
line: Oh, yeah. But, uh, what if - and I'm just spitballin'. What if it was something more like, "Hey, Doc! I got a caveman in my teeth!" Huh?

name: Ice King
line: Haha! Whoo!

name: Finn
line: Heh. Yeah. That's pretty good, I guess.

name: Ice King
line: Oh, is this Ble? I love Ble! That one with the two cops who are always accidentally arresting each other.

name: Finn
line: Right?! And "Animal Quackers"!

name: Ice King
line: I've been mailing them my short stories and comics for as long as I can remember. But, uh, nary a piece published. Nary a piece.  Nary a piece! I hate Ble! Sittin' in their ivory towers! They don't know comedy! They don't understand the common folk! The busy woman on the go!

name: Ice King and Finn
line: The average Joe or Josephine! Right!

name: Ice King
line: See? We got the goods, you and I, and they've lost their touch. Hey, if we want them to touch our goods, we should go down there and confront them face-to-face.

name: Finn
line: And if I get my winning caption printed, everybody will know it's funny! I'm talking about you, BMO. But, uh, where do they print Ble?

name: Ice King
line: Oh, yeah. I don't, uh... Oh! Oh! Yeah, hold this. I'll use my... demonic wishing eye!

name: Ice King

name: Wishy
line: You go, girl!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, it takes a piece of your soul each time you use it. But look! The legendary Bledquarters!

name: Finn
line: It must be so fun to work here, just sittin' around, making up jokes all day.

line: Hey! Hey.

name: Finn
line: Aww. Who are you?

name: Finn
line: Waahh!

name: Finn

line: Uh-oh! Angle up, Big Tina!

name: Pudding Troll
line: Uh-oh! Ugh!

name: Pudding Troll
line: You win. Fine. I've never let anyone inside before, so I hope you have an amazing pitch.

line: Hey! These are all my submissions! They kept them in a big pile by the door... Seems like a good sign!

name: Finn
line: Well, shoot, man. Looks like everyone here is crazy dead.

name: Pudding Troll
line: I've been guarding dead people for five hundred years. Wow, I need to sit with that.

name: Finn
line: This means that Ble Magazine is dead, too!  Now how am I supposed to prove my caption's funny.

name: Ice King
line: Ding dong! I found Ble 217! We can see what the winning caption was.

name: Finn
line: "I'm going to write you a prescription for one giant club."

name: Ice King
line: It's about time us young guns took the reins.

name: Ice King
line: Hello, boys. Now let's roll these presses one last time.

name: Finn
line: Our very own Ble Magazine.

name: Ice King
line: And it's a pretty good issue, too. We got that nice cover you did, my short story, "Fionna and Cake Baby Detectives", some, looks like, pudding jokes...
