line: Big Tina wrote those!

name: Ice King
line: ..."Fionna and Cake Baby Detectives Go to College", and, of course, your caption!

name: Finn
line: Wow. It looks amazing in print.

name: Pudding Troll
line: Guys, I'm gonna be honest, just speaking as an average Josephine, I really don't get that caption.

name: Finn
line: Maybe it doesn't matter if my caption is funny or not. I think I just wanted to be part of Ble. It's something I've been a fan of for so long. And maybe we can bring it back. There's no reason it can't have a new dawn. A Blennaissance!

name: Ice King
line: Okay, boys, close her down!

name: Finn
line: No, you're right. Can't be nostalgic!

name: Finn
line: Man, that caption was amazing in my head. Maybe I'm not a very funny person. Like, I got low comedy stats. That's kind of a bummer.

name: Finn
line: Yo, BMO. Check it out! I got Ble to publish my caption, even though I don't need you to think I'm funny anymo-

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Evil is rising. In vile power, the fiend walks among us again. The Vampire King. With all my investigations into the supernatural, I should know better, but I can't help it. I'm dying to see him in person!  I probably will die if I see him in person.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Hello?

name: Jake
line: Yo, yo, yo, yo! Bubblegum sent me for the bucket.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Dozo.

name: Jake
line: Merci and adios.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Wait! Uh... how's it going?

name: Jake
line: It's good, you know? Uh, Marceline's got all her powers back. She's getting ready to give the Vampire King a big, fat whompin', uh, I hope.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Um, while that's going down, do you think you could ask the V.K. to sign something for me?

name: Jake
line: That would be weird. You're weird.

name: Marceline
line: I dreamed about you while I was in my poison coma. I was old and withered, and you were still nice and pink.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: You think I'm nice? Oh, brains! I lost count.

name: Marceline
line: That's okay. I'm done with bat jacks.  I have this weird feeling in my tums.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: 'Cause you're scared of The Vampire King?

name: Marceline
line: No, it's not fear. I know what that feels like. So, maybe it's...love?  Oh! What is it?!

name: Jake
line: It's the herald of a new snack dawn!

name: Marceline
line: Oh, yeah.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I arranged a snacky-snack for the team.

name: Jake
line: I love you, Bonnibel.

name: Marceline
line: Yeah, me too, Bonnibel.  Ohh!  Holy macaroni! Can we do this all the time?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Later, we can, all the time. But, for now-now, we got to get our plan together.

name: Marceline
line: Easy. First, we take down the V.K, kill him, destroy him, and...kill him!

name: Jake
line: I like this plan! It's got good bones!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Well, the devil's in the details. Like, how do we even find him?

name: Vampire King
line: I come to you!

name: Marceline
line: Vampire King!

name: Vampire King
line: In the flesh!

name: Marceline
line: Not for long, sucker!

name: Vampire King
line: Whoa! I just want to talk.

name: Jake
line: Oh really! Why don't you step inside for a nice chat?

name: Vampire King
line: No, thank you.

name: Vampire King
line: Just hear me out, Marceline.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Hear this!

name: Marceline
line: Ouch!

name: Vampire King
line: Will you calm down and listen to-

name: Finn
line: YAHHH!

name: Finn
line: Shoot.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Sorry.

name: Vampire King
line: Stay calm, and nobody gets hurt. I know what you must think of me, and you'd be right.  My thirst for blood is an awesome force. But in these new times, I have a chance to try a different course.

name: Vampire King
line: I think I wanna-

name: Finn
line: Roll out!  Thorn arm!  ACTIVATE!

name: Finn
line: You gonna help, or what?

name: Vampire King
line: Let me finish my thought.

name: Finn
line: Stake you!  Okay, go ahead.

name: Vampire King
line: This is the old way. Agents of darkness and light in a tug-of-war. But now, a creature can step out of that struggle. In this age, why would I want to be the Vampire King anymore?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I don't know, why would you?

name: Vampire King
line: I wouldn't. I submit.  Take the vampire essence from my blood. Free me from the shackles of my station.

name: Marceline
line: YAHHHH!  FINN! What the heck?!

name: Finn
line: It's against my code to strike a foe who's raised his bottom to the sky. The Enchiridion explicitly states so.

name: Marceline
line: Dem are your rules.

name: Finn
line: Dem a good rule dhough.

name: Marceline
line: Outta my way!

name: Finn
line: Ep, ep, ep, ep, ep! Look.  Look at these babies. These pleadin' puppies.

name: Finn
line: Whoops. Shoulda staked him.

name: Vampire King
line: How many times do you wanna do this, Marceline? Our lives have magnetized. We're in a negative loop.  But we can change our outcome this time!

name: Marceline
line: I like the outcome where you get staked!

name: Vampire King
line: And you become a vampire?

name: Vampire King
line: Marceline.  I know I was ruthless in the past. But tell me, what's the one thing you've noticed about the world, since you beat me all those hundreds of years ago?

name: Marceline
line: Everything repeats over and over again. No one learns anything, 'cause no one lives long enough to see the pattern, I guess.

name: Vampire King
line: But you've lived long enough.

name: Marceline
line: I know. Duh.

name: Vampire King
line: And you still think this is the right way? Fighting me?

name: Marceline
line: The other way's like a black hole; an unknown.

name: Vampire King
line: So let's consult a witch-

name: Marceline
line: No witches.

name: Vampire King
line: I'm not afraid of the unknown!  I have the power-  -to change destiny! Queen of vampires! You weigh the scales of fate. Spill my guts, or face the unknown. Either way, I will not bite. For turning you would subjugate me to the wheel of fortune. And I am a king, not a hamster. My path runs straight into the void, on a sick, flaming chariot!  Stake me. I will not hide.  Do it, chicken! You make me sick!

line: Be cool. Be like, 'How's it going, VK? I'm Peppermint B and I know all about you!' No, that sounds lame. 'Yo, V.K., sign my book, jerk!' No...

line: His vampire essence is now completely drained.  Well, let's see what we've got left.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, great. 'Cause I need you to go to the secret catacombs and bury this nasty bucket of sludge in the deep-deep down.  Just be uber-duber careful not to drop it. Pure vampire essence this powerful could kaboom reality off its whack.

name: Peppermint Butler
line: Don't drop the bucket.

name: Head Marauder
line: You're not too bad for a human boy!

name: Finn
line: Not too bad!? I'm better than that!  Huh?  Jake! Do you hear that?

name: Jake
line: What'd you say? Whoa!

name: Finn
line: I think someone's crying.  Stop!  This is serious! I gotta go find out where that crying is coming from!

name: Head Marauder
line: Get back here you chickeeeen!

name: Marauders
line: Ohhhhhhhh!

name: Finn
line: What did you call me?

name: Head Marauder
line: You can't just walk away from a roughhouse!

name: Finn
line: Hey! Listen up you cold-hearted marauders! Someone's out there crying for help and I'm not gonna ignore that!

name: Jake
line: Awwww here it comes! Lay it down Finn!

name: Finn
line: A long time ago when I was a baby, I went boom boom on a leaf. Boom! Boom!  And I fell backwards and sat in my own boom boom. I cried for a day. But no one came to help me.  That day I vowed to help anyone in need! No matter how small their problem.  And that's why I need to go.

name: Jake
line: He still cries when he poops. Thanks for being cool guys. Wait up, Finn!  It's comin' from up there!

name: Finn
line: Someone must be caught in that avalanche! Let's get it on!  So, who's crying?

name: Mountain Man
line: I am.

name: Finn
line: Whoa! Aww, what's wrong fella? You cryin' boulders?

name: Mountain Man
line: Yes, I am sad. Having been forced to watch roughhousing men for centuries.

name: Finn
line: Ohhhh! I see. You're feeling left out and you wanna roughhouse too! Well I can take you on tough guy! Come on Jake! Back me up!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, do it Finn! Hit 'im with a boulder! And then hit 'im with another rock!

name: Mountain Man
line: Please! No roughhousing! It…m-makes…me…soooo.. SAD!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Why?

name: Mountain Man
line: Because they're so rough on each other!

name: Finn
line: But a smooth well controlled roughhouse bolsters your guts and rejuvenate the muscle.

name: Mountain Man
line: No! It's raunchy and maddening! All those men and their disgusting fantastic bodies!

name: Jake
line: Whoa. This guy's got problems.

name: Ladybug kid
line: Look mommy!

name: Ladybug Lady
line: Honey! Don't look! That kid's got problems!

name: Finn
line: I'll help you mountain!

name: Jake
line: Whoa! What!

name: Finn
line: I'll stop those roughhousers from being rough!

name: Mountain Man
line: Really? You'd do that for me?

name: Finn
line: Yes sir! My names Finn and I'm gonna help you out!

name: Jake
line: But Finn, we're not gonna shut down the roughhouse for real are we?

name: Finn
line: No way! But there's got to be some kind of solution. I’ll figure this out Mountain Man!  Yup!

name: Head Marauder
line: Aw! Finn! Ready to get destroyed!

name: Finn
line: N-nooo! Wait, um, actually, could you guys stop being so rough.

name: Marauders
line: What!?

name: Head Marauder
line: Whoa whoa whoa!  What are you talking about Finn?

name: Finn
line: Could you guy just tone down the roughhousing a little?

name: Marauder
line: What!?

name: Head Marauder
line: Whoa! Hey, hey. Shh. It's all right fellas. Finn, I'm sure this tone down the roughing thing has something to do with your boom boom, and I can respect that, but how can we POSSIBLY, Make roughhousing, Less rough?!

name: Finn
line: I think I have a perfect idea!  This'll soften your punches for smooth knock outs. Like punching a dream!

name: Marauder
line: Ha! Ha! Pigs on my knees! Pigs on my knees!

name: Jake
line: That’s like math

name: Finn
line: Mathematical.  What do ya think? Fixed all you’re problems right!

name: Mountain Man
line: No! That was terrible! Now they’re just punching animals! It’s worse than before and it’s in no way a good solution!

name: Finn
line: I’m sorry!

name: Mountain Man
line: Well you should be! It’s not fair to those animals and it’s not fair to me! I might just start to cry again, you know?

name: Jake
line: Aw, man.

name: Finn
line: Come on Jake. I gotta give this another shot!

name: Jake
line: Finn this guy seems like a real nut job. You know what I mean? I don’t wanna get sucked into this guy’s hang-ups.

name: Finn
line: Yes I do Jake. That’s what I vowed! To help anyone in need! No matter how small their problem!  At least I have to try brother.

name: Jake
line: So be it brother.

name: Finn
line: Hey guys. I’m back.  Hey guys. Guys? Men! Men. Please stop a second. Men! Boys? Please? I have more to ask of you! Bros? My bros?  Brother?

name: Marauder
line: What? Did you just pet me? I’ll pet you! Pet pet! Heeeey! Pet pet. Hey this is great!

name: Marauder
line: Hey! Did you just pet me?!

name: Marauder
line: Yeah! I did!

name: Marauder
line: Well I’ll pet you back! Wha-whoa. What the-? This is awesome!

name: Finn
line: Alright! This could be it!

name: Head Marauder
line: Finn!  You're really mixin' things up in the best of ways today!

name: Jake
line: Maybe you can solve everyone's problems. Like a cherub with its bottom out.

name: Finn
line: Okay, cool. Hey, I'm gonna go tell the mountain.

name: Jake
line: Alright I’m gonna-  stay here this time.

name: Finn
line: So, everything's fine this time, right?

name: Mountain Man
line: Yes! Thank you Finn!

name: Finn
line: So the mountain is totally fine with everyone petting. I feel great.

name: Jake
line: Right on man! The marauders are going crazy over the petting! They're petting each other raw! Check ‘em out!

name: Finn
line: They look kinda rashy.

name: Head Marauder
line: Hey Finn! Hey man. As you can see the petting got sorta out of hand.  Stop that! We are done with that! We’re going back to roughhousing!

name: Finn
line: No wait fellas! The mountain doesn't like roughhousing.

name: Head Marauder
line: Well we don’t like not roughhousing! Ya see the problem here?

name: Finn
line: Well. Well what if we rotate the entire mountain 180 degrees around, so the mountain’s facing the other direction. That way, you guys can keep roughhousing and the mountain doesn't have to watch it!

line: Sounds fine with me!

name: Finn
line: What do ya say mountain!

line: Just promise him anything, he’s out of his gourd.

name: Head Marauder
line: Yeah! We’ll stay healthy!

line: Now I just need to set up some sort of pulley system.

line: Huh? What? Really!?

line: Want do you want baby?  Why are you crying? Margaret, this baby won’t tell me what’s wrong with it, and it’s stuck to a leaf, and it stinks.

line: Huh eh! What was that?!  Darling, are you alright? I thought I heard a—  Oh, I see what happened. She broke up with me!  Well, it's your mistake, missy! This Ice King is gonna be fine!

name: Ice King
line: Why did she leave? I put so much cool stuff in her little prison! Come on, old boy, keep it together  Hey, maybe she called me!  Please, please, please! Doo-doo... doo, doo-doo, doo-doo. No new messages?!  Raaaaa!

name: Ice King
line: This is where she use to do her business. Uh, I'm so tired of looking at this face.  Aa, hee hee, not bad! And now for some healthy exercise! Ha ha, I'm forgetting about that silly old breakup already!

line: Alright, let's fly!  Oof! You fool, you can't fly without your beard.  I'm gonna be alone forever.

line: Heh heh and I was all like "Leave him alone!" and he was like "Make me!" and I was like "Okay!" and then he was like "Aaah, my head!" Ah haha.  Dude, what are you doing?

name: Jake
line: Trying to get a signal, it's like everyone in Ooo is on their phones or something.  Aww man.

line: Have you guys...  seen the new...  nice king?

line: Yeah!  He's single...  and he's ours!  Now, get out of our way!

line: Nah, let him keep it. Hey, there's a new king and he's nice, we should offer our services!

name: Jake
line: Finn & Jake-style!

name: Princess
line: Yoo hoo! Nice King, Nice King over here!

line: Ladies, I'll have time to meet you individually later, please just, just stop squirming.

name: Princesses

name: Ice King
line: Please! I'm trying to tell my Nice Knights something!

name: Ice King
line: Come here.  The main enemy to the Nice King right now is the disorganization of his love life.

name: Ice King
line: The ugly ones are all mixed up with the other ones! I need you to catalog them... or something.

name: Jake
line: Tah ha, but we punch monsters.

line: Let's move onto something easier. Um, do you like drums?

name: Jake
line: She's dodging the question.

name: Finn
line: Are you fond of men with magical abilities?

line: I'm really nervous right now... I-I just really want to meet a nice king.

name: Jake
line: You can go back to the waiting room now, ma'am!

name: Jake
line: I think we did a good job.

name: Finn
line: I don't feel good making a princess cry, this is not how knights are suppose to act.

name: Jake
line: Finn, knights are loyal to their king.

name: Finn
line: I'm still not sure...

name: Jake
line: Aa Ba-ba-ba-ba-ba! Loyalty to the King!

name: Finn
line: Can't argue with that!

line: Hey, Nice Knights, Turtle Princess is about to walk out that door, I told her that I like her a lot, but I really don't like her all that much, could you guys break it off for me?

name: Finn
line: The Nice King is not looking for a relationship right now.

name: Jake
line: Get out of here!

line: I feel terrible, I need to talk to the Nice King about this.

line: Yes, yes, keep walking in a circle.

line: Bye, Nice King.

line: What's up, knight?

line: I don't like treating princesses this way, I don't wanna... I don't wanna do this anymore.

line: Your loyalty is in question?

line: Oh, it's not that. It's just, princesses are suppose to be treated with niceness.

line: Are you implying that I'm not the nice king!

name: Finn
line: Hey, what's wrong with you!

line: Hey, I'm here.

name: Ice King
line: Ugh, Finn, get rid of her.

line: What?! No, man!

name: Ice King
line: She's too loud and lumpy, I like smooth princesses... smoo-o-o-oth.

line: I can be smooth!  Finn, punch out my lumps.

line: What?!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I can be whatever he wants! I can change!

name: Finn
line: I can't punch a princess!

name: Ice King
line: Gaah! Finn, just punch her! Let me see what she looks like... smoo-o-o-oth.

name: Finn
line: Oooo...

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Yes! Hit me, hit me, hit me!

name: Finn
line: Uuh, I'm sorry, Lumpy Space Princess, I just can't punch you!

line: Are you serious?! Fine, I'll do it myself.

name: Finn
line: Princess no!

name: Ice King
line: Wait a minute Nice Knight, let's see what she can do.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: There, how's that? Better?

name: Ice King
line: Meh, no, I-I don't like her.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: This is all your fault, Finn!  Aaaaaah!

name: Finn
line: King, I'm sorry, I just can't do this anymore punching princesses, breaking hearts, eh- it just doesn't seem nice at all.

name: Ice King
line: Hey! You're on thin ice Nice Knight!

name: Finn
line: Huh?

name: Ice King
line: The jig is up!

name: Finn
line: What jig?

name: Ice King
line: Ah, eh, heh heh, my jig is up. Up high! It's a highland jig.  And I have a new assignment for you, one with more knight related stuff, very important.

name: Finn
line: Oh, wow, awesome! What is it?

name: Ice King
line: The Ice King stole my razor, sneak into his trap-filled ice castle and retrieve it.  And don't look through the shoebox he keeps behind the laundry bag in the closet.

name: Finn
line: Wha?!

name: Ice King
line: Those are my orders!

name: Finn
line: Yes, finally something knight-like!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Get ready, Ice King, for battle!

name: Ice King
line: And once I have my razor, I can select my elite army of wives and take over the world!

name: Finn
line: Whoa, Jake, look at all his hair.

line: Did this Ice King shave his back or something?

name: Finn
line: Ha ha!  The Nice King's razor , Jake, look, check this out- Aaaah!

name: Jake
line: Relax, dude, it's just me.

name: Finn
line: Ha ha, you look just like the Ice King.  And so do I.

name: Jake
line: Heh hee heh. These whiskers would make anyone look like the Ice King.

name: Finn
line: Ha haa, yeah, even the Nice King!

name: Finn & Jake
line: The Nice King is the Ice King!

name: Ice King
line: Ugh, what do the princesses see in this face? Hope I can keep this going. So many princesses to meet.  Whiskers!  I can't be growing whiskers now!  Daaarrr, I haven't picked who I want to marry me!

name: Finn
line: Nice King!

name: Ice King
line: Did you retrieve my stole razor?!

name: Finn
line: Yeah and also this!

line: My beard! I-I-I mean what is that?!

line: Pfft, he knows what it is!

name: Finn
line: Let's get him Jake!

line: Stop! We're not gonna let you beat up the Nice King.

line: We don't believe you!

name: Jake
line: Man, these ladies really wanna get married.

line: Jake, we can't beat up princesses!

name: Jake
line: Relax dude  just get behind my ear shield.

line: Wait, I can't fly!

line: Let me help ya!

name: Ice King

name: Finn
line: Yaaaaaaa!  Now fly, ya liar!

line: Ugh!  Oh, eh?  Ladies, ladies, heh heh, I can shave it off again, a-and when you get fat, I'll grow it back! Eh!

line: Now that's what I call, a close shave!

name: Jake
line: Awww, haa haa hoo.

line: Throw it, Cake!

name: Fionna
line: Eyahh!

line: These Jelly Kinders aren't... alive, are they?

line: Kick it! Thanks for helping me out guys.

line: Ice Queen, why are you always predatoring on dudes?

name: Ice Queen
line: Ha! You should talk! Keeping all the babes to yourself, totally ice-blocking my game!

name: Fionna
line: What?

name: Ice Queen
line: Not  this time!

name: Prince Gumball
line: Gah! Slush Beast!

name: Fionna
line: Cake! Morning-star mode!

name: Prince Gumball
line: You saved me from the Ice Queen!

name: Fionna
line: Oh, uh, yeah I guess. Is she gone?

name: Prince Gumball
line: She must have fled. Fionna, you're so strong. And you look so beautiful in the snow. What are you doing later?

name: Fionna
line: I was just going to go home, I...

name: Prince Gumball
line: Come with me. Let's go out.

name: Fionna
line: Go... out?

name: Prince Gumball
line: Yeah. Let's go somewhere.

name: Fionna
line: What?

name: Cake
line: We'd love to!

name: Prince Gumball
line: Great! Meet me in the castle gardens in an hour!

name: Cake
line: Yes, we'll be there!

name: Cake
line: Oh, it's a date!

name: Fionna
line: No, it's not. I'm sure when he said "go out," he meant "go out," not "go out!"

name: Cake
line: Shut up, he's into you!

name: Fionna
line: Come on, you heard what he said. I'm like his guy-friend.

name: Cake
line: Well, that could change tonight.

name: Fionna
line: If it's a date, why are you coming?

name: Cake
line: I'm coming to help you! Hold on, I'm bringing my dulcimer.

name: Fionna
line: Man.

name: Cake
line: It's a conversation starter.

name: Fionna
line: Fine, I'll do this if only to prove you wrong.

name: Fionna
line: Mm... Let's just bail, I changed my mind.

name: Cake
line: No! No retreat, girl.

name: Prince Gumball
line: Hello, Fionna. And I see you brought Cake.

name: Fionna
line: That's cool, right?

name: Prince Gumball
line: Only if it's cool that I brought... Lord Monochromicorn!

name: Cake
line: Hiya, gorgeous.

name: Lord Monochromicorn
line: H-E-Y.

name: Prince Gumball
line: Accept these tokens of our esteem.

name: Fionna
line: Hey you didn't have to, guy...

name: Prince Gumball
line: Nonsense. For you, Cake, a satchel of nepetalactone. Mo-Chro picked it himself.

name: Cake
line: Catnip! Sweet babies!

name: Prince Gumball
line: And for you m'lady, a bouquet of posies.

name: Fionna
line: Oh, uh, they're...

name: Prince Gumball
line: There's a surprise at the center.

name: Fionna
line: Huh! A crystal sword! I'm all about swords! How did you know?!

name: Prince Gumball
line: I pay attention to things I see you being all about.

name: Fionna
line: Thanks dude. It's just...WOW.

name: Prince Gumball
line: Come, for the wowiness has only just begun!

name: Cake
line: Psst, Fi, tell Gumball that you think he's HAWT.

name: Fionna
line: What?! No!

name: Cake
line: Guys like to hear that they're hot!

name: Fionna
line: Will you keep your voice down?!

name: Prince Gumball
line: Oh, Fionna!

name: Fionna
line: Hey, what's up?

name: Prince Gumball
line: I thought we might have a little race. A playful race to Marshmallowy Mweadows.

name: Fionna
line: Okay, but I'm gonna kick your butt.  Not that I'm thinking of butts...

name: Prince Gumball
line: Excellent.

name: Cake
line: After him, Fionna. After your man.

name: Prince Gumball
line: Good race, Fionna.

name: Cake
line: Why are y'all breathless if we're the ones running?

name: Fionna
line: Gumball!

name: Prince Gumball
line: Sorry, I saw a pearl pygmy skull in there. It reminded me of you. The way your eyes sparkle.

name: Prince Gumball
line: Fionna, there's something I want to tell you.

name: Fionna
line: Oh, my gosh, dude. That was, like, the stupidest thing ever.

name: Cake
line: See you back at the tree house.

name: Fionna
line: Jeez, I dunno, I thought about it, but I think you could wear your pants as a shirt, if you really needed to.

name: Prince Gumball
line: Okay, okay, now you ask me something.

name: Fionna
line: Oh, um, is this a date?

name: Prince Gumball
line: Fionna, come to the ball with me.

name: Fionna
line: As your chum?

name: Prince Gumball
line: No, as my girlfriend.

name: Fionna
line: It was a date! There was singing and junk!

name: Cake
line: I know! I was there for that part!

name: Fionna
line: Cake, he wants me to come to the ball as his girlfriend!

name: Cake
line: Oh, my goodness! It's almost seven! You need something to wear! Oh, hold on honey, I am gonna make this happen!

name: Fionna
line: How am I supposed to fit my weapons in this?

name: Cake
line: It's a ball! You don't need weapons!

name: Fionna
line: I'll take my retractable sword.

name: Cake
line: Okay! Lets go, go, go!

name: Prince Gumball
line: I've been looking for you.

name: Fionna
line: Well, here I am.

name: Prince Gumball
line: Ha ha! Hey, I wanna show you something.

name: Fionna
line: Okay.

name: Cake
line: Okay, girl! I'll see you later!

name: Fionna
line: What? Hey, is this your bedroom?

name: Prince Gumball
line: Fionna.

name: Fionna
line: Heh... whoa.  What?!

name: Ice Queen
line: This was so much easier than I thought it would be!

name: Fionna
line: This is really messed up, Ice Queen! WHAT IS YOUR PROBLEM WITH ME?!

name: Ice Queen
line: You're what stands between me and my Gumball!

name: Fionna
line: I can't believe I fell for this trash! You got me to show up with a dress! And a pur—  My purse! My sword!

name: Ice Queen
line: You like my ice sword?

name: Fionna
line: Get it off me!

name: Cake
line: Fionna!

name: Prince Gumball
line: Oh, my goodness.

name: Cake
line: WHAT'S GOING ON IN HE—  AAAHH! Don't you touch her!

name: Fionna
line: Shhh... It's okay, it's okay. It was the Ice Queen.

name: Ice Queen
line: Paws off my prince!

name: Ice Queen
line: My magic tiara... my powers!

name: Fionna
line: And this is for yanking my heart guts!

name: Cake
line: Ha ha! I'm a queen!

name: Fionna
line: No, you might catch her crazy.

name: Prince Gumball
line: Wow, Fionna. You're, you're just really incredible. Maybe we should meet up, for a date.

name: Fionna
line: No way, man. Not interested.  I think the reason I got all these guy-friends and no boyfriend is because I don't really want to date any of 'em. I don't need feel like I'm waiting to be noticed. I know who I am. And I'll know what I want when and if it ever comes along. But there is one guy I would do anything to date.  The Ice King!

name: Prince Gumball
line: What?!

name: Cake
line: Me, too. Ice King's the real deal!

name: Fionna
line: Ice King is the hottest hottie, and I can't wait—

name: Ice King
line: "—to marry him!" said Fionna. Then she turned to Prince Gumball and said, "I hope Ice King will sweep me off my feet and take me to the farthest corner of Ooo, where we will do nothing but kiss and eat a whole bunch until we get fat and die." The end. So, what do you think of the fanfiction I wrote about you guys?

name: Finn
line: Uh...

name: Ice King
line: Tell me you thought it was good!

name: Finn
line: Uh, it's good! It's good! It's really good, dude! It was amazing!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Shelby. Shelby, wake up.

name: Shelby
line: Where am I? Tree Trunks, what's going on?!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Uh, you've been snoozing on my dome. I just woke up in this room with these fellas Nectar, Ice Cream, and one of the Lemoncarbs.

name: Lemongrab
line: Awake.  Avast, hold tight your buns, if buns you do hold dear; for time has come to wake and run and not give way to fear!

name: Tree Trunks
line: What are those awful words?

name: Lemongrab
line: I'm reading the wall.  They are wall words.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Beyond this room are a thousand rooms, outside of them still more.

name: Shelby
line: Behind each door, on every floor, danger, danger, ever more.

name: Neptr
line: Stranger, hark! The traps galore may kill you whilst you do explore. To free yourself -

name: Ice King
line: Huh? Oh. Now where were we? To free yourself from this tomb, and nevermore re-enter, find the room amidst the rooms that lies exactly center?

name: Shelby
line: It's a map!

name: Lemongrab
line: I no longer need this map. I have infallible recall.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh! The room is trying to hug us!  Oh no!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, dag.

name: Neptr
line: Check out my mods, bro.

name: Lemongrab
line: Enough of this!

name: Ice King
line: Huh? This room doesn't have any doors.

name: Tree Trunks
line: W- We're trapped!

name: Lemongrab
line: This is wrong. The map lied to me-e. It doesn't want me to find the EXIT! Ice King, h-how do you taste?

name: Ice King
line: Uh, nice, I guess?

name: Lemongrab
line: Mild or SPICY?!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, uh -  Kinda lonely.

name: Lemongrab
line: Make yourself into food! Now!

name: Ice King
line: You're going to eat me? Yeah, right.

name: Neptr
line: Slop your mouths up. I have found an oven and baking supplies.

name: Tree Trunks
line: I can make an apple pie for all of us.

name: Lemongrab
line: Make them fast, servile.

name: Tree Trunks
line: If you want a taste of my juicy apple pie you better be nice. You got that?

name: Lemongrab
line: I am sorry. Make pies, slave.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Okay, that's better, now let's see about this pie business.

name: Tree Trunks
line: All right, gentlemen. Have a look at my luscious, gooey apple pie.

name: Lemongrab
line: No!  Acceptable.

name: Shelby
line: Uh, Lemongrab?

name: Lemongrab
line: WHAT?!

name: Shelby
line: Never mind.

name: Ice King
line: Come on, you guys. That mouse showed us the room door.

name: Ice King
line: Say, you know what's weird?

name: Neptr
line: What, Papi?

name: Ice King
line: Well, isn't it weird how Tree Trunks' ability to make pies is specifically what helped us escape from that room?

name: Neptr
line: I make pies, too, Papi.

name: Ice King
line: Right, yeah, like, battery pies or summin'?

name: Neptr
line: No. Real pies. Don't you remember? I am your s-

name: Ice King
line: Hey! Look, another room!

name: Ice King
line: Good grief, it's humid in here.

name: Lemongrab
line: That door will lead us closer to the exit!

name: Ice King
line: Hold up, hold up!  Look!

name: Ice King
line: There has to be a way to get across without that thing chompin' our WOO-HOOS!

name: Neptr
line: Can't you fly us across, Papi?

name: Ice King
line: Oh yeah, I can sure try.

name: Ice King
line: Nggh! Aw dang, this heat is negating my powers! Can't do nothin' with this steam coming off the water.

name: Ice King
line: NGH, glob! Fah!  Nagh! Look at this!  Well, that's it. Show's over. I'll just die here and y'all can eat my body if you want to survive.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Golly, how we ever gonna worm our way out of this... fishy situation?

name: Shelby
line: I think I have an idea.

name: Shelby
line: That's a girl, Tree Trunks! You can do it!

name: Shelby
line: This is gonna work out just fine.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, that's warm on my undercarriage.

name: Ice King
line: H-help me guys!

name: Neptr
line: Yes, Papi!

name: Ice King
line: NNGH! Lemongrab, c'mon!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Bleh! Wow, that was heavy, man.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Aw yeah, I've been reborn!

name: Neptr
line: Look!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Let's go then!

name: Neptr
line: Papi, no!  Ouchies!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Look out,  Shelby!

name: Lemongrab
line: WOOAH! WUOAGH!

name: Lemongrab
line: OUGHF! MY JUICE!! MY VITAL JUICES!!!

name: Lemongrab
line: MOMMY!!!

name: Lemongrab
line: The hidden door! Hohuugh..

name: Lemongrab
line: My vital essence depleted... Must.. replenish...

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, step back, you all.

name: Shelby
line: Ugh!

name: Ice King
line: Ew.

name: Lemongrab
line: Nugh.. That'll do, Slave Trunks. To the spiraling ledge!

name: Ice King
line: We almost there, Lemongrab?

name: Lemongrab
line: Yes.

name: Shelby
line: Faster, TT!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Don't criticize my running, Shelby.

name: Lemongrab
line: This door leads to the center exit!

name: Neptr
line: The door is secured with an esoteric encryption system.

name: Ice King
line: Well that's okay, 'cause you can hack the mainframe or whatever, right BMO?

name: Neptr
line: I'm not BMO, I'm your son Neptr. I-I throw pies.

name: Ice King
line: Ohhhs! I grabbed the wrong robot!  Dang! Nuts face!

name: Shelby
line: Uhhh ... what is going on here Ice King?

name: Tree Trunks
line: Yes, I'm getting a weird feeling in my stomach, and I think it's 'cause of you, Mr. Wizard you'd better fess up to whatever you're doing.  I got no time for nobody dancing around and acting fool at my expense.  I'm Tree Trunks and people know I'm kind and honest, that's why people like me.

name: Ice King
line: Huh? Wha-wha-what's she sayin'?

name: Tree Trunks
line: So stop sellin' fib-bibs and give it straight!

name: Ice King
line: Grrrr! All right! I knocked you all out and brought you here!

name: Ice King
line: I'm sorry, but I had to do it. Each of you possess the exact qualities to pass the various tests of this dungeon Tree Trunks with your baking skills;  Lemongrab with your lemony-juicy...

name: Lemongrab
line: Essence.

name: Ice King
line: Yeah...  Shelby, who should've been the bait for the fish.

name: Shelby
line: Yeah..but no, thanks.

name: Ice King
line: And..BMO, who should've been here instead of this weird piece of junk that I don't remember nothin' about.  Ahhh, I failed!

name: Neptr
line: Father! Look at me.

name: Neptr
line: Are you happy with me now, Papi?

name: Ice King
line: Yes! Yes! Oh, my son!  The grand prize of my loins!

name: Ice King
line: Now you see why I needed to bring you all here. Behold! The Ancient Sleeping Magi of Life Giving!

name: Tree Trunks
line: What's it do?

name: Ice King
line: Whatever goes in the Magi's flames..comes to life, anything at all!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Uh, like an ashtray?

name: Ice King
line: Yes! Isn't it amazing?!

name: Shelby
line: Uh..You should've told us! I would've freaking brought something!

name: Ice King
line: Do not be sad. Because I brought the ultimate thing!  This.

name: Neptr
line: Your journal?

name: Ice King
line: Except..it's not my journal!  It's my Fionna & Cake fan-fiction!  All my brilliant fantasies will now be real.  Fionna, Cake, Marshall Lee; they'll all be living, breathing beings, just like me.

name: Lemongrab
line: You serve no function, you must be destroyed!

name: Ice King
line: Yes! Yes!

name: Book
line: Woo, hahaha, yeah!

name: Ice King
line: No..NO! Another cruel joke on my life!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, good..you're awake, you bum. Look what you did.. Get out of my Face! Yeah, yeah Get out!

name: Finn
line: This is the spot? Right here?  What was that?!

name: Tree Trunks
line: C'mon Ice Cream. We-we're leavin'

name: Jake
line: I'm tellin' you dude, my pie-dar's goin' 'nay-nays.

name: Jake
line: Oww!

name: Book
line: Write in me!

name: Finn
line: What the—This is very strange.

name: Jake
line: TT! Where is the pie at?!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh, Mister Lemoncarb ate it.

name: Lemongrab
line: Bye, don't follow me.

name: Shelby
line: Hey, Jake can I catch you a ride back home?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, but what the heck is goin' on here?

name: Shelby
line: Ice King was doin' some... desperate business, but it didn't work out.  He seems pretty bummed out 'bout it.

name: Neptr
line: Don't be sad, Papi. Your characters can always be real in the garden of your mind.

name: Ice King
line: They can?

name: Neptr
line: Remember when you showed me your imagination zone?

name: Ice King
line: Yes! Yes, if I can concentrate...

name: Ice King
line: It worked!

name: Fionna
line: I missed you, Ice King!

name: Ice King
line: Oh, Fionna, can dreams be real as waking life?

name: Fionna
line: Of course they can! Dreams are real!

name: Ice King
line: Then I will wait for you, from across the threshold of consciousness.

name: Neptr
line: Our worlds will surely meet, Ice King.

name: Ice King
line: I, too, feel this; and it feels so strong it must be true.

name: Finn
line: Who in this world is sadder than the Ice King?

name: Shelby
line: Me, watching this.

name: Book
line: Yeah! Write it down! Write it down!

name: Finn
line: SLAM!

name: Jake
line: Hey! I was trying to read that!

name: Finn
line: That book is above your level.

name: Jake
line: What business are you into?

name: Finn
line: None of your business!

name: Jake
line: Talk about it over lunch?

name: Finn
line: Heh, if you're buying.

name: Jake
line: Hey!

name: Finn
line: Hey!

name: Finn and Jake
line: Fight!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Ahh! it's terrible!

name: Finn, Jake and Princess Bubblegum
line: Lumpy Space Princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Whats wrong?!

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: You guys! Somebody stole something from me! Something I can't live without!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I'll get something to calm her down.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: I've been robbed! I've been robbed!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Out of the way!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I need help! Can you guys hold her down?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: Do something! I've been- ooh!  Ohh!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oops.

name: Finn
line: LSP! Who robbed you?

name: Lumpy Space Princess
line: It...was...puh...pee...pete...sa...sas...as...

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I think I gave her too much.

name: Finn
line: Jake. A crime has been committed. We must find the criminal.

name: Jake
line: We must.

name: Finn
line: And retrieve whatever it is that was stolen from Lumpy Space Princess.

name: Jake
line: Stolen. But all we have to go on is part of a name. Pete something.  Need more clues! Hold me!

name: Finn
line: Clues, clues, clues.

name: Finn
line: What's that? I can't see it.

name: Jake
line: Oop, sorry.  Aah!

name: Finn
line: There's something in her hand!  A key! A key to...what? Three zero three. Hmm.

name: Jake
line: Ooh, turn it around!

name: Finn
line: Ah!  Looks like we've got our first lead!

name: Finn
line: Hmm. Find anything, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Got some bags and...wait-  more bags. But no leads on Pete something.

name: Finn
line: Same here. BMO.  Start marking evidence.

name: Jake
line: Hmm.

name: Finn
line: Hmm.

name: BMO
line: Hmm.

name: Finn
line: Dude, check this!  Is this blood?

name: Jake
line: Yeah man, that's definitely blood.

name: Finn
line: Hmm. LSP's injuries were 100 percent emotional. So it has to belong to Pete Sa-something. BMO, take a sample and do a full blood analysis.  The works.  Hey, if that guy cut himself during the robbery, he might have gone somewhere to buy a mini adhesive bandage. There's a drugstore across the street!

name: Jake
line: Let's roll.

name: Finn
line: Woah!

name: Ann
line: And if the oozing persists, just come back   and I'll give you something a little stronger.

name: Finn
line: I'm Finn. This is my partner, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Hello, citizen. Had anyone in here looking to buy some mini adhesive bandages today?

name: Ann
line: A lot of people come through my store, gentlemen. You can't seriously think I'd be able to remember any one particular customer among the countless others I see on a daily basis, now, can you?

name: Finn
line: I guess not. Fair dues. C'mon, Jake.

name: Ann
line: Wait! Now that you mention it, there was this one guy in here earlier. Real suspicious type. Had a nosebleed. Said it was the first one he'd had in years.  Used to get them all the time as a kid, he said.  Can never remember if he was supposed to pinch his nose and hold his head back, or pinch his nose and hold his head forward.  Maybe it was a case of being boxed on the nose too many times.  Made the blood vessels in his lower septum weak and vulnerable to hemorrhaging. Anyway, his mammy always said it was because he couldn't keep all those picky little fingers out of his dirty little nose holes.  He didn't buy it though. He always thought it had-

name: Finn
line: Ma'am, can you give us a name?

name: Ann
line: Mmm, nope. No wait, yes I can. Pete Sassafras.

name: Finn
line: Did you catch which way he was going?

name: Ann
line: Of course! He said he was catching a train at 1127, Candy Kingdom Station, Platform 5. Heh. Sorry, I wish I could remember more.

name: Jake
line: See anyone who might be our guy?

name: Finn
line: Nope.  Nobody's suspicious here. Just a load of decent law-abiding folk.  What the-?! Jake! What's with all the turning into stuff today?

name: Jake
line: I really like turnin' into cop stuff. I literally can't stop turning into cop stuff.  Hey, there's Platform 5!  I see a nasty tranch!

name: Finn
line: Let's book him, son.

name: Finn
line: Stop right there! What's under that skeezy trenchcoat ya-

name: Blueberry Cop 1
line: Crook!  Busted! For attempting to board a train without a ticket.

name: Finn
line: Oh, guys, he's getting away!

name: Jake
line: We're not criminals, man! We're working the beat, just like you!

name: Blueberry Cop 1
line: Jimmy?

name: Blueberry Cop 2
line: Yup. Checks out. He tastes like police.

name: Blueberry Cop 1
line: Sorry about that, officers, it was an honest mistake.

name: Finn
line: Ugh. We lost him.

name: Jake
line: Not yet we didn't!

name: Finn
line: Ugh! It's too far ahead! We'll never catch it.

name: Jake
line: If we cut through the forest, maybe we can head it off at the pass.

name: Finn
line: Sweet thinkin'.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Yeah!

name: Finn
line: Are you Pete Sassafras?

name: Pete Sassafras
line: Wha-? Uh, I got a lot of names. Who's askin'?

name: Jake
line: Give back what you stole from LSP!

name: Pete Sassafras
line: Who? What's that, an acronym or somethin'?

name: Finn
line: Cuff 'em.

name: Jake
line: Ehh, I got this.  You have the right to remain... busted.

name: Pete Sassafras
line: Alright, you listen, flatfoot. There's been some kind of crazy mistake here. I didn't do nothin'!

name: Jake
line: Save it for the candy judge, Pete.

name: Finn
line: Look, you can cut the act and drop the sass, Sassafras. We've got an eye-witness and your blood at the scene of the crime.

name: Jake
line: You do the crime, you do the time, man!

name: Finn
line: Roll the dice, you pay the price.

name: Pete Sassafras
line: What dice? Oh, you guys are donkers.

name: Jake
line: Burgle our friend, it's the end.  For you!

name: Pete Sassafras
line: I wanna see a lawyer.

name: Lawyer
line: I'll handle this, Pete. You're upsetting my client. Just look at that face. That constitutes harassment, so give him some space. Don't worry buddy, I got this case.

name: "Lawyer"
line: Welcome to the next twenty-five years of your life.

name: Finn
line: We deserve donuts.

name: Jake
line: Let's ball.

name: Pete Sassafras
line: No, wait, please! You guys!

name: "Lawyer"
line: Guilty!

name: Finn
line: Man, we didn't just crack that case, we crunched it! Crumbled it!

name: Jake
line: We are awesome at being cops!  No question about that.

name: Finn
line: Call me crazy, but I was thinking maybe we should actually become detectives. Like, as a job! When we were out on the streets back there, getting those leads, busting that perp, it just felt so...I don't know...right.

name: Jake
line: I know, man. I actually totally do know exactly what you mean.

name: Finn
line: Aw, dude.

name: Jake
line: I told you I have a problem. I can't stop!

name: BMO
line: Howdy, partner.

name: Finn
line: Oh hey, BMO. What's going on?

name: BMO
line: I finished processing the blood sample. And I have the result.

name: Finn
line: Nice!

name: Jake
line: Yeah, good work, BMO!

name: Finn
line: It's Pete Sassafras's blood, right?

name: BMO
line: No. It doesn't belong to anyone because it's not blood. It's tomato sauce.

name: Jake
line: Tomato sauce?

name: Finn
line: Hmm...  Oh my mind! LSP wasn't trying to say "Pete Sa-something"; she was trying to say "Pizza something!"

I wonder what I'm going to write in you. What kind of person will I be when I get to your last page? Will I have my braces off? Will I have written a song that doesn't totally suck? Will I have met a cool guy? ...I can barely look at dudes without breaking out into hives. ...Just another day in teenage purgatory, AKA the school caf. Hive of bees in my head, get out! ...Mother, I'm not going to tell you again! ...Lies, lies, lies! ...Diary, it's my birthday tomorrow, but I don't feel like celebrating. I feel like screaming.

name: B.P.
line: Dear Justin I'm not sure you'll ever read this letter. Maybe I'm writing this more for myself anyway. You know when you're little, and the future feels really far away? You don't know what it looks like. You just hope you'll have stuff figured out by then. You'll know exactly how to act, and feel. You'll have conquered all your fears. And you'll never feel dumb or uncomfortable. You don't think about how you'll actually get there. The middle parts, between now and then? The middle parts suck. Which is why I split, I guess. Okay, so riding out your teen years in a cave is pretty dramatic, but do you know much reading you get done in a cave? I even figured out a cure for my crab hand!

name: B.P.
line: Oh Justin, I hope you're not too upset, and I hope you didn't spend too much money on that birthday present. It wouldn't have worked out between us anyway. You're kind of clingy. Sincerely, Nurse Betsy Poundcake.

line: Can you take us to him?

name: Cubby
line: Sure. He sleeps on the monster's heart. It's like a blood waterbed.

name: Cubby
line: This is as far as I go. Party Pat is right around this corner. Bye, you guys!

name: Finn
line: Bye, Cubby!

name: Jake
line: Bye!

name: Finn
line: Uhh... we're lookin' for Party Pat?

name: Finn
line: Oh, uh...  Well, listen. I know you don't know us, sir, but we need to talk.

name: Finn
line: It's pretty important, actually—

name: Party Pat
line: Shhh-sh-sh-sh-shhhh. You know who I am?

name: Finn
line: You're Party Pat?

name: Party Pat
line: I'm the chief.

name: Finn
line: Riiiight... right.

name: Jake
line: You're the chief.

name: Party Pat
line: Shhhh... before you talk to the chief, you must party with the chief.

name: Finn
line: But—!

name: Party Pat
line: It is the only way.

name: Jake
line: Dude, we've been partyin' for hours.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, he keeps drinking those honey-flavored energy drinks.

name: Finn
line: How's your nausea?

name: Jake
line: Full-blown.

name: Finn
line: Hang in there, pal.  Hey, Party Pat. You're the chief, and I totes respect that... but what we have to tell you is really important. And you said if we partied, we could talk.

name: Party Pat
line: But you haven't been partying.

name: Finn
line: What?!

name: Party Pat
line: You move to music, but that's not dancing. You chew pancakes, but you're not tasting. To truly party, one must leave behind the problems that are troubling  and open one's  mind eye.  I'm just kiddin'. You guys are party animals.  This is just a sticker!  You can stay in our cave as long as you want.

name: Finn
line: That's what I've been trying to tell you, man! This isn't a cave—y'all are partyin' in a monster's BELLY!

name: Party Pat
line: Oh, yeah. That makes sense. It's definitely the weirdest cave I've ever seen. Heh heh.

name: Finn
line: So... you'll tell everyone to leave?

name: Party Pat
line: Nah, we love it here.

name: Finn
line: But you're all gonna die if you stay!

name: Party Pat
line: Attention. Attention, everybody. Can I have your attention, please?  So... apparently we're not in a cave.

name: Party Pat
line: We're in a... MONSTER'S BELLY!

name: Jake
line: It's kinda peaceful.

name: Finn
line: All those bears... are gonna turn into the stuff.

name: Jake
line: Shh. Seriously? The only foreseeable threat might be all these trees being swallowed, but they're not hurtin' nothin'.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, good thing he isn't swallowing some deadly volcano lava. That would kill them for sure.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Whoaa.

name: Finn
line: The monster is headed toward that volcano!

name: Monster
line: Uh-huh.

name: Finn
line: We gotta warn the bears!

name: Finn
line: If we bum everyone out, maybe they'll listen to us.

name: Jake
line: Oh, okay.

name: Finn
line: Just follow my lead.

name: Finn
line: You bears gotta get outta here or you're all gonna be melted by lava!

name: Finn
line: Party Pat, do you know of another exit?

name: Party Pat
line: Well, there's the dark and mysterious mine, but nobody uses it anymore.

name: Finn
line: He must be talkin' about the butt intestines! C'mon, Jake, we gotta get outta here!

name: Jake
line: Ehhhhh.

name: Finn
line: One more bandage.

name: Finn
line: Huzzah! The party bears are safe, Party Pat. Y'all can party out here now.

name: Party Pat
line: No. To survive, my people need a phat party club to grind in. That monster's gut was totally excellent.

name: Jake
line: You're sick, Party Pat. I'm gonna go watch TV.

name: Finn
line: Hmmm.

name: Monster
line: Ohh...

name: Finn
line: Pat, he's not gonna let you back in his mouth. You scorched it all up with fireworks! Unless... Party Pat!  Party... pancakes.

name: Party Pat
line: Hear me, monster. My people and I wish to party inside you once more. Prithee take us upon thine gut and we shall party no more with fireworks but instead  with gentle lasers!

name: Finn
line: Hey, Jake.  Wait up!

name: Jake
line: BMO, I've been playing this 72 hours straight. Can I please save after this battle?

name: BMO
line: No, it takes up too much brain space.

name: Jake
line: I'm out of candles. Huh? Man, if Finn were here, we'd be doing this in shifts. Oh, well, let's keep grinding.

name: BMO
line: I cannot talk and run this game at the same time.

name: Jake
line: No!  Well, I guess that means I'm free. I live again!

name: Jake
line: ♪My name is Jake, and love my life. Kissin' on lady 'cause she's basically my wife. Fixin' up Neptr 'cause he fell from a tree. Catchin' up with Maja and Aptwe.♪

name: Ancient Psychic Tandem War Elephant
line: ♪Maja's in a coma, and she might not wake up.♪

name: Jake
line: ♪I'm glad you got a friend now even though that's messed up. Take T.V. to the market to get him into fruits. Take a little nappy in my blanket cocoon... Wake up really early just to cook for my friends. Later in the field at night I thought I saw death. Made myself a boat, and I sailed with a whale. Took T.V. to the market so he could try kale. And some other stuff...♪ Ah!

name: Shelby
line: Nice song, Jake.

name: Jake
line: What a crazy 2 weeks. I think I'm ready to hole up and go round tow on 'Age of Grinders'. But where's Finn? I need him on this adventure.

name: Shelby
line: Uh, well...

name: Jake
line: Hold on. What?

name: Shelby
line: If you don't know, I'm not sure it's my business to tell you.

name: Jake
line: Don't you dare, Shelby! Give up that greasy gossip!

name: Shelby
line: Word on the street is, Finn's been hanging with a new lady.

name: Jake
line: Who the honk is it?

name: Shelby
line: I don't...

name: Jake
line: Muscle Princess. It's perfect.

name: Shelby
line: I don't...

name: Jake
line: Me-Mow, from the future!

name: Shelby
line: Nobody knows. Finn's been keeping this on the super DL.

name: Jake
line: Why?

name: Shelby
line: He's just trying to be careful this time.

name: Jake
line: Oh yeah, I get it. But I still got to know who this girl is.

name: Shelby
line: Okay, just don't blow up his spot.

name: Jake
line: I won't!

name: Science Cat
line: Hey, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Oh hey, Science Cat. Where's Sword Shark?

name: Science Cat
line: He died of old age. Hey, are you gonna find out who Finn's girlfriend is?

name: Jake
line: Who told you that?

name: Science Cat
line: Word gets around, man.

name: Jake
line: Not to me, apparently.

name: Science Cat
line: Let me know the dirt when you find out.

name: Jake
line: I won't!

name: Jake
line: Huh? What's that? Sounds like a flute coming from above the canopy.

name: Jake
line: Huntress Wizard!

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Stop!

name: Huntress Wizard
line: This isn't working, Finn.

name: Jake
line: Dude.

name: Finn
line: Oh, hi, Jake. What are you doing here?

name: Jake
line: I wanted to check out your new lady friend, but I guess she just dumped you like a diaper in the dirt, bro.  I'm sorry, man! I want you to have a healthy relationship with someone cool.

name: Finn
line: That's so sweet, Jake. I love you, man.

name: Jake
line: Me, too, man. Okay, I'm okay.

name: Finn
line: But, dude, me and Huntress Wizard weren't together. We're just trying to conjure up the Spirit of the Forest with my flute spell.

name: Jake
line: What the blood are you talking about?

name: Finn
line: It went down like this.

name: Finn
line: I was just minding my own business, in my new alone place I've been hanging out at.

name: Finn
line: Hello.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: How are you playing like that?

name: Finn
line: I don't know. I'm just making stuff up.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Something in your notes has the quality of a powerful evocation spell. What spirit guides your hands? Tell me, or I'll put this up your nose.

name: Finn
line: First off, I'm a great fighter. And especially agile when I'm nude, so good luck. Second, my flute improv ain't no secret. I let my grass hand do whatever it wants, which is usually sort of shreddy and busy.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Let me see that hand!

name: Huntress Wizard
line: You're what I've been looking for.

name: Jake
line: Looking for a dope boyfriend.

name: Finn
line: No man. She thinks my grass arm flute playing could summon the Spirit of the Forest. I've been playing different songs for 2 weeks, though, and he hasn't shown up yet.

name: Jake
line: Who's that, her ex-boyfriend?

name: Finn
line: Uh, I guess they used to hang out, but maybe in some kind of mentor-student capacity.

name: Jake
line: So my theory holds. You can still make this happen.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, I really want to help her summon this dude.

name: Jake
line: Finn, that's not why you're here.

name: Finn
line: That's why I'm here.

name: Jake
line: Come on. Let's make some magic happen.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, my magic flute spell.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Finn. I had an idea.

name: Jake
line: Hi.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: I think the problem is your flute. We should make you a better one from a magical tusk, like the tusk of the legendary Thunder Boar that lives in these woods.

name: Finn
line: I'm down for whatever if it helps.

name: Jake
line: I'm also here.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Hey, what's up? It's late. Why don't you guys crash at my place tonight? We'll start the hunt first thing in the morning.

name: Jake
line: Ha-ha! I'm like your sleepover chaperone.

name: Finn
line: Grow up.

name: Jake
line: You grow up, you teen.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: So, yeah, here's the place. We got some nice soft dirt right over here. Pantry, in case you want a snack, bathroom. I got a console if you get bored, but it was a gift, but it was a gift, so I haven't really set it up yet. Night, boys.

name: Jake
line: Dude, I think I figured it out. You can't summon the Spirit of the Forest 'cause you ain't playing that flute for him. You got a crush on HW.

name: Finn
line: HW's just training me to live an ascetic life like her.

name: Jake
line: Okay, I buy that for like zero seconds.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Before we hunt the Thunder Boar, you should drink from this enchanted spring. It might give you crazy dreams, but when you wake up, you'll be immune to the Boar's electrical attacks.

name: Finn
line: Let's roll those dice.

name: Jake
line: Hey, dude, are you sure you wanna do that?

name: Finn
line: I've had plenty of weird dreams... Oh-okay! That was fast.

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: Welcome. I am the Spirit of the Forest.

name: Finn
line: Wow, dude, we've been trying to summon you for weeks.

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: And why do you seek me?

name: Finn
line: I don't, personally, but Huntress Wizard really wants to talk to you, man.

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: Did you know that a wolf's eyes are on the front of its head?

name: Finn
line: But, yeah, didn't you guys used to hang?

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: Most predatory species are like that. This little buddy doesn't even know I'm here.

name: Finn
line: Fella, I don't want to have a science talk right now.

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: Huntress Wizard only sees straight ahead, eyes on the prize. Now, why did you really need to see me?

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah! Can you make me immune to electricity?

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: Here.

name: Finn
line: Whoa.

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: Now plunge that into your heart.

name: Finn
line: And this will give me immunity to electricity?

name: Finn
line: I'll do it. To help Huntress Wizard.

name: Finn
line: How long was I out?

name: Jake
line: Seven long harrowing seconds.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Hold still.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, fells fine.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Great. Now we can hunt down the Thunder Boar.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah, the Boar.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Try to stay focused.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Magic dog, what do you smell?

name: Jake
line: Mostly, Finn, but also some kind of giant wild pig.

name: Finn
line: There!

name: Finn
line: Jake's joking. I smell fine.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Good work.

name: Thunder Boar
line: You just wanted a tusk? You could have asked!

name: Finn
line: Oh.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: You can stop. He is not coming. He is gone for good, and I should just deal.

name: Finn
line: Maybe if I played it a little jazzier, like, all syncopated?

name: Jake
line: Hey! Why don't you tow try playing together? Use that chemistry to guide the music. Yeah, just get in there. Cozy up.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: I guess we've tried everything else.

name: Jake
line: Wow...

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: Who summons me with the sweet song of longing? Oh, hey-oh. Can you see me now?

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Yes.

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: How's it been going?

name: Huntress Wizard
line: I've been talking to a lot of twigs. Where have you been, dude?

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: I've been right here, but the forces that drew us close became obscured as you drifted into the lifestyles of magic city livin'. Attracting forces come and go. It's the way of the world.

name: Jake
line: I still can't tell if you guys dated.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: But I'm ready to come back now.

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: Are you, though?

name: Jake
line: That's what I'm saying.

name: the Spirit of the Forest
line: Finn, who was your flute spell for?

name: Finn
line: Um... I was playing my flute for you the whole time, but I knew you had a thing with this dude, and he seems cool, so I was just gonna keep playing this flute song about my secret feelings until my flute broke.

name: Huntress Wizard
line: I-uh, I worry that hard meat don't get eat. That is to say, if I ever find what I'm looking for, I'll become soft and I'll cease to matter in this world.

name: Jake
line: What?

name: Huntress Wizard
line: Fear of softness is waht drove me to the mad and sad world of wizarding. And Finn...

name: Finn
line: Yeah, what?

name: Huntress Wizard
line: My flute spell was for you, too. You're an exceptional beast, and you have great hair. But exceptional beasts like us cannot fall in love. That is the secret of ordinary people.

name: Jake
line: Uh, that's real dumb.

name: Finn
line: I agree.

name: Jake
line: Wait, you agree with me or her?

name: Finn
line: Take it easy, Huntress Wizard.

name: Finn
line: Man, I can't believe all you can do is upgrade your armor in this game.

name: Jake
line: It's all about patience and treating each grueling repetitive battle as if it were your first.

name: Finn
line: Oh, snap! Finally!

name: Both Finn and Jake
line: Whoo! Blah!

name: Finn
line: What a bad and boring game. It was just what I needed.

name: Jake
line: I'm sorry it didn't work out with Huntress Wizard. She just needs time to miss how cool you are.

name: Finn
line: Attracting forces come and go, man.

name: Finn
line: Oh. Heh heh. What? Where are we?

name: Jake
line: I dunno.

name: Finn
line: What did we do last night?

name: Jake
line: Mayhaps we drank juice of the Elder Toad.

name: Finn
line: Eh, I doubt it. Yo, do you see this? We're in a cage! Do you think we, like, did something wrong?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, right. When did we ever did wrong actions? Get real.

name: Finn
line: Who ya calling?

name: Jake
line: I'm callin' BMO, see if he knows what happened.  Junk... My new camera phone... Wait, c'mere!

name: Finn
line: What?

name: Jake
line: I guess I vid-taped a buttload of stuff on here.

name: Finn
line: Play it for the clues within.

name: Jake
line: Okay, play.

name: Finn
line: Did you take it yet?

name: Jake
line: Recording.

name: Finn
line: Okay, get a shot of the portal.

name: Finn
line: Gonna go through this biz!

name: Jake
line: Alright, let's do—

name: Finn
line: Oh, no! What?!

name: Jake
line: Battery crunked out.

name: Finn
line: Dude, do you remember any of that mess?

name: Jake
line: No, but I guess we're here on purpose?

name: Finn
line: So we opened a portal to somewhere, but where?

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: The Nightosphere.

name: Finn & Jake
line: AHHHhhhh...

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: You're in the Nightosphere.

name: Finn
line: Are you sure?

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: Uh, yes. You got thrown in jail. Look.

name: Jake
line: Look!

name: Finn
line: Marceline's dad! We really are in the Nightosphere!

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: Up an' at em, people.  Eveyone out of your cages. My shift is over, and no one's shown up, so...

name: Finn
line: Whoa, wait. You're letting us go?

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: I mean... yeah, but not really. You're in the nightosphere, so...

name: Finn
line: So what?

name: Jake
line: Is there an outlet somewhere for this?

name: Finn
line: Hey, c'mon! Just tell us how we can get back to our world.

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: You can't leave the Nightosphere. Not unless he let's you.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Marceline's dad.

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: Yeah, that's Hunson Abadeer. He runs this place.

name: Jake
line: Hunson Abadeer?  Alright.

name: Finn
line: Well, dude, how do we talk to him?

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: You can't just talk to the boss. You gotta make an appointment.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, but we don't even know why we're here!

name: Jake
line: And what's up with this?

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: Ugh. Oh! Oh, oh, sick! You touched that stuff?!

name: Nightosphere Jailer
line: Later, fools.

name: Jake
line: Hey! Hey! Is there an outlet anywhere? You guys...

name: Finn
line: Maybe this is where they put all the dummy demons.  Right, big guy? You're not so smart, right? Yeah...  Let's go out that hole, man.

name: Jake
line: Okay, get on.

name: Finn
line: Mm-hm, mm-hm. Pretty neat.

name: Finn
line: Whoa, look!

name: Demon dad
line: Charlie, don't socialize with the smaller demons! They're dirty and stupid!

name: Charlie
line: Daddy!

name: Finn
line: What is that?

name: Jake
line: I think it's like sentient blood mist.

name: Finn
line: Cool.

name: Jake
line: C'mon, let's see if anyone knows where Hunson Abadeer is.

name: Finn
line: Alright, well, how about that dude?

name: Jake
line: Okay.

name: Finn
line: Yo, bros! How do we talk to Hunson Abadeer?

name: Half Monster Demon
line: The teller can help you. Get in my flipping belly, and I will transport you. My insides are habitable. You will not be digested.

name: Finn
line: Bye, mister!  Who's the teller? That guy?

name: Boat Demon
line: Okay, bozos, make room, make room, make room!

name: Small Demon
line: Ouch! Come on!

name: Boat Demon
line: Scooch over, fatty.

name: Small Demon
line: I can't, dude. This outbox is packed tighter than my tummy tunnel when I can't make brown on the camping trips because of my anxieties and I have IBS also.  Ow!

name: Finn
line: Hey, guy, are you the teller?

name: Boat Demon
line: No, no, no, this is the line to meet the teller.

name: Finn
line: No, man, are you for real? How long's the wait?!

name: Boat Demon
line: I dunno. I just like to row around on top of their heads.

name: Finn
line: Bunk that!

name: Jake
line: Hey, do you know about this?

name: Boat Demon
line: I... ew, no.  Sick.

name: Finn
line: Why do we need to see the teller anyway? We just wanna see Hunson Abadeer and find out what happened to us!

name: Boat Demon
line: The teller will get you in touch with Hunson Abadeer. We got systems down here. You gotta swim the proper channels, ya know?

name: Small Demon
line: Youse ain't special! Youse gotta wait just like the rest of youse...  Us.

name: Finn
line: Where's the line start?

name: Boat Demon
line: Oh... I dunno. The thing sorta governs itself.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Tight!

name: Finn & Jake
line: Ow!

name: Jake
line: That guy stinks.

name: Finn
line: Excuse me! Excuse me! Big man? Over here!

name: Big Demon
line: Huh? What, me?

name: Finn
line: Uh, yeah, how long have you been in line for?

name: Big Demon
line: How... long?

name: Finn
line: Oh, butt traps. Jake, stretch us to the front.

name: All demons
line: NO CUTTING!!!

name: Big Demon
line: I will kill you with all my hopes and regrets!

name: Finn
line: All right, dudes, chill! We'll wait!

name: Finn
line: I can't feel my legs.

name: Finn
line: SAY SOMETHING!! Say something to me!!!

name: Jake
line: I... can't. I got nothing to say anymore.

name: Finn
line: Just make up words then!

name: Jake
line: Bloobity bloo bloo blah blee blee blah. Shree shrah...

name: Jake
line: Hey, check it out. We're at the front of the line.

name: Finn & Jake
line: Woohoo!

name: Finn
line: Yo, yo! We wanna talk to Abadeer!

name: Teller
line: Wha... Huh?  When your thingy comes up, Hunson Abadeer will see you through the door.

name: Finn
line: 42 million?! What's the number on the door?

name: Jake
line: 41 million...  We're next! Whew! Man, I thought I was gonna throw up!

name: Finn
line: That's us!

name: Jake
line: Yaaay!  Nooooooo!

name: Finn
line: I'm gonna lose it! Waaaaaaaaaaahhh...

name: Jake
line: Hey, do you know if there's an outlet anywhere?

name: Two-headed Demon
line: No.

name: Jake
line: Do you know what this is all about?

name: Two-headed Demon
line: No... gross.

name: Jake
line: What's going on, buddy? You givin' up?

name: Finn
line: I guess.

name: Jake
line: You don't wanna just stick it out a little more?

name: Finn
line: I don't know if my little boy heart can take it.

name: Jake
line: Listen, Finn. Are you listening?

name: Finn
line: Mm-hmm.

name: Jake
line: Your heart may be small, but it's strong as a bull donk. And I know. You can wait through this line so we can meet Hunson Abadeer and find out why we're here, and why we're in a pile of banianials, 'cause you're a champ, OK?

name: Finn
line: Ok.

name: Jake
line: 上手で頑張ってね

name: Finn
line: Well, at least I can see the end of the line, I think. Let's wait the heck out of this line!

name: Jake
line: That's it, champ.  Hehehehe, you're pretty pumped up.

name: Finn
line: I'm super pumped!

name: Cloud
line: Does anyone need to go pee-pees?

name: Cloud
line: Go ahead.

name: Finn
line: Oh, yeah, we've got questions.

name: Jake
line: Put your hand down, Finn!

name: Finn
line: No way, dude, I got questions.

name: Finn
line: What the hey, Jake!

name: Jake
line: It's not answering questions, man. That thing is gonna bake our beans.

name: Finn
line: Hey, bloodmist cloud! What happened to us? Why can't we remember any—? Oh, it's gone.

name: Jake
line: Look.

name: Jake
line: Ride me, partner.

name: Finn
line: Hey, cloud! Where's Abadeer? Whoa, look at all these paintings. I think this is Hunson Abadeer's house.

name: Hunson Abadeer
line: Hey!

name: Finn
line: Hunson Abadeer!

name: Hunson Abadeer
line: How dare you chumps trespass here!

name: Jake
line: We just wanna go home, man.

name: Finn
line: Yeah, why'd you lock us up, Abadeer? When Marceline finds out about this, it's gonna stir up some heavy daddy-daughter issues.

name: Hunson Abadeer
line: NO ONE LEAVES THE NIGHTOSPHERE!

name: Jake
line: Ah, come on, man!

name: Hunson Abadeer
line: NO ONE! NO ONE LEAVES THE NIGHTOSPHERE!

name: Hunson Abadeer
line: Come with me, you juicy, little mortal soul!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Oh, my lob, Jake! You found the portal!

name: Jake
line: We don't want to hurt you, Abadeer. Just let us go.

name: Finn
line: What the—?

name: Finn & Jake
line: MARCELINE?!

name: Marceline
line: I'm gonna close this portal.  You're forbidden to come back to the Nightosphere!

name: Finn
line: But Marcy, let us help you!

name: Marceline
line: It's too late! Stay away from me, FOREVVVEEERRRR!!!!

name: Finn
line: Marceline's in trouble! We gotta go back and save her.

name: Jake
line: Alright, but I'm gonna take a shower first.

name: Finn
line: Jake! Jake!  Jake?  Hmmm...

name: Jake
line: Aaaah!  Aaaaah!  Bl-bl-bl-bl-bl!  Uh! That sounded horrible, man!

name: Finn
line: I don't know how to play.

name: Jake
line: Exactly!

name: Finn
line: Huh? Let's go!

name: Jake
line: Oh, wait up. I gotta finish tuning my viola.

name: Finn
line: Soft People! Why are you all in a tizzy?

name: Soft Person #1
line: The Gut Grinder! He's back!

name: Finn
line: The "Gut Grinder?"

name: Old Soft Person
line: Yes, the Gut Grinder is a gold-eating monster. In the past, the Soft People of this village enjoyed piling our gold in the center of town and dancing wildly around it. It was awesome ! But then, the Gut Grinder came and stole our pile of gold. So we adapted and learned how to hide our gold using a big cup. And it worked! The Gut Grinder didn't come back! But recently, and admittedly it was probably a bad idea, we took our gold out from under the cup and we put it in the center of town. Haha, 'cause--'cause we really like dancing around it! But, boy oh boy, was that a mistake. You know what happened?

name: Finn
line: Uhhh... it came back and ate all your gold?

name: Old Soft Person
line: Yes, oh, yes!

name: Finn
line: Aw, don't cry, Soft Old Man. I'll find this monster and bring peace to this village. I swear!

line: Look, sweetie, someday you'll be too big to hold. I'm as old as garlic balls, and if someone offered to pick me up and carry me, I'd do it in a heartbeat. Take it when you can get it.

name: Simon
line: We're both gross, darling.  A food truck! Might be chicken soup inside there.  Alright, now to get some chicken soup inside you-- Clams?  The Clambulance?! No, I need chicken! Marceline, cover your ears! MOTHER, MOTHER, MOTHER, MOTHER, MOTHER, MOTHER, MOTHER, MOTHER!

line: Mother, Mother!   Mother, Mother, Mother, Mother, Mother, Mother, Mother, Mother, Mother...!

line: WHAT THE HECK, MAN?! And they're all lefties! Sorry I'm not finding any loot.

name: Finn
line: Keep it together, chubby, because I think we found enough scrap to finish building our gauntlet dock; a dock that is also a gauntlet.

line: Don't be lazy, Jake.

line: Huh?

name: Finn

name: Finn
line: Stand back, Jake! I'm gonna melt 'em outta there! Full charge.

name: Jake
line: Whoa, don't roast 'em, man. You gotta flambé.

name: Jake
line: Ah. Perfecto. Bon appetit.

name: Finn
line: Hey! Can you hear me? Hello?

name: Jake

name: Finn

line: Been frozen... so long, I...  can't remember. Can't remember! Oh. Looking for help, your business? We love work for you.

name: Jake

name: Jake

name: Finn
line: Uhh...

name: Jake
line: Go on guys, fix it up!

name: Businessmen
line: Woo!

name: Finn
line: Well... they do seem really happy to do it.

name: Finn
line: Whoa!

line: Told ya so.

name: Finn
line: Come on! Let's try it out!

name: Finn
line: Yeah! Woo!

name: Jake
line: Yeah! Woo!  See? If we hire them full time, they'll be back in business and we'll be able to focus on fun stuff. Everybody wins!

line: You hear that, guys? Maybe I'm right!

line: These guys are great, right?

name: Finn

name: Jake
line: That's 'cause you had time to rest your body and refresh your brain.

name: Jake
line: Yeah! Good work.

name: Jake
line: Got 'em!

line: Hey!

line: ♫ Good little girl. Always picking a fight with me, you know that I'm bad... But you're spending the night with me... What do you want from my world? You're a good little girl. ♫

name: Fionna
line: ♫ Bad little boy. ♫

name: Fionna
line: ♫ That's what you're acting like, I really don't buy... that you're that kind of guy... and if you are, why do you want to hang out with me? ♫

name: Marshall Lee
line: ♫ Don't you know I'm a villain? Every night I'm out killin', sending everyone runnin' like children. I know why you're mad at me. I've got demon eyes, and they're looking right through your anatomy... into your deepest fears. Baby, I'm not from here. I'm from the Nightosphere... To me, you're clear. Transparent. You got a thing for me, girl; it's apparent. ♫

name: Cake
line: ♫ Oh, oh!  I got a hot potata!  And I gots two hot tomatas! Well they'll make a good sauce maybe... ♫

line: You're not so bad, you know.

line: Not so bad? I'm the son of a demon... and the Vampire King. It's not something I have to try at. You on the other hand...

line: ♫ ... on the table... the table... for as long as I am able! ♫

line: I'm not trying to be bad... I'm hanging out with you because you're my friend.

line: Hey! Come on... where you goin'? What's the deal? You're missing the party! Fionna, lighten up!

line: Look, I don't care if you're being a jerk to me... but nobody messes with Cake.

name: Fionna

name: Fionna

line: You want your Cake back? Come and get her!

name: Marshall Lee
line: ♫ Did you think I was lying? I said I'm evil, without even trying!  Already dead, so I'm not scared of dying... Drinking the red from your heart in one sitting. You think you've got me pegged, you must be kidding. I raise the dead up, and they do my bidding. Girl, I'm a thousand years old, I'm a riddle... Bad little boy! Yes, I'm bad, but not little. ♫

line: Uh-uh boy, what are you thinking?

line: Fionna!

line: Cake!

name: Fionna
line: I-I get that you flirt with me all the time, and it's funny or whatever, but you're doing that now?!  What are you trying to do to my head? You think I've got some little crush on you? Well, for however long we've got left... FOR ONCE, DROP IT, YOU FREAK!

line: Faking it! Faking it! Okay, my shirt is, like, filled with cream puffs!

line: Oh, come on! You guys got mad at me for a bad story? I mean it's cute, but... that's not how'd they be! But look, it might not be too late to polish this piece off—let's spitball off some ideas. Like, if Marshall Lee gets sick and dies, but he's got a brother we didn't know about! His name's Marshall Lee...roy. Boom, shocker!  Uh-huh! I feel goosebumps!

line: Everyone get out...  I know you're out there somewhere... I just haven't figured out how to get to you... but believe me, I will! I will...

line: Whoops.

line: And I dub thee Sir Jake the Dog.

line: You two now comprise the royal guard of the one true princess of Ooo. That's me!  As such, you may no longer own property or operate children and must render all treasure and wives unto your sworn princess within a hangman's fortnight.

line: We, the inhabitants of Ooo, owe you heroes our very lives. As the once powerful and dignified Princess Bubblegum sulked off into exile, it fell upon you two to save us from the impending comet of doom and/or from the hideous Orgalorg, who aimed to eat the powerful comet and grow invincible! And for that, we are eternally grateful.

line: I know I am.

line: This is it, fellas, the only spot in the kingdom left unscoured during my treasure census. I'm afraid it'll explode or something if I open it. But I really think there could, nay, there might be precious treasures in there. So I want you two to do it.

line: Man, this...seems like a really bad idea.
