line: Woah.

name: Jake
line: Wait up.

name: Finn
line: It's a dragon...a candy dragon. Look. He sucks the vitamins from the roots. And transforms it into candy juice? And then—And then the juice goes in all those drains. This. This is the lifeblood of the whole kingdom. Power, defense, recreation. This is everything. It cleans, it nourishes, and—and...

name: King of Ooo
line: ♪Muh-muh-muh money, money.♪ Go on...

name: Finn
line: What are you talking about with all this money talk?

name: Jake
line: Yeah, why are you singing the money song?

name: King of Ooo
line: What, you don't see it?

name: Toronto
line: They don't see it.

name: King of Ooo
line: Look, everyone needs juice to live, right? And I control the source of the juice, so by me charging a mere pittance for every single drop, I can easily quadruple my treasure pile!

name: Finn
line: Man, if you think we're just gonna stand here and let...

name: King of Ooo
line: Although...if this dragon thing could pick up the pace a bit, we could have enough of a surplus left over to export worldwide! Hey, you there! What do you think about picking up the...

name: King of Ooo
line: Looks like the Candy Kingdom empire is finished. But the four of us will live like kings 'til the juice runs out. What do you say, boys? Let's... Huh, I wonder where they ran off to.

name: Finn and Jake
line: Princess, Princess, Princess! Princess, Princess, Princess, Princess!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh, hey boys!

name: Finn
line: Princess, sklizz is really blizzed up with the King of Ooo! He really blizzed up all the sklizz.

name: Jake
line: He blizzed it all up, man.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Yeah, well maybe he should unblizz it then.  Why do I always gotta unblizz everything?

name: Finn
line: But Princess, under the tree there's—there's a dragon. And he took the juice!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Oh no. This is all my fault. Neddy...

name: Finn
line: Princess? Princess, what is it?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: That dragon you saw, he's my brother, Neddy.

name: Finn
line: Whaaaaaaaaa?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: We spawned together from the Mother Gum, and now I'm all he has.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Neddy's very sensitive. It's not safe for him out there. He needs my help, and I'll need yours.

name: Jake
line: Woah.  Ahhhhhhh.

name: Finn
line: It's pretty quiet, huh?

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Okay, guys. Neddy's in this cave. I know because my bod rod here is calibrated to our sister-brother bond. Now, people frighten him, so I'm going in alone. If he tries to run, STOP HIM.

name: Jake
line: I don't think we can. He's a giant.

name: Finn
line: Yup.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Thanks, guys!

name: Jake
line: This armor is driving me nuts!

name: Finn
line: No way, I changed my mind. I feel like a fancy shield. Or if I was like a dangerous candlestick. Like a knight's candlestick.

name: Jake
line: You don't stretch, man. This thing's cramping my crimps!  Woo!

name: Finn
line: Dude, I don't like that.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: Neddy, you sweet weirdo.

name: Neddy
line: Ooooh! OOOOH!

name: Banana Guard
line: Oh nooo! I just want consistency!

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: If the King of Ooo tries to come here again, you have my secret permission to stop him. No holds barred. Moosewood Stadium freestyle.  So, what are you two up to now?

name: Jake
line: Eh, garden stuff, I guess.

name: Finn
line: Ummm... Hey Bonnie, you always act like a loner, right? But next to your brother, you're the light of the party. Sorry, the LIGHT of the party.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: I mean, yeah. One of the first things I did after making sure Neddy was safe was to start making the candy people. I was formed in the Mother Gum. My mind and my gum were in touch with dozens of others, like a crowded womb. I guess I missed that.

name: Jake
line: But Neddy's from the same place you're from, and he's a wet hot dog around everyone.

name: Princess Bubblegum
line: People get built different. We don't need to figure it out. We just need to respect it. Maybe he likes his own company better than I like mine.

name: Finn
line: Well, do you miss the candy people?

name: King of Ooo
line: Hey babaloos, good thing that juice is back on. I was making a mint, but hoo doggie, my candles were starting to turn.  Thanks, Jake.  Ahh, that's the stuff. Hey, do you know if I can drink this? Like, is it like well water? Good for bathing, but not so good for drinking? You know what? I'm going for it!  Yup, it tastes just like you'd think.

name: Magic Man
line: Bzzz, bzzz, bzzz, bzzz. The waffle doll shall fall lest you eat the yellow dough.  Bzzzzz...

name: Jake
line: Hmm.  I'll... I'll finish this later.  So tired. And also hungry...  Maybe I should... eat some—

name: Jake
line: Huh? Uh...  Huh. Hmm. Everything's made of... me.

name: Jake
line: Pretty neat. I bet there's, like—like a cool city or something around here.

name: Jake
line: Nice. Jake City.

name: Jake Person
line: Hi!

name: Jake
line: Oh, uh, hi!

name: Jake Person
line: Jake! How you doing, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Uh, good, man! Good!

name: Jake
line: Man, this place is awesome!  Ooh!  Cool dolls! They look like the rare antique kind. Maybe my kids will like them. Mm. Wonder what my kids are gonna have for dinner. Maybe pizza...

name: Jake
line: Whoa-oh! Some kind of Jake-quake...

name: Goose
line: Eh? Is that Jake?

name: Jake
line: Hey there, um...

name: Goose
line: C'mon, man! It's Goose! Your best friend, Goose!

name: Jake
line: Oh, uh, of course! Goose!

name: Goose
line: Aww, Jake, Jake, Jake, Jake, Jake, ya big goof! How long's it been? Two, three years?

name: Jake
line: Let's see, uh...  one, two, uh... I've never been here.

name: Goose
line: "I've never been here." You've still got it, Jake.

name: Goose
line: C'mon! Let's get you home. Everyone's waiting for you at the party.

name: Jake
line: Eh—party?

name: Goose
line: No. Par-tay!

name: Jake
line: Do it again, Goose!

name: Goose
line: Hey, Jake.

name: Jake
line: Hey, what?

name: Goose
line: Now that you're back, how 'bout that five bucks you still owe me?

name: Jake
line: Uh, what five bucks?

name: Goose
line: Cheeseburger cheesecake ring a bell?

name: Jake
line: What—? What is that?

name: Goose
line: Oh, oh, that. Don't worry about that. Do not—don't worry about that.

name: Jake
line: Guess I'd better not worry about it.  Hmm. I'm hungies, Goose.

name: Goose
line: I think there's a leftover nacho basket or something in the fridge.

name: Goose
line: Just a sec.  Cold cut-and-nacho sandwiches!

name: Jake
line: All right!  Ow! Something's wrong, Goose. Jakey can't eat any of these nachos...  but Jakey needs nachos! Aah!

name: Urchin
line: Mr. Jake! Mr. Jake! Mr. Jake, the Mayor wants to see you straightaway.

name: Jake
line: Alright, lad, show me the way!

name: Finn
line: Jake! Hey, I got a for-real important question do you like cereal in your cake? Jake?  Hmm...  Mm-mm-mm.

name: Urchin
line: Mr. Mayor.

name: Mayor
line: Urchin, thank you for your help. Help yourself to the herring cakes.

name: Urchin
line: Right-o!

name: Mayor
line: Hello, Jake. Thanks for making it.

name: Jake
line: Heh. Okay.

name: Mayor
line: Now look, we're at orange alert here. Below us are gathered the city's top minds.

name: Jake
line: Hmm.

name: Mayor
line: And they've noticed that our seismographic troubles have increased exponentially since your arrival.

name: Jake
line: Mayor, uh, I want to meet these minds.

name: Mayor
line: Here are some of the minds.

name: Scientist
line: Jake, we want to perform some tests on you to discover the cause of the quakes.

name: Jake
line: There's no need. I've got it figured out. The tremors are happening because Jake is hungry,  and his stomach is growling. And the hungrier he gets, the worse the quakes will become.

name: Jake
line: I'll prove it!

name: Scientists
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Mention a food item.

name: Scientist
line: Omelet.

name: Jake
line: What's in the omelet?

name: Scientist
line: Chili! It's a four-egg chili omelet!

name: Scientist
line: Watch out!

name: Scientist
line: Analysis, Tim!

name: Tim
line: It's too early to say; this evidence is anecdotal!

name: Jake
line: Look, just let me stretch outside to get something to eat, and the quakes will stop.

name: Tim
line: That doesn't sound very science-y.

name: Scientist
line: No, but you have my permission to test your idea.

name: Erik Adamkinson
line: I don't like that idea.

name: Scientists
line: Huh?

name: Erik Adamkinson
line: If Jake leaves, that would mean the utter destruction of our world. I believe that Jake is an extra-dimensional being, a Glob if you will, whose psychic field holds our world together. If he leaves, his flesh will reconfigure, and everything and everyone here will disappear completely!

name: Tim
line: Oh, Erik Adamkinson, you're just a fringe scientist, well known to have a crackpot of crazy theories.

name: Erik Adamkinson
line: Hm! Perhaps I am. And maybe I am wrong... but are you really willing to take that chance? We should imprison Jake immediately!

name: Jake
line: What?! No way! The world's not gonna end just because I go get a bagel.

name: Mayor
line: Seize him!

name: Jake
line: Uh, peace!

name: Jake
line: Why?!

name: Mayor
line: Finish him.

name: Jake
line: Mm.  Bagel.

name: Erik Adamkinson
line: Don't worry, everybody. I will journey to Jake's Glob world, which, legend would have us believe, lies beyond the great sky-hole, and bring back the food of the globs to appease Jake's appetite, thus saving everybody.

name: Erik Adamkinson's father
line: Wait! Wait!  I want to go with you, Son!

name: Erik Adamkinson
line: I-I'm sorry, Dad. Y-you can't; i-it's too dangerous. Your mind is unprepared.

name: Erik Adamkinson's father
line: My son.

name: Erik Adamkinson
line: Huh?  Yeah!

name: Erik Adamkinson
line: There it is, the sky ho-o-o-o-ole!

name: Erik Adamkinson
line: Phew! Oh, my stars! It's just as I envisioned! Almighty Jake Globs, I beseech your aid! Do you have bagels? Hello? Hmm. Maybe those aren't the true globs. Yeah, they're too ugly to be—

name: Erik Adamkinson
line: I thought you'd be beautiful. But you're not!  You're hideous! Hideous!

name: Finn
line: BMO, resume.

name: Jake
line: Spaghetti...

name: Guard
line: Don't!

name: Guards
line: Huh?

name: Guard
line: Hey, you're a le—

name: Jake
line: Huh?

name: Jake
line: Goose?

name: Goose
line: Go.

name: Jake
line: But—but what if Erik Adamkinson is right? What if you and all the Jake peeps disappear and I can't bring you back?

name: Goose
line: Then you won't have to pay me back that five bucks.

name: Jake
line: But—

name: Goose
line: Go eat, Jake!

name: Finn
line: Uh, Jake? What's going on, man? Feeling okay?

name: Jake
line: Just getting a snack, Goose.  Just getting a snack.

name: Finn
line: Wait, wait, wait, wait!

name: Finn
line: Look, Jake.  More guardians. The Citadel, I presume.

name: Jake
line: Likely so.

name: Finn
line: Hey. Do you think maybe one of them could be my dad?

name: Jake
line: Eh, I don't think so. We'll probably know when we see him.

name: Finn
line: Right, right. That makes sense.

name: Finn
line: Hey! The Lich again! This must be where the prison cells be at. See? Good riddance, too. I hope you rot forever, you awful jerk-clapper. Some people just make the world a worse place to be in just by being around, Jake.  That's right. Bad apples. Lock 'em all up, I say. At the bottom of the ocean, where it's too dark to see.

name: Jake
line: Look at that weird ol' kid over there. He looks just like you.  Man, look at his clo—

name: Finn
line: Daddyyy!  Aah!  All locked up in there. D-Do you think maybe he's a criminal too?

name: Jake
line: Well, it had crossed my mind.

name: Finn
line: Jeez, man! Now I wish I hadn't said all that stuff before. Now my heart feels yellow and green.  Maybe we shouldn't even have come here—waah!?  Jake, what did you do?

name: Jake
line: It wasn't me! It came from up there!

name: Finn
line: He's melting the crystal all up!  Breaking cats out left and right! Turning cats gray! Did he trick us again!? I think he did!

name: Martin
line: Hey, kid!  Hey, do me a favor. Get me out of here, huh?  This fire smells crazy!

name: Martin
line: Thanks, kid. Now, where'd you guys park your Star Skipper?  This place is coming down quick, and I mean quick, like zip zip. Like wow, like boom boom wow.

name: Finn
line: Oh. We... we don't have a Star Skipper.

name: Jake
line: Also, Finn'ss your son.

name: Martin
line: Whaaat? No Star Skipper?

name: Jake
line: Ahem! I said, Finn's your son. He came a long way to meet you.

name: Martin
line: Son? Oh, hey, good for you, kid. In other news, I still gotta get out of here and the ground is melting. Huh?  It's all pooling in the center.

name: Finn
line: Hey, um... I... I wanted to ask you something. I... well...  Hey, wait up!   Dad, wait!  Dad, I need to ask you —- aah!

name: Starchie
line: Aaah!

name: Void Caster
line: Gree-nah-gah-ga-ba-ga-ga-da-da-ga-ga.

name: Jake
line: Finn, I know we normally come out of these things okay, but I got a bad feeling about this. Just promise me, if both my eyes get fried off, you'll fry yours off too.

name: Finn
line: What? No.  Listen, you don't gotta worry about a thing, Jake ol' pal.  We just need to defeat those five space villains, hijack the shard they're hijacking and sail it home to safety.  Easy peasy.

name: Martin
line: Yeah, Jake, smarten up. As soon as the last guardian dies, the fighting stops. See? He's bitin' the dust right now.

name: Finn
line: Aahh! Uh oh!

name: Martin
line: It's-- It's okay. It's okay.  You just gotta fetch me a gob of that guardian blood, son. It's got that good nooch that keeps us young in the crystal.

name: Finn
line: Nooch?

name: Martin
line: Come on now, partner.  No dawdling, yer old man needs ya.

name: Martin
line: Atta boy, Flynn! Do it for yer old man! Yeah, yeah, just get right in there! Don't be shy. Yeah!

name: Martin
line: Hey, good job, son! Now, rub some of that sap on my leg there. Make sure to get it into the chicken wing hole.

name: Finn
line: Dad...

name: Martin
line: Martin!

name: Finn
line: Okay, M-Martin. We need to talk.

name: Martin
line: Yeah, okay, kid, but hurry it up. I'm trying to act cool here, but this thing really stings!

name: Finn
line: Why'd you abandon me in the forest when I was a little baby!?

name: Martin
line: Oh... I mean... Heh. You know me. I'm a funny guy!

name: Martin
line: Ahhh, I dunno. It was a long time ago.  Who knows,  maybe you left me!

name: Martin
line: But hey, daddy's back!   You and me, daddy and baby, or should I say...baby and daddy.  Now slap that sap!  Whoa! Would ya look at that!  Smooth like new.  Pssh, couldn't fix the boot too, huh?

name: Jake
line: Dude!!  S'mores important junk happening! Look!

name: Finn
line: It's time to peel bananas on this fool, as a family!  How about it, Martin?  Dad?

name: Martin
line: I gotta run to the store!

name: Finn
line: Hrm.  Wha?

name: The Lich
line: Fall.

name: The Lich
line: You are alone, child.  There is only darkness for you, and only death for your people.  These Ancients are just the beginning.

name: The Lich
line: I will command a great and terrible army; and we will sail to a billion worlds. We will sail until every light has been extinguished. You are strong, child. But I am beyond strength. I am the end.  And I have come for you, Finn.

name: Finn
line: What? You don't like this stuff, huh?  Whoa!  Right in the doorbell.  Dad.  Jake, finish off the Lich. I gotta go catch my dad.

name: Jake
line: Finn, forget that loser!

name: Finn
line: Dad, wait!

name: Martin
line: Hey, cool guys. Looking for a new boss?  Chew faster, that guy's really moving.

name: Finn
line: Dad! Stop!

name: Jake
line: Finn!

name: Finn
line: Martin, I won't let you escape!

name: Martin
line: Hey, hey, you're a void caster, right? We gotta put some  gas in this buggy.

name: Jake
line: Finn! Let go! He's not worth it!

name: Martin
line: Oh, gross. Pedal to the metal!

name: Martin
line: Hey, what about air—?

name: Jake
line: It'll be okay, dude.

name: Finn
line: I mean, at least you finished off the Lich, right?

name: Jake
line: Oh, yeah, that's the good news I didn't have to! One sec.  Up you go! Check this out!  Brand new baby. The Lich is super cute now, and he smells real neat!  That sap rebooted him or something.  I like him a lot.

name: Starchie
line: Over here, fellas! Next stop, the Candy Kingdom. Previous stop, this weird place.

name: Tree Trunks
line: Mr. Pig, I think we should get a d—

name: Jake
line: Okay, run. Go, go, go!

name: Tree Trunks
line: Oh!  Oh, this changes everything!

name: The Lich
line: Hello!
